apps , general knowledge , smartphone , tech tips a a print email humse jyadatar log smartphone mein dharadhar apps download karne lagte hain
jab bhi koi app download kiya jata hain aur usay install kiya jata hain toh vah app aapke smartphone ki information ko search karte rahta hain
app aur mobile commerce companies ne is process mein apne liye business ki opportunity doondh li hain
ek baar jab aap koi shopping karne ki koshish karte hain toh aapka email , mobile number , e commerce company ke paas hota hain
jab aapki online purchase puri ho jati hain toh aapke credit card ya debit card ke bare mein information e commerce company ke paas hoti hain
usi tarah jab aap koi app download karte hain toh aapka phone number , email aur aapke phone mein mauzood sabhi contact number ki jankari app company ko mil jati hain
agar aapne flipkart ke app ko download kiya hain aur amazon se product khareeda hain toh flipkart ko uski khabar pahuch jati hain
aapki device ke internet protocol address se website ko aapki sabhi pasand ke bare mein jankari hoti hain aur oos information ke according website bhi aapko vaise hi products show karne lagti hain

huawei , smartphone a a print email chinese smartphone company huawei ne indian smartphone users ke samne apna naya smartphone huawei honor 4c launch kar diya hain
yeh ek budget smartphone hain
jo ki indian users ko lag bhag 8 , 122 rupaye mein available hoga
jaane iss budget smartphone ke features huawei ke iss naye smartphone mein aap 2 sim use kar sakte hain
iss price range ke smartphone mein dual sim feature ki behad demand rahti hain
operating system ki baat kare to yeh device android
lekin is os par honor ke emotion
isiliye iske buttons aur graphics anya kitkat phone jaise nahi dikhenge
ghz ka quad core processor laga hain
device ki screen 5 inch hain , jo hd display outlook deti hain
storage capacity ki baat kare to 8 gb ki internal memory milti hain
camera hain kafi khas huawei ke iss naye budget smartphone ko smartphone camera lovers ko dhyan mein rakhkar banaya gya hain
front me aapko 5 megapixel ka camera milega aur rear camera 13 mega pixel ka hain
agar connectivity ki baat kare to honor 4 c mein aapko wi fi
b g n , wi fi direct , hotspot , a gps , glonass , radio micro usb v2
aur usb host , 3g , bluetooth aadi ki suvidha milegi

02 sardiyo mein fruits se bane facepack
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge sardiyo mein fruits se bane facepack badhayenge chehre ki raunak , aise kare istemal
general knowledge a a print email sardi ke mausam mein skin ko khas dekhbhal ki jaroorat padti hain
aur is wajah se cream aur moisturiser ka jyada upyoghone lagta hain
lekin aap inki jagah fruit face pack try kare
jante hain kuch aise hi fruits face pack ke baremein kela best hain dry skin ke liye dry skin walo ke liye kele ka mask best option hain
skin pores ko open karneaur skin ko tight karne mein yeh mask kaam mein aata hain
papita kam karega moohanse sardiyo mein papita skin ko dryness se bachane mein madad kartahain
agar accha face mask chahiye toh papite ko mash karke usme2 chammach pineapple juice , 1 chammach glycerine aur ek chammach milk powder dale
phir is mixture ko chehre par 20 minutes tak laga kar rakhe
seb dega glowing skin natural vitamins se bharpoor apple mein astringent ki quantity kafi jyada hoti hain , jisse skin hydrate rahti hain
isliye seb ka face pack glowing skin ke liye behtar hain
aisa karne se skin soft ho jayegi
strawberry hain natural scrub chehre ko scrub karne ke liye strawberry ka mask taiyaar kar sakti hain
isme natural astringenthotahain , jo skin ke liye behtar hain
is mixturekochehrepar lagaye aur 15 minutes tak chhod de
orange sekare body ko scrub orange khaneke saath saath skin par lagane ke liye bhi bahutfaydemand hain
natural scrub ka kaam yeh paste karega
anaar semilegi natural oiling winter body scrub ke liye anaar se behtar kuch nahi
phir usmebadam ka powdermix kare
phir usme dry milk powder milaye
puri body ko naturaloiling mil jayegi

hari pattedar sabziya apne aahaar mein gahre hare rang ki pattedar sabziya jaise broccoli , dairy products shamil kare , kyonki yeh vitamin d ka accha source hain aur haddiyo ke liye kamal ka kaam karti hain
lahsun pyaz lahsun aur pyaz sulfur ke acche source hain to inka sewan jaroor kare
high protein meat high protein maans ka sewan jyada na kare , kyonki isse sharir ka calcium jaldi khatam hone lagta hain
isme khoob saara calcium , vitamin d , phosphorus aur potassium hota hain , jo ki haddiyo ke liye accha mana jata hain
chahe to seedhiyo se chade utre , jogging , dancing ya weight lifting kare , yeh sab haddiyo ko majbooti dete hain
football , basketball aadi khelne se haddiya majboot banti hain
vitamin d ka sewan roj subah jaldi uthe aur suraj ki halki dhoop mein kewal 15 minutes bitaye

04 ab apply karne ke 48 hours mein haathon
ab apply karne ke 48 hours mein haathon mein hoga pan card hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home finance ab apply karne ke 48 hours mein haathon mein hoga pan card 0 finance a a print email agar kendra sarkar ke hawale se aa rahi news par vishvas kare to voh din door nahi jab aapke apply karne ke mahaz 48 ghanto ke baad aapka pan card aapke haathon mein hoga
agar aap online pan card apply karte hain to sirf 48 ghanto mein pan card bankar aapke ghar pahuch jayega
jald hi iski official announcement kar degi
vitt mantri arun jaitely ne isi saal budget mein ghoshna ki thi ab sabhi high price vale lenden mein logo ko pan card dena compulsory hoga
saath hi black money ko rokne ke liye govt
pahli nsdl hain aur doosri uti technology services
dono agencies ke portal par pan card banvane ke liye online apply kiya ja sakta hain
iske tahat somvar ko sarkar ne ghoshna ki thi ki ab kewal aadhaar card ya voter card pan card ke liye pryapt document hoga
abhi tak logo ko apni date of birth , identity aur residence proof ke taur par 3 3 document dene padte thay
kitne pan card holder hain is desh mein desh mein 25 july 2014 tak
crore pan card ban chuke thay
vahi return file karne valon ki kull sankhya varsh 2013 14 mein
08 daily face par makeup karne ke side
daily face par makeup karne ke side effects
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge miscellaneous daily face par makeup karne ke side effects
general knowledge , miscellaneous a a print email beautiful dikhne ke liye hum makeup karte hain
haan kisi khas occasion aur event par aap makeup ka istemal karke khubsoorat dikh sakti hain
isliye aise products ka istemal daily nahi karna chahiye , balki festivals aur programs party aadi ke liye kiya jana chahiye
yeh chemical se bhare products kuch time ke liye aapko attractive bana sakte hain
lekin long time tak ise face par lagane se aapko nuksaan hi hoga
eyes ke aaspaas wrinkle pad sakte hain regularly face par foundation lagane se chehre par wrinkle pad sakte hain aur iske nishaan sabse pahle chehre ki sensitive skin par nazar aayenge
so makeup ko lekar itna jyada excited mat hoyiye
makeup hair follicle ka size badhaata hain daily chehre par makeup lagane se aapki skin par hair follicle ka size badh sakta hain
in bade hair follicle mein makeup ka kuch ansh rah jata hain jo bacteria ke saath mil kar pimples hone ki wajah banti hain
lekin makeup is lachak ko banaye rakhne wale tissues ko khatm kar deta hain
aap old dikhayi dene lagengi makeup mein mauzood pigment aur dusre chemical , bacteria aur pollution ke saath mil jate hain
aur phir aapki skin ke collagen ko nuksaan pahuchate hain aur dead skin cells ko dubara se develop hone se rokte hain
lekin 24 hours tak lipstick hontho par lagaye rakhne se yeh aapke lips ka natural colour ko chin sakta hain
hontho par lipstick ki bajaye koi lip bam ya natural product lagaye
eye infection eyes ko attractive banane ke liye lagaya gya makeup aankho ko nuksan pahucha sakta hain
make up mein mauzood chemical se eyes mein ulcer ya aankhon mien khujali ya jalan mahsoos ho sakti hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home finance ppf kya hain aur iska fayda kaise milta hain
finance a a print email aajkal ham sabhi ko income tax savings ki declaration dene ki chinta hain
tax bachane aur jyada return paane ka ek surakshit vikalp hain public provident fund ppf
ka return bhi milta hain
kya hain ppf ki khasiyat agar aap kisi sarkari scheme mein lambe samay tak paisa lagakar tax saving karna chahte hain to public provident fund ppf ek accha vikalp hain
dhara 80c ke tahat aap public provident fund ppf mein har saal adhiktam
ppf par milne wale compound interest ke karan aap long term mein accha khasa return bhi le sakte hain , jo retirement ke samay aapke kaam aa sakti hain
saal mein mature hone wale tax saving ke is vikalp par f y 2015 16 ke liye
apne bachche ke naam se bhi khulwa sakte hain khata ppf long term ka ek aisa investment hain jise eee exempt exempt exempt ka darja hasil hain
for example agar aapne apna ppf account 2009 10 mein khola hain aur 2015 16 mein aap nikasi karna chahte hain to nikasi ki rashi 31 march 2012 ya 31 march 2015 ko available rakam mein se jo bhi kam ho uske 50 tak ki limit hain
har saal badlati rahti hain ppf ka interest rate rate of interest ppf ka interest rate fixed nahi rahi ab yeh 10 saal wale sarkari bond ki yield se judi hui hain aur yeh average bond yield se
har saal ppf ke interest rate ki ghoshna karti hain
f y 2015 16 ke liye sarkar ne
lekin gaur karne wali baat yeh hain ki iska calculation monthly basic par aapke account mein har mahine ki 5 taarikh se pahle last date tak available sabse kam rashi par ki jati hain
kahaan khulvaye ppf account where open ppf account ppf account aap post office , nationalized banks ya chundinda private banks mein khulwa sakte hain
long term ke liye achcha hain ppf vah jamana gya jab retirement ke baad companies pension bhi deti thi
ppf retirement fund banaane ke nazriye se ek accha option hain
long term ke targets jaise bachcho ki education aur unki marriage , retirement aadi ke najriye se aaj ki date mein invest ke options mein ppf mein invest karna behtar faisla hoga
ppf account 15 saal ki avadhi ke liye khulta hain
vyakti ki agar ppf maturity se pahle maut ho jaye to uska ppf account band kar diya jata hain aur uske account mein jama paise uske nomniee uttar adhikari ko transfer kar diye jate hain
nomminee ppf account ko aage jari nahi rakh sakta hain
ppf account mein aapko har saal minimum 500 rupaye jama karwane hote hain
lekin aapke ppf account ko haath tak nahi laga sakti hain
ppf account open karwane ke liye aapko apne bank ya post office mein ek ppf account open form bharna padta hain
aapko document ke taur aapko apne residence proof aur identity proof ki photo copy dena hota hain
aapko bank ya post office ki taraf se ek passbook milti hain
05 chana khane ke fayde benefits of bengal
chana khane ke fayde benefits of bengal gram , chickpea , kala chana , gram , garbanzo hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips chana khane ke fayde benefits of bengal gram , chickpea , kala chana , gram , garbanzo 2 health tips a a print email kale chane bhune huye ho , ankurit ho ya iski sabzi banaai ho , yeh har tarike se sehat ke liye bahut hi faydemand hote hain
isme bharpoor matra mein carbohydrate , protein , fiber , calcium , iron aur vitamins paye jate hain
lekin sharir ko sabse jyada fayda ankurit kale chane khane se hota hain , kyonki ankoorit kale chane chlorophyll , vitamin a , b , c , d aur k , phosphorus , potassium , magnesium aur minerals ka accha source hain
kabz se rahat chane mein mauzood fiber ki matra pachan ke liye behad jaroori hoti hain
energy badhata hain
diabetes se chutkara dilata hain chana takatwar hone ke saath hi sharir mein extra glucose ki matra ko control karta hain jo diabetes ke mareezo ke liye kargar hoti hain
chane ka sattu diabetes se bachata hain
ek se do mutthi chane ka sewan blood sugar level ko control karne ke saath hi jald aaraam pahuchata hain
anemia ki samsya door hoti hain
chane mein 27 phosphorus aur 28 iron hota hain jo na kewal naye blood cells ko banata hain , balki hemoglobin ko bhi badhata hain
saath hi , gud aur chana khane se urine se related kisi bhi tarah ki problem mein rahat milti hain
02 chai tea peene ka sahi waqt jisse mile
chai tea peene ka sahi waqt , jisse mile aapko jyada fayda

general knowledge , health tips a a print email subah subah chai peene ke jo silsila shuru hota hain , veh raat tak kayam rahta hain
cardiovascular problems se yeh door rakhti hain
mid morning mein ise sabseaccha hota hain
ya phir lunch se pahle agar chai peeni ho toh green tea ko prefer kare
lunch aur dinner ke baad ginger tea lena sahi hain
saath hi agar pet mein koi gadbadi ho toh ginger tea lena best option hain
black tea stress level ko kam karne aurblood pressure ko low karnemein yeh chai kafi kaam aati hain
isme caffeine content kafi hota hain , jis wajah se body ko instant energy milti hain
herbal tea medical benefits ke liye yeh chai kafi famous hain
is chai mein caffeine ki matra bilkul bhi nahi hoti hain
isme herb , spices aur anti oxidants kafi acchi matrahoti hain , jo sehat ke liye acchi hain
bas regular jo chai bantihain , usi mein adrak , laung , elaichi , pudina aadi dale jate hain
08 patta ghobhi khane ke fayde benefits of
patta ghobhi khane ke fayde benefits of cabbage hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips patta ghobhi khane ke fayde benefits of cabbage 0 health tips a a print email patta gobhi jise hum band gobhi ke naam se bhi jante hain
patta gobhi bandgobhi brassicaceae family ki ek member hain is family mein aur sabziya jaise broccoli , phool gobhi aur brussels sprout aate hain
jinki paidawaar ki shuruvat , eastern mediterranean aur asia minor mein mani jati hain
isme vitamin , iron aur potassium bharpoor matra mein hote hain
diindolylmethane dim , sinigrin , lepeol , sulforaphane aur indole 3 carbinol , jaise labhdayak tatv hote hain
immunity ko badhata hain patta gobhi , sharir mein immunity system ko strong banati hain
isme vitamin c bharpoor matra mein hota hain jisse body ka immunity system kafi strong ho jata hain
anti inflammatory properties ; isme amino acid bahut acchi matra mein paye jate hain jo sujan aadi ko kam karne mein madadgar hote hain
you may also like parwal ki sabzi khane ke fayde
alzheimer ko kam kar deta hain haal mein huye ek research se yeh pata chala hain ki patta gobhi khane se alzheimer jaisi problems door ho jate hain
ismein vitamin k bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain jo alzheimer ko kam karne mein madad karta hain
peptic ulcer ke ilaj mein madadgar patta gobhi , peptic ulcer stomach ulcer ke ilaj mein kafi madadgar hota hain
you may also like hari pattedar sabziya khane ke fayde
skin ki sahi dekh bhaal ke liye patta gobhi mein kafi jyada matra mein anti oxidants hote hain jo skin ki health ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain

khane peene ki cheezo se jude kuch bhram aur satya foods myths and facts hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips khane peene ki cheezo se jude kuch bhram aur satya foods myths and facts 0 health tips a a print email apne aap ko fit rahne ke liye aap bahut se tarike apnate hain , inme se sabse upar aata hain aapka diet chart
janiye khane se jude kuch aise hi bhram aur satya myths aur facts kuch aise myths aur inki sachaai myth suji mein postic tatv hote hain
myth chini sugar nahi khane se diabetes nahi hoti hain
fact chini nahi khane se kuch extra calorie se to bach sakte hain , lekin iska diabetes se koi lena dena nahi hain
diabetes carbohydrate metabolism ka disorder hain
jise genetic aur lifestyle factors high calorie diet , jyada wajan aur sharirik roop se jyada active na rahna jaise tatv parbhavit karte hain
myth gud aur shahad chini sugar se behtar hain
fact shahad aur gud natural unrefined hote hain , lekin inme chini ki tarah hi kai glasemic index paye jate hain
fact sach to yeh hain ki seb aur kela iron ka nahi balki fiber ka bharpoor source hain
myth ; ek mutthi se jyada dry fruits cholesterol badhate hain
fact dry fruits ko sehat ke liye accha mana jata hain , lekin hamesha kewal ek mutthi hi khane ki salah di jati hain
iski wajah se logo ko lagta hain ki jyada dry fruits khane se cholesterol badhta hain , jabki asal mein dry fruits cholesterol ko ghatate hain
myth ; ande mein cholesterol adhik hota hain
ek ande mein kareeb 215 mg cholesterol hota hain , jo aapke din bhar ki 300mg cholesterol ki jaroorat ko pura karta hain
iska blood cholesterol par bahut kam asar padta hain , isliye ande healthy hote hain
myth khana banane ke liye extra virgin olive oil istemal nahi hota hain
fact aksar logo ka swaal hota hain ki extra virgin olive oil garam hone ke baad apne poshak tatv kho deta hain , lekin aisa nahi hain
olive oil sabse jyada heat stable oil mein se ek hain aur extra virgin olive oil isse jyada stable hota hain

05 angoor khane ke fayde benefits of grapes
angoor khane ke fayde benefits of grapes hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips angoor khane ke fayde benefits of grapes 0 health tips a a print email angoor khana sabhi ko accha lagta hain
angoor mein vitamin a , c , b6 , folate ke alawa kai prakar ke minerals jaise potassium , calcium , iron , phosphorus , magnesium aur selenium bhi paye jate hain
gram angoor mein sirf 69 calorie , protein vasa ki matra
gram aur fiber ki matra
kale ya hare angoor mein15 se 25 tak glucose ki matra paayi jati hain , jo khoon mein ghulne ke saath kafi samay tak sharir ko bharpoor energy deti hain
angoor mein paye jane wale flavonoids , jo anti oxidants ke roop mein kaam karte hain , yeh chehre ki jhurriyo ko kam karte hain aur aapki tavcha ko jawan banate hain
haddiyo ke liye angoor copper , iron aur meganize ka bahut accha source hota hain , jo haddiyo ke nirman aur unhe majboot banane mein bahut hi jaroori hote hain
iske rojana sewan se osteoporosis jaisi bimari se bacha ja sakta hain
meganize bhi hamare sharir ke liye ek bahut jaroori tatv hain , jo nervous system ko sahi rakhta hain
dil ki bimari angoor khoon mein nitric oxide ke level ko control karta hain , jisse blood clotting nahi hoti hain
isse heart attack ka khatra kafi kam ho jata hain
saath hi isme maujood anti oxidants ldl cholesterol se bachav karte hain
flavonoids ki jyada matra bhi acche anti oxidants ka kaam karti hain
isse breast cancer nahi failta hain
angoor mein resveratrol aur quercetin do prakar ke tatv sharir ko radicals se bachakar arteries ko bhi surakshit rakhne ka kaam karta hain
yeh blood mein platelets ki kami nahi hone deta
migraine pake huye angoor ke ras ke sewan se migraine jaisi samsya mein araam milta hain
red wine ko migraine ki ek wajah mani jati hain , lekin angoor ka juice aur iske beej se is samsya ko door kiya ja sakta hain
kyonki ismein mauzood organic acid , sugar aur cellulose ki matra pachan kriya ko durust rakhti hain
isse iron ki matra aapke sharir mein energy ka level ko banaye rakhegi jo thakaan aur alaspan ko door rakhti hain
zinc , celenium , carbohydrate aur polyphenols ki matra brain ko active rakhti hain
alzheimer bimari mein resveratrol angoor mein paye jane wala ek bahut hi faydemand polyphenol hain jo alzheimer ke mareezo mein amyloid beta denotes peptides ke level ko kam karta hain
britain ke scientists ke anusaar kale angoor mein paye jane wale flavonoids ka sidha sambandh nerv cells se hota hain jo yaddast sudhaarne mein madad karta hain
daanto ke liye haal mein huyi ek research ke anusar angoor ke beej aur red wine ke sewan se cavity aur masoodo ki samsya kai percent tak kam ho jati hain
vitamin a , c aur k ka khazana samete angoor sharir ko healthy banaye rakhta hain
yeh khas taur par immunity ko badhata hain
motiyabind flavonoids mein mauzood anti oxidants sirf skin ke liye nahi , balki aankhon ke liye bhi bahut faydemand hote hain
kidney ke labhkari angoor ke ras mein paani aur potassium ki bharpoor matra hoti hain aur albumin aur sodium chloride ki matra kafi kam hoti hain jo kidney se jahreele tatvo ko bahar nikal kar usay healthy banati hain
skin ke liye angoor mein vitamine a paya jata hain , jo skin ke liye bahut hi faydemand hain
skin ke liye faydemand tavcha ko healthy rakhne ke liye angoor bahut hi gunkari hota hain
ismein mauzood anti oxidants aur anti inflammatory tatv tavcha ke liye jaroori tatvo ki purti karte hain
saath hi kisi bhi tarah ke phalo ki tarah ismein mauzood vitamin c skin ko healthy rakhta hain
angoor ke beejo aur gude mein proanthocyanidins aur resveratrol bahut ki prabhavkari anti oxidants hote hain
jyadatar sunscreen lotions mein angoor ka pryog kiya jata hain
free radicals ki samsya chehre par jhurriya banaati hain , jo asamay budhape ka karan hoti hain
rojana kewal 20 minutes tak angoor ke gude se chehre par massage karke is samsya ko roka ja sakta hain
angoor mein mauzood organic acid ki matra se tavcha ko jawan banaya ja sakta hain
vitamin c collagen ke nirman mein sahayak hota hain , jo jaroori cells ke nirmaan ke saath rakt ke pravaah ko bhi banaye rakhta hain
lambe baalo ke liye angoor mein mauzood anti oxidants rakt pravaah ko sahi rakhte hain
isse baal healthy rahte hain
isme maujood paani ki matra jaroori nami ki purti karti hain , jisse blood circulation sahi rahta hain
iske beejo mein maujood vitamin e aur linoleic acid baalo ki jado ko majboot banata hain

agar aap apna rang gora karna chahte hain toh sabsepahle aapko tamam tarah ki cream , face pack ya scrub lagana chhod kar gharelu nuskhe ajmana chahiye

ise aap apni diet mein shamil kare aur dull skin ko glowing bana sakte hain

09 body ki immunity ko boost karne wale
body ki immunity ko boost karne wale best food
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips body ki immunity ko boost karne wale best food
general knowledge , health tips a a print email kya aap apne immune system ko majboot banana chahte hain
kya aap janna chahte hain ki kaun se phal fruits aur food hain jinhe khane se body ki immunity badhti hain
body ki immunity system ko increase karne ke liye kya khana chahiye
best food for strong immunity in hindi urdu
body ki immunity system ko majboot banane ke liye aapko apni diet par khas dhyaan dene ki jaroorat hain
jaise ki vitamin c wale food apni diet mein shamil kijiye
vitamin c wale fruit jaise nimbu , orange , papita , amrood aur strawberry body ke immune system prti raksha pranali ko badhane mein madad karte hain
vitamin k bhi immunity ko boost karne mein madad karta hain
body ki immunity badhane wale best food hari patteda sabziya apni diet mein hari pattedar sabziyo ko jaroor shamil kare
inme vitamin aur minerals jyada matra mein paye jate hain
iron , vitamin a , vitamin b complex , vitamin c , calcium aur fiber bahut hi acchi quantity mein paye jate hain
in hari sabziyo mein powerful antioxidants paye jate hain jo cancer ki wajah banne wale free radicals ko khatm karte hain ya phir unko badhne se rokte hain
green vegetables ko khane se digestion system healthy rahta hain aur isse pet saaf rahta hain
alsi ka regularly istemal karne se yeh hame kai tarah ki bimariyo se chhutkara dilate hain
alsi mein alpha linolenicacid , omega 3 fatty acid hota hain , jo hame kai tarah ki bimariyo se ladne ki power deta hain
vegetarian logo ke liye alsi omega 3 fatty acid ka sabse best source hain
sea food aur mutton zinc non vegetarian food items mein paya jata hain
zinc body mein hormones ko balance mein rakhne , skin ko healthy banaye rakhne , body ko infection se bachaane aur body ki immunity power ko badhaane mein madadgar hota hain
vegetarian logo mein khas karke zinc ki kami hone ka khatra rahta hain , isliye vegetarian log hari phallidar sabziya , saabut anaaz jaise rajma , chhole aadi aur dry fruits ko jaroor khaye
vitamin c vitamin c fruits , green vegetables , tamatar , shimla mirch , raseele aur khatte phalo mein paya jata hain
vitamin c khoon mein cholesterol ko control karta hain
vitamin c white blood cells ke acche se kaam karne mein help karta hain
vitamin c se aapka immune system majboot banta hain aur kisi bhi tarah ke infection se ladne mein yeh kafi faydemand hota hain
badam badam vitamin e ka good source hain
vitamin e body mein natural roop se paye jane wale natural killer cells ko badhane mein madad karta hain
badam body mein b type cells ke count ko increase karne ka kaam karta hain
yeh cells antibodies banati hain , jo body mein mauzood nuksaandeh bacteria ko khatm karne mein madadgar hota hain
green tea green tea mein antioxidants sabse jyada paye jate hain
isme calorie bhi nahi hoti hain
green tea mein polyphenols aur antioxidants paye jate hain , jo sharir ke bacteria ko khatm karke immune system ko majboot banate hain
lahsun lahsun mein antioxidants hote hain jo hamari body ke immune system ko bimariyo se ladne ki power dete hain
isme allicin naam ka aisa tatv paya jata hain , jo body ko infection aur bacteria se ladne ki power deta hain
rojana khane mein lahsun ka istemal karne se pet ka ulcer aur cancer se bachav hota hain
rojana subah khali pet lahsun ki 2 3 kacchi kaliyan khane se high blood pressure control mein rahta hain aur isse lambe waqt tak immune system bhi strong banta hain
dahi dahi mein doodh ke mukable zyada calcium paya jata hain
dahi ke bacteria aur poshak tatv body ke liye antibiotic ka kaam karte hain aur saath hi bimariyo se ladne ki capacity bhi increase hoti hain
doodh ke mukable dahi mein protein , lactose , calcium , iron , phosphorus aadi kai vitamins hote hain , isliye dahi ko poshak mana jata hain
yeh bahut hi powerful antibiotics hain , saath hi yeh cancer se lekar alzheimer tak kai saari bimariyo ko theek karne ke liye bhi istemal hoti hain
haldi mein mauzood curcumin blood sugar level ko kam karta hain aur glucose ke metabolism rate ko badha kar diabetes ko control mein rakhta hain

05 santra khane ke fayde benefits of orange
santra khane ke fayde benefits of orange hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips santra khane ke fayde benefits of orange 0 health tips a a print email orange ka naam sunte hi khatti meethi feelings aane lagti hain
shayad aapko pata na ho ki orange energy ko boost karta hain
din mein 2 orange jaroor khane chahiye
cancer se bachaav ke liye orang mein citrus limonoids hota hain
yeh breast , skin , pet aur colon jaisi jagaho par hone wale cancer ke bacteria se bachata hain
kidney ke rog se bachav roj ek glass orange juice peene se kidney mein hone wale dikkato se chhutkara mil jata hain
aisa mana gya hain ki orange juice mein vitamin a ki matra adhik hoti hain
ise ham carotenoids ke naam se jante hain
kam cholesterol orange mein fiber ki matra adhik hoti hain
boost heart health orange mein potassium aur electrolyte minerals dil ke liye sahi rahte hain
bimariyon se bachav orange mein vitamin c bharpoor matra mein hota hain
jo neutralizing free radicals ko protect karne mein madad karta hain
free radicals cancer aur dil se judi dikkaton mein bachav karta hain
viral infection study ke anusaar , orange mein polyphenols hota hain , jo body ko viral infection se bachane mein madad karta hain
aankhon ke liye orange mein carotenoids compound aur vitamin a hota hain jo aankhon mein padne wale dhabbon ko kam karta hain
blood pressure ko sahi rakhta hain
orange mein magnesium aur hesperidin paya jata hain jo blood circulation ko sahi rakhta hain 11 skin protection orange mein beta carotene hota hain , jismein anti oxidants paya jata hain
yeh body cell ko damage hone se bachata hain
09 menopause ke dauran kya karna chahiye
menopause ke dauran kya karna chahiye
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips menopause ke dauran kya karna chahiye
health tips a a print email periods kisi bhi woman ka adult hone par hone wala ek natural process hain , lekin ek umar ke baad jab periods aana band ho jate hain , usay hi menopause kaha jata hain
menopause ka process normal nahi hota hain
iske tahat woman ki body kai saare process se gujarti hain
meditation aur saans se related exercise kare jin ladies ko menopause ke dauran neend nahi aati hain , vey meditation kare aur saans se related exercise kare
sone se pahle caffeine yani ki chai ya coffee nahi peeni chahiye
dimaag ko control mein rakhe , positive soche , family ko time de
dard bahut zyada ho raha ho toh doctor se consult kare
calcium se bharpoor diet le apni diet mein calcium se bharpoor food ko shamil kare
isse aapko menopause ke time hone wali problems se nijat milta hain
daily morning aur evening time nikaal kar kam se kam 10 minutes tak walk jaroor karna chahiye
04 top 3 cloud storage janiye kaun hain
tech news , tech tips a a print email jab aap kisi file , photo aadi ko store karne ke liye jaate hain toh sabse pahle yeh decide karna padta hain ki aap kaun saa cloud use kar rahe hain
to aaiye jane onedrive , dropbox aur google drive ke baare mein
one drive sabse pahle baat karte hain one drive ki
yeh microsoft ka storage option hain
yeh specially windows users ke liye hain
jinke pass window 8 aur
yeh inke operating system mein pahle se mauzood hota hain
halaki yeh android aur ios mein bhi asaani se run kar sakta hain
iske liye aapko officially website par jakar onedrive android download karna hoga
philhaal iss cloud storage mein aap kisi bhi tarah ki file store kar sakte hain
jisme photos , videos aur documents shamil hain
ek baar aap isme koi file store kar dete hain to aap ise kanhi bhi doosre pc ya phone me access kar sakte hain
kya hain khasiyat onedrive service khas taur par window smartphone users ke liye banayi gayi hain
jiske chalte yeh window operating system mein mauzood hota hain
iske alawa yeh ms office se kafi had tak juda hua hain
yani ki jo log office purpose ke liye presentation ya photos ka work karte hain , unke liye yeh faaydemand hain
onedrive use karne ke liye aapko microsoft mein account sign up karna padta hain
jiske chalte aap outlook , xbox live aur anya microsoft ki services ko access kar sakte hain
halaki android aur ios mein aisi koi suvidha nahi milegi
dropbox dropbox sabse jyada popular cloud storage mana jata hain
yeh kafi reliable hain , asaani se use kiya ja sakta hain aur set up friendly hain
yani ki aap agar isme kisi file ko store kar dete hain , to ise dropbox website se , desktop applications for mac , windows aur linux ubuntu , debian , fedora or computer your own , or the ios , android aur blackberry kisi bhi service ke jariye restore kiya ja sakta hain
iske saath hi dropbox mein store kiya hua data aap apne pc mein asaani se move kar sakte hain
dropbox ki khasiyat dropbox ki sabse badi khasiyat yeh hain ki , isme file store ki koi limit nahi hain
iski strength kafi majboot hain
iske saath hi yeh pc , laptop aur smartphones sabhi mein ek jaisa hi work karta hain
dropbox ki kamiyan dropbox ke design ki baat kare toh user ko bahut hi kam pasand aati hain
dropbox ka design iss cloud storage ki sabse badi kami hain
google drive online office tool ka sabse best option hain , google drive
yeh ek complete office suit hain , jisme cloud storage ki suvidha mauzood hain
isme aapko word processor , spreadsheet application aur presentation builder bhi milega
iske saath hi 15 gb ka free storage space bhi milega
isme aap photos , documents , videos sabhi ko store kar sakte hain
kya hain khasiyat agar aap google drive ki service ko use karna chahte hain toh iske liye aapke pass google account ka hona compulsory hain
iske saath hi agar aapka smartphone google account se chal raha hain to camera se click ki gayi sabhi photos automatically google drive mein store ho jayengi
yani ki sirf google account se sink hone par hi photos automatic save ho payenge
08 android smarphone ki speed badhane ke
android smarphone ki speed badhane ke liye 5 tips
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home android smartphone tech tips android smarphone ki speed badhane ke liye 5 tips
android , smartphone , tech tips a a print email android smartphone ka market duniya mein sabse bada hain
duniya mein jitne smartphone users hain unme se har teesre ke paas android smartphone hain
ab aise mein jab android smartphone ka use badh raha hain , to usse judi problems ko solve karna bhi jaroori hain
high range ho ya budget smartphone , dheere dheere sabhi android smartphone ki speed kam ho jati hain
update your smartphone firmware kisi bhi android smartphone ka sahi se istemal tab hi hota hain
jab aap samay samay par apps aur os ko karte rahe
halaki os ko ek baar hi update karna hota hain lekin samay samay par apps updation dete rahte hain
aise mein jaroori hain ki notification mein aane wale apps updation ko avoid karne ke bajaye jo jaroori apps hain , unhe update kar diya jaye
reset your android phone android smartphone ki speed badhane ke liye dusra tarika phone ko reset karna hain
yani ki handset ko agar backup reset kar diya jaye to speed mein kafi difference pad sakta hain
basically yeh phone ko internally naya bana deta hain
iske liye aapko settings option mein jakar backup reset ko click karna hoga
check the internal memory space android users ko device use karte samay samay par internal memory ko check karte rahna chahiye
yani ki jab aap setting options mein storage par click karenge to internal memory aur external memory mein save apps aur data aadi ko show karega
yahi nahi agar aap messaging app data ko delete karna chahte hain , to asaani se kar sakte hain
iske alawa cache data ko hamesha delete karte rahiye
uninstall unused programs application android device mein kai aise apps hote hain , jinka istemal to ham nahi karte hain , lekin yeh device mein mauzood rahte hain aur faltu ki jagah ghere rahte hain
aise mein aapko chahiye ki in un useful apps ko turant uninstall kar de
device mein jitne kam apps honge utna hi phone accha chalega
useful apps ko hi install kare
halaki ki aap chahe to kuch apps ko sd card mein yani ki external memory mein bhi move karwa sakte hain , jisse internal memory mein jagah khali ho jayegi
software developer agar aap apne purane android phone ki performance ko sudharna chahte hain to iska ek tarika hain
jo phone software developer hain
sabse pahle phone ki settings mein jaye , uske baad ' about phone ' ke option ko choone
uske baad phone ke build number ko baar baar tap kijiye
uske baad aapke saamne developer option naam ka ek vikalp aayega
yaha jakar aap menu option mein teen badlaav la rahe hain
in teen mein window animation scale , transaction animation scale aur animation duration scale
in teeno ko badal kar

09 alsi ke fayde benefits of flax seeds in
alsi ke fayde benefits of flax seeds in hindi hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips alsi ke fayde benefits of flax seeds in hindi 1 health tips a a print email alsi ke fayde kya hain
kya aap jante hain , kuch ka manana hain ki alsi flax seeds duniya ka sabse powerful plant hain
kuch researches se yeh baat samne aayi hain ki isse dil ki bimari , cancer , stroke aur diabetes ka khatra kam ho jata hain
alsi ko 3000 b
8th century mein king charlemagne alsi se sharir ko hone wale fayde mein itna yakin karte thay ki unhone ise khane ke liye ek kanoon bhi parit kar diya tha
aaj 1300 saal baad experts ne primary researches ke bases par yeh kaha hain ki charlemagne ka andesha bilkul sahi tha
isme omega 3 fatty acid paya jata hain
gram omega 3 paya jata hain
alsi se hone wale fayde benefits of flax seeds in hindi
cancer modern researches mein yeh baat samne aayi hain ki alsi mein breast cancer , prostate cancer aur colon cancer se bachane ke gun paye jate hain
isme paya jane wala lignans cancer se bachata hain
alsi mein alpha linolenic acid paya jata hain , jo arthritis , asthma , diabetes aur cancer se ladne mein madad karta hain
khas taur par colon cancer se ladne mein sahayak hota hain
cardiovascular disease research se yeh pata chala hain ki alsi mein paya jane wala plant omega 3 jalan ko kam kar aur heart beat ko normal kar cardiovascular system ko behtar banata hain
saath hi yeh white blood cells ko blood vessels ke aantrik parat par chipka deta hain , jisse dhamniyo mein flack kam matra mein jama hota hain
madhumeh primary researches mein yeh pata chala hain ki alsi mein mauzood lignan ko lene se blood sugar level behatar hota hain
simit matra mein alsi ka sewan khoon mein sugar level ko control karta hain
isse sharir ke androoni parts healthy rahte hain aur behtar kaam karte hain
jalan fitzpatrick ki mane to alsi mein paye jane wale lla aur lignan jalan ko kam karta hain , jo ki parkinson disease aur asthma ko janm deta hain
darasal yeh kuch pro inflammatory agents ke bahaav ko band kar deta hain
jalan ka kam hona dhamniyo mein jama hone wale plague se related hain
yani ki alsi heart attack aur stroke ko bhi rokta hain
hot flash 2007 mein mahilaon ke periods par ek report publish ki gyi thi
vegetarian logo ke liye alsi omega 3 ka behatar option hain , kyonki ab tak machli fish ko omega 3 ka accha source mana jata tha , jiska sewan non vegetarian log hi kar pate thay
is tel ki massage se chehre ki skin glowing ho jati hain
isme mauzood lignan naam ka tatv , aanto mein active hokar , aise tatvo ka nirmaan karta hain , jo female hormones ke balance ko banaye rakhne mein important role ada karta hain
yeh blood mein cholesterol level ko kam karne mein bhi kargar hain
rojana subah shaam ek chammach alsi ka sewan aapko puri tarah se healthy rakhne mein helpful hota hain
isme mauzood ghulansheel fibers , natural taur par sharir ke cholesterol level ko control karne ka kaam karte hain
isse dil ki dhamniyo mein jama cholesterol ghatne lagta hain , aur blood flow behtar hota hain
isse skin healthy aur chamakdaar banti hain

kyonki isse aapkocurcumin naam kaantioxidant milta hain , jo cancer paida karne wale cells se ladne mein help karta hain
yeh pain relief medicines se bhi badhiya tarah se kaam karta hain
yeh healthy brain ke liye ek acchi drink mani jati hain
khoon saaf kare is mishran ko peene se sharir mein blood circulation sahi tarah se hota hain
diabetes mein faydemand biochemistry aur biophysical research ki ek study mein yeh paya gya kihaldi ke niyamit sewan se glucose ka level kam ho jata hain aur type2 diabetes hone ke khatre se bacha ja sakta hain

04 aloe vera ke fayde benefits of aloe vera
aloe vera ke fayde
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips aloe vera ke fayde
health tips a a print email dhrit kumari aloe vera ek jadu ki tarah kaam karta hain , khaskar jab baat aati hain beauty se judi problems ki
purane jamane ke egyptians ise plant of immortality amarta ka paudha kahte thay
aloe vera ka gel , tavcha rogo aur skin ulcer ke liye kafi kargar hain
isme hain anti itching property yeh beauty gel anti itching ki problem ko khatm karne mein madad karta hain
aloevera mein beta carotene , vitamin c aur e jaise prabhavshali tatv hote hain , jo aapki skin ko hamesha naye jaise banaye rakhte hain
itna hi nahi isme anti oxidant bhi hote hain
stretch mark ko karta hain kam pregnancy ke baad aur wazan ghatane ke liye aloe vera best option hain
iska istemal stretch mark ko khatm karne ke liye kiya jata hain
isme axioms aur gibberellins jaise hormones hote hain , jo jakhm ko bharne mein madadgar hote hain
pregnancy ke baad iske gel ko apne tummy par lagaye aur dekhe kaise khatm ho jayenge stretch marks
yeh hain kamaal ka moisturizer oily skin ke liye aloe vera ek kamaal ka moisturizer hain
yeh greece nahi hota , isliye yeh skin ko bina dry kiye moisturize karta hain
yeh muhanse or dry skin ke saath saath sensitive skin problem , jalan aur khujali se bhi aaram dilata hain
aloe vera gel ko muhanse aur acne vali jagah par lagaye , yeh unhe kam karega
isme koi shak nahi hain ki kai shampoo mein aloe vera ek main ingredient ke roop mein istemal kiya jata hain
saath hi iski alkalizing property , scruple aur baalon ke ph level ko balance karta hain , aur dry scruple ko moisturize karta hain
yeh baalon ke oiliness aur dandruff ko khatm karta hain
pigmentation ke liye hain perfect upay jinhe pigmentation skin aur chehre par daag dhabbe ki problem hain , unhe rahat ki saans dega aloe vera
aloe vera aapko hyper pigmentation aur sun burn se bachata hain
05 professional camera kharidte samay yeh
professional camera kharidte samay yeh na kare galtiyan
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge tech tips professional camera kharidte samay yeh na kare galtiyan
general knowledge , tech tips a a print email agar aapko photography ka shaunk hain , aur naya camera kharindne ka mann bana chuke hain , to market mein jane se pahle acchi research karna jaroori hain
bahut jyada mega pixel wala camera kharidna aksar users ko lagta hain ki agar camera jyada megapixel wala ho to photo quality bhi utni hi acchi hogi
agar aap digital camera lene ja rahe hain to ek baar megapixel ke baare mein soche , lekin professional camera lete waqt mega pixel par jyada dhyaan nahi dena chahiye
kyon nahi dena chahiye jyada dhyaan mega pixel ka kaam photo size ko badhana hota hain
professional camera ki quality vaise bhi bahut high hoti hain
is tarah ki photo ko save karne , internet par upload karne aur file transfer karne mein bahut samay lagta hain
total cost par dhyaan na rakhna kai baar log sirf main camera cost par dhyaan dete hain , lekin baad mein accessories ki cost milkar jyada ho jati hain
main camera ke saath accessories ki keemat mila di jaye to budget bigadna lajmi hain
kyo rakhe dhyaan professional camera ke saath tripod , additional lens , battery , portable charger , memory card , camera case , external flash jaisi cheeze mahatvpurn hoti hain
photo quality ke saath gadget care karne ke liye bahut si cheeze kharidni hoti hain
censor size par dhyaan na dena jyadatar users megapixel par dhyaan dete hain , censor par nahi
bade censor aur behtar lens wale camera acchi quality ka photo dete hain
agar censor accha hain to , megapixel count kam hone se koi fark nahi padega
kyon jaroori hain censor censor ka kaam camera se photo mein light bharna hota hain
censor accha hoga to photo mein behtar brightness , color aur sharpness aayegi
dhyaan de aapko portrait photo khichni hain ya landscape , nature photography karni hain ya arial
aam taur par bade image censor jyada behtar kaam karte hain
example ke taur par full frame dslr camera ke liye 36mm x 24mm image censor size hoga
compatibility chek na karna yeh point pahla professional camera kharidne wale users ke liye nahi hain
agar aap thodi bachat karna chahte hain to camera kharidne se pahle apne paas mauzood camera accessories ko janch le
kai baar naye professional camera mein purani accessories istemal ki ja sakti hain
kai baar purane camera lens , memory card , battery , flash aur filters aadi ko re use kiya ja sakta hain
review na padhna internet par lag bhag sabhi professional camera ke review mil jate hain
kyon hain jaroori tech review padhne se gadgets ki kamiyon ki samajh aati hain
gadgets review mein kai aise features ke baare mein bataya jata hain , jo baad mein users ke liye bahut hi important sabit ho sakti hain

04 bsnl landline se kijiye puri night free
bsnl landline se kijiye puri night free mein calls
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home bsnl tech news bsnl landline se kijiye puri night free mein calls
bsnl , tech news a a print email bsnl landlines customers ke liye good news hain
company may mahine se 9 pm se 7 am tak sabhi tarah ke network par free mein call karne ki suvidha dene ja rahi hain
sarkari telecom company bsnl apni iss nayi strategy ke jariye ek baar phir se landline business ko badhana chahti hain
may se milegi yeh suvidha company ki nayi strategy par bsnl ke cmd anupam srivastav ne bataya hain ki landline customers ke liye hum nayi suvidha shuru karne ja rahe hain
isse may se landline customers raat 9 baje se lekar subah 7 baje tak kisi bhi network par free mein baat kar sakenge
iske alawa company next generation network par focus kar rahi hain
iske jariye customers ko landline par kai saare naye features milenge
iuc ko milega fayda anupam srivastva ke anusar inter connection usage chart iuc mein badlav ka fayda customers ko milega
unhone bataya ki company ke paas landline ke liye pure desh mein taiyar infrastructure hain
kya hai yeh iuc haal hi mein telecom niyamak trai ne inter connection usage iuc mein kami kar di hain
iske tahat ek oprator apne customer ko dusre network se connect karne ke liye dusri company ko charge deta hain
trai ne iss charge ko per minute 20 paisa se ghatakar 14 paisa kar diya hain
jiski vajah se telecom companies ki lagat mein kami aayegi
naya connection lena hoga asaan anupam srivastva ke anusar company new costumers ko naya connection bahut hi asaani ke saath uplabdh karvaayegi
kewal iske liye grahko ko thoda sa installation charges dena hoga
company ki kull landline bazaar mein 62 hissedari hain
aise mein bsnl ki nayi strategy dusre telecom operator ke liye chunauti khadi kar sakti hain
green chai peene ke fayde aur gharelu nuskhe benefits of gree tea home remedies of tea hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips green chai peene ke fayde aur gharelu nuskhe benefits of gree tea home remedies of tea 0 health tips a a print email chai , chaaye ya chaay green tea peene ke gharelu nuskhe aur fayde janane ke liye yeh post jaroor padhe
yeh daanto ke liye behatrin medicine ki tarah kaam karti hain
baalo ki conditioning ke liye baalo ki conditioning ke liye 2 glass paani lekar usme 4 tea bag dale
lakdi ka furniture ko saaf karne ke liye ladki ka furniture saaf karne ke liye thode paani mein 4 5 tea bags dalkar ubale
pet ki jalan door karti hain 1 cup green tea mein 2 chammach pudina mix kijiye , isse pet ki jalan door ho jayegi
toner ka kaam karti hain tea bag ek natural toner ki tarah kaam karta hain
oos tea bag ko daant dard wali jagah par nichod le
jale ka nishan mitane ke liye jalne par chaay ek medicine ki tarah kaam karti hain
ulcer ke rogiyo ke liye faydemand ; pet mein ulcer ki wajah se dard ho raha hain , to thandi green tea pijiye
isme bahut saara anti oxidants hote hain , jo pet ke liye faydemand hain
raat bhar is mixture ko aisa hi rakha rahne de
gas ki problem se chhutkara gree tea mein agar peppermint mila kar piya jaye to gas nahi banti hain
behtrin scrub bhi green tea mein thoda white sugar aur paani mila kar chehre par massage kare
06 atal pension yojana ki puri jankari
atal pension yojana ki puri jankari
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home finance general knowledge atal pension yojana ki puri jankari
finance , general knowledge a a print email aap non formal sector asangathit kshestra mein kamgar hain aur future mein lekar insecure feel karte hain
saath hi pf khate ki hi tarah govt
is pension yojana mein apni aor se bhi anshdan degi
atal pension yojana 18 se 40 saal ki umar ke logo ke liye hain
atal pension yojana mein aapke saath sarkar bhi aarthik yogdan karegi
ne yeh yojana pahle ki nda govt
ki swavalamban yojana national pension scheme nps light ki jagah launch ki hain
nps yojana ke liye jo bank aur societies kaam kar rahi thi vahi atal pension yojana ke liye registered ki gyi hain
phil haal kai public aur private sector ke bank national pension scheme ke tahat khata kholte hain
sambhav hain ki vahi bank jinme state bank of india , axis bank , allahabad bank , state bank of mysore aadi hi nayi yojana mein khata khole
atal pension yojana mein premium jama karwana bahut hi asaan hoga
is yojana mein premium auto debit suvidha ke tahat kiya jayega
premium ki rashi har mahine fix date par apne aap automatically aapke bank account se atal pension yojana ke khate mein transfer ho jayegi
agar consumer 42 rupaye per month atal pension yojana mein jama karwata hain to usay 60 saal ki umar ke baad 1000 rupees ki har mahine pension milegi
atal pension yojana bharat sarkar ne launch ki hain
is yojana ko pension fund regulatory development authority nigrani kar rahi hain
sarkar ke budget ghoshna ke mutabik swavlamban yojana national pension fund nps mein khata khulwa chuke logo ko sidhe direct atal pension yojana mein bhagidaar banaya jayega
iske baad epf account holders bhi pension yojana ka hissa ban sakenge
atal pension yojana mein premium umar ke hisaab se kuch is tarah hogi age jisme aap is yojana ko start karte hainkitne saal tak priemium dete hain monthly premium ki average in rs monthly pension jo consumer ko milega in rs family ko milne wala total amount in rs
lakhs tags atal pension yojana ki puri jankari , atal pension yojna , atal pension yojana age requirment , atal pension yojana ka premium kya hain , atal pension yojana kinke liye hain , atal pension yojana ko join kaise kare
indian goverment pension scheme , atal pension yojana ke labh , atal pension yojana ke fayde , budhape mein aamdani , old age pension in india scheme , private job pension scheme
05 papita khane ke fayde benefits of papaya
papita khane ke fayde benefits of papaya hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips papita khane ke fayde benefits of papaya 0 health tips a a print email papita jitna khane mein tasty hota hain , utna healthy bhi hota hain
papita pachan sambandhit dikkato ko door karke , piliya , harniya , fertility badhana , heart aur cholesterol ke rogiyo ke liye bahut hi faydemand hain

05 30click for other resources ka matlab hota hain ki y
click for other resources ka matlab hota hain ki yeh ads aapki website par click nahi huye hain ya phir yeh ads galti se click ho gye hain
in clicks par aapko koi paisa nahi milega
adnow mein 100 ads agar usme se 50 ads click for other resources ke hote hain
yeh ads invalid click ke ho sakte hain , jaisa ki adnow manta hain
yani ki click for other ka paisa aapko nahi milta hain
br br aap apne adnow mein sites par click kare aur apni blog ke status mein active likha hain to aapko verification ki jaroorat nahi hain
iska matlab hain ki account active hain
bas apne blog par traffic badhana hoga
br br adnow google ke mukable kam hi earning deta hain
lekin phir bhi yeh extra earning ka accha source hain
br br aapka main ad network google adsense hi hoga
maan lijiye agar aap google adsense se 100 ek mahine mein earn karenge to vahi adnow se aap 30 ek mahine mein earn karenge
br br aap adnow ke tickets par click kare aur apna question unke customers care se puchhe
br br thanks
br br hinglishpediahttps www
05 30bhai aap ne jo kaha ki adnow ko verification code
bhai aap ne jo kaha ki adnow ko verification code ke jariye karna hota hai but muje sign up karne ke baad eisa koi code nahi mila lekin mai ne adnow me ads create kar ke mere blog par laga diye hai aur ads show bhi ho rahe hai
aur ak baat click from other resource ka kya matab hai aaj 4 click bata rahi hai but kuch income nahi huvi hai
05 30sir kya aap muze bata sakte ho ki adnow ads ke cod
sir kya aap muze bata sakte ho ki adnow ads ke code kaise blog me lagaye jaata haianil ganvithttps www
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home miscellaneous taboola kya hain
miscellaneous a a print email taboola kya hain
what is taboola
yeh ek native ads company hain , jiska kaam website par ads dikhana hain aur yeh google adsense ki tarah hi advertiser aur publisher dono ke liye kaam karti hain
kahne ka matlab yeh hain kiagar aapko internet par apne product ya apni website ka koi promotion karna ho toh aap taboola ke advertiser ban sakte hain
taboola advertiser ke ads publishers ki website par show karti hain
jis par kisi user ke click karne par taboola advertiserse paisa le leti hain aur kuch commission apne paas rakh leti hain aur baaki ki payment publisher ko karti hain
taboola aaj kal har badi websites par ads dikha rahi hain
aapne sabhi newspaper ki website aur bhi kai website par iske ads dekhe hi honge
yani ki agar aapke paas apni website hain toh aap taboola account ko approve karwa kar internet se paisa kama sakte hain
kahne ka matlab hain ki aap apni website par taboola ke ads dikha sakte hain aur jab koi user ya visitor oon ads par click karega toh aapko paise milenge
taboola publisher banane ke liye aapke website ki kya jaroorate honi chahiye
what is the requirement of getting taboola publisher account in hindi urdu
taboola publisher banne ke liye aapke website par kam se kam 40 , 000 , 00 pages view har monthhoni jaroori hain
jab yeh company start huyi thi toh yeh shuru mein 5 , 00 , 000 pages view month maangti thi , dheere dheere jaisehi yeh company aagebadhi toh iski demand10 , 000 , 00 tak pahuch gyi , abhi maine iske liye apply kiya toh taboola ki team ka reply aaya ki kya aapki website par 40 , 00 , 000 pages view per month hain
tabhi hum aapko taboola ki publisheraccountko approve kar sakte hain
yani ki matlab saaf hain ki yeh sirf big websites ke liye acchi hain
hum jaise chhote website aur blog ko yeh approve nahi karegi , kyonki hamara traffic itna zyada nahi hain
lekin agar aapke website ki traffic itni zyadahigh hain toh yeh aapke liye faydemand rahegi
taboola kisi bhi language mein likhi huyi website ko approve karta hain , iske liyewebsite ka language koi mayne nahi rakhta hain , aap chahe kisi bhi bhasha language mein apni websitebanaye toh yeh aapki website ko approve kar lega , bas shart yehi hain ki traffic 40 , 000 , 00 per month pageshona chahiye
taboola ke ads logoko bahutzyada attract karte hain , in par click honeki sambhavna bahut jyada hoti hain
halaki yeh google adsense se thoda kam cpc deta hain , lekin iski ctr kafi high hain
kahne ka matlab yeh hain ki yeh google adsense ke ads ke mukable taboola ke ads par click hone par aapko shayad thodi kam keemat mile , lekin taboola ke ads kafi attractive hote hain jis par users google adsense ke mukable jyada click karte hain , matlab ki iska ctr google adsense se kafi behtar hain
har mahine ki payment ko 45th day mein payoneer ke jariye payment karta hain
payoneer paypal ki tarah ek freelancer service hain , jo aapko duniya ke kisi bhi ek account se dusre account mein paisa transfer karti hain , jiske badle mein veh transfer ke dauran kuch commission leti hain
lekin payoneer paypal se zyada acchi hain , kyonki iska transfer fee paypal ke mukable kam hain
taboola ke ads bahut acche hain , yeh google adsense ka alternative toh ban sakta hain
hum jaise chote publishers ke liye yeh hamara account approve nahi karta hain
why eat apple with peels hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips seb ko chhilko ke saath kyun khana chahiye
why eat apple with peels 0 health tips a a print email seb ko chhilko peels ke saath kyon khana chahiye
dimaag ki kamjori ke liye seb ke chhilke mein paya jane wala tatv brain cell ko damage hone se bachate hain
bimariyo se bachaye seb ke chhilko mein anti oxidants aur flavonoids hote hain jo ki ek healthy body ko banaye rakhne mein madad karte hain
diabetes ke liye agar aapko diabetes ki problem hain to uske liye apple peels ko khana bahut hi badhiya rahega
yeh badhte huye blood sugar level ko control karta hain
anemia se bachaye seb ka chhilka pregnancy mein khoon ki kami ko door karne mein madad karta hain
isme bahut saara iron aur folic acid hota hain
saath hi isme calcium , potassium , magnesium aur zinc bhi acchi matra mein paye jate hain
cancer se bachaye seb ke chhilke mein triterpenoids tatv paya jata hain
yeh hame liver , breast aur colon cancer se bachata hain
gallstone ki problem mein seb ke chhilke mein kafi saara fiber paya jata hain , jisse stone pitt ki thaili mein jam nahi pata hain
wajan kam kare ; seb ke chilke mein enzyme hota hain jise hum ursolic acid kahte hain
haddiyo ki majbooti ke liye calcium bahut hi jaroori hain

kabz hone par beetroot mein fiber hone se pet se judi samsyaye khatm ho jati hain
pregnant mahilaon ke liye faydemand beetroot mein folic acid hota hain , jo pregnant mahilaon ke un born baby ke liye sahi rahta hain
iske alawa beetroot se pregnancy ke samay mahila ko energy milti hain
beetroot mein maujood folic acid baby ki spinal cord ke liye accha hota hain
osteoporosis ke liye beetroot mineral silica hota hain
jo calcium ki purti karta hain
calcium sharir ke liye jaroori tatv hain
calcium se haddi aur daant majboot hote hain

jo hemagglutinin ko sahi rakhta hain

jisse sharir ka energy level badh jata hain
jo cancer se ladne mein skasham hain
jin logo ko tymer aur breast cancer hota hain
beetroot khane se cancer ke treatment mein madad milti hain
ise ham nitric oxide ke naam se jante hain
bad cholesterol ko kam karna chukandar mein ghulne wala fiber , flavonoids aur betacyanin hota hain
isme anti oxidant hota hain

vitamin c ke khazane se bharpoor kathal mein jaroori methanol aur ethanol hota hain
kathal khane se immunity power badhti hain
bahut kam phal aur sabziya instant energy dene wali hoti hain , lekin kathal unme se ek hain , kyonki isme energy dene wale 2 tatv carbohydrate aur calorie prayapt matra mein maujood hain
blood pressure control karta hain
blood pressure ko control karne mein potassium bahut hi jaroori hota hain
sharir ko rojana 4700 ml potassium ki jaroorat hoti hain , taki sharir mein sodium ka balance bana rahe
in sabke ke alawa potassium heart muscles ki functioning sahi rakhta hain
yeh fluid level ke saath electrolyte level ke balance ko bhi banaye rakhta hain
isse stroke aur heart attack ka khatra kafi hud tak kam ho jata hain
per 100 gram kathal mein
gram khane ko pachane wale fiber hote hain
colon cancer se bachata hain
anti oxidants ki matra sharir se faltu toxins ko nikal kar usay healthy banati hain
asthma mein faydemand dhool , pollution aur kharab immunity system ke karan asthma ke rogiyo ki sankhya har saal badh rahi hain
kathal mein calcium ki sabse jyada matra payi jati hain , jo haddiyo ko healthy aur strong banati hain
isse arthritis , osteoporosis jaisi bimariyo se door raha ja sakta hain
vaise to calcium ki purti ke liye dairy products ko best mana jata hain , lekin kuch phalo aur sabziyo ko kha kar bhi iski purti ki ja sakti hain
khoon ki kami nahi hoti blood mein red cells ki kami hemoglobin aur anemia jaisi samsyaon ko paida karti hain
iske alawa kai minerals jaise copper aur magnesium ki matra blood ki kami ko door karti hain
05 blackberry ne indian market mein launch
blackberry ne indian market meinlaunch kiya blackberry leap
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home blackberry smartphone blackberry ne indian market meinlaunch kiya blackberry leap
blackberry , smartphone a a print email blackberry company ne apna latest smartphone ' leap ' ko indian bazaar mein lauch kar diya hain
is phone ki keemat company ne 21 , 490 rupaye rakhi hain
yeh phone retail stores ke saath saath online store par bhi available hoga
blackberry leap ke features yeh ek single sim smartphone hain , jo company ke bb10 operating system version
iska display 5 inch hain , jo hd 720x 1280 resolution quality deta hain
saath hi yeh 294 pixel per inch density bhi deta hain
phone mein 8 megapixel auto focus rear camera led flash ke saath hain
vahi front camera 2 megapixel ka hain
phone ki internal memory 16 gb hain , jise micro sd card ki madad se 128 gb tak badhaya ja sakta hain
connectivity ke liye wi fi , wi fi direct , bluetooth options diye gye hain
phone mein light censor bhi diye gye hain
blackberry ne ek aisa hi smartphone blackberry rio z20 december 2014 mein launch kiya tha
jisme blackberry leap ki tarah hi features diye gye thay
05 whatsapp calling feature kafi hain
whatsapp calling feature kafi hain mehanga hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home tech news tech tips whatsapp calling feature kafi hain mehanga 0 tech news , tech tips a a print email whatsapp dwara calling feature shuru karne se users bhale hi khush nazar aa rahe hain
lekin hakikat isse ult hain , ji haa ek research ke mutabik whatsapp voice calling feature sasti nahi balki tradition call se bhi jyada mehnga padta hain
free mein nahi milta hain kuch bhi whatsapp voice call ke liye wi fi ya mobile data ki jaroorat hoti hain
aise mein company dwara free service dena kisi bade khel se kam nahi hain
halaki abhi net neutrality ko lekar kafi bawaal macha raha
lekin kya aap jante hain ki whatsapp voice calling feature aapko free mein nahi blki vaise ke evaj mein milti hain
ek research ka yeh kehna hain ki whatsapp voice call karne par data kharch hota hain , jo ki traditional call se bhi mehnga padta hain
is tarah se ho raha hain khel research ki maane to 4g par whatsapp call karne par 1 minute mein
mb data kharch hota hain
iska matlab hain ki agar koi 500 mb ka monthly pack dalvaata hain , vah 6 ghanto mein khatm ho jayega
jo ki traditional call ke 11 minutes per day ke barabar hota hain
aise mein whatsapp call kafi effective nahi hain
aur iski cost traditional calls se bhi jyada pad sakti hain
din mein sirf 40 minutes agar aap 1 gb ka data plan lete hain aur usse whatsapp call karte hain
to is hisaab se aapko 1 mahine mein 1250 minutes milenge
vahi tradition call ki baat kare , to kisi bhi network par average 50 paisa per minutes ki cost lagti hain
aise mein free whatsapp calling sirf users ko gumraah karne ke liye hain

calcium ki kami ko door karne ke upay tips for cure calcium deficiency hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips calcium ki kami ko door karne ke upay tips for cure calcium deficiency 0 health tips a a print email calcium ki kami ko door karne ke liye gharelu nuskhe ya tips kya hain
modern lifestyle aur sugar se bharpoor padartho chocolate , cake , cold drinks aadi ke karan calcium ki kami aam samsya hoti ja rahi hain
saalo tak calcium ki dawaa kha kar bhi iski purti nahi ho pati , kyonki sharir ke liye natural roop se calcium hi sabse best hota hain
inse sharir ko protein ke saath hi calcium bhi prapt hota hain
doodh doodh calcium ka sabse accha source hain
doodh se milne wala calcium sharir asaani se pacha pata hain
isliye sharir mein doodh ke rahi pahuchaya gya calcium adhik faydemand hota hain
dahi ke ek bowl mein 400 mg calcium hota hain
dahi ke alawa doodh se bane other products jaise paneer , cheese aadi mein bhi calcium pryapt matra mein hota hain
vitamin d ka vishesh gun hain ki yeh sharir ko calcium observe karne mein madad karta hain

08 rs 10990 mein launch hua panasonic ka

panasonic , smartphone a a print email smartphone ki duniya mein apni ek alag pahchan bana chuki smartphone maker company panasonic ne apna naya model pesh kiya hain
panasonic ne high tech features ke saath panasonic eluga icon ko launch kiya hain
yeh smarphone monday 11 august 2015 se amazon india ke jariye bikri ke liye aa chuka hain
kaha ja raha hain ki yeh smartphone motorola aur lenovo ke smartphone se takkar lega
smartphone se takkar lega sutro ki maane to panasonic eluga icon smartphone market mein maujood kai smartphones se takkar lega
jisme motorola ka moto g 3rd gen , lenovo ka k3 note , xiaomi ka redmi note 4g aadi smartphone shamil hain
company ne isme camera ke saath anya features par vishesh dhyaan diya hain
jisme ui features jaise isense , smart awake aur blink play aadi shamil hain
camera bhi hain kafi behatrin panasonic eluga icon abhi 2 rango mein hi available hain
yeh gold aur slate color mein available hain
inch hd display hain
4g lte connectivity par based yeh phone ki sabse khas baat iski socking price hain
itne high tech features se less hone ke bawjood iski price sirf 10 , 990 rupaye hain
is smartphone ka camera bhi kafi behtarin hain
isme led flash ke saath 13 megapixel ka rear aur 8 megapixel ka front camera diya gya hain
yeh android
5ghz octa core processor , 2gb ram di gyi hain
iski storage capacity 16gb tak hain , jise 32gb tak expand kiya ja sakta hain
iske alawa isme wi fi , gps , gprs , micro usb , bluetooth aadi ki connectivity hogi
company ko bharosha hain ki 3500 mah ki battery wala phone users ko kafi pasand aayega
inch hd display memory 16 gb internal storage expandable up to 32 gb connectivity wi fi
b g n , gprs edge , 3g , gps a gps , otg , micro usb , bluetooth camera 13 megapixel rear camera and 8 megapixel front facing camera
05 matar khane ke fayde benefits of green
matar khane ke fayde benefits of green pea hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips matar khane ke fayde benefits of green pea health tips a a print email matar sardiyo ke mausam mein asaani se milne wali sabzi mein se ek hain
saath hi isme fiber aur protein kafi adhik matra mein hote hain
pet ke cancer se bachaata hain matar mein polyphenols adhik matra mein hota hain
anti aging , strong immunity aur high energy level flavonoids catechins , epicatechin carotenoids alpha carotene , beta carotene folinic acid ferulic caffeic acid polyphenols coumestrol jaise chemical hote hain jo energy dete hain aur minerals jaise zinc , iron , calcium , meganiz aur copper , immune system ko strong rakhte hain
blood sugar ke liye matar mein fiber , proteins se jyada hota hain
matar mein anti oxidants aur anti inflammatory aliment hone ki wajah se yeh sugar ko control karta hain
matar mein carbohydrate , natural sugar aur starch hota hain
dil ke liye labh matar mein anti oxidants aur anti inflammatory hone se yeh blood vessel ko theek halat mein rahne mein madad karta hain
matar mein vitamin b1 , folate , b2 , b3 aur b6 hota hain
isse homocysteine levels badhta hain , jo dil ke problems ko door karne mein labhdayak hain
sharir mein triglycerides level ko kam karke cholesterol control kiya ja sakta hain
healthy bone 1 cup matar mein 44 vitamin k hota hain jo haddiyon ko majbooti deta hain
vitamin b bhi osteoporosis mein kafi faydemand hain
bad cholesterol ko kam kare matar mein niyasin hota hain
yeh triglycerides aur bldl banata hain jo bad cholesterol ko kam karta hain aur good cholesterol ko banane mein madad karta hain
bhoolne ki bimari ko kam karna kai logo ko alzheimer ki samsya hoti hain
matar khane se bronchitis jaisi bimari mein bhi fayda hota hain
hamesha jawan rakhe anti oxidants ki bharpoor matra sharir ko chust durust rakhti hain
iske alawa hari matar mein flavonoids , phytonutrients , carotene jaise tatv sharir ko hamesha young aur energy se bharpoor banaye rakhte hain

pyaaj ki prajatiya jaise kalyanpur lal gol , agrofind light red , poosa ratnaakar samanya prajatiya hain , sankar prajatiyo mein x caliber , barr gandhi , copy morain aur rosy yeh samanya aur sankar parjatiya hain
rabi ki fasal mein beej 10 12 kg per hectare samanya prajatiyo ka lagta hain aur 4 5 kg per hectare sankar prajatiyo ka lagta hain
potas ke roop mein dena chahiye
litter stamp dawaa 800 1000 litter paani mein mila kar spray karne se kharpatvaaro ka jamaav kam hota hain
purple leaf balotch rog ki roktham ke liye 2 kg
copper oxychloride prti hectare ki dar se chhidkaav karna chahiye , iske saath hi indofil 2
per hectare ki dar se chhidkaav karna chahiye ya indofil 2
gram per litter paani mein ghol kar 10 15 din ke antraal par chhidkaav karte rahna chahiye
pyaz ki upaj per hectare kitna prapt kar sakte hain
samanya prajatiyo ki paidawaar 250 300 kuntal per hectare aur sankar prajatiyo ki 300 350 kuntal per hectare hoti hain
02 rohu machhli khane ke fayde benefits of

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips rohu machhli khane ke fayde benefits of rohu fish
health tips a a print email agar aap non vegetarian hain aur fish khana aapko sabse jyada pasand hain , toh rohu naam ki machhli ko aap acchi tarah se pahchante honge
rohu machhali khane se kya kya fayde aur benefits hote hain , aaiye inke baare mein jante hain
dil ke liye faydemand machhali mein omega3 fatty acid hota hain jo dil ko healthy banane ke kaam aata hain
vitamin c se bharpoor rohu macchali mein kafi saara vitamin c hota hain , jisse health se related bimariya door hoti hain
minerals ka khazana iron , zinc , iodine , potassium , calcium aur selenium aadi kuch aise minerals hain , jo sharir ko rohu machhali ko khane se mil sakte hain

08 kaise chalega airtel 4g
kaise chalega airtel 4g
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home airtel smartphone tech news tech tips kaise chalega airtel 4g
airtel , smartphone , tech news , tech tips a a print email telecom service company airtel ne thursday ko bharat ke 296 cities mein ek saath super speed data service 4g ko official roop se launch kar diya hain
airtel ke 4g network se judi yeh 5 jankariya padhe aur super fast internet ka maza le
airtel 4g internet ko mobile par chalane ke liye kya chahiye aur iske plan kya hain
aapke smartphone mein 4g support hona jaroori hain sabse pahle to 4g ka sewa labh lene ke liye 4g supported smartphone hona chahiye
aapke paas 4g smartphone nahi hain to airtel ne motorola , xiaomi , samsung , lenovo aur micromax u ke 4g support karne wale smartphones special offer ke saath available karvaye hain
4g sim yadi aapke paas 4g sim nahi hain to chinta ki koi baat nahi hain , 4g sim paane ke liye aapke paas 2 options hain
aap khud airtel store mein jakar 4g sim le le ya phir airtel ki website par jakar 4g sim ke liye request kare
aapko free mein 4g sim milegi
airtel 4g ke plan aur offers airtel ne 3g ki keemat par hi 4g internet speed dene ka faisla kiya hain , offer ki shuruvaat 25 rupaye se hoti hain
baki ke offers in pictures mein dekhe aur airtel ki official website par jakar dekhe
kyon le airtel 4g airtel ke advertisement ke mutabik aap puri movie sirf 3 minutes mein hi download kar sakte hain aur ek album ko sirf 1 minute mein upload kar payenge
airtel ne ek challenge diya hain ki agar aapka koi aur network isse tez hua to company lifetime tak aapke internet bill ka payment khud karegi
movie lovers ki balle balle airtel ne mobile app wink movie ki bhi shuruvat ki hain
wink movie mein popular video aur movies hongi
wink music ki safalta ke baad company ne wink movie app launch kiya hain
google keyword sabz pari story in hindi
, magical story in hindi
mast story in hindi , very interesting stories in hindi

06 hasne muskurane ke fayde benefits of
hasne muskurane ke fayde benefits of laugh smile hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips hasne muskurane ke fayde benefits of laugh smile 0 general knowledge , health tips a a print email hasna muskurana na kewal aapke swabhav ko batata hain , balki yeh aapki positive personality ko bhi dikhata hain
doctors ka bhi yeh manna hain ki hasne se chehre aur sharir ki jyada se jyad muscles active rahti hain , jo healthy rahne ke liye madadgar hoti hain
inhi sabhi wajaho se log laughing therapy ka istemal kar rahe hain
tension door karta hain hasne se body mein endorphins chemical banta hain jo tension aur chinta jaisi problems ko door karta hain
yeh vahi chemical hain jo running aur exercise karte samay nikalta hain
isse dimaag active bana rahta hain
immune system sahi rahta hain hasne se immune system sahi rahta hain , kyonki isse jyada matra mein white cells bante hain jo kai tarah ki bimariyo se ladne mein sahayak hote hain
fefde , muscles ke liye healthy hasne se body mein oxygen bharpoor matra mein pahuchati hain
isse fefde se lekar muscles aur cell badhiya kaam karte hain
positive attitude job ke liye interview ho ya shaadi ke liye mooh dikhai
hasna aur muskurana bahut hi jaroori hota hain , kyonki yeh aapke positive attitude aur confidence ko zahir karta hain
isse hemoglobin badhta hain aur khoon ki kami door hoti hain
isse uski muscles , brain aur fefde ki exercise ho jati hain
isliye laughing therapy ko best therapy mana gya hain
comedy show , films , dram dekhe ; sabse best tarika hota hain
hafte mein ek din ka time nikale aur koi comedy movie dekhe
par aane wale comedy show to jaroor dekhe
kitabe aur chutkule padhna kisi bhi funny kitaab ko padhna aur baccho ki comics padhna bhi is exercise ke liye bahut hi help karta hain
cartoon wale serials dekhe aur fun kare

micromax ne apne is naye smartphone ko naam diya hain hue
halaki abhi isko lekar koi official declaration nahi kiya gya hain , lekin online is canvas hue 2 ko 11 , 736 rupaye ki keemat par darj kara diya gya hain

yahi nahi ab to yeh phone offline stores par bhi uplabadh hain
is retailer ki mane to hue smartphone ki keemat mop par 12 , 499 rupaye ki aur mrp par 17 , 999 rupaye batai ja rahi hain
specification par gaur kare ab is smartphone ke specifications ki baat kare to yeh hue 2 model no

kitkat os out of the box par kaam karta hain

phone ko power deta hain
vahi aapko bata de ki retailers is phone par
ghz octa core processor ke support karne ki baat bata rahe hain
storage aur camera par ek nazar in sabke alawa phone par aapko milegi 16gb ki internal memory
jise aap 32 gb tak micro sd card ke jariye expand bhi kar sakte hain
agar baat kare camera ki to is par aapko milega 13 megapixel ka rear camera , led flash ke saath
iske alawa selfie click karne ke liye is par aapko milega 5 megapixel ka front facing camera

b g n , micro usb aur bluetooth ki suvidha
