general knowledge , health tips a a print email aankhon ke neeche kale ghere yani dark circle aaj ke daur mein aam baat ho gayi hain
aise mein aankhon ke niche hone wale kale ghere dark circle khoobsurati aur smartness ko kam karte hain
kai baar dark circle unhealthy lifestyle ka natiza hote hain
dark circle ka ilaj gharelu upayo se asaani ke saath kiya ja sakta hain
paani khoob piye agar aankhon ke niche dark circle hain to pani khoob piya kare
yeh ek simple gharelu upay hain , jo eyes ke dark circle ko door kar deta hain
pani peene se skin hydrate rahti hain aur dark circle nahi ho pate hain
jab aap aaram kar lenge , aankhon ko aaram denge , to dark circle apne aap khatm ho jayenge
tea bags se bhi door ho sakta hain dark circle tea bags ka upyog karke bhi purush ki aankhon ke niche hone wale dark circle ko door kiya ja sakta hain
subah ki chay ke baad use kiye gye tea bags ko apne freeze mein rakh de
tamatar tomato se upchar tamatar mein kai saare gun hote hain
jo skin ke dark circle ko halka kar dete hain aur skin ko glow pradan karte hain
is mixture ko apne eye dark circle par lagaye
ise 10 minutes tak yuhi laga rahne de
badam ka tel almond oil badam ka tel kai natural guno se bharpoor hota hain , jo aankhon ke niche dark circle ko fayda pahuchata hain
badam ke tel ke niyamit upyog se dark circle halke ho jate hain
aapko jald hi dark circle se chutkara milega

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge janiye aapka rail ticket kya kahta hain
general knowledge a a print email rail yatra ke dauran agar hamari nazar agar kisi cheez par kam jati hain veh hain hamara rail ticket
rail ticket par likhi code bhasha ka matlab janiye
kitni tarah ke reservation yeh janana interesting hain ki indian railway mein reservation kitni tarah ka hota hain
is samay aap indian railway mein 3 tarah ke reservation pa sakte hain
ticket window par jakar traditional tarike se reservation online e reservation online i reservation e aur i ticket aajkal e ticket yani ki electronic ticket ka zamana hain
har koi ticket reservation ke liye computer ka istemal kar raha hain
yaha reservation ke 2 option hain
agar aap physical ticket original print ticket chahte hain aur ticket window par jane se bhi bachna chahte hain toh aapko i ticket lena chahiye
yeh ticket indian railway post office ke jariye aapke address par bhejti hain
kahne ka matlab yeh hain ki i ticket ko aap online reserve karwa sakte hain aur jaisa ki normal reservation ticket jo ki reservation window par milti hain , vahi ticket aapko milegi , lekin yeh aapke ghar ke address par post ke jariye aayegi
passenger ki pahchaan pnr no
ticket window se liye gye aam reservation ticket ke left side ke upar ki aor yeh number hota hain
yeh number unique hota hain aur ise passenger name record kaha jata hain
is lihaaz se yeh number aapke aur railway dono ke liye bahut hi important hain
pnr number ki madad se aap train number , train ka naam , destination ki jankaari , safar ka class , ticket ka status , passenger coach aur seat ka number pata kar sakte hain
route ki janam kundali hain train number reservation ticket par jo dusra important number nazar aata hain veh hain train number
train number 5 digit ka hota hain aur iska har number kuch na kuch kahta hain
aapko thoda idea dete hain agar aapke reservation ticket par likhe train number ki pahli digit 0 hain toh aap summer special , holiday special ya anya special train mein safar karne wale hain
number se shuru hone wale train number kolkata ki local train ka hota hain
number se shuru hone wala train number delhi , chennai , secundrabad jaise metro city ki rail services ka hota hain
number traditional tarike ki train ka hota hain
indian railways ke expert train number dekh kar train ke route ki puri jaankari de sakte hain
e ticket par aapko ticket number ki jagah transaction number milta hain
wl ka chakkar apne ticket ke confirm na hone ki tension to aapko hogi , saath mein short form mein likhe angreji ki kuch axar aapke dil ki dhadakne aur badhayenge
aaiye nazar dalte hain waiting list ke kuch aise hi short form aur unke matlab par
rlwl iska matlab hain remote location waiting list
agar aap in stations se apni yatra shuru kar rahe hain aur aapka ticket waiting mein hain to aap pulled quota waiting list mein aa jate hain
iska matlab hain pulled quota ke saare ticket reserve ho chuke hain aur aap oos quota ke waiting list mein hain
cqwl jab aap tatkaal quote mein ticket lete hain aur aapki ticket waiting mein hoti hain , toh ise current quota waiting list mein rakha jata hain
rqwl ise request waiting list kahte hain
agar route mein koi pulled quota nahi toh is tarah ki waiting list ko banaya jata hain
quota tere kitne naam ld ladies quota hq high official ya headquarter quota df defence quota os outstation quota rs road side quota , bade stations ke beech ke aise stations jo computerized network se na jude ho tab unhe road side quota mein rakh kar ticket reserve ki jati hain
isme waiting list bhi hoti hain
ph parliament house quota ft foreign tourist quota dp duty pass quota hp handicap quota ss senior citizen quota up down ko bhi samajhe jis station se train shuru hoti hain aur apne destination ki taraf jati hain , veh up train kahlati hain
vapis aane ki yatra ko down journey kahte hain
down train ka number up se ek jyada rahta hain
jaise agar up train ka number 15707 hain toh down ka number 15708 hoga
agar aapki birth number ke samne lb likha hain toh iska matlab lower yani neeche wali birth , agar likha hain mb toh iska matlab middle birth , ub ka matlab upper birth
iske alawa agar su aur sl likha hain toh iska matalab side upper aur side lower birth hain
railway senior citizen ko lower seat dene ki koshish karta hain , agar aisi seat available ho to hi
online reservation karwane par availability ke hisaab se aap khud hi seat choose kar sakte hain

08 blood pressure ko control mein rakhne
blood pressure ko control mein rakhne ke asaan tarike aur tips
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips blood pressure ko control mein rakhne ke asaan tarike aur tips
health tips a a print email blood pressure ko control mein rakhne ke asaan tarike simple hindi tips for control blood pressure ke baare mein aaj hum janenge
doctors ki mane to yeh unhealthy lifestyle , khan pan , gas , anidra aur namak ke adhik sewan se yeh bimari hoti hain
kai baar is bimari ka karan vansanuganit family history bhi hota hain
iska sewan karne se blood pressure ki samsya mein araam milta hain
yeh high blood pressure ko normal banane ke liye achook upay hain
dark chocolate blood pressure ko badhane wale enzyme ko banane se rokti hain
dark chocolate mein bhari matra mein paya jane wala chocoa mein catechin aurprocyanidin compound paye jate hain
yeh dono compound blood pressure ko control karte hain
aisa karne se high blood pressure ki shikayat nahi hoti hain
yeh blood pressure ko control mein rakhne ka ramban upay hain
apne family doctor se apna blood pressure niyamit roop se check karana na bhoole
tobacco , bidi , cigaret , gutakha aadi ka upyog hanikarak hain
aapko hamesah yaad rakhna chahiye tobacco smoking is injurious to health
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips cancer ko rokne mein madad karte hain yehmasale
general knowledge , health tips a a print email cancer jaisi janlewa bimari puri duniya mein bahut tezi ke saath phail rahi hain
ghar ki rasoi mein aise herbs aur masale paye jate hain , jinka istemal karke hum cancer cells ko banne se rok sakte hain
kesar aur haldi jaise masalo mein chamatkarigun paye jate hain , jo hamari body ko toxins , bacteria aur virus ke khatre se bachte hain
halaki jeera ke health benefits aur bhi hain
ek aisa masala hain jisme antioxidants hote hain
jeere mein thymoquinone hota hain jo prostate cancer paida karne wale cells ko banne se rokta hain
adrak adrak ke sewan se cholesterol ko control mein rakha ja sakta hain
adrak ko khane se cancer cells ko khatm kiya jasakta hain
khane ko tasty bananewali dalchini mein iron aur calcium bharpoor matra mein hota hain
research se pata chala hain ki isme powerful polyphenol curcumin paya jata hain , jo cancer cells ki growth ko roktahain
jisse prostate cancer , melanoma , breast cancer , tumours aur leukaemia mein fayda milta hain
curcuminapoptosis ko badhaawa deta hain jo cancer ko badhaane wale cells ko hatata hain aur is baat ka bhi dhyaan rakhta hain ki is process mein dusre healthy cells banne se bhi na rooke
radiotherapy aur chemotherapy ke samay cancer cells ke saath saath uske aas paas ke healthy cells bhi chapet mein aa jate hain
isliye iske side effects dikh jate hain
lal shimla mirch yeh ek aisi sabzi hain , jisme cancer se ladne ki power hoti hain
lal shimla mirch se apoptosis ka process start hota hain , jo cancer cells ko maarta hain aur leukaemia , tumours cells ke size ko kam karta hain
saunf phytoposhak tatv aur anti oxidant hone ki wajah se cancer cells ko saunf se haar ka saamna karna padta hain
phenols ka mukhya tatv anethole cancer cells ko banneaur tezi se phailne wali nature ko rokta hain
yeh cancer cells ko badhane wale enzyme se cancer ko badhne se rokta hain
oregano pizza aur pasta mein istemal kiye jane wala oregano prostate cancer ko rokne mein bahut madad karta hain
isme anti microbial compound hote hain
oregano mein quercetin naam ka phytochemical hota hain jo body mein cancer paida karne wale cells ko badhnese rokta hain aur cancer ki bimariyo mein medicine ka kaam karta hain
kesar kesar mein ' crocetin naa ka natural carotenoiddicarboxylic acid hota hain jo cancer se ladne wala mana gya hain
dusre masale laung , saunf , tulsi , lahsun , kala jeera , methi , sarso , pudina , rosemary , taza nimbu , olive , vinegar aur avocado kuch aise masale aur food hain jo cancer se ladne mein madad karte hain
omega 3 fatty acid ka sewan kare , isse sujan aur jalan mein rahat milti hain
potato chips ki jagah aap popcorn khaye
white bread ki jagah wholegrain bread ka istemal kare
white bread sehat ke liye nuksandeh hoti hain
rock salt ko khane se bache
celtic sea salt himalayan salt kabhi bhi khaya ja sakta hain
vegetable oil ki jagah olive oil ka istemal kare
seal pack khana khane se bache jisme transfatki quantity jyada ho
fiber se bharpoor khana khaye

general knowledge , health tips a a print email underarms mein paseena aane se badboo bhi aane lagti hain
underarms mein paseene ki badboo jyada aati hain , kyonki isme glands jyada hote hain
aaiye jante hain underarms se paseene ki badboo smell ko door karne ke useful gharelu nuskhe aur upay
home remedies for underarms sweating smell in hindi urdu
tea tree oil tea tree oil underarms se smell paida karne wale bacteria ko maarta hain
paani mein tea tree oil ki kuch boonde milaaye aur isey spray ki bottle mein rakhe
bas ek shower lene se pahle underarms par iska istemal kare

is pest ko bagal mein lagaye aur 30 minutes ke baad ise thande paani se dho le
07 lava ne launch kiya rs 5999 mein lava
lava ne launch kiya rs
mein lava flair z1
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home lava smartphone lava ne launch kiya rs
lava , smartphone a a print email flair p1 aur e1 ke baad smartphone bharatiya market mein launch karne ke baad lava company ne apni is series mein apna naya smartphone joda hain
lava company ne ab lava flair z1 ko launch kiya hain
yeh budget smartphone exclusively snapdeal par available hain
kya hain khas android lollipop
operating system par chalne wala yeh phone purane dono version par naya upgrade hain
yeh dual sim smartphone 5 inch ki screen ke saath aata hain
ghz ka quad core processor hain
is phone mein 5 megapixel ka rear camera hain , jiske saath led flash aur hd recording di gyi hain
iske alawa grid feature , photo timer aur hdr mode jaise features diye gye hain
lava flair z1 mein 8 gb ki internal memory di gyi hain
iske alawa micro sd card ki madad se ise 32 gb tak badhaya ja sakta hain
connectivity ki baat kare to lava ka yeh smartphone 3g , wi fi , usb
, gps aur bluetooth jaise options ke saath aata hain
is phone ka dimension
iske alawa lava ka yeh smartphone 160 gram wajan ka hain
mah power ki battery company ke anusaar 15 hours aur 30 minutes ka talk time deti hain
yeh 2g network ka talk time hain
3g network par yeh battery 9 hours aur 40 minutes chalti hain

05 roaming rate huye kam
roaming rate huye kam
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge tech news roaming rate huye kam
general knowledge , tech news a a print email roaming par ab mobile se apno se baat karna sasta ho gya hain
desh ki pramukhya telecom companies vodafone , bharti airtel , idea aur reliance communication ne national roaming tariff mein 75 tak katauti ki hain
telecom companies dwara yeh ghoshna telecom regulator trai dwara selling tariff ki katati karne ke baad ki hain
vodafone india , airtel , idea aur r com ne roaming par incoming voice tariff mein 40 ki katauti ki hain
ab in companies ke customers ko iske liye 45 paisa per minute ka bhugtan karna hoga , jo ki pahle yeh 75 paisa per minute tha
isi prakar ab roaming par outgoing local aur std call ke liye customers ko kmrsh 80 paisa aur
rupee per minute tha
company ne roaming par national outgoing call rate par 23 aur local outgoing call rate par 20 ki katauti ki hain
company ne roaming ke dauran sms tariff par 75 tak ki katauti ki hain
may se roaming par local sms ke liye ab kewal 25 paisa aur std sms ke liye 38 paisa ka payment karna hoga
rupee per sms tha
08 vaseline ke fayde benefits of petroleum
vaseline ke fayde benefits of petroleum jelly hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge vaseline ke fayde benefits of petroleum jelly 0 general knowledge a a print email aam taur par saalbhar aur khas taur par sardiyo mein hamari tavcha ka khyaal rakhne wala vaseline petroleum jelly beshak aapki zindagi ka hissa hoga
nahi jante hain to ab janiye vaseline ke fayde keywords vaseline ke fayde aur gharelu upyog , vesline ke fayde , veseleen ke fayde , vaslen ke fayde , vaisleen ke fayde , veslan ke fayde home benefits of vaseline
petrolium gelly ke fayde , petroleum jelly ke fayde
veselene ke fayde skin ke liye
vaseline benefits in hindi
vaseline ko aap make up remover ki tarah istemal kar sakte hain
agar aap apne eyeshadow aur blusher ko powder ki tarah prayog karke bore ho gyi hain aur creamy shade chahti hain , to aapko bas itna karna hain , ki purane eyeshadow ya blusher mein vaseline mila de
lijiye ban gya creamy shade
beauty competition mein yeh tarika ajmaya jata hain
aap plucker se apni eye brow bana rahi hain , jo jara sa vaseline laga le
apni eye brow ko shiny banane ke liye bhi aap vaseline ka upyog kar sakti hain , turant chamak aa jayegi
phati aur rukhi aidiyo ko behtar banane ke accha option hain vaseline

hamesha positive soche

exercise kare
vitamin c ka sewan kare
gahri saans le taki aapke fefdo mein oxygen sahi tarah se pahuche aur bloodcirculation sahi se ho

chukander , gajar , shalgam , mooli , patta gobhi , broccoli aadi sabziyo ko jaroor khaye
apni body se dead skin ko nikaal de

finance , general knowledge a a print email long term savings aur tax ki dendari ghatane ki liye bacche ke naam par ppf khata khola ja sakta hain
nabalik ke naam khola gya ppf khata parents ki guardianship mein operate hota hain
jaroori documents bacche ke naam account kholne ke liye passport size photo ke saath uski age ke proof ke taur par form ke saath uska birth certificate school certificate jama karna hota hain
investment limit kisi person ke apne aur uski guardianship mein khole gye ppf account mein har saal
lakh ki rupaye ki limit account ke hisaab se nahi balki individual ke hisaab se lagoo hoti hain
lac se upar nivesh chala jata hain , to additional fund par byaaz nahi milega
tax chhoot income tax act 80 c ke tahat guardian maximum
yeh limit dono ppf account ke balance par lagoo hogi

02 examination hall ke liye jaroori tips
examination hall ke liye jaroori tips
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home miscellaneous examination hall ke liye jaroori tips
miscellaneous a a print email boards ke exams shuru hone wale hain , ab students ke saath saath parents mein bhi tension ko dekha ja sakta hain
har subject ki pure saal ki taiyaari ki parakh mahaz 3 hours ke paper mein aapke performance par ki jati hain aur isi results ke base par future career ki direction aur situation bhi tay hoti hain
aise mein bakhoobi in 3 hours ke har paper ke importance ko samjha ja sakta hain
examination hall ke liye jaroori tips time management ke liye dikkat na ho , isliye aapke paas ghadi jaroor honi chahiye
pure question paper ko padhe
isse examiner par accha shuruvati asar padta hain aur acche numbers dene mein uske haath rookte nahi hain
match , physics , accounts ke question papers mein steps par base marking hoti hain
examiner ka dhyaan main points par attract karne ke liye sub headings aur important facts ko underline karna na bhoole
answers ko jyada asardaar banane ke liye scholars experts aadi ke vichaar dene mein harz nahi hain
language ke question paper mein pronouns aur grammar ki galtiyo ke marks jaroor kaate jate hain , jabki baaki subjects mein facts ki galtiyo ke marks kaate jate hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips paseena aana sehat ke liye hain faydemand
general knowledge , health tips a a print email paseena aana ek natural process hain
dimaag ka hypothalamus body ke temperature ko banaye rakhta hain
paseene mein paani aur ammonia jaise chemical ki matra hoti hain
mood theek hota hain workout ke baad paseena aana ek natural process hain , jisse mood theek hota hain
sweating ka yeh sabse bada health benefit hain
isse aap accha sochte hain aur acche se decision le paate hain
sweating sharir ko infection se ladne mein bhi madad karta hain
researches se yeh pata chala hain ki paseene mein anti microbial peptide hota hain jo t
sweating ek invisible army ki tarah bacteria se ladta hain
skin pores ko saaf karta hain paseena nikalne ka sabse bada fayda yeh hain ki isse skin pores rome chhidra saaf rahte hain
agar paseena nahi nikalega toh aapke skin pores se bacteria nahi nikal payenge , jisse aapko moohase aadi ho jayenge

11 cholesterol level ko control mein
cholesterol levelko control mein rakhna kyon hain jaroori
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips cholesterol levelko control mein rakhna kyon hain jaroori
health tips a a print email cholesterol hamari body ke liye ek jaroori compound hain
kyonki yeh blood vessels ko block kar deta hain
jisse aapko heart attack hone ke chances badh jate hain
to chaliye jante hain cholesterol ko natural tarike se kaise control kiya ja sakta hain
agar aap apni lifestyle mein kuch jaroori changes kar le to defiantly aap cholesterol level ko control mein rakh sakte hain
cholesterol level ko control karne ke tips omega 3 fatty acid wale food omega 3 fatty acid se bharpoor food jaise ki fish , sunflower seed , nuts aur badam aadi ka sewan kare
yeh sabhi cheeze bad cholesterol ko kam karti hain aur body mein good cholesterol ko badhaati hain
exercise kare exercise karne se hum apna weight control mein rakh sakte hain
daily 30 minutes tak kasrat karne se cholesterol ka level kam hota hain , yeh hame high blood pressure , tension aur diabetes mein bhi raahat pahuchata hain
ise aap khana banane ke liye istemal kare , jisse yeh na sirf body ke cholesterol ko controlmein rakhta hain , balki full body ko healthy banaye rakhta hain
black tea black tea ldl bad cholesterol se bachne mein bahut jyada helpful hota hain
rojana black tea peene se aapka cholesterol control mein rahega
yeh cholesterol ko kam karne aur blood clotting banne se rokta hain
yeh hame high bp se bhi bachaata hain aur hame kai tarah ke infection aadi se bhi safety deta hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips cholesterol ke liye badhiya tel kaun sa hain
general knowledge , health tips a a print email cholesterol kya hain
cholesterol blood mein fat ke saath paya jane wala ek naram padarth hain , jo body activities ke liye jaroori hain
yeh 3 tarah ka hota hain low density lipoprotein , high density lipoprotein , very low density lipoprotein
kisi bhi vegetable fat mein cholesterol nahi hota hain , lekin yeh sharir mein cholesterol ko paida jaroor karta hain
desi ghee , makkhan , chicken , anda , shellfish aur dairy products mein cholesterol paya jata hain
fat 2 tarah hote hain bad fat aur good fat bad fat saturated fat yeh total cholesterol aur ldl ke level ko badha deta hain
trans fat yeh ldl bad cholesterol ke level ko badhata hain aur hdl good cholesterol ko ghata deta hain
good fat monounsaturated fat yeh total cholesterol aur ldl bad cholesterol ke level ko ghatata hain aur hdl good cholesterol ko badhata hain
polyunsaturated fat yeh total cholesterol aur ldl ke level ko kam karta hain
cholesterol aur sehat ke lihaz se kaun sa tel oil hota hain badhiya hamse se jyadatar log oil ki jankari hone ke naam par bas yahi bata payenge ki hame oily food aur khas karke saturated fat nahi lena chahiye
aaiye jante hain cooking oil ke baare mein jo cholesterol ke liye bhi acche hote hain
soyabean ka tel soyabean oil central india mein istemal kiya jane wala tel hain , is tel mein polyunsaturated fat hota hain , khas karke alpha linoleic acid
yeh good aur bad cholesterol ke beech mein balance banaye rakhta hain
polyunsaturated fat garm hokar toxins mein badal jate hain
nariyal tel coconut oil saturated fat hain , lekin vanaspati tel hone ki wajah se isme cholesterol nahi hota hain , sehat ke liye theek hain , talne ke liye sahi nahi hain , salah yeh di jati hain ki dusre oils ke combination ke saath iska istemal kare
isme monounsaturated fat hota hain
isme oryzanol bhi hota hain , jo ldl bad cholesterol ko kam karta hain
saath hi isme natural vitamin e aur squalene bhi paya jata hain , jo tavcha ko young banata hain
isme monounsaturated fatty acid ki matra kafi hoti hain aur isme polyunsaturated fatty acid bhi hota hain
iska istemal total cholesterol aur ldl ko kam karta hain
olive oil kisi waqt sirf mediterranean desh maslan spain , argentina jaise desho mein istemal kiya jane wala olive oil apne taste ke chalte duniya bhar mein popular ho gya hain
yeh tel kai kism ka hota hain , jaise extra virgin olive ko first time compress karke nikaala gya , virgin dusri baar press karke nikaal gya , pure process kiya aur extra light kam flavor wala processed oil
yeh total aur ldl cholesterol ke level ko kam karta hain
yeh body mein fat distribution par bhi effect rakhta hain
talne ke liye accha hain kardi oil polyunsaturated fat wala kardi oil saffola oil kai jagah istemal kiya jata hain
palmolive oil palmolive oil taad ke tel mein monounsaturated fat hota hain , lekin linoleic acid ki matra kam hoti hain
isme polyunsaturated fat ki matra jyada hoti hain , khas karke linoleic acid ki
talne ke liye accha nahi hain , kyonki polyunsaturated garm hokar toxins mein badal jate hain
yeh ldl ke level ko kam karta hain , lekin good cholesterol ke level ko normal rakhta hain

02 talcum powder ke nuksaan
talcum powder ke nuksaan
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips talcum powder ke nuksaan
health tips a a print email mulayam , safed aur khusboodar talcum powder bahut si ladies ka beauty product hain
food drugs administration 2010 ne ise safe cosmetic product declare kiya hain
endometrial cancer ek study ke anusaar jo mahilayein jyada talcum powder ka istemal karti hain aur periods ke baad bhi istemal karti hain , unme endometrial cancer ka khatrajyada hota hain
isse bhi jyada talcosis ya fefdo meinjalan bhi paida hoti hain
talcum powder zehareela hain talcum powder mein tall naam ka mineral hota hain
yeh anti septic , baby powder aur talcum powder mein istemal hone wala khas mineral hain aur yeh sadakchhap heroine hain
jisse fefdo serelated problems paida hoti hain aur aage chalkar yeh fefdo ke cancermein bhi badal sakti hain
isliye jyadatar log cancer ki roktham ke liye cornstarch yukt body powder istemal karne ki salah dete hain
garbhashya cancer cancer prevention coition ka manana hain ki is tarah ke beautyproducts ke istemal se garbhashya ka cancer ka khatrabadh jata hain
powdermahila ke yaun ang dwara grabhashya tak pahuchtahain
saans se sambandhit bimariya talcum powder se saans se related problemsshuru ho jati hain , khastaur par shishuon mein
american academy of pediatricks dwaraiska kam istemal karne ki salah di ja rahi hain
saans ke saath ander jaane par yeh baccho mein pneumonia paida kar sakta hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email kya aap moong daal khane ke fayde ke baare mein janna chahte hain
kya aapnesearch kiya hain moong daal ke fayde ya benefits of moong daal in hindi urdu toh welcome to hinglishpedia
moong daal vegetarian logo ki favourite dish mein se ek hoti hain
moong daal mein 50 tak protein , 20 carbohydrate , 48 fiber , 1 sodium aur kai kism ke vitamins , phosphorus aur minerals ka khazan liye hoti hain , jo hame kai saari bimariyo se bachaye rakhte hain
benefits of moongdaal in hindi urdu
potassium , calcium aur vitamin b complex se bharpoor is daal mein fat na ke barabar hota hain
raat mein roti ke saath moong daal khaye , jisse aapko bharpoor matra mein nutrients milenge
pet ke liye faydemand moong ki daal easy to digest mani jati hain , yani ki yeh pachne mein kafi asaan hoti hain
peeli moong daal mein protein , iron aur fiber bahut hi acchi matra mein paya jata hain
skin ke liye faydemand moong daal ko khane se aap skin cancer jaisi khatarnaak bimari se bach sakte hain
jab aap sun rays ya phir pollution ke contact mein aate hain toh skin mein skin mein free radicals daakhil ho jate hain
isse skin ko nuksaan pahuchta hain
moong daal antioxidant se bharpoor hota hain , jo free radicals se ladta hain aur aapki skin ko cancer hone se bachata hain
blood pressure control mein rakhe moong daal khane se blood pressure control mein rahta hain
heart patient ko moong ki daal jaroor khani chahiye
cholesterol kam kare moong daal mein paya jane wala fiber body ke faltu cholesterol ko kam karta hain
typhoid hone par moong ki daal khane se patient ko bahut aaraam milta hain
acchi sehat ke saath saath yeh baccho mein vikas se related jaroori nutrients ki kami ko pura karta hain
pregnant woman ke liye faydemand garbhvati mahilaon ke liye moong daal bahut hi faydemand hoti hain

haldi powder yeh ek anti septic hain jo infection ko phailne se rokta hain
teatree oil yeh badi hi anti biotic dawa hain , jo ki ghaav ko badi jaldi hi sahi kar deta hain
05 kya tamatar khane se kidney stone hota
kya tamatar khane se kidney stone hota hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips kya tamatar khane se kidney stone hota hain
general knowledge , health tips a a print email logo ke anderkai tarah ki bhrantiya aur myths hote hain
jab aap oxalate rich foods khate hain tab kidney stone hone ka khatrabadh jata hain
jiski wajah se isse kidney stone nahi hota hain
doodh aur baingan se bhi nahi hoti hain patthari baingan aur doodh mein calcium ki matra jyada hone ke bawjood kidney stone hone ka iska koi relation nahi hain
in cheezo se hota hain stone coffee , chai , palak , nuts aur aerated drinks jaise oxalate food jyada namak wale food jaise achaar , marinade kiya gya bhojan stone hone ki wajah bante hain
seafood aur table salt red meat mein uric acid high quantity mein hota hain , kam matra mein fluid ka sewan karne se bhi stone hone ki sambhavna badhti hain , toh aap jaan gaye honge ki kidney stone kis tarah ki khane ki cheezo se ho sakta hain
isliye alert rahiyeaur kidney ko healthy rakhiye

lekin sabse popular animal cow ya buffalo hi mani jati hain
cholesterol bhains ke doodh mein gaay ke doodh ke mukable kam cholesterol hota hain
isliye diabetes , hypertension , kidney se related bimariyo , motape aadi se peedit logo ko bhains ka doodh peene ki salah di jati hain
minerals mahatvpurn minerals ke mamle mein bhains ka doodh gaay ke doodh ko peeche chhod deta hain
jyada iron aur 118 jyada phosphorus hota hain
bhains ke doodh mein magnesium aur potassium bhi gaay ke doodh se adhik paya jata hain
yeh bachcho mein wajan ghatane , thyroids ki samsya se nipatne aur heart ke liye accha hota hain
gaay ke doodh se bhi dairy products bante hain , jaise dahi , sweets , cheese , lekin yeh kam creamy hote hain

health tips a a print email salad ko khane ka sabse jyada nutrients wala hissa kaha jata hain , lekin bahut kam hi log hain jo salad se aur bhi jyada fayde lene ke baare mein sochte hain
protein aur calcium ka accha source hone ke karan salad mein daal kar khaye
lettuce lettuce sabse accha weight loss food hain
isme iron , calcium aur protein bhi hote hain
isme calorie content kafi kam aur fat naamatra ka hota hain
omega 3 se lekar omega 6 fatty acid hote hain
anar potassium , calcium , vitamin c aur vitamin a ka accha source hain
isme bharpoor matra mein anti oxidants bhi paye jate hain
prostate cancer aur breast cancer ke khatre ki sambhavna ko bhi door rakhta hain
olive oil salad mein oilve oil aur vinegar dalne se sharir mein sugar level balance rahta hain
salad mein mono unsaturated fats hote hain
salad mein olive oil aur sirka daal kar khane se namak ka sewan kam ho jata hain
nuts seeds nuts aur seeds mein fiber aur protein bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain
inhe salad mein shamil karne se cholesterol level kam kiya ja sakta hain
ande ke peele hisse mein carotenoid anti oxidant ko absorb karne ki power 9x jyada hoti hain
agar aap cholesterol ko lekar chintit hain to salad mein boil eggs faydemand saabit ho sakte hain
throat cancer in hindi hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips gale ka cancer kya hain aur uske lakshan aur ilaj kya hain
throat cancer in hindi 1 health tips a a print email aawaz ki jawabdari gale mein mauzood swar peti yani ki larynx ki rahti hain
kai baar cigarette aur tobacco sewan ke karan larynx prabhavit hone lagti hain
janiye gale ka cancer larynx cancer kya hain larynx swar peti ke jariye hi aadmi ki aawaz aati hain
cancer se hone wali mauto mein
tarah ke hote hain larynx cancer yeh cancer 3 tarah ka hota hain
hamare desh mein supraglottis cancer bahut hi aam hain
iske baad glottis cancer jyada hota hain
subglottis cancer ki sankhya jyada nahi hain
tobacco chewing , smoking aur sharab se inke hone ki aashanka rahti hain
in sabme tobacco sabse jyada cancer karak padarath ke roop mein laryngeal cancer ko badhawa deta hain
jyadatar yeh kamjor economy level ke logo mein paya jata hain
throat cancer gale ke cancer ke lakshan kya hote hain
aisi situation mein mareez ke aerodigestive tract ki jaanch ki jati hain
yeh bhi pata chalta hain ki vocal cord kaisa hain
rogi ka primary checkup hone ke baad usay gale ka ct scan karwane ke liye kaha jata hain
ct scan se hi pata chalta hain ki cancer kitna phaila hain ya nahi
yeh ho jane ke baad mareez ko anesthesia dekar behosh karte hain aur laryngoscopy se bimari ki pahuch pata karte hain
iske baad biopsy ki jati hain
biopsy karne se hi cancer ki pushti ki jati hain
throat cancer ke treatment gale ke cancer ke ilaj saans lene mein preshani mareez ko cancer ke badh jane par agar saans lene mein preshani aati hain to jaroorat padne par emergency tracheotomy ki jati hain
agar saans lene ki jagah kam dikhti hain to direct laryngoscopy jaanch ke dauraan bhi tracheotomy ki ja sakti hain
third aur fourth stage mein multi modality treatment ki jaroorat padti hain
ise chemo radiation ya surgery ki jati hain
operation ke baad phir radiotherapy ya chemotherapy ki jaroorat padti hain
surgical robot ka upyog first aur second stage mein ya phir primary situation mein microlaryngoscopic surgery ki ja sakti hain
yeh surgery microscope ki madad se ki jati hain
tumor ko saaf karne mein laser ka upyog kiya jata hain
isme surgical robot ka istemal karte huye in dino kuch jagaho par yeh surgery ki ja rahi hain
3rd aur 4th stage mein is tarah ke tumor ka ilaj iski pahuch par depend karta hain
advance tumor ki aamtaur par surgery ki jati hain , vah total total laryngectomy surgery kahlati hain
kuch chuninda mareezo mein hi aanshik laryngectomy ki ja sakti hain
isme hum larynx ke function ko barkarar rakhne ki puri koshish karte hain
larryngectomy mein saari larynx ke alawa gale mein lymph ki granthiya bhi hata di jati hain
speech therapy ki jaroorat chunki larynx ko hata diya jata hain , is wajah se rogi operation ke baad kuch bol nahi pata hain
bolne ke liye tracheoesophageal prosthesis operation ke samay hi gale mein lagate hain
isme mareez computerized ya robot ke jaisa bol sakta hain
total laryngectomy ke baad mareez soongh nahi pata hain , kyonki vah apne gale se hi saans leta hain
larynx na hone karan rogi operation ke baad bhaari wajan nahi utha pata hain
operation ke baad nikaale gye cancer ke histopathological test ke liye bheja jata hain
iske baad tay hoga ki aage ka kya upchar chemotherapy ya radiotherapy hoga
treatment pura hone ke baad bhi mareez ko regular checkup ke liye aana hota hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email patta gobhi jisko bandgobhi bhi kaha jata hain , is sabzi ke bahut hi adhik fayde hotehain
patta gobhi brassicaceae family ki ek sabzi hain , is family mein aurbhi sabziya jaise phool gobhi , brussels sprout aurbroccoli aatehain
ismevitamins , fibers , potassium , calcium aur bhi jaroorimineralsbharpoor matramein paye jatehain
isseindian , chinese , western sabhi tarah kefood banayejatehain
patta gobhi ke benefitskya hain , aaiye jantehain
pattagobhi ka soup body ko energy deneke saathweightloss karnemein bhi helpful hota hain
haddiya banayestrong pattagobhi mein calcium bahut hi acchi quantity mein paya jata hain
diindolylmethane dim , sinigrin , lepeol , sulforaphane aurindole 3 carbinol , jaisetatv patta gobhi mein payejate hain , yeh sabhi tatvcancerse bachaav karnemein helpful manejatehain
alzheimer kokam karne mein helpful fresh research seyeh maloom hua ki patta gobhi khane sealzheimer jaisi problems ko doorkiya ja sakta hain
ismevitmain k hota hain jo alzheimer kokam karnemeinhelp karta hain
kabj se aaram dilatahain ismehigh quality ke fiber mauzood hote hain , jiski wajah sepachan tantra sahi tarike se kaamkarta hain , agaraapka pachantantrasahi tarikese kaam kartahain toh definitelyaapko kabz , gas , acidityki problem aadi nahi hoti hain
peptic ulcer ke treatment mein helpful pattagobhi stomach ulcerke treatment mein kafi helpful saabithota hain
body kiimmunity ko badhata hain patta gobhi khanese body ki immunity power badhti hain
ismevitamin c bahut hi acchi quantity meinpaya jata hain , jissebody kiimmunitykafi strongho jati hain
skin ke liyehain faydemand patta gobhi meinbahut hi acchi matra meinanti oxidantspayejatehain , jo skin ko healthy rakhne ke liye behadhi jaroori hain
anti inflammatory propertieska khazana isme amino acid bahut hi high quality mein paya jata hain jo sujan aadi ko kam karne mein helpful hain
muscleske pain mein aaram pattagobhi mein lactic acidpaya jata hain jo muscleskepain aurusay chotilhoneparusay repair karnemein help karta hain

hinglishpedia 0 airtel , tech news , tech tips dher saare advertisement ke saath airtel 4g ki sewa shuru hone ke baad india ke internet users ke mann mein kai swaal uth rahe hain
inme se 10 main questions aur unke answer diye ja rahe hain
4g sachmuch kitna fast hain
agar aap bharat mein 4g connection lete hain to aapko 3g ke mukable bahut behtar speed milegi
airtel 4g par 6 8 mbps ki speed milti hain , jabki airtel ke 3g par 1 3 mbps ki speed milti hain
lekin jaise jaise log 4g ka istemal badhayenge , vaise vaise iski speed kam hoti chali jayegi , khas karke delhi jaise busy cities mein
kya mera handset ise support karega
agar aapne isi saal latest phone khareeda hain to ummeed hain ki 4g support karega
airtel ke liye aap unki website par apna number daal kar pata kar sakte hain
is samay market mein bahut se 4g handset mauzood hain
inme samsung , motorola , micromax , xiaomi aur dusri companies ke smartphone hain
4g bahut shandar portable broadband bhi hain aur 4g dongle ke saath ghar mein istemal ke liye temporary option bhi ban sakta hain
india mein sabse pahli 4g service kaun si thi
august 2015 tak 296 cities aur areas mein 4g mobile service shuru karke airtel saaf taur par reliance geo aur vodafone se aage nikal gya hain
airtel hi pahli company hain jisne 2012 mein kolkata mein broadband wireless access ke liye pahli 4g service shuru ki thi
is company ne february 2014 mein bengaluru mein pahli baar 4g sewa shuru ki thi
august 2014 tak ek aur operator aircel ne 6 states mein 4g broadband sewa shuru ki , lekin yeh gair mobile sewa thi
halaki airtel ne 4g ka rate 3g ke barabar hi rakha hain , lekin aap jyada kharch kar sakte hain
aap 4g mein jyada video dekh sakte hain
aap whatsapp aur email par jyada tezi se pictures download ya upload kar sakte hain
mumbai aur gurgaon jaise kai big aur busy cities mein coverage ek jaise nahi hota hain
delhi mein municipal corporation ne bahut saare tower hata diye hain
vaha kuch jagah mobile coverage bahut gadbad ho gyi hain aur lagatar call drops hoti hain
par yeh problem 4g tak hi simit nahi hain
airtel 4g users ko kai gift bhi de rahi hain , jaise unlimited voice calls , movies aur music
iske alawa iske wynk mobile app par aap 25 , 000 movies aur 18 lakh songs stream kar sakte hain
iske liye aap airtel ne flipkart ke samjhauta kiya hain , agar aap flipkart se koi bhi 4g smartphone khareedte hain to airtel ka 4g sim saath mein milta hain
bharat lte naam ki technique ka istemal karta hain jo ki 4g ke liye 2300 mhz frequency spectrum par kaam karta hain
ek aur technique wimax bahut acchi tarah se nahi chali aur ab kuch ki countries mein iske istemal kiya ja raha hain
kaun kaun si companies 4g service shuru kar rahi hain
mukesh ambani ki reliance geo december 2015 mein 4g service zor shor se shuru karne ka plan bana rahi hain
isne 5 years mein gadgets aur tower install karne ke liye 14 arab doller yani ki takreeban
dusri aor airtel ne pichle 20 saal mein gadgets par 15 arab dollar yani ki
iske alawa isi financial year mein vodafone aur idea bhi apne 4g service shuru karenge
example ke liye whatsapp par auto download media ka option ko mobile data par band karke rakhna chahiye
iske saath hi mobile data roaming setting ko bhi off rakhe
dher saare advertisement ke saath airtel 4g ki sewa shuru hone ke baad india ke internet users ke mann mein kai swaal uth rahe hain

05 panasonic eluga l 4g rs 12990 mein hua
, 990 mein hua lauch
panasonic , smartphone a a print email japan ki handset maker company panasonic ne india mein apni eluga series ke smartphone ko expend karne ka man bana liya hain
iske chalte company ne naya eluga l 4g ko launch kar diya hain
inch ki hain display panasonic company ne apne is naye smartphone eluga l 4g mein android ka operating system diya hain
iske alawa agar is handset ke processor ki baat kare to isme aapko
ghz ka octa core qualcomm snapdragon 410 processor milega
eluga l 4g mein aapko 1 gb ki ram milegi
vahi iske storage capacity ki baat kare to isme aapko 8 gb ki internal memory milegi aur 32 gb tak micro sd card ki suvidha milegi
megapixel ka rear camera panasonic company ne apne is naye smartphone eluga l 4g mein 8 megapixel ka rear camera diya hain , jisme auto focus hoga
vahi isme 5 mega pixel ka front camera bhi aapko milega
agar connectivity ki baat kare to eluga l 4g mein aapko 4g , 3g , gprs edge , bluetooth , wi fi aadi ki suvidha milegi
agar iske color variant ki baat kare to isme aapko radiant blue color milega

android , apple , general knowledge , microsoft , smartphone , tech news , tech tips a a print email smartphone ke market mein in dino naye aur behtarin features wale handset ki bahaar hain
halaki ki jitne handset available hote hain , customers ko confusion bhi utna hi hota hain
android , windows , ios aur blackberry jaise os wale tamam smartphone market mein mauzood hain
to aaiye jante hain ki kis operation system ki kya hain khasiyat ;
android pichle 2 saalo se baat kare to google ka mobile operating system yani ki android os sabse jyada popular ho raha hain
iska main reason yeh hain ki , android ka user interface itna simple aur behtar hain ki users ise asaani se access kar lete hain
jiski wajah se yeh customers mein kafi charchit hain
android os mein aapko 4 , 000 se lekar 40 , 000 rupaye ki keemat wale smartphone mil jayenge
android device mail handle karne , social networking aur web browsing , smooth touch screen ke mamle mein number one sabit hota hain
iske alawa yeh os apne app store ki wajah se users ko kafi attract karta hain
vahi samay samay par company iske operation system ko update karti rahti hain
haal hi mein google ne android ka
os version market mein utara tha , jiska user interface kafi behtarin hain
aise mein agar aap apps ke deewane hain to android os best option hain
ios agar aap touch screen smartphone ka alag experience lena chahte hain to , ios se behtar aur koi option nahi milega
iska user interface adroid se bilkul alag hain
yeh apple ka os hain , jo kafi smooth chalta hain
apple ke apps kafi alag hote hain
isme users ko sab kuch milega
presentation editing karni ho ya phir game khelna ho
vahi video editing ke liye bhi kafi behtar device hain
yeh os regularly update hota rahta hain
agar iski keemat ki baat kare to , yeh high range smartphone hain
windows ; yeh os microsoft ke dwara run karaya jata hain
iske user interface ki baat kare , to isme aapko home screen dikhaai nahi degi jaise android ya ios mein milta hain
isme users ko icon app nahi dikhenge
vahi menu ki baat kare to yeh square box jaisa hota hain
jisme saare apps mauzood hote hain
diggaj company microsoft ke dwara banaya gya yeh os samay samay par update hote rahta hain
company ne haal mein hi iska naya version window 10 market mein utar diya hain , jo sabhi windows device par run karega
phil haal windows os ki sabse badi kami iske apps ko lekar hain
market mein blackberry os ki demand na hone ke karan company ko ghata loss bhi uthana pada hain
khair yeh os office workers ke liye kafi behtarin hain kyonki isme ppt , documents se lekar excel tak sabhi kaam kiye ja sakte hain
agar aap entertaining ke purpose se yeh phone khareedna chahte hain to aapka yeh faisla galat sabit hoga
yeh businessman ke liye perfect choice ban sakta hain lekin college going student ke liye bekar hain
06 methi ke dane khane ke fayde benefits
methi ke dane khane ke fayde benefits of fenugreek seeds hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips methi ke dane khane ke fayde benefits of fenugreek seeds 0 health tips a a print email aamtaur par kitchen mein paye jane wale methi ke dano aur pattiyo ka istemal daal , paranthe aur sabziyo se lekar tamam tarah ki dishes mein kiya jata hain
khane ka swaad badhane ke saath methi ke dano mein kai diosgenin , aur steroidal saponins ka bhi accha source hain
diosgenin bhi ek tarah ka steroid hain
protein , vitamin c , niacin , potassium , iron aur alkaloids jaise tatvo ka khazana hain methi
methi bad cholesterol ko bhi kam karta hain
dil ki bimariya rakhe door methi ke daano aur pattiyo mein paya jane wala galactomannan potassium ek bahut accha source hain
yeh sodium ki matra ko control karke dil ki dhadkan ke utar chadhav ko maintain karta hain , jisse blood pressure normal rahta hain
diabetes mein faydemand methi ka istemal diabetes mein bahut hi faydemand hain
galactomannan asaani se ghulne wala fiber hain , jo blood mein sugar ko observe karne ki capacity ko kam karta hain
iske saath hi methi mein amino acids ki mauzoodgi insulin ke production ko bhi badhati hain , jo diabetes ke rogiyo ke liye jaroori hain
ghulansheel fiber pet mein jakar phoolta hain
06 hari mirch khane ke fayde benefits of
hari mirch khane ke fayde benefits of green chillies hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips hari mirch khane ke fayde benefits of green chillies 0 health tips a a print email bhojan ke saath agar hari mirch na rakhi ho to kanhi na kanhi kami si lagti hain
cancer se bachaye hari mirch mein anti oxidants hote hain jo sharir ki immunity ko badhata hain aur cancer se bhi ladne mein madad karta hain
skin ke liye accha hari mirch mein bahut sara vitamin e hota hain , jo ki skin ke liye faydemand natural oil ka production karta hain
zero calorie aapko mirch se jo kuch acchi cheeze milti hain vah bina calorie ke hoti hain
purusho ko jaroor khana chahiye purusho ko hari mirch prostate ke cancer se bachati hain
blood sugar level ko kam kare mirch khane se aapke sharir ka blood sugar level balance ho jayega
bacterial infection se bachav hari mirch mein anti bacterial gun paye jate hain , jo ki infection ko door karte hain

08 tej patta ke fayde benefits of bay leaf
tej patta ke fayde benefits of bay leaf hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips tej patta ke fayde benefits of bay leaf 0 health tips a a print email tej patta jise tej pat ya bay leaf kaha jata hain is ke bahut hi fayde hain
indian kitchen mein khane ka swaad aur khushboo badhane ke liye istemal mein laya jane wala tej patta bay leaf ek mahatvpoorn masala hain
in patto ke tel mein anti fungal aur anti bacterial gun hota hain , jo skin ko ifection se bachata hain
diabetes ka ilaj type 2 diabetes ke ilaj mein tej patta bahut hi faydemand hota hain
yeh blood glucose , cholesterol aur triglyceride ke level ko kam karta hain
tez patta anti oxidants se bharpoor hota hain jo diabetes kafi hud tak control karta hain
digestion ke liye jaroori khane mein tejpaat ke istemal se digestion sahi rahta hain
cardiovascular health tej patta phytonutrients se bharpoor hota hain , jo cardiovascular bimariyo jaise heart attack aur stroke ki sambhavna ko kam karta hain
iske alawa isme salicylates , phytonutrients , routine , caffeic acid mauzood hote hain jo heart ke function ko sahi rakhte hain
yeh pimples ko theek karte hain
periods ki samsya mein folic acid se bharpoor tej patta pregnancy ke 3 mahine pahle aur baad , dono hi situation mein sharir ki kami ko puri karta hain

herbal experts ke anusaar skin par agar tulsi ke patto ko ragad diya jaye , to skin par kisi bhi prakar ke infection mein aaraam milta hain

herbal experts flu ke dauraan bukhaar se grast rogi ko tulsi aur sendha namak dene ki salah dete hain

05 dalia khane ke fayde benefits of
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips dalia khane ke fayde
general knowledge , health tips a a print email low calorie , high fiber , bahut sare vitamins aur protein ki matra ke liye daliya ka upyog jyadatar log subah ke nashte mein karte hain
saath hi din bhar ke liye jaroori neutrons ki supply bhi isse ho jati hain
hemoglobin badhata hain dalia iron ka bahut accha source hain , jo sharir ke liye jaroori hone ke saath , hemoglobin bhi badhata hain
wajan kam karna carbohydrate ki uchit matra vale daliya ko jyadatar log subah ke nashte mein khate hain
kyonki yeh halka hone ke saath wajan kam karne aur diabetes ke patients ke liye bhi faydemand hain
diabetes ke mareez dalia kha kar bahut hi jald glucose level ko control kar sakte hain
type 2 diabetes mein faydemand dalia aur aise hi prakar ke sabut anaj mein magnesium ki bharpoor matra hoti hain
magnesium lag bhag 300 prakar ke enzymes banata hain
khastaur par aise enzymes jo insulin's secretion mein madadgar hote hain
saath hi glucose ki jaroori matra blood tak pahuchate hain
haddiyon ko majboot banata hain daliya calcium aur magnesium ka khazana hota hain
energy deta hain fiber ke saath daliya mein energy ke liye jaroori carbohydrate paye jate hain
sirf 1 cup dalia kha kar b1 , b2 , minerals , magnesium aadi purti ki ja sakti hain
isme mauzood bahut saare nutrients , anti oxidant sharir se hanikarak toxins ko bahar nikal kar kai saari bimariyon se bachate hain
breast cancer se bachata hain
sabut anaj jaise daliya aadi mein fiber ki pryapt matra breast cancer ki sambhavna ko kam karti hain
reserch ke anusar fiber yukt cheezo se lung , breast , ovarian cancer jaise sabhi cancer se nijat paya ja sakta hain
gram fiber paya jata hain
daliya mein mauzood fiber kabz se rahat dilata hain
aur digestive system ke saath pet ko bhi healthy banata hain
cardiovascular system ko sahi rakhta hain rojan 1 cup sabut anaj khakar cardiovascular system ko sahi rakha ja sakta hain
saath hi high cholesterol , high blood pressure ko bhi control kiya ja sakta hain
01 ber khane ke fayde benefits of berry in
ber khane ke fayde benefits of berry in hindi
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips ber khane ke fayde benefits of berry in hindi
health tips a a print email ber khane ke bahut hi fayde hote hain
ber mein carbohydrate 20 30 gram , protein
benefits of indian berry jujube in hindi baalo ke liye faydemand ber ki pattiyo mein 61 jaroori protein paaye jane saath vitamin c , carotenoids ke alawa b complex jyada matra mein paya jata hain
isme anti oxidant aur anti inflammatory gun bhi hain
khansi aur bukhaar mein faydemand ber mein anti inflammatory gun hote hain , iska juice peene se khansi aur bukhaar door ho jate hain
body ki immunity ko badhata hain ber mein magnesium , potassium , phosphorus , copper , calcium aur iron jaise minerals paaye jate hain
in tatvo se body ka immune system majboot banta hain
vitamin c se bharpoor santre aur nimbu ki tarah ber mein bharpoor matra mein vitamin c paya jata hain
isme dusre fruits ke compare jyada vitamin c aur anti oxidants ki matra hoti hain
iske istemal se skin lambi umar tak jawan bani rahti hain
santre aur nimbu mein mauzood vitamin c ka behatarin option hain ber , isme vitamin c ki matra khatte phalo ke mukable 20 guna jyada hain
tumor aur cancer se bachaav ; medical researches ke mutabik ber se low blood pressure , anemia , liver aadi ki problems se rahat milti hain
yeh sharir mein tumor ke cells ko paida nahi hone deta hain
yeh skin ki dekhbhaal ke liye best option hain
blood purifier ka kaam karta hain ber ek natural blood purifier hain
to dosto aaj aapne jana ki ber indian jujube , berry hamare liye kitna faydemand hota hain
ber ke benefits janne ke baad aapka mann bhi ber khane ko karega
lekin is ber ka ek negative effect yeh hain ki agar aapko diabetes hain toh yeh phal aapko nahi khana chahiye , kyonki isme carbohydrate jyada paya jata hain , jo blood sugar level ko badhane mein madad karta hain
isliye diabetes patient ko ber jyada nahi khana chahiye
04 online shopping ke fayde aur nuksaan
online shopping ke fayde aur nuksaan
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge tech tips online shopping ke fayde aur nuksaan
general knowledge , tech tips a a print email aaj ka zamane mein har kisi ko online shopping karna bahut hi accha lagta hain
aadmi ho ya aurat sabhi ki pasand ban gyi hain oline shopping
online shopping ke iss option ki wajah se log ghar baithe baithe internet ke zariye asaani se shopping kar lete hain aur veh bhi apne favorites brands ke products ki
india mein e commerce ka market aur badh aur bhi tezi ke saath grow kar rahe hain , kai tarah ki online shopping websites apne customers ko loobhane mein lagi huyi hain
kai companies aisi hain jo free mein products ki home delivery bhi deti hain , kuch companies big sale , festival sale tamam tarah ke sale ke naam par grahako ko attract karne ki koshish karti hain
online shopping karne ke fayde online products ka price local market se sasta hota hain
online shopping mein time waste nahi hota hain
kai products local stores par easy available nahi hote hain , toh vehi products online badi hi asaani ke saath aapko mil jate hain
online shopping se customers zyada satisfy hote hain
companies aapki privacy ka khayaal rakhti hain
online website customer ko protection bhi deti hain
online shopping karne ke nuksaan online shopping mein products ki quality ka pata nahi chalta hain
kuch companies samaan ki delivery karne par shipping charges bhi leti hain
online shopping mein order dene par samaan kai baar bahut late aapke paas deliver hota hain
online shopping mein products ki delivery mein uske defective ya tootne ka bhi darr hota hain
kuch products ki warranty bhi nahi milti hain
kuch website farzi hoti hain , jisse customer unke jaal mein phas jata hain
credit card , debit card mein dhoka hone ki sambhavna rahti hain
online shopping karne ki quick tips agar aap online shopping karne ja rahe hain toh oos products ka price local market mein check kare
online shopping hamesha jaane maane websites se hi karni chahiye , ho sake toh cash on delivery ka option ka istemal kare
kyonki fake website se agar aap online shopping karte hain toh yeh aapki bank account ko hack bhi kar sakte hain
isliye famous website se hi online shopping kare

02 smartphone ki battery ko jald khatm
smartphoneki battery ko jald khatm honese bachane ki tips
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home smartphone tech tips smartphoneki battery ko jald khatm honese bachane ki tips
smartphone , tech tips a a print email market mein in dino behatarin featureswalesmartphone ki line lagi huyi hain
inke featuresaurspecifications toh jabardast hain , lekin jab smartphone ka jyada istemal hone lagta hain , toh inki battery bahut hi jaldi dischargehojati hain
turn down display brightness yehtips smartphone aur laptop dono users ke liye common hain
jyadatar devices mein brightness ki setting ko asaani ke saathaccess kiya ja sakta hain
iseaap display settings mein jakar change karsaktehain
don t use vibrate aksar dekhne ko milta hain kismartphone s user ringtone ko mute karkephone vibratepar rakhtehain
keep it cool aaspaas ka mahaul battery par khasa asar daalta hain
yani ki temperatureka battery power par seedhaasar padta hain
aise mein smartphoneko direct sunlight se door rakhna chahiye
jyada garmi aur thandidono hi smartphone ki battery ki capacity ke liye haanikarak hain
change your settings aksar dekhajatahain ki users smartphonepar live wallpaper ya 3d wallpaper laga kar rakhte hain , iski wajah se battery jaldi dischargehoti hain
schedule app updates over wi fi agar aap kisi app ko updatekar rahehain tohusaywi fi ke jariye updatekare
go forpaid appsinstead offree ones ads supported apps aapke smartphone battery lifeko lagbhag
us based research kemutabik , phone processor dimaag ki tarah hotahain
aisemein adssupported appsbrain powerkam kar dete hain
aise meinjahatak possible ho toh free apps se bache
iskeliyepaid apps sabse behtarin option hain
keep the screen timeout short smartphone ki display jitni kam chalegi , battery utni kam kharch hogi
iske liye aapko display settings par jana hoga
jaha par aapko screen timeout ka option dikhaai dega
is option se yeh nishchit kiya jata hain ki phone screen par koi bhi app use karneke baad uski screenkitani der takjalegi
turn off location tracking ek newsreport ke mutabik , iphone users agar facebook app ko accesskarte hain , toh unke phone ki batteryjaldi dischargeho jatihain
kyonki yeh gpsmodule ke chalteuser ki location ko lagatar track karta rahtahain
aise mein agar location trackko off kar diya jayetoh battery drain ki problem se niptaja saktahain
agar aap androiduser hain toh settings location mein jakar location tracking ko disable kar sakte hain
vahi ios user ke liye settings privacy location services option mauzoodhain
turn off push notifications agar aapko lagta hain ki battery 30 ke aas paasbachi hain toh sabhi push notificationsko offkarde
jaise ki facebook ya kai messenger apps aadike pop ups on rakhne par yeh energy ko concede karte hain
aapke phone meinjitni baar pop up notificationaayega , vehkuch na kuch battery jaroor khayega
particular dischargevs full discharge aksar aapne suna hoga ki phone ko tabhi charge par lagana chahiye jab vehpuri tarah se discharge ho chuka ho
expertskahte hain kibattery ke30 se 40 percent tak aatehi phone ko chargekarlena chahiye
kyonki mana jatahain kiparticular discharge full dischargecycle se behtarhain
aise mein abaap kabhi bhi battery ko full dischargenakare , issebattery ki capacity ke kam hone ka khatranahi hota
what is sukanya smriddhi yozna
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home finance sukanya samriddhi yojana kya hain aur iske fayde
finance a a print email bachchon ke future ki jaroorato ko pura karne ke liye tamam tarah ki yojnaye hain
jis par f y 2015 16 ke liye government
ka interest de rahi hain
ise income tax ki dhara 80c ke ander rakha gya hain
is scheme mein account mein jama ki gayi rakam , milne wale byaaz aur maturity par milne wali rashi tax free hoti hain
aap yeh khata tabhi khulwa sakte hain jab aap bacchi ke natural ya legally guardian ho
ek financial year mein is khate mein jama ki gyi rakam
ek financial year mein aap nyuntam minimum 1 , 000 rupaye jama karwa sakte hain , agar aap nyuntam rakam jama nahi karwate hain to aapko 50 rupaye ki penalty deni hogi
jab tak bachchi 10 saal tak ki nahi ho jati hain tab tak uske parents is account ko operate karenge
uske baad wah khud bhi is account ko operate kar sakti hain
uske 21 saal hone par sukanya samriddhi account mature ho jayega
is account ka transfer bharat mein kanhi bhi karvaya ja sakta hain
iske liye bachchi ka birth certificate aur anya document jaise aapki identity aur residence proof dena hoga
paise aap cash , cheque , demand draft ke jariye jama karwa sakte hain
incomen tax mein milne wala labh sukanya samridhdhi account dhara 80 c ke dayre mein rakha gya hain
is liye is khate mein ek financial year mein
sukanya samriddhi yojana , ppf aur child mutual fund ki tulna sukanya smaridhhi yojana , ppf aur child mutual fund ki tulna , returns , liquidity aur taxation ke aadhaar par jante hain ki kaun si yojana aapke liye faydemand rahegi
bank aur kuch private banks sambandhit mutual fund company saal mein kitni baar jama karwa sakte hain paise asimit baar saal mein 12 baar asimit baar kitna milta hain return financial year 2015 16 ke liye
financial year 2015 16 ke liye
bazaar se sambandh minimum aur maximum invest ki seema pratek beti ke liye minimum 1000 rupaye aur maxium
lakh rupaye minimum 500 rupaye maximum koi limit nahi kya avarti jama ya systematic investment plan ka vikalp hain haa nahi haa kisi khas saal par paise na jama karne par lagne wali penalty 50 rupaye 50 rupaye koi penalty nahi paise jama karne par milne wala kar labh dhara 80 c ke tahat
lakh rupaye tak dhara 80c ke tahat
lakh rupaye tak nahi arjit byaaz par lagne wala tax tax free tax free tax free 1 saal baad aanshik nikasi ki suvida aur kab nikaal sakte hain paise haan , beti ke 18 saal ke hone par 50 6th year ke baad kabhi bhi 3 saal tak nikasi par exit load lagega maturity ki avadhi khata khulane ki date se 21 saal ki umar ya shaadi ke samay khata khulwane ke 15 saal baad kabhi bhi kar sakte hain nikasi 3 saal tak lagega exit load kya maturity ke baad badhaai ja sakti hain nivesh ki avadhi agar maturity par khata band nahi karwaya gya to oos par byaaz milna jaari rahega 5 saal ke liye , asimit baar nikasi na karne ke samay tak liquidity bahut kam madhyam darje ka adhik posted by hinglishpedia share to nextnewer post previousolder post post a comment aprieztmkrdezign 218168578325095 subscribe to post comments atom loading

weight loss karne wale 5 kism ki chai tea
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips weight loss karne wale 5 kism ki chai tea
general knowledge , health tips a a print email wajan kam karna aur bhi mushkil ho jata hain , jab aap pizza , burger , paneer se bhari sandwich aur sharab ka sewan karte hain
aisi kai kism ki chai tea hain jo wajan kam karne mein helpful hoti hain
chai energy level ko badhati hain aur heart stroke ke khatre ko kam karti hain
oolong tea oolong tea fat ko kam karti hain , fat ko burn karti hain aur body mein cholesterol ki matra ko bhi ghatati hain
agar aap oolong tea ka labh lena chahte hain toh ise 20 se 30 minutes tak ubaal le
green tea mein kuch aise rasayan paye jate hain jo body ke metabolism ko badha dete hain
yehi badha hua metabolism sharir ke extra weight ko kam karta hain
saath hi green tea mein kuch anti oxidants bhi paye jate hain jo sharir ko detoxify karne mein help karte hain , detoxification ki wajah se bhi wajan tezi ke saath kam kiya ja sakta hain
black tea sharir mein energy aur stamina ko badhati hain
saath hi body se toxins ko nikaalne mein madad bhi karti hain
rose tea chai banane ke dauran isme gulab ki patti mila kar rose tea taiyaar ki jati hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips jau ka paani peene ke fayde
general knowledge , health tips a a print email jau ka paani peene ke bahut saare fayde hote hain
aaj hum aapko jau ka paani peene ke fayde benefits of barley water in hindi urdu
jau mein vitamin b complex , iron , calcium , magnesium , manganese , selenium , zinc , copper , protein , amino acid , dietary fibers aur kai tarah ke antioxidants paye jate hain
jau ka paani peene se kidney stone se chhutkara milta hain
barley water ko rojana peene se kidney bhi healthy rahti hain
daily jau ka paani peene se skin glow karne lagti hain , yeh vitamin c , antioxidants aur minerals ka khazana hota hain jo skin ke liye faydemand saabit hota hain
pregnancy ke duaran pregnant lady ke pairo mein sujan ho jati hain , aise mein sujan ko kam karne ke liye garbhvati mahila ko jau ka paani peena chahiye
jau ke paani mein fiber bahut jyada paya jata hain , jiski wajah se yeh body ke cholesterol level ko kam karta hain
cholesterol level kam hone se heart se related kai saari bimariyo hone ka khatra kafi kam ho jata hain
isse heart bhi healthy rahta hain
jau anti inflammatory hain , joints pain aur gathiya se preshan logo ko jau ka paani kafi fayda pahuchaata hain
agar aapko urine se related koi problem hain toh jau ka paani aapke liye faydemand saabit hoga
yeh blood sugar level ko control karne mein bahut madadgar hota hain
jau ka paani body mein glucose aur blood sugar level ko normal banaye rakhne mein madad karta hain
ise peene se sugar level ko contrl mein rakha ja sakta hain
darasal jau mein beta glucan paya jata hain jo glucose level ko kam karta hain , iska matlab hain ki agar aapko diabetes hain toh aapko jau ka paani jaroor peena chahiye
yeh body ki swelling ko kam karne aur skin ko kharab hone se bachata hain
isme beta glucan paya jata hain , jiski wajah se aapki aante saaf rahti hain
jau ka paani banane ki vidhi recipe of making barley water in hindi urdu jau ka paani banane ke liye sauce pan mein 2 table spoon jau le aur usme paani milaye

health tips a a print email parwal bharat ke har state mein sabzi ke taur par khaya jata hain
parwal ka vanispatik naam trichosanthes dioica hain aur ise english mein pointed gourd kaha jata hain
aadiwasi herbal experts ke anusar aksar parval ki sabzi khate rahne se pet se judi anek problems mein rahat milta hain
parval ka taza juice takat aur energy deta hain
aadiwasiyo ke anusaar parwal blood purifier ka bhi kaam karta hain

05 aaloo bhukhara khane ke fayde benefits
aaloo bhukhara khane ke fayde benefits of plum hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips aaloo bhukhara khane ke fayde benefits of plum 0 health tips a a print email bahut hi kam phal aise hote hain jo khane ke saath saath sehat ke liye faydemand hote hain
isme mauzood anti oxidants ki matra kai saari bimariyo jaise osteoporosis , aankho ke sukhepan , cancer , diabetes aur motape ko door rakhne ka kaam karte hain
body mein cholesterol level ko control karne ke saath cardiovascular health aur sahi immunity system ko barkarar rakhte hain
blood ki clotting se bhi bachate hain aur electrolyte ko balance karta hain , nervous system ko durust rakhne ke saath hi skin ko kai prakar ke rogo se suraksha karta hain
ise fresh khane ke saath sukhakar bhi khaya ja sakta hain
aaloo bukhare mein mauzood phenols aur flavonoids sehat ke liye har tarike se faydemand hain
tamam research ke anusaar beej wale phalo ke sewan se metabolic rate sahi rahta hain
isme mauzood anti obesity aur anti inflammatory body mein alag alag tarike se kaam karte hain , jo pet ke saath saath cholesterol , diabetes aur cardiovascular sambandhi bimariyo ko door karte hain
anti oxidants se bharpoor aaloo bukhare mein vitamin c aur phytonutrients jaise lutein , zeaxanthin , cryptoxanthin aur chlorogenic acid mauzood hote hain
jo anti oxidants ke taur par kaam karte hain
jo radicals ki problems ko door karte hain
aaloo bukhare mein mauzood tatv motapa kam karne ke saath hi androoni cells ki repairing ka kaam bhi karte hain
diabetes aaloo bukhare mein anti hyperglycemic tatv diabetes rogiyo ke liye labhdayak hota hain
ise khane se blood mein glucose ki matra ka balance bana rahta hain
saath hi isme mauzood flavonoids diabetes mein jaroori insulin level ko bhi banaye rakhta hain
osteoporosis ki sambhavna ko kam karta hain
sukhe huye aaloo bukhare mein potassium ke saath polyphenols bhi paye jate hain jo ovarian ke liye jaroori hormone ke secretion ke liye jimmevar hota hain
pregnancy mein faydemand vitamins aur minerals ka khazana hone ke karan aaloobukhara ya isse bani kisi bhi cheez ke sewan pregnancy mein bahut hi faydemand hota hain
skin ki dekhbhaal karta hain
aaloo bukhare mein anti oxidants ke saath vitamin c ki bharpoor matra payi jati hain jo tavcha ki komalta ke saath hi usay lambe samay tak jawan banaye rakhti hain
jyadatar skin care products mein iska istemal kiya jata hain
cancer se bachata hain
aaloo bukhare mein anti oxidants aur phytonutrients ki uchit matra mahilaon mein aamtaur par hone wale breast cancer ki sambhavna ko kafi hud tak kam kar dete hain
saath hi pet , fefde , ovarian aadi prakar ke cancer ke liye jimmevar cells ko bhi banane se rokta hain
cholesterol level ko kam karta hain
ise khane se ya iska juice peekar cholesterol level ko kafi hud tak control kiya ja sakta hain
fiber ki matra bahut jyada ldl cholesterol ko kam karti hain
aur body ke liye achchi aur jaroori hdl cholesterol level ko badha kar usay chust durust rakhti hain
immunity system sahi rakhta hain
vitamin c ki bharpoor matra body ki immunity ko itna strong bana deti hain , jisse sharir kisi bhi prakar ke infection , rogo se ladkar usay tamam tarah ki bimariyo se koso door rakhta hain
nervous system ko behtar banata hain
aaloo bukhare mein vitamin b6 ki mauzoodagi nervous system ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
yeh hormone level ko bhi control karne ka kaam karta hain
neen na aane ki samsya , mood badalna aadi ke liye jimmevar fluid ko maintain karta hain

phone ko power de raha hain

saath hi selfie ke liye is phone par milega aapko 2 megapixel ka front camera

09 energy level badhaane wale top food
energy level badhaane wale top food
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips energy level badhaane wale top food
general knowledge , health tips a a print email body ki energy level badhaane wale food kaun se hain
food list in hindi urdu who increase body's energy level
kyonki energy drink peene se health ko nuksaan hi hota hain , isliye aap in food ko jaroor apni diet mein shamil kijiye aur apni body ki energy ko badhaayiye
isse bachne ke liye jyadatar log soft drink , coffee aur kai tarah ki energy drinks peete hain
lekin long term tak energy drinks peene se health se related problems bhi ho jati hain
kyonki in energy drinks mein paye jane wale caffeine hamari body ke liye bahut hi nuksandeh hote hain
caffeine kuch time ke liye aapke dimaag ko alert aur active kar deta hain , lekin jab caffeine ka asar khatm hota hain to aap phir se tiredness feel karne lagte hain
aise mein aapko aise natural food lene chahiye jinme caffeine bilkul bhi na ho aur vey aapko pura din energetic bhi rakhe
body ko energetic banane ke liye khayiye yeh cheeze
apple seb mein antioxidants bharpoor matra mein hote hain jo body ki immunity ko boost karte hain
isme vitamin , minerals aur fiber paye jate hain ko aapki body ko energetic rakhte hain
badam badam mein potassium , protein , magnesium aur calcium paya jata hain , jo aapki body ko pura din energetic banaye rakhte hain
banana kele mein potassium ki quantity kafi jyada hoti hain jo susti aur thakaan ko door karti hain
kele mein vitamin b6 bhi hota hain jo energy level ko banaye rakhta hain aur concentration ko bhi badhaata hain
isme protein aur carbohydrate hote hain , jo aapke brain ko energy dete hain
palak palak mein iron ke alawa aur bhi kai nutrients hote hain jo hame full day energetic rakhne mein hamari madad karte hain
aap palak ka salad ya soup bana kar pee sakte hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips kamar ke motape belly fat ko kam karne ke liye kya khana chahiye aur kya nahi khana chahiye
general knowledge , health tips a a print email kamar ke motape ko kam karne ke liye aapko kya khana chahiye aur kya nahi khana chahiye , iske bare mein aaj hum aapko batayenge
example ke taur par agar aap white bread khate hain to iski jagah par aap brown ya wheat bread kha sakte hain
dusri ko aapko oily aur spicy food khane ki bajaye simple roti sabzi khani chahiye
belly fat ko kam karne ke liye kya khaye aur kya nahi khaye milk shake ki banaye fresh fruits ki smoothie piye milkshake mein kafi jyada calorie payi jati hain
safed chawal ki bajaye brown rice khaye 1 cup cooked huye brown rice mein 4 gram fiber hota hain
toh dusri aor 1 cup pakaye gye safed chawal mein sirf 1 gram fiber hi paya jata hain
fruit juice peene ke bajaye doodh piye apki body ka 99 calcium aapki haddiyon mein paya jata hain
ice cream ki jagah par dahi khana chahiye dahi khane se protein , vitamin c , vitamin b12 prapt hote hain
balki simple vegetable soup hi peena chahiye
toh dusri aor phalon mein fiber , nutrients aur natural sugar paya jata hain
milk chocolate ki jagah par dark chocolate khaye dark chocolate mein milk chocolate ki mukable kam sugar hoti hain
fried chicken ya fish ki jagah par boil , roast ya grill chicken khaye fry kiye gye bhojan mein fat aur calorie jyada hoti hain
potato chips ki jagah par popcorn khana chahiye popcorn mein potato chips ke mukable 80 kam fat hota hain , iske alawa popcorn mein aaloo chips ke mukable dugna fiber hota hain
ki cold drink mein 10 chammach sugar hoti hain
white pasta ki jagah par wheat pasta khaye wheat pasta mein high fiber aur nutrients kafi jyada matra mein paye jate hain
jabki white pasta mein sirf maida hi hota hain
fried food ki bajaye roti sabzi khaye fried food khane se pet toh bhar jata hain , lekin fried food mein calorie aur fat jyada paye jate hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email modern lifestyle ki wajah se aaj kal hum sabhi log tension segheere rahte hain
tension door karne ke useful tips
morning aur evening ke time rojana apna manpasand gaana aur music sunne se aapka dimaag shant hota hain
kai countries mein huyi researches se yeh pata chala hain ki agar aap daily breakfast nahi karte hain , to isse aapke mental health par buraasar padta hain
iske opposite jo log subah ke naashte mein nutrition se bharpoor food jaise juice , dry fruits , phal aadi khate hain , unhe tension kafi kam hota hain
isliye subah breakfast jaroor kare
morning breakfast mein potassium , zinc , magnesium aur vitamins wali cheezo ko shamil kare
apni thinking ko hamesha positive rakhe
psychology ke according agar hum apni soch ko positive rakhte hain to hamare dimaag par bahut hi accha effect padta hain
isse aap tension free life jee sakte hain
office se aane ke baad nahaye
apni family , friends , janne walo aur colleagues se acche relation bana kar rakhe
experts ka kahna hain ki har 2 ghante ke baad aankho aur dimaag ko rest dene ke liye 5 minutes ka break le
isse aapko kafi relaxation mahsoos hogi
