05 karela khane ke nuksaan side effects of
karela khane ke nuksaan side effects of bitter gourd hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips karela khane ke nuksaan side effects of bitter gourd 0 health tips a a print email karela ko prakriti ka vardaan hain , ise sehat ke liye bahut faydemand mana jata hain
diabetes ke mareez ko karela khane ki salah di jati hain
kyonki karele ke beejo mein alpha momorcharin tatv hota hain , jo pregnancy mein badhak hota hain
liver adhik matra mein karele ka sewan liver infection ka karan ban sakta hain
karela directly liver ko nuksaan nahi pahuchata hain , lekin iske adhik istemal se liver enzyme badhte hain jo dhamiyo mein akadan badha sakte hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips chini sugar khane ke fayde
general knowledge , health tips a a print email chini shakkar sugar khane ke fayde bhi hote hain , yakin nahi aata na
ganne ke ras se taiyaar ki jane wali shakkar mein mainly sucrose , lactose aur fructose mauzood hota hain
yeh fruits , shahad aur dusre sources mein bhi paya jata hain
jab dimaag ko sugar supply band ho jati hain toh black out ki situation paida ho jati hain
khoon mein pahuch kar chini glucose mein badal jati hain , jo chini ka saraltam roop hota hain
aapko jaankar hairaani hogi ki kai players turant thakaan mitane ke liye apne saath sugar cubes rakhte hain
low blood pressure walo ke liye jin logo ko low blood pressure ki shikayat hoti hain , unhe apne saath sugar cubes rakhne ki salah di jati hain
ise khane se blood pressure badhta hain
iske alawa sugar skin ke liye ek accha scrub bhi hain
yeh skin se dead cells ko hatakar chamak deta hain
isse sharir mein paani aur minerals ki kami puri ho jayegi
04 online money transfer karte samay rakhe
online money transfer karte samay rakhe in baaton ka khyaal
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home finance tech tips online money transfer karte samay rakhe in baaton ka khyaal
finance , tech tips a a print email online paise transfer karna jitna asaan hain , utna hi jokhim bhara bhi
to online money transfer karte samay in baaton ka kyaal rakhe naya beneficiary jodte waqt rahe alert vaise to beneficiary ka account number 2 baar is liye type karna padta hain , taki mismatch hone par gadbadi ka pata chal sake
lekin agar pahli baar aapne ehtiyat se beneficiary ka account number likh liya hain to dobara use type karne ki bajaye copy paste kar de
beneficiary ka mobile number bank ko de beneficiary ka bhi mobile number bank ko jaroor de
isse bank aapko aur paisa jiske account mein bheja gya hain yani ki beneficiary ko mobile par transaction ki suchna dega
cooling period mein na kare paise transfer agar naye beneficiary ko paise bhej rahe hain
ise cooling period kaha jata hain
galat transaction ki suchana turant bank ko de reserve bank ke niyam anusaar online transaction mein huyi gad badi ke liye grahak khud jimmevar hain
isliye aise mamlo mein bank beneficiary ke account se paise recall nahi karta hain
06 bhringraj ke desi nuskhe benefits of
bhringraj ke desi nuskhe benefits of bhringraj hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips bhringraj ke desi nuskhe benefits of bhringraj 0 health tips a a print email nadi , naalo , maidani ilako , khet aur bagaano mein aksar dekha jane wala bhringraj ayurveda ke anusar bada hi mahatvpurn aushdhiy paudha hain
iska vanaspatik naam eclipta prostrata hain
herbal experts ke anusaar rojana aadha cup iska ras peene se ek hafte ke ander hi piliya rog khatm hone lagta hain
iske liye bhringraj ke paudhe kareeb 50 gram ko lagbhag 100ml paani mein kuchlakar phir chhan kar peena chahiye
acidity door karta hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email paani aapke acche health ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
kai baar jyada medicines khane se bhi gala aur mooh sookhta hain
hamesha thakaa hua mahsoos karte hain jab aap sahi quantity mein paani nahi peete hain toh aapke sharir ka pura system slow ho jata hain aur power saving mode mein chala jata hain
isse pet ke acid bhi dilute hota hain , jisse aapko acute acidity ki shikayat nahi rahti
muscles aur joint mein pain hona paani aapki muscles aur joint ko lubricant karta hain
minutes tak wait kare aur kuch kha le
thook aapke mooh mein khatarnaak bacteria ko panpane se rokta hain
agar aapko soft aur smooth skin chahiye toh dher saara paani peene ki aadat daaliye

health tips a a print email palak spinach aapke health ke liye bahut hi jyada faydemand hain
palak mein iron , magnesium , zinc jaise nutrients , vitamins aur minerals mauzood hote hain
health benefits of spinach juice mix with other juice in hindi urdu
palak ke juice mein in cheezo ko jaroor milaye aur piye tomato juice half cup tomato juice mein half cup spinach juice ko mix karke peene se physically weakness khatm hoti hain
gajar ka juice spinach juice mein carrot juice mila kar peene se khoon ki kami door hoti hain

06 cheeku khane ke fayde benefits of sapota
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips cheeku khane ke fayde
health tips a a print email cheeku guno se bharpoor aur bahut hi swadisth phal hain
carbohydrate hota hain
saath hi isme vitamin a aur vitamin c ki bharpoor matra payi jati hain
chiku mein 14 sharkra bhi hoti hain
isme phosphorus aur lauh tatv kafi matra mein hote hain
rakhta hain energy se bharpoor chiku mein glucose acchi matra mein paya jata hain , jo sharir ko turant energy deta hain
bimariyo se bachata hain cheeku mein tanins paya jata hain
jhurriya kam kare cheeku mein anti oxidants acchi matra mein paye jate hain
yeh free radicals ko khatm kar deta hain
cancer se bachata hain cheeku mein vitamin a aur b mauzood hota hain
isme anti oxidants , fibers aur anya poshak tatv paye jate hain
iska niyamit sewan karne se yeh cancer rodhi ka kaam karta hain
haddiyo ke liye hain faydemand cheeku mein calcium , phosphorus aur iron paya jata hain
pregnancy mein cheeku khane ke fayde cheeku mein carbohydrate aur jaroori poshak tatv bharpoor matra mein paye jate hain
cheeku pregnancy ke dauran hone wali problems jaise kamjori , mitli , chakkar jaisi dikkato ko bhi kam karta hain
khoon se judi bimariyo mein dawa ka kaam karta hain cheeku mein hemostatic properties payi jati hain
anti viral aur anti bacterial hota hain ; chikoo mein polyphenols antioxidants hone ke karan isme kai anti viral , anti prestige aur anti bacterial gun paye jate hain
yeh sharir ko bacteria ke infection se bachata hain
diarrhea se dilaye rahat cheeku diarrhea mein bahut hi faydemand hota hain
is prakar yeh chinta , depression , anidra se pidit logo ke liye bahut hi faydemand hain
iske niyamit sewan se gastric enzymes control mein ho jate hain
cavity bhar deta hain cheeku mein latex paya jata hain isliye yeh daanto ki cavity ko bharne ka kaam karta hain
skin ko healthy banaye rakhne ke liye cheeku mein vitamin e paya jata hain , jo aapki tavcha ko nami pradan karta hain
ise lagane se baal moisturize hone ke saath hi inme nayi chamak bhi aa jati hain
isse aapke baal dandruff free ho jayenge
08 akhrot khane ke fayde benefits of walnut
akhrot khane ke fayde benefits of walnut hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips akhrot khane ke fayde benefits of walnut 0 health tips a a print email akhrot khane ke fayde bahut hain
isme ala alpha lipoic acid hota hain , jo behad upyogi tatv hain
shakahari vegetarian logo ke liye akhrot walnut kudrat ka vardaan hain
maslan salad ke saath , pasta , dips , spread aur ice cream aur brawny ke saath iska upyog asaani se kiya ja sakta hain
akhrot mein fibers , vitamin b , magnesium aur anti oxidants adhik matra mein hote hain
isme omega 3 fatty acid hota hain
yeh asthma , arthritis , skin problems , eczema aur psoriasis jaisi bimariyo se suraksha karta hain
akhrot mein omega 3 fatty acid hota hain
prachin chinese manyata ise mahaj ek coincident nahi manti hain
is tradition ke anusaar akhrot mein kai saare gun hote hain
isme anti oxidants hote hain , jo cancer cells ko ikattha hone se rokte hain
akhrot khane se sharir se melatonin hormone ka nikaas hota hain
akhrot khoone mein cholesterol level ko kam karta hain
iske niyamit sewan se baal aur skin dono healthy rahte hain
rojana akrot khana diabetes ke rogiyo ke liye faydemand hota hain
yeh rakt vaahikaaon ko faila deta hain aur metabolism syndrome ko kam kar deta hain
akhrot khane se sperm count badhta hain
agar aap apne stno breast ko soodaul aur healthy banaye rakhna chahti hain , to akrot ka niyamit sewan kare

general knowledge , tech tips a a print email hum aksar air conditioner ke baare mein sochte hain ki jitna zyada star hoga , utna hi zyada yeh bijali ki bachat karega
aaj kal gharo mein ac ka istemal hota hain , jab bhi aap apne office ya home mein air conditioner lagwate hain to is baat ka khyaal rakhte hain ki yeh electricity ka consumption kitna karega
lekin , center for science environment yani cse ne challenge kiya hain ki 5 star ac ke naam par consumers se dokha ho raha hain
star ka ac garmi ke dino mein 1 star ac ki tarah kaam karta hain
ac par lage star sticker mein jitne star color kiye gye hote hain , vahi ac ki star rating hoti hain
matlab ki jitne star zyada honge , electricity saving utni zyada hogi
cse ki report ke mutabik 5 star ac se electricity saving karne ka daawaa darasal ek dokha hain
cse ki report ke according garmi mein jaise hi temperature 40 degree hota hain , aapka 5 star ac 2 star ki tarah kaam karne lagta hain
temperature agar 45 degree pahuch jaye tab yeh 1 star ban jata hain
star ac zyada garmi mein thandak kam deta hain
star rating dene ka kaam bureau of energy efficiency karti hain
star ac 20 22 percent electricity saving karne ka daawaa karte hain
room ko cool karne ki capacity 30 kam ho jati hain
ton wala ac 1 ton wale a
cse ne voltas , lg aur godrej ke 3 models ko lekar 5 star ac par report taiyaar ki hain
market mein 50 ac inhi teeno companies ki zyada bikte hain
cse ki report ke baad companies ki yeh jimmevaari banti hain , veh apne customers ko satisfy karne ke saath yeh saabit kare ki 5 star a
c , 5 star hi hota hain na ki one star
iphone ke aas paas ghoomne lagi chintiaa ants circling around the iphone hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home tech news iphone ke aas paas ghoomne lagi chintiaa ants circling around the iphone 0 tech news a a print email pichle dino ek khas video viral hua jisne sabko hairat mein daal diya aur gossip ka daur shuru ho gya ki aisa kaisi ho sakta hain
is video mein iphone ring hone par chintiaa ants gole bana kar iske aas paas ghoomne lagti hain
is clip mein ants normal taur par alag alag direction par chalte huye nazar aa rahe hain
youtube par is video ko upload karne wale viral video lab ke mutabik chintiya aane wale call ke karan bane electromagnetic wave ke chalte aisa kar rahi hain
new england university ke nigel andrew ne is baat se sahmati jataai hain ki chintiya magnetism ke contact mein aate hi apni direction ek disha mein le aati hain
unhone kaha , chintiyo ke antenna mein magnetic receptor hote hain
agar veh lamba rasta tay kar rahi hain to dharti se magnetic que le rahi hoti hain ki veh north , south , west , east kis direction mein ja rahi hain
ek aur expert ne bataya ki yeh abnormal behavior ke karan bhi ho sakta hain kyonki aksar ants cheezo ke aas paas gola bana leti hain
james cook university mein social inspect specialist symon robeson ne yeh kaha hain ki yeh movement ants ki communication system ka result hain
dusre experts ka yeh manana hain ki yeh video fake hain
entomologist phill torres ne kaha ki , mera manana hain ki yeh video asal mein fake hain
aisa nahi hain ki chintiyo se yeh movement nahi karwaya ja sakta hain , lekin yeh pura movement unke nature ke according thoda strange hain

09 andhere mein smartphone chalate hain

general knowledge , health tips , smartphone a a print email agar aapko bhi andhere mein ek karwat lekar smartphone ko chalane ki aadat hain , toh yeh khabar aapke hosh uda degi
ek report ke according england ki 22 years ki ek ladki ko der raat tak apne smartphone mein busy rahne ki aadat thi
is dauran karwat lekar letne ke dauran uski left eye pillow se dhaki rahti thi aur right eye se vah mobile ke screen par focus karti thi
london ke famous eye specialist dr
umar mahru ne the new england journal of medicine mein publish huye ek report mein bataya ki hamari aankho ka retina bahut hi kamaal ki cheez hoti hain
kyonki yeh lights ke level ke according dhal sakti hain , jabki camera bhi aisa nahi kar sakta hain
vah apni left eye ko band karke ek andhere kamre mein gaye aur right eye ki madad se lagatar 20 minutes tak smartphone ki screen par dekhte rahe
iske baad unhone screen ko off kar diya
mahru ke mutabik kai patient ne smartphone ke use ke chalte vision loss hone ki shikayat ki hain
12 vegetarian hone ke fayde benefits of
vegetarian hone ke fayde
benefits of eating veggies in hindi urdu
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips vegetarian hone ke fayde
health tips a a print email khane peene ko lekar hamesha log confusion mein rahte hain
kuch log kahte hain ki non veg khana chahiye to kuch log vegetarian hone ki waqalat karte hain
sirf veg khane se hame kya health benefits hote hain
hamari acchi health ko dhyaan mein rakhte huye jyadatar experts hame vegetarian banne ki salah dete hain
vegetarian hone ke fayde veg khane se aapko colon cancer , fefdo ka cancer , breast cancer , prostate cancer aur stomach cancer hone ka khatra kafi kam ho jata hain
isliye apne khane mein non veg ki jagah vegetarian khane ko jyada preference de
doctors dietitian ki mane to hamare khane mein fiber jaroor hona chahiye
green vegetables mein fiber bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain
fiber se bowel movement bahut accha hota hain
jabki non veg food mein fiber bahut hi kam quantity mein hota hain
vegetarian diet mein fat aur sodium low quantity mein hota hain
isme bacteria hote hain jo bimariyon ko paida karte hain
results ke taur par veg khane wale log jyada charhare , slim , young aur healthy rahte hain
vegetables mein jo fat paya jata hain , voh nuksaandeh nahi hota hain
isliye non vegkibajaye vegetarian banne ki koshish kare
sabhi log jante hain ki food hamari body ko energy dene ka kaam karte hain
non vegkhane se animals se milne wali problems aapko free mein mil jati hain
because animals bhi humans ki tarah steroids aur others tension hormones ko paida karte hain aur jab aap unhe khate hain to veh khoon mein mil jate hain aur poison banate hain
the good thing is that veg food khanese pet hamesha bhara bhara rahta hain aur aapko baar baar bhookh nahi lagti hain
vegetarian food khane se aapka bp bhi control mein rahta hain
jaise ki antioxidants , minerals , vitamins
inse immune system bhi strong banta hain aur cancer jaisi janlewa bimariyo se bhi fight karne mein help milti hain

04 janiye at rate of ke baare mein
janiye at the rate of ke baare mein interesting facts
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge tech tips janiye at the rate of ke baare mein interesting facts
general knowledge , tech tips a a print email internet , e mail aur social network ke is yug mein hum symbol ka khoob istemal karte hain
lekin kya aapne socha hain ki iss yani ki at the rate of sign ka istemal pahli baar kab hua
english mein yeh symbol word kaha se aaya
toh chaliye jante hain at the rate of se jude interesting facts ke baare mein duniya bhar ke alag alag zubaane bolne wale is at the rate of ko alag alag naamo se bulate hain
maslan , armenian language mein ise dubka hua kutte ka baccha kahte hain
vahi middle east asian county kazakhstan mein chaand ka kaan , germany mein spider monkey yani ki makdi ki tarah chipakne wala bandar
aisa nahi hain ki har desh mein yani ki at the rate of symbol ko jaanwaro wala naam hi diya gya ho
vahi slovakia mein achaari fish roll , toh turkey mein khubsoorat wala a kahkar bulaate hain
symbols ke morse code mein first world war ke baad koi naya symbol juda hain toh veh hi hain
iss at the rate of yani ki ke istemal ki shuruvat ki kahani aur iska itihaas history bhi kafi interesting hain
keith houston ke famous blog shady characters mein iske baare mein dilchasp kahani likhi gyi hain
e mail address ke liye sabse pahle symbol ka istemal 1971 mein hua
saal ke computer engineer ray tomlinson ne sabse pahle e mail address ke liye iss symbol ka istemal kiya
aaj yeh symbol whole world mein email ke address ke taur par istemal ho raha hain
ray tomlinson ne is symbol ko chahe jo bhi sochkar choona ho , magar yeh khoob steek baithta hain ki aap fala e mail ya domain ko mail send kar rahe hain
yani ki 20 rotiya 10 cent
vaise at the rate of symbol ka sabse pahle istemal ka zikr saal 1536 mein milta hain
jab italy ke florence city ke ek businessman ne , apni chitthi mein wine ka rate batane ke liye symbol ka istemal kiya
english ke is symbol word ka mool spanish aur portuguese language mein hain
sochiye zara mediterranean sea mein wine ke boxes se hota hua yeh ' at the rate of ' yani ki puri duniya par hukumat kar raha hain
02 adrak ki chai ke nuksaan
adrak ki chai ke nuksaan
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips adrak ki chai ke nuksaan
health tips a a print email ginger tea masaledaar drink hain jo ki pure asia mein din bhar pee jati hain aur pure world mein ise pasand kiya jata hain
yaha tak ki prachin ayurved aur chinese medicine mein bhi kareeb 3000 saalo se adrak ka istemal remedy ke roop mein kiya jata raha hain
aur adrak ki jado se taiyaar ki jane wali chai apach , sujan , jalan , migraine , nausea , diarrhea aur kai tarah ki bimariyo ke liye natural treatment ke taur par istmal ki jati hain
adrak ki jad ki chai potassium , magnesium , vitamin b6 aur vitamin c se bharpoor hoti hain
iske saath hi health ke liye jaroori oils jaise gingerol , zingerone , shogaol , farnesene , beta phellandrene , paradols hota hain
har jadi buti ki tarah adrak ki chai ke bhi side effects ho sakte hain
adrak ko acchi tarah se dho kar sukha le
ise 5 se 15 minutes tak yunhi rahne de
iske saath hi aap ready made ginger tea bhi bazaar mein available hain aur aap adrak ko capsule ke roop mein bhi le sakte hain
adrak ki chai peene ke nuksaan side effects of ginger tea neend na aana adrak ki chai peene se bechaini aur anindra ki shikayat ho sakti hain
pregnancy mein pregnancy mein adrak ka sewan karna chahiye ki nahi , yeh zara controversy matter hain
pregnant women ko adrak ka sewan na karne ki salah di jati hain , kyonki aisa mana jata hain ki isse garbh mein pal rahe bacche par bura asar padta hain
traditional chinese doctors pregnancy ke dauraan adrak ke sewan ko maa aur bacche dono ke liye khatarnaak batate hain
toh , behtar yahi hain ki pregnancy mein adrak ki chai ka sewan karne se pahle apne doctor ki salah jaroor le le
iske saath hi iske jyada istemal se human body mein acid bhi paida ho sakta hain , jisse acidity hoti hain
aur toh aur diabetes ke mareezo ko kisi bhi roop mein adrak ka jyada istemal nahi karna chahiye
kyonki adrak sharir mein sugar level ko kam kar deta hain , jisse hypoglycemia ho sakta hain
anticoagulants ki reaction ke natije ke taur par vyakti ko simple reaction , jakho aur khoon bahne se ubarne mein preshani hoti hain
isme ibuprofen aur aspirin jaise dawaayein shamil hain
iske saath hi veh log jo high blood pressure ki dawa kha rahe hain , unhe kisi bhi roop mein adrak ka istemal nahi karna chahiye
kyonki yeh blood pressure ko kam kar sakta hain , jisse heart palpitation ki problem ho sakti hain
adrak ki jad blood plates ke saath action karti hain , jiski wajah se hemoglobin jamne lagta hain
adrak ke istemal se logo mein hemophilia jaise rakt vikaar ho sakte hain
university of maryland medical center ke mutabik aisa karne se gastrointestinal kharab ho jata hain
gallstone pitt ki patthari ke mareez doctor se acchi tarah se baat cheet karne ke baad hi adrak ka istemal kar sakte hain , kyonki iske side effects hone ke khatre bahut jyada hote hain
06 babool ke fayde benefits ko vachellia
babool ke fayde benefits ko vachellia nilotica hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips babool ke fayde benefits ko vachellia nilotica 0 health tips a a print email babool ko english mein vachellia nilotica kahte hain , ise aam bolchal mein babool , babul , kikar aadi namo se bhi jana jata hain
babool cough aur pitt nash karne wala hota hain
diarrhea babool ke alag alag bhaag diarrhea ko door karne mein madad karte hain
eczema 25 gram babool ki chhal aur aam ki chhal ko 1 ltr
paani mein ubaal kar eczema wale jagah ki bhaap se sekaai kare
isse tonsils turant theek ho jata hain
conjunctivitis raat ko sone se pahle conjunctivitis wali aankhon par babool ke taze patte pees kar lagaye aur ise kisi saaf kapde se baandh de
08 karbonn ne launch kiya karbonn titanium
karbonn ne launch kiya karbonn titanium mach 5 sirf rs
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home karbonn smartphone karbonn ne launch kiya karbonn titanium mach 5 sirf rs
karbonn , smartphone a a print email indian handset maker company karbonn ne bharat mein titanium mach 5 smartphone ko launch kar diya hain
is smartphone ke kai khas features hain jo bhartiya users ko kafi pasand aayenge
is smartphone mein advance universal remote capability hain jisse aap apne t
dvd aur set top box ko control kar sakte hain
karbonn titanium ek aisa smartphone hain jo sabhi tarah ke remote control ka kaam karta hain
titanium mach 5 mein swiftkey keyboard hain jo 22 local indian language ko support karta hain
saath hi company ne ir peal ke saath collaboration kiya hain , jiske jariye isme remote control feature diya gya hain
carbonn titanium mach 5 mein 5 inch ka hd display hain jiska resolution 1280 x 720 pixel hain
3ghz quad core processor aur mali 400 mp2 gpu ke saath 2gb ram ko couple kiya hain
is smartphone mein 16gb ki inbuilt memory hain jise 32 gb tak expand kiya ja sakta hain
is smartphone mein 8 megapixel primary camera aur 5 megapixel front camera hain
dono camera ke saath led flash diya gya hain
is phone mein 2200 mah battery di gyi hain jo 16 hours 30 minutes ka taltime aur 565 hours ka standby time deti hain
yeh device 3g , wi fi , bluetooth , gps , light censor aur proximately censor ke saath aati hain
yeh phone champagne , silver white aur blue color ke variants mein available hoga
is phone ki keemat carbonn ne 5 , 999 rupaye rakhi hain aur yeh amazon par exclusively becha ja raha hain
04 lava iris alfa l launch hua
lava iris alfa l launch hua
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home lava smartphone lava iris alfa l launch hua
lava , smartphone a a print email lava ne indian smartphone users ke liye naya smartphone iris alfa l ko launch kiya hain
is smartphone ka price sirf 8000 rupees hain
yeh smartphone 3000 mah ki bhari bharkam battery se less hain
kaisa hain processor aur screen agar is device ki screen aur processor ki baat kare to yeh device screen ke lihaz se kafi khas hain
inch ki hain jo 540x960p ka resolution deti hain
agar baat kare device ke processing speed ki to is phone ke saath aapko kam keemat mein ek accha processor mil raha hain
ghz ki clock speed ke saath 1 gb ki ram di gyi hain
jisse aap multiple apps ko open kar sakte hain
badhiya hain camera aur memory is smartphone mein lava ne 8 mega pixel ka camera diya hain
jisse aap shandar pictures click kar sakte hain
front camera 2 mega pixel ka hain
jisse aap acchhi selfie click kar sakte hain
iske baad number aata hain device ki memory ka
lava ki is device mein aapko 8 gb internal storage milega jise memery card madad se 32 gb tak badhaya ja sakta hain
yeh device android lollipop se less hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email gale mein kharash ho gyi ho to mulethi ko choosey , isse aapko kafi rahat milegi
mulethi ka istemal karne se na sirf amashya ke defect balki gastric ulcer ke liye bhi labhkari hota hain
glyceric acid hone ki wajah se iska taste normal sugar ke mukable 50 guna jyada meetha hota hain
mulethi ke 10 behatarin fayde benefits of mulethi in hindi urdu
mulethi ka 1 gram churan regularly lene se ladies apni yoni , sex desire , beauty ko lambe waqt tak banaye rakh sakti hain
isse na sirf gastric ulcer balki choti aant ke ulcer mein bhi yeh fayda pahuchaati hain
mulethi ka powder ulcer , apach , hyper acidity par faydemand asar daalta hain
06 intex ne launch kiya aqua q4 3g
intex ne launch kiya aqua q4 3g smartphone sirf 5 , 290 rupaye mein
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home intex smartphone intex ne launch kiya aqua q4 3g smartphone sirf 5 , 290 rupaye mein
intex , smartphone a a print email duniya ki mashoor chip maker company intex ne smartphone market mein makool jagah banane ke baad ek aisa phone launch kiya hain , jo kifayati hain aur features ke mamle mein bhi is range ke kai phones se behtar hain
intex ne monday ko aqua series q4 naam ka apna naya smartphone launch kar diya hain , jiski keemat mahaz 5290 rupaye rakhi gyi hain
mana ja raha hain ki company is phone ko offline aur online dono tariko se bhartiya bazaar mein uplabadh karvayegi
features ki baat kare to yeh phone gsm dual sim ko support karta hain aur android
kitkat operating system par kaam karta hain
iske alawa phone ki screen bhi
ghz ka quad core quallcom snapdragon processor se less kiya gya hain
itna hi nahi phone mein 4 gb ki internal storage hain jise micro sd card ki madad se 32 gb tak badhaya ja sakta hain
phone mein 5 megapixel ka primary camera hain , jise led flash support aur bhi accha banata hain aur 2 megapixel ka front camera aapko video chat karne ki puri azadi deta hain
general knowledge a a print email ias mein jaane ka dream dekhnewalestudents kemann mein yeh question lagatar bana rahta hain ki aakhirveh behad tuff examki taiyaarikab seshuru kare
aakhir official taur par is priksha ki taiyaari ki koi samayseema nahi hain
school level par taiyaari aise students , jinke family mein ek ya ek sejyada ias officerhuye hain , aksar school ke timehi iski taiyaari karna shurukardetehain
is approach ke fayde aurnuksaandono hain
student ncert ki school books vistaar sepadhna shuru karsaktehain
yeh books i
inhe padhkar aap ias exam mein cover honewale topics ko acchi tarah se jaan samajh sakenge
sikke ka dusra pahlu yeh hain ki school level setaiyaarikarne walestudents jabtakupsc civil services exam mein baithne ki paatrata pa jaye , tab tak exam ka pattern , syllabus , trends aadi mein kafi changes aane jaane ki sambhavna rahti hain
graduation level par taiyaari graduation ki padhai ka samay student life ka sabse romanchak samay mana jata hain
yeh taiyaari self study aur coaching ke roop mein ki ja sakti hain
is exam ki minimum education requirement graduation hi hain
isliye graduation pura karte hi candidate upsc ke exam mein baith sakte hain aur is dauran exam ke pattern mein koi bada badlaav aane ki sambhavna na ke barabar hi rahti hain
ias toppers mein sabse jyada quantity oon youths ki hain jinhone graduation ke dauran hi is exam ki taiyaari shuru kar di thi
yeh yuva apna pura time aur energy is exam ki taiyaari mein de sakte hain
issi hard work aur dignity ke bal par aap is ias ki priksha ko pass kar sakte hain

benefits of ice in hindi urdu 0 general knowledge , health tips a a print email burf sabhi ko accha lagta hain aur garmi se rahat paane ke liye hum barf ka istemal karte hain
burf ke fayde benefits of ice in hindi urdu body ki immunity badhaye thande paani mein baithne bhar se body mein white blood cells ki quantity increase hoti hain
accha feel karwata hain barf ke paani se nahane se skin ke ander ke sense active hote hain
jisse heart rate ke saath saath adrenaline exciting situation mein paida hone wala hormone ko bhi badhaati hain , jisse aap good feel karte hain
glowing skin ke liye garm paani aapki skin se jaroori oils ko door karta hain , lekin ice cubes ko ragande se isse puri tarah opposite effect hota hain
yahi wajah hain ki rugby ke players match khelne ke baath ice bath karte hain
aisa karte huye aapke body ka metabolism 550 tak badh jata hain , jiske results ke taur par body ki extra calorie burn hoti hain
happy rahne mein help karta hain ice cream khane se aadmi ke dimaag ki prefrontal cortex active ho jata hain , jisse aapko khushi mahsoos hoti hain
sex life ke liye sex life ko interesting banane ke liye bed par garm hona jaroori hota hain , lekin aisa karne ke liye aapko pahle thoda cool hona padta hain
barf ke paani mein nahane se sharir mein sex hormone , testosterone aur estrogen ke level mein badhotari hoti hain

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips dil ko healthy rakhne ke liye kya khaye aur kya nahi khaye
jis wajah se hame health se related kai problems ka saamna karna padta hain
daliya , sprouts aur daalo ke fiber se cholesterol kam hota hain
healthy heart ke liye cholesterol par control rakhe
cholesterol liver ke disorder se badhta hain
liver ko saafrakhne ke liye aloe vera juice , amla juice aur vegetablejuice le
balanced diet ka matlab jisme carbohydrates , protein , vitamins sabhi ki sahi matra ho
toned milk ka istemal kare
badam aur akhrot jaise dry fruits , good cholesterol ke sabse acche source hain
khane mein oils ka balance jaroori hain
olive oil aur sarso ka tel zyada istemal kare
isme cholesterol kam hota hain , lekin ise zyada garm na kare
sarsotel , beans , badam , akhrot , fish liver oil , salmon fish , flex seeds alsi ke beej khane chahiye , kyonki inme kafi matra mein omega 3 fatty acid hota hain , jo dil ke liye accha mana jata hain
dusra hota hain liquid fat , jo jamta nahi hain aur jiski thodi matrasharir ke liye jaroori hoti hain
isme sarso ka tel ya canola oil aadi shamil hain
expertske mutabik canola oil aur olive oil dil ki acchi sehat ke liye best hote hain
skimmed , fat free milk ya soya milk le
hari sabziya , saag , shaljam , beans , matar , oats , sunflower seeds , alsi ke beej aadi khaye , inme folic acid hota hain , jo cholesterol levelko kam karta hain
inse cholesterol kam hota hain
healthy heart ke liye kya nahi khana chahiye tala bhuna na khaye
biscuit , matthi aadi mein kafi trans fat hota hain jo direct liver parasar karta hain , in cheezo ko khane se bache
saturated fat desi ghee , vanaspati , makkhan , nariyal tel , mayonnaise na le
ldl yani ki bad cholesterol badh gya ho toh chini , maida aur chawal nahi khana chahiye
cholesterol andeke peele hisse , redmeat aur doodh malai mein hi paya jata hain
processed aur junk food khane se bache
08 low blood pressure ko door karne ke
low blood pressure ko door karne ke gharelu nuskhe home remedies of lower blood pressure hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips low blood pressure ko door karne ke gharelu nuskhe home remedies of lower blood pressure 1 health tips a a print email yadi aapko aksar kamjori aur thakaan mahsoos hoti hain to ho sakta hain , aap low blood pressure ka shikar ho
chakkar , susti , kaam mein mann na lagna , saare sharir mein dard aadi low blood pressure ke mukhya lakshan hote hain , lekin kai baar aise log jab doctors ke paas checkup ke liye aate hain , to normal lagte hain
yadi aap bhi low blood pressure ki samsya se preshan hain to aaj hum aapko batane ja rahe hain kuch aise gharelu nuskhe jo low blood pressure ko turant control karte hain tips for low blood pressure in hindi
subah unka chhilka utaar kar 15 gram makkhan aur mishri ke saath mila kar khane se blood pressure low nahi rahta hain
high blood pressure mein jaha namak ke sewan se rogi ko haani hoti hain , vahi low blood pressure mein rogiyo ko namak khane se fayda hota hain
gajar ke 200 gram ras mein palak ka 50 gram ras mila kar peena bhi low blood pressure ke rogiyo ke liye faydemand rahta hain
amla ya seb ke murabbe ka sewan low blood pressure mein bahut upyogi hota hain
low blood pressure ko normal banaye rakhne mein chukandar ka ras kafi kargar hota hain
isse low blood pressure ki samsya khatm ho jati hain
gram matra mein subah shaam gungune paani ke saath iska sewan kare
kuch hi dino mein low blood pressure ki samsya khatm ho jayegi

easy home remedies for get rid cockroach from house in hindi urdu
boric powder cockroach ki problem lagbhag sabhi gharo mein hoti hain
baking powder aur chini mila kar rakhe ek katore mein barabar matra mein baking powder aur chini milaye aur is mixture ko oos jagah par chhidak de jaha cockroach rahte ho
ise kha kar cockroach mar jayenge
borax powder ka istemal kare jaha cockroach jyada ho vaha par borax powder ka chhidkaav kare
kheere ki smell cockroach ko door bhagane ke liye kafi hain , kyonki kheera nuksandeh bacteria ke growth ko rok deta hain , jo cockroach ke liye rookavat ka kaam karta hain

06 shalgam khane ke fayde benefits of
shalgam khane ke fayde benefits of turnip hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips shalgam khane ke fayde benefits of turnip 0 health tips a a print email shalgam jise shaljam bhi kaha jata hain , iske kai chamatkari gun paye jate hain
itna hi nahi shaljam shalgam hamare immune system , aankhon ki roshini , haddi aur tavcha ke liye bhi faydemand hain
yeh blood mein cholesterol ke level ko kam karta hain , osteoporosis , gathiya rog aur motiyabind se bachata hain aur blood pressure ko control karta hain
aaiye jante hain shalgum , shaljm , shalgam shalgam khane ke fayde ke baare mein
saath hi yeh folate aur vitamin b ka bhi bahut accha source hain , jo cardiovascular system ko behtar banate hain
cancer se rokta hain shalgam mein anti oxidants aur phytonutrients bharpoor matra mein hote hain , jo cancer ke khatre ko kam karne ke liye jane jate hain
isme paye jane wale plant compounds aur glucosinolate , tumor ke growth ko rokta hain
shalgam ko apne aahaar mein shamil karne se breast cancer , colon cancer aur rectal tumor ka khatra kam ho jata hain
isme calcium , potassium aur jaroori minerals badi matra mein paye jate hain , jo haddiyo ke growth ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
isme paya jane wala carotenoid motiyabind aur macular degeneration ko rokta hain
isme fiber bhi acchi matra mein paya jata hain jo metabolism ko regulate karta hain
asthma ka achook ilaj agar aap asthma se grast hain to shalgam ko apne khane mein shamil kare
isme anti inflammatory gun aur anti oxidants badi matra mein paye jate hain , jo asthma se nijat dilane mein madadgar sabit hote hain
immune system ko majboot banaye immune system ko majboot banane ke liye shalgam ka jawab nahi hain
isme beta carotene paya jata hain jo healthy membrane banane mein madad karta hain
blood pressure ke mareez ke liye faydemand agar aap apne blood pressure ko normal rakhna chahte hain to shalgam aapke liye bahut hi labhkari hain
isme magnesium aur vitamin b paya jata hain , jo blood pressure ko normal banate hain

isse gas , allergy aur skin se related bimariya hoti hain

iska screen resolution 540 x 960 pixel ka hain
yeh hd se kam hain , lekin display quality ke mamle mein yeh phone badhiya features deta hain
screen par scratch na lage iske liye is phone mein corning gorilla glass 3 protection diya gya hain
is phone mein android kitkat
version operating system diya gya hain , jise kitkat
aur android ke sabse latest version
lollipop par upgrade kiya ja sakta hain
gram ka yeh dual smartphone micro sim aur dual active feature deta hain
is phone mein
ghz ka dual core qualcomm snapdragon processor diya gya hain
is phone mein multitasking ke liye 1 gb ki ram di gyi hain
iske alawa 4g internal memory hain
memory card ki madad se is phone ki memory 32 gb tak badhaya ja sakta hain
moto e mein 5 mega pixel ka camera diya gya hain
iske alawa hd recording features bhi hain
jaise ki pahle bhi bataya gya tha ki front camera nahi hain , yahi is phone ka weak point hain
connectivity ke mamle mein is phone mein wi fi , 3g , gps , bluetooth jaise basic features diye gye hain
is phone mein 1980 mah power ki battery di gyi hain
company ke anusaar 3g data par 24 hours ka talk time mil sakta hain
ise black aur white rang mein launch kiya gya hain

tarbooz ke beej khane ke fayde benefits of watermelon seeds in hindi urdu
iske beejo mein iron , potassium , minerals aur vitamin paye jate hain
tarbooz ke beej khane se skin healthy ho jati hain
tarbooz mein mauzood magnesium dil ke liye bahut hi accha hota hain
iske alawa yeh cardiovascular rogo aur hypertension mein bhi faydemand hain
isse blood sugar control mein rahta hain
tarbooz mein un saturated fatty acid hota hain , jo tavcha mein nami ko barkarar rakhta hain
isme mauzood anti oxidants tatv jhurriyo ko door karta hain
tarbooz ke beej khane se high blood pressure bhi control hota hain
protein aur jaroori matra mein amino acid hone ki wajah se iske beej baalo ki problems mein ramban hain
tarbooz mein lycopene paya jata hain , lycopene hamari skin ko hamesha jawan banaye rakhta hain
tarbooz par thoda kala namak daal kar khane se acidity aur gas ki problem khatm ho jati hain

extra paisa kate toh complaint kare kai baar dusre bank ke atm se aap jab money withdraw karte hain toh kuch bank extra rupees cut kar lete hain
is complain mein atm id ka reference jaroor de

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home finance amir banane ke liye apnaye bachat ke yeh tarike
finance a a print email kharch ki koi seema nahi hain
itni si saving aur juta sakte hain khoob saara paisa agar aap har mahine 3200 rupees ki saving karte hain aur iss rashi par aapko 10 se return milta hain to 30 years mein aapke paas 72 lac 94 hazaar rupaye ho jayenge
maslan , monthly requirements , aap ki age , salary , risk profile aur investment ke plan
sabse jaroori hain ki kitne returns ki aap umeed kar rahe hain
yeh samjhne ke baad decide kare ki short term yaa long term mein invest karna hain
bachat ke liye alag saving account bachat ki rashi ko salary account mein rakhne ki bajaye dusre account mein rakhe
post office aur banks ki different saving scheme iska sabse asaan aur safe option hain
iske saath hi share market , mutual fund , ppf , insurance aur lic sabse best return dene vale options hain
ppf account aap salary person ho ya businessman
apni bachat ka lag bhag 25 long term me nivesh kare
long term mein public provident fund , provident fund aur life insurance good hain
ppf aur ppf schemes mein mauzooda samay mein 8 annual return mil raha hain
lic lic mein kai scheme hain
inmein bimari , accident , loan suvidha cover hone ke saath saath pripvakta mein moti rashi mil jati hain
family par pressure nahi padta hain
share market yeh sector invest ke liye high risk aur high return vala hain
halaki share market mein kai companies aisi hain jo invest ke liye safe mani jati hain
jaise banking sector , power sector , it sector , auto sector aadi
banking mein sbi , hdfc , icici , idbi aadi acchhe shares mein gine jate hain
power sector mein ntpc , it mein infosys , wipro , tcs , metal mein hindalco , tata steel , tisco , auto sector mein maruti , textile mein reliance industries aadi behtar vikalp mane jate hain
gold mein nivesh gold , silver nivesh ke hisab se behtar sabit hote aaye hain
lekin market experts long term ke hisab se ise acchha option mante hain
mutual fund yeh systematically investment plan hain
isme investor money direct na laga kar fund manager ke madhyam se lagata hain
ismein aap har month apni saving ke hisab se dhan laga sakte hain
recurring aur fixed deposit rd account mein bhi nivesh kiya ja sakta hain
rd mein bhi good returns milti hain
iske alawa fixed deposit ka bhi acchha option hain
lekin saara paisa fixed deposit mein mat lagaye
property mein invest real estate acchha vikalp hain
aur un rupaye ko real estate mein shift kar dena bhi acchha decision hain

company ne isme 4 inch ki display lagaai hain
iske alawa agar handset ke processor par gaur kare to isme aapko

peshab mein jalan ko door karne ke gharelu nuskhe home remedies for urine burn hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips peshab mein jalan ko door karne ke gharelu nuskhe home remedies for urine burn 7 health tips a a print email peshab mein jalan hona ek aam samsya hain , lekin bahu se log ise nazarandaaz kar dete hain
is samsya ke kai karan ho sakte hain jaise mutra marg mein infection , kidney mein stone ya dehydration aadi
mutr marg mein infection , dehydration , kidney mein stone , liver ki problem , ulcer , pregnancy ke samay naso ya reedh ki haddi ka damage hona , shukraanoo ya virya kosh mein infection , prostate ka badhna , diabetes , kuposhan , mutr marg tang hona
nariyal ka paani dehydration aur peshab ki jalan ko theek karta hain
kai baar yoni vagina aur ling penis mein infection hone ki wajah se bhi mutr marg prabhavit hota hain
agar peshab karne ke baad adhik waqt tak jalan ho to mutr path infection hain
iske liye aapko beer peeni chahiye jisse kidney stone gal sake
yadi aap lubricant ka istemal kar rahe hain to water base wale lubricant ka istemal kare , na ki chemical wale lubricant
khatte phal yani ki citric fruits khayiye , kyonki isme citric acid hota hain , jo mutr mein infection paida karne wale bacteria ko maarta hain

general knowledge a a print email jyadatar log sochte hain ki alcohol sirf sharab ya beer aadi mein paya jata hain
alcohol veh chemical hota hain jo nasha paida karta hain
vanilla extract sweets , cake aur dusri meethe pakwano mein istemal kiya jane wala vanilla satv extract bhi alcohol se bhara hua hota hain
darasal isme paye jane wali alcohol ka level , vodka aur gin ke barabar hota hain
cough syrup cough , khansi ya seene ki jakdan ke liye aap jis cough syrup yani ki khansi ki dawaa ka istemal karte hain , darasal usay banane ke liye kuch alcohol ka istemal kiya jata hain
mouthwash mooh ko bacteria aur mooh ki badboo se bachane ke liye aap har subah mouthwash ka istemal karte hain , usme lagbhag 30 tak alcohol paya jata hain
sanitizer daily aap apne haatho ko saaf rakhne ke liye jis sanitizer ka istemal karte hain , usme lagbhag 60 se 85 tak alcohol paya jata hain , jo ki bacteria ki behtar safaai karne mein helpful hoti hain
halaki market mein alcohol free sanitize r bhi available hain

05 sahjan ke fayde benefits of drumsticks
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips sahjan ke fayde
general knowledge , health tips a a print email sahjan drumsticks ya munga jad se lekar phool aur pattiyon tak sehat ka khazana hain
sahjan ke taaze phool herbal tonic hain
iska vanspati naam ' moringa oleifera ' hain
ayurveda mein 300 rogo ka sahjan se upchar bataya gya hain
sahjan mein carbohydrate , protein , calcium , potassium , iron , magnesium , vitamin a , c aur b complex bahrpoor matra mein paya jata hain
ek research ke anusar isme doodh ke mukable 4 guna jyada calcium aur 2 duna jyada protein paya jata hain
yeh blood pressure ko control mein rakhta hain
iska pryog pet mein ulcer ke ilaj ke liye kiya jata hain
yeh body ke energy level ko badha deta hain
pani mein ghulkar yeh ek natural clarification agent ban jata hain
yeh pani ko bacteria rahit banata hain
iska juice pregnant aurat ko dene ki salah di jati hain
pimples ki problem ho to sahjan ka sewan karna chahiye
sahajan ki pattiyon se taiyaar kiya gya soup tapedik , asthma aadi rogo mein dawa ka kaam karta hain
ismein calcium ki matra adhik hoti hain , jisse haddiya majboot banti hain
iske alawa iron , magnesium aur cilium hota hain
isme zinc bhi bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain
sahjan mein folic acid bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips bimariyon se bachna chahte hain follow kare yeh tips
health tips a a print email doctors ka manna hain ki prevention is better than treatment yani ki ilaaj karwane se behtar hain ki hum saavdhani barte
bimari se bachne ke tips aur upay diet ka dhyaan rakhe good health ke liye jaroori hain ki aap nutrients se bharpoor food ko khaye
apni diet mein variety of food shamil kare , isme aap different different types ke vegetables fruits ko shamil kare
regular exercise kijiye aapki age chahe kuch bhi ho aapko regularly exercise jaroor karna chahiye
experts ka manana yeh hain ki youth aur children ko daily exercise karni chahiye
new born baby daily 16 se 18 hours ki neend leta hain
to 3 year old child 14 hours sota hain to 3 se 4 saal ke bacche 11 se 12 ghante tak sote hain
school going child ko minimum 10 hours ki neend jaroori hain
teen age wale baccho ko 9 se 10 ghante sona chahiye aur young adult people ko 7 se 8 ghante tak sona chahiye
neend puri lene se youth aur children sabhi ka mentally aur physically development hota hain
heart disease hone kakhatra kafi kam ho jata hain
iske alawa aap apne ghar mein water purifier bhi lagwa sakte hain
isse aapko clean aur healthy water peene ko milta hain
time to time water purifier machine ko check up karwaate rahe , kyonki iske filter kharaab ho jate hain , jisse paani ki safaai sahi tarah se nahi ho paati hain
water purifier ka paani aapko healthy rahne mein madad karta hain
avoid smoking drinking healthy rahne ke liye sabse jaroori hain ki aap kisi bhi tobacco products ka istemal na kare
nahi hi aap alcohol ka sewan kare
bimariyon se bachne ke liye aapko tension free life jeena chahiye
isliye tension ko door karne ki koshish kare aur laughter therapy ka istemal kare

garm paani aur nimbu nimbu mein mauzood citric acid pet se jami huyi gandagi ko bahar nikalne ka kaam karti hain
aap iska sewan 1 cup garam paani mein nimbu nichodkar kar sakte hain
in phalo mein prayapt matra mein resha hota hain jo aanto ko shakti deta hain
baking soda baking soda ke sewan se kabz 95 tak theek ho sakta hain
iska sewan karne ke liye 1 4 cup garam paani mein 1 t spoon baking soda mila kar piya jaye

yeh ek ayurvedic upchar hain
aisi cheezo ko ek saath mila kar na khaye , varna yeh pahucha sakte hain aapko nuksaan hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips aisi cheezo ko ek saath mila kar na khaye , varna yeh pahucha sakte hain aapko nuksaan 0 health tips a a print email in cheezo ko ek saath mila kar nahi khana chahiye , varna yeh zehar tak ban sakti hain
aise khadya padarath jinhe ek saath mila kar nahi khana chahiye dangerous food combination
starch se bharpoor food aur fruits phal fruits jaldi hajam hone wale product hain , vahi starch se bharpoor bhojan jaise chawal aur aaloo ko pachne mein kafi samay lagta hain
mint aur cold drinks ; pepper mint ya pudine ko kabhi bhi cold drink peene se pahle ya baad mein nahi khana chahiye , varna in dono ke mixture se pet mein cyanide banne ka khatra rakhta hain
matlab aapko cold drink ke saath bhool kar bhi mouth freshner mint aadi nahi leni chahiye
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips exam ke time baccho ki diet ka rakhe khyaal
health tips a a print email exam ke samay baccho ko sahi diet jaroor de
exam time mein best performance dene ke liye sirf study hi nahi , balki sahi khan pan bhi jaroori hain
ise sea food , ankurit chano ke jariye paya ja sakta hain
zinc hamare immune system ko bhi durust rakhta hain
omega 3 fatty acid exam ke time baccho ko omega 3 fatty acid ki bahut jaroorat padti hain
oily fish iska sabse accha source hain
iske alawa omega 3 fatty acid , olive oil aur sea food mein bahut hi acchi quantity mein paya jata hain
protein protein hame lambe samay tak energy dete hain
isliye aapka baccha agar exam de raha hain , to uski meal mein protein wala food jaroor shamil kare
ise aap breakfast mein eggs , poha , idli ya dosa ke jariye dengi to baccha dinbhar energetic feel karega
iron aur vitamin b inse bacche ke sharir mein physical aur mental energy bani rahti hain aur study mein aaram milta hain
coffee ko kahe na coffee mein caffeine ki matra kafi hoti hain , jiski wajah se focus to banta hain , lekin hame bhookh nahi lagti aur dheere dheere energy level down ho jata hain
carbohydrates carbohydrates hamari body mein fuel ki tarah kaam karte hain
kam samay mein energy lene ke liye carbohydrates lena sabse badhiya rahta hain , kyonki yeh glucose ko energy mein tabdeel karke usay dimaag tak pahuchate hain
isse concentration banaye rakhne mein madad milti hain
carbohydrates ko seb , nashpati , jamun , aaloo , gajar , salad aur brown bread ke jariye paya ja sakta hain
09 food poisoning ko door karne ke gharelu
food poisoning ko door karne ke gharelu nuskhe home remedies for food poisoning in hindi hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips food poisoning ko door karne ke gharelu nuskhe home remedies for food poisoning in hindi 0 health tips a a print email food poisoning ko door karne ke liye gharelu nuskhe aur upay kya hain
aaj kal ke samay mein chahe college ho ya office , lunch time mein young generation canteen mein hi jyada dikhayi dete hain
food posioning ho jane par samajh lijiye ki aapki to 48 hours tak chhutti ho gyi
dahi dahi ek antibiotic hain , jo food poisoning ho jane par jaroor lena chahiye
anar anar ka juice diarrhea bhagane ke liye accha hota hain
black aur green tea black aur green tea peene se rahat milti hain
jeera jeera ek aisa food hain jise food poisoning ke liye sabse best medicine mana jata hain
chammach bhoona zeera khane se food poisoning ki problem mein turant rahat milti hain
aloe vera juice aloe vera ka juice digestion mein help karta hain
adrak adrak ek natural antibiotic hain , jo food poisoning ki samsya mein ramban aushidhi hain
isse food poisoning ke karan hone wali samsyaen door ho jayengi
apple cider vinegar food poisoning hone par 1 chammach apple cider vinegar le
brown sugar brown sugar food poisoning ke karan aayi kamjori ko door karne ki ramban dawaa hain
food poisoning ke karan jab aap kamjori mahsoos kare to ek chammach brown sugar kha le
brown sugar ka matlab drugs wala brown sugar nahi hain
tulsi tulsi pet ki problems mein sabse behatrin medicine hain
04 12 rupaye aur 330 rupaye mein insurance
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home finance general knowledge 12 rupaye aur 330 rupaye mein insurance ke niyam ek hi account par milega bima ka labh
finance , general knowledge a a print email vitt mantralay ne 12 rupaye aur 330 rupaye mein sasta insurance dene ke niyam tay kar diye hain
iske liye bima ka labh lene ke liye applicant ka saving account hona jaroori hain
saath hi vah kewal ek hi bank account par hi saste insurance ka labh le payega
usay kewal ek khate par 12 rupees mein accident insurance aur 330 rupees mein jeevan bima karvane ka mauka milega
jiske liye 31 may 2015 tak registration karaya ja sakta hain
desh ke main banks scheme mein enrollment ki suvidha 1 may se shuru karenge
multiple bank account hone par bhi ek hi insurance vitt mantralay dwara jari suchna ke anusaar agar kisi khatadharak ka ek se adhik bank mein bachat khata hain , to bhi vah kewal ek hi baar insurance kara sakega
aadhaar card hoga aham insurance cover dene mein duplicity na ho
uske baad yojana mein bane rahne ke liye policy holder ko renewal karvana hoga
is saal 31 august 2015 tak enrollment ki chhoot vitt mantralay ne di hain
kaise karaye enrollment jis bank mein aapka bachat khata hain , vaha jakar aap enrollment ke liye avedan kar sakte hain
iske tahat bank aapko ek form dega
insurance ke liye aapko kisi bhi insurance company ke paas apply karne ki jaroorat nahi hain
kitna milega insurance cover pradhan mantri jeevan suraksha yojana mein bima dharak ko 2 lac rupaye ka accident cover milega
iske liye use har saal 12 rupees ka premium dena hoga

04 kaddu ke beej khane ke fayde benefits
kaddu ke beej khane ke fayde benefits of pumpkin seeds in hindi
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips kaddu ke beej khane ke fayde benefits of pumpkin seeds in hindi
health tips a a print email pumpkins seeds benefits in hindi urdu
journal food chemistry toxicology mein publish 2008 ki ek report bhi iss tarah ke daawo ko sahi thaharaati hain
pathaari ya kidney stone mein faydemand saal 1987 mein american journal mein publish ek research ke mutabik jin baccho ke peshab test sample mein calcium oxalate particles paaye gye , unke khaane mein kaddu ke beejo ko shamil kiya gya aur iss problem ko kafi hud tak kam hote dekha gya
calcium oxalate kidney mein stone ko paida karte hain
periods se judi problems ke liye saal 2008 mein aayi ek report ke mutabik jin mahilaon ko kaddu ke beej ke tel 2ml
unme periods ke dauran hone wali problems , jaise blood pressure badhna , cholesterol ka badhna , hormones ki kami ka hona aadi mein sudhaar dekha gya
mein aayi ek report mein kaddu ke beejo ke tel se prostate ki badhotari ko kam paya gya
high blood pressure ya hypertension se rahat dilaye kaddu ke beej mein anti oxidants paye jate hain
yeh high blood pressure ko kam karne mein behad kargar saabit huye hain
joints pain ya arthritis mein faydemand saal 1995 mein published ek report ke mutabik drug indomethacin jo arthritis ke rogiyo ko di jati hain , vaisa hi asar kaddu ke beej bhi karte hain
tension , chinta , depression ko door kare kaddu ke 1 gram beej mein kareeb 2 milligram tryptophan protein paya jata hain
research par gaur kiya jaye toh glucose ke saath kaddu ke beejo ka sewan karne se behtar neend aati hain
04 micromax canvas play q355 rs 7490 mein
micromax , smartphone a a print email micromax company ne ek aur android lollipop operating system vala smartphone pesh kiya hain
company ne apni official website par micromax canvas play q355 handset ko list kar diya hain
halaki abhi tak adhikarik taur par iske price ka khulasa nahi hua hain , lekin third party online retailer ise 7490 rupees mein bech raha hain
kya hain khas micromax ka yeh dual sim phone android lollipop
operating system par kaam karta hain
canvas fire 4 aur micromax canvas spark ke baad yeh company ka teesra budget smartphone hain jo android ke latest version ke saath aata hain
micromax canvas play mein 2820 mah ki battery hain
company ke anusaar yeh phone 10 hours ka talk time deti hain aur 273 hours ka stand bye time hain
micromax canvas play mein 8gb ki internal memory ke saath 32 gb tak micro sd card ke jariye memory badhane ki suvidha hain
is phone mein 5 mp ka fixed focus rear camera hain
mp ka front camera bhi diya gya hain , jo video calling ke liye sahi to sakta hain , lekin selfie ke liye utna badhiya shayad hi sabit ho
connectivity ki baat kare to is phone mein 3g , gprs edge , wi fi , gps , micro usb aur bluetooth jaise option diye gye hain
micromax ke iss phone mein chat , clean master , hot star , m
live , news hunt , quicker , snapdeal jaise apps diye gye hain

health tips a a print email desi ghee ka istemal bharat mein kewal khane ke liye nahi balki puja paath aadi mein bhi kiya jata hain
energy badhata hain fatty acids ki matra hone ke karan ghee liver ke dwara aasaani se observe ho jata hain
isme maujood omega 3 fatty acid extra cholesterol ki matra ko kam karta hain , jo dil ko healthy rakhne ke saath fat ko bhi control karta hain
khastaur par gastrointestinal ki samsya mein
iske saath hi apach aur ulcerative colitis ki samsya hone par ghee khane ki salah di jati hain
anti oxidant ka khazana vitamin a free ridicules ko khatm karne ke saath skin ko young rakhta hain
jo jyadatar phalo aur sabziyo mein paya jata hain , lekin ghee mein butyric acid aur linoleic acid ki matra ek behtar anti oxidant ka kaam karti hain
jo cancer hone ki sambhavna ko kam kar deti hain
aankho ke liye faydemand ghee mein vitamin a ki pryapt matra maujood hoti hain
carotenoids aur anti oxidants ki matra aankhon mein sukhepan , paani aana , motiyabind , ki samsyaon se chhutkara dilati hain
immune system ko sahi rakhta hain butyric acid ki sabse jyada matra ghee mein payi jati hain , jo body ke t cells ko banane mein madadgaar hota hain

rajma mein potassium , magnesium , iron aur protein bharpoor matra mein maujood hote hain
anti oxidant ki matra immunity system ko sahi rakhne ka kaam karti hain
cancer se bachata hain rajma mein mauzood meganize anti oxidant ka kaam karta hain
yeh free radicals ko damage hone se rokta hain
iske saath isme mauzood vitamin k ki matra cells ko bahari nuksaandayak cheezon se bachaati hain , jo cancer ka mukhy karan hote hain

isse alzheimer jaise bimari door rahti hain aur yaddast bhi tez hota hain

jo body ke carbohydrate ki matra ko kam karte hain

general knowledge a a print email ice cube facial ke fayde kai mehange treatment se better hain
yeh na sirf pocket friendly hain , balki sunburn aur skin aging par kamaal ka asar dikhaata hain
makeup se pahle chehre par ice cube facial se vehjyada lambe samay tak chehre par rahta hain aur saath hi paseene ki problem bhi door hoti hain
fruit facial ke baad agar parlor mein sabse jyada demand mein koi hain toh veh hain ice cube facial

ise direct chehre par lagane se skin ko nuksaan pahuch sakta hain

isse face oily nazar nahi aata

05 smartphone choose karne se pahle in
smartphone choose karne se pahle in baato ka rakhe dhyaan , best smartphone chunana hoga asaan
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home smartphone tech tips smartphone choose karne se pahle in baato ka rakhe dhyaan , best smartphone chunana hoga asaan
smartphone , tech tips a a print email market mein in dino competition itna badh gya hain ki companies ek se badhkar ek features aur design wale smartphone launch kar rahi hain
operating system kisi bhi smartphone mein os yani ki operating system ka sabse aham roll hota hain
yeh os hi ek sadharan smartphone ko smart banata hain
android os agar aap acchi google service chahte hain , to iske liye android os kafi behtarin hain
isme users ko sabhi google services jaise gmail , map , hangout , youtube aadi ki suvidha milegi
iske saath hi google play store par lakho apps maujood hain
jisse users apni marzi aur jaroorat ke hisab se oon apps ko apne smartphone mein install kar sakte hain
is os ki ek aur khasiyat yeh hain ki , android handset ko aap apne pc mein asaani ke saath connect kar sakte hain
usb cable ke jariye file transfer ki ja sakti hain
gaurtalab hain ki is samay market mein latest android lollipop os handset bikri ke liye available hain
windows phone windows os ke smartphone users kam milenge
is handset mein aapko android ki tarah apps ki bharmaar nahi milegi
windows os par based sabhi smartphone mein jaroorat ke hisab se kuch app pre installed hote hain
yeh os microsoft dwara banaya gya hain , jismein maps , drive aur navigation jaisi service milegi
user interface se lekar app store tak sabhi features kafi behtarin hain
halaki isme aapko android ki tarah free mein jyadatar apps nahi milega
isme jyadatar apps payable hain
vaise operation quality ki baat kare to ios se accha koi os nahi hain
ios wale handset ki kimat lag bhag 50 , 000 rupaye ke aas paas hain
processor kisi bhi smartphone ke smoothly work karne ke peeche processor ka kafi yogdaan hota hain
market mein dual core , quad core aur octa core processor wale smartphone mil jayenge
vaise normally baat kare to octa core processor ko kafi tez mana jata hain
lekin processor ki performance handset ke os par depend karti hain
dual core wala ios handset quad core wale android smartphone se kafi behtar hota hain
display kisi smartphone ki display ko check karne ka sabse accha tarika yeh hain ki , usay different angle se dekha jaye
yani ki display ke colour ko change karte huye uski visibility condition ko check kiya ja sakta hain
agar aap fablet lena chahte hain , isme full hd 1080p display honi chahiye
vahi 5inch ki display ke liye hd 720p screen best mani jati hain
halaki users wvga 800 x 480 px se kam resolution wale smartphone ko avoid kar sakte hain
amoled aur ips technology wali display best mani jati hain
ram market mein 1 gb se lekar 4 gb ram ke smartphone milte hain
storage kisi smartphone mein storage sabse aham part hota hain
market mein 4 gb se lekar 64gb tak ki storage power wale handset maujood hain
agar aap e mail , social network , photographs , video aur music aadi ka jyada istemal karte hain , to iske liye 4gb storage prayapt hain
vahi agar koi user dher saare app aur game ikattha karke rakhna chahta hain , uske liye 8 16 gb tak ka smartphone best option hain
halaki agar kisi handset mein storage power kam hain , to usay sd card chip laga kar storage ko badhaya ja sakta hain
size 4 inch se lekar 5 inch tak ke smartphone ko best mana jata hain
inch ka smartphone users ke liye best hain
kisi bhi smartphone mein 5 8 megapixel ka rear camera best mana jata hain
iske alawa photo ke liye led flash hona bhi bahut hi jaroori hain
vahi agar aap selfie lovers hain , to jis smartphone mein front camera accha ho , vah aapke liye behtarin sabit ho sakta hain
battery agar smartphone ki baat kare , to isme battery back up ka role aham nahi hota hain
vaise 2000 mah ki battery standard mani jati hain
halaki market mein kai smartphone companies 24 ghante ka battery backup dene ka wada karti hain , jo galat hain , aapko yaha yeh dhyaan rakhna hoga ki agar smartphone mein internet chal raha hain to battery ka kharch hona lajmi hain
05 aleo vera hain guno ka khazana

health tips a a print email aloe vera ek aushdhiya paudha hain ise gwarpatha , gheekwar aur dhritkumari ke naam se bhi jana jata hain
chehre ke liye amrit aur aushdhiya guno ka bhandaar hain aloe vera
aaiye jante hain aloe vera ke guno ke baare mein , saath hi jante hain aloe vera juice peene ke fayde benefits
aloe vera ka juice bawasir , diabetes aur pet ki preshaniyo se nijat dilane mein madad karta hain
aloe vera ka juice blood mein hemoglobin ki kami ko door karta hain
aloe vera ko saundary nikhar ke liye herbal cosmetic products jaise aloe vera gel , body lotion , hair gel , skin gel , shampoo , sabun aadi mein bhi istemal kiya jata hain
06 aaloo ke upyog uses of potatoes
aaloo ke upyog uses of potatoes hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips aaloo ke upyog uses of potatoes 0 health tips a a print email aaloo ko jyadatar log avoid karte hain
aaloo mein vitamin c , vitamin b complex , iron , calcium , meganize , phosphorus kafi matra mein paya jata hain
dark spot hone par chehre ya aankho ke niche dark spot hone par aaloo sabse jyada faydemand hain
agar aapke chehre par black spot hain , to aaloo ki slices ko chehre par ragde aur dheere dheere haatho se 5 minutes tak massage kare
aise mein aaloo best remedy hain
sunburn hone par garmiyo mein sunburn hone par aaloo se behtar koi upay nahi hain
uske baad thande aaloo ko sunburn area par lagaye
dark circle ko remove karne ke liye aankhon ke dark circle ko door karne ke liye aaloo ek natural upay hain
aaloo ka ras regular lagaye
aaloo ka ras lagane ke liye cotton ya cotton rumaal ka istemal kare
dry skin ke liye jin logo ki skin dry hoti hain , unke liye aaloo perfect hain
yeh anti aging remedy ke roop mein kaam karega
dead skin cell ke liye aaloo chehre ki chamak aur anti aging ke saath saath skin ke dead cell ko bhi khatm karta hain
chehre par 10 minutes tak aaloo lagaye rakhne se skin ke dead cell khatm hone lagte hain
natural cleanser aaloo ek natural cleanser hain

how to earn money from facebook in hindi urdu
paisa kamaye online facebook ke jariye
aise kamaye facebook se paise facbook ke advanced user features ki help se money earn ki ja sakti hain
aapke apne page ko daily update karna hoga
reach ke badhne par , facebook aapke page ko automatically scan kar lega
iske baad aapke page par advertisement milne lagenge
facebook par business aur advance user feature ki puri jankari ke liye neeche link par click kare https www
com security kaise kare register iske liye aapko facebook ka advance user banna padega
aap jaise hi facebook ke advanced user banenge , aapke paas ek notification aayega ki aap facebook ke advance user ban chuke hain
advance user banne ke baad aapko ek form fill karna padega , jisme aapke bank ki private jankariya , jaise bank account number aur kai dusri information fill karni padegi
form fill karne ke 48 hours ke andar aapka account activate ho jayega
yeh option philhal advance user banne ke liye test hone ke baad notification ke jariye facebook aapse contact karega
video sharingke jariye kijiye kamaai agar aap apni timeline ya facebook page par koi video upload karte hain , to bhi aap paisa kama sakte hain

health tips a a print email taste ke aage health ko ignore karne wale yeh nahi sochte hain ki zara si laparavahi karke veh kitni saari bimariyo ko bula rahe hain
food items mein ho rahi milavat iska sabse bada karan hain
inme fiber aur polyphenols ki bharpoor matra hoti hain
na kewal dry fruits balki bhoone huye anaazo ke beejo ka sewan bhi labhdayak hota hain
blood circulation sahi rahta hain aur oxygen ki bharpoor matra body ke har ek part tak pahuchti hain
isse cancer aur aisi hi kai tarah ki bimariya door rahti hain
fruits aur vegetables ki bharpoor matra apni diet mein phalo , sabziyo aur salad ki jyada se jyada matra shamil kare , kyonki inme vitamin c , lycopene aur beta carotene jaise jaroori tatv paye jate hain
research se is baat ka khoolasa hua hain ki khane mein phalo aur sabziyo ki prayapt matra cancer hone ki sambhavna ko kafi hud tak kam karti hain
iske saath hi , inme phytochemicals ki mauzoodagi polluted environment ke asar ko bhi kam karti hain
meetha , fat aur meat ka kam sewan kare khane mein sugar ki jyada matra , fat badhane wale chips , burger aur packaged meat aadi ka sewan khatarnaak sabit ho sakta hain
processed meat ko preserve karne ke tamam tarah ke chemicals istemal mein laye jate hain
isme mauzood fiber ki matra digestion ko theek rakhne ke saath hi colon cancer se bachati hain
colorectal cancer duniya mein teesra sabse jyada phailne wala cancer hain
ise rokne ke liye sabut anaaz ke saath hi bread , brown rice , oatmeal , daal khana bahut hi madadgar sabit ho sakta hain
inme anti oxidants bharpoor matra mein mauzood hote hain jo skin cancer ke khatre ko rokte hain
alcohol , tobacco ka kam sewan kare bahut jyada sharab peena , tambaako tobacco chabana , cancer hone ki wajah ban sakte hain
alcohol ke jyada sewan se pet , breast , mooh aur gale ka cancer ho sakta hain
alcohol ki adhik matra seedhe dna ko damage karti hain
isse blood vessels mein estrogen ki matra badha deti hain , jo ladies mein breast cancer hone ki ahem wajah hain
research se yeh saabit ho chuka hain ki alcohol , tobacco dono ka sewan karne wale logo mein oral cavity , gale aur pet ka cancer jyada dekha gya hain

25 megapixel power 2580x1920 pixel ka resolution vale is device mein 6 led light lagi huyi hain
jo users ko kam roshini mein bhi acchi picture quality deti hain

aur is headset ke charging ka time 2 hours ka hain

is webcam mein usb
yeh night vision camera video recording , motion detection , plug play aur brightness sharpness control feature ke saath aata hain

kela aur kishmish se kam kare badha hua heart beat rate
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips kela aur kishmish se kam kare badha hua heart beat rate
health tips a a print email heart rate ko pulse rate ke naam se bhi jana jata hain
heart rate dil ki dhadkan hoti hain
university of virginia health system ke according ek adult ki normal heart rate 60 80 dhadkan per minute hoti hain
halanki yeh athletes mein yeh heart rate kam yani ki 40 minute per minute ke hisaabse hoti hain
dil ki lay aur flood flow ko power dene ke liye heart rate important hota hain
badhi huye heart rate ko tachycardia ek adult mein per minute lagatar 100 se jyada baar dil dhadkta hain
yeh heart disease , stroke aur kidney disease ke khatre ko badha deta hain
paseena aana , matli aur ulti jaise symptoms dekhne ko milte hain
kishmish ke istemal se kam kare badha hua heart rate kismish mein potassium bharpoor matra mein hota hain aur isme 1000 milligram se bhi jyada potassium paya jata hain
regularly 15 days tak is upa y ko kare
kela kha kar kam kare heart rate university of maryland medical center ke according , banana potassium ka bahut hi good source hainaur potassium heart rate ko normal banaye rakhne mein madad karta hain
potassium ki kami ki wajah se muscles mein ainthan aur energy kam dekhne ko milti hain , jiski wajah se heart rate badh jata hain
kele mein 96 calorie mein 400 milligram potassium hota hain
kele mein sodium 1 milligram se kam hota hain , jo log kam sodium wala food khana chahte hain , unke liye yeh best food saabit ho sakta hain
yeh antioxidants aur vitamins se bharpoor hota hain jo heart disease , bad cholesterol level aur bhojan ki lalsa ko control karne mein madad karta hain
magnesium se bharpoor food jaise ki kaddu heart rate ko kam karne mein aapki help karta hain
magnesium heart rate ko control mein rakhta hain
brazil nut jaisa powerful nut vitamin aur mineral khas taur par magnesium se bharpoor hota hain
doodh calcium se bharpoor hota hain
agar aap natural tarike se tez heart rate ko kam karna chahte hain toh apni diet mein calcium se bharpoor cheezo ko jaroor shamil kare
05 allergy se hain preshan toh apnayiye
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips allergy se hain preshan toh apnayiye yeh tips
general knowledge , health tips a a print email allergy ke tips kya hain
allergy ham mein se kisi ko bhi kisi food se , weather change hone par ya anuvanshik ho sakti hain
zyadatar hum allergy ko seriously nahi lete hain
allergy ke lakshan allergy ke neeche likhe lakshan ho sakte hain
saans ki allergy isme khansi , saans lene mein takhleef aur asthmajaisi samsya ho sakti hain
puri body ki allergy kabhi kabhi kuch logo ko allergyseserious situation ka saamna karna padta hain aur puri body mein ek saath gambhirlakshan paida ho jatehain
aisi situation mein turant hospital mein jana chahiye
skin ki allergy skin ki allergy kaficommon hain aur yeh baarish ke mausam mein bahut zyadapaida hoti hain
tavcha ki allergy mein skin mein khujali hona , daane hona , chakatte panda aadi hota hain
dhool mitti se bache , agar aapko dhool mitti wale environment mein kaam karna padta hain toh face mask pahan kar kaam kare
rajai gadde , takiye ke cover aur bed sheets ko time timepar garmpaani sedhoterahe
bike chalate waqt mooh aur naak par rumaal baandhe , aankho pardhoop se bachnekeliye acchi quality ke sunglasses pahne

health tips a a print email acchi aur kadak chaye tea har kisi ko pasand hoti hain
green tea ko oxidize nahi kiya jata hain , jiske chalte iske pattiyo mein electrons ki sankhya jyada hoti hain
minutes baad apne baalo mein conditioner lagaye
bas aapko green tea ki bajaye black tea ka istemal karna hoga
stress , allergy , jyada sharab peene ya hormone change ki wajah se aankho mein sujan ho sakti hain
minutes baad usay farsh se hataye
ab carpet ki dhool aur gandh door ho chuki hogi
aise mein thande tea bag le aur jis jagah par skin prabhavit huyi hain , waha par 10 minutes tak rakhe , asar turant dikhega
shaving rash chutki mein hataye agar aapke under arms ya pairo par shaving rash hain to tea bag ka sahara le
saving ke baad 5 minutes tak arms ke neeche paani mein bhiga hua tea bag dabakar rakhe
saath hi kisi tarah ke infection hone ka khatra bhi nahi rahega
mahnge spray mein paisa lutane ki bajaye aap ghar mein hi is samsya se nipat sakte hain
yeh skin mein mauzood benzoyl peroxide ko rokti hain , jisse chehre par spot nahi aate hain
