08 supreme court ka naya order ab sirf
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home aadhaar card finance general knowledge supreme court ka naya order ab sirf 2 kaamo ke liye jaroori hoga aadhaar card
aadhaar card , finance , general knowledge a a print email supreme court ne aadhaar card par ek naya judgement diya hain
iske alawa , govt
kin 2 kaamo ke liye aadhaar card hoga compulsory jaroori ; supreme court ne aadhaar card ko sirf public distribution system pds aur lpg subsidy haasil karne ke liye compulsory kiya hain
aadhar card holders ki personal jankari sarvajanik publically hone ke khatre ko dekhte huye court ne kaha ki koi bhi authority is baat ko sunschit kare ki jankariyo ka khulasa na ho sake
aadhaar card ke bina nahi milegi gas subsidy bharat sarkar ne gharelu gas par aam janta ko subsidy di hui hain
is subsidy ko bhi aadhar card se joda ja chuka hain
yadi aapke paas aadhaar card nahi hain to aap ko gharelu gas cylinder ke liye subsidy nahi milegi aur aapko unche daamo high price par lpg cylinder khareedna padega
lekin supreme court ke is order ke baad ab passport ke liye koi bhi identity di ja sakti hain
isme voter card , ration card , passport , driving license , revolver license aur public sector ke id card ya govt
halaki subsidy haasil karne ke liye aadhaar card ko bank account se link hona jaroori hain
11 google ki kuch useful tricks ke bare
google ki kuch useful tricks ke bare mein janiye
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge tech tips google ki kuch useful tricks ke bare mein janiye
general knowledge , tech tips a a print email aaj internet ke zamane mein agar aapko kuch internet par search karna hota hain to sabse pahle aap google ke paas jate hain
yeh tricks specially google search box ke liye
google search ke secret tricks tips in hindi urdu
kisi bhi word ka definition janne ke liye google search mein word se pahle definition type kare
jaise ki aap money ki definition janna chahte hain to google mein type kare definition money isse aapko money ka matlab puri tarah se google aapko batayega
kisi bhi flight ki arrival time aur date check karne ke liye google search mein airline ke naam ke baad flight number type kare
example ke taur par aap air india airlines ki 143 flight ki arrival time aur date pata karna chahte hain toh google search box mein type kare air india airlines 143 aur itna hi type karte hi google aapko show karega is flight ke arrival hone ka time aur date
google search box ko aap calculator ki tarah bhi use kar sakte hain
iske liye aap search box mein type kare calculator aur aapke saamne calculator aa jayega
vaise direct google search box mein calculate karne se bhi yeh sahi result show karta hain
google search box mein aap timer bhi set kar sakte hain
timer set karne ke liye google search box mein type kare set timer __ hours minutes aur yeh aapke liye timer set kar dega
example ke taur par mujhe 30 minutes ka timer set karna hain to main google search box mein type karoonga set timer 30 minutes iske baad google mere liye timer set kar dega
kisi bhi english word ka apni language mein translate karne ke liye google search box ka bhi aap istemal kar sakte hain
example ke taur par main settlement word ka meaning hindi mein janna chahta hoon to main google search box mein type karoonga settlement translation in hindi ya phir main yeh bhi type kar sakta hoon settlement in hindi in 2 dono tarah se type karne par google ek translation ka kaam karne lagta hain
aur yeh mere saamne settlement ka meaning hindi mein show karne lagta hain
isi tarah aap kisi bhi language mein kisi bhi word ka translate google se karwa sakte hain
jaise ki main optics ka matlab urdu mein janna chahta hoon toh main google search box mein type karoonga optics in urdu toh google automatically iska urdu mein matlab aapko batayenga
local area ke baare mein kuch bhi search karna chahte hain to google maps mein jakar type kare
example ke taur par google maps mein type kare restaurants to yeh aas paas ke sabhi restaurants ki list aapke saamne show karne lagega
kisi specific format mein file search karna chahte hain to file name ke aage filetype type kare
example ke taur par main health tips ki file pdf format mein search karna chahta hoon toh main google search box mein type karoonga health tips filetype pdf iske baad google mujhe pdf wali sabhi pages show karne lagega
google search par aap asaani se stock price , chart aur isse related sabhi information aap paa sakte hain
jaise ki aap dabur ke share janna chahte hain to type kare stock dabur itna hi type karne par google aapke saamne dabur company ke share , price sabhi kuch show karne lagega
apne city ke weather janne ke liye bhi aap google search box ka istemal kar sakte hain
google search mein weather type karne par baad city ya place ka naam type kare aur result aapke saamne hoga
example ke taur par main jalandhar ka weather report janna chahta hoon to maine google mein type kiya weather jalandhar iske baad google ne mujhe jalandhar city ka weather report show kiya
currency converter ke roop mein bhi google search box aapki madad karta hain
jaise ki main 1 ko indian rupees mein convert karna chahta toh main google par typer karoonga 1 inr toh google automatically 1 ki value indian rupees mein show karne lagega
iske alawa agar main kisi dusri countries ki currency ko bhi google search mein convert kar sakta hoon
example ke taur par maine 500 indian rupees ko pound mein convert karne ke liye type kiya 500 inr to pound toh google ne 500 indian rupees ki value british pound mein show ki
yani ki google search box ko aap currency converter ki tarah bhi use kar sakte hain
example ke taur par main yeh janna chahta hoon ki ludhiana mein is samay kaun si movies kaun se theater mein lagi huyi hain toh main google search box mein type karoonga movies in ludhiana bas itna hi type karte hi google mujhe ludhiana mein lagi sabhi movies ke naam aur timing kis jagah yani ki cinema house mein lagi hain sabhi information show karne lagega
google search box se aap apne city ka sunrise aur sunset hone ka exact time jaan sakte hain
google search box mein zerg rush type karte hi aap zerg rush ki game khelne lagte hain
google search box mein aap asani se apne favorite serials ke episodes bhi search kar sakte hain
jaise hi maine google search box mein type kiya saath nibhaana sathiya episodes toh main hairaan rah gya
google search box mein aap cricket score bhi jaan sakte hain
bas aapko type karna hain cricket score toh yeh aapke saamne live sabhi cricket matches ke score show karne lagega
jaise main janna chahta hoon cricket schedule to yeh meri country ki cricket team ke sabhi schedule show karne lagta hain
isi tarah aap kisi bhi cricket team ki schedule ke baare mein google se direct jankari le sakte hain
jaise ki england ki cricket team ke schedule janne ke liye maine type kiya england cricket schedule to mere saamne england team se judi sabhi schedule show hone lage
aap google se apne favorite singer ke songs bhi jaan sake hain
iske liye google search box mein type kare songs by singer name ya phir songs of singer name
google images mein aap jakar type kijiye atari breakout to aapke saamne ek game show hone lagegi , jise aap khel sakte hain
google aapke liye converter ka bhi kaam karega
height ko convert karne ke liye aap google search mein type kare
jaise ki maine 100 cm to meter type kiya to google ne automatically ise convert kar diya
isi tarah weight ko bhi google convert kar sakte hain
maine type kiya 100 kilogram to ton to google ne ise convert kar diya
isi tarah aap google se aap koi bhi length ya weight ko aap convert kar sakte hain
google search box se aap apne pasandida writer ke books ke baare mein bhi jaan sakte hain
jaise ki maine type kiya books of munsi premchand to google ne munsi prem chand ki likhi sabhi books ki list show ki
google search box se aap kisi bhi city ka time aur date pata kar sakte hain
exaple ke taur par maine type kiya london time to london city ka current time date mujhe pata chal gya
google se aap apne favorite actor ki movies list ke baare mein bhi jaan sakte hain
jaise hi maine google search box mein type kiya hritick roshan movies to hritick ki sabhi movies list show hone lagi
aap google search ke in secret aur useful tricks ko jaroor hi istemal karenge
05 adrak khane ke fayde benefits of ginger
adrak khane ke fayde benefits of ginger hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips adrak khane ke fayde benefits of ginger 0 health tips a a print email sardiyo mein bina adrak ki chay ke bina jyadatar logo ki subah shuru nahi hoti hain
low calorie hone ke saath hi yeh bhookh ko bhi control karti hain
rojana iska sewan metabolism ko sudharta hain aur sharir ki extra fat ko ghatane mein madad karta hain
pregnant mahilaon ke liye bhi adrak faydemand hain
dard se milega chhutkara migraine ke dard , muscles pain , back aur joint pain ki shikayat hain to roj adrak ki chay piye , aaraam milega
cancer se ladne mein sahayak adrak mein aise anti oxidants hote hain , jo cancer ko door rakhne mein madadgar hote hain
daily diet mein ise shamil karne se breast , lung , skin aur prostate cancer se bhi bacha ja sakta hain
subah jo bhi aap healthy drink lete hain , usme chhota sa adrak ka tukda daal sakte hain
cold ya flu se ladne ki power badhata hain
ismein zinc , chromium aur magnesium hota hain
isse blood circulation niyamit bana rahta hain
nimbu ke saath lene se immune system behtar banta hain
dawa ki tarah kar sakte hain upyog sabse khas baat hain ki adrak non allergic hota hain
powder , fresh , oil aur dry sabhi roopo mein ise istemal kiya ja sakta hain
isme vitamin a , c , e aur b ke saath magnesium , potassium , phosphorus , silicon , iron , calcium aur zinc hota hain , jo body ko healthy rahta hain
saans lene mein dikkat hone par adrak mein mauzood anti oxidants allergy aur infection se ladne mein madadgar hote hain
yahi wajah hain ki surgery ya chemotherapy ke baad hone wali problems mein doctor adrak ke sewan ki salah dete hain
periods mein dard mein rahat deta hain adrak mein anti inflammatory gun mahilaon ko periods ke dard se mukti dilane mein bhi madadgaar hain
yeh periods ke dauran mahilaon ko adhik gastric ki samsya se nidaan mein bhi kargar hain
skin ke liye faydemand adrak ka sewan karne se skin mein glow aata hain
rukhe baalo ko silky banane ke gharelu upay aur nuskhe tips for dry hair to make silky hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips rukhe baalo ko silky banane ke gharelu upay aur nuskhe tips for dry hair to make silky 3 health tips a a print email kya aap rukhe baalo dry hair se preshan hain
aap aloe vera ke ark wala shampoo bhi laga sakte hain
beer beer mein adhiktar matra mein yeast paya jata hain , jisse baalo ko moisture milta hain aur veh mulayam ban jate hain
good results ke liye aisa 1 hafte tak lagatar kijiye
ando ka yolk peela bhaag lekar acche tarah se fent le
is mixture mein 2 chammach olive oil yani ki jaitun ka tel mila le
brush ki help se baalo mein lagaye
isse baal straight aur shiny ho jayenge
creamy paste taiyaar ho jayega
multani mitti ek cup multani mitti le
is paste ko mahine mein 3 se 4 baar jaroor lagaye , iske istemal se baal silky , shiny aur straight ho jayenge
doodh ek spray bottle mein paani aur doodh barabar matra mein le
is mixture ko apne baalo mein spray kar le
yeh mishran pure baalo mein barabar matra mein spray hona chahiye
shampoo se dhone ke baad conditioner ka istemal kare

05 bael ka juice peene ke fayde benefits
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips bael ka juice peene ke fayde
general knowledge , health tips a a print email ayurveda mein garmi ke mausam mein bael ya bilv ka sewan sharir ke liye bahut hi labhkari mana gya hain
6ml iron , 2ml vitamin c aur iske alawa bael mein 137 calorie energy aur kuch matra mein vitamin b bhi paya jata hain
diabetes mein labhdayak bael mein laxative ka level adhik hota hain
yeh body mein blood sugar level ko control mein rakhta hain
sharir mein insulin's banane mein madadgar hota hain , jisse diabetes mein aaram milta hain
infection se bachav bael mein kai tarah ke anti microbial gun hote hain
jo body ko infection se bachane mein madadgaar hote hain
ulcer mein faydemand bael mein phenolic tatv ke saath anti oxidant mauzood hote hain
yahi karan hain ki bael ka sharbat gastric ulcer ko theek karne mein madadgar hota hain
cholesterol par control ayurveda mein iski madad se cholesterol kam kiya jata hain
bael ke patto mein mauzood ark ka sewan karne se cholesterol ka level kam karne mein madad milti hain
04 sabudana ke fayde benefits of sago in
sabudana ke fayde benefits ofsago in hindi
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips sabudana ke fayde benefits ofsago in hindi
health tips a a print email sabudana jise englishe mein sago kaha jata hain , ise hum jyadatar upvaas ya vrat ke dino mein istemal karte hain
benefits of sago in hindi
sabudana carbohydrate ek good source hain , jo body ko instant aur jaroori energy dene mein bahut hi kargar hota hain
sabudane mein paya jane wala potassium blood circulation ko behtar banata hain aur blood pressure ko control karta hain
sabudane mein paya jane wala folic acid aur vitamin b complex pregnancy ke time garbh mein pal rahe bacche ke development mein madadgar hota hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge rojana baalo ki tel se malish karna hota hain faydemand
general knowledge a a print email baalo ka jhadna ho , asamay safed hona , dandruff , infection hone jaisi problems ka saamna aap sabhi ne kabhi na kabhi toh jaroor hi kiya hoga
baalo ke health ke liye log tarah tarah ke mahange treatment karwate hain aur in treatment ke effect ke liye unhe lamba intezaar bhi karna padta hain
rojana baalo ko tel se maalish karne ke fayde benefits of daily oil massage for hair in hindi
castor oil , almond oil aur olive oil baalo ke liye jaroori kai saare nutrients ki supply karte hain
iske alawa kharab digestion , protein aur vitamins ki kami bhi ek badi wajah ho sakte hain
hair ki growth ke liye baalo ki growth puri tarah se usay milne wale nutrients par depend karti hain
protein aur vitamins baalo ki growth ke liye sabse jaroori cheez hain
coloring , straightening aur aise hi kai tarah ke treatments se damage ho rahe baalo ki quality ko hafte mein 3 4 baar tel lagakar kafi hud tak sudhaara ja sakta hain
tel se baalo ki jado mein acche se massage kare jisse blood circulation sudharta hain
jado mein tel observe hone se usay kai jaroori nutrition asaani se mil jate hain
dandruff se chhutkara dilaye scalp ki dryness dandruff ke badhne ki wajah hoti hain
dandruff dead cells hote hain jo khujali hone par kapdo par girte hain
lagatar shampoo aur conditioner laga kar kafi hud tak is problems se chhutkara paya ja sakta hain
bacteria aur fungal infection kare door ; seer ki jado mein gandagi jama hote rahne se kai tarah ke bacterial aur fungal infection hone ka khatra bana rahta hain
rojana tel mein shahad mila kar usse maalish karne se anti bacterial tatv bacteria ko paida nahi hone deta hain
baalo ko banaye chamakdaar ; chamakdaar baal personality ko graceful banane ka kaam karte hain

general knowledge a a print email daanto mein agarthanda garm lagta hain toh ho sakta hain ki aapke daanto ki coating jise hum enamel kahte hain , ghees chuki ho
enamel daantoka safetycoverhota hain jo usay hard cheezo se bachane ka kaam karta hain
teethka sensitivebane rahna mahino se lekar saalon tak bana rahta hain
bahut jyada sugar wale products na khaye , kyonki yeh daanto mein badi hi tezike saath lagti hain
soft brush ka istemal kare , jisse daanto aur masoodho par zor na pade
fluoride hame daanto ki sadan aur tooth enamel ko damagehone se bachata hain
sensitivedaanto ke liyespecial kism ke toothpaste market mein easily available hain
normal toothpaste ki bajaye inka istemalkare
fruits ke juices , cold drinks , wine , tea , ice cream aur citric khatte phal jaise tamatar , salad , dressingaur aachaar aadi na khaye
din mein 2 times brush kare

05 aam khane ke fayde benefits of mango
aam khane ke fayde benefits of mango hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips aam khane ke fayde benefits of mango 0 health tips a a print email garmiya apne saath aam ka season lekar aati hain
mango mein amino acid , vitamin a , c aur e , niacin aur beta carotene , iron , calcium , magnesium , potassium aur bhi kai tarah ke enzyme atyadhik matra mein paye jate hain
vitamin a bahari vatavaran aur kai prakar ke bacteria ke prabhavo ko rokta hain , vahi vitamin c skin ke rogo se bachata hain
cholesterol kam karta hain
rojana aam khane se isme maujood adiponectin extra cholesterol ka level dheere dheere kam karta hain
isse extra calorie bhi burn ho jati hain
potassium ki matra heart beats aur blood pressure dono ko sucharu roop se chalate huye heart attack ke khatre ko kam karti hain
skin glow kare aam wala face mask scrubbing ke liye bhi upyogi mana jata hain
isme paya jane wale anti oxidant khas taur par vitamin c skin ko healty rakhne ke saath uski chamak ko bhi banaye rakhti hain
aam mein mauzood flavonoid skin ke rom chidra open pores kholkar muhanse ko kam karta hain
aam mein paya jane wala beta carotene vitamin a ko kai tatvo mein devide kar deta hain , jo skin ko chamakdaar banane ke saath usay healthy bhi rakhte hain
saath hi vitamin e free radicals ko khatm karta hain , jo samay se pahle budhape ko kam karta hain aur skin ki safai kar daag dhabbo se chhutkara dilata hain
aam mein maujood potassium sharir mein sodium level ki matra ko banaye rakhta hain
iske alawa bhi kai prakar ke flavonoids jaise beta carotene aur beta cryptoxanthin aankhon ki roshini ko badhata hain
isme paye jane wala enzyme pachan tantra ko energy deta hain
aam mein maujood protein , fat , carbohydrate ko pachakar sharir ke jaroori tatvo ki purti karta hain
kidney ki bimari door karta hain aam mein maujood citric acid , malic acid aur tartaric acid sharir mein alkali ka balance banaye rakhta hain
cancer se bachav aam mein anek prakar ke swasthvardhak finolens hote hain
jaise kwarsetin , aisokwarsetin , strogelin , fisetin , gallic acid , methyl gallet vitamin c , soluble pectin aadi
aam mein maujood vitamin c anti oxidant ka kaam karta hain
jo leucaemia ke alawa colon , breast aur protest cancer se bachata hain
boston ke dana cancer institute ke anusaar cancer ke mareez ko rojana 2 glass mango juice peena faydemand hain
immunity ko badhata hain aam mein maujood vitamin a aur c body ki immunity ko badha kar usay healthy aur strong banata hain
vitamin a immunity ko badhane mein sabse mahatpurn bhumika nibhata hain
vitamin a aur c ke alawa 25 tarah ke carotenoids hote hain jo body ki immunity power ko badhate hain
brain ki memory ko badhata hain
ek study ke anusaar aam mein glutamic acid naam ka amino acid paya jata hain
to brain ko strong karne ke saath concentration aur memory ko badhata hain
aam ko love fruit ke naam se jana jata hain
vitamin e ki bharpoor matra hone ke karan yeh sex hormones ko badhata hain
saath hi isme maujood magnesium aur potassium jo ki sex hormones ko badhane ke liye bahut hi kargar hote hain
yeh unke liye bahut hi badhiya source hain
jaroori matra mein mango khana sex life ko behtrin bana sakta hain
usme kai prakar ke anti oxidant paye jate hain , khastaur par vitamin c
aam ke gude ko kai prakar ke face mask aur scrub ke taur par istemal kiya jata hain
yeh skin par padne wale gahre kale nishaan , daag dhabbe aur pimples ko door karta hain aur skin ka natural glow barkarar rakhta hain
blackheads ko door karta hain sunane mein bada ajeeb lagega , lekin yeh baat sach hain ki aam se banaya gya scrub , black heads ko door karta hain
pure chehre par is scrub ko dheere dheere lagaye
isse blackheads ke saath aapki dead skin bhi nikal jayegi
umar kam kare aam mein maujood antioxidants chehre ki pigmentation ko kam karke skin ko young rakhte hain
saath hi hanikarak radicals ko door karke cancer se bhi bachav karta hain
vitamin c ki bharpoor matra baar baar chehre par hone wale pimples ko bhi rokti hain
aam ko sidhe chehre par lagane se skin mulayam to hoti hain , saath hi yeh ek natural moisturizer ka bhi kaam karta hain
skin ke liye ek detaining agent ke roop mein kaam karta hain
cleanser ka kaam karta hain skin ki ander ki safai karta hain , jisse uske chhed skin pores khul jate hain aur use bharpoor oxygen ki matra milti hain
face wash ka kaam kare oily ho ya dry har tarah ki skin ke liye aam asardaar hain
sensitive skin ke liye sensitive skin ke liye aam ka guda bahut hi labhkari hota hain
baalo ki dekhbhal aam bahut saare minerals aur vitamins ka khazana hain
ise balo par lagakar pure 30 minutes tak rahne de
vitamin e hair scalp mein blood transfer ke process ko sahi rakhta hain , jo baal ko lambe karne ka mukhya vajah hain
balon ko jhadne aur safed hone se rokne ke liye aam ki guthali se nikalne wala tel fatty acids , vitamins aur minerals ka khazana hota hain
is mixture ko rojana seer par lagaye

yeh bimari paida karne wale cholesterol ke level ko control karta hain
diarrhea dast mein labh hoga

general knowledge , health tips a a print email aaj hum namak , nimbu ka ras aur kali mirch in teeno ko ek saathmila kar lene se kya fayde hote hain
mausam ka badalna hamari sehat par side effect daalta hain
is mixture ko lene se aapko kafi fayda hoga
benefits of lemon , salt black pepper taking together in hindi urdu
namak , nimbu ka ras aur kali mirch teeno ko ek sath lene ke fayde flu se dilaye chhutkara is mixture ko honey ke saath mila kar khane se flu ke virus aurbacteria khatm ho jate hain
is mixture mein antibacterial gun paye jate hain , jo gale mein panap rahe bacteria ko khatm karte hain aur aapko gale ke dard se aaram dilate hain
weightloss karne mein helpful yeh mixture 1 chammach rojana khali pet ek glass garm paani ke saath liya jaye toh body ka metabolism rate increase hota hain , jisse wajan kam karne mein madad milti hain
gallstone theek kare agar in teeno ke saath olive oil bhi mix kar diya jaye toh yeh mixture bahut hi zyada powerful ban jayega
yeh mixture gall bladder mein ikattha stones ko ghulaane mein madad karta hain
lekin aapko ise regularly lena hoga
04 xiaomi mi 4i vs moto g2 vs yu yureka
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home micromax motorola smartphone xiaomi xiaomi mi 4i vs moto g2 vs yu yureka
micromax , motorola , smartphone , xiaomi a a print email chinese smartphone maker company xiaomi ne haal hi mein
yu yureka micromax company ke smartphone yu yureka mein cyanogen os 11 ka operating system diya hain , jo android
vahi agar is handset ke processor par gaur kare to isme aapko
ghz ka octa core processor milega , jo ki 64 bit qualcomm snapdragon 615 chipset ke saath uplabadh hoga
inch ki display wale handset mein 16 gb ki internal memory aur 32 gb tak micro sd card ki suvidha milegi
isme aapko 5 megapixel ka front camera aur 13 mega pixel ka rear camera bhi milega
moto g2 motorola ka moto g2 smartphone 4g hain
isme user ko 16 gb ki inbuilt memory milegi , vahi 32 gb tak micro sd card ki suvidha milegi
company ne is 4g smartphone mein users ko 2390 mah ki battery di hain
guar talab hain ki company ne apne moto g gen2 mein 5 inch ki display ko lagaya hain
iske alawa company ne isme 8 megapixel ka rear camera diya hain , jisme led flash laga hua hain
vahi 2 mega pixel ka front camera maujood hain
xiaomi mi 4i is phone mein aur bhi shandar features diye gye hain

05 cyber attack se bachne ke liye tips
cyber attack se bachne ke liye tips
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home tech tips cyber attack se bachne ke liye tips
tech tips a a print email internet ke badhte prabhav ne logo ko kafi suvidha to pradaan ki hain
lekin iske ult cyber crime mein bhi kafi badhotari huyi hain
personal data ho ya phir photos , ye hackers mauka milte hi aapke e mails account se aham jankariyan chura lete hain
jab bhi aap apne smartphone par wi fi ke jariye net access kar rahe hain
to oos network ki security ya password ke baare mein janch parakh kar le
apne e mail account ko manage karte waqt savdhaani barte
kisi bhi anjaan vyakti dwaara bheje gye pop up , attachment ya notification ya kisi link par click naa kare
koi bhi website kholne ja rahe hain to hamesha url ko type karke khole
aamtaur par dekha jata hain ki , personally identifiable information pii dwara online request bheji jati hain , is tarah ki kisi bhi request par koi response na dena hi uchit hain
apne social media account ko puri tarah secure rakhe
kisi bhi information ya photos ko share karne ke baad sirf unhi logo ko tag kare , jinhe aap personally jante ho
kisi bhi password ko do baar use na kare
password ko lekar hamesh starkta baratni chahiye aur samay samay par password ko change karte rahna chahiye
agar kuch doubt lage to turant authority ko suchit karna chahiye
system aur smartphone ke software ko hamesha update rakhe
agar aapko koi problem samajh mein aa rahi hain , to device ko turant internet se disconnect kar de
system ya smartphone mein hamesha anti virus software install rakhe
virus aane par sabhi password ko change kar dena chahiye
khaskar ke financially password ko pahle change karna chahiye
is tarah ki condition mein apne computer ya device ko safe mode mein le jakar restart kar de
federal trade commission ko jankari de
taki hackers ke baare mein jankari mil sake

sharab se jude kuch bhram aur satya myths facts of alcohol hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips sharab se jude kuch bhram aur satya myths facts of alcohol 0 general knowledge , health tips a a print email kya aap sharab wine se jude bhram aur iske satya ke baare mein janana chahte hain
kya aapko pata hain ki alcohol ke kaun kaun se myths hain aur asal mein unke facts kya hain
sharab se related bhram aur sach
fact mana ki kuch best wine hundreds year purain hain , lekin jyadatar wine 1 ya 2 saal ke under peene ke liye taiyaar ki jati hain , matlab ki sharab ki expiry date amooman 2 saal tak mani ja sakti hain
fact sharab stomach lining ke jariye khoon mein samaati hain
myth darker alcohols healthy hote hain
fact darker whiskey aur darker beers jaise darker alcohols mein jyada anti oxidants hote hain , lekin unme jyada congeners bhi hote hain
congeners veh toxic element hote hain jo sharab banane ke process mein bante hain
saath hi , darker alcohols mein calorie bhi jyada hoti hain
myth energy drinks ke saath sharab peene se nasha aur chadhta hain
fact energy drinks mein caffeine hoti hain , jisse aap energetic feel karte hain , lekin iska aapki khumari se kuch lena dena nahi hain
fact rojana ke hisaab se alcohol ki recommended limit aurto ke liye 1 drink aur purusho ke liye 2 drink ki hain
agar aap weekdays par nahi peete hain aur weekend par bottles par bottles kholte hain , to yeh aapki sehat par bura asar dal sakta hain

cancer , motape asaani se control ho jata hain
neem se hone wale fayde benefits of neem in hindi urdu
blood sugar ko control kare iske liye neem ki patti kafi faydemand saabit hoti hain
yeh natural insulin ki tarah kaam karta hain
dry skin ko normal banaye agar aapki skin bahut jyada dry hain toh aapko neem facepack ka istemal karna chahiye
iske liye thoda sa neem powder lekar usme kuch boonde grape seed oil ki mila le
cancer se bachata hain neem ki pattiyo mein glycoprotein paya jata hain jo tumour cells ki growth ko rokta hain
chehre ke blackheads ko mitaye ; neem blackheads , whiteheads aur big skin pores ko theek karne mein kafi madadgar saabit hua hain
skin infection se bachata hain neem ki pattiyo mein anti bacterial , anti fungal aur anti viral tatv hote hain
aisa karne se aapki skin se related sabhi tarah ke infection door ho jayenge

general knowledge , health tips a a print email kya aapko maloom hain ki air conditioner ke jyada istemal se aap bimar bhi ho sakte hain
side effects of air conditioner uses in hindi urdu
kai saare log 7 se 8 hours tak air conditioners ke kamre mein rahte hain
ek research yeh batati hain ki a
kamre mein ek artificial temperature generate karta hain , jisse aapki body ke parts par bura effect hota hain
aaiye jante hain air conditioner mein rahne se kya kya side effects ho sakte hain
air conditioner mein jyada der tak rahne ke nuksaan side effects allergy hona a
blood circulation bigad sakta hain a
ki thandi hawaa ki wajah se blood nerves sikudne lagti hain
isse body ka blood circulation kharab ho sakta hain
thakaan jyada hona air conditioner ka temperature kam rahta hain
eyes mein problem hona air conditioner ki cool air ke chalte aankhon mein dryness badh jati hain
asthma ki bimari hone ka khatra long time tak a
bechain aur stress hona lagatar air conditioner ki hawaa khane ki wajah se body ko ek hi temperature ki aadat pad jati hain
aise mein aapko bechaini aur stress feel hone lagti hain
skin dry hona air conditioner ki thandi hawaa ke chalte aapke skin ka natural moisturizer kam ho jata hain
joint pain hona air conditioner se nikalne wali hawa ki wajah se joints ke functions par bura asar padta hain
sinus ki problem air conditioner ke jyada istemal se aapka mocous gland hard ban jata hain
air conditioner ki hawaa ka exposure direct seer ya aankhon par nahi hona chahiye
ki cooling na ho

lahsun is acid ko banne se rokta hain

anek tarah ki bimariya jaise diabetes , typhus , depression aur bhi kuch prakar ke cancer ki roktham ke liye sahayak hota hain

isme na kisi step ki tension hoti hain aur na hi body movement ki

shukranu ki sankhya badhane ke tips tips for increasing sperm count hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips shukranu ki sankhya badhane ke tips tips for increasing sperm count 0 health tips a a print email shukranu ki sankhya kaise badhaye , sperm count ko badhane ki tips kya hain
modern lifestyle ka khamiyaza purusho ko apne shukranoo ki sankhya sperm count ko kho kar chukana pad raha hain
isse unki fertility capacity prabhavit ho rahi hain aur sperm ki gunvatta bhi kam huyi hain
britain mein huye ek research mein modern lifestyle ke karan purusho ki prajanan kshamta par ho rahe negative asar ka khulasa hua hain
study se behad chintajanak aankde samne aaye hain ki aaj se 50 saal pahle purusho ke ek milliliter semen mein spern count ki sankhya 11 crore 30 lac thi jo ki saal 1988 mein ghatkar 6 crore 20 lakh rah gyi aur aaj yeh matra 4 crore 70 lac rah gyi hain
in upay ko apnakar acchi matra mein high quality wale sperm ko banna possible kiya ja sakta hain
sperm count ko badhane ki tips aur upay
healthy weight banaye rakhe sharir na jyada dubla hi ho aur na jyada mota , kyonki sharir ka wajan hi estrogen aur testosterone ke level par asar dalta hain
jyada chust underwear na pahne yadi aap kasi ya choost underwear ya pant pahnenge to andkosh prostates sahi matra mein shukranoo ka production nahi kar payega aur sperm ki ginti kam hogi
jyada lubricant na use kare jyada lubricant ke use se bache veh bhi shukranoo ke maut ka karan ban sakta hain
jyada hard exercise aur training program se bache
apne andkosh prostates ko inme se nikalne wali garmi se bachaye
isse sperm ki gatisheelta kharab ho jati hain
isse gurde ko blood supply kam ho jati hain aur blood pressure badh jata hain

04 broccoli khane ke fayde benefits of
broccoli khane ke fayde benefits of broccoli in hindi
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips broccoli khane ke fayde benefits of broccoli in hindi
health tips a a print email broccoli abhi india mein itni jyada famous sabzi toh nahi hain , lekin dheere dheere yeh market aur hamare gharo mein apni jagah bana rahi hain
phool gobhi ki tarah dikhne wali broccoli darasal ek hi prajati ki sabziya hain
isme vitamin a , c , e , protein , calcium , iron , carbohydrate aur bhi kai poshak tatv bharpoor matra mein paye jate hain
benefits of broccoli in hindi urdu
aankho ki liye accha hain broccoli mein vitamin a aur beta carotene bahut hi acchi matra mein paye jate hain
isliye aankho ko sahi rakhne ke liye broccoli jaroor khani chahiye
body ki immunity ko badhata hain broccoli mein vitamin c bharpoor matra mein payi jati hain , vitamin c sharir ke immune system ko boost karne aur infection se bachane mein help karta hain
gathiya mein faydemand broccoli ko apne diet mein shamil karne se aap arthritis gathiya jaise bimari se bach sakte hain
dil ke liye accha ; broccoli mein carotenoids lutein paya jata hain , yeh dil ki dhamniyo ko healthy banaye rakhta hain
isme mauzood potassium cholesterol ke level ko badhne nahi deta hain
wajan kam karne mein sahayak broccoli mein calorie kafi kam hoti hain
cancer se bachata hain broccoli mein anti oxidants kafi acchi matra mein paye jate hain
broccoli ke sewan se cancer hone ki sambhavna kafi hud tak kam ho jati hain
pregnancy mein iska sewan bahut hi faydemand hota hain garbhvati mahilaon ko niyamit roop se broccoli ka sewan karna chahiye
cholesterol kam kare broccoli mein fiber , potassium aur chromium bahut hi acchi matra mein paye jate hain jo cholesterol level ko kam karke blood pressure ko control karte hain
haddiya majboot banaye broccoli mein bahut hi acchi matra mein calcium paya jata hain
agar aap haddiya majboot banana chahte hain toh broccoli ka sewan kare
diabetes mein faydemand ; broccoli blood sugar level ko control karti hain
diabetes ke patient ko broccoli ka sewan jaroor karna chahiye
why don't mix soda in alcohol hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips janiye drink mein soda mila kar kyon nahi peena chahiye
why don't mix soda in alcohol 0 health tips a a print email jab koi aap hard drink peete hain jaise sharab aadi to usme paani ki jagah soda hi milana pasand karte hain
isme artificial sweetener pada hota hain , jiski calorie bahut jyada hoti hain
isme mauzood sodium , blood pressure ko badha deta hain aur blood pressure ke badhne se heart attack ka risk hota hain
soda de hydration ko paida karta hain
isme sodium ki jyada matra hone ki wajah se dehydration ho jata hain

health tips a a print email bahut saare logo ko nahi pata hain ki garm doodh mein bahut saare gun chhupe huye hain

protein ka uttam source garm doodh protein aur vitamin ka natural source hain
calcium ki kami ko pura kare agar aapke daant sensitive hain to garam doodh aapko jaroor fayda pahuchayega
garam doodh mein calcium , iodine aur phosphorus paya jata hain jo daanto aur masoodo ko majbooti pradan karta hain
garam doodh maanspeshiyo aur nerves ko tension free kar deta hain
yeh gale mein infection paida karne wale bacteria ko maarta hain aur dard se rahat dilata hain
isse sharir mein electrolyte ki kami puri hogi aur sharir turant hydrate hoga

inhi mein shamil hain kalonji mangraila jisme bahut saare nutrients aur minerals hote hain
iron , sodium , calcium , potassium , fiber aur phosphorus se bharpoor kalonji kai tarah ki bimariyo ka ghar baithe ilaj hain
lagbhag 15 amino acid wala kalongi sharir ke liye jaroori protein ki bhi purti karta hain
seer par 20 minutes tak nimbu ke ras se massage kare aur phir acchi tarah se herbal shampoo se dho le
kalonji oil , olive oil aur mehndi powder ko mila kar halka garm kare
you may also like motapa door karne ke gharelu upay
diabetes se bachata hain kalonji ka istemal diabetes jaisi khatrnaak bimari se bhi bachata hain
you may also like brain memory power ko badhane ke gharelu upay
kalonji ke tel ko rojana use karne se migraine ki samsya door hoti hain
asthma ka ilaj asthma aur kisi bhi tarah ki saans se related bimariyo ke ilaj mein kalonji kargar hain
subah subah ise peene se asthma bimari theek hoti hain , saath hi cough aur allergy ki samsya bhi door hoti hain
you may also like arthritis hone ke karan , lakshan aur iska ilaj
you may also like aankhon ki roshini badhane ke liye best food
blood pressure kare control kalonki ka tel blood pressure ko bhi control karta hain

doodh mein maujood lactic acid aapki dead ho rahi skin ko repair karta hain
haldi aur shahad ka paste banakar chehre par lagane se skin ke pores rom ched khul jate hain
is mixture ko 15 minutes tak chehre par laga rahne de aur phir dho le
skin ko banaye be daag stretch marks mahilaon mein stretch marks ki samsya bahut aam baat hain
skin mein khichav aane ki wajah se middle layers ke fibers break ho jate hain , jo stretch mark ke roop mein najar aane lagte hain
pregnancy aur motape ke dauraan stretch marks kuch jyada hi kharab dikhai dene lagte hain
bas haldi ko alovera gel ke saath mila kar lagaye
facial se tavcha ke rom chhidr chhed khul jate hain
fati aidi ke liye aidiya phatne ka karan calcium hota hain
08 migraine ke ilaj ke kuch tips
migraine ke ilaj ke kuch tips hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips migraine ke ilaj ke kuch tips 0 health tips a a print email migraine ke ilaj ke liye kuch tips aur tarike jo aapko pata hone chahiye
migraine neurological yani brain se juda ek disorder hain
itna hi nahi isse peedit vyakti light , sound , smell aur environments ke prati kafi sensitive ho jata hain
in chemicals ka bahaav allergy , tension , masik dharm ya lambe samay tak bhookhe rahne se ho sakta hain
kai baar heredity anuvansikta aur high blood pressure ke karan bhi vyakti migraine ka shikar ho jata hain
khan pan aur dincharya mein chhupa hain migraine ka ilaj food vitamin b2 kam se kam 400 mg vitamin b2 migraine ke lakshano ko kam karne mein madad karta hain
vitamin b2 hame dairy products , phallian , hari pattedar sabziya , chicken , fish aur eggs mein milta hain
niacin hari pattedar sabziya , surajmukhi ke beej , khameer aur macchali mein mauzood vitamin b3 ya niacin se bhi rahat milti hain
physical activities yoga iska optional treatment hain
saanso se jude alag alag tarah ke yog aur exercise ko daily routine ka hissa banane se migraine ke dard ko kafi kam kiya ja sakta hain
iske baad hi heavy workout ke baare mein soche
therapy malish is situation mein seer ki malish aur dhyaan jaisi relaxation therapy faydemand rahti hain
kanpati aur gardan par cold therapy rahat deti hain
santulit aahaar balanced diet le
roj kam se kam 30 minutes tak exercise kare
acupuncture , massage jaisi therapy se body ko beech beech mein relax karte rahe
doctor ki salah ke bina koi bhi dawa medicine na le
junk food , sharab alcohol aur tobacco products ka istemal na kare
02 kele ke patte ke fayde benefits of
kele ke patte ke fayde benefits of banana leaf hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips kele ke patte ke fayde benefits of banana leaf 0 general knowledge , health tips a a print email kele ka ped bahut lamba aur bada hota hain , iske ped ko dharmik kaamo ke liye bahut hi pavitra ped mana jata hain
yeh non sticky liner streamer tray ke roop mein bhi kaam kar sakta hain aur bio degradable bhi hain
isse milne wale fiber ka istemal chataai , dariaan , mote paper aur paper pulp banane ke kaam mein aata hain
aaiye jante hain kele ke patte ka istemal aur iske fayde skin ke liye faydemand ; kele ke patto mein kafi matra mein epigallocatechin gallate aur egcg jaise polyphenols paye jate hain jo ki green tea mein bhi paye jate hain
polyphenols ek acche anti oxidants hote hain jo pattedar bhojan mein paye jate hain , isliye yeh skin ke liye bhi faydemand hote hain
fode , funsi aur jalne mein istemal skin par fode funsi , nishaan aur jalne par kele ke patte par nariyal ka tel daal kar lapetne se skin se related problems se jald nijat milti hain
09 energy drinks peene ke nuksaan side
energy drinks peene ke nuksaan side effects of energy drinks hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips energy drinks peene ke nuksaan side effects of energy drinks 0 health tips a a print email aaj kal young generation ko energy drink peena bahut hi pasand aata hain , unka manana hain ki ise peene se body ko instant energy milti hain aur veh padhaai ya party bina thake kar lete hain
energy drink peene ke nuksaan aur side effects ke baare mein jaroor jane
energy drink peene ke nuksaan aur side effect 1 ango par tanaav energy drink ke sewan se sharir ke sabhi parts par stress padta hain , kyonki veh thak jate hain aur unhe aaram nahi mil pata hain
agar aap healthy aur khush haal rahna chahteh hain to energy drink ka sewan jyada na kare
mood par asar researches se yeh baat sabit ho chuki hain ki energy drink peene se vyakti ke mood par asar padta hain aur uska mood swing hota rahta hain
jo log rojana energy drink peete hain , unhe is samsya ka samna aksar karna padta hain
caffeine par adhaarit yeh baat sabke samne hain ki caffeine ki matra energy drink mein mili huyi hoti hain
ek baar agar sharir ko caffeine ki latt lag gyi to aur bhi dher saari problems paida ho sakti hain
isliye ise na peena hi better option hain
iske sewan se dehydration , immune system kamjor hona , kharaab daant , haddiyo aadi par asar padta hain

what is the health benefits of cow s ghee in hindi urdu
gaay ke ghee mein aise medical gun hote hain
isme micronutrients tatv hote hain jo aapko cancer jaisi gambhir bimari se bhi bachate hain
deshi gaay ke ghee mein cancer se ladne ki great power hoti hain
iske istemal se breast aur aant ke khatarnaak cancer se bacha ja sakta hain
migraine ki problem se nijat agar aapko migraine ki samsya hain toh gaay ke ghee se aap isse nijat pa sakte hain
yeh ek lubricant ki tarah kaam karta hain

health tips a a print email office mein kaam ki adhikta aur tension ke chalte ham kai baar health ko ignore karne lagte hain
haatho aur body ko stretch karne ke liye , right hand ko upper le jate huye left shoulder ko touch karne ki koshish kare aur yehi process left hand se bhi repeat kare
isse body ki stretching ke saath haatho ki bhi exercise ho jayegi
swimming ki position mein dono haatho aur shoulders ko table ke samne rakhe aur stretch kare
right leg par left leg ko cross karke baithe aur peeth ko ulti disha mein ghumane ki koshish kare
theek yahi process left leg se bhi kare
paani peen , colleague se baat karne , washroom jane jaise chhote mote kaamo se diabetes , dil ki bimari aur motape ki problems se koso door raha ja sakta hain
lunch ya tea break mein 5 7 minutes tak tahlna faydemand hota hain , bewajah ki gapshap ki tulna mein
bina power wala chasma pahanana bhi ek accha option hain
aapne idea telecom company ki advertisement to dekhi hi hogi
fitness ke saath wright diet body ko exercise ke alawa sahi diet se bhi healthy rakha ja sakta hain
dono ka sahi combination hi busy life mein fit fine rakhne mein madadgar hota hain
bhigoye huye chane aur sprouts ka istemal shaam ki chaay ke waqt karna bahut hi faydemand hota hain
isme bharpoor matra mein protein mauzood hota hain , jo body ke liye jaroori nutrients ki purti karta hain
lunch ho ya dinner , time par khane ki aadat dale
saath hi fiber ki matra pachan ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
dry fruits khana bhi faydemand hota hain
oily aur spicy food se tauba kare
04 cellkon campus a518 sirf rs 4500 mein
cellkon campus a518 sirf rs
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home cellkon smartphone cellkon campus a518 sirf rs
cellkon , smartphone a a print email indian handset maker company cellkon ne wednesday ko naya campus a518 smartphone ko launch kar diya
yeh abhi e commerce website par available hoga ki nahi iski koi jankari nahi hain
inch ki hain display cellkon company ne apne is naye smartphon campus a518 mein android ka operating system diya hain
iske alawa agar is handset ke processor par gaur kare to isme aapko 1 ghz ka single core processor milega
campus a518 mein aapko 512 mb ki ram milegi
vahi iske storage capacity ki baat kare to 4 gb ki internal memory aur 32 gb tak micro sd card ki suvidha milegi
mp ka rear camera cellkon company ne apne is naye handset campus a518 mein
mega pixel ka rear camera diya hain
mp ka front camera bhi milega
agar connectivity ki baat kare to campus a518 mein aapko 3g , gprs edge , bluetooth , wi fi aadi ki suvidha milegi
iske alawa battery back up mein yeh phone behtrin hain
philhal iske color variant ki baat kare to isme aapko whiter aur dark blue color milega

09 seb khane ke fayde benefits of apple
seb khane ke fayde benefits of apple hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips seb khane ke fayde benefits of apple 0 health tips a a print email seb apple khane ke fayde kya aap jante hain
seb apple khane se kya fayde benefits hote hain
is post mein hum aapko batayenge ki apple khane se health ko kya kya fayde hote hain
an apple a day , keeps the doctor away english ka ek bahut hi famous dialogue hain jiske according daily ek seb khane se doctor ko door rakha ja sakta hain
scientific researches se yeh pata chala hain ki seb khane se dil ke rog , cancer , diabetes ke saath saath dimaagi bimariya jaise parkinson aur alzheimer aadi mein bhi bhi aaram milta hain
isme kai acche anti oxidant mauzood hote hain
apple body mein glucose ke level ko normal karta hain , jisse diabetes ke patient ko labh hota hain
kai health problem ki wajah motape ko mana jata hain
jaise heart disease , high blood pressure , diabetes jaisi bimariya jyada wajan ke karan hoti hain
seb mein fiber high quality ka paya jata hain , jo wajan kam karne mein madad karta hain
seb mein mauzood quercetin vyakti ke cells ko nuksaan pahuchane se bachata hain
isse cancer ka khatra kam ho jata hain
isme paye jane wale flavonoids aur folinic acid sharir ko tumor se bachaye rakhte hain
seb mein ghulansheel fiber paya jata hain jo cholesterol ko kam karta hain
isme cholesterol level ko kam karne ka anokhe gun hote hain
is tarah aap apple juice peekar aap dil ko healthy rakhne ka ek asaan upay kar sakte hain
seb mein fiber hota hain , jisse aapke daant healthy rahte hain
isme anti viral properties payi jati hain jo bacteria aur virus ko door rakhta hain aur aapke mooh ke thook ki matra ko bhi badhata hain
apple mein vitamin c balanced matra mein hota hain , saath hi isme iron aur boron bhi paya jata hain
seb mein flavonoid paya jata hain jo aurato ko osteoporosis se bachata hain , kyonki yeh haddiyo ke thickness ko badhata hain
seb gurde ki pathari kidney stone ko banane se rokta hain
kyonki isme cider vinegar acchi matra mein hota hain
isme mauzood vitamin c se immune system bhi strong banta hain
apple ko rojana khane se body mein germs aur bacteria se ladne ki shakti badh jati hain
red apple mein quercetin naam ka anti oxidant paya jata hain , haal hi mein huye researches se yeh pata chala hain ki quercetin aapke immune system ko majboot karta hain
seb mein paya jane wala pectin , sharir mein galacturonic acid ki kami ko pura karta hain aur insuline ke upyog ko kam karta hain
jisse diabetes ke patients ko bahut hi aaram milta hain
apple mein mauzood alkalinity liver ko sharir ki safaai karne mein madad karta hain
seb mein sharir ke ph level ko control karne ka gun hota hain
iski bahari parat mein mauzood pectine se pachan tantra durust hota hain
apple energy ka ek bahut hi accha source hain , chunki yeh fefdo ke liye oxygen ki supply karne mein madad karta hain
bowel syndrome kabz , diarrhea aur pet dard jaisa hota hain , jisse bachne ke liye doctors dairy products aur fat vale food se door rahne ki salah dete hain aur fiber wali diet ko apnane ki advise dete hain
apple ke sewan karne se aap bowel syndrome se bache rah sakte hain
apple juice dama ke mareezo ke bahut hi jyada fayda pahuchata hain
isme dame ke attack ko rokne ki capacity hoti hain
isme paya jane wala flavonoids fefdo lungs ko takatwar banata hain
seb brain ki bimariya jaise ki alzheimer ki roktham karne mein bhi kargar hain , kyonki yeh free radicals damage se brain cells ki raksha karta hain jo ki alzheimer hone ki ahem wajah banti hain
apple mein anti oxidants bharpoor matra mein hote hain
isme paye jane wale polyphenols aur flavonoids heart ke health ke liye bahut hi faydemand hain
iske alawa yeh aapke sharir ke liye jaroori minerals aur potassium tatvo ka behtarin source hain
seb mein bahut hi acchi matra mein fiber paya jata hain jo ki pachan mein madad karta hain
apple mein sorbitol hota hain , jisse is problem ko door kiya ja sakta hain
seb fiber ka godown mana jata hain
iske istemal se body ko vitamins aur minerals ki supply hoti hain
10 dandruff door karne ke asaan nuskhe
dandruff door karne ke asaan nuskhe
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips dandruff door karne ke asaan nuskhe
health tips a a print email dandruff ka samna lagbhag har mausam mein karna padta hain
aaiye jante hain dandruff door karne ke asaan gharelu nuskhe aloe vera oily scalp ke liye aloe vera accha solution hain
aloe vera gel scalp par lagaye
iska anti bacterial property scalp ke fungus ko khatm kar dega
dahi dead skin layer ke jama hone ke karan dandruff hota hain
aise mein dahi apne anti fungal gun ke karan scalp ki scaling se bachata hain
ap ise scalp par lagaye
nimbu mein mauzood citric acid dandruff ko khatm karta hain
vahi , shahad baalo ko moisturize karne ka kaam karta hain
isme 1 chammach multani mitti milaye
is pack ko lagaye aur scalp ki massage kare
yeh blood circulation ko theek kar dandruff ko khatm karta hain
oil scalp dry hain aur dandruff ki bhi problem hain toh hot oil , extra virgin olive oil ya coconut oil lagaye
yeh scalp ko moisturize karta hain aur dead skin ko bhi nikaal deta hain
minutes baad shampoo se dho le

miscellaneous a a print email har kisi ke paas chandi ke gahne silver jewellery toh jaroor hi hoti hain
ghar par chaandi ke gahno ki safaai ke liye liye gharelu nuskhe home remedies tips for cleaning , shining silver jewelries in hindi jewellery ya chandi ke bartan saaf karne hain toh sabse pahle ek medium size ka bowl yani ki katora le
phir is katore par aluminum foil yani aluminum ki panni ki parat chadha de , jaisa ki photo mein dikhaya gya hain
aluminum foil aluminum ki panni market mein asaani se mil jati hain
aur phir is bowl ko garam paani se bhar de
ek paper napkin par thoda sa tomato ketchup nikaale aur tarnish area kaala ya maili jagah par ise ragde
agar aapke silver ke gahne mein texture ya design ho toh ise aap apne toothbrush ki madad se saaf kar sakti hain
corn starch aur paani ka ghol bana le
thodi der baad ise ruff towel se saaf kare

other benefits immune system sahi rakhta hain , dil ki bimari nahi hoti , motapa door karta hain , diabetes control karta hain
kabz se rahat , arthritis mein aaram , cancer se bachata hain , khoon ki kami door karta hain , skin disease se bachata hain , skin ke infection se bachata hain , anti easing ka kaam karta hain , chamakdaar baal , do muhe balon se rahat
immune system ko sahi rakhta hain karele mein aise kai saare tatv mauzood hote hain , jisse body ki immunity power badhti hain
saath hi blood sugar level ko maintain karke dil ko healthy aur happy rakhta hain
diabetes control karta hain type 2 diabetes marizon ke liye karela ka juice peena bahut hi acchha mana jata hain
lekin karela ka juice blood sugar level ko control karta hain
iske alawa kheere ka ras , green apple ka ras , hari shimla mirch ka juice bhi kafi faydemand hota hai
kabz se rahat karele mein mauzood fiber pachan kriya ko sahi rakhta hain
cancer se bachata hain cancer aur aids jaisi bimariyon se ladne ke liye karela sahayak hota hain
body mein bharpur matra mein neutrons , minerals , vitamins , protein ki matra se na kewal sehat acchi rahti hain balki skin bhi glow karti hain
anit itching ka kaam karta hain karele mein mauzood vitamin c , ek bahut hi acchha antioxidant hota hain
jo hanikarak free ridicules ko door karta hain
dandruff se rahat dhoop , dhool aur pollution se baalon mein dandruff ki samsya aam baat hain

lekin ise asali pehchan di d
american anderson ne white castle hamburger chain shuru ki , jo ki duniya ki sabse purani burger chain hain
pizza pizza ka naam sunkar mooh mein paani aa gya na
italy ke naples se duniya bhar mein pahucha modern pizza
vaise tasty tasty pizza ki shuruvat yunan greece mein hui thi
karib 6 4 b
ke samay tak greece ke log bread par khoob saara oil , herb aur cheese laga kar khate thay
18vi sadi mein pahli baar italy ke logo ko flat bread ka idea aaya
aaj bhi unke naam se margherita pizza popular hain
noodles tasty chatpate noodles china mein kareeb 5000 b
sabse purane noodles china ke yellow river ke paas paye gye
french fries sabse suhane wale french fries yani fried potatoes ko pommes frites bhi kaha jata hain
france ya belgium mein iski shuruvaat huyi iske baare mein kuch kaha nahi ja sakta hain
khas karke belgium mein is mudde par khasa vivad controversy raha hain kyonki pommes frites ko vaha national food mana jata hain
france mein iski shuruvat shayad rajdhani paris ke sabse purane pull bridge pont neuf par hui
food experts yeh mante hain ki yeh street food hain aur nichle tabke se iski shuruvaat hui , par ab to yeh sabka favorite ban gya hain

darasal , sandwich britain ke ek chhote se shahar ka naam hain
sandwich shahar ke chauthe 4th earl john montagu game khel rahe thay
isi liye spain ki rasoion kitchens mein chocolate drink mashhoor popular ho gya
american log isme bahut saare masaale pees kar milaya karte thay
vanderbilt naam ke ek shaksh aadmi ne saratoga springs new york ek restaurant ' moon lake house ' mein french fries ka order diya
chef george crum ne kam mote french fries banaye , par vander ne aur patle aur kurkure banane ke liye kaha

general knowledge a a print email shahad ko ayurveda mein kai saari bimariyo mein ramban mana gya hain
yeh fructose , glucose , sucrose , maltose aadi sugars ka mixture hain
iske alawa isme protein , albumin , fat , enzyme amino acid , carbohydrates , iodine , iron , magnesium , potassium , sodium , phosphorus , calcium , chlorine jaise health ke liye jaroori minerals paye jate hain
saath hi vitamin riboflavin , vitamin a , b1 , b2 , b3 , b5 , b6 , b12 aur vitamin c , vitamin h biotin bhi mauzood hote hain
shahad ke gharelu nuskhe aur unke fayde home remedies of honey and its benefits ek chammach shahad mein ek chauthaai chammach paani mila kar iss mishran ko acche se mix kare
ise dono hatho se acchi tarah milaye aur chehre par clockwise massage kare
kisi jagah cut ya ghaav ho jane par antibiotic cream ki tarah honey ka upyog kiya ja sakta hain , kyonki shahad ek natural antibiotic hain
teen chammach shahad aur 2 chammach olive oil nahane ke paani mein milaye
yeh aapki skin ko naturally moisturize kar dega aur aapki skin smooth lagne lagegi
pimple baith jayega
hangover ho jaye toh breakfast mein shahad lage toast le
isse sharir ka metabolism tez ho jata hain , jiski wajah se alcohol ka asar khatm ho jata hain

04 india mein launch hua xiaomi mi 4i
india mein launch hua xiaomi mi 4i , keemat sirf 12 , 999 rupees hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home smartphone xiaomi india mein launch hua xiaomi mi 4i , keemat sirf 12 , 999 rupees 0 smartphone , xiaomi a a print email smartphone nirmata chinese company xiaomi ne ab india mein kal xiaomi mi 4i ko launch kiya
xiaomi ne ise delhi mein ' global mi phone premier ' ke tahat utara hain
xiaomi mi 4i smartphone ki keemat 12 , 999 rupees hain
is smartphone ka registration aaj se shuru ho jayega
aur yeh online flipkart par 30 april se asaani ke saath khareeda ja sakega
battery quick charge technique ke saath xiaomi ne xiaomi mi 4i utarkar apne grahko ko phir se ek accha smarphone ka tohfa diya hain
is phone mein ek se badhkar ek feature diye gye hain
yeh phone hindi , bengali , kannada , telugu , malayalam , tamil aadi language ko support karta hain
is smartphone ki battery bhi kafi powerful hain
company ne isme 3120 mah ki battery quick charge taknik ke saath di hain
iske alawa smartphone mein beautify feature bhi diye gye hain , jisme wrinkle remover , skin smoothing jaise features hain
yeh smartphone laminate ogs ke saath aaya hain
phone me sunlight display dala gya hain , jo tez suraj ki roshni mein image ki quality ko barkarar rakhegi , kyonki kai baar tez dhoop mein phone ki picture quality clear dikhayi nahi deti hain
is phone mein aur bhi shandar features diye gye hain
xiaomi mi 4i smartphone mein kareeb 2 gb ki ram di gyi hain
ghz 64 bit octa core snap dragon processor diya gya hain
itna hi nahi iski internal storage kafi acchi hain
sabse khas baat hain ki yeh phone android lollipop
iske alawa is phone ka camera bhi kafi accha hain
phone ke peeche ki taraf 13 mega pixel camera dual tone flash ke saath diya gya hain
aage ki or 5 megapixel selfie camera diya gya hain
itna hi nahi camera ki quality badhane ke liye kai saare features diye gye hain
connectivity mein isme bluetooth , wi fi b g n , gps a gps , micro usb diya gya hain

08 pregnancy period mein machhali ka tel
pregnancy period mein machhali ka tel fish oil lene ke fayde
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips pregnancy period mein machhali ka tel fish oil lene ke fayde
general knowledge , health tips a a print email fish oil bahut hi faydemand mana jata hain
pregnant woman ke liye bhi yeh tel kafi faydemand hota hain
fish oil mein bharpoor matra mein omega 3 fatty acid paya jata hain
jo depression , tension , udaasipan , mentally tiredness , chinta aadi maansik rogo ko pregnancy period mein door karta hain
macchli ka tel hone wale bacche aur pregnant lady ki immunity system ke liye bhi behtar poorak ahaar hain
omega 3 maa se bacche mein placenta ke jariye se jata hain
jo bacche ke immune system ko majbootbanata hain aur baad mein bacche ko eczema se bachata hain
auratein pregnancy ke dauran omega 3 ki extra khuraak leti hain , unke baccheki skin dry nahi hoti hain
blood circulation sahi kare machhali ke tel ko khane se jaha healthy baby ko janm diya ja sakta hain
vahi yeh tel pregnant woman ko diet ke roop mein diya ja sakta hain
itna hi nahi isse oxygen aur poshak tatvo ke beech blood circulation ko bhi positive roop se asar karta hain
physicallydevelopment pregnancy period mein fish oil ka sewan karne se garbh mein pal rahe bacche ke dimaag aur aankho ke development sudhaar hota hain

microsoft , smartphone a a print email apni lumia range mein microsoft ne ek aur budget smartphone lumia 430 ko launch kar diya hain
yeh lumia series mein ab tak ka sabse sasta phone hain
is dual sim smartphone mein 4 inch ki wvga 480 x 800 pixel lcd display hain
ismein 2 megapixel ka primary camera aur saath hi vga secondary camera diya gya hain
ghz dual core qualcomm snapdragon 200 processor aur 1 gb ram hain
lumia 430 mein 8 gb internal storage hain
jise micro sd card ki madad se 128 gb tak expend kiya ja sakta hain
is phone ke liye jald hi windows 10 upgrade bhi aayega
yeh phone 3g , wi fi , bluetooth
aur gps ko support karta hain
is phone ki keemat bharat mein rs
yeh bright orange aur black color mein becha jayega

09 kya sugar free drink health ke liye
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips kya sugar free drink health ke liye acche hote hain
health tips a a print email aajkal market mein diabetes ke mareezo ko dhyaan mein rakhte huye khane peene ke kai sugar free product aate hain jinme sugar free soft drink bhi kafi popular hain , lekin inme calorie ki matra jyada hoti hain
bazaar mein inki demand lagatar badhti chali ja rahi hain kyonki inhe sadharan ordinary drink se better mana jata hain
lekin kya sugar free drinks health ke liye faydemand hoti hain
kuch logo ka manana hain ki sugar free drink regular drink ki tulna mein jyada acche hote hain kyonki inme calorie aur fat na ke barabar hota hain
isse aapki body ko extra calorie nahi milegi aur fat bhi kam hoga
is article mein kuch aise points bataye ja rahe hain , aakhir sugar free drink healthy kyon nahi hain 1 gastric problem sugar free drink mein carbon dioxide , acid , additives , preservatives , artificial sweetener aadi hota hain
iske sewan se health par negative asar padta hain
sugar free drink aam cold drinks se behtar to ho sakti hain , lekin healthy nahi ho sakti hain
sugar free drink mein acid ko flavor ke liye dala jata hain , jo daanto mein bacteria ko panpane deta hain , jisse daanto mein sadan hoti hain aur daant mein keede bhi lag jate hain ya daant gal jate hain
haddi kamjor kare sugar free drink mein carbon dioxide hoti hain , jo calcium ko ghula kar peshab ke jariye sharir se bahar nikaal deti hain
jisse aapko arthritis aur thyroids jaisi bimariya jakad leti hain
05 pyaz khane ke fayde benefits of onion
pyaz khane ke fayde benefits of onion hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips pyaz khane ke fayde benefits of onion 0 health tips a a print email pyaaz khane ke baad munh mein badboo aati hain
fat burn karta hain aap apni fat burn karne ke liye exercise , yoga , walk aur dieting sab kuch karte hain
pyaz mein ek aisi quality hoti hain , jo carbohydrate aur metabolism ko tez kar fat ko jaldi burn karne mein madadgaar hain
isliye periods hone se 4 ya 5 din pahle ise khana shuru kar de
dark spot aur pigmentation kam karta hain
pyaaz mein maujood vitamin c aur antiseptic tatv dark spot aur pigmentation ko kam karte hain
yeh head , colon aur gale ke cancer se bachaata hain
saath hi gastric aur protest cancer hone ke khatre ko kam kar deta hain
aisa pyaz mein mauzood organosulfur ke karan hota hain
immunity boost karta hain
pyaaz mein mauzood phytochemicals chemical jisse sabziyo aur phalo mein rang aata hain sharir mein vitamin c ke asar ko badhate hain
yani is chemical ki wajah se vitamin c sharir mein theek se promote ho pata hain
isse immunity improve hoti hain
iske liye mahine mein 2 baar pyaz ka mask jaroor lagaye
pyaaz mein anti inflammatory , anti septic aur anti bacterial properties hoti hain
blood sugar level ko balance karta hain
pyaz mein kam matra mein calorie hoti hain aur yeh fiber , potassium , iron , vitamin aur baki sabhi nutrients ka achcha source hain
isi wajah se pyaaz diabetes diet ke liye best hain
saath hi isme kai aise chemicals hote hain , jo blood sugar level ko normal rakhte hain
oral health ko sahi rakhta hain
fever se bachne mein help karte hain yeh super food
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips fever se bachne mein help karte hain yeh super food
general knowledge , health tips a a print email jab kabhi bhi mausam mein badlaav aata hain , to iska sabse pahle effect hamari body par padta hain
kyonki in super food ko khane se aapke body ki immunity boost ho jati hain , jisse mausam ke badalne ka asar aapki body par asaani se nahi padta hain
aaiye jante hain aise hi khuch special super food ke baare mein
fever se bachne mein madad karte hain yehsuper food wheat grass wheat grass mein fiber aur minerals bharpoor matraa mein paye jate hain
yeh red blood cells , potassium aur electrolytes ke production mein madad karta hain
aap wheat grass ka powder aur wheat grass juice market se asaani se khareed sakte hain
body ki immunity ko badhaane ke liye wheat grass juice jaroor pijiye
diabetes , sardi jukaam , khansi aur chronic feverjaisi problems ko door karne mein madad karti hain
papaya leaf papita ke patta chahe kitna bhi kadwa kyon na ho , lekin dengue bukhaar ko door karne ka yeh traditional treatment hain
papite ki pattiyo ka juice peene se blood plates count increase hota hain
ise antioxidants ka khazana bhi kaha jata hain , isse bukhaar , diabetes , gathiya , apach , asthma jaisi bimariyo ka treatment kiya ja sakta hain
aap kisi bhi ayurvedicstore se giloy ka power , giloy ke tablets ya giloy juice asaani se buy kar sakte hain
yeh vitamins , electrolytes aur minerals se bharpoor hota hain
yeh immune system ko strong banane mein madad karta hain
yeh cancer , coronary disease , allergy aur blood pressure ke ilaj mein kafi faydemand maana jata hain
rojana mutthi bhar kishmish jaroor khaye aur aap viral infection aadi se bache rahenge
yeh blood pressure , diabetes aur heart problems ke treatment mein madad karta hain
aloe vera aloe vera na sirf aapki skin ke liye accha hain , balki yeh vitamins aur minerals ka khazana hain
yeh aapke digestion ko theek rakhta hain aur aapki body ko detoxify karne mein bhi madad karta hain
aloe vera ek natural antibiotic , anti fungal aur antibacterial ingredienthain

06 seb ka juice peene ke fayde benefits of
seb ka juice peene ke fayde benefits of apple juice in hindi urdu
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips seb ka juice peene ke fayde benefits of apple juice in hindi urdu
health tips a a print email seb ka juice peene ke fayde
benefits of apple juice in hindi urdu
daily sirf 1 glass apple juice peene se body mein vitamins , anti oxidants aur minerals ki kami ko pura kiya ja sakta hain
seb mein cholesterol nahi paya jata hain , jiski wajah se apple ko best fruit mana jata hain
jab aapko apple juice peene se health ko hone wale benefits ke bare mein pata chalega to aap bhi apple juice lover ban jayenge
apple juice peene ke fayde
aankho ke liye hain best apple ke juice mein vitamin a bharpoor matra mein hota hain jo aankho ki roshini badhaane mein bahut hi helpful mana jata hain
apple ka juice rojana peene se aankho se related kai problems se chhutkara paya ja sakta hain
haddiya strong banaye apple juice mein boron , iron , calcium , vitamin c hote hain jo ek saath mil kar haddiyo ko majbootipradan karte hain aur unhestrong banate hain
skin aur hair ke liye apple juice skin aur hair ke liye kafi faydemand hota hain
heart ko healthy rakhe apple mein mauzood polyphenols , anti oxidants aur flavonoids heart ke liye bahut hi badhiya mane jate hain
isme potassium bhi hota hain jo dil ke liye kafi labhkari minerals mein se ek hain
cancer se bachaye apple juice hame tumors aur cancer se bachane mein madad karta hain
kabzsechhutkara dilaye apple mein sorbitol hota hain jo kabzse chhutkara dilata hain
apple juice pee kar aap cholesterol ko kam kar sakte hain
immune system ko strong banata hain apple juice mein vitamins aur minerals paye jata hain jo body ki immunity ko boost karte hain
yeh sharir ke immune system ko majboot banata hain , jisse body ko bacteria aur virus aadi se ladne mein kafi madad milti hain
asthma se bachata hain seb mein flavonoids paya jata hain jo fefdo ke liye kafi faydemand hain
flavonoid fefdo ko healthy rakhta hain aur unhe majboot banata hain , jisse fefde sahi dhangse kaam karte hain
appleka juice daily peene se aap asthma se bach sakte hain
chewing gum chabane ke nuksaan disadvantage of chewing gum hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips chewing gum chabane ke nuksaan disadvantage of chewing gum 0 health tips a a print email bahut se logo ko chewing gum chabane ki aadat hoti hain
kewal side effect ke liye nahi balki class mein bad manners ke karan
junk food khane par zor ek research se yeh pata chala hain ki khas taur par mint wali chewing gum chabane se aap phal aur sabziyo jaise healthy foods se door rahte hain
sirf yeh cheez nahi , yeh aapko junk food fast food khane ke liye majboor karti hain
lagatar chewing chabane se ek disorder hota hain jise medical ki bhasha mein temporomandibular disorder kahte hain
gastrointestinal ki problem chewing gum chabane se bahut si hawa paida hoti hain , jisse pet mein sujan aur dard ho sakta hain
iska karan yeh hain ki chewing gum mein bahut se preservative , artificial flavors aur artificial sugar maujood hoti hain jo ki zehareeli , allergy aur sar dard paida kar sakti hain
iska karan hain chewing gum mein maujood sugar cote daanto mein bacteria ke jane ka karan hain
diarrhea chewing gum chabane se diarrhea bhi hota hain
menthol aur sorbitol jaise artificial sweeteners aanto mein jalan paida karte hain
isse diarrhea hota hain aur sharir ka taral nikalne se dehydration bhi hota hain
yeh bhi chewing gum chabane ka ek sabse bada side effect hain

04 budget smartphone ko khareedte waqt
budget smartphone ko khareedte waqt yaad rakhe yeh baatein
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home smartphone tech tips budget smartphone ko khareedte waqt yaad rakhe yeh baatein
smartphone , tech tips a a print email budget smartphone segment in dino kafi garm hain
kam keemat mein aise smartphone aa rahe hain jo aapke budget mein bhi fit hain aur specification bhi jabardast de rahe hain
budget smartphone khareedte waqt yaad rakhe yeh baatein ____________________________________________________________________________________________
high end smartphone se compare na kare
adhiktar budget smartphone users sochte hain ki ek sasta smartphone dugni keemat wale high end smartphone ke mukable thoda sa hi kam powerful hota hain
xiaomi redme note aur yureka jaise kuch phones high ends devices ke kafi kareeb pahuch gye hain , lekin baki budget smartphones in high ends smartphones ke kareeb bhi nahi pahuch sake hain
yeh budget smartphones hain , isliye yaad rakhe ki inmein aapko screen resolution , processor type aur speed , ram , camera quality , build quality , battery life aadi jaise kai cheezon par compromise karna padega
features theek se check kare aapko sasta smartphone bechne ke liye manufactures phone mein se kai aise features hata dete hain , jo aap khareedte waqt notice bhi nahi karte hain
is tarah 4gb internal storage mein sirf 2gb hi aap istemal kar paate hain
inch ki screen ka resolution 800 x 480 pixel ho sakta hain
connectivity ke mamle mein ho sakta hain ki phone se wi fi direct , nfc aur naya bluetooth
payment se pahle check kare ki sabhi features hain ya nahi
hardware par focus smarphone chunte samay hardware specification ko theek tarah se check karna jaroori hain
jaroori nahi hain ki yeh budget phone hain , to entry level par hi kaam karega
processor check kare ab asaani se octa core available hain
ram check kare jitna jyada ho utna hi best hain , aur available storage check kare expended storage hamesha check karna chahiye
iske alawa display size aur resolution , connectivity options , battery capacity aadi sabhi cheezon ko jaroor dekhna chahiye
iske alawa phone khareedte waqt aap demo phone mein uski build quality , button placement aur parts dekh le
os ka version check kare purane android , windows aur blackberry version chalane wale phone mauzood hain
dhyaan rakhe ki alag alag operating system ke liye alag alag hardware ki jaroorat hoti hain
jaise android ke latest version ke mukable window os ke latest version ke liye kam processor speed aur ram chahiye hoti hain
yeh bhi dekhe ki kitni third party apps pre installed hain aur kya inhe hatane se phone ke performance par koi asar padega
after sell support adhiktar smartphone 1 saal ki warranty ke saath aate hain
halaki , agar service centre najdeek na ho to warranty ka koi fayda nahi hain
company ki website par najdeeki service centers ko search kare
alag alag forum se verify kare ki company ki support reputation kaisi hain
adhiktar companies mein smartphone ke spare parts na milne ki problem aati hain
10 early age mein huye safed baalo ko kala
early age mein huye safed baalo ko kala karne ke gharelu nuskhe home remedies for white hair to black hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge early age mein huye safed baalo ko kala karne ke gharelu nuskhe home remedies for white hair to black 0 general knowledge a a print email aaj kal yuvaon mein sabse aam problem yeh dekhi ja rahi hain ki kam umar hone par bhi unke baal safed hote ja rahe hain
is problem ka sabse main reason fast life culture mein baalo ki sahi dekh bhaal na ho pana aur pollution aadi hain
hum aapko batane ja rahe kuch aise hi simple home remedies aur tips jisse aapke baal naturally black kaale ho jayenge
in tips aur nuskho ko ajma kar aap kam umar mein safed huye baalo ko phir se natural tarike se kala kar sakte hain
is paste ko baalo mein lagane se baalo ka rang attractive dark brown hone lagta hain
seer dhone ke liye shikakai powder ya mild shampoo ka istemal kare
isse baal naturally brown hone lagte hain aur safed nahi hote hain
