lenovo , smartphone a a print email lenovo ne apne smartphone portfolio ko badhate huye joint battery wale do smartphone a5000 aur p70 launch kar diye hain
lenovo ke pichle 3 phones a6000 , a6000 aur a7000 ko flipkart ne flash sales ke jariye exclusive becha tha
lekin a5000 ko company dukaano par bhi utaregi
shayad isi karan se iski keemat halke specification ke bawjood jyada rakhi gyi hain
a5000 mein 5 inch 720p ips display hain aur ispar special nano coating ki gyi hain
is phone ki motai
98mm hain aur wajan 160 gram hain
3ghz mediatek mt6582 quad core processor aur 1 gb ram hain
isme aapko 8 megapixel auto focus rear camera aur 2 mega pixel ka front camera milega
is phone mein 8 gb ki internal memory storage hain
yeh dual sim functionality aur micro sd card ko support karta hain
iski 4000 mah ki battery replaceable nahi hain
kitkat operating system aur lenovo ki vibe ui skin hain
users ke liye android
lollipop upgrade bhi maujood hain
phone mein bluetooth
, wi fi , 3g aur gps connectivity maujood hain
p70 mein 5 inch hd 720 x 1280 pixel ips display hain
7ghz octa core mediatek mt6752 processor hain , 2 gb ram , 16 gb internal memory hain aur yeh android
kitkat par operate karta hain
company ka dawa hain ki yeh phone 3g network par 18 hours ka talk time aur 696 hours ka standby time deti hain
is phone mein 13 mega pixel ka auto focus rear camera aur led flash hain
front camera 5 mega pixel ka hain
yeh phone 4g lte , 3g , wi fi , bluetooth aur gps connectivity options ko support karta hain
a5000 ki keemat 9 , 999 rupaye rakhi gyi hain , jabki p70 15 , 999 rupees mein milega

08 cycling ke fayde benefits of cycling
cycling ke fayde benefits of cycling hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips cycling ke fayde benefits of cycling 0 health tips a a print email cycling cycle chalane ke fayde bahut hain , kya aapko pata hain ki cycling se health ko kya kya benefits milta hain
bachpan mein aap sabhi ne cycling jaroor ki hogi , ab modern busy life mein itna waqt nahi mil pata ki aap cycling kare
aaiye jante hain cycling ke faydo ke baare mein chehre par naa dikhe umar ka asar stanford university ke scientist ke anusaar niyamit cycling se skin ultra violet rays ke side effects se bachti hain jisse badhit umar chehre par dikhaai nahi deti
britain ke harley street ki dermatologist dr
christopher rowland payne ka kahna hain ki cycling jaisi kasrat se blood flow tez hota hain aur tavcha aur cells ko jyada matra mein oxygen aur poshak tatv milte hain
aanto ke cancer se bachaav bristol university ke experts ke anusaar jo log cycling karte hain unki badi aant mein bhojan ki activity tez hokar asaani se hajam ho jata hain
vahi harley street ke gastroenterologist dr
ana raymudo ka kahna hain ki cycling aanto ke cancer ke khatre ko kam kar deti hain
infection nahi satata cycling immune cells ko active karti hain aur infection se ladne ki capacity ko badhati hain
isse aapko natural aur fresh environment mein rahte huye bina boriyat ke workout karne ka mauka milta hain
neend na aane ki samysa mein stanford university school of medicine ke researchers kahte hain jo log physically work ki kami ke karan aneendra ke rogi hain , vey rojana 20 se 30 minutes tak cycle chalaye
isse stress hormone be asardar ho jata hain aur gahri neend aati hain
hafte mein 5 din cycling aapko fit bana sakti hain
maa aur shishu rahenge healthy michigan university ke researchers ke anusaar pregnancy periods mein niyamit roop se cycling karne se delivery ke dauran dard kam hota hain
lekin shuruvaati aur aakhiri mahine mein cycling nahi karna chahiye
dil ke rogo se bache rahenge ek research ke anusaar yeh result paya gya hain ki niyamit cycling dil ki bimari hone ka khatra 50 tak kam kar deta hain
british heart foundation ka kahna hain ki agar log niyamit roop se normal exercise kare to har saal 10 thousand se jyada heart attack se hone wali death ko kam kiya ja sakta hain
dekhte samay jitni oxygen lete hain , usse 10x jyada oxygen cycling karne se milti hain
cycling na sirf cardiovascular system ko majboot banati hain balki fefdo ki power ko bhi badhati hain
cancer se bachav jin kasrato se cancer ka khatra kam hota hain , unme se cycling sabse best hain
kai researchers ka kahna hain ki 30 minutes roj cycle chalane se cancer hone ka khatra kam ho jata hain
yadi mahilaye niyamit roop se cycle chalaye to breast cancer ka khatra kam hoga
baccho ki exercise cycling baccho ke liye best exercise hain
kyonki badhte baccho ke liye jaroori hain ki vah niyamit roop se exercise kare , aise mein cycling unhe full body workout karwati hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email garmiyon ke dino mein dhoop bahut jyada hoti hain , jisse aap ki skin aur sehat dono ko bahut hi jyada nuksan ka saamna karna padta hain
aaj ke article mein hum aapke liye lekar aaye hain ki aise fruits aur vegetables ki list aur upay , jinhe khane se aapko garmi se kafi rahat mil jati hain
isey khane se blood pressure control mein rahta hain
kheere mein 96 tak paani hota hain aur 4 tak fiber paya jata hain
isme calorie na ke barabar hoti hain
isme vitamin c bahut hi acchi matraa mein paya jata hain
jo body ki immunity ko boost karta hain
iske alawa aam ko khane se digestive system bhi majboot banta hain
tamatar tomato mein lycopene aur water bharpoor matraa mein hota hain
isey aap salad , soup , ketchup , puree aur sabzi bana kar kha sakte hain
angoor ko khane se digestion sahi rahta hain
angoor sharir ko ors ke ghol ki tarah instant energy dete hain
isse body hydrate rahti hain
watermelon mein vitamin a , b , magnesium , potassium ke alawa jaroori antioxidant bhi hote hain
tarbooz mein calorie na ke barabar hoti hain aur iske sewan se immune system bhi majboot banta hain
kitna khaye 2 se 3 slice tarbooz rojana khana chahiye
08 flu ka upchar karne ke liye jaroor
flu ka upchar karne ke liye jaroor khaye yeh 10 food
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips flu ka upchar karne ke liye jaroor khaye yeh 10 food
general knowledge , health tips a a print email flu aisi bimari hain jo sehatmand insaan ko achanak se bed par daal deti hain
flu ke waqt thakaan hona aur matli aana aam symptoms hote hain
healthy food khane se mareez jald se jald theek ho jata hain
healthy diet hi flu ka best treatment hota hain
flu hone par kuch special food khane chahiye jo body ki immunity ko boost kare
flu ke treatment ilaj ke liye jaroor khaye yeh food
turkey meat turkey ke meat mein zyada protein aur thoda sa fat hota hain , jo body ko energy deta hain
adrak wali chai adrak wali chai peena flu ko door karne ka ek behatarin gharlu upay hain
flu hone par ginger tea peene se araam milta hain
isme flu virus se ladne ki shakti hoti hain
black tea black tea mein antioxidants bharpoor matra mein hote hain
black tea peene se flu ke lakshan door hote hain aur gale ki kharash khatm hoti hain
fruits phal protein aur vitamins ka natural source hote hain
orange , grapes , banana aur apple aadi khane se flu ke duaran sharir ko taakat milti hain
fruits ko khane se body dehydrate hone se bach jati hain
soup fresh vegetables aur chicken se bana hua soup flu mein bahut hi fayda pahuchaata hain
juice flu ka ilaj karne ke liye vegetable aur fruits dono ke juice bahut hi faydemand hote hain
inmehigh protein aur aur kai dusre poshak tatv paye jate hain , jo body ko energetic banate hain
gajar , tamatar , berry aadi ka juice peene se flu se hone wali weakness door ho jati hain
salad flu ke mareez ko khana khane ki bajaye ek plate saladjaroor khana chahiye
mint candy mint candy flu ke dauran gale mein hone wali kharash ko door karti hain
brown bread mein protein ki quantity jyada hoti hain jo sharir ko energy dete hain
isliye brown bread aur garlic ka combination body ko energy deta hain aur immunity ko badhaata hain taaki sharir acchi tarah se flu virus se lad sake

04 kesar ke fayde benefits of saffron in
kesar ke fayde benefits of saffron in hindi urdu
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips kesar ke fayde benefits of saffron in hindi urdu
general knowledge , health tips a a print email kesar se kya fayde hote hain
what is the health benefits of saffron in hindi urdu
kesar ka scientific name crocus sativus hain
isme carotene , lycopene , zeaxanthin , crocin , picrocrocin aadi paye jate hain
dusre chemical compounds mein turpentine turpentine , alcohol aur aldehyde bhi paye jate hain
in chemicals aur carbonic compounds ki mauzoodagi kesar ko anmol aushidhi banati hain
thand mein iske sewan se immunity power badhti hain aur mardanatakat aur beauty ko bhi yeh badhata hain
kesar aapkeliyekaise faydemandhain , kesar ke kya kya fayde hote hain benefits of saffron in hindi urdu
low blood pressure mein yeh behatarin dawa hain
agar pregnant woman pregnancy ke dauran kesar ka sewan karti hain , toh isse uska hone wala baccha healthy hota hain
isme vitamins , calcium aur protein acchi quantity mein paye jate hain , jisse puri body healthy rahti hain
mentally depression aur tension hone par mahilaon ko ise jaroor khana chahiye
sardi mein kesar ka doodh lene se skin beautiful banti hain
dimaag aur nervous system ke liye kesar kisi vardaan se kamnahi hain

health tips a a print email daanto ki sehat banaye rakhne ke liye kuch baaton ka zehan mein rakhna jaroori hain
aisa karne se daanto mein fracture hone ki ashanka bani rahti hain
iske saath hi daanto mein sensitivity ki samsya paida ho jati hain
iske karan daanto mein cavity hone ka khatra samanya se adhik ho jata hain
sakht bristle wale toothbrush kuch logo ko lagta hain ki jitne hard toothbrush ke bristle honge utne hi acche se daant saaf honge
kuch samay baad yeh pyria ka roop le sakta hain
doctor ki salah par toothbrush ka chayan kare
aisa karne se daanto mein cavity hone ki ashanka jyada ho jati hain
iske saath hi rojana flossing bhi ki jani chahiye

brush karne ko kaam na samjhe

general knowledge , health tips a a print email indian food ka important hissa hain papad
side effects of eating papad in hindi urdu
haan papad ke naam se mujhe ek tongue twister ki bhi yaad gayi jo ki aapne bhi suna hoga , lekin is tongue twister ko lagatar bol pana bahut mushkil hain
vah tongue twister yeh hain kaccha papad pakka papad itna chota tongue twister hain , lekin lagatar ise bol pana mushkil bhara kaam hain
acidity ki problem ghar ke banaye gye papad ke mukable bazaaroo yani ki dukaan se khareede gye papad mein artificial flavour aur spices jyada hote hain
preservative ka jyada istemal hota hain papad ko lambe waqt tak fresh banaye rakhne ke liye papad banane wali factory usme preservative aadi milati hain
unhealthy situation mein banaye jane ki sambhavna jis tarah se papad ko banaya jata hain , vah bhi serious problem hain
gram papad mein 35 se40 calorie , sodium 226 mg aur carbohydrate
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips lychee ke fayde
health tips a a print email sabse pahle litchi lychee , lichi , leechi ki kheti 1st century mein south china mein shuru huyi thi
leechi vitamin c aur pottasium ka important source hain
iss pulp ke ander kathayyi rang ka beej hota hain
lichi nutrients ka khazana hain
isme vitamin c , potassium aur sugar hota hain
aaiye jante hain litchi khane ke fayde ke bare mein health benefits of litchi in hindi urdu leetchi mein fiber bahut hi acchi quantity mein hota hain
litchi khane se blood pressure theek rahta hain
leechi mein breast cancer ko rokne ki power hoti hain
ise khane se skin healthy rahti hain
lychee mein anti oxidants bahut zyada matra mein hote hain
leechi mein minerals , calcium , phosphorus , magnesium hote hain jo sharir ke vikas ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
leechi mein vitamin c paya jata hain
hamari skin aur body ki immune system ko healthy rakhta hain

tech tips a a print email aapke gmail account ko chrome par aur bhi safe banane ke liye google ne naya tarika dhoondha hain
google ne apne chrome browser ke liye ek free extension launch kiya hain
jisse aapke google accounts aur e mails se un online attackers se safe rahega , jo aapke passwords aur dusri personal information churane ki koshish karte hain
google account ko safe karne wale extension ka naam hain password alert
ise google chrome par download kiya ja sakta hain
yeh users ko account information dalne se pahle fishing pages ke khilaf alert karta hain
google ne kaha ki har roz lakho fishing emails bheji jati hain
password alert ke lead engineer dru hintz ne kaha , philhaal , yeh tay karna user ke upar hain ki vah apna password dalna chahte hain ki nahi
hame ummid hain ki users in sites ke anter ko samjhenge aur users se is tarah ki request karna beimani hain
is extension ko taiyaar hone mein 3 saal lage
yeh google ke security messenger mein naya audition hain
iske alawa google ki safe browsing technology users ko potation malicious sites aur verification tools ke bare mein warning deti hain
jisse private account safe rahte hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email healthy bane rahne ke liye aapko daily green vegetables aur fruits khane ki jaroorat hain
green vegetables aur fruits ko khane ki salah duniya ke lagbhag sabhi doctors dete hain
ek study se yeh bhi maloom hua hain ki hari sabziyan aur phal khane se heart se related disease hone ka khatra kafi kam ho jata hain
iske alawa hari pattedar sabziyon mein magnesium paya jata hain , jo blood pressure ko control mein rakhta hain
anti oxidants ka khazana green vegetables aur fruits mein anti oxidant bahut hi badhiya matra mein paye jate hain
in anti oxidants ki wajah se body ki immunity strong banti hain
iske alawa hari sabziyon aur phalon mein anti bacterial gun bhi paye jate hain
blood pressure kam kare high blood pressure se joojh rahe logo ko hari sabziyan jaroor khani chahiye
ek study ke mutabik jin auraton ne beans ko khaya , unhe meat khane wali auraton ke mukable jyada healthy paya gya
cholesterol level control mein rakhe avocado ek aisa fruit hain , jise khane se cholesterol level control mein rahta hain
isme fat bahut hi kam hota hain , jisse ise khane se body mein cholesterol nahi badhta hain aur aap hamesha healthy rahte hain
iske alawa edamame mein vitamin a , calcium aur iron bhi kafi acchi matraa mein paye jate hain
isse sharir ka motapa nahi badhta hain aur blood lipid level bhi sahi bana rahta hain
kyonki green vegetables fruits mein vitamin c hota hain jo aapki aankhon ko motiyabind hone se bachaye rakhta hain

08 hing ke fayde benefits of asafoetida
hing ke fayde benefits of asafoetida hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips hing ke fayde benefits of asafoetida 1 health tips a a print email ghar ki rasoi ho ya hotel ki hing asafoetida ka kitchen mein rahna bahut hi jaroori hain
pain killer kisi bhi tarah ke dard mein hing rahat deti hain
isse migraine ka dard , daant ka dard , periods ka dard , normal seer dard aadi ko door kiya ja sakta hain
isme mauzood anti oxidants aur dard nivaarak gun turant dard se rahat dete hain
yeh anti oxidants aur anti inflammatory khoobiyo se bharpoor hone ke karan pet ki gadbad , gas , pet ke keede aur dast se sambandhi dikkato mein turant rahat deti hain
skin problem hing mein kai shaktishali anti inflammatory agents hone ki wajah se iska istemal beauty products mein kiya jata hain
yeh skin par panpane wale corns aur calluses ko theek karti hain
hing ka cooling effect tavcha ki jalan ko kam karta hain aur bacteria ko paida nahi hone deta hain
cancer se bachaav hing ke anti oxidants se koshikao mein free radicals ko phailne ka mauka nahi milta hain
yeh free radicals hi cancer ko badhava dete hain , lekin hing inko phailne se rokta hain aur kai tarah ke cancer se bachata hain
iske alawa hing se luecoria ka bhi ilaj kiya jata hain
periods ki problems mein mahilaon ke aniyamti periods aur periods mein jyada bleeding ko hing ke dwara door kiya ja sakta hain
apne anti inflammatory guno ke karan hing blood vessels ki sujan ko door karta hain jo sirdard ki ahem wajah hoti hain
is paste ko seer par lagaye
migraine mein aaraam milega
kaan dard mein hing ka upyog use of asafoetida in ear pain nariyal tel ko garam kare aur usme chutaki bhar hing ki matra dal kar usay mix kare

aise foods jinme adhik carotenoids paya jata hain , vah fefde aur mooh ke cancer se bachate hain

masudo ki sujan ko door karne ke asaan gharelu upay home remidies for gums swelling hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips masudo ki sujan ko door karne ke asaan gharelu upay home remidies for gums swelling 0 health tips a a print email masudo mein sujan hain to ise door karne ke gharelu nuskhe aur upay kya aap jante hain
masoodho masoodo gums masudho ki sujan ko door karne ke tips kya hain
irritation ke saath hi isme khujali , dard aur sensitivity hoti rahti hain
iske alawa pregnancy mein hormones ke badlaav ki wajah se bhi gums mein swelling aa jati hain
masudho ki samsya ko door karne ke gharelu nuskhe aur upay ajwain ajwain ka istemal bhi masudho ke sujan ki problem ko kafi hud tak kam karta hain , kyonki isme anti bacterial aur anti fungal ke saath hi anti inflammatory gun bhi mauzood hote hain
laung cloves mein mauzood eugenol anti oxidant aur anti inflammatory guno se bharpoor hota hain , jo sujan ke sath sath dard mein bhi araam pahuchaata hain
aloe vera research mein is baat ka pata chala hain ki aloe vera masudo ke sujan ki samsya ko khatm karta hain
aloe vera mein anti inflammatory , anti fungal , anti bacterial aur anti oxidant jaise kai saare gun paye jate hain
sujan ke saath masudho mein khoon aane ki problem mein aloe vera best hain
adrak aur namak ka paste ; adrak anti inflammatory agent ke taur par jana jata hain , jo sujan paida karne wali problems ko door karta hain
baking soda baking soda mein alkine gun hote hain jo mooh ke bacteria ko khatm karne mein bahut hi faydemand hain
nimbu paani nimbu mein anti inflammatory aur alkine ke alawa calcium , potassium , vitamin a , c aur pectine fiber mauzood hota hain , jo na kewal masoodo ki sujan ko door karta hain , balki mooh ki others problems aur bimariyo ko bhi door karne mein bahut kargar hota hain
yeh minerals aur vitamins ki kami ko door karta hain
aise kare istemal 1 glass mein gunguna paani le

05 smartphone ki speed badhane ke 5 tips
smartphone ki speed badhane ke 5 tips
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home android tech tips smartphone ki speed badhane ke 5 tips
android , tech tips a a print email puri duniya mein android smartphone ka market sabse bada hain
halaki ki kabhi kabhi aapka smartphone jyada pressure padne se slow performance karne lagta hain
clean up those apps kisi bhi smartphone mein application ka bhandar nahi rakhna chahiye
phone mein jitne jyada apps install honge , aapka phone utna hi jyada slow perform karne lagega
watch your widgets android smartphone users widget ka jyada istemal karte hain
aise mein sirf useful widget ko hi carry kare
faltu widget ko remove kar de
iske alawa live widgets aur weather widgets phone ki performance par bahut hi jyada asar dalte hain
use a task killer task killer app kisi bhi smartphone ki performance speed badhane mein help karta hain
vaise play store mein advance task killer app maujood hain
live wallpaper must die live wallpaper se jitna bacha jaye , utna hi sahi hain
agar aapke smartphone mein live wallpaper hain , to yeh phone ki performance ko definitely gira dega
get rooted yeh aapke phone ki performance ko badhane ka sabse best tarika hain
iske liye users ko sirf clean dried app ko install karna padega
ek baar jab yeh install ho jayega to iski help se phone ki performance ko asaani se badhaya ja sakta hain

isme amla main ingredient hain jo behad shaktishali anti oxidant mana jata hain
cells ki umar nahi badhne deta
body ke tissues ke poshan str mein sudhar lata hain
free radicals se hone wale nuksaan se aapki skin ko protect karta hain
brain memory , concentration aur alertness ko badhata hain

aapke respiratory system ko majboot karta hain

05 launch hua micromax ka yu yuphoria
launch hua micromax ka yu yuphoria smartphone hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home micromax smartphone launch hua micromax ka yu yuphoria smartphone 0 micromax , smartphone a a print email micromax ne apne naye smartphone yu yuphoria jo ki cynogen os par kaam karta hain usay lauch kar diya hain
metal frame wala yeh phone buffed steel black and champagne gold white color mein milega
is phone ko amzone par exclusively becha jayega
pre booking 12 may se shaam ko 5 baje se shuru hogi
premium feature wale is phone ki keemat company ne 6 , 999 rupaye rakhi hain
inch screen wale yuphoria ke dimension
iske fully laminated ips display par corning gorilla glass 3 protection diya gya hain
made in india label wale is smartphone mein 64 bit
2ghz qualcomm snapdragon 410 quad core chip , adreno 306 gpu aur 2 gb ddr3 ram hain aur 16 gb ki internal storage hain
yeh phone cynogen os 12 par chalta hain
jo ki android
lollipop par adhaarit hain
cynogen ne isme kai saare customization ke options diye hain
yu yuphoria mein 8 megapixel ka rear camera hain , jo hdr mode ke saath 1080 pixel video capture kar sakta hain
primary camera ke saath led flash diya gya hain
ismein 5 mega pixel ka front camera hain , jismein 86 degree wide angle lens hain
connectivity ki baat kare to yeh dual sim phone 3g , 4g cat 4 , tdd lte , indian 4g band , bluetooth
, wi fi aur gps ko support karta hain
is phone mein 2230 mah high density quick charge battery hain
compnay ka yeh dawa hain ki yeh 160 hours ka standby time de sakti hain
enhanced sound ke liye isme ecirrus logic wolfson stereo dca audio chip diya gya hain
05 android lollipop os aur 8mp camera ke
android lollipop os aur 8mp camera ke saat launch hua micromax unite
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home micromax smartphone android lollipop os aur 8mp camera ke saat launch hua micromax unite
micromax , smartphone a a print email micromax company ne apne lokpriya smartphone unite 2 ka naya version unite 3 ko launch kar diya hain
yeh phone company ke official website par list kar diya gya hain
isi ke saath third party online retailer par yeh phone rs
gaurtalab hain ki micromax unite 2 ke baad yeh is series ka teesra phone hain
offer micromax ki official website par is phone ke saath vodafone ki taraf se do mahine tak 500 mb 2g 3g data dene ki baat kahi gyi hain
kya hain khas micromax ka yeh phone series ke baki dono smartphones ki tarah kai languages ko support karta hain
iske saath hi 10 indian languages pre loaded aayengi
is smartphone mein ek aur feature hain ki users english se kisi anya bhasha mein message ko translate kar sakte hain aur iska ulta bhi kar sakte hain
micromax unite 3 smartphone android ke lollipop operating system par kaam karta hain
features ki baat kare to android lollipop operating system par kaam karne wale micromax unite 3 mein unite 2 ki tarah
inch ki screen di gayi hain
iska resolution kafi kam hain 480 x 800 pixel ka resolution
screen size aur picture quality bhi micromax unite 2 jaisi hi hain
unite 3 mein
ghz ka quad core mediatek mtk6582m processor diya gya hain
isme 1 gb ki ram ke saath 8 gb ki internal memory di gyi hain
isse pahle unite 2 ko 4 gb internal memory ke variant mein launch kiya gya tha
micro sd card ki madad se is phone ki memory ko 32gb tak badhaya ja sakta hain
connectivity ke mamle mein is phone mein 3g , gprs edge , wi fi , micro usb aur bluetooth jaise option diye gye hain
camera features ki baat kare to pichle variant ke mukable ise behtar banaya gya hain
unite 3 mein 8 megapixel ka auto focus rear camera aur led flash diya gya hain
pichle variant mein 5 megapixel ka rear camera tha
front camera mein koi badlav nahi kiya gya hain
yeh ab bhi 2 megapixel ka fixed focus camera hain
micromax ne is smartphone mein 2000 mah ki battery di hain
official listing ke anusar is phone ki battery 8 hours ka talk time deti hain
iske alawa 220 hours ka stand by time milega
is phone mein ask me , chats , clean master , facebook , facebook messenger , hot star , news hunt , paytm , quicker , snapdeal jaise apps pahle se hi pre loaded hain

03 mouse se jude kuch interesting facts
mouse se jude kuch interestingfacts
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge tech news mouse se jude kuch interestingfacts
general knowledge , tech news a a print email douglas engelbart ne 1960 mein jab computer mouseka aavishkaar kiya tha , tabunhone ise lakdi ka banaya tha
aaiye aaj ki is post mein jantehain computer mouse sejude history aurkuch interesting facts ke baremein
jis samay 1960 mein douglas ne mouse ko invent kiya tha , oos timecomputer bade badekamrokebarabar hotethay , in machines mein punch card ke jariyedatabharejatethay
mein bill english ne douglas ke sketches kebase parlakdi ka mousebanaya , jise chalane ke liye2 pahiyo ka istemal kiya gya
douglas ne 1968 mein san francisco ke computerconference mein mouseka sabse pahla demonstration diya
jacky holy aur bill english , douglas ke is kaam se behadhi impress thay
unhone usi base parpahla digitalmouse1972 mein xerox parkdesignkiya
is mousemein analogue se digitalmein convert karne nahi hoti thi , yeh seedhe information computerko bhejta tha
mein douglas engelbart ne mouseka patentkaraya tha , unke naam mouse ke alawa 45 aur aavishkaarokepatenthain
douglas ke presentation ke kareeb 20 saal baad 1981 mein mouse istemal keliye market meinavailablehua
xerox star 8010 personal computerskesaath ise becha gya
oos samay computer ki keemat 16000 thi
microsoft nepahlibaar 1983 mein mouseki bikri shuruki
mein logitech ne worldka pahla wirelessmousepeshkiya , jismeradio frequency transmission ka istemal kiya gya
mein logitech ne pahla laser mousemarket mein utaara
is mouseki speed optical mousese20 guna jyada thi
ise english , spanish , italian , german , french , russian samet jyadatar bhashao meinmousekenaam se hi jana jatahain
kaun thay douglasengelbart
douglasengelbart sirfmouse kejanamdaatanahi thay , balki e mail , word processing aurteleconferencing par bhi unhone shuruvaati kaam kiya tha
unke father radio mechanic aur motherhousewifethi
unhone electrical engineering ki degree leneke2ndworld war mein radartechnician ketaur parkaam kiya
uske baad unhonenasa ki society naca mein electrical engineer ki post parkaam kiya
jald hi veh job ko chhod kardoctorateki upaadhi ke liyebarkley stith california university chalegye
baadmein unhone apni augmentation research center kaayam ki
unki research ne arpanetke vikas mein sahyogdiya , jisneaage chalkarinternet ka roop liya
unhe 1997 mein lemelson mit prizesenawaza gya

android , tech news a a print email google ke mobile operating system android par ek aur naya version jald hi shamil hone ja raha hain
google android operating system ke is naye m os android ka philhal koi naam company ki taraf se clear nahi hua hain
google i o ki or se conference jankaro ke mutabik google is naye operating system ke naam ka khulasa is mahine ke last week mein kar sakta hain
iske liye san francisco mein google i o ki or se conference bhi aayojit ho sakti hain
is dauran company android m ke sabhi features ka khulasa kar sakti hain
iske alawa yeh bhi kaha ja raha hain ki google is saal ke aakhir tak is naye android m operating system ko bazaar mein bhi utaar sakta hain
jisse mobile grahko ko is naye android m version ka besbri se intezar hain
lekin logo ka andaja hain ki yeh ab tak ke android version se jyada user friendly aur sharp hoga
m alphabet se hone ke karan kuch log ise macaroo , to kuch ise mudpai naam de rahe hain
02 ghar mein banaye yeh moisturizer aur
ghar mein banayeyeh moisturizer aur dry skin sepaye chhutkara

general knowledge a a print email sardiyo mein hamari skin nami khone lagti hain
aise mein skin ko moisturize karna jaroorihotahain
yu toh bazaar mein kai tarah kebranded aurnon brandedmoisturizer mauzood hain , lekin yehkafimehngehotehain
iske mukable gharelu moisturizerkafifaydemandhotehain
isse skin ka drynessdoorho jayega
yeh moisturizer nahaneke foranbaad laganese skin meinnami barkararrahtihain
isechhan le aur isme2 chamach aloe vera juice mila le
iselagane se skin ka rookhapan door hoga
best results ke liye iseregularly use kare
is mishranseaapki tavchamein freshness aa jayegi
is moisturizerko 3 se 4 din tak istemalkiyaja sakta hain
yeh sensitiveskin walo ke liyekafibehtarhain
yeh kafiaccha body moisturizer hain
yeh skin ko clean bhi rakhta hain
aur lagaye , isse skin mulayam banegi
aloe vera 4 chammach aloe veragelle , 1 chammach badamoil , 1 chammach jaitoon ka telle
in sabhi ko acchi tarahmila le aur room temperaturepar rakhe
yehdryskin walo ke liye best hain
mulayam tavcha ke liyeyeh moisturizer kafi accha saabit hota hain
yehfacekeliye badhiya moisturizerhain

03 body ko strong aur healthy rakhne ke
body ko strong aur healthy rakhne ke liye purush jaroor khaye yeh cheeze
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips body ko strong aur healthy rakhne ke liye purush jaroor khaye yeh cheeze
general knowledge , health tips a a print email purusho ka sharir gathila aur muscles strong ho tabhi veh attractive lagte hain
purush jaroor khaye yeh 16 cheeze , man should must be eat these 16 healthy food
tomato tamatar tamatar mein lycopene ki matra bahut jyada hoti hain
lycopene paudho mein paya jane wale ek natural chemical hain
yeh chemical apne anti oxidants guno ke liye jana jata hain
yeh prostate , fefde aur pet ke cancer ko khatm karta hain
lahsun mein anti bacterial aur anti viral tatv paye jate hain , jo sharir ki rog pratirodhak kshamta ko badhate hain
saath hi isme , anti oxidants gun bhi mauzood hote hain
yeh blood circulation ko tez banata hain
isme fiber , minerals aur kai tarah ke swasthyavardhak anti oxidants paye jate hain
isme amino acid paya jata hain
rojana ek glass anaar ka juice peene se purusho ko prostate ki samsya nahi hoti hain
broccoli broccoli khane se chamatkari labh hote hain
isme paya jane wala isothiocyanate liver ko uttejit karta hain
yeh oon enzymes ka nirmaan mein help karta hain , jo cancer paida karne wale cells ke prabhaav ko kam karte hain
inme vitamin , minerals aur kai poshak tatv aur protein paye jate hain jo muscles ko majboot banate hain
shimla mirch shimla mirch bhi men ke liye beneficial hoti hain
kuch researches ke anusaar lal shimla mirch mein orange ke juice ke mukable 3 guna jyada vitamin c paya jata hain
scientist ki maane toh flavonoids ke liye lal shimla mirch bahut hi badhiya option hain
flavonoids mardo ko sehatmand banata hain
soya ; soya mein mauzood isoflavones prostate ki raksha karte hain
yeh prostate cancer ke khatre ko kam karte hain
rojana 25 gram soya protein ke sewan se cholesterol level ko bhi kam kiya ja sakta hain
dry fruits dry fruits aur nuts dono mein hi bharpoor matra mein protein paya jata hain
purusho ko dry fruits ka sewan niyamit roop se karna chahiye
isme fibers , minerals , vitamin aur anti oxidants paye jate hain , jinse muscles majboot bante hain aur sharirik taakat ke saath saath dimaag bhi tez hota hain
aam mein amino acid , vitamin a , c aur e , niacin , beta carotene , iron , calcium aur potassium paya jata hain
vahi papite mein prayapt matra mein vitamin b aur c ke saath hi anti oxidants bhi mauzood hote hain
in dono phalo ke chhilko mein bioflavonoids paya jata hain
low fat dairy products kam fat wale dairy products jaise doodh , dahi , chhaach aadi mein protein adhik matra mein hota hain
ek cup doodh se lagbhag 8 mg
carnitine milta hain
doodh se bani cheezo mein calcium , vitamin jaise important poshak tatv bhi mauzood rahte hain
raagi raagi calcium ka sabse accha source hain
yeh purusho ko osteoporosis se bachata hain
saath hi , yeh zinc aur fiber ka bhi accha source hain
iske niyamit sewan se dyslipidemia , diabetes aur motape aadi se bhi bacha ja sakta hain
green tea green tea ka sewan bhi purusho ke liye accha hota hain
green tea mein polyphenols bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain
yeh cancer hone se rokta hain
moongfali moongfali mein zinc ke alawa bharpoor matra mein amino acid paye jate hain
yeh amino acid mardo ke liye faydemand hain
google keywords search purusho ke liye best food , best diet food for man in hindi , mardo ke liye uttam aahaar , ,

skin dry ho sakti hain aur baal toot sakte hain
shower ke baad moisturizer na lagaanaa shower lene ke baad skin ka moisturizer kam ho jata hain
isliye tel ya moisturizer lagana chahiye
bahut jyada thande ya phir garm paani se nahana isse baalon aur skin ke tissues damage ho jate hain
skin burn ho sakti hain ya skin sunn bhi ho jati hain

isse skin dry bhi ho sakti hain

isse skin aur body mein infection hone ka khatra kafi jyada badh jata hain

06 7999 rupaye mein launch hua xolo cube
, 999 rupaye mein launch hua xolo cube
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home smartphone xolo 7 , 999 rupaye mein launch hua xolo cube
smartphone , xolo a a print email indian handset maker company xolo ne haal hi mein xolo cube naam se smartphone lauch kiya hain
android lollipop par chalne wale is smartphone ki keemat 7 , 999 rupaye bataya gya hain
company ki aor se yeh smartphone white , black aur golden color mein utara gya hain
specifications hain kuch aise ab baat karte hain phone ke specification ki to phone mein 5 inch ka display diya gya hain , jo ki deta hain aapko 1280 x 720 pixel ka high definition resolution
is smartphone mein ips display par five point ka touch input diya gya hain
saath mein hain mali 400 mp gpu
lollipop ke saath aur kya hain phone mein latest android
aka lollipop os diya gya hain
gb ki internal storage ke saath is par aapko 32 gb tak memory ko expand karne ki suvidha milegi
baat camera ki kare to phone aapko dega 8 megapixel ka rear camera flash ke saath aur selfie click karne ke liye milega aapko 2 mega pixel ka front camera
phone mein rear camera full hd video recording ke saath diya gya hain
connectivity par ek nazar iske alawa xolo cube par connectivity ke naam par 3g , gps , micro usb
, wi fi aadi ki suvidha milegi
is battery par aapko 3g network ke saath 11 hours ka talk time aur 466 hours ka standby time milega
sim dual sim display 5 inch 1280 x 720 pixels hdogs ips display with asahi dragontrail glass protection memory 1gb ram , 8gb internal memory , 32gbexpandable memory with microsd connectivity 3g , gps , agps , wi fi b g n , microusb

05 curry patta ke fayde benefits of curry
curry patta ke fayde benefits of curry leaves hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips curry patta ke fayde benefits of curry leaves 0 health tips a a print email meethe neem ya curry patte ka istemal bhartiya rasoi mein jyadatar tadka lagane ke liye kiya jata hain
curry patte mein 66 moisturizer ,
minerals paye jate hain
curry patte mein vitamin a aur c ke saath anti bacterial aur anti fungal gun hote hain , jo cough ki samsya ko door karte hain
diabetes ke liye research mein yeh paya gya hain ki curry patta blood mein glucose ki matra ko kam nahi karta , balki kafi dino tak usay control bhi karta hain
sharir mein insulin ki sakriyta ko prabhavit karne ke saath blood sugar level ko kam karta hain
anemia problem door karta hain
curry patte mein iron aur folic acid ki bharpoor matra payi jati hain
sharir mein folic acid ke kami se iron acche se observe nahi ho pata hain
is karan anemia ki problem ho jati hain
per 100 gram curry patte mein
ml iron hota hain
research ke anusaar , curry patte mein blood cholesterol ko kam karne wale gun hote hain , jo dil ki bimariyo se bachate hain
anti oxidants ki bharpoor curry patte cholesterol ko oxidize hone se rokte hain , kyonki oxidize cholesterol hi bad cholesterol banata hain , jo kai parkar ki dil ki bimariyo ka karan hota hain
curry patta liver ko oxidative stress se bachata hain , jo machhali aur alcohol mein paye jane wale hanikarak tatv se liver ko bachata hain
vitamin b1 , b3 aur b9 aur c ke saath hi curry patte mein iron , calcium aur phosphorus ki uchit matra hoti hain
is paste ko scalp par laga kar halka massage kare
periods mein hone wale dard se aaraam dilata hain
diarrhea rokta hain
curry patte mein anti bacterial aur anti inflammatory gun hote hain

health tips a a print email kya aap bhi ek din purana yani ki baasi chawal ko khate hain
baasi chawal khane se health ko hone wale benefits
yeh american chemical society ki research mein saabit hua hain
baasi bhaat khane se skin young aur glowing banti hain

06 diabetes ke mareezo ke liye natural
diabetes ke mareezo ke liye natural sugar
artificial sweetener kya hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips diabetes ke mareezo ke liye natural sugar
health tips a a print email chocolate , ice cream , toffy , sweets jyadatar logo ko pasand hote hain
lekin aajkal market mein bahut saare aise artificial sweeteners maujood hain , jinhe log khane ka swaad lene ke liye istemal karne lage hain , par kyonki artificial sweeteners refined sugar ke mukable hanikarak hoti hai , isse sehat ko kai saare nuksan pahuch sakte hain
isliye log aaj kal sugar ke healthy aur natural options ko dhoondh rahe hain
ganne ka juice ham jo ghar mein chini use karte hain , vah kai saari refining process se hokar gujarti hain , jisse uske nutrients , vitamin b , vitamin c , calcium , iron aur meganize khatm ho jate hain
isme potassium , calcium aur vitamin b6 hota hain
iska flavor bhi accha hota hain aur yeh brown sugar ka accha substitute mana jata hain
stevia yeh bhi artificial sugar ke liye best substitute hain
yeh natural sugar hain aur ismein calorie aur carbs bhi kam hain
coconut sugar coconut ko ubalne aur phir sukhane ke baad coconut sugar mitli hain
ismein kai nutrients hote hain
sirf yahi nahi , isme calcium , zinc , iron aur potassium bhi hota hain
jinka sugar level high rahta hain , yeh unke liye bahut hi accha hain
artificial sweetener ka yeh accha substitute hain artificial sweetener kya hain
artificial sweetener ya sugar substitute ek tarah ka chemical hain
kai sugar ya diabetes ke mareez chini ki jagah artificial sugar istemal karte hain , taki vo bhi meetha kha sake
sach yeh hain ki artificial sweetener na to aapka motapa kam karta hain aur na hi aapko slim trim rakhta hain
north eastern oheo university college of medicine ke professor aur chairman doctor rolf watson ke research se yeh baat samne aayi ki artificial sweetener se sar dard , yaddasht ki kami , achanak chakkar aakar gir padna , coma mein jana aur cancer jaise bimariyo ka shikar ho sakte hain
iske alawa yeh sharirik aur mansik rogo ka karan ban sakta hain , jisme alzheimer , chronic thakaan , depression aadi pramukhya hain
artificial sweetener wale drinks aur doosri cheeze khane se taste buds mein change aata hain
yeh preshani kai diabetes logo ko bhi hoti hain , isliye log artificial sweetener lene lagte hain
saath hi , jamkar exercise kare aur fruits khaya kare
skin ke liye hain khatrnaak aap sunder dikhne ki chah mein artificial sweetener khan shuru kar dete hain
khoobsurat dikhne ki chah mein artificial sweetener khane se problem hone lagti hain
iska alawa pigmentation , rashes jaisi dikkate bhi hone lagti hain
jyada artificial sweetener khane se haddiya kamjor ho jati hain
artificial sweetener khane se haddiya kamjor hone lagti hain aur arthritis aur osteoporosis jaisi problems shuru hone lag padti hain
jyada artificial sweetener khane se jodo ki sinning layer khatm ho jati hain , jisse joint mein roughness aane lagti hain
haddiyo mein sujan , khurdrapan , water collection aadi bimariya ho sakti hain

soup sabziyo ka soup hangover mein bade kaam ka ho sakta hain
yeh tasty aur healthy option hain
kele mein mauzood potassium aur carbohydrates aapke sharir ko re hydrate karte hain
breakfast light hi rakhe , lekin usme protein aur carbohydrates jyada ho
anda bread badhiya option ho sakta hain
vegetarians log crackers ya oats kha sakte hain
caffeine se hamare sharir ka blood pressure badhta hain aur iska asar hamare dimaag par padta hain
yeh re hydration mein madadgar sabit hoga aur isme mauzood vitamin c michli se rahat dilata hain
santre , ananas ya mix fruits juice acche options hain

05 ab desh mein taiyaar honge currency
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home finance ab desh mein taiyaar honge currency note ke paper , sabse pahle chhapega 1000 rupaye ka note
finance a a print email ab noto ki chhapaai desi kagaz se hogi aur iske liye kagaz ki pahli khep taiyaar ho gyi hain
shanivar ko ek samaroh mein kendriya mantri arun jaitly ne madhya pradesh ke hoshngabad mein 495 crore rupaye ki lagat vali ' new bank note paper line ' factory ka udghatan kiya
unhone chhapaai ke liye kagaz , currency note nasik press ke liye rawana kiye
hazar metric tone production yaha har saal 6 hajaar tone kagaj ka utpaadan kiya jayega
new bank note paper line mein latest security system laga hua hain
factory se environment ko koi nuksaan nahi hoga
do aur factories lagaai jayengi new paper factory security printing meeting corporation of india limited dwara shuru kiye gye bank note paper ke deshikaran ka ek hissa hain
sutro se mili jankari ke anusar , iske alawa security printing meeting corporation of india ne bank note paper mill india private limited ke saath milkar ek sanyukt upkarm ke tahat mysore mein 12 hajar tone ki capacity wali paper machine ki do extra factories lagaai gyi hain
inmein commercial production is saal ke ant tak shuru ho jayega
3d water mark wale bank note chhapenge is note factory mein vishesh suvidhaon se yukt prayogshala hogi aur online quality monitoring aur control system hoga
paani aur electricity ke upbhog ko kam karne ke liye latest technology ka istamal kiya jayega
yeh factory sabhi mulya varg ke 3 d water mark wale bank note paper ki manufacturing karegi
vahi 2011 12 aur 2012 13 mein yeh krams

juyein khatm karne ke tarike , home remedies for louse , lice
baalo ko kisi kapde ya shower cap se dhak kar rakhe
iske baad mild shampoo se dho le
aur kapoor juon ko apne anti parasitic gun ke karan maarta hain
neem tel neem ka anti bacterial aur anti microbial gun juon se chhutkara dilata hain
petroleum jelly petroleum jelly vaseline ka upyog aam taur par hontho aur skin ki khushki ko door karne ke liye kiya jata hain , par baalo mein laga kar juon se mukti mil sakti hain
vinegar ya sirka sirka ka astringent gun joouon ko khatm karta hain
methi methi ka anti fungal , anti bacterial gun juon se chhutkara dilane mein madad karte hain
05 shimla mirch khane ke fayde benefits of
shimla mirch khane ke fayde benefits of capsicum hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips shimla mirch khane ke fayde benefits of capsicum 0 health tips a a print email har hindustani rasoi mein dekhi jati hain shimla mirch aur bade hi chaav se sabzi ke taur par khaya jata hain
fat aur carbohydrate ki kam matra ke paye jane ke karan yeh sharir ke liye uttam hoti hain
cholesterol control hota hain shimla mirch ko cholesterol ka control karne ke liye herbal expert ati uttam mante hain
modern research se yeh pata chala hain ki shimla mirch body ki metabolism process ko control karke triglycerides ko kam karti hain
shimla mirch mein paye jana vala parmukhya rasayan capsaicin dard nivarak mana jata hain
energy milti hain kai pohsak tatv , vitamin c , fiber aur anti oxidants bharpoor matra mein hone ki wajah se iski adh kachchi sabzi ko behad kargar tonic mana jata hain
arthritis mein fayda modern research ke anusaar shimla mirch mein bete carotene , luetin , zeaxanthin aur vitamin jaise important rasayan paye jate hain
shimla mirch ke lagatar sewan se sharir beta carotene ko retinol mein convert kar deta hain
retinol asal mein vitamin a ka hi ek roop hain
in sabhi rasayano ke dwara heart ki problems , osteoarthritis , bronchitis aur asthma jaisi samsyaon mein jabardast fayda hota hain
tanav door hota hain shimla mirch mein ek pramukhya rasayan lycopene paya jata hain
sharirik shakti badhata hain herbal experts ki mane to shimla mirch sharirik shakti ko majboot banane ke liye ek madadgar upay hain
shimala mirch mein bharpoor matra mein vitamins , khas taur par vitamin a , b aur c hote hain
high blood pressure ko kam karta hain herbal experts shimla mirch ko high blood pressure ko kam karne ke liye mahatvapurn mante hain

09 hume ubaasi kyon aati hain what is
what is reason of yawning in hindi hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge hume ubaasi kyon aati hain
what is reason of yawning in hindi 0 general knowledge a a print email kya aapne socha hain ki kisi dusre person ko ubasi leta dekhkar aapko bhi ubaasi kyon aane lagti hain
yun to ubaasi ek normal physical process hain , lekin isse judi kai chhoti badi baato par hum dhyaan nahi dete hain
jabki princeton university ke scientist dwara kiye gye research mein pata chala hain ki ubasi neend ya boriyat ka sanket nahi hain , balki yeh dimaag ke taapman ko control mein rakhti hain
american academy of sleep medicine mein publish research ke according ubaasi sharir mein oxygen ki kami ki bharpaai bhi karti hain
dimaag apne valves ko thanda rakhne ke liye ubaasi leta hain
mein kiye gye research ke mutabik anuvanshik family relation aur bhavnatmak sentimental roop se jude logo ko ubaasi lete dekh kar adhik ubaasi aati hain
america ke national institute of health ke researchers ne yeh paya ki insaan ko jyada ubaasi aana bhi kafi kuch bayan karti hain

11 custom domain ke fayde kya hain
custom domain ke fayde kya hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home miscellaneous custom domain ke fayde kya hain
miscellaneous a a print email custom domain kya hote hain
custom domain ki puri jankari
custom domain kisi bhi blog ka pata ya address hota hain
blogspot par free mein blog banaya jata hain , jiska url yourdomain
custom domain mein aap blogspot ko delete kar dete hain aur aapki website ka khud ka direct url hota hain jaise ki yourdomain
com , custom domain 2 tarah ke hote hain ek toh main domain jaise ki yourdomain
com aur dusra sub domain
sub domain aise hote hain abc
com , aapka blog agar blogspot par hain toh aapke blog ka url sub domain par hain
isliye custom domain ko set karlene se aapke blog ka address
com mein convert ho jata hain aur aapka blog main domain mein transfer ho jata hain
agar aap blogging ke kshetra mein hain toh aapko pata hi hoga ki custom domain hamare liye kyon jaroori hain
aap chahe wordpress par ho ya blogger ki free services par aap blogspot bloghain toh aapko apna custom domain jaroor khareedna chahiye
custom domain ka kharcha saal bhar mein mahaz 600se lekar 1000 rupees ka hota hain
blogging ki shuruvaat mein hi aap apna domain khareed le aur ise apne blogger ke blogspot blog par set karle
agar aap wordpress ko hosting khareedrahe hain toh 1 saal ke liye har hosting site aapko free mein custom domain deti hain
chahe kuch bhi ho custom domain ke apne fayde hain
custom domain aapko apne blogpar blogging ke starting mein hi set ya add kar lena chahiye
custom domain ke fayde
why add set custom domain on your blog in hindi urdu
custom domain ko shuru mein set kar lene se aapka blog , ab blog nahi rahta hain , balki yeh ekwebsite mein convert ho jata hain
com website jaisa feeling aati hain aur yeh
com wala blog ab website mein change ho gya hain , jise users visitors bahut hi like karte hain
custom domain ka sabse bada fayda yeh hain ki google adsense account ko approve karnwane mein yeh bahut faydemand rahte hain
jaha india or pakistan jaise countries mein kisi bhi new blog par google adsenseke ads dikhane ke liye google adsense account ko approve karwane ke liye , google aapke blog ki age 6 months maangta hain
vahi par agar aap apne blog par custom domain set kar lete hain toh aap apni websiteko sirf 10 15 dino mein google adsense account approve karwa letehain
yani ki google custom domain ko bahut hi pasand karta hain
isse aap google adsense account ko easily approve karwa sakte hain
blog par custom domain set karne se jab aap google adsense account approve karwate hain toh aapka google adsense account non hosted account mein approve hota hain
jabki blogspot blog se approve karwane par aapko hostedaccount milta hain
non hosted google adsense account ka sabse bada fayda yeh hain ki aap ab apni kisi bhi nayi website par apne google adsense ads ko dikha sakte hain
google se nayi websitepar ads dikhane ke liye baar baar permission nahi leni padti hain
yani ki custom domain blog ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
khud ka domain lene se aapke blog ko jo ki ab website mein convert ho gyi hain , jiski wajah se alexa aapki website ko sahi tarike se rankdeta hain
kyonki blogspot blog hone ki wajah se aapka blogke kai kai saare url ban jate hain , jaise ki blogspot blogindia mein blogspot
in , pakistan mein blogpot
com , uae mein blogspot
ae isi tarah har country ke hisaab se different different url mein convert ho jati hain , jiski wajah se alexa ko harurlki alag alagrank karna padta hain
jisse aapke blog ki alexa ranking par asar padta hain
jisse veh asaani se rank karti hain aur isse aapke blog jo ki ek website mein change ho gyi hain , usay alexa ranking mein jabardastuchaal milta hain , agar aapke blogpar zyada visitors aate ho
kai saare aise ads networks hote hain , jinke ads dikhane ke liye vehaapse apni website ki demand karte hain , jaise ki taboola aadi companiesaapko publisher account dene ke liye custom domain ki requirement maangte hain
isliye custom domain aapke liye sahi hain
custom domain se googlesearch console aapke blogki acchi tarah se sitelinks banata hain
kyonki sitelinks aapke website ko search engine par aur bhi jyada attractivebana dete hain
custom domain se aapka blog website mein convertho jata hain , user ko lagta hain ki yeh websitehain
ads companies bhi custom domain ki aor attract hoti hain
customdomain set kar lene se jab aap apna blogspot blogwordpress par transfer karte hain toh aapka apne pahle wale custom domain ko set kar sakte hain , jisse aapki blog ki ranking mein koi khas bura asarnahi padta hain
custom domain ki wajah se aapko non hosted adsense account milta hain , jisme aapki website custom domain hone ki wajah sematched content ads ke liye aapki easily approve ho jati hain
jabki blogspot url mein aapki blog hone ki wajah se google kabhi bhi aapke blog ko matched content ads ko approve nahi karta hain
custom domain hone ki wajah se google adsense aapko non hosted account deta hain , jisme aap search ads units bana sakte hain
jabki blogspot se aapko hosted account mein search ads unit banane ki suvidha available nahi hoti hain
matlab aap kisi khas time ke liye custom domain khareedte hain , time period khatm ya expire hone se pahle aapko ise dubara se renewal karwana padta hain
custom domain ka url kaisa hona chahiye
custom domain aapko koshish karni chahiye ki
com wala hi khareede , kyonki isse aapki website ko universal effect milta hain
net wale domain thode mahange hote hain , lekin country specific wale domain jaise ki
yeh globalize touch dete hain
custom domain ka url bahut bada nahi hona chahiye
custom domain ka url aisa hona chahiye ki user ise asaani se yaad rakh sake
custom domain ka url unique ho toh aur bhi behtar hain
custom domain ka url aam bol chaal mein istemal hone wale common words mein hona chahiye , jisse user ko aapki website ka address easily yaad rahe
googlecustom domain ko bahut hi zyada like karta hain
aap chahe toh blogger keblogspot blog par hi sirf 600 rupaye mein hi apna custom domain set kar sakte hain
blogging ki duniya mein blog par custom domain set karne se aapke blogka wajan badhta hain
alexa rankingincrease hotihain
finally meri yahi salah hain ki aap blogging ke starting mein hi custom domain setkarle
kai experts toh yeh kahenge ki custom domain ko baad mein bhi set kiya ja sakta hain
blogging ki shuruvaat mein custom domain set kar lene se blogging ko aurbhi behtar banaya ja sakta hain
04 facebook lekar aaya hain true caller

smartphone , tech news a a print email facebook ne android smartphone ke liye ek naya voice calling app pesh kiya hain
gaurtalab hain ki whatsapp ne bhi hal hi mein android aur ios ke liye calling feature ko launch kiya hain
hello ' naam ka yeh stand alone app facebook ke creative labs ka 7th app hain
iske ilawa facebook ne hal philhal mein news reading app paper , video sharing app riff jaise kuch product nikale thay , jinhe khas saflata nahi mil saki thi
chunki yeh facebook se connected hain , hello users apne caller ke pehchan ke baare mein jan sakte hain
chahe wo unki contact list mein ho yaa nahi ho
hello app phil hal america , brazil aur nigeria mein hi uplabadh hain
kull milakar , hello apke phone mein voice dialer ko replace karne ke liye hain
lekin users mauzooda apps ko hatakar facebook branded apps install karenge , iss baat mein doubt hain
isse pahle facebook ne home apps ke jariye smartphone ki home screen ko badlne ki koshish ki thi , jise users ne jyada pasand nahi kiya tha
tambe ke bartan mein paani peene ke fayde benefits of copper vessels water hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips tambe ke bartan mein paani peene ke fayde benefits of copper vessels water 0 health tips a a print email tambe copper ke bartan vessels utensils mein paani water peene ke fayde benefits bahut jyada hote hain
lekin purane jamane mein jab water purifier nahi hote thay , tab log tambe ke bartan mein water ko store karke rakhte thay
ise bahut hi accha purifier mana jata tha
yeh fungal , algie aur paani mein mauzood kai kism ke bacteria aur germs ko easily destroy kar deta hain
copper se body ko aur kis kis tarah se benefits milta hain aaiye jante hain
aaj hum aapko batane ja rahe hain tambe ke bartan mein rakhe paani ko peene se hone wale kuch behatrin faydo ke baare mein paani se hone wali bimariyo se bachata hain copper paani mein mauzood sabhi tarah ke bacteria , specially e coli s aureus ko destroy karne ke helpful hota hain
yeh bacteria diarrhea , dentistry aur jaundice jaisi bimariya paida karte hain
saal 2011 mein university of south hampton mein yeh paya gya ki copper in bimariyo ki sambhavna ko khatm karne ke saath hi inke infections se bhi bachata hain
digestion sahi rakhe acidity , gas aur kabz jaisi preshani se door rahna chahte hain to tambe ke bartan mein rakha hua paani piye
saath hi , liver aur kidney function ko bhi sahi rakhta hain
weight kam kare digestion sahi rakhne ke saath hi tamba fatty cells ko badhne se bhi rokta hain
isse motapa control mein rahta hain
tambe ke bartan mein paani peene ke alawa diet aur exercise par bhi pura dhyaan dena chahiye
dil ka rakhe khyaal tambe mein mauzood minerals cardiovascular health ke saath hi dil se judi problems ko bhi door rakhte hain
blood pressure ke level ko sahi rakhne ke saath yeh bad cholesterol ko kam karte hain
saal 2005 mein european health journal mein chhapi ek report ke mutabik , tambe ke bartan mein rakha paani har tarike se faydemand hota hain
heart attack ke khatre se bachne aur blood pressure ko control mein rakhne ke liye tambe ke bartan mein store kiya hua paani piye
skin ko rakhe healthy jyadatar log healthy skin ke liye tarah tarah ke cosmetic ka upyog karte hain
vey mante hain ki acche cosmetics use karne se skin beautiful ho jati hain , lekin yeh sach nahi hain
niyamit roop se is nuskhe ke upyog se aapki skin glowing aur healthy rahne lagegi
melanin skin ko ultra violet rays se bhi bachata hain saath hi scars ko door karke chehre ke daag dhaboo ko door karta hain
anti aging ka kaam karta hain copper bahut hi accha anti oxidant hota hain , jo samay se pahle nazar aane wale budhape ko door karta hain
yeh free radicals damaging ko rokta hain , jisse wrinkles , skin par nazar aane wali baareek lines aur dhag dhabbe door hote hain
thyroid mein aaram thyroxine hormone ke unbalance ke karan se thyroid ki bimari hoti hain
thyroid experts mante hain ki copper ke touch wala paani sharir mein thyroxine hormone ko balance karta hain
thyroid ki samsya ko door karne mein tambe mein mauzood minerals bahut hi jyada upyogi hote hain
tambe ki kami se thyroid gland sahi tarike se kaam nahi karta
isse dil , dimaag , liver aur kidney prabhavit hote hain

05 lenovo ne launch kiya lenovo s60 sirf
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home lenovo smartphone lenovo ne launch kiya lenovo s60 sirf rs
lenovo , smartphone a a print email lenovo india ne apna naya s series smartphone s60 launch kar diya hain
dual sim adhaarit lenovo s60 android kitkat
par kaam karta hain aur isme lenovo ka vibe
user interface hain
company ne ek press conference mein confirm kiya hain ki yeh handset android
lollipop upgrade hassil karega
lenovo s60 mein 5 inch ki hd 720 x 1280 pixel resolution wali ips display hain
is phone mein 64 bit
ghz quad core quallcomm snapdragon 410 msm8916 processor hain , jiske saath 2 gb ram ko couple kiya gya hain
isme 8 gb ki inbuilt storage hain , jise micro sd card ki madad se 32 gb tak expand kiya ja sakta hain
s60 mein 13 megapixel primary auto focus camera hain aur 5 megapixel ka fixed focus front camera hain
primary camera ke saath led flash hain aur yeh scene detection , face recognition , low light enhancement , panorama , geo tagging , burst short aur hdr options features ke saath aa raha hain
lenovo s60 4g ko support nahi karta hain , aur yeh 3g , gprs edge , wi fi
b g n , micro usb aur bluetooth connectivity options ke saath aata hain
is phone mein 2150 mah battery hain , jo officially list ke mutabik 3g network par 17 ghanto ka talk time aur 240 ghanto ka standby time deta hain
philhaal yeh phone sirf grey color mein listed hain
ismein accelerometer , ambient light censor , magnetometer aur proximity censor bhi hain
is phone ki keemat lenovo ne 12 , 999 rupaye rakhi hain
dusre lenovo handsets ki tarah , lenovo s60 mein kuch priority doit apps aur secureit hain , jinse user apne data use ko analysis aur optimize kar sakta hain
iske alawa shareit ke jariye phone to data bina wi fi ya mobile network ke transfer kiya ja sakta hain

android , apps , smartphone a a print email kai baar zyada heavy games hone ki wajah se smartphone ki speed , data aur memory mein bahut asar padta hain
mb is game mein aapko skating karni hoti hain
isme aane wali rookavato aur hurdles ko aapko paar karna hota hain
is game mein speed par bhi kafi dhyaan dena padta hain
yeh game google play store se free mein download kiya ja sakta hain
skater boy ko download karne ke liye yaha click kare
bottle shot is game mein fingers ki help se bottle ko todna hota hain
iski sabse badi khasiyat iski graphics hain
yeh light game hote huye bhi 3d jaise iskegraphics hain
is game mein aap naye se naye high score bana sakte hain
yeh game google play store mein free mein download kare
is game mein aapke performance ke basis par aapke dimaag ki umar test kiya jayega
iske alawa is game mein aap apni short term memory bhi check kar sakte hain
test ke results global scoreboard mein post kare aur usaydusre users ke saath compare kare

mb is game mein ants yani ki chhintiyo ko pakadna hota hain
is game ko google play store se free mein yaha click karke download kare
hill climb racing is game ko pahado ke different raasto par gaadi ko chalana hota hain
gaadi ko chalate waqt aapko points collect karne honge
unchaai se bike ya vehicle ko nikaalne ke bhi points milte hain
in points ki madad se aap bus se lekar jeep , tanker yaha tak ki rail jaise vehicle chalane ke liye khareed sakte hain
is game ko google play store se free mein download kare
racing moto racing game ke shaukin users ke liye yeh ek accha time pass ban sakta hain
is game mein aapko traffic se bachna hota hain
aap speedometer ke jariye apni speed check kar sakte hain
iske graphics kafi acche hain
yeh ek motion sensor game hain
google play store se free mein ise download kare
mb purane dino ki baat kare to snake game ko kaun bhool sakta hain
lekin android user ke liye yeh game abhi bhi play store mein mauzood hain
isme 9 original aur 3 extra level hain
yaha click karke download kare
07 diabetes control karne ke liye jaroor
diabetes control karne ke liye jaroor khani chahiye yeh 5 cheeze
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips diabetes control karne ke liye jaroor khani chahiye yeh 5 cheeze
general knowledge , health tips a a print email diabetes ki bimari hone par mareez ko apne khane peene ka vishesh dhyaan rakhna padta hain
agar aapko bhi diabetes hain to aapko neeche batayi gyi khane wali in 5 special cheezo ko jaroor khana chahiye
kyonki in cheezo ko khane se diabetes ko control karne mein madad milti hain
diabetes control karne ke liye jaroor khaye yeh 5 cheeze
sage ke patte khaye sage sej ke patte khane se insulin secretion aur activity mein badhotri hoti hain , jo pro diabetic situation mein blood sugar ko control rakhta hain
iske alawa yeh liver ke kaam karne ki capacity ko bhi badhaata hain , jisse aapki body ki immunity bhi increase hoti hain
beans jaroor khaye fiber se bharpoor beans ko khane se diabetes ko control mein rakhne mein kafi help milti hain
isliye apne breakfast mein beans salad jaroor khaye
khajoor mein fiber acchi matraa mein hote hi hain , saath hi isme antioxidant bhi bharpoor matraa mein paye jate hain
khajoor mein angoor , santra aur broccoli jaise fruits aur vegetables se jyada matra mein antioxidant paye jate hain
patsan ke beej mein blood sugar level aur cholesterol ko kam karne ki power hoti hain
isse heart attack , dil ki bimariyan aur cardiovascular diseases se ladne mein madad milti hain
doodh aur dahi doodh aur dahi mein calcium aur vitamin d bharpoor matraa mein paye jate hain
yeh blood sugar level ko control karne mein madad karte hain
iske liye aap cottage cheese aur low fat yogurt ko apne khane mein shamil kare

iske liye aap dead list , military prey , bench press , squirts aur bhi kasrat karke apne muscles ko healthy rakh sakte hain

isliye healthy khana khaye
calorie par dhyaan de agar aap chahte hain ki aapka wajan badhe toh iske liye apni diet mein calorie ka sewan jyada kare

smartphone , xolo a a print email xolo ne apna latest android
lollipop handset bharat mein lauch kar diya hain
company ki or se yeh naya handset bharat mein kam budget wale consumers ko dhyaan mein rakhkar utaara gya hain
display aur ram par ek nazar is smartphone ke features ki baat kare to is par
inch ka ips display diya gaya hain
is par 854x480 pixel , 218 ppi ka resolution diya gya hain
iske alawa phone mein 8 gb ki internal memory hain , jise micro sd card ki madad se 32 gb tak badhaya ja sakta hain
others features phone par camera ki agar baat kare to is par aapko mil raha hain 5 mega pixel ka auto focus rear camera aur saath hi aap is par full hd video ko bhi record kar sakte hain
mega pixel ka selfie camera diya gya hain
is 3g dual sim xolo prime par 1800 mah ki battery di gyi hain
agar connectivity ki baat kare to isme aapko wi fi , bluetooth , gps , 3g ki suvidha milegi
yeh phone aapko black , blue aur golden color mein available hoga

08 fast food hame kaise nuksaan pahuchate
fast food hame kaise nuksaan pahuchate hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips fast food hame kaise nuksaan pahuchate hain
health tips a a print email jab american scientist michael jacobson ne saal 1972 mein junk food word ka pahli baar istemal kiya tha to unka matlab kabad jaise khane se tha
bharat mein fast food ka bazaar 2020 tak
arab dollar ka ho jayega
burger matra 100 gram calorie 295 fat 14 burger high calorie food hain
in 3 reasons ke karan burger hain hanikarak 1 mayonnaise sauce ek double hamburger mein
gram saturated fat aur 172 mg cholesterol hota hain , jabki mayonnaise sauce mein
gram saturated fat aur 26mg cholesterol hota hain
non veg burger mein cholesterol ka khatra aur jyada hota hain
saath hi , tel blood mein cholesterol aur body mein fat badha deta hain
burger se unsaturated aur trans fat dono hi badhte hain
sodium mayonnaise ke saath ek double hamburger mein
gram sodium hota hain , jabki ek vyakti ko ek din mein
gram se adhik sodium nahi lena chahiye
is tarah , ham burger se blood pressure aur kidney ke rogo ka jokhim badh jata hain
noodles ke jariye mono sodium glutamate msg sharir mein jata hain , jo kidney rog , migraine , hypertension aur heart attack ka karan ban sakta hain
inme nutrients nahi ke barabar lagbhag 6 hote hain
instant noodles ko preservative ke saath boxes mein pack kiya jata hain
band cup mein plasticizers mil jate hain , jisse cancer ka jokhim badh jata hain
research ki finding consumer education research center ne ek research mein duniya ke 15 main noodles brands ko shamil kiya
in noodles mein salt ki matra jyada aur fiber ki quantity bahut kam payi gyi
is research se yeh sabit ho gya ki noodles se migraine aur chid chidapan ho sakta hain
fiber ki kam matra se colitis aur namak ki jyada matra se tension ki problem ho sakti hain
pizza matra 100 gram calorie 151 sodium
gram ke ek pizza slice mein
gram fat hota hain
american agriculture department ki ek report ke anusaar ki namak sodium ke 3 big source mein pizza bhi ek hain
inch ke ek small cheeze pizza mein lagbhag 1200 calorie hoti hain
research ki finding ; pizza banane mein istemal kiya jane wala anaaz pet ki charbi ko badhata hain
yeh baat american journal of clinical nutrients ke research mein sabit hui hain
isi tarah , howard medical school mein hui ek study ke anusaar pizza khane se aant sambandhi bimariyo hone ki sambhavna kafi badh jati hain , vahi abdominal fat se type 2 , diabetes , breast cancer aur dil ke rog hone ka jokhim hota hain
fast food baccho ke liye hain ghatak international study of asthma allergies in childhood ne ek survey kiya hain
in survey ke anusaar , junk food khane wale baccho mein allergy , rhinitis aur eczema ke mamle jyada dekhe gye
fast food ke yeh viklap option acche sabit ho sakte hain
yeh low calorie aur sugar free hota hain
isme wheat biscuits , high fiber cookies aur dusre bakery products istemal kiye ja sakte hain
corn corn junk food ka good option hain
isme carbohydrate , protein , vitamins aur anya minerals hote hain
namkeen aur meetha , dono tarah ka daliya junk food ko better option ho sakta hain

08 music ke fayde benefits of listening of
music ke fayde benefits of listening of music hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips music ke fayde benefits of listening of music 0 health tips a a print email music sirf hamare mood ko hi nahi , balki health ko bhi fit rakhti hain
kai researches aur study se yeh baat sabit ho chuki hain
music sabke liye hain faydemand purush university of gothenburg ne apni study mein paya ki jo purush rojana music sunte hain , unme positive emotions jyada aate hain
isi karan unki personal life aur professional life behtar banti hain
mahila ek american study mein daawa kiya gya hain ki jo mahilaye pregnancy ke dauran music sunti hain , unhe labor pain kam hota hain
bacche chinese university of hong kong ki ek research ke mutabik , jo bacche music ki class lete hain , vey academic mein bhi behtar hote hain
ek anya research ke mutabik , aise bacche jyada cooperative hote hain
bujurg university of kansans medical center ne study mein paya ki jo log music ki training mein adhik involve rahte hain , budhape mein unka dimaag behtar tarike se kaam karta hain
music songs sunane ke fayde benefits of listening music
back pain kam hoga nervous system ka part hota hain autonomic nervous system
yeh part blood pressure ko control , heart beat aur brain function ke liye jimmevar hota hain
music isi part par asar dalta hain , vo bhi positive
jab koi slow music play kiya jata hain to heart beat aur blood pressure bhi slow hoti hain
isse gale , kandhe , pet aur back mein muscle tension kam hoti hain aur gambhir back pain ki samysa se rahat milti hain
research austria ke general hospital of salzburg ne apne ek research mein yeh paya ki music back pain mein rahat dilata hain
yeh research 21 se 28 saal ki umar ke 645 mareezo par ki gyi thi
is research mein yeh paya gya ki back surgery ke baad jin mareezo ne music therapy li , unhe surgery ke baad back pain mein kafi aaram mila
memory loss mein aaram music sunane se hamari yaddasht behtar hoti hain
iska karan hain ki dimaag ka jo part music process karta hain , theek uske paas wala part yaddasht se juda hua hota hain
isliye music ka memory se gahra nata hain
research is sambandhi norway mein sogn og jordan college mein ek research ki gyi
is research mein kamjor yaddasht walo ko music therapy di gyi , to unme se 2 3 mareezo ka orientations badha aur unki memory loss mein kafi sudhaar aaya
isse depression kam ho jata hain
relaxing se muscles ko aaram milta hain aur saans behtar tarike se li jati hain
research is silsile mein haal mein hi tokyo science of university mein ek research ki gyi
is research mein yeh paya gya ki music vakai mein manushya ki chinta , tension aur depression ke levle ko kam kar deta hain
depression aur tension ko door karne ke liye classical music sabse jyada madadgar hain
aisa muscles ke relax ke karan hota hain
research is sambandh mein hui ek research ke tahat baccho ke 3 groups ko words aur music dono ke madhyam se surgery ki jankari di gyi
jisse exercise karte waqt mood behtar rahta hain aur high intensity exercise karte samay hone wale discomfort ka asar kam hota hain
music sunane se endorphin hormone bhi release hota hain jo mood ko behtar karta hain aur lambe samay tak exercise karne ke liye prerti karta hain
research america ke hampden sydney college ke dr
robert ne apni ek research mein cyclist ki madad se yeh jana
facts 26 ke lagbhag blood vessels ka diameter badh jata hain , joyful music sunane ke baad
university of maryland ki research ke mutabik , music sunana dil ki bimariyo ko rokne mein sabse jyada faydemand hain
ek aur research mein yeh paya gya ki jo cancer patient apne treatment ke saath saath music therapist ke pass bhi jate hain , vey apni bimari ko lekar jyada positive hote hain

heartburn ko door karne ke liye10 food
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips heartburn ko door karne ke liye10 food
general knowledge , health tips a a print email jyada tala aur bhoona khane se kaiproblems hote hain , jinme se heartburn bhi ek hain
heartburn hone par seene ke nichle hisse mein jalan mahsoos hoti hain
jab heartburn hone lagta hain pet aur seene mein dard , sujan , gastric problem , gale mein khatta swaad aur matli aane lagti hain
agar aap ghar ka bana khana kam khate hain aur fastfoodjaise pizza , burger , noodles aadi ko zyada khate hain toh aapko heartburnkiproblemho sakti hain
example ke taur par nariyal ka paani heart burn se chhutkara dilane mein kafi hud tak kargar hain
issi tarah se kai food hain jisse aap natural tarike se heart burn se chhutkara pa sakte hain
aaiye jante hain heart burn ko door karne wale food kebare mein
seb isme phenolic phytochemicals jaise quercetin aur carbohydrates hote hain , jo heart burn ko theek karta hain
mulethi isme fiber hota hain jo heart burn ko door karne ke liye natural medicineke taurpar istemal kiya jata hain
yeh cholesterol ko observe karta hain aur gastric acid ko banne se rokta hain
papita ; ismepapain naam ka enzyme hota hain jo pachan kriya ko sahi karta hain
yeh heart burn se nijaatdilata hain
nimbu isme acetic acid hota hain jo heart burn ko doorkarta hain aur pachan kriya ko bhi badhata hain
aloe vera juice iska juice gastric acidbanane wale bacteria komaarta hain
isme vitamin a , b1 , b2 , b3 , c aure hota hain jo ki ek natural astringent hainaur yeh heart burn ko door karta hain
sea food sea food khayiye , khas karke macchali kyonki isme taurine hota hain , jisse gastric acid kam banta hain
orange yeh citrus phal chahe swaad mein khatta meethaho , lekin yeh heartburn ki problemke liye accha hota hain

jiske jariye wah rich push notification se din bhar ke best twits ka ek digest bhejega
the verge ke mutabik , twitter ka yeh naya feature shuruvat mein sirf android platform ke liye available hoga
twitter ke gorden look ne thursday ko ek blog post mein likha hain , aapki home timeline browse karne aur twits se engage hone ke liye ek behtarin jagah hain , lekin ham jante hain ki is par mauzood har cheez ko dekhne ka time nikaal pana kafi mushkil hain
aap jin logo ko follow karte hain , unke top twits , trending stories aur bahut kuch dekh sakenge
aapki highlights create karne ke liye twitter unn accounts aur conversation ko dekhta hain , jo logo ke beech popular hain
jinhe aap follow karte hain unke twits bhi dekhata hain , jinse aapke kareebi rishtey hain aur aapke ilake ke trending topics aur events ke baare mein bhi batata hain
jab aap aakhiri highlight par pahuch jayenge , to ek aur swipe kar apni home timeline par pahuch sakenge
