02 wajan kam karne wale soup
wajan kam karne wale soup
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips wajan kam karne wale soup
health tips a a print email har koi chahta hain ki uski body fit , slim aur shape mein rahe
halaki busy lifestyle aur tension bhari job se diet mein unbalance aa jata hain , jisse wajan par effect padta hain
wajan kam karne wale soup soup for weight loss hara pyaaz aur aaloo ka soup wajan kam karne ke liye aap is soup diet ko apna kar sharir ko jaroori poshak tatv bhi upalabdh karwa payenge
aap ise multigrain bread ke saath lekar kam fat wala halfa breakfast kar sakte hain
isme fat aur sugar kam hota hain aur yeh protein aur fiber ka behtarin source hain
broccoli soup ho sakta hain ki aapko broccoli pasand na ho , lekin yeh tezi ke saath wajan kam karne ke liye asardaar soup hain
gram broccoli soup mein kareeb
gram fat paya jata hain
masoor daal ka soup masoor daal ka soup bahut healthy hota hain aur yeh protein , vitamin aur fiber se bhara hota hain
masoor daal ke 100 gram soup mein sirf
brown rice ke saath chicken soup wajan tezi ke kam karne wale soup mein yeh soup na sirf tasty hota hain , balki isme sodium kam aur protein jyada matra mein paya jata hain
chicken ke saath 100 gram brown rice soup mein sirf
wajan kam karne wale is soup mein aapko jaroori potassium , protein aur fiber bhi mauzood hote hain
isme fat aur sugar kafi kam matra mein paye jate hain aur yeh vitamin c ka behtarin source hain
wajan kam karne wale is 100 gram soup mein kewal
safed bean soup safed bean soup wajan kam karne wali diet ka ahem hissa hain
mushroom soup 100 gram mushroom soup mein kewal
yeh sharir ke liye jaroori protein muhaiya karwata hain aur extra weight ko effective tarike se kam karta hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips periods ke tez dard ko kam karne ke gharelu nuskhe aur upay
general knowledge , health tips a a print email ladies mein periods har mahine mein hone wala ek natural process hain jo ki 4 5 din tak rahta hain
is dard ki wajah prostaglandins hain
jo ultras grabhashay , womb ke paas nikalne wala ek hormone hota hain
yeh hormone delivery ke dauraan bhi active rahta hain
isse womb ki lining bahar nikalti hain
saath hi smoking , alcohol aur drugs lene se yeh samsya aur badh jati hain
adrak periods shuru hone se pahle paani mein adrak ko ubaale aur usme shahad mila kar piye
khatti cheezo ko avoid kare periods ke ek hafta pahle se hi khatti aur thandi cheezo se parhez karna shuru kar de
namak khana kam kare periods mein bloating hona aam baat hain
papita papite mein mauzood anti inflammatory tatv , dard mein aaram dilata hain
iske alawa isme carotene , iron , calcium aur vitamin a jaise nutrients bhi mauzood hote hain , jo blood clotting nahi hone dete hain , saath hi muscles contraction ko bhi rokte hain
lavender oil apne pet ke paas lavender oil lagane se pet dard aur ainthan se 10 15 minutes mein hi aaram mil jata hain
inme mauzood vitamins aur minerals body ki kai saari jaroorato ko pura karta hain
iske alawa inke anti oxidants body se toxins ko bahar nikalte hain
ajwain kitchen mein mauzood ajwain in dino ko bahut hi asaan bana sakti hain
lag bhag 5 minutes boil karne ke baad , ise chhankar pee le
pineapple ananas mein bromelain jo ki protein digestive enzyme ka mixture hain mauzood hota hain , jo dard mein aaram dilata hain

lenovo , smartphone a a print email chinese handset maker company lenovo ne thursday 20 august 2015 ko india ka sabse sasta 4g smartphone launch kar diya hain
lenovo a2010 abhi tak bharat india ka sabse sasta cheapest 4g smartphone mana ja raha hain
lekin isse aane wale samay mein 4g smartphone aur saste hone ki umeed badh gyi hain
inch ki hain display lenovo company ne apne is naye smartphone a2010 mein android ka operating system diya hain
ghz ka 64 bit quad core mediatek mt6735m processor milega
vahi lenovo a2010 mein aapko 1 gb ki ram milegi
agar iske storage capacity ki baat kare to isme 8gb ki internal memory milegi , jise 32 gb tak micro sd card ke dwara expand kiya ja sakega
mp ka rear camera lenovo company ne apne is naye handset a2010 ko kafi stylish banaya hain
iska beautiful design users ko attract kar sakta hain
iske saath hi 2 megapixel ka front camera bhi mauzood hoga
agar connectivity ki baat ki jaye to lenovo a2010 mein 4g , 3g , bluetooth , wi fi , gps aadi ki suvidha milegi
battery back up mein bhi yeh jabardasht hain
color variants mein yeh aapko black aur white 2 rango mein milega

05 moongphali ke tel ke fayde benefits of
moongphali ke tel ke fayde benefits ofpeanut oil in hindi urdu
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips moongphali ke tel ke fayde benefits ofpeanut oil in hindi urdu
general knowledge , health tips a a print email moongfali ke tel ke fayde kya fayde hain
moongphali peanut oil ke tel se kya fayde aur benefits hote hain
lekin agar aap isse hone wale healthy benefits ke baare mein jannenge toh aap dekhenge ki isme dusreoils ke mukable jyada gun hote hain
peanut oil mein cholesterol level ko kam karne , heart ko healthy rakhne , hajma durust rakhne aur cancerjaisi bimari se ladne ke gun hote hain
is tel mein sehat ko behtar banane wale oleic acid , stearic acid , palmitic acidaur linolenic acid paye jate hain
isme fatty acid unbalanced quantity mein nahi hota hain , jiski wajah se body mein fat bhi nahi badhta hain
aaiye jante hain moongfali ke tel se sehat ko hone wale fayde health benefits of peanut oil in hindi urdu
sugarkemareezo ke liye faydemand jin logo ko diabetes ki problem hain unhe specially moongphali ke tel ka sewan karna chahiye
is tel ke istemal se body mein insulin sahi quantity mein bani rahti hain
iska istemal karne se blood mein glucose level normal rahta hain auryehblood sugar level ko control mein rakhta hain
moongfali ka tel cholesterol ke liye bahut hi accha hain
is tel se massage karne se skin glow karnelagti hain
pet ki problems door kare moongphali ka tel ka istemal karne se pet ki kai problems door ho jati hain
dandruff door kare agar aap dandruff se preshan rahte hain toh apne baalo mein moongphali ka tel lagaye
yeh dandruff ko hatane ke liyenatural anti septic ka kaam karta hain aur dandruff ko door karta hain
blood circulation sahi rakhe moongphali ke tel mein linolenic acid hota hain , jo body ke blood circulation ko sahi banaye rakhta hain
aromatherapy ke liye moongphali ka tel aromatherapy mein bhi upyog kiya jata hain
isse massage karwane aur warm bath mein istemal karne se skin mein chamak aur nikhaar aati hain
is tel ka istemal karne se coronary arteries bimari nahi hoti hain aur dhamniyo mein khoon ka bahaav bhi acche tarah se hota hain
yeh ek tarah ka natural skin care hota hain , is paste ko lagane se dry skin ko bhi fayda hota hain
high blood pressure ke liye isme fat ki kam quantity hoti hain , jo sharir ko high blood pressure se bachati hain
02 solar energy hain desh ka bright future

general knowledge a a print email bijali ki badhti keemato ne aam aadmi ke budget ko bigaadkarrakh diya hain
aise mein solar energy logo ke liye bahut hi accha option ban kar saamne aayi hain
yeh environment aur sehat ke liye bhi faydemand hain
solarpanel dwarasolarenergy ko electricity mein convertkar diya jata hain
solarenergy sechalane walegadgets solarenergyparbased productssuraj ke hone par bijali paida karte hain
garden aur streetlight solarenergy se chalne wali tamamtarah ki garden aur streetlightbazaar mein available hain
garden light 2 saal tak chal jati hain aur street light 10 se 15 saal chalti hain
solar cooker lpg ke badhte daamo se jeb par padh rahebojh ko kam karne ke liye solar cooker ka istemal kiya ja sakta hain
solar cooker 2 tarah ke hote hain box type aur dish type
toh box type cooker ka istemal kiya ja sakta hain
solar cooker ka istemal jyada asaan aur suvidhajanak hota hain
yeh working logo ke liye kafi kargar hain
solar cooker20 se 25 saal tak chalta hain
keemat solarcooker 4000 4500 rupaye aam cooker 2000 se 3000 rupaye
solarwater heating system bharat mein launch huye solar products mein yeh sabsepurana hain
isse jyada capacity wale system hotels , restaurant , hospital , guest houseaadi mein lagaye jate hain
aaj kal aise solar heating system bhi aarahe hain jinme bijali ke element bhi lage hote hain
aise mein yeh solar energyna mauzood hone par grid energy ka bhi istemal kar sakte hain
tak ka water heating system electronic geezer ko replace kar sakta hain aur isse salana lagbhag1500 unit bijali bachai ja sakti hain
ton carbon dioxideko paida karne se rok sakta hain
solarwater heating system ko chhatparlagayajata hain
garam paani system mein hi mauzood tank mein store hotahain , jo solarenergy uplabadh na hone par bhi 24 hours tak garm bana rahta hain
ki capacity wale system 30 , 000 rupaye
ki capacitywalesystem 80 , 000 rupaye
solargeezer paani garm karne ke liye solar geezerka upyog kiya ja sakta hain
solar geezerka istemal kar bijali ki bill mein kafi katautikija sakti hain kyonki bijali se chalne wale geezer mein bijali bahut consume hote hain
solar geezerpar government ki taraf se 30 ki subsidy bhi di jati hain , lekin yeh3 mahine ke baadmilti hain
subsidy keliye solar geezer kokhareedte waqt apply kiya ja saktahain , jiske 3 mahine baad government ke dwara chequemil jata hain
solar waterheating system aur ismeis tube light ka hi antar hain
solargeezer mein solarwater heating system ke compare paani dheere dheere garamhotahain , lekin yeh usse sasta padtahain
iski life15 20 saal tak hoti hain
keemat 100 ltr ki capacity wala 2 logo ke liye 14 , 500 rupaye
ltr ki capacity wala 5 6 logo ke liye 40 , 000 rupaye
solarinverter bharat mein bijali janeki samsya aam hain
solarinverteraise kai areas ke liye bahut hi upyogihain
solarinverterke jariyegrid se chalnewale inverter ke bill se bacha jasakta hain
aam taurpargharo mein lagbhag 1 kilowattke inverter ka istemal kiya jasakta hain jisse6 lights , 4 fans , 1 computer aur 1 tv 8 ghanto tak chalaya ja sakta hain
isse kam powerkeinverter ka istemal karna ho toh 650 watt ke inverter ka istemal kiya ja sakta hain , jisme 2 fans , 2 cfl aur1 tv set chalayaja sakta hain
solarinverter ke solarmodule ki lifetoh lambi hoti hain lekin iski battery 4 5 saal mein badala jatahain
aajkal solarinverter gridsupportedbhi aate hain jinhe solar energyna milne par grid energy ke jariyebhi charge kiya ja saktahain
vaisesolar energy se charge karnepar yehlambesamay tak chalte hain
solarmoduleki life 20 25 saal tak hoti hain
keemat 650 watt solar inverter 30 , 000 rupaye 1 kilowatt solar inverter 60 , 000 rupaye
kuch aur products homelight system homelight system mein2 bulb , 1 fan , mobilecharger aur solar panelhota hain
homelight system ka shaharo mein kam istemalhotahain , lekin gaanvo mein inki kafidemandhain
iski keemat 4200 11000 rupaye hain , jo pankhe ke sizeaur panelki capacity par depend hain
solarlantern market mein kaitarah kesolar laaltenavailablehain jo din bhar solar energy se charge honepar 5 6 ghanto ka batterybackup detehain
aaj kal solarlaalten ke saathmobilecharger ka bhi option hain
bazaarmein solar energyke saathhi grid se chargehonewalesolarlantern bhi availablehain
solar torch solar energy se chalnewalitorch mein radio , blinkeraurmobilecharger bhi attachmilta hain
mobilecharger solarenergy se chalnewalemobilecharger bhi bazaar mein availablehain
bazaar mein iske2 option hain ek batteryke saath aur ek bina batteryka charger
rojmarraki zindagimeinsafarkarte samay in chargerska istemal kiya ja saktahain
kaha se khareede aapkeshahar ke electronicmarket meinsolar productski tamam dukaanehain
iske alawa tamam solar products ke dealer online bhi samaan book kar rahe hain
solar energyse chalne waleair conditioners , tv , fridge aadi ka nirmaan bhi kiya ja chuka hain , lekin philhaal yeh abhi availablenahi hain
solarenergyke expertsbatate hainkisolar energysechalne waleproducts ki gramin area mein bahut demandhain kyonki vaha electricityki supply nahi hain
asaani se mileaiseproducts gharelulevelpar solar productsko apna kar kafibijali ki bachat kija sakti hain , lekin isbare meinjyada jankarina honekiwajah seinka istemalbahut kamhi hota hain

health tips a a print email agar aap healthy diet ke sath in tips ko follow karte hain to weight loss karne mein aapko bahut jyada fayda hota hain
dim light aur soft music mein khana khaye research batate hain ki room ki light ko dim karke aur soft music sunne se aap kam khana khate hain
researchers ne ek fast food restaurant ka makeover kiya aur yeh paya ki jazz aur soft lights se logo ne khana kam khaya , lekin unhone food ko khoob enjoy karte huye khaya
fat free ki bajaye full fat wali cheeze khaye fat free sunne mein bahut hi healthy lagta hain , lekin asal mein aisa nahi hain
according to researches jab hum full fat milk ya dahi lete hain , to jyada wazan kam karte hain
reason yeh ki full fat dairy products hunger ko long time tak shaant kar dete hain
yeh long term ke liye jyada best hain
se jyada food na khaye agar aapke saamne kai saare high calorie wale tasty spicy oily foodrakh diye jaye , to aap jaroorat se jyada kha lete hain

05 micromax ne launch kiya apna naya
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home laptab micromax micromax ne launch kiya apna naya laptab sirf rs
laptab , micromax a a print email beete kuch dino se micromax social network ke deewane apne fans ke liye ek behad khas device lane ki jagat mein tha
laptab ki banavat micromax ke is laptab ki puri body metal se bani hain
inch ki ips touchscreen 1280 x 800 pixels di gyi hain
grey metal color ki body ke saath iske speaker grills par black finish aur top ports ke aas paas labtap ko stylish look diya gya hain
iske top aapko sim slot , micro sd slot , micro usb port aur
5mm ka audio jack , iske right side par aapko ek bada button milega jo power aur volume button hain
box ke ander aapko keyboard doc bhi milega
doc ke upar magnetic clip di gyi hain , jo metal ki hi bani hain
doc se side mein mouse aur storage drive jaisi accessories ko connect karne ke liye full size usb
port diya gya hain
is tablet ko doc par fit kiya ja sakta hain aur isse hatakar haath mein bhi liya ja sakta hain
hardware aur software micromax ka yeh laptab window
vahi isko power deta hain quad core intel atom processor
laptab par memory ke naam par di gyi hain 2gb ki ram aur 32 gb ka flash storage
iske alawa others specification ke taur par ispar diya gya hain , expansion ke ke liye micro sd slot , 3g sim slot aur charging ke liye micro usb port
isme 10 hours ke battery back up ke saath 7700 mah ki battery bhi di gyi hain
isko anya phone ya tablets ki charging ke liye power bank ke roop mein istemal kar sakte hain
in sabke saath is par aapko milega dual speaker , dual camera 2mp front , 2mp rear , usb host spot , wi fi aur bluetooth bhi
result micromax ki is device ke jaisi device pahle hi kai companies ki or se utari ja chuki hain
notion ink , swipe aur iball inme mukhya hain
aise mein rs
mein full hybrid windows device ek accha sauda sabit ho sakta hain

11 fairness cream se gora hona chahte hain
fairness cream se gora hona , aapka waham hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge fairness cream se gora hona , aapka waham hain
general knowledge a a print email aaj ke time mein gora rang hona beautiful hone ka ek standard mana jane laga hain
logo ki isi mentality ka fayda uthaate huye kai saari beauty products banane wali companies , rang gora karne wale fairness cream ko market mein aaye din launch karte rahte hain
abhi ek research mein yeh baat saamne aayi hain ki rang gora karne wali in fairness cream mein steroids hote hain , jo skin ko nuksan pahuchate hain
in cream ko banane ke liye glutathioneka istemal kiya jata hain
glutathioneko internet par gorapan badhaane wale agent ke roop mein promoted kiya ja raha hain
gorepan se iske relation hone ka koi scientific proof nahi mile hain
aur to aur long time tak in creams ka istemal karne se aapko skin se related bimariya bhi ho sakti hain
skin ki sahi safaai , toning , oil massage , moisturizing se skin mein moisturizer banaye rakh kar aap clean clear , glowing skin paa sakte hain , jisse aap kafi khubsoorat dikhenge
mein 233 ton fairness products ka use indian consumers ke dwaarakiya gya

09 rtgs aur neft mein kya difference hota
rtgs aur neft mein kya difference hota hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home finance general knowledge rtgs aur neft mein kya difference hota hain
finance , general knowledge a a print email rtgs real time gross settlement aur neft national electronic funds transfer dono hi india mein online paise bhejne ka jariya hain , jiske dwara aap alag alag bank accounts mein money transfer kar sakte hain
in dono payment system ko reserve bank ofindia rbi manage karta hain
rtgs aur neft mein kya hain difference rtgs mein funds turant hi transfer ho jate hain
yeh different bank ke beech mein fund transfer karne ka sabse fast medium hain
dusri aor neft ke tahat paise turant transfer nahi ho paate hain
is system mein hours ke according time slot mein kaam hota hain
jinka saving account ya current account hain , veh customer neft aur rtgs dono hi services ka use kar sakte hain
lekin , jinke bank account nahi hain , veh sirf neft wali branches mein cash deposit kar sakte hain
kab se kab tak hota hain transaction
online rtgs aap time table ke according hi kar sakte hain
kitna amount send kar sakte hain
rtgs system ka use big amount send karne ke liye hota hain
isme minimum 2 lakh aur maximum 10 lakh rupaye transfer kiye ja sakte hain
vahi , neft mein aap jitna chahe utna paisa send kar sakte hain , lekin yeh sirf online neft mein kar sakte hain , offline yani ki bank branch mein jakar cash deposit aap 50 , 000 se zyada nahi karwa karwa sakte hain
transaction agar fail ho jaye toh
charges kya hain
every neft transaction ke liye services tax ko chhod kar 25 rupees se jyada charge nahi liya jayega
vahi rtgs mein maximum fee 55 rupees hain
aap bank ke kisi bhi branch se transfer karne ke mukable online transaction karna zyada faydemand hota hain
kya transaction ko roka ja sakta hain
yunki rtgs mein real time transaction hota hain , isliye agar aapne transaction kar diya hain toh usay baad mein bhi rok sakte hain
02 moblie phones ki alag alag screen aur
moblie phones ki alag alag screen aur unme antar
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge smartphone moblie phones ki alag alag screen aur unme antar
general knowledge , smartphone a a print email smartphone lene se pahle hum sab sabse pahle uski screen par nazar daalte hain
phone ki screen na sirf uske design ko attractive banati hain , balki iski quality smartphone user ke experience ko behtar banati hain
is baat mein koi shak nahi ki mobiles companies din par din jitne naye features apne phone mein jodti chali ja rahi hain , utni hi tezi se veh screen ki quality par bhi dhyaan de rahi hain
market mein jab hum koi smartphone lene jate hain toh aapne dhyaan diya hoga ki price ke accordning phone ki screen quality bhi alag alag hoti hain jaise tft screen , lcd screen , amoled screen , ips screen lekin aakhir in sabhi mein kya differences hota hain , aur yeh ek dusre se alag kaise hote hain
lcd screen lcd screen jise hum liquid crystal display bhi kahte hain , ek normal flat screen hoti hain , yeh aankhon par tez roshini ke padne se rokta hain
lcd apne aap mein koi roshini paida nahi karti hain , balki dusre sources se padne wali roshini ko modulate karta hain
lcd screen ki quality acchi hoti hain , lekin isme kam contrast resolution hota hain , saath hi jyada roshini jaise dhoop ya phir ghar ke bahar lcd screen mein kam dikhta hain
tft screen tft jise hum thin film transistor kahte hain , lcd se behtar hoti hain , jisme har pixel mein electrode hote hain
yeh pixel ke beech doori ko kam karte hain , jisse jyada pixel quality user ko milti hain
entry level phone mein aapko tft screen asaani ke saath mil jayegi
ips screen ips yani ki in plane switching ko hitachi aur lg ne behatar color aur angle jaise feature ke saath banaya hain
aaj kal jyadatar har smartphone mein ips display ka istemal hota ja raha hain
retina ; retina display ko apple ne banaya hain aur yeh aapko iphone mein milti hain
retina display mein pixel ke beech ki doori behad kam hoti hain , jisse user ko saaf pictures dikhti hain
oled oled yani ki organic light emitting diode bahar ki light ke bajaye apni khud ki light create karte hain , jisse na sirf battery save hoti hain , balki jyada clear colour quality milti hain
amoled ; amoled yani ki active matrix organic light emitting diode mein sabhi pixel ek dusre se connect rahte hain
amoled screen manufactures ko sasti padti hain , saath hi yeh kam power kharch karti hain
amoled oled ka upgrade version hain
clear black display is display ko nokia ke dwara 2007 mein banaya gya tha
clear black screen par padne wale reflection ko hatata hain , khas taur par dhoop mein screen quality ko behtar dikhaane ki kaam karta hain
mobile bravia display yeh sony dwara istemal kiya jane wala brand hain , is display ko jyadatar hd tv mein istemal kiya jata hain
lekin ab ise mobile phone mein bhi istemal kiya ja raha hain
isse phone ki screen sharpness ke saath bahut hi behtar nazar aati hain
is screen ka istemal sony xperia series phone mein jyada dekha ja sakta hain
gorilla glass gorilla glass hone se screen ko choti moti ragad se bachaya ja sakta hain
ise khas taur par mobile phone , portable media player , laptop ke alawa kuch tv screen par bhi istemal kiya jata hain
pahli baar gorilla glass screen ka upyog 2007 mein apple ke dwara iphone mein kiya gya tha
ab iska latest version gorilla glass 3 chal raha hain
dragontrail glass yeh asahi glass corp
dwara banaya gya hain aur saath hi yeh thinness aur lightness ke saath hi screen ko damage hone se bachata hain
yeh corning gorilla se kafi milta julta display hain
yahi dragontrail glass ka sabse bada gun hain

in points par gaur kare

pryapt safaai aur high gean mein laaparvaahi bacche ki life ko khatre mein daal sakti hain
kuch diaper ethylbenzene , toluene aur xylene jaise volatile organic compounds yani environment mein bhaap ban kar pahuchane wale organic compound ko release karte hain
jisse neurological problems ke alawa aankho mein preshani aur immunity kamjor padne ka khatra rahta hain

05 healthy liver food in hindi urdu
healthy liver ke liye jaroor khaye yeh cheeze
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips healthy liver ke liye jaroor khaye yeh cheeze
health tips a a print email healthy liver ke liye kya khana chahiye
healthy liver ke liye good food kaun se hain
liver hamare body ka store house hain , jaha iron , vitamins aur minerals jama hote hain
sharir ke metabolism mein iska ahem role hain
apple rojana ek sebkhane se liver healthy rahta hain
green tea isme anti oxidant hota hain jo liver sefreeradicals ko bahar nikaalta hain aur gandagi ko saaf kartahain
olive oil jaitoon ka tel , jab sahi quantity mein istemal kiya jata hain toh yeh liver ke liye ekdum sahi lipid base deta hain
saath hi liver mein carcinogens ko ikattha honese bhi rokta hain
broccoli isme glucosinolateshote hainjo liver mein enzymeko paida karte hain , is enzymese liver ke ander ki saari gandagi bahar nikal jati hain
yeh liver mein enzyme banata hain , jisse vehpaushtik tatvo ko grahan kar sakeaur gandepadartho ko bahar nikaal sake
brown rice , multi grain wala atta aur soya atta liver ke liye bahut hi acche hote hain
inme mauzoodchlorophyll tatvliver mein dangerouschemicals ke asar ko kam karta hain
avocado isme mauzood glutathione compoundke saath mono saturatedfat hota hain , jo liver ki safaai ke saath cells aur tissues ko nayabananemein madad karta hain
jad wali sabziya jadwali sabziyomein flavonoidshota hain
chukandar , gajar , aaloo aadi liver ke cells ki repair karte hain , jisse liver theek se kaam kar sake
10 running ya jogging karne ke fayde
running ya jogging karne ke fayde
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips running ya jogging karne ke fayde
health tips a a print email running daudne ya jogging karne ke fayde bahut hi jyada hain
yeh hamare physically , mentally aur emotionally health mein sudhaar karne mein madad karta hain
diabetes ke khatre ko kam karta hain research se yeh pata chala hain ki niyamit roop se running karne se type 2 ke diabetes ke khatre ko kam karne mein madad karta hain
fat ko burn kare running jyada fat ke cells ko burn karne mein madad karta hain aur sharir ko dubla patla bana deta hain
heart ke health ko sudhaarata hain blood circulation ko badhate , blood pressure ko banaye rakhte aur kai tarah ke dil ke rogo ke khatre ko kam karte huye daudne se dil ka swasthya sudharta hain
aapki haddiya majboot karta hain niyamit roop se running karne se osteoporosis aur gathiya jaise haddi se related rog kam hote hain , aur yeh aapki haddiyo aur maanspeshiyo ko majbooti deta hain
faydemand aerobic exercise niyamit roop se running karna aerobic exercise ka hi ek roop hain , yeh aapke mood ko accha karne mein aapki help karta hain
immunity power badhaata hain yadi aap niyamit roop se jogging karenge toh aap allergy , sardi , khansi , flu aadi jaise health problems se grast nahi honge
04 intex aqua power plus rs 8999 mein hua
intex , smartphone a a print email intex ne apna nay low budget smartphone intex aqua power plus launch kar diya hain
intex aqua power ke features intex ke is naye smartphone mein 5 inch ki screen hd 1280 x720 pixel resolution display quality ko support karti hain
ghz ka quad core processor aur 2gb ki ram di gayi hain
iski internal memory 16 gb hain , jismein 12 gb users istemal kar sakte hain
vahi micro sd card ki madad se ise 32 gb tak aur badhaya ja sakta hain
company ka yeh smarphone android ke latest version
lollipop operating system par kaam karta hain
isme shandaar photo quality ke liye 13 mega pixel ka rear camera diya gya hain
vahi selfie ke liye front camera 5 megapixel ka hain
itna hi nahi yeh phone kai games aur apps se pre loaded hain
users is phone ko reliance retail store se kharid sakte hain
company ne iss phone ko black champagne , champagne , white champagne aur black silver color mein pesh kiya hain
itna hi nahi company iske saath free mein flip cover bhi de rahi hain
isi mahine intex ne aqua speed hd smartphone itni hi keemat rs
jo ki intex aqua speed ka variant tha
inch hd display diya gya tha

iska display , battery backup aur price users ko dhyaan mein rakh kar tay kiya gya hain

health tips a a print email pet kharab hain to in cheezo ko nahi khana chahiye
inme mauzood caffeine pet mein acid ki matra badhate hain
aapko agar aksar acidity satati hain , to normal dino mein bhi chai coffee ka sewan jyada na kare
haan dahi aur cheese cube jaroor kha skate hain , kyonki isme lactose nahi paya jata hain
jismein jyadatar package food mein artificial sweetener aur color milaye gye hote hain
diarrhea dast lagne ke dauraan fat wali cheezo ko na kahe
aise nazuk haalat mein ice cream , makkhan , cheese , pasty , pastries , ghee , tel , meat , cream aadi ko nahi khana chahiye
dahi mein mauzood bacteria fruits ke poshak tatvo ke saath milkar kamaal dikhate hain
sabziyo ko pachaane mein takhleef hoti ho , to unka sewan gravy ya puree ke roop mein kare
diarrhea hone par jau jaii ko pakakar patla ghola banaye
sharir ko jaroori poshan milega aur infection door ho jayega

general knowledge , health tips a a print email kacchi sabziya , fruits khane ke saath hi juice peena lambe ghane aur shiny baalo ke secrets hote hain
lekin experts ki manetohlahsun , pyaaz , palakd , dhaniya aur aloe vera mein bhi paye jane wale nutrients baalo ki growth badhane mein kargar hain
vitamin k , c , folate , manganese , magnesium , copper aur beta caroteneka khazana palak baalo ki har samsya ko door karne ka behtarin ilaj mana gya hain
saath hi copper baalo ke pigmentation ko manage karta hain aur manganes aur anti oxidants , flavonoids aur carotenoids stress ko kam karte hain jo baalo ke jhadne ka sabse bada karan hota hain
amrood amroodmein vitamin c bahut jyada matra mein mauzood hota hain
iske alawa isme anti oxidants , carotenoids , lycopene , lutein aur cryptoxanthin paya jata hain jo baalo ko na kewal lamba kartahain balki unhe ghanaaur mulayam bhi banatahain
lahsun anti bacterial aur anti fungalki matra liye huyelahsunhar tarah ke infection ko door karnemein kargar hotahain
baalo ki jado se related koi bhi problem honepar lahsun ka ras scalp par lagana faydemand hota hain
baalo ko healthyrakhne ka kaam lahsun mein mauzoodselenium mineral karta hain
pyaaz biotene , vitamin jaha hair growthke liye jaroori hota hain , vahi copper pigmentation ke liye
in sabkealawa pyaaz ka anti bacterialgun kai tarah ke infection ko bhi door karta hain
kheera baalo ki growthaur majbooti ke liye vitamin c aur anti oxidants bahut hi jarooricheez mani gyi hain
flavonoids hair follicles ki samsyako door karta hain aur usay shiny , healthy aur soft banata hain
kiwi kiwi phal mein vitamin c mauzoodhota hain jo ek behatrin anti oxidant mana gya hain
yeh hair follicles ko baharidhoop , dool aur pollution se bachata hain , jo baalo ki girnekisabsebadi wajah hoti hain
vitamin c body ki immunity power ko badhata hain
kiwi mein flavonoids aur carotenoidski bharpoormatra hoti hain
iskealawa ismecopper aur minerals bhi thodi thodimatra mein mauzoodhotehain jo baalo ko pigmentationke saath hi unke growthke liyebhi jaroori hain
aloevera aloe vera skin se lekar baalo tak ki healing ka kaam karta hain
skin ko soft banata hain vahi baalo ko majboot
aloe vera ki pattiyo meinvitamin c , e aur beta carotene , vitamin b1 , b2 , b3 , b6 ke alawa zinc , copper aur iron ki mauzoodgi hoti hain
iske saathhi aloe vera immunity ko badhaneka bhi kaam kartahain
gajar pyaaz jitna hi biotin aur vitamin gajar mein paya jatahain , isliye ise bhi baalo ki growth ka behtarin source mana ja sakta hain

health tips a a print email diabetes mein kaddu khane se kya fayde hote hain
benefits of pumpkin in diabetes in hindi urdu
diabetes ki bimari ko silent killer mana jata hain , jisme blood sugar level badh jata hain aur yeh control mein nahi rahta hain
agar aap is bimari se peedit hain toh aapko preservative food packaged food khane se bachna chahiye
diabetes ke patient ko broccoli , beans , salmon , karela , masoor ki daal , salmon fish aadi ka sewan karna chahiye
kaddu ka sewan diabetes ke mareez ko jaroor karna chahiye
diabetes ke mareez ko kaddu kyon khana chahiye anti oxidants ka khazana sharir mein insulin ki matraa kam ho jane par diabetes ki bimari ho jati hain
kaddu mein anti oxidants paye jate hain jo insulin ko badhane mein madad karte hain
isliye diabetes ke rogi ko kaddu ka sewan jaroor karnachahiye
agar aap iske crunchy snacks bana kar khate hain to aapko koi nuksan nahi hota hain
vitamin c ka khazana kaddu mein vitamin c bharpoor matra mein hota hain
vitamin c acchi matra mein hone ki wajah se insulin banta hain aur badhi huyi diabetes control mein aa jati hain
folic acid kaddu mein folic acid bharpoor matra mein hota hain
kya zyada matra mein kaddu khane se diabetes ki bimari ko theek kiya ja sakta hain
isliye hafte mein kam se kam 2 baar kaddu khane se diabetes ki bimari ko theek kiya jasakta hain

chandan mein antibiotic gun paye jate hain , saath hi yeh apne natural guno ki wajah se hame kai saari bimariyo se bhi chhutkara dilata hain
benefits of chandan in hindi
body ke khus khas parts jaise gallbladder aur private parts mein sujan hone par chandan ka istemal karna accha mana jata hain
tension aur aneendra se aaram dilaye neend na aane ki wajah jaroorat sezyada active brain , mentally tension aur thakaan hain
is chakra ke karan aapke negative vichaaro ki wajah se aapke andernegative energy chali jati hain
isse daant se related problems se bhi bachaja sakta hain
chandan ka paste keel moohaso ko hi nahi theek karta , balki isse skin clean aur moisturise bhi hoti hain
regularly iske istemal se aap apne baalo mein khud fark mahsoos karenge

06 sony ne launch kiya xperia c4 dual
sony ne launch kiya xperia c4 dual selfie focus 29 , 490 rupaye mein
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home smartphone sony sony ne launch kiya xperia c4 dual selfie focus 29 , 490 rupaye mein
smartphone , sony a a print email smartphone makers companies mein se ek sony ne india mein apna xperia c4 dual phone launch kiya hain
company ki aor se iski keemat 29 , 490 rupaye batai gyi hain
iske saath hi company ne is baat ki goshna ki hain ki selfie focused smartphone june se bazaar mein available hoga
usse pahle company ne xperia m4 aqua dual smartphone ke may mein launch hone ki baat kahi thi
kuch aisi hain jankari bataya ja raha hain ki yeh xperia c4 smarphone friday se white , black aur vibrant mint color mein sony ke centers , xperia stores aur major electronics stores par available hoga
vahi phone ke specifications ke bare mein bataya gya hain ki yeh phone android
lollipop par run karega
5inch ka full hd 1080 x 1920 pixel ips display diya gya hain
isko backup dega firm ka s bravia engine 2 aur sports a super vivid mode
phone ko power dega 64 bit
in sabhi suvidhaon ke saath phone par aapko mil raha hain mail t760 gpu aur 2 gb ki ram
camera par khas dhyaan ab baat kare agar camera ki to handset mein aapko milega 13 megapixel ka auto focus rear camera , vo bhi led flash ke saath
iske alawa sony ka agla selfie focused smartphone hone ke nate is xperia c4 dual phone par aapko milega 5 megapixel ka front facing camera
is camera par aapko milega company ka exmor r censor , led flash aur 25mm wide angle lens ke saath
battery aur storage bhi hain jabardast is xperia c4 dual mein par aapko milega 16 gb ki inbuilt storage
iske baad aap ise 128 gb tak micro sd ki madad se expand bhi kar sakte hain
phone ko power de rahi hain 2600 mah ki capacity wali battery
company ki aor se is battery mein 12 hours 47 minutes ka talk time dene ka dawa kiya gya hain
connectivity ke liye is par milega bluetooth , wi fi with hotspot , 3g , 4g lte , gps a gps , glonass , micro usb , dlna aur nfc ki suvidha
inch 1920 x 1080 pixels fullhd ips display with mobile bravia engine 2 , scratch resistant glass forprotection memory 2gb ram , 16gb internal memory , upto 128gb expandable memory via microsd card connectivity bluetooth , wi fi with hotspot , 3g , 4g lte with support for indianlte bands , gps a gps , glonass , micro usb , dlna , and nfc camera 13mp rear camera led flash , exmorrs sensor , 1080p video recording , 5mp front facing camera with 25mmwide angle lens os android

07 headphone par r aur l kyon likha hota
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge tech tips headphone par r aur l kyon likha hota hain , agar aap iske matlab right left samajh rahe hain to aap galat hain
general knowledge , tech tips a a print email headphone ka istemal aap gaane sunne ke liye karte hi honge
aapne apne phone ya laptop ke earphone ya headphone par l aur r ka nishaan bana hua dekha hi hoga
sound engineering se lekar recording se judi baatein iski wajaho mein se ek hain
sabse pahli wajah hain ' recording
agar stereo recording ke samay ko sound left ki aor se aa raha hain to yeh aapke headphone ke left channel mein jyada tez sunaai dega aur right channel mein thoda dheema sunai dega
earphone mein left aur right channel hone ka dusra reason yeh hain ki isse 2 sounds ko alag alag karke sunna asaan ho jata hain
unke beech ka difference ko pahchan paana asaan hota hain
kai aise songs hote hain , jinme loud musicals instruments example dhol aur soft musicals insturments jaise baansuri ki awaaz ek saath hoti hain
iske alawa films ki perfect sound recording ke liye left aur right channel ka hona jaroori hain
aapne kabhi koi movie apne laptop ya smartphone par earphone ke jariye dekhi hain

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips diabetes ke mareez yeh phal kha sakte hain
health tips a a print email yadi aap diabetes ke mareez hain to aapke mann mein yeh aksar swaal uthta hoga ki diabetes madhumeh , sugar rog mein kaun se phal kha sakte hain ya is bimari mein kaun se phal fruit khane se hame koi nuksaan nahi hoga
aise phal jaise kela , leechi , chikoo , custard apple aadi ko khane se bachna chahiye
in fruits se blood sugar level control mein rahta hain , isliye inhe khane se koi nuksaan nahi hota hain
papita isme vitamin aur kai tarah ke minerals paye jate hain
anar yeh phal bhi badhe huye blood sugar level ko kam karne mein asardar hain
angoor sharir mein glucose ke level ko control karta hain
ananas isme anti bacterial tatv hote hain jo sharir ki sujan ko kam karne mein kargar hain
amarakh star fruit yadi aapko diabetes hain to aap yeh phal aaram se kha sakte hain
yeh diabetes patient ke liye bahut hi healthy mani jati hain
kathal yeh phal insulin level ko kam karta hain kyonki isme vitamin a , c , thiamine , niacin , riboflavin , calcium , potassium , iron , magnesium aur kai tarah ke minerals paye jate hain
seb seb mein anti oxidants hote hain jo cholesterol level ko kam karta hain aur immunity power ko badhata hain
aadoo is phal mein bhi gi bahut kam hota hain aur diabetes ke mareezo ke liye aadoo behad faydemand mana jata hain
kiwi kai researches ke baad yeh baat samne aayi hain ki kiwi khane se blood sugar level kam hota hain
kharbooja isme glycemic index jyada hone ke bawjood bhi fiber ki matra behad acchi hoti hain , isliye yadi ise sahi matra mein khaya jaye to behtar hoga
amrood amrood mein vitamin a aur vitamin c ke alawa fiber bhi hota hain
anjeer isme mauzood fibers diabetes patients ke sharir mein insulin ke kaam ko badhawa dete hain
amla is phal mein vitamin c aur fiber hota hain jo sugar ke mareez ke liye accha mana jata hain

08 alzheimer ki bimari se bachne ke liye
alzheimer ki bimari se bachne ke liye jaroor khani chahiye yeh cheeze
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips alzheimer ki bimari se bachne ke liye jaroor khani chahiye yeh cheeze
general knowledge , health tips a a print email healthy diet lene se diabetes , hypertension , heart disease aur alzheimer ki bimari hone ka khatra kafi kam ho jata hain
national institute of health ne apni research mein yeh paya ki food , diet aur lifestyle mein change karke aap alzheimer ki bimari hone se bach sakte hain
alzheimer ka khatra har kisi ko hota hain
isse peedit hone par insaan apna mental balance kho deta hain
vaise toalzheimer ka relation jean se hota hain , lekin health experts ki mane todusri wajah se bhi yeh bimari ho sakti hain
dusri wajaho mein nutrients ki kami , diabetes , mentally aur physically activities shaamil hain
experts yeh maante hain ki alzheimer samet dusri bimariyo ko rokne ke liye exercise bahut hi faydemand saabit hoti hain
aise mein alzheimer ke patient ko healthy food lene ke saath saath regular taur par exercise bhi karte rahna chahiye
alzheimer ki bimari ko door karne ya phir isse bachne ke liye jaroor khaye yeh cheeze aur food
fish machhali calcium aur protein se bharpoor hoti hain , jisse dimaag ka vikaas hota hain , khas karke salmon aur tuna fish khane se
mutton bina fat wala mutton iron , vitamin b12 aur zinc ka accha source hota hain
coffee coffee mein caffeine aur antioxidant paye jate hain , jiski wajah se coffee peene se alzheimer hone ke khatre ko kafi kam kiya ja sakta hain
broccoli broccoli mein vitamin k sametdher saare nutrients paye jate hain , jo brain ki power ko badhaane mein madad karte hain
seep seafood khane ke bahut fayde hote hain
isme zinc aur iron paya jata hain jo brain ko sharp aur concentrate banata hain
blueberry blueberry mein acchi quantity mein anti oxidants paye jate hain , jo free radicals se cells ko hone wale nuksaan se bachane mein madad karte hain
saath hi blueberry fruit ko khane se body cells aur umar ke beech balance bana rahta hain
anda ande mein vitamin b12 aur collin bharpoor matra mein hota hain
yeh brain cells ka production karte hain , jisse yaddast badhti hain
iske alawa kaju , badam aur akhrot jaise dry fruits antioxidants aur omega 3 fatty acid se bharpoor hote hain , jo dimaag ko tez banate hain
lekin dark chocolate brain ke liye bahut hi accha mana jata hain
chocolate mein flavonols paya jata hain jo brain mein khoon ka bahaav badhaata hain
tamatar tomato lycopene se bharpoor hota hain
yeh sirf cells ko nuskaan hone se bachata hain , balki tamatar khane se aap alzheimer ke khatre ko bhi kam kar sakte hain
cherry cherry mein 2 aise gun paye jate hain jo body ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
yeh hain antioxidants aur inflammation
yeh dil ki bimariya aur mental rogo ko khatm karne mein important role ada karte hain
04 ab railway ke app se book hogi un
ab railway ke app se book hogi un reserve ticket
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home tech news ab railway ke app se book hogi un reserve ticket
tech news a a print email railway ministry ne digital india ki disha mein ek aur kadam badha diya hain
railway mantralya ne aaj pilot basis par unreserved class mein ticket book karvane ke liye mobile phone app pesh kar diya hain
indian railway ne yeh pahal paperless ticketing ke liye kiya hain
rail minister suresh prabhu ne aaj south railway zone mein aane vale chennai ke egmore aur tambram upnagaro ke yatriyon ke liye iss mobile app ko launch kiya
philhaal yeh suvidha south zone ke 15 station ke yatriyon ko milegi
railway ki aage ise sabhi metro station tak badhane ki yojana hain
is app ke madyam se ticket book karvane vale yatriyon ko iska printout lene ki jaroorat nahi hogi aur vah tte ko apne cellphone par iski softcopy dikha sakenge
yeh app android aur windows platform vale mobile ke liye hain
jise google store se download kiya ja skta hain
download karne ke baad user ko e wallet taiyar karne ke liye ek id number milega
ticket khareedne ke liye paise ka bhugtan e wallet mobile payment system se ya to online ya kisi station ke ek ticket counter par karna hoga

05 anar ka juice peene ke fayde benefits
anar ka juice peene ke fayde benefits of pomegranate juice hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips anar ka juice peene ke fayde benefits of pomegranate juice 0 health tips a a print email aajkal ke lifestyle ke chalte log healthy foods ki jagah packaged food ko khate hain
anar ke ayurvedic guno ke aadhaar par duniya bhar ke scientist kai tarah ke research kar rahe hain
garbh mein shishu ki sehat ke liye faydemand anar ka juice cardiovascular system ko behtar banata hain
arthritis mein aaraam milta hain
jod dard ya arthritis se grast rogiyon ke liye anar ka juice vardaan hain
prostate cancer ko rokta hain
research se yeh jankari mili hain ki anar ka ras prostate ke dohrepan ko rokta hain aur prostate cancer cells ko maarne mein sakshm hota hain
breast cancer se ladta hain
darasal aromatase enzyme androgen ko estrogen mein badalne ka kaam karta hain jiske karan mahilaon mein breast cancer ka khatra badh jata hain
yaddasht badhata hain evidence based complementary and alternative medicine ecam mein haliya publish ek report ke anusaar rojan sirf 1 glass pomegranate anar ka juice peekar 30 40 varsh ke log aur bujurg apni yaddasht ko behtar bana sakte hain
research ke mutabik anar mein neuroprotective gun paye jate hain
saath hi alzheimer ke rogiyo ke liye bhi anar ka fruit aur juice bahut hi faydemand hota hain

smartphone , videocon a a print email indian handset maker company videocon ne apna naya smartphone z55 dash launch kar diya hain
halaki , keemat ki baat kare to yeh e commerce website par 6 , 499 rupaye mein mil raha hain
inch ki hain display videocon company ne apne is naye smartphone z55 dash mein android ka operating system diya hain
vahi handset mein aapko 5 inch ki display milegi
ghz ka octa core mediatek6735 processor milega
vahi z55 dash mein aapko 1 gb ki ram milegi
agar iski storage capacity ki baat ki jaye to isme aapko 8 gb ki internal memory milegi , jise 32 gb tak micro sd card ki madad se expand kiya ja sakta hain
mp ka rear camera videocon company ne apne is naye handset z55 dash ko kafi stylish banaya hain
iska behatarin look users ko attract kar sakta hain
isme aapko 8 megapixel ka rear camera milega , jisme led flash hoga
iske saath hi isme aapko 5 megapixel ka front camera bhi milega
agar connectivity ki baat ki jaye to z55 dash mein aapko 3g , bluetooth , wi fi aur gps aadi ki suvidha milegi
battery backup mein bhi yeh smartphone kafi jabardast hain
color variant ki baat kare to isme aapko black white aur white chrome color milega

05 dehydration se bachav
dehydration se bachav
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips dehydration se bachav
general knowledge , health tips a a print email garmi ke dino mein fluid aur liquid kam lene se body ka electrolytes balance bigad jata hain
ise dehydration kahte hain , jo ki bahut hi jyada khatarnak hota hain
dehydration ka turant ilaj karna chahiye
samay par ilaj na karne se brain hemorrhage , kidney fail hone ka khatra bana rahta hain
dehydration ke lakshan
skin dry hona
peshab kam aur peela aana dehydration ke nuksan
blood pressure kam hona
prayapt matra mein paani piye
coffee , cola jaise drink se bache
potassium yukt diet le
dehydration kya hain
sharir mein fluids khas taur par paani ki kami dehydration ka karan hoti hain
dehydration ke chalte paseena aana , gastrointestinal , bukhar , looh lagna jaisi problem hone lagti hain
bado mein dehydration hone ke karan bukhaar , dhoop ke prabhav aur jaroorat se jyada exercise karne se
ulti , dast aur urine ke infection ke karan , khane aur paani peene ke matra mein balance na hona
skin infection , bimari aur moonh ki kisi bhi tarah ki bimari hone par dehydration ki problem ho sakti hain
bado mein dehydration ke lakshan
in lakshan ke paye jane par turant doctor se checkup karwana chahiye
moongfali khane ke fayde aur nuksaan benefits of ground nut hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips moongfali khane ke fayde aur nuksaan benefits of ground nut 1 health tips a a print email jameen ke ander ugne wali moongfali ka istemal jyadatar snacks ke roop mein kiya jata hain
moongfali ke per 100 gram 166 calorie ,
7ml fat maujood hota hain
healthy heart ke liye moongfali mein monosaturated aur polysaturated fat paya jata hain
jo healthy heart ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
in dono ki balance matra cholesterol level ko control karti hain
yeh kharab cholesterol ko kam karke sharir ke liye jaroori cholesterol ke production ko badhati hain
protein ka khazana cells ke banane mein protein ki sabse jyada jaroorat hoti hain
anti oxidant se bharpoor polyphenols ek bahut hi accha anti oxidant hota hain
iske alawa isme p coumaric acid aur oleic acid bhi paye jate hain
jo na kewal healthy heart ke liye jaroori hain , balki free radicals ko door karke kai prakar ke infection se bachate hain
minerals ka khazana moongfali mein magnesium , phosphorus , zinc , potassium , calcium aur sodium sabhi prakar ke minerals paye jate hain
jo body ko active rakhne ke liye jaroori hain
vitamins ka source sharir ke sahi vikas ke liye protein ki sabse jyada jaroorat hoti hain
iske saath hi vitamins cells aur tissue ke ban ne mein bhi utne hi jaroori hote hain
metabolism ka level sahi rakhe ke saath fat aur carbohydrate ko energy mein badalne ka kaam vitamins hi karte hain
dimaag ki shakti badhata hain moongfali mein vitamin b3 paya jata hain
ise brain food ke taur par jana jata hain
sensitive skin ke liye bhi moongfali bahut ki ghatak hoti hain
isliye jaise hi kisi allergy ka abhaas ho to turant doctor se contact kare aur iske theek hone tak kisi bhi dry fruit ka sewan naa kare

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips dengue bukhaar se bachne ke liye kya khaye
health tips a a print email aaj ke time mein dengue bukhar ke maamle jyada tezi ke saath badh rahe hain
dengue fever hone par sabse pahle aapke body mein blood plates bahut tezi ke saath decrease hone lagte hain aur aapkibody kamjor hone lagti hain
dengue ke bukhaar se bachne ke liye kya khana chahiye , iske baare mein yeh article likha gya hain
dengue se bachne ke liye jaroor khaye yeh cheeze kiwi fruit kiwi mein sabhi fruits ke mukable jyada vitamins aur antioxidants hote hain
is pahadi phal mein fiber , vitamin e , c , folic acid aur carotenoids paye jate hain jo blood mein girate huye plates ko badhaane mein madad karte hain
isliye dengue ke patient ko kiwi fruit jaroor khana chahiye
kyonki palak mein vitamins bharpoor matraa mein paye jate hain jo khoon mein girte huye plates ko increase karne mein help karte hain
haldi turmeric mein curcumin naam ka antioxidant hota hain jo body metabolism rate ko increase karta hain , jisse dengue se bachne mein madad milti hain
kaddu kaddu mein vitamin a aur vitamin c bharpoor matra mein paye jate hain , jisse ise khane se body ki immunity strong banti hain aur dengue se bachaav hota hain
adrak mein anti bacterial properties payi jati hain jo dengue ke asar ko kam karti hain
isse aapki immunity strong hogi aur aap dengue se bache rahenge
amla aur orange dono hi vitamin c ke good sources mane jate hain jo body ki immunity ko boost karne ka kaam karta hain
glass orange juice ko daily peene se bhi dengue mein fayda hota hain
coconut water apni daily routine mein kam se kam 1 nariyal paani jaroor pijiye , kyonki isme electrolytes hote hain jo blood plates ko badhaane mein help karte hain
isme anti bacterial gun hota hain jo body ki immunity ko boost karta hain aur aap dengue se bache rahte hain
tomato tamatar mein vitamin c aur lycopene hota hain jo aapko dengue ke macchar ke kaatne ke baad hone wali weakness ko mahsoos nahi hone deta hain aur aapko energy bhi deta hain
04 htc ne launch kiye 3 naye smartphone jo
htc ne launch kiye 3 naye smartphone , jo hain kai saare features se bharpoor
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home htc smartphone htc ne launch kiye 3 naye smartphone , jo hain kai saare features se bharpoor
htc , smartphone a a print email smartphone making company htc ne indian market mein apne 3 naye smartphone htc one m9 , one e9 aur desire 326g launch kiye hain
aayiye jante hain ki kaise hain yeh smartphones kaisa hain htc one m9 htc one m9 mein
inch ki quad hd display hain jiska resolution 1440x2560 p hain
design ki baat karein to screen ko corning gorilla glass 4 protection diya gya hain
fronts dual speakers diye gye hain aur device ke niche vale hisse mein bio metrical authentication system diya gya hain
device mein
ghz ka mediatek processor laga hua hain , jiske saath 3 gb ki ram lagi hui hain
internal memory 32 gb hain , jise 128 gb tak badhaya ja sakta hain
htc one m9 mein
lollipop android diya gya hain , jiske saath uid 7 skin di gyi hain
agar camera ki baat ki jaye to rear camera
megapixel ka hain aur front camera 4 ultra pixel ka hain
company ne iss device ko 52500 rupay mein launch kiya hain
kaisa hain htc one e9 htc ne htc one e9 ko bhi announce kiya hain
iss smartphone mein
inch ki quad hd screen display di gyi hain
jismein 1440x2560p ka resolution hain
camera ki baat ki jaye to yeh phone aapko 20 megapixel ka rear camera deta hain
device ka processor pichli device ki tarah hain
internal storage 16 gb ki hain jise 128 gb tak badhaya ja sakta hain
iss device mein aap voice command se bhi selfie click kar sakte hain
kaisa hain htc desire 326g ab baat karte hain htc ki teesri device htc desire 326g ki
yeh ek budget device hain jo dual sim feature uplabadh karvaati hain
camera ki baat karein toh iss phone mein 8 megapixel ka rear aur 2 megapixel ka front facing camera hain
processing speed ke liye quad core processor ke saath 1 gb ki ram di gyi hain
internal memory 8 gb ki hain , jise 32gb tak badhaya ja sakta hain
battery 2000 mah ki hain jo badhiya standby time de sakti hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips bazaar ke mukable ghar ka bana soup hota hain jyada faydemand
health tips a a print email bazaar mein bikne wale ready made instant soup log bahut pasand karte hain , lekin ghar par banane wale soup ki baat hi kuch aur hain
aaiye jante hain ghar par bane alag alag soup aur uske fayde ke baare mein mix vegetable soup palak , pudina , chukandar , lauki , tamatar , amla aur adrak se bane mix vegetable soup mein iron , phosphorus ke alawa vitamin b , c aur d paya jata hain
skin se related bimariyo aur sharir mein sujan ko hone par ise naa piye
agar high blood pressure ki problem hain toh ise banate waqt namak ka istemal na kare
tamatar soup protein , phosphorus , sulfur aur vitamin a , b , c se bharpoor is soup mein doodh aur ande se jyada matra mein iron paya jata hain
yeh diabetes , aankho ki kamjori , kabz aur anemia jaise rogo mein faydemand hain
bukhaar , dast aur allergy hone par ise lene se parhez kare
pind amla soup pind khajoor aur amla se bane is soup mein bharpoor matra mein iron , minerals aur vitamin c aur d paye jate hain
lauki soup isme carbohydrate , iron , vitamin b aur minerals paye jate hain
halka hone ki wajah se yeh pet mein bharipan , bhookh na lagna ya liver se related problems mein labhkari hota hain
khali pet soup sehat ke liye nuksaandeh ho sakta hain
isse pet mein acidity ya dusri tarah ki dikkat hone ki ashanka rahti hain

finance , general knowledge a a print email kya aapko pata hain ki kabhi kabhi atm se nakli note bhi nikal sakta hain
jis wajah se customer ko kafi nuksan uthana padta hain
iske alawa kaibaar atm se kate phate , stample lage note bhi nikal jate hain , jisse kai problems ka saamna karna padta hain
atm guard ke paas ek register hota hain , jis par aapko note ka number , transaction id , date time likh kar sign karna hota hain
aap oos register par guard ke bhi sign karwaye
phir apni complaint ki ek photo mobile se leaur jis branch se veh atm connected hain , vaha par jakar manager se bhi apni problem share kare
nakli note nikalne ki complaint written mein bhi darz karwaye
bank dega aapko naya note reserve bank ko india ki guidelines ke according har bank mein fake currency ki jaanch ke liye scanner lagana jaroori hain
aapki complaint par bank note ki jaanch karega
bhi registered karwa sakte hain
fir register karwaate time police ko saare proof de
related bank aur rbi ko iske baare mein written mein report kare
rbi ko aap uski website www
in par public ke liye bane complaint section mein jakar complaint kare
apne complaint mein kharab note ki photo , transaction slip ki photocopy kobhi is complaint ke saath attach kare
rbi aapki shikayat par bank ke against action lega aur currency note ke barabar amount ki payment karne ke liye kahega
aise mein aap rbi ke paas written mein apni complaint register karwa sakte hain
rbi ke sabhi regional offices mein iske liye alag se department bana hua hain
e address rbi ki website aur bank branch mein likha hua mil jayega

intex , smartphone a a print email indian handset maker company intex ne apni aqua series ke tahat naya smartphone bharat mein launch kar diya hain
inch ki hain display intex company ne apne is naye smartphone aqua turbo 4g mein android ka operating system diya hain
ghz ka quad core mediatek mt6735 processor milega
vahi aqua turbo 4g mein aapko 1 gb ki ram milegi
agar storage capacity ki baat kare to isme 8 gb ki internal memory milegi aur 32 gb tak micro sd card ki suvidha milegi
megapixel ka rear camera intex ne apne is naye handset aqua turbo 4g ko kafi stylish banaya hain
iska behatrin look users ko attract karega
iske saath hi 2 megapixel ka front camera bhi uplabadh hain
agar connectivity ki baat ki jaye to aqua turbo mein aapko 4g , 3g , bluetooth , wi fi aur gps aadi ki suvidha milegi
battery back up mein yeh phone kafi jabardast hain
color variants ki baat kare to isme aapko white aur black color milega

05 janiye world ki top 10 countries
janiye world ki top 10 countries internet ke speed ke maamle
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge tech news janiye world ki top 10 countries internet ke speed ke maamle
general knowledge , tech news a a print email hamare desh mein internet ki speed ko lekar hamesha preshani ka samna karna padta hain
yaha na sirf internet connection ki speed bahut acchi hain , balki downloading bhi tezi ke saath hoti hain
aise mein yeh desh internet connectivity ke mamle mein dusre desho ko kafi peeche chhod dete hain
to janiye world ke top 10 fastest internet speed wali countries ke baare mein is list mein pahli position south korea ki hain
yaha par average
mega bits per seconds mbps internet speed hain
pichle saal yaha par internet speed
increase huyi hain
yaha par average mbps
last year se is saal yaha par 37 internet speed increase huyi hain
is list mein teesra number japan ka hain
hain , vahi speed increase hone ka percentage 16 hain
internet ki speed ke mamle mein sweden aur switzerland bhi kafi aage hain
chauthe number par sweden hain , jaha average mbps
hain , yaha par 34 internet speed increase ho rahi hain
isi tarah se switzerland mein average mbps
yaha speed increase hone ki dar 21 hain
chhathe number par netherlands , saatve par latvia , aathwe par ireland , nave par czech republic aur daswe par finland hain
in desho mein internet speed ka average
saath hi pichle saal ke mukable internet speed increase level 33 tak hain
internet speed ke mamle mein bade desh kafi piche hain
yadi uk ki baat ki jaye , to yeh 17th number par hain
dusri or america , australia , france aur china jaise desh bhi internet speed ke top countries mein jagah nahi bana paye hain

ise yaha curd rice ke naam se bulaya jata hain

general knowledge , smartphone , tech tips a a print email technology ke is era mein smartphone ka use kafi badh gya hain
aise mein user apne smartphone mein sabse jyada internet access karte hain
internet ek aisa platform hain jaha har query badi asani ke saath solve ho jati hain
never runs multiple applications aamtaurpar yeh problem sabhi ke saath hoti hain , jab hum browsing karte hain , toh uske saath run kar rahe application ko band karna bhool jate hain
jiske chalte internet speed slow ho jati hain
agar kabhi bhi internet access karna chahte hain toh sabse pahle device mein run karrahe multiple application ko band kar de , taki acchi internet speedka fayda mil sake
disable auto update feature for application agar aapke smartphone mein apps ke liyeautomatic updation laga hain , toh turant isedisable kar de
textsearch results kisi bhi browser par agaraap sirf text search karna chahtehain toh sabsepahle image search ko block karde
isse fast browsing mein madad milti hain
darasal jab image searchunblock hota hain toh veh text serelated image ko bhi open karta hain , jissesamay lagta hain
aise mein text searching ke dauran internet speed badhane ke liye imageblocking sabsebest option hain
good network areas smartphone ya pc in sabhi devices par internettabhi accha chalta hain , jab yehacche networking areas mein honge
aise mein sabsepahle aapko yeh sure kar lena chahiye ki aap jis device parinternet access karna chahte hain
veh acchenetworks ko detect karsake
avoid lotsof apps phonejitna saaf suthra rahega , utna hi accha chalega
yani ki kabhi bhi smartphonemeinapps ka storagena rakhe
jis app ki aapko jaroorat housi app ko apnesmartphone mein rakhe , baki faltukeapps ko uninstall karde
free your phone memory jaisa ki aap jantehain ki traffic jam mein koi bhi gaadi speed senahi chal sakti hain
agar aapke phone ki memoryfull hogi , toh phone ka os slow kaam karega , jiska effect internetspeed par padta hain aur veh slow ho jata hain
aise mein smartphone userstime time par phone memory ko clearkarterahe
remove web cache and oldhistory browser par koi bhi websitesearch ki jati hain , toh veh history ke roop mein storehoti rahti hain
iskealawa web cachedata ko bhi time timepar deletekarterahe

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home motorola smartphone motorola ke moto x gen2 ka price kam hua
motorola , smartphone a a print email motorola ne moto x gen2 ke 16 gb aur 32 gb variants ke price mein katauti kar diya hain
gaurtalab hain ki , leather wood back panel wale 16 gb variant ki keemat 28 , 999 rupaye hain
moto x gen 2 ke dono variants mein storage capacity ke alawa kuch bhi difference nahi hain
dono ki phone mein storage expend nahi hoti hain
moto x gen2 mein
inch 1080 x 1920 pixel oled display hain
jiski pixel density 423 ppi hain aur uspar corning gorilla glass 3 protection hain
ghz quad core qualcomm snapdragon 801 msm8974 ac processor aur 2gb ki ram hain
iss phone mein 13 megapixel primary camera hain , jismein f
lens , 4k video recording aur dual led ring flash hain
iske alawa 2 mega pixel ka front facing camera hain
jo 1080 pixel tak video recording ki ja sakti hain
moto x gen2 me 4g lte , wi fi
le , micro usb aur
mm audio jack diya gya hain

health tips a a print email bharat mein anek states mein arbi ki kheti iske kand ke liye ki jati hain
arbi ka vanaspati naam colocasia esculenta hain
iski pattiyo mein prakuhya taur par vitamin a , b , c ke alawa calcium aur potassium paya jata hain
iske kando mein protein , starch , vitamin a , b , c aur e ke alawa potassium , maganize , phosphorus aur magnesium paya jata hain
har roj arbi ki sabzi khane se high blood pressure mein kafi fayda hota hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips allergy kitnitarah ki hotihain aur isse bachneke tarike kya hain
general knowledge , health tips a a print email jab hamari body kisi cheez ko napasand karti hain to usay allergy kaha jata hain
environment mein mauzood cheezo se sensitive insaan ko kabhi bhi allergy ho sakti hain
allergy hone ki wajah family history bhi ho sakti hain
agar aapki family background ya purani peedhi ki wajah se aapme allergy hone ki bimari hain to environment ke kuch cheezo ke contact mien aane par aapko allergy ho jayegi
jaisi ki paragkan pollen , dust , dust mite , fungus , medicine , food , beauty products , keet , dhool aadi
allergy hone ke lakshan symptom kya hote hain
body ke kuch parts par allergy ka zyada asar padta hain
allergy kitni tarah ki hoti hain
jukaam allergy ki wajah se hone wale jukaam ka scientific naam allergic rhinitis hain
eczema skin par allergy ka asar hone se baar baar khujli hoti hain
yeh saare symptom haath pair , gardan kanhi ho sakte hain
allergen allergen ke contact mein aane ke baad kisi ko allergy ke lakshan turant to kisi ko kuch der baad mahsoos hote hain
kuch logo mein asthma aur allergy ke lakshan allergen contact mein 4 se 8 ghante baad hote hain
usay late reaction kahte hain
allergen ke contact mein aane se normal jald aur der dono tarah ke reaction hote hain , allergic padarth jaise hi fefdo ya sharir mein daakhil hota hain to uski pahchan turant dushman ke roop mein ho jati hain
scientific research mein yeh paya gya ki jo log allergy se preshan hain , vah agar din mein 2 3 cup coffee regular taur par peete hain to allergy 50 tak kam ho jati hain
se 15 din mein allergy se aaram milega aur allergy door hogi
agar allergy ke mareezo ko phoolo ko paragkan ki wajah se allergy hoti hain to unhe apne gharo mein ped paudhe nahi rakhna chahiye
asthma aur allergy ki wajaho se apna bachaav kare
agar khusboo ki wajah se allergy hoti hain to macchar baghane wale coil , agarbatti , chemical , tez spray nahi lagana chahiye
rajai , gadde , takiye ke cover ko plastic cover mein rakhe

07 diamond facial karwaane ke fayde
diamond facial karwaane ke fayde
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge diamond facial karwaane ke fayde
general knowledge a a print email diamond facial normal facial se kanhi zyada faydemand hota hain
aaj hum janenge ki diamond facial kya hota hain
diamond facial karwaane ke kya fayde hote hain
yeh facial dusre facial ke mukable kaise alag hain aur iske benefits kya hain
aayiye jante hain diamond facial kya hain
diamond ek aisi jewelry hain jo kisi ki bhi ungli mein chaar chaand laga deti hain , kisi bhi gale ko sundar bana deti hain
lekin kya aapko pata hain ki diamond sirf jewelry hi nahi hain balki beauty ko badhane ke liye iska istemal facial ke roop mein bhi kiya ja sakta hain
isse skin se related kai problems ka ilaj kiya ja sakta hain
yeh bejaan aur dry skin ke liye accha saabit ho sakti hain
aaiye jante hain diamond facial karwane ke kya kya fayde hote hain
diamond facial karwaane ke fayde badhti umar ko roke present time mein unbalance lifestyle , unhealthy eating habits aur tension ki wajah se early age mein hi skin par bura asar dikhaayi dene lagta hain
aise mein diamond facial faydemand hota hain
yeh cells ko active kar deta hain jisse skin ki metabolism process fast ho jata hain
exfoliate karna dunia bhar mein diamond ka istemal skin ko exfoliate karne ke liye kiya jata hain
diamond facial skin se dead cells ko hatata hain aur chehre par nikhaar lata hain
tanning door kare ; dhoop mein nikalne ki wajah se suraj ki khatarnaak ultra violet rays ki wajah se tanning ki problem hona lazmi hain
isse tanning ke saath saath black heads ki problem bhi door hoti hain
diamond facial ke liye jaroori cheeze diamond facial kit lekar aap ise apne ghar par khud bhi istemal kar sakti hain
iske liye aapke paas diamond scrub , jisme natural cheeze phoolo ka ark , essential oil , walnut ke saath diamond ash hota hain
iske alawa diamond detoxifying lotion yeh skin ko saaf kar soft banati hain , diamond massage gel isme anti aging gun hote hain , yeh skin mein kasaavat laati hain
aur diamond face mask yeh tanning door kar tavcha mein nikhaar laata hain hona chahiye
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips garmiyo kemausam mein jaroor khani chahiye yeh 10 sabziya
to aayiye jante hain kaun healthy vegetable hain jinhe hame summer season mein jaroor khana chahiye
shimla mirch shimla mirch mein vitamin c , vitamin a aur beta carotene bahut hi jyada matra mein paya jata hain
shimla mirch mein calorie bilkul bhi nahi hoti hain , isliye yeh bad cholesterol ko nahi badhane deti hain
yeh body ko kai tarah ki bimariya jaise heart attack , osteoporosis , motiyabind aur asthma se ladne meinmadad karti hain
palak palak mein kai tarah ke minerals jaise calcium , magnesium , iron aur vitamin a , b , c aadi bharpoor matra mein paye jate hain
iske alawa yeh fiber aur zinc se bharpoor hota hain
isme vitamin a , b6 aur vitamin c hota hain
yeh potassium aur fiber ka accha source hain
yeh blood pressure ko bhi control mein rakhta hain
yeh skin problems ko bhi door karta hain
in sabke alawa yeh blood sugar level aur aant ko bhi sahi rakhta hain
isliye diabetes ke patient ko kaddu khane ki salah di jati hain
hari beans beans mein omega 3 fatty acid paya jata hain
isme vitamin b1 aur b3 paya jata hain
yeh asthma , kidney stone aur blood se related bimariyo ko theek karne mein bhi madad karta hain
karela karela skin se fode funsi , rashes , fungal infection aur daag dhabbe door karne mein bahut madad karta hain
yeh khoon ko saaf karta hain , bloodsugar level ko kam karke diabetes ko door bhagata hain
yeh blood pressure ko bhi theek banaye rakhne mein madadgar hain
yeh body ke temperature ko sahi banaye rakhne mein madad karta hain
kheera potassium , magnesium aur fiber ka khazana hain , jisse bp hamesha control mein rahta hain
isse acidity , gas aur apach ko door kiya ja sakta hain
lauki sodium ka accha source hain

side effects of nail polish in hindi urdu
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips nail polish lagane ke nuksan
general knowledge , health tips a a print email ladies khoobsurat dikhne ke liye nail polish ka istemal jaroor hi karti hain
nail polish lagane ke nuksan side effects of nail polish in hindi urdu
darasal nail polish mein mauzood chemicals eye aur skin ke contact mein aane par health par bahut bura asar daalte hain
nail polish ya kisi bhi dusrecolourful beauty product ko banane ke liye formaldehyde chemical ka istemal hota hain , yeh chemical beauty product ko chipchipa banane ke liye istemal hota hain
isse allergy bhi ho sakti hain
nail polish mein phthalates naam ka ek oily chemical hota hain , jo lagatewaqt isme crack nahi padne deta hain
lekin jab yeh aankho aur mooh ke contact mein aata hain to infection hone ka khatra badh jata hain
nail polish mein toluene chemical sabse khatarnaak chemical hota hain
zyada der tak toluene soonghne se brain cells mar jate hain
cancer hone ka khatra ; formaldehyde aisa chemical hota hain jo cancer paida karne wala mana gya hain
isse cancer se bante hain
reedh ki haddi par asar padta hain neurotoxins aise zehreele chemical hote hain jo direct brain par asar daalte hain
nervous system ko bhi nuksaan pahuchane ke liye yehchemical jana jata hain
triphenyl phosphate hota hain nail polish ke label par kanhi bhi triphenyl phosphate ka zikr nahi kiya jata hain
gale ka infection nail polish lagane ka sabse bura side effect gale ke infection ke taur par saamne aata hain
brest feeding karwane wali maao se yeh bacche mein chala jata hain
isse bacche ke vikas par direct asar padta hain
brain par bura asar daale isme paye jane wale chemical jab body ke ander chale jate hain to dimaag aur nervous system par bura asar daalte hain
01 why doesnt keep eggs in fridge ande
general knowledge a a print email ande fridge mein nahi rakhne chahiye , scientists ka aisa kahna hain
ande ko fridge mein rakhne ke baad phir usay room temperature par rakhne par condensation hone ka khatra kafi badh jata hain
condensation se ande ke chhilke mein mauzood bacteria ki speed badh sakti hain aur uske ander daakhil hone ke chances bhi badh jate hain
room temperature par rakhe gye ande jyada dino tak tikate hain
fridge mein rakhe gye eggs boil karte waqt jaldi toot jate hain
fridge ki cooling se eggs mein paye jane wale kai poshak tatv bhi khatm ho jate hain
toh dosto aapne jana ki ande ko fridge mein kyon nahi rakhna chahiye why doesn't keep eggs in fridge

06 ande khane ke fayde benefits of egg
ande khane ke fayde benefits of egg hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips ande khane ke fayde benefits of egg 0 health tips a a print email kahte hain ki garmiyo mein anda khana sehat ke liye accha nahi hota , kyonki yeh garmi ko aur jyada badha deta hain
energy deta hain ande mein bahut sara protein aur nutrients paye jate hain
gram protein hota hain
ande mein vo saare amino acids mauzood hote hain , jinhe body ki jaroorat hoti hain
yeh cells ke damaging ko rokte hain aur brain ko active rakhte hain
iron oxygen ke saath mil kar immunity system ko sahi rakhta hain
saath hi , metabolism level ko control karta hain
ande mein vitamin a , e aur b12 ke alawa folate ki bhi bharpoor matra hoti hain
ande mein mauzood anti oxidants , lutein aur zeaxanthin aankhon ko healthy rakhne ke liye bahut hi jaroori hote hain
healthy baalon aur nakhoono ke liye ande mein mauzood protein , vitamin d aur nutrients baalo ke saath hi nakhoono ko bhi majbooti pradan karta hain
ande mein amino acids , sulfur aur zinc ki mauzoodagi body ke saath saath skin aur baalo ko healthy rakhti hain
yeh calcium ko observe karke haddiyo ko majboot banata hain
doodh , dahi jaise dairy products ke saath hi ande ka sewan umar badhne ke saath hone wale osteoporosis aur arthritis jaisi bimariyo ko door rakhta hain

01 pet ki common problems se preshan logo
pet ki common problems se preshan logo ko jaroor khani chahiye yeh cheeze

health tips a a print email pet khush toh sab khus , pet mein dard , gas aur acidity common problems hain
is problems ka main reason khana theek se na pachna hain
papita papita mein vitamin a , folic acid , vitamin b6 aur vitamin b1 aadi poshak tatv paye jate hain
isme fiber adhik matra mein paya jata hain
adrak adrak pet ki samsyaon ke liye behtar aushidhi hain
isme anti bacterial aur anti inflammatory gun mauzood hote hain
rojana ek cup subah adrak ki chaay ginger tea peene se digestion durust ho jata hain
adrak ke ras mein shahad mila kar peene se bhi pet ki problems door ho jati hain
nimbu nimbu mein vitamin c adhik matra mein paya jata hain
isliye iska sewan pet ke liye bahut hi faydemand mana gya hain
ajwain ajwain pet ke liye medicine ki tarah kaam karta hain
is paani mein chini mila kar peeye , acidity se rahat milegi
seb seb mein vitamin a aur c ke saath anek poshak tatv paye jate hain
pudina pudina mein anti inflammatory aur anti septic gun paye jate hain
pudine wali green tea bana kar peene se gas ki problem se turant rahat milti hain
aloe vera juice aloe vera juice pet ke liye bahut hi faydemand hota hain

is bimari mein body ka uric acid badh jata hain , jisse joints mein dard paida hotahain
carotenewale food gathiya ko theek kar sakte hain
