05 jaitun ke tel ke fayde benefits of
jaitun ke tel ke fayde benefits of olive oil hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips jaitun ke tel ke fayde benefits of olive oil 0 health tips a a print email lite aur healthy khane ke saath hi olive oil jaitun ka tel khane ka swaad dugna kar deta hain
haddiyo ki majbooti ke liye olive oil haddiyo se calcium observe karne ki capacity ko badhaata hain , jo nayi haddiya banane ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
iske saath hi umar badhne ke saath hone wali kai bimariya jaise osteoporosis , peeth dard aur arthritis se bhi bacha ja sakta hain
haddiyo ki majbooti ke liye olive oil jetun ka tel bahut hi upyogi hain
liver sahi rakhta hain
anti oxidants ka khazana olive oil , kharab khan pan ke karan hone wale liver damage ko rok kar usay healthy banaata hain
saath hi yeh free radicals se bhi bachata hain
olive oil mein kai saare aise minerals mauzood hote hain hain jo liver ki androoni saaf safaai kar usay healthy rakhne ke liye bahut hi jaroori hote hain
diabetes mein faydemand is oil mein aise healthy chemicals paye jate hain jo sharir mein blood sugar level ko control karte hain
olive oil pachne ke baad insulin ke taur par kaam karta hain , jiski diabetes ke rogiyo ko bahut jyada jaroorat hoti hain
alzheimer ke khatre ko kam kare olive oil mein oleocanthal naam ka tatv paya jata hain jo dimaag ke kaam karne ki capacity ko sahi rakhta hain , saath hi yaddasht ko bhi badhaata hain
isse badhti umar ke saath bhoolne ki bimari alzheimer ki sambhavna kafi kam ho jati hain
dryness door kare skin ki dryness ko bina koi cream lagaye door karna ho , to olive oil ek behtar option hain
lagatar kuch dino tak aisa karne se skin ki dryness door ho jati hain
kai tarah ke mehnge makeup remover ka sahara lena padta hain
makeup asaani se hat jayega
stretch marks hatane ke liye motape aur exercise ki wajah se pet aur seene ke aas paas stretch marks pad jate hain , jinhe door karna thoda mushkil hota hain , lekin olive ke dwaara iske nishaan ko halka jaroor kiya ja sakta hain
iske istemal se stretch mark se bacha ja sakta hain
chehre ki jhurriyo ko door kare olive oil mein vitamin e ke saath hydroxytyrosol naam ka anti oxidant hota hain
tanning se rahat dilaaye
tanning ke chalte skin 2 rango ki dikhne lagti hain
sunscreen ka istemal isi tanning se bachne ke liye kiya jata hain
jankar hairaani hogi ki olive oil iske liye bhi bahut kargar hain
iske liye facial aur massage bahut hi jaroori hain
hafte mein sirf ek baar olive oil ka massage blood circulation ko sahi rakhne ke saath skin ke glow aur moisturizer ko banaye rakhta hain
iske liye garm olive oil ki kuch boonde chehre par lagaye

lahsun glucose ke level ko kam karta hain

sprout bhi le sakte hain
brown bread , oat , daliya khaye
mahine mein 1 2 liter tel kafi hain
doodh se bani cheeze doodh , dahi , paneer le , lekin low fat wali
double toned doodh ka istemal accha hain
masale aur anya methi , lahsun aur dalchini khoon mein glucose level ko kam karte hain aur good cholesterol ko badhate hain

09 treadmill par running karte huye in
treadmill par running karte huye in baato ka rakhe khyaal
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips treadmill par running karte huye in baato ka rakhe khyaal
general knowledge , health tips a a print email treadmill par running karna cardio exercise ka sabse badhiya tarika hain
baaki machines ke compare mein treadmill ke jariye wajan kam karna utna bhi mushkil nahi hain , lekin treadmill par daudte waqt kuch saavdhaaniya jaroor baratani chahiye
treadmill par running ke samay thodi si laparvaahi aapko chhotil kar sakti hain
to aaiye jante hain treadmill ke safety tips jo aapko janana bahut hi jaroori hain , agar aap treadmill ka istemal karte hain
running ke dauraan handrail na pakde aksar aisa hota hain ki treadmill par daudte daute log handrail pakad lete hain
nange paanv treadmill par na daude friction aur tez movement ke chalte kafi heat paida hoti hain , isliye agar aap bina shoes ke treadmill par running karenge to aapke pairo mein jalan ho sakti hain
iske alawa fungus aur bacteria ka bhi khatra hota hain
isliye fitting shoes pahan kar hi treadmill par daud lagaye
jaroorat se jyada rakhe treadmill ki speed treadmill par running karne se pahle apni ' target heart rate ' jaan lijiye
kisi ko bhi apni ' target heart rate ' ki 50 70 speed se jyada par nahi daudna chahiye
machine start karne se pahle belt nahi deck par rakhe paanv vaise to jab bhi aap treadmill ko start karenge , uski shuruvati speed kam hi rahti hain , yani ki is baat se koi fark nahi padta ki last time ise band karne se pahle iski speed kya thi
machine mein yeh feature isliye diya jata hain taki achanak fast speed mein belt ghoomne se aapka balance na bigad jaye

inme vitmin d , b5 aur b6 hote hain

what is the side effects of coffee in hindi urdu
pregnant woman ko nahi peeni chahiye coffee pregnant aurto ko coffee peeni chahiye ya nahi is baat ko lekar experts ki ek raay nahi hain
coffe peene se bhroon caffeine ke contact mein aata hain aur garbh mein pal rahe bacche iske prati kafi sensitive hote hain
kareeb 1000 aisi ladies par research ki gyi jinke periods band ho chuki thi
acidity paida karti hain coffee peene se pet mein kai saari problems paida ho sakti hain

jabki dry skin kadak aur jhurriyo se bhari hoti hain

isliye jo log french press coffee ya turkish coffee peena pasand karte hain , unhe filtered coffee peeni chahiye
caffeine ke overdose hone ki wajah se khas karke america mein kai logo ki jaan ja chuki hain
researchers ka manna yeh hain ki jodo ki preshani khas karke unfiltered coffee peene se jyada hoti hain
coffee acidic hoti hain aur aapke daanto ke enamel ko kharaab kar sakti hain

04 kidney stone mein rahat deti hain yeh
kidney stone mein rahat deti hain yeh 10 cheeze
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips kidney stone mein rahat deti hain yeh 10 cheeze
health tips a a print email unbalanced lifestyle , wrong khan paan aur sahi tarah ki activity ke na hone se gurdey ki patthari hone ki problem hoti hain , jise kidney stone bhi kaha jata hain
kidney stone se bachne ke liye in cheezo ka kare istemal
isme potassium ki quantity kam hoti hain aur vitamin k bahut jyada paya jata hain
ek research ke anusaar vitamin b ki 100 150 milligram quantity niyamit roop se lene se gurde ki patthari se nijat milta hain
din tak iska istemal kare , yeh kidney stone mein fayda degi
isme albumin aur sodium chloride ki matra bahut hi kam hoti hain , jo patthari ke upchar ke liye faydemand hain
lal angoor heart aur kidney ko healthy rakhne ke liye red grapes bahut hi faydemand mane gye hain
isme mauzood probiotic bacteria kidney ki safai kar nuksaandeh padartho ko bahar kar deta hain
isse kidney stone ki problem nahi hoti hain
bathua aadha kilo bathua ko 800 ml

09 1g 2g 3g 4g aur 5g mein antar kya hain
1g , 2g , 3g , 4g aur 5g mein antar kya hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge tech tips 1g , 2g , 3g , 4g aur 5g mein antar kya hain
general knowledge , tech tips a a print email haal ke dino mein 4g technique kafi charcha mein hain
mobile service provider companies 4g sewa launch karne ki soch rahi hain
ek taraf jaha reliance geo desh bhar mein bade paimaane par saal ke aakhir tak 4g service launch karne wali hain
ummeed hain ki agle 2 3 mahino mein vodafone bhi 4g service ko launch kar degi
to aaiye jante hain mobile service ki techniques aur kya kya difference hain in alag alag generation ki mobile taknik mein 1g 1g takneek duniya mein wireless phones ki pahli technique mani jati hain
is takneek ki sabse badi khami iski roaming ka na hona tha
pahli baar america mein 1g mobile system ne is technique ka upyog kiya tha
is technique mein mobile phone par voice ki quality kafi kharab thi , saath hi yeh battery bhi bahut khapat karti thi
is technique par chalne wale mobile bhi kafi heavy hua karte thay
yeh analog system par aadhaarit takneek thi
2g 2g takneek ki shurvaat 1991 mein finland mein hui
yeh global system for mobile communication par adhaarit takneek hain jise short form mein gsm technology kaha jata hain
is technique ke jariye phone calls ke ilawa picture message , text message aur multimedia message bheja jane laga
is technique ki sabse badi khoobi yeh thi ki ise istemal karne se kafi kam energy consume hoti hain aur phone ki battery kafi jyada chalti hain
is takneek par data ke aane jane ki speed 50 , 000 bits per second tak ho sakti hain
yeh takneek mukhya roop se aawaaz ke signal ko broadcast karta hain
2g takneek se download aur upload ki maximum speed 236 kbps kilo byte per second hoti hain
iske advance version ko
7g ka naam diya gya tha , data ke exchange ki speed bhi badh gyi thi
is takneek ka standardization international telecommunication union itu ne kiya tha
is technique ke madhyam se text , pictures aur video ke alawa mobile television aur video conferencing ya video call kiya ja sakta hain
3g takneek ka jor mukhya roop se data transfer par hain
3g takneek mein maximum download speed 21 mbps aur upload speed
mbps hoti hain
is technique ne mobile phones ke liye app banane ka rasta khol diya
4g 4g takneek ki shuruvat saal 2010 ke aakhir mein hui
ise mobile technique ki 4th generation kaha jata hain
yeh global roaming ko support karta hain
yeh technique 3g takneek ke mukable kanhi sasti takneek hain
saath hi isme security features bhi jyada hain
jaise 3g ke mukable kanhi jyada battery khapat karta hain
4g takneek se less mobile mein hard hardware system ki jaroorat hoti hain , isliye 3g phones ke mukable 4g phone mahnge hote hain
4g takneek ki basic infrastructure ko taiyaar karne mein mehnge gadgets lagane padte hain
philhaal 4g takneek duniya ke kafi kam desho mein available hain , jinme jyadatar development countries shamil hain , lekin khushi ki baat yeh hain ki yeh takneek bharat mein bhi mauzood hain
3g takneek ki sabse badi khami jaha iske data ka minimum speed
5g ke barabar hona hain
5g ; 5g takneek ki shuruvaat saal 2010 mein hui
ise mobile network ki 5th generation kaha jata hain
yeh wireless world wide web mobile internet ko dhyaan mein rakh kar banaya gya hain
is technique mein bade paimaane par data ka aadan pradaan kiya ja sakta hain
isme hd quality ka video ke saath multimedia newspaper broadcast ki ja sakti hain
saath hi is takneek se video calling ke sectors mein revolution aa jayegi
is takneek mein ultra high definition quality ki voice ka broadcast kiya ja sakta hain
is technique ki sabse badi khoobi real time ke bade se bada data transfer karna hoga
saath hi yeh takneek augmented reality ke sector mein naya rasta kholegi , yani ki is technique se aap phone call par bilkul aamne saamne baat kar paane mein saksham honge
philhaal britain ki capital london mein 2020 tak is takneek ko lagane ki taiyaari chal rahi hain

isme anti fungal , anti septic , de detoxifying gun paye jate hain
yeh tavcha ki alag alag samsyaon jaise eczema , sukhapan aur allergy se rahat dilata hain

anti oxidants , vitamin a , c aur kai minerals se bharpoor dhaniya cancer se bachaav karta hain

iski bhale hi scientific taur par pushti naa hui ho , aur kharij bhi nahi kiya gya hain
lekin research jaroor kiye gye hain
janwaro ke earthquake ke sanket dene ko lekar italy , japan , china sahit kai desho mein charcha hoti rahi hain
water ke under rahne wale animals ke bare mein scientist kehte hain ki ground water ke chemicals mein kuch change ho sakta hain , jisse pani mein rehne vale janwar ko sanket mil sakta hain
aisa mendhako ne earthquake aane ke kuch din pahle kiya tha
is par italy mein research kiye gye thay
research ke result mein yeh likha gya , ho sakta hain ki earth ke bheetar pressure ke karan chattaon se charged atom nikle ho aur water ke saath unka reaction ho gya ho
research team ko lead karne vale ne kaha tha ki unke thesis ke base par biologist aur zoologist ko aage kaam karna chahiye
lekin 18 20 feet lambi jab kuch oarfish kisi samunder ke kinare paayi jati hain , to earthquake ko lekar rumors chalne lagti hain
japan times ne ise messenger from the sea god kaha tha
chili ke 2010 earthquake ke pahle kuch fishersmen ne kuch oarfish ko dekha tha
red ants european geoscience union ki ek salana meeting mein pesh kiye gye ek research ki report ke mutabik red ants lal chinti bhi bhookamp ke sanket ko samajh sakti hain
gabriele berberich naam ke geo biologist ne iske liye ants par 3 saal ka analysis kiya
unhone kaha ki jab 1 baar 2 rector scale par bhookamp aaya to ants ki gatividhi badal gyi
billi cat animal planet ne kuch research ke hawale se kaha hai ki billion cats ke kuch sanket bhi bhookamp aane ke suchak ho sakte hain

antioxidants mauzood hone se yeh cancer se bachaav karke sharir ko thandak deta hain
ayurveda ke anusaar garmiyo mein din mein 2 baar chhachh pee sakte hain

milk shake calcium aur energy ka behatrin source milk shake swaad mein lajawaab hota hain aur ise kisi bhi samay piya ja sakta hain

isse blood pressure aur tension kam hota hain
yeh skin ko healthy banane ke saath liver ke liye bhi faydemand hota hain

05 amrood khane ke fayde benefits of guava
amrood khane ke fayde benefits of guava hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips amrood khane ke fayde benefits of guava 0 health tips a a print email amroodh ek aisa phal hain , jo har season mein mil jata hain
yeh vitamin c , fiber aur anya kai jaroori minerals se bharpoor phal hain
jyada kabz hone par amrood body ke metabolism ko balance rakhta hain
amrood mein mauzood vitamin c , anti oxidants aur carotene skin ke liye bahut hi faydemand hote hain
saath hi , isme mauzood potassium ke karan iske niyamit sewan se skin glow karne lagti hain , aur keel muhanse se chhutkara milta hain
skin glowing karne wale kai tarah ke cosmetics mein amrood ke gude ka istemal kiya jata hain
motapa kam karne ke liye wajan kam karna chahte hain aur bhojan mein protein , vitamins aur fiber ki matra barabar rakhna chahte hain , to amrood khana shuru kar de
kyonki isme kafi matra mein vitamins , protein aur minerals mauzood hote hain
saath hi , cholesterol aur carbohydrate ki matra kafi kam hoti hain
to agli dieting schedule mein amrood ko shamil karna na bhule
isse mahilaon ki fertility badhti hain
vitamin c amrood mein orange se bhi 4 guna jyada vitamin c hota hain
vitamin c mein mauzood anti oxidants sharir ki immunity ko badhata hain aur cancer se ladne mein madadgar hota hain
potassium aur sodium amrood mein mauzood potassium sharir mein sodium ke prabhav ko kam karta hain
jisse blood pressure control mein rahta hain
saath hi cholesterol level bhi kam hota hain
diabetes diabetes ke mareez ke liye amrood kafi labhdayak hain
kyonki isme mauzood fiber sugar level ko kam karta hain
yeh sugar ko digest karne aur insulin badhane mein madad karta hain
type 2 diabetes marizo ko to din mein kam se kam 2 baar amrood jaroor khana chahiye
thyroid amrood mein copper hota hain , jo thyroid ko control karta hain
thyroid gland bahut hi mahatavpurn gland hain , jo kai prakar ke hormones aur organ system ko control karta hain
amrood mein iodine bhi hota hain
jo sharir mein hormones ko balance banaye rakhta hain
saath hi niacin bhi , jisse blood circulation sahi rahta hain
blood circulation sahi hone par dimaag bhi active rahta hain

04 auto sweep account kya hain jyada byaaz

finance a a print email aapke bachat khate mein padi rashi par kitna byaaz milta hain
yeh sambhav hain auto sweep facility ke jariye , jise flexi deposit scheme kaha jata hain
vahi fixed deposit par 8 percent interest milta hain
what is auto sweep account auto sweep facility saving account aur fix deposit ka mixture hain
jise threshold limit kahte hain
ab aapke khate mein ho jayenge 29 hazar rupaye , aur auto sweep facility lagoo ho jayegi
jo aapki threshold limit 10 hazar se kam hain
yani ki threshold limit se 5 hazar rupaye jyada

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home smartphone tablet tech tips kaise kare apne gadgets ko clean
smartphone , tablet , tech tips a a print email logo ko khana khate waqt bhi smartphone ko use karne ki aadat hoti hain
tips for cleaning gadgets in hindi urdu
gadgets ko saaf karne ka tarika
mein safety ko dekhte huye protecting coating ki jati hain agar aap windex ya usse milta julta koi product use kar rahe hain
television ko hamesha microfiber cloth se hi saaf karna chahiye
screen par jami dust ko aap easily saaf kar sakte hain
aap paani ke saath liquid soap ka bhi istemal kar sakte hain
agar aap fitness wrist band pahante hain to veh bhi bahut easily gande ho jate hain
phir ek kapde par alcohol ya vinegar lekar halke haathon se wrist band ko saaf kare
kai smartphone aise hote hain jinke camera lens par cover ka istemal hua hota hain
yeh cover phone ke camera lens ko surakshit rakhte hain , lekin phir bhi jab aap mobiles ki safaai kare to badi hi saavdhaani ke saath saaf kare
agar lens mein dhool ya gandagi chali gyi hain to micro fiber cloth se usay saaf kare
television ka remote ya kisi bhi gadget ke remote ko saaf karne ke liye aap board saaf karne wali technique ka istemal kare
water alcohol ke mixture se aap apne remote ko easily clean kar sakte hain
if you have use white data cable , toh yeh bahut hi jaldi dirty ho jate hain
aapko data cables ko saaf karne ke liye vinegar ya alcohol ka istemal karna chahiye
kapde mein vinegar ya alcohol laga kar aap data cables ko easily clean kar sakte hain
agar aap notebook use karte hain to aapko iski screen aur keypad dono ko saaf karna aana chahiye
phir screen par cleaning spray kare
aap apne headphone ko paani aur alcohol se saaf kar sakte hain
phir phone ki screen par spray maare
aap half water half vinegar ko mix karke bhi phone ki safaai kar sakte hain
aap kisi smartphone cleaning spray ka bhi use kar sakte hain
phone ko halke kapde se saaf karna chahiye jisse screen par scratch na pade
aap easily plastic pod ki safaai kar sakte hain
safaai karte time sabse dhyaan rakhne wali cheez hain ki aap apne speaker ko damage na kar de

isme aapko android

yeh bacteria ke growth ko rokti hain

09 bhutta makka khane ke fayde benefits of
bhutta makka khane ke fayde benefits of sweet corn hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips bhutta makka khane ke fayde benefits of sweet corn 0 health tips a a print email sweet corn jise aam bol chal ki bhasha mein bhutta , makka , makai , makki ya chhalli kaha jata hain , ise khane ke bahut hi fayde hote hain
fibers , minerals , carbohydrates , potassium ki sahi matra liye sweet corn har tarike se sehat ke liye fayde mand hain
aaiye jante hain sweet corn makka , bhutta , makai ko khane ke fayde
dil ki bimari door karta hain bhutta dil ki bimari ko bhi door karne mein sahayak hain , kyonki isme vitamin c , carotenoid aur bioflavonoid paya jata hain
cancer se bachata hain sweet corn mein beta cryptoxanthin naam ka chemical hota hain jo kafi hud tak beta carotene se milta julta hain
ise body vitamin a mein badal deti hain
beta cryptoxanthin aur lung cancer ka opposite relation hain
matlab sharir mein beta cryptoxanthin ki sahi matra hone se lung cancer se koso door raha ja sakta hain
pregnancy mein faydemand iska sewan pregnancy mein bahut hi faydemand hota hain , isliye garbhvati mahilaon ko ise apne aahaar mein jaroor shamil karna chahiye
anemia door kare iron ki kami ki wajah se anemia ki bimari ho jati hain , isliye isko door karne ke liye bhutta khana chahiye , kyonki isme vitamin b aur folic acid hota hain , jisse anemia door hota hain
cardiovascular mein faydemand sweet corn folate ka bahut hi accha source hain , jise vitamin b9 ke naam se bhi jana jata hain
iski sahi matra sharir mein homocysteine level ko balance karti hain , jo blood vessels ko damage karti hain
rojana folate ki sahi matra lekar 10 tak heart attack ke khatre ko kam kiya ja sakta hain
energy deta hain ek adult ko din bhar ki energy ke liye 130 gram carbohydrate ki jaroorat hoti hain
ek cup pake huye sweet corn mein 31 gram carbohydrate ki matra hoti hain jo physically aur mentally dono ki energy ke liye jaroori hain
ise instant energy paane ke liye bhi khaya ja sakta hain
ek cup sweet corn mein 325 mg potassium ki matra hoti hain
bhutte ke peele daano mein bahut saara magnesium , iron , copper aur phosphorus paya jata hain , jisse haddiya majboot banti hain
immunity power badhata hain protein doosra aisa nutrient hain , jiski sharir ko sabse jyada jaroorat hoti hain
iska kaam cells ko baahri toot foot se bachana , muscles banana aur immunity power ko badhana hain
sweet corn mein protein bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain
purusho ko rojana 56 gram aur mahilaon ko 46 gram protein ki jaroorat hoti hain , jise sirf ek cup sweet corn kha kar asaani se pura kiya ja sakta hain
corn mein anti oxidants paye jate hain , jisse skin lambe samay tak jawan dikhaai deti hain
jisme linolic acid paya jata hain

aise mein log usay rumaal , table cloth , t shirt ya phir towel aadi se saaf karne lag padte hain
aise mein smartphone ko saaf karne ke liye microfiber cloth ka istemal kare

aise mein screen guard lagvate samay yeh dhayaan de ki aap kaun sa screen guard lagva rahe hain

04 apple cider vinegar ke gharelu nuskhe
apple cider vinegar ke gharelu nuskhe aur fayde
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge apple cider vinegar ke gharelu nuskhe aur fayde
general knowledge a a print email apple cider vinegar seb ke sirke ke gharelu nuskhe kya hain aur isse hame kya fayde hote hain
what is the home remedies of apple cider vinegar its benefits in hindi urdu
sebkofermentation ek special kism metabolism process , jisse beer , bread aadi banti hain , usi tarah ka process karke nikalegye ek special liquid cider kaha jata hain
is fermented liquid se hi apple cidervinegartaiyaarkiya jata hain
ise hi apple cider vinegar kaha jata hain
apple cider vinegar ko nahane se pahle pure sharir par lagaye aur phir nahaye
apple cider vinegar mein potassium ke sath hi calcium aur phosphorus paya jata hain
isliye thoda apple cider vinegar lene se haddiya healthy rahti hain
multani mitti mein thoda shahad aur apple cider vinegar mila kar paste banaye aur ise chehre parlagaye
agaraap digestion se judi problem se preshan hain toh paani mein thoda shahad aur apple cider vinegar mila kar le , fayda hoga
apple cidervinegar mein pectin zyada quantity mein paya jata hain , jo kabzke saath hi gas aur acidity jaisi samsyaon ko bhi khatm kar deta hain
applecidervinegar mein anti septic properties hoti hain
iske niyamit sewan se fungalaur bacterialinfection door hota hain
yeh diabetes ko bhi control karta hain
shampoo karne ke baad 1 chammach apple cidervinegar ko 1 glass paani mein mila le
apple cider vinegar dast ki problem mein faydemand hain
ek glass mein thoda adrak crush karle , usmethoda shahad aur apple cider vinegar mila le
apple cider vinegarsinus ke mareezo ke liye bahut hi faydemand hota hain
isme acetic acidhota hain jo wajan ko kam karne mein madadkarta hain
note apple cider vinegar ko hamesha paani mein ya herbal tea mein hi mila kar lena chahiye
01 boys ke pimple remove karne ke upyogi
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips boys ke pimple remove karne ke upyogi tips aur gharelu nuskhe
general knowledge , health tips a a print email pimples ek aisi problem hain jo na sirf girls ko hi hoti hain , balki yeh ladko ko bhi preshan karta hain
aaiye jante hain ladke boys men apne face se pimples ko kaise remove kar sakte hain
home remedies for remove pimples problem in hindi urdu
yeh chehre ke pimples aur scars remove karne mein help karta hain
iske alawa honey milk dono hi face ko moisturize karke smooth bhi banate hain
masoor ki daal masoor ki daal ke face pack pimples remove karne ka best tarika mana jata hain
aap is face pack ko 2 tariko se bana sakte hain
is pest ko 15 minutes ke liye face par laga rahne de
isse aapko pimples ki problems se nijaat to milta hi hain , saath hi aapki skin soft shining bhi ban jati hain
iske liye kheere ko kaatkar isey aap mixture mein pees le
nimbu ka ras nimbu ka ras face ke liye kisi beauty products se kam nahi hain
yeh face pack chehre ke liye best mana jata hain
aaloo ka ras aaloo ke ras mein kheera ka ras mix kare aur cotton ki help se ise chehre par lagaye
ise 15 minutes tak face par laga rahne de , phir gungune paani se chehre ko dho le
haldi haldi mein gulabjal mila kar pest banaye aur ise face par apply kare
kyonki haldi mein antioxidants paye jate hain jo pimples ko theek karta hain

bsnl , finance a a print email bsnl ne apne telecom users ko 15 june 2015 se ek nayi saugat dene ka faisla karegi jo unke bill mein katauti karegi
bsnl ne khatm ki roaming bsnl ne aagaami 15 june se national roaming par lagne wale shulk ko khatm karne ka faisla kiya hain
iske saath hi wi fi hotspot par suchna dete huye prashad ne kaha ki unki sarkar yeh aashvaasan dilayegi ki agle 2 saalo mein desh bhar ke famous tourist spots par wi fi hotspot skriya ho jaye , iske saath hi july tak mobile number portability shuru karne ki suchna di
trai ne diye sanket telecom authority of india pahle hi telecom companies dwara liye jane wale roaming charges par kainchi chala chuki hain
trai ne sabhi companies ko apne roaming charges mein bhari antar karne ka adesh diya tha
isme call par liye jane wale charges aur national sms shamil thay
lekin bsnl ne charges kam karne ki jagah khatm kar diye hain
iske alawa may mahine mein bsnl ke prepaid aur postpaid users dwara use kiye jane wale tariff charges ko 40 tak kam kiya ja chuka hain

health tips a a print email kya aap vitamin a ke source ke bare mein janna chahte hain
vitamin a source list in hindi urdu
to yeh article jaroor padhe
vitamin a vegetable aur non vegetable dono tarah ke food mein paya jata hain
jaha meat non veg mein vitamin aretinoid ke roop mein hota hain to vegetable shakahari mein yeh carotenoid ke roop mein hota hain
vitamin a body ki immunity ko bhi badhata hain , cells ke vikas mein bhi madad karta hain aur skin ko soft bhi banata hain
agar aap vegetarian ya non vegetarian hain to aap kisi bhi tarah se vitamin a ko apni diet se pa sakte hain
aisa mana gya hain ki carotenoid mein anti oxidant mazood hota hain
pregnant woman ko bhi vitamin a wali cheezo ko jaroor khana chahiye
vitamin a red , yellow aur orange color ki sabziyo mein zyada paya jata hain
kuch log aise bhi hote hain jo vitamin a ki kami ko pura karne ke liye cod liver oil ka bhi istemal karte hain
aaiye jante hain ki vitamin a ke source kya hain
lekin yakin maniye doodh vitamin a ka bahut hi accha source hain
yani ki kaddu vitamin a ka sabse best source hain
lal shimla mirch lal shimla mirch jitna dekhne mein khoobsurat hoti hain utna hi yeh carotenoid aur anti oxidants se bhi bharpoor hoti hain
gajar gajar ko yunhi nahi vitamin a ka sabse best source kaha gya hain
matlab saaf hain ki gajar vitamin a ka sabse jabardast source hain
gajar vitamin a ka bahut hi accha source hain
kaleji agar aap non vegetarian hain to aapko murge ya bakre ki kaleji jigar liver jaroorkhana chahiye
isliye chhote baccho ko vitamin a ki kami ko pura karne ke liye bakre ki kalejikhane ki salah di jati hain
tamatar tamatar mein anti oxidants aur vitamin a bahut hi acchi matra mein paye jate hain
tomato lycopene ka bahut hi accha source hain jo body ko cancer cells ko badhne se rokta hain
tamatar mein chromium bhi paya jata hain jo blood sugar ko control karne mein madad karta hain
haripattedar sabziya hari pattedar sabziyasabhi tarah ke vitamins ka good source mani jati hain to bhala vitamin a isse kaise achhoota rah sakta hain
isliye hari pattedar sabziyo ko apni diet mein jaroor shamil karna chahiye kyonki yeh vitamins aur minerals ka bahut hi accha source mani jati hain
fish ko brain food bhi kaha jata hain aur yaddast badhane aur dimaag ko tez karne mein bhi madad karti hain kyonki isme omega 3 fatty acid bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain
in sabke alawa vitamin a , chukandar , saag , broccoli , aam , makkhan , anda , beans , rajma , meat , papita , chiku , matar , sea food , tarbooz , makkai ke daane , santri aur peele rang ke phal , sarso , sabut anaaz , paneer , shalgam aur cod liver oil mein bhi bahut acchi matra mein paya jata hain

05 khajoor khane ke fayde benefits of dates
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips khajoor khane ke fayde
health tips a a print email dry fruits ke taur par khaye jane wale khajoor mein sehat se jude kai saare fayde chhipe huye hote hain
bahut saare vitamins aur minerals se bharpoor khajoor ka swaad mitha hota hain
per 100 gram khajoor mein
jo blood se cholesterol ki matra ko kam karta hain
protein ka khazana sharir mein balanced protein ki matra growth ke saath muscle banane ke liye jaroori hoti hain
iski pryapt matra sharir ke function ko sahi rakhti hain
vitamin c ka source khajoor kai saare vitamins jaise vitamin b1 , b2 , b3 , aur vitamin a aur c ka accha source hain
vitamin a jise anti oxidant ke roop mein jana jata hain
vitamin a ki matra lung aur oral cancer ko kafi kam kar deti hain
body ko energy deta hain khajoor mein glucose , sucrose aur fructose paye jate hain , jo body mein energy banaye rakhne ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
isme calorie ki matra na ke barabar hoti hain , jo healthy rahne ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
khajoor ki per 100 gram matra mein 696 ml potassium ki matra hoti hain
yeh sharir ke naye cell aur fluid ko banati hain
yeh heart ke saath hi blood pressure ko control mein rakhta hain
iske alawa fluorine ki matra daanto ki samsya se chhutkara dilati hain
aur to aur ratondhi , aankhon se judi problem bhi door ho jati hain khajoor se skin ko hone vale fayde khajoor mein vitamin a , b1 , b2 , b3 , protein , calcium , phosphorus , iron aur magnesium skin ki andruni saaf safai karne ke saath hi uski chamak ko barkarar rakhte hain
rozana iske sewan se kair prakar ki skin problems , infections aadi se bacha ja sakta hain
anti aging ka kaam free radicals skin cells ko damage kar deti hain
khajoor mein vitamin c hota hain , jo is problem se bachata hain
isse skin young rahti hain

05 perfect selfie lene ke top tips
perfectselfie lene ke top tips
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home smartphone tech tips perfectselfie lene ke top tips
smartphone , tech tips a a print email aaj kal ke zamane mein selfie ka trend badhta hi ja raha hain
smartphone se log jab bhi mauka milta hain selfie lena nahi bhooltehain
bedroom se lekar party event , travelling tak har jagah selfie lene ka bhoot chadha rahtahain
jin logo ko selfie lene ki aadat ho , unhe aaj hum batayenge aise top tips jo perfect selfie khichne ke liye hain
aaiye jante hain perfect selfie click karne ke khas tips do something interesting kuch interesting kaam karte huye selfie lena kafi special hotahain
don t editphoto selfie ko kabhi bhi edit nahi karni chahiye
one hand or two hand selfie lete waqt aap kaun sa haath use kar rahe hain , yeh bhi mayne rakhta hain
adjust your shoulder placement agar aapka shoulder camera ke parallelhain toh usey side ki aor thoda aur jhuka de
use back camera aamtaur par selfie lovers hamesha se selfie lene ke liye front camera ka istemal karte hain
back camera ka resolution kafi high hota hain , jisme blurrinesske chance kafi kam hote hain
experiments with angles selfie lete waqt perfect angle ka hamesha dhyaan rakhe
jaise ki aap selfie lene ja rahe hain , apne seer ko ekbaar right side aur phir left side rakh kar phone ki screen par nazar dale
aise mein jo angle aapko accha lageturant photo click kare
isiliye selfie lete waqt smiling face hamesha se important hota hain
pose with something new kisi bhi perfect selfie mein pose ka role kafi important hota hain
different poses mein selfie lene ka alag hi mazahain
kabhi glasses laga kar , kabhi hair style change karke , vahi ghar mein koi paaltujaanwar hain toh uske saath selfie lena best option hain
take a full bodyshot jyadatarselfie mein aapka chehra hi dikhayi deta hain , lekin full body shot lena ek behtaroption ban sakta hain
kisi full size mirror ke saamne selfielena ek alag experience hota hain , toh abki baar jaroortry kare
standin the light selfie lete waqt light adjustment jaroori hain , jab bhi selfielene ja rahe ho toh face hamesha oos taraf rakhe , jis tarafse aapke chehreparlight aa rahi ho
iske alawaagaraap light ke hisaab se khud ko adjust karenge , jaise ki half face par light pade , aise mein kafi acchi selfie aa sakti hain
dalchini aur shahad ko ek saath mila kar lene ke fayde benefits of honey with cinnamon hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips dalchini aur shahad ko ek saath mila kar lene ke fayde benefits of honey with cinnamon 0 health tips a a print email dalchini aur shahad ko ek saath mila kar lene se kya fayde hote hain
iske prayog se heart attack aane khatra kafi kam ho jata hain
jodo ke dard mein jodo mein dard joints pain hone par dalchini ka prayog aapko rahat dega
arthritis ke dard mein bhi dalchini kafi faydemand sabit hoti hain
dalchini powder mein nimbu ka ras mila kar lagane se muhase aur black heads door hote hain
cancer dalchini ke sewan karne se cancer jaise rog par control kiya ja sakta hain

million users wale messenger app ki screen ke right ki taraf top corner mein ab video icon dikhai dega , jisse free mein video call ki ja sakegi
video call se judne ke liye messenger microsoft ke skype , apple ke facetime aur google ke hangout se takkar lega
in sabhi mein pahle se hi video calling suvidha mauzood hain
company ne kaha hain ki ab users messenger app se apne dosto ko video call kar sakte hain
bhale hi unme se ek apple ka ios aur dusra android operating system use kar raha ho
facebook ke messenger app mein video calling ki sewa america , canada , uk , france sahit kai desho mein shuru ki gyi hain

02 singhare ke fayde benefits of water
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips singhare ke fayde
health tips a a print email dil ke design se milta julta lal aur hare rang ka singhara paani mein paida hota hain
aaiye jante hain singhara shinghade , shinghare khane ke fayde aur benefits pregnant women ke liye amrit hain garbhasya ki kamjori aur pitt ki adhikta se pregnancy period pura hone se pahle jin mahilaon ka garbhpaat miscarriage ho jata hain , unhe singhara khane se labh hota hain
paani ki bharpaai sardiyo mein hone wale dehydration ko door karne ke liye singhara kafi faydemand hain
tonsils ka ilaj isme mauzood iodine gale mein hone wali tonsils ke ilaj ke liye madadgar hain
paushtikta se bharpoor ; singhare mein protein , carbohydrate , vitamin b , vitamin c , iron , calcium , magnesium , phosphorus jaise minerals , riboflavin jaise tatv prayapt matra mein milte hain
is phal mein kai aushadhiya gun hain , jinse sugar , ulcer , heart diseases , gathiya jaise rogo ka bachaav ho sakta hain
bujurgo aur pregnant women ke liye toh yeh kafi gunkari hain
thyroid aur gengha rog mein faydemand ; singhare mein mauzood iodine , manganese jaise minerals thyroid aur gengha rog ki roktham mein ahem role ada karte hain
energy ka accha source singhare mein carbohydrate kafi matra mein hote hain
singhare mein mauzood gymnemic aur lauric acid baalo ko nuksaan pahuchane se bachate hain
yeh anti oxidants ka bhi accha source hain
yeh suraj ki ultra violet kirano se skin ki raksha karta hain
peshab mein jalan , peshab rook rook kar aana jaisi bimariyo mein singhare ka istemal faydemand sabit hota hain
singhara khane mein sawdhaani warning of eating singhara ek sehatmand aadmi ko rojana 5 10 gram fresh singhare khane chahiye
06 beer peene ke fayde health benefits of
beer peene ke fayde health benefits of drinking of beer hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips beer peene ke fayde health benefits of drinking of beer 0 health tips a a print email beer peene ke fayde agar aapne search kiya hain bear peene ke fayde to jaroor padhe , mujhe pata hain ki maine bear ka spelling galat likha hain , iska sahi spelling beer hona chahiye , lekin search engine ke karan maine bear peene ke fayde likha hain
beer ke normal matra mein sewan karne walo ko dil ki bimari ka khatra kam hota hain
research ke mutabik agar roj 2 glass beer ka sewan kiya jaye to yeh sharir ke good cholesterol yani ki hdl level ko badhata hain
isse heart disease ka khatra kam ho jata hain
beer puri tarah se natural hain sacchai yeh hain ki beer bhi vaise natural hain jaise milk ya juice hota hain
beer mein kisi bhi tarah ka preservative nahi hota hain , kyonki isme alcohol aur hopes dono hote hain , jo ki dono hi natural hote hain
vitamin b ka source beer , khas kar acchi aur mehangi beer mein vitamin b ka ansh hota hain
beer mein alcohol ke tatv kam hote hain
isme vitamin b bhari matra mein hota hain aur folic acid bhi hota hain , jo ki heart attack ke khatre se bachata hain
thodi matra mein beer peene se heart attack se
beer cancer se ladta hain beer aur sehat ke beech sabse accha health connection hota hain
isme ek shaktishali anti oxidant hota hain jo cancer se ladne mein madad karta hain
beer se bear belly nahi hota hain university london of college mein 2013 mein yeh research kiya gya hi overhang hone ka aur drink ka aapas mein koi connection nahi hain
06 khubani khane ke fayde benefits ko

isme mauzood ghulansheel fibers pachan kriya sahi rakhte hain
isme khane mein mauzood jaroori nutrients ko observe karne ki capacity hain
cholesterol ko kam karti hain
ghulansheel fibers blood cholesterol ko kam karne ka kaam karte hain
cholesterol badhne ka sabse jyada asar heart par hota hain
khubani mein anti oxidants jaise carotenoids aur flavnoids mauzood hote hain , jo cholesterol ki matra ko kam karte hain
anemia se bachata hain
khubani mein ek aisa iron paya jata hain jo body mein dheere dheere observe hota hain
isse anemia ki problem nahi hoti hain
cancer door rakhe cancer ki sambhavna ko khubani ke kuch tukde kha kar door kiya ja sakta hain
anti oxidants ki matra dna ko damage hone se rokti hain

hamesha happy rahne ke liye follow kare yeh 5 useful tips
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home miscellaneous motivation speech hamesha happy rahne ke liye follow kare yeh 5 useful tips
miscellaneous , motivation speech a a print email aaj kal ki life mein koi bhi person hamesha khush nahi rah pata hain
current time ke saath khud ko change karne ki koshish kare
dusro par gussa karne ki bajaye khud ko kisi positive work mein involve kare
aaiye jante hain hamesha khush rahne ke liye 5 useful tips eat good nutrients food diet expertsyeh mante hain ki hamesha fit rahne ke liye balanced diet leni chahiye
aapko morning breakfast jaroor karna chahiye
isse aap pure din energetic bane rahte hain
apni diet mein fat free milk , dry fruits , dahi , sprouts aadi ko jaroor shamil kare
iske alawa seasonally fruits ko jaroor khana chahiye , jaise ki banana , orange , guava aadi
apni diet mein different types ke beans ko jaroor shamil kare
isse aapka mind cool rahta hain , aapki bones , nerves aur muscles bhi strong banti hain
be punctual kisibhi kaam ko karne ke liye ek time set kare
agar aap office employee hain ya phir housewife hain to apna kaam waqt se pahle nipta le
agar aap koi time table taiyaar kar lete hain to aap apne sabhi task ko easily finish kar lete hain
isse time saving hone ke saath hi body mein activeness bhi barkarar rahti hain aur mind bhi sahi rahta hain
generally ek normal person ko 8 hours ki neend lena bahut hi jaroori hota hain
agar aap bina kisi alarm ke naturally tarike se subah aapki aankh khul jati hain to aap khud ko jyada fresh feel karte hain
aapke sone wali jagah ka environment ekdamshant hona chahiye
think positive , be positive kya aapne yeh muhavra suna hain ki jo jaisa sochta hain , vaisa hi ban jata hain
apni soch ko kabhi bhi negative na hone de
is dauran aap apne interest se related koi kaam kare
aap chahe to apna favorite music sun sakte hain , acchi books read kar sakte hain , apna manpasand koi bhi kaam kar sakte hain
yeh aapke liye khud ko diya hua ek special gift hoga
apna favorite kaam ko karne se definitely aapko khushi milegi aur aapna mind excitement se bhar jayega

apple watch ki kya hain khasiyat
isme user call kar sakta hain , message ka response de sakta hain
jiske chalte is apple watch ka price 10000 dollor tak hain
company ne high range ke saath kuch low budget ki watches bhi market mein utari hain

vahi isme navigation feature bhi milega
yeh wearable device aapki sehat ka bhi khyaal rakhegi
isme heart rate monitor laga hua hain

jo users ki body movement ko measure karega

04 dahi khane ke fayde benefit of curd
dahi khane ke fayde benefit of curd hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips dahi khane ke fayde benefit of curd 1 health tips a a print email dahi ka istemal world mein lag bhag har jagah par bhojan mein kiya jata hain
doodh se bane is dairy product mein sehat se jude bahut sare fayde hain
pachan kriya sahi rakhti hain dahi mein mauzood nutrients pachan kriya ko behtar banate hain
taiwan dwara ki gyi ek study ke anusar dahi pet ke h pylori infection se bachaati hain , jo kafi aam samsya hain
yeh high blood pressure ko control karne ke saath cholesterol level ko bhi control karti hain
immunity power ko badhati hain dahi mein aise bacteria mauzood hote hain , jo sharir ki immunity power ko badhakar unhe kai prakar ke rogo aur infection se door rakhte hain

isiliye dahi ko kai saare hair packs aur face mask mein istemal kiya jata hain
isme phosphorus aur calcium ki bharpoor matra hoti hain , jo haddiyon ke saath saath daanton ko bhi mazboot banati hain
saath hi iska face pack wrinkle ki samsya ko bhi door karta hain
ismein mauzood lactic acid mein anti fungal tatv mauzood hote hain , jo sabse jyada faydemand hote hain
conditioner ka kaam karti hain baalon ke liye jaroori nourishment ki supply dahi lagakar ki ja sakti hain
research ke anusaar dahi mein mauzood lactic acid safed baal aur baal girane ki samsya se nizaat dilati hain
saath hi isme mauzood vitamins baalon ki conditioning ke liye bahut hi faydemand hain
calcium ki mauzoodgi body mein cortisol ki matra ko produce karti hain
tanav aur chinta ko kam karti hain tension se health se related kai prakar ki problems shuru ho jati hain

general knowledge a a print email stretch marks ko kaise hataya jaye
stretch marks ko door karne ke liye gharelu nuskhe kya hain
what is the home remedies for removestretch marks in hindi urdu
skin ki 3 main layers hoti hain epidermis , dermis and hypodermis
inme se skin ki jis parat mein lachak nahi hoti hain , oos par stretch marks padte hain
stretch marks khas taur par skin ki middle parat dermis par hote hain
yeh stretch marks youngageaur pregnancy ke dauran hotehain
home remediesfor stretch marksin hindi urdu
ande ka safed bhaag stretch marks par lagaye
tattoo karwa kar bhi stretch marks se chhutkarapaya ja sakta hain
is mishranko stretch markswale hisso par acchi tarah se laga le
ek mahinelagatar iska istemal karne se stretch marks halke ho jatehain
tanning lotion aur tanning spray bazaarmein asaani semil jate hain
jaitoon ke tel ko stretch marks par lagaye aur halki maalish kare
isse bloodcirculation sahi hota hain aur stretch marks halke hote hain
aloevera ka juice stretchmarks par lagaye
cup aloe vera jell , 1 cup jaitoon ka tel , 10 vitamin e capsules , 5 vitamin a capsule lekar mix kare
is mishrankostretch marks par tabtaklagayejabtakaapki tavcha usay sokh nale
iske liye prabhavit hisso par arandi ka tellagaye , phir oos hisso plastic bag se lapet de
ab hot water bottlesekareeb aadheghantetak sekaai kare aur halkaragde
dheere dheere stretchmarksdoorho jayenge
cleanser se stretch marksko chhupaya ja sakta hain
skin tone sematch karta hua cleanserkhareediye
usay stretch marks par laga lijiye
medium size ke aaloo ko thoda mota kaat le
uske baad aaloo ke tukde ko stretch marks par lagaye
taaze kate nimbu ke ras ko stretchmarks par lagayiye
iske alawa kheere ka ras aur nimbu k eras ki barabarmatra ko le aur stretch marks par lagaye

home remedies for fresh skin face in hindi urdu
strawberry aur shahad aksar tez dhoop mein kaam karne se aapke face par ultra violet rays ka effect saaf saaf dikhne lagta hain
strawberry ko salicylic acid ka source mana jata hain aur shahad to anti bacterial guno se bharpoor hota hain
is home remedy ko ajmane ke liye aap 3 strawberries ko 1 chammach shahad ke sath mix karke chehre par lagana hain
badam antioxidants aur vitamin e se bharpoor hota hain to coffee aapki skin ko ek naya nikhar deti hain
ab is mixture ko jaha jaha par kale dhabbe pad gye ho vaha par apply karna hain
se 15 minutes baad ek cleanser se facewash karna hain
pudine ki chai skin ko banaye taro taza agar aap chai peene ke saukin hain to normal chai ki jagah pudine wali chai pijiye
english mein ise peppermint tea ke naam se marketing ki jati hain

09 hike messenger ne android users ke liye
hike messenger ne android users ke liye launch kiya free calling feature
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home android apps tech news hike messenger ne android users ke liye launch kiya free calling feature
android , apps , tech news a a print email hike messenger app ne apne features mein changes kiye hain
iske chalte users ab free group call ki suvidha ka anand utha sakenge
lekin abhi yeh service sirf android users ke liye hi hain
vahi windows users ke liye yeh 2016 mein available hoga
log ek saath karenge baat ek report ke mutabik , instant messaging app hike apne users ko attract karne ke liye naya plan lekar aayi hain
company ne sabhi android hike users ke liye free group calling ki facility uplabadh kara di hain
yahi nahi hike ne group chat ke ander ek single call button diya hain jis par press karte hi group se jude sabhi members ke pass automatic call chali jayegi
kaise kiya jayega istemal philhaal company ne free calling ki suvidha to de di hain
button dabate hi yeh call group ke sabhi members ke paas pahuch jayegi
million users hain target hike messenger ke founder aur ceo kevin bharti mittal ka kahna hain ki , kai hike users group calling ko lekar complain kiya karte thay
aise mein company ne ek single button se hi free mein group call karne ki suvidha de di hain
philhaal hike mein yeh naya free calling feature company ki marketing ka ek hissa hain
company ka target 200 million hike users banana hain
gaurtalab hain ki company ne haal hi mein hike messenger ko update kiya tha
company ka dawa hain ki yeh naya update messenger slow network condition mein bhi acche se kaam karne mein mahir hain
hike messenger ko aap google play store se download kar sakte hain

home remedies of salt in hindi urdu

09 plastic bottle mein paani peene ke
plastic bottle mein paani peene ke nuksaan side effects of drinking water in plastic bottle hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips plastic bottle mein paani peene ke nuksaan side effects of drinking water in plastic bottle 0 health tips a a print email modern lifestyle mein logo ko plastic bottles mein paani peene ki aadat hi ho gyi hain
agar aap plastic bottle mein paani peete hain , iski wajah se aapko diabetes , heart disease , pregnant women aur uske bacche ko khatre ke alawa kai dusri khatranaak bimariya ho sakti hain
paani ke jariye yeh dangerous chemicals hamare body mein daakhil ho jate hain aur hame nuksaan pahuchate hain
plastic bottle mein paani peene ke nuksaan 1 new born baby mein ho sakta hain janm dosh bottle ko banane wala chemical bhroon mein difference paida kar sakta hain , jisse bacche ko janm ke samay kuch dosh paida ho sakte hain
agar aapne paani peene ke liye plastic bottle ka upyog kiya hain to aage chalkar bacche ko prostate cancer ya breast cancer tak ho sakta hain
aisa na kare kyonki in bottles ko banane mein aise chemicals use hote hain jo garam hone ke baad yeh chemicals paani mein mil jate hain
kabz aur pet mein gas darasal plastic bottle ko banane ke liye bisphenol a ke karan pet par bura asar padta hain
miscarriage ka khatra veh mahilaye jinhe pregnant hone mein problems ka samna karna padta hain ya phir jinhe ek baar miscarriage ho chuka ho , unhe plastic ki bottle se jyada paani nahi peena chahiye
yeh purusho mein sperm count ko bhi kam karta hain
cancer hone ka khatra hawaii ke cancer hospital ke research ke according , plastic ke bottle ka paani cancer hone ki wajah ho sakta hain
plastic ki bottle jab dhoop ya jyada temperature hone ke karan jab garam hota hain , to plastic mein mauzood nuksaandeh chemicals di oxygen ka risaav shuru ho jata hain
iski wajah se mahilaon mein breast cancer ka khatra badh jata hain

ab is paste se daanto ko 1 2 minutes tak saaf kare
minutes tak ise laga rahne de
iski anti microbial properties gum ko surkasha degi
toothbrush mein kuch boond nariyal ka tel laga kar brush kare
inka crunchy texture daanto se daag dhabbe aur bacteria ko door karta hain
natural acid unhe saaf banata hain
apple cider vinegar coffee aur smoking ke karan daanto mein padne wale dhabbo ko apple cider vinegar door karta hain
baking soda se isme fayda hota hain
jyada coffee aur soft drinks ka sewan karne se aapke daanto mein daag dhabbe pad jate hain
high alcohol content wale mouthwash ki wajah se bhi saanso mein badboo aati hain
bubble gum aur sugarless candy chabane se lar banti hain , jisse bacteria bahar nikal jate hain
aajkal kai dental treatment available hain , jinki madad se manchahi muskan hasil kar sakte hain
cleaning aur polishing technique se teeth jyada beautiful lagte hain
smoking aur tobacco khane se health problems ke saath saath saanso mein badboo , daag dhabbe aur masoodhe rog bhi ho jate hain
aapki oral health bhi nazar andaz ho jati hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email haldi hamari rasoi ka ahem hisaa hain
yeh ek aisa masala hain jise kai cosmetic beauty products mein bhi istemal kiya jata hain
haldi khane ke fayde benefits of turmeric in hindi urdu
haldi dimaag mein banne wale amyloid plaques ko hatati hain , is tarah yeh alzheimer rog ki growth ko slow kar deti hain
haldi alzheimer ki bimari se hame bachati hain
haldi pancreas ka cancer , breast cancer aur prostate cancer ke ilaj mein madad karti hain
tumours mein naye cells ko badhne se rokti hain aur saath hi yeh baccho mein leukaemia ke kahtre ko bhi kam karti hain
yeh aapke sharir mein cholesterol ke level ko bhi normal banaye rakhti hain

haldi ek natural pain relief padarth hain

08 pregnancy period mein in baato ka

isliyein dino pregnant lady ko apni sehat ka khas khyaal rakhna chahiye
aaj hum janenge aisi baatein jo pregnancy mein har maa ke liye jaroori hain
pregnancy period tips for woman in hindi urdu
pregnancy mein in baato ka rakhe dhyaan pregnancy period mein calorie aur nutrition diet lena bahut hi jaroori hain , jaise anaaz , phal , sabziya , bina charbi wala meat , kam fat wala doodh , nariyal paani aadi
pregnancy period mein halke aur dheele kapde pahne
pregnancy ke waqt har lady ko blood group khas karke r
factor ka test karwana chahiye
iske alawa time to time hemoglobin ki jaanch doctor ki salah ke mutabik karwate rahe
pregnancy period ke dauran koi bhi medicine bina doctor ki salah se kabhi nahi khani chahiye
pregnancy ke jaroori tike lagwaye aur iron ki goliya khaye
turant doctor se consult kare
pregnancy ke shuruvaati dino mein jee ghabrana , ulti hona , blood pressure jaisi problems ho sakti hain , aise mein doctor se check up jaroor karwaye
pregnancy ke dauran pet mein tez dard aur vagina se khoon nikalne lagta hain , ise seriously le aur doctor ko turant iske baare mein bataye

oily food kam se kam khaye
pregnancy mein cigarette aur sharab jaisi buri cheezo se door rahe
is waqt aap juice , salad , soup jaise liquid cheezo ka jyada se jyada sewan kare
pregnancy mein jyada matra mein folic acid , iron , calcium , vitamin a aur b12 wali cheezo ko khaye
pregnancy period mein khoob paani peena chahiye
yeh sabhi tips normal pregnancy ke liye bataye ja rahe hain
isliye pregnancy ke time apne doctor se consult jaroor karte rahna chahiye
04 orange santra kyon hain chamatkaari phal
orange santra kyonhain chamatkaari phal
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips orange santra kyonhain chamatkaari phal
general knowledge , health tips a a print email orange khana har umar ke logo ko bahut pasand aata hain
dil ke liye hain faydemand santre mein mauzood potassium , folic acid aur calcium , cholesterol ke level aur high bloodpressureko control mein rakhta hain
yeh tatv koshikaon mein electrolytes ko balance karke heart ko healthy rakhne mein madadgar hain
potassium brain mein oxygen ke circulation mein help kartahain , jissetension aur depression mein rahat milti hain
orange mein mauzoodfructose , dextrose jaise minerals , body mein energypaida karte hain aur dil aur dimaag ko nayi shakti aur taazagi se bhar dete hain
arthritis ke treatment mein faydemand apneanti oxidants guno ki wajah se santra gathiya mein hone wale muscles aurjoints ke pain mein rahat pahuchata hain
daily 1 glass orange juice peene se gathiya hone ka khatra kafi kam ho jata hain
kabz se dilata hain rahat santre mein mauzoodfiber aur amino acid pachan tantra paralkaline effectdaalta hain
fiber pachan ko badhawa dene aur pachan tantra se related bimariyo ko rokne mein bhi help karta hain
badhti umar ke effect ko kam kare santre mein mauzood anti oxidants umar badhne ke saath saath skin par padne wale wrinkles ko kam karte hain
santre ka ras aur chhilka skin par lagane se skin daag dhabbo aur pimples jaise problems sefree ho jati hain aur komal ban jati hain aur aapki tavcha mein ek naya nikhaar aa jata hain
cancer se bachata hain vitamin c se bharpoor orangemeinanti oxidants aurlimonin , freeradicals se body ke cells ko damage hone se bachate hain
limonin hamarebody mein lagbhag 8 10 hours tak active rah sakta hain , jo cancercells ki growthko badhne serokta hain
orangeko rojana khane seskin , lungs , breast , mouth , stomach aadi ke cancer ko roknemein madad milti hain
yeh gastric ulcer ke khatre ko kam karne mein bhi helpful hain
orange mein mauzood pactinefiber hame cancer se bachata hain
yeh kuch hud tak osteoporosiski roktham karne mein bhi helpful hain
bloodsugar level normal banaye fiber ka good source hhone ki wajah se orangesugar ko fructosemein convert kar deta hain
is tarah santra meetha hone ke bawjood sugar level ko control karkediabetes ke mareezokeliye behatarphal hain
immune system strongbanaye orange mein mauzoodvitamin c aur a , bloodmein white cells ke production ko badhate hain , jissebody ki immunesystem majboot banta hain
women ke liye bhi hain faydemand pregnant woman aur liver rog sepeedit mahilaon ko santra jaroor khana chahiye
nutrientska khazana hain khatte phalo ki category mein aaneki wajah se orangevitamin c ka khazana hain
vitamin c ki hamari rojana jaroorat ko sirfek santra pura karnemein capable hain
iskealawa yeh vitamin a , b complex , flavonoid , amino acid , calcium , iodine , phosphorus , sodium , manganese jaise poshak tatvo ki khan bhi hain
kidney stone se bachata hain orange mein paya jane wala citric acid peshab ke rog aur gurda rogo ko door karta hain
niyamit roop se santra khane se urinekejariyecitricacidka production seph levelmein sudhaar hota hain
santra orange khane se hame kaun kaun se benefits aur fayde hote hain

05 til ke daane aur tel ke fayde benefits
til ke daane aur tel ke fayde benefits of sesame oil seeds hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips til ke daane aur tel ke fayde benefits of sesame oil seeds 0 health tips a a print email bharat mein kai dishes mein til ko swaad badhane ke liye dala jata hain
bad cholesterol ko kam karta hain
til mein folic acid bharpoor matra mein hota hain
yeh monounsaturated fatty acid ka ek potent hota hain , jo bad cholesterol ko kam karta hain
saath hi , good cholesterol ka badhaata hain
isse sharir mein healthy lipid fat bana rahta hain
cancer se protect karta hain
research se yeh pata chala hain ki til mein anti cancer property hoti hain
jis wajah se yeh lung cancer , colon cancer , leukemia , protests cancer , breast cancer aur pancreatic cancer se protect karta hain
ismein mauzood anti oxidants sharir mein na sirf cancer cells ko banne se rokte hain , balki cancer badhane wale chemicals se bhi bachata hain
anxiety ko kam karta hain
til niyasin nervous system ko theek rakhne ke liye jaroori vitamin se bharpoor hota hain
itna hi nahi yeh gaba gamma amino butyric acid yeh brain ke ander hone wali ek activity ko bhi improve karta hain
yahi activity anxiety aur neurosis ka karan banti hain
pregnancy mein bhi faydemand til mein mauzood folic acid pregnant mahilaon ke liye bahut hi achcha hota hain
isse unke feats garbh ko healthy growth milti hain
bachchon ki haddiya healthy hoti hain til mein achchi matra mein dietary protein aur amino acid hota hain
yeh acid aur protein bachchon ki bones ko strong banaata hain
lag bhag 100 gram til ke beej khane se 18 gram protein milta hain
research se yeh pata chala hain ki stroke ke baad brain mein blood circulation ka flow kam ho jata hain
yeh blood ka flow theek karne mein madad karta hain
itna hi nahi , isme mauzood magnesium na sirf blood circulation ko theek karta hain , balki neuron impulse ko bhi majboot banata hain
ayurveda ke anusaar , til ka tel thanda hota hain , jo bachcho ke healthy growth mein faydemand hota hain
05 aapka first aid box kaisa hona chahiye
aapka first aid box kaisa hona chahiye
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips miscellaneous aapka first aid box kaisa hona chahiye
general knowledge , health tips , miscellaneous a a print email firstaid box firstaid box yani ki physical chot lagne ya mamuli bimar honepar aapka sabse pahla saathi hain
aayiye jante hain first aid box se related kuch tipsaur jankari ke baare mein kyon jaroori hota hain first aid box
inhi situation se nipatne ke liye ghar mein first aid box jaroor hona chahiye
first aid box mein kaun si dawaayian rakhni chahiye
vaise toh koi bhi medicine doctor se salah lekar hi khani chahiye , lekin kuch medicine aisi hain jo aap bina doctor ki salah ke bhi le sakte hain , bas oon medicine ki expiredate khatm nahi honi chahiye
bandit , bandage aur medicated cotton , khule jakhm par infection hone ka khatra rahta hain
mamooli katne chhilne par bandage aapko infection se bacha sakta hain
anti allergic skin mein hone wale khujali se rahat paane ke liyeanti allergic medicine bhi firstaid box mein jaroorrakhna chahiye
electoral mausam ke badalne se body mein minerals ki kami ho jati hain
aise mein electoralya ors is ki kami ko door karte hain
saath hi pudin hara , eno , diegin , jaisi dawaayia bhi faydemand hain
aise mein antacid se pet ki problems mein aaram milta hain
anti septiccream aur lotion katne chhilne par anti septic cream ya solution ka istemal kare
anti septic cream bacteria ko paida nahi hona deta hain , is tarah aap infection se aap bach sakte hain
apne first aid box mein dettol ya savlon ki bottle jaroor rakhni chahiye
thermometer thermometer bahut hi jaroori hota hain , taaki bukhaar hone par body ka temperature mapa ja sake
taki emergency mein aapko isedhoondhne mein zyada mehanat na karni pade
dhyaan rahe ki family ke sabhi members ko first aid boxki location ke baare mein acchi tarah se maloom hona chahiye
aap ise apne bedroom ya dying room mein bhi rakh sakte hain
first aid box kab kaam aata hain
medical emergency mein yehfirst aid box bade kaam ki cheez saabit hoti hain
first aid box mein mauzood medicines bina hospital ke chakkar lagaye aapko sabsebadi rahat deti hain
aap family rahte hain ya pg mein , ghar mein rahte hain ya hostel mein , yeh first aid box aapke saath hamesha hona chahiye
05 ananas khane ke fayde benefits of
ananas khane ke fayde benefits of pineapple hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips ananas khane ke fayde benefits of pineapple 0 health tips a a print email hari pattiya , golden orange skin , sar par bane guchhchhe aur moti parat wala pineapple , jise ananas bhi kaha jata hain mein kai gun maujood hain
free radicals damage ko rokta hain pineapple anti oxidants ka bahut achchha source hota hain , jo free radicals ki samsya ko khatm karta hain
isse cells surkashit rahte hain
yeh anti oxidants dil ki bimariyo , arthritis , cancer aur atherosclerosis bimari ko door rakhne mein madad karta hain
sardi khansi se doori pineapple mein vitamin c aur bromelain prayapt matra mein paye jate hain , jo infection failaane wale virus se ladte hain
majboot haddiya haddiyo ki majbooti ke liye sharir mein calcium aur meganize ki pryapt matra ka hona bahut hi jaroori hain
iski purti kewal dairy products kha kar nahi ki ja sakti hain
pineapple mein meganize bahut jyada matra mein paya jata hain
sirf 1 cup pineapple juice mein 73 meganize hota hain
macular degeneration isme dheere dheere dekhne ki capacity kam ho jati hain
pineapple mein mauzood beta carotene aankhon ki sehat ka khyaal rakhta hain
pineapple khastaur par anti inflammatory guno ke karan jana jata hain
healthy heart ke liye cholesterol level ko control karta hain , jo healthy heart ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
anti oxidants ki matra cells ko damage hone se rokta hain aur free radicals ko khatm karta hain
pimples se nijat pineapple mein paye jane wali vitamin c ki matra skin ko healthy rakhti hain
saath hi ismein maujood bromelain aur anti inflammatory enzymes , vitamin c ki capacity ko badhate hain
isme paye jane wala bromelain enzyme pachan kriya ko sahi rakhta hain
fiber ki matra digestive system ko durust rakhti hain

health tips a a print email masaledaar aur chatpata khana hum sabhi indians ki sabse pahli pasand hain
spicy food khane wale iske flavour aur sensation ke deewane hote hain
aaiye jante hain masaaledaar khana khana khane ke fayde ke bare mein health benefits ofeating spicy food in hindi lambi umar ke liye china mein ek research mein yeh paya gya ki jo log rojana spicy food lete hain , unke jaldi marne ki aashanka 14 tak kam ho jati hain
researchers ka kahna hain ki ise direct roop se lifespan se nahi joda ja sakta hain , lekin natize prenana dene wale hain
yeh peptic ulcer ke jokhim ko 53 tak kam karta hain
calorieburn karnemein helpful spicy food khate huye aapko jo paseena aata hain , veh apne asli maksad ko pura karta hain
ek research ke mutabik spicy foodlene par body ke calorie burn karne ki speed ko 8 tak increase kiya ja sakta hain
dusri study mein yeh paya gya ki jo log spicy appetiser consume kartehain , veh main coursemein kam calorieconsume karte hain
khushi deta hain masaledaar bhojan aapke dimaag mein happy hormone paida karta hain jaise ki serotonin jo depression , anxiety , anger aur stressse deal kartahain
dard se rahat capsaicin aapke nerve cell se dimaagko bheje gyekuch signals ko roktahain aur mahsoos ho saknewaledardke ahsaas ko khatm karta hain
isliye capsaicin ko pain relief cream , patches aadi mein saamgri ke taurparistemal kiya jata hain
heart ko protect karne mein helpful kai researches mein yeh paya gya ki spicy diet lenewaleoon desho mein spicy khana na khane wale desho ke compare kam heart attack hote hain
iske alawa aapke mooh mein spicy food se hone wali burning effect ke liye jimmevarchemical capsaicin jalan se ladnemein madad karta hain
cancer se ladta hain kuch medical researches se yehpata chala hain ki capsaicin ka kuch cancer cell par effect hota hain jo ki cancer fighting drugski tarahpowerful hota hain
yeh chemical itna powerful hain ki leukemic cells aur tumour ke growth ko dheere dheere khatm kar deta hain
iske kai vitamins jaise a , c aurkuch minerals paye jatehain
06 intex ne launch kiya intex aqua 4g plus
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home intex smartphone intex ne launch kiya intex aqua 4g plus sirf rs
intex , smartphone a a print email intex technologies ne apni 4g device ke launch ki ghoshna kar di hain
gaur kare specifications phone ki sabse badi khoobi yeh hain ki phone kai multiple languages ko support karega
iske anya specification ki baat kare to phone mein
ghz mediatek quad core processor diya gya hain
iske alawa is smartphone mein 2gb ki ram di gyi hain
phone ko hd screen ke saath banaya gya hain
iske saath hi ispar dragontrail glass aapke phone ki screen ko scratches se bachayega
connectivity aur memory par ek nazar in sabke alawa ek aur khoobi is smartphone ko dusre smartphones se alag banati hain , vah hain iska slow motion video support
iska matlab hain ki aap is smartphone se aap slow motion mein bhi video bana sakenge
is dual sim smartphone mein connectivity ke liye diya gya hain , bluetooth , wi fi ki suvidha
memory ki baat kare to is aqua 4g plus mein 16gb ki internal memory di gyi hain , ise aap 32 gb tak expand kar sakte hain
phone ke camera ki baat kare to phone ka camera aapko dega live filters aur behartin front back camera shots
agar handset ke colours variants ki baat kare to isme aapko white aur black 2 colour milenge
inch 720x1280 pixels memory 2 gb ram with 16 gb internal storage , expandable upto 32 gb connectivity wi fi , gps , bluetooth , usb camera 13mp rear camera , 5 mp front camera os android
ghz mediatek quad coreprocessor gpu battery 2300 mah battery price 9 , 499rs
08 bread khane ke nuksaan disadvantages of
bread khane ke nuksaan disadvantages of bread hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips bread khane ke nuksaan disadvantages of bread 0 health tips a a print email bread khane ke kai nuksaan side effect hote hain
white bread , brown bread se jyada ghatak hoti hain
white bread mein kafi matra mein carbohydrate , sodium aur gluten mila hota hain , jo kai bimariya paida karta hain
na hi isme koi protein hota hain aur na hi isme fiber ya vitamin paye jate hain
ha safed bread ki jagah aap brown bread kha sakte hain
high sodium tatv ki matra adhik bread mein high level ka sodium hota hain jo blood pressure aur heart attack ki bimari ko badhata hain
ise cake ya burger ke roop mein lene se isme mauzood extra salt aur sugar weight badhane mein madad karte hain
gluten ka mamla bread mein bahut jyada gluten yani ki lislisa padarth hota hain jo ki siliek rog ko invite karta hain
carbohydrate ki jyada matra bread ke kai items mein carbohydrate mila hota hain
sharir ke liye thoda carbohydrate faydemand hota hain lekin iski jyada matra nuksaandayak hoti hain
jyada refined carbohydrate khane se blood sugar high aur low hone lagta hain jisse madhumeh , heart attack aur brain damage tak ho sakta hain
pimple ki problem white bread mein saturated aur trans fat hota hain
daant sadaye cavity problem in teeth isme high level ki matra mein starch hota hain jo daanto mein sadan paida karta hain
yeh harkate agar karte hain toh aap hain fomo yani ki social media addiction ke shikaar

ise addiction yani ki latt kaha ja sakta hain

yeh fomo ke saath saath nomophobiaka bhi sanket hain

ananas khane ke nuksan side effects of pineaaple hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips ananas khane ke nuksan side effects of pineaaple 0 health tips a a print email ananas ek aisa phal hain jo protein , phosphorus , calcium se bharpoor hain aur usme vitamin a aur c paya jata hain
isme fiber ki kafi matra mein paya jata hain
isse gale mein kharash karne wale enzyme khatm ho jayenge
garbhpaat pregnant women ko suruvati dino mein ananas nahi khana chahiye kyonki isse garbhpaat miscarriage ka khatra badh sakta hain
kyonki ek dum se unka blood sugar level badha kar unki jaan khatre mein daal sakta hain

05 muli khane ke fayde benefits of radish
muli khane ke fayde benefits of radish hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips muli khane ke fayde benefits of radish 2 health tips a a print email aaj ham aapko muli ke baare mein bata rahe hain
muli mein vitamin c hone ke karan anti oxidant ki matra bharpoor hoti hain
blood pressure ko sahi rakhna muli anti hypertensive hoti hain jo high blood pressure ko control karne ka kaam karti hain
muli mein potassium hota hain jo sharir mein sodium aur potassium ke level ko sahi rakhta hain
isse insulin nahi badhega aur sugar level control mein rahega
wajan kam karne ke liye muli mein kam calorie hoti hain aur fiber adhik matra mein hota hain
gram muli mein 16 calorie hoti hain
asthma ke mareez ke liye jin logo ko asthma ki dikkat hoti hain , unke liye muli behad faydemand hain
khubsoorati ka raaz muli mein vitamin c aur anti oxidants hota hain , jo skin ko radicals se free rakhta hain
isse skin glow karne lagti hain
skin ke daad dhabbe hatate hain
kidney ko healthy banaye rakhne ke liye muli mein diuretic gun hote hain , jo kidney ko healthy rakhne mein madad karta hain
isse body ander se saaf rahti hain

09 health aur fitness se related 8 common
health aur fitness se related 8 common questions aur unke answer
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips health aur fitness se related 8 common questions aur unke answer
general knowledge , health tips a a print email sabhi logo ke mann mein yeh 8 commons swaal jaroor hi uthate aur hum sabhi in health fitness se related questions ka jawaab janna chahte hain
toh jante hain health aur fitness se related veh common swaal kya hain aur unke jawaab kya hain
kya brown bread white bread se jyada healthy hoti hain
nahi , jyadatar white bread refined daano se banti hain , jinme dher saare fiber aur nutrients ki kami payi jati hain
lekin whole wheat white bread bhi aate hain jo whole bread jitne healthy mane jate hain
nahi , research ke according lcd screen ya dusri device ko ghoorte rahne se aankho ki roshini par zyada asar nahi padta hain
kya cough syrup kaam karte hain
bina prescription chemist ki dukaan se khareedi huyi medicine kaam nahi karti hain
you may also like saavdhaan , jhaag wala toothpaste de sakta hain aapko cancer
kya olive oil heart attack ko rokne ka kaam karta hain
ji haan , scientist ne apni researches mein paya hain ki olive oil ka sewan karne se coronary artery disease ka khatra kafi kam ho jata hain
mediterranean diet mein agar extra olive oil mila diya jaye , toh usse breast cancer ka khatra kafi kam ho jata hain
kya dry fruits nuts khane se hum mote ho sakte hain
isliye rojana ek mutthi dry fruits jaroor khaye , yaad rakhiye rojana sirf ek mutthi dry fruits khane hain , ek mutthi se zyada dry fruits ka sewan nahi karna chahiye
isliye chalna aur bhaagna walking running dono hi acche hote hain
kya plastic ke bartano mein khana rakh kar microwave mein garm karna sahi rahega
haan yeh safe hain , lekin sirf tab hi jab tak container par microwave safe likha ho
is marking ke saath aane wale containers flexible hote hain
isliye inme khana microwave mein rakh kar garm karne se koi problem nahi hoti hain
lekin aapko plastic container mein khana rakhne se pahle yeh jaan lena chahiye ki oos container par microwave safe likha hain ki nahi

09 multani mitti ke fayde benefits of
multani mitti ke fayde benefits of multani mitti in hindi hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge multani mitti ke fayde benefits of multani mitti in hindi 0 general knowledge a a print email multani mitti ke fayde kya hain
isse skin ka oilypan khatm ho jayega
darasal , skin mein oil hone se tavcha ke rom chidra pores band ho jate hain , jo keel muhanse aur daane banne ki ahem wajah hote hain
yahi nahi oily skin ke karan kai baar blackheads aur whiteheads bhi ho jate hain , lekin multani mitti ke istemal se yeh problem asaani se door ho jati hain
shining skin ke liye multani mitti skin ko clean kar minto mein shining deti hain
isme magnesium chloride hota hain , jo skin mein hone wale problems se nijat dilata hain
complexion chehre par tanning ho to multani mitti ka istemal faydemand hota hain
yahi wajah hain ki moohaso ki problem ya oily skin par iska istemal bahut faydemand mana jata hain
oily skin hain , to ise gulab jal ke saath skin par lagaye aur dry skin hain , to ise badam paste ke saath mila kar laga kar kuch minutes tak massage kare
isse blood ka flow bhi theek bana rahta hain
texture skin ke texture ko improve karne mein multani mitti behad kaam aati hain
kull mila kar , multani mitti sabse accha face pack , cleanser aur scrub hoti hain
is paste se 2 se 3 minutes tak face ki massage kare
yeh perfect scrub ka kaam karta hain
yeh paste face se blackheads aur whiteheads ko to clean kar hi deta hain , saath hi skin ko bhi healthy banata hain
dead cells ko khatm kar yeh skin ko deeply clean karta hain , isliye yeh kahna galat nahi hoga ki skin ki dekhbhaal ke liye multani mitti ka istemal behtar hain
