02 ankoorit anaaz ya sprout khane ke fayde
ankoorit anaaz ya sprout khane ke fayde
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips ankoorit anaaz ya sprout khane ke fayde
health tips a a print email ankoorit anaaz ya sprout mein mauzood nutrients hamare health ke liye kai tarah sefaydemand hain
isme fiberbahuthi jyadamatramein hote hain
sprout ko regular apni diet mein shamil karne se hone wale fayde ke bare mein janiye
sprout ke fayde sharir ko karta hain detoxify sprout ko apni diet mein shamil karne se sharir mein mauzood haanikarak acids asaani se bahar nikalte hain
yeh body ko natural detoxify kartahain aur kai bimariyo sebachata hain
sprout se wajan hota hain kam sprout mein fiber kafi acchi matra mein paye jate hain
haddiya hoti hain majboot sprout mein mauzood nutrients calcium ki matra badhaneka kaam karte hain
roj katori sprout khane se haddiya majboot hoti hain
immune system strong banta hain
digestion sudhaarta hain sprout mein mauzood fiber body ke function ko theek karta hain
inhe khane se digestion system sudharta hain aur kabz se rahat milti hain
skin hoti hain glow sprout mein anti oxidants sahi matra mein paye jatehain
inhekhane sejhurriya door hoti hain aur skin glow karti hain
yeh vegetariandietka behtaroption mana jata hain
sprout se milti hain energy sprout mein vitamin a , c , b 6 aurk bharpoor matra mein paye jate hain
saath hi isme phosphorus , magnesium , calcium , aur potassium bhi mauzood hote hain
yeh nutrientssharir ko prayapt energydetehain
bimariyarakhedoor isme calcium , magnesium jaise tatvo ki bharpoormatra payi jati hain , jo sharirko majboot banate hain
roj sprout khane se kai bimariyo ka khatra tall jata hain

health tips a a print email sabhi log koi na koi dal toh jaroor hi khate honge
urad ka scientific name vigna mungo hain aur ise english mein black gram kaha jata hain
isme calcium , potassium , iron , magnesium , manganese jaise tatv bharpoor matra mein hote hain
yeh manganese aur folate level ko badha kar dhamniyo ko block hone se bachaati hain
isme paya jane wala magnesium heart health ko badhane mein madad karta hain , kyonki isse blood circulation badhta hain
veh log jo vegetarian hain ya phir jinke paas meat , machhli khane ke paise nahi hain , unke liye urad ki daal protein ka good source hain

08 cholesterol level kam karne ke jaroori
cholesterol level kam karne ke jaroori tips
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips cholesterol level kam karne ke jaroori tips
general knowledge , health tips a a print email cholesterol body mein fat ke jaisa padarth hota hain jo cells ko energy dene ka kaam karta hain
jabhum carb aur fat ka sewan karte hain toh yeh usse paida hote hain , cholesterol hamari body ke liye bahut hi jaroori hota hain
aap agar high cholesterol ki preshaani ka samna kar rahe hain to yeh 7 tips follow kare
in tips aur upay ko ajma kar aap high cholesterol level ko kam kar sakte hain
motape ko kam kare agar aap overweight yani motape se peedit hain
specially kamar ki charbi se
iske liye aap gym , sports , dancing ya aerobics class ko join karna chahiye
aisa karne se aapmegood cholesterol ka level badhega aur bad cholesterol ka level kam hoga
saturated fat ko kam kare aur trans fat ko chhode aapko ande ka peela hissa , fried food , fat wala doodh aur usse bane dairy productsaur fatty meat aadi ko puri tarah se chhodna hoga
daily sirf 20 gram tak hi saturated fat lene ki salah di jati hain
fish khaye high aur bad cholesterol ko kam karne ke liye omega 3 fatty acid bahut hi faydemand hota hain
omega 3 fatty acidnatural tarike se dil ki bimariya , cholesterol aur stroke se door rakhne mein hamari madad karta hain
omega 3 fatty acid macchli mein bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain
smoking ko kahe naa agar aap cholesterol level kam karna chahte hain to smoking ko alvida kahiye janab
cigarette mein corsinozen aur carbon mono oxide hota hain , jisse khoon mein jaldi cholesterol level badh jata hain
palak khayiye agar aap vegetarian hain to to palak jaroor khayiye
palak ke saag mein 13 flavonoids tatv paye jate hain , jisse cancer , heart ki bimari aur osteoporosis se bachaav hota hain
cup rojana palak khane se heart attack nahi hota hain
exercise rojana kare agar aapko high cholesterol ki problem hain to aap rojana 40 se 60 minutes ki exercise jaroor kare
exercise se cholesterol ka level kam ho jata hain aur dil ki bimariya hone ka khatra kafi kam ho jata hain
06 chhach chach peene ke fayde benefits of
chhach , chach peene ke fayde benefits of buttermilk hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips chhach , chach peene ke fayde benefits of buttermilk 0 health tips a a print email chhachh jise mattha , chaas , chach ya lassi bhi kaha jata hain , jo ki dahi se banta hain , bharat ka ek mukhya drink hain
calcium jaise ki mattha ek dairy product hain isliye isme calcium khoob bhari matra mein paya jata hain
rog prtirodhak shamta ko badhaye isme healthy bacteria aur carbohydrates hote hain , saath hi lactose sharir mein aapki rog pratirodhak shamta immunity power ko badhata hain , jisse aap turant energetic ho jate hain
vitamins buttermilk mein vitamin c , a , e , k aur b paye jate hain , jo sharir ke poshan ki jaroorat ko pura karte hain
minerals yeh swasth poshak tatvo jaise iron , phosphorus , zinc aur potassium se bhara hota hain , jo ki sharir ke liye bahut hi jaroori minerals mane jate hain
low calorie yadi aap diet par hain to roj ek glass mattha jaroor piye
yeh low calorie aur fat mein kam hota hain

general knowledge , tech tips a a print email aaj smartphone ka zamana hain aur youth ki is taraf tezi se badhte interest ki wajah whatsapp hain
har koi whatsapp par aana chahta hain aur apne circle se jude rahna chahta hain
bas aapke phone mein internet pack hona jaroori hain
whatsapp ke jariye aap apne dosto se photo , video , music , contact number aur apni location bhi share kar sakte hain
aap apne dosto ko voice notes bhi bhej sakte hain
pahle whatsapp mein privacy ki suvidha kam thi , lekin ab aap settings mein ja kar apna status , profile photo aur last seen jaise option ki setting kar sakte hain ki veh aap apne dosto ya chuninda dosto ko dikhana chahte hain ya nahi
agar koi aapko anjaan person preshan kar raha hain toh aap usko apne whatsapp se block bhi kar sakte hain
whatsapp aapko media auto download ki suvidha bhi deta hain
whatsapp ke jariye aap kisi bhi friend ko free voice calling aur yaha tak ki free video calling bhi kar sakte hain , iske liye aapko internet data ki jaroorat padti hain
whatsapp aake phone ki bahut space cover karta hain
whatsapp install karne ke liye aapko bahut saari permission deni padti hain jaisi ki kuch personal details , location aadi
whatsapp se distraction hota hain , kyonki aap usay barabar check karte hain
kahne ko toh isme free voice aur video calling ki suvidha hain , lekin inko istemal karne par yeh itna jyada internet data use karta hain , jo ki normal calling se bhi mehanga padta hain

ki apple ke iphone ke mukable android smartphones behtar option ho sakte hain
fast sink android smartphones google , facebook aur other apps ke saath behtar aur fast sink ho jate hain
aise mein in sites ka istemal karne mein aapko time barbaad nahi karna padta hain
memory card android smartphone users micro sd card ki madad se apne smartphone ki memory badha sakte hain
jabki iphone users aisa nahi kar sake hain , unhe 16 , 32 ya 64 gb memory card se hi kaam chalana padta hain
battery replacement market mein kai saare aise android smartphones hain jo aapko purani battery badalkar nayi lagane ki suvidha dete hain
common charger charger ke mamle mein android smartphones iphone ko peeche chhod dete hain
jabki android users is mamle mein khud ko lucky maan sakte hain , kyonki android ke lagbhag sabhi smartphone ek jaise charger se charge kiye ja sakte hain
ise users jis tarah se chahe oos tarah se customize kar sakte hain
isme users ko themes , launchers aur kai apps install karne ki suvidha milti hain
lekin is segment mein iphone peeche rah jata hain
iphone mein vahi purana ios icon hain
budget friendly budget ke mamle mein android smartphones ne baazi maar li hain
android phones iphone se kanhi jyada budget friendly hain
veh kam budget mein aapko jaroorat se jyada features dete hain
lekin iphone 18000 rupees se start hokar alag alag variants mein alag alag price par milenge
isliye android smartphones ki range aisi hain jise sabhi log apni economy ke anusaar khareed sakte hain
android ya ios aajkal koi bhi outdated phone istemal nahi karna chahta hain
aise mein android smartphones ka ek plus point yeh bhi hain ki yeh samay samay par update hote rahte hain
bata de ki iphone users ko 1 saal baad hi update milta hain
isliye better performance , price aur anya mamlo mein android behtar vikalp ho sakta hain
behtar hardware option apple apne har device mein ek hi hardware ko modify karke istemal karta hain , lekin android smartphones companies apne phone ko fast banane ke liye naye naye hardware ka istemal karti rahti hain
iske saath hi designs aur looks mein bhi android phones behtar hote chale ja rahe hain
covered design , flexible phone aur smart look
vo din bhi door nahi jab market mein transparent android phone bhi aa jayenge

se kam keemat wala intex aqua star ii 0 intex , smartphone a a print email indian handset maker company intex ne aqua series ka naya budget smartphone launch kar diya hain
inch hi hain display intex company ne apne is nay smartphone aqua star 2 mein android ka operating system diya hain
vahi is handset mein 5 inch ki display milegi
2ghz ka quad core processor milega
aqua star 2 mein aapko 1gb ram milegi
ismein 8gb ki internal memory aur 32 gb tak micro sd card ki suvidha milegi
mega pixel ka rear camera intex company ne apne is naye smartphone aqua star ii ko kafi stylish banaya hain
vahi isme 8mp ka rear camera milega
jabki front camera 5 mp ka hoga
agar connectivity ki baat kare to intex aqua star ii mein aapko 3g , wi fi , gps , bluetooth aadi ki suvidha milegi
color variant ki baat kare to isme aapko white , grey , silver aur champagne color available hoga

micromax , smartphone a a print email indian phone brand micromax ne apne smartphone ki series mein ' canvas nitro 2 ' ko lauch kiya hain
yeh canvas nitro2 online retail store infibeam par bikri ke liye available ho gya hain
micromax ke is naye smartphone ki keemat 10 , 399 rupaye rakhi gyi hain
sutro ki maane to micromax ne ise indian market mein redmi note , lenovo a7000 aur moto e 4g ke comparative ke roop mein utaara hain
abhi ho rahi hain online bikri indian smartphone nirmata company micromax ne ek baar phir smartphone ki series mein ek behad jabardast smartphone ' canvas nitro2 ' launch kiya hain
company ne canvas series mein is smartphone ko jodte huye iski keemat 10 , 399 rupees rakhi hain
sabse khas baat yeh hain ki kaale rang ka yeh smartphone micromax ke behatrin smartphones mein jagah banane mein kamyaab hoga , kyonki company ne isme ek se badh kar ek features diye hain
iske camera ki quality bahut hi acchi di gyi hain
halaki yeh smartphone abhi online retail stores par hi bikri ke liye available hain
inch ki display micromax ne is smartphone mein 1280 x 720 pixel resolution ke saath 5 inch ka display diya hain
yeh smartphone
4ghz octa core mediatek mt6592m processor par based hain
iske saath hi 450gpu , 2gb ram aur 16 gb internal memory di gyi hain
iske alawa iske memory ko micro sd card ki madad se 32 gb tak badhaya ja sakta hain
yeh smartphone android ke
kitkat operating system par chalta hain
smartphone mein led flash aur auto focus ke saath 13 megapixel ka rear camera hain
front camera 5 megapixel ka hain
connectivity ke mamle mein bhi yeh piche nahi hain , isme 3g , gprs edge , wi fi
b g n , gps , bluetooth aur micro usb jaise features hain

health tips a a print email badhti age ke saath bones ka weak hona men aur women mein ek common problem hain
is mamle mein sabse important period hota hain pregnancy ka , kyonki is dauran mahila ke sharir se ek bhroon ke vikas ki jaroorat bhi pura hoti hain
shishu baby ko hoti hain jaroorat pregnancy mein shishu ki haddiyo ke development ke liye calcium ki jaroorat hoti hain
baby apne liye saare jaroori nutrients mother ke khane se leta hain
agar aapke bhojan mein jaroori calcium aur minerals nahi honge , to shishu aapki haddiyo se yeh jaroori nutrients sokhne lagta hain
pregnancy aur doodh pilane tak ke samay mein mahila ke sharir mein nutrients ki kami hone lagti hain
aise mein jo auratein apne poshan ko lekar alert nahi rahti hain , unhe health se related kai problems ka samna karna padta hain
khatra hain osteoporosis ka long time tak lagatar calcium ki kami osteoporosis ki wajah ban sakti hain
osteoporosis ya haddiyo ka kamjor hone ka khatra badh jata hain
isliye dhyaan de healthy aur strong bones ke liye balanced diet , regular exercise aur healthy lifestyle ko apnana bahut hi jaroori hain
calcium apne bhojan mein khoob calcium ko shamil kare
apne food mein calcium ki matra ko badhane ke liye pregnancy tak ka intezar na kare
agar aap maa banane ja rahi hain to doctor se salah lekar calcium supplements tablet kha sakti hain
vitamin d vitamin d se haddiyo ko calcium sokhne mein madad milegi
agar aap suraj ki roshini nahi le paa rahi hain , to doctor se consult karke vitamin d ke tablets le sakti hain
regular exercise haddiyo ko majboot banane ke liye rojana exercise behad hi jaroori hain
muscles ki majbooti par bhi in exercise ka good effect padta hain
agar aap pregnant hain to uchal kood wale exercise na kare
lekin haddiyo ko healthy rakhne ke liye aap anya halki fulki exercise ya diet mein calcium ko shamil karne ke tarike jaroor ajmaye

microsoft lumia 540 ke features lumia 540 mein 5 inch ki ips dispaly hd 720 x 1280 pixle resolution diya gya hain

yeh phone windows
halaki ki company ise windows 10 ke update ke saath degi
lumia 540 mein
ghz ka quad core cortez a7 qualcomm snapdragon 200 processor hain
saath hi adreno 302 gpu diya gya hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email khichadi khane mein bahut hi tasty hoti hain , ise halka bhojan bhi mana jata hain
agar khichadi moong ki daal ki banayi jaye to yeh aur bhi zyada faydemand hoti hain , kyonki ismecarbohydrate , protein , fiber , vitamin c , calcium , magnesium , phosphorus aur potassium bahut hi acchi matra mein paye jate hain
benefits of eating khichadi in hindi urdu
agar digestion system week hain to khichadi mein nimbu ka ras mila kar khana chahiye
yeh bahut hi paustik food hain
nutrients ka khazana khichadi mein protein , carbohydrate ke alawa sharir ke liye jaroori amino acid bhi paye jate hain
pregnancy mein khichadi jaroor khaye pregnancy aur delivery ke baad pet mein aksar kharabi ho jati hain
body ko detoxify kare khichadi kha kar aap apni body ko detoxify kar sakte hain

04 saavdhaan jhaag wala toothpaste de
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips saavdhaan jhaag wala toothpaste de sakta hain aapko cancer
general knowledge , health tips a a print email naami giraami companies tarah tarah ke toothpaste ka nirmaan karti rahti hain
jaise ki fluoride
fluoride oos zehar ka naam hain jo sharir mein fluorosis naam ki bimari ko paida karta hain
yeh jhaag sodium lauryl sulphate naam ke chemical ki wajah se bante hain
chemistry mein ek chemical ka jikr hua hain , veh hain sodium lauryl sulfate
agar aap chemistry ki dictionary mein sodium lauryl sulfate ke baare mein janna chahenge toh is word ke aage likha hota hain zehar
aur agar is chemical ki
kyonki bina sodium lauryl sulfate ke toothpaste mein jhaag nahi ban sakta hain
toothpaste aur shaving cream dono mein yeh sodium lauryl sulfate daala jata hain
technical language mein ise synthetic detergent kaha jata hain , vahi in pasto mein milaya jata hain
yehi synthetic detergent sodium lauryl sulfate kapda dhone wale washing powder aur detergent cake , shampoo aur daadhi banane wale shaving cream mein bhi milaya jata hain
sodium lauryl sulfate ke aur bhi naam hain sodium lauryl sulfate ke aur bhi naam hain , jo aapke toothpaste par print hote hain
inme sodium dodecyl sulfate , sulfuric acid , monododecyl ester , sodium salt , sodium salt sulfuric acid aadi naam hain
jaise aap tooth powder ya manjan jaise product use kar sakte hain

top 10 weight loss food in hindi urdu
isme high quantity mein fiber paya jata hain , yeh aapke sharir ki protein ki jaroorato ka bakhoobi khyaal rakhta hain
fiber wala food khane se cholesterol kam hota hain aur pitt ka production badhta hain , jisse fat ko kam karne mein madad milti hain
yeh kafi hud tak cholesterol ko kam karne mein helpful hoti hain
yeh zingiberaceae family ki member hain
curcumin iska important element hota hain jo carbohydrate ko low sugar mein badal deta hain
pitt foodfat ko tukado mein todne ki koshish karta hain
yeh body se extra fat ghatane ke saath saath sharir ki jaroori process ko sanchalit karne ke liye extra energy bhi deta hain
mirch chilli pepper solanaceae family ka plant hain
chilli mein capsaicin paya jata hain jo metabolism ko tez karta hain
moong ke sprout mein vitamin a , b , c aur e bahtaayat hota hain
elaichi elaichi bhi zingiberaceae family ka plant hain
05 makeup removal tips in hindi urdu

how remove make from face eyes in hindi urdu
yeh hain aankho aur chehre par se makeup hatane ke kuch asaan tips makeup removal tips in hindi urdu
is misharan ko cotton ball mein lagakar chehra saaf kare
bazaar mein bahuttarah ke cleanseraur makeup remover available hain
alcohol skin ke liye nuksaandayak hota hain
yeh istemal ke kuch din tak fresh look dete hain , lekin phir skin ko dry bana dete hain
niyamit cleaning , toning aur moisturising se skinkisi bhi tarah ki samsya sedoor rahti hain aur lambe samay tak swasth rahti hain
makeup hatane ke liye jo bhi product istemal kare , usay cotton ball ki sahayata se hi saaf kare
foundation , lipstick jaise water bestfacial makeup kisi bhi acche cleanser se asaani se saafkiyeja sakte hain , lekin eye makeup jaise liner kajal aur maskaara ko hatane ke liye alag remover ki jaroorat hoti hain
iske liye makeup remover solution mein adhik oil hona chahiye
eye makeup hatane ki kuch tips
eye makeup hatane ke liye homemade cleanser bhi banaya ja sakta hain
cleanser banane ke liye castor oil , olive oil aur canola oil ko barabar matra mein milaye
ab is mishran ko tissue paper ya cotton ball mein thoda sa lekar aankho ko saaf kare
eye makeup ko hatane ke liye baby oil aur baby lotion ka bhi istemal kiya ja sakta hain

agar t
ke liye gharelu nuskhe home remedies for t
treatment in hindi urdu orange ek glass fresh orange juice mein ek chutki namak aur 1 chammach shahad mix karke piye
pudina isme anti bacterial gun hota hain jo cough se nijaat dilata hain
is mixture ko 3 hisso mein baant le aur har ek ghante mein piye

01 indian currency se jude kuch
indian currency se jude kuch interesting facts
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge indian currency se jude kuch interesting facts
general knowledge a a print email bhartiya note ke kuch rochak fact jinke baare mein shayad aap janana chahenge
languages mein likhi hoti hain keemat hindi aur english ke alawa indian currency note mein 15 languages ka istemal hota hain
koi bhi note jaise 10 , 20 , 50 aadi par hindi aur english ke alawa assamese , bengali , gujarati , kannada , kashmiri , konkani , malayalam , marathi , nepali , oriya , punjabi , sanskrit , tamil , telugu aur urdu mein iski keemat likhi hoti hain
hindi aur english ka istemal note ke front side mein hota hain
rbi ke guidelines ke anusaar , kisi bhi tarah ka phata , purana aur ganda note kisi bhi bank ki branch mein jakar badla ja sakta hain
sikko ki taskari isliye hoti thi bangladesh mein blade banane ke liye ek samay 5 rupees ke coins ki smuggling ki jati thi
ek blade ki keemat 2 rupees thi
rbi nahi balki finance ministry jari karta hain 1 rupee ka note ek rupaye ka note vitt mantralay jaari karta hain
baaki sabhi noto ko jaari karne ka adhikaar reserve bank of india rbi ke paas hain
is ek rupaye ke note par rbi ke governor ki jagah finance secretory ka signature hota hain
bharat hi nahi in desho ki currency bhi rupaya hain 20th century ke shuruvaat mein rupya adan , oman , kuwait , qatar , kenya , uganda , seychelles aur mauritius ki bhi currency thi
itna hi nahi agar koi in notes ke saath nepal mein pakda jata hain toh usay punishment bhi dene ka niyam hain
reserve bank ne january 1938 mein pahli baar paper currency chhaapi thi , jo ki 5 rupaye ka note tha
maje ki baat yeh hain ki 1954 mein per capita income 240 rupees thi aur 10000 ka note chhaapna apne aap mein ek rochak baat thi

health tips a a print email hum sabhi jante hain ki fruits health ke liye bahut hi faydemand hote hain
lekin fruits ko aise hi kha lene se phalo mein mauzood nutrients sharir ko sahi tarike se nahi mil pate hain
khana khane se pahle fruits khane se fruits sharir mein mauzood gandagi aur kharab chemicals ko sharir se baahar nikaal dete hain
fruits ka juice kaise piye
seb apple isme vitamin c ki matra kam hoti hain , lekin antioxidants aur flavnoids bharpoor matra mein hote hain
dono hi chemical vitamin c ki activeness ko badha dete hain , jisse cancer aur heart attack ka khatra kam ho jata hain
kiwi is chote se phal mein orange ke mukable dugna vitamin c mauzood hota hain
potassium , magnesium , vitamin e aur fiber ka yeh bahut hi accha source hain
yeh cancer ko heart blockage ko rokne mein madad karta hain
iske sewan se garmiyo mein dehydration se bacha ja sakta hain
tarbooz khane se immune system bhi majboot banta hain
orange isme vitamin c bahut hi acchi matra mein paya jata hain

health tips a a print email sabut dhaniye ke beej ka istemal rasoi mein masale ke taur par kiya jata hain
lekin kya aapko maloom hain ki dhaniya ke beej ka paani coriander seeds water ko regularly piya jaye to health par kya good effect dekhne ko milenge
kyonki dhaniye ke beejo mein magnesium , vitamin c , potassium , calcium jaise minerals paye jate hain , jo body ki kai saari health problems se chhutkara dilaate hain
health benefits of coriander seeds water in hindi urdu
periods ke dard se aaram dilaye dhaniye ke paani mein antispasmodic properties hoti hain jo mahilaon ke periods ke dauran hone wale dard ko kam karne mein madadgar maani jati hain
typhoid se bachaata hain dhaniye ke paani mein ek special element duodenal hota hain
yeh typhoid ke bacteria ko khatm karne mein antibiotics se dugna asar karta hain
ulcer ki problem se nijaat dilaye dhaniya ka paani collagen tissue ke production ko increase karta hain
skin infection se bachaata hain dhaniye ke pani mein linolenic acid paya jata hain jo skin ko infection aur eczema se bachaata hain
khoon badhaaye dhaniye ke pani mein bharpoor matraa mein vitamin c aur folic acid hota hain
diabetes ki bimari se bachaye niyamit roop se dhaniye ka paani peene se body ka glucose level balance mein rahta hain
body ki immunity strong banaye dhaniye ke paani mein ascorbic acid paya jata hain
ascorbic acid ko antioxidant ki category mein rakha gya hain
yeh special anti oxidant body ki immunity ko boost karta hain
dil ke liye faydemand dhaniye ka paani peene se sharir mein good cholesterol yani hdl badhta hain aur body se kharab cholesterol yani ldl kam hota hain
04 whatsapp ke 5 secret features jo aapke
whatsapp ke 5 secret features jo aapke bade kaam aayenge
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home smartphone tech news tech tips whatsapp ke 5 secret features jo aapke bade kaam aayenge
smartphone , tech news , tech tips a a print email agar aap smatphone user hain to , in dino whatsapp aapke liye jaroori ho gya hain
jis tarah se whatsapp users ki sankhya badhti ja rahi hain
halaki iss messaging app mein bahut se features aise hain , jinhe janna aapke liye jaroori hain
to aayiye jane aise hi khas features
disable read receipts last seen timestamps whatsapp mein messaging ke dauraan aapne dekha hoga ki jise aap message karte hain , vo message 2 tick ke saath pahuchta hain
iska matlab yeh hota hain , ki message server par pahuch gya hain
halaki ki agar aap blue tick ko hatana chahte hain , to aapko settings account privacy mein jakar read receipts ko disable karna hoga
change number keep whatsapp account kisi user ko apna whatsapp number ko change karne ka man kar raha hain , to yeh bahut hi asaan hain
halaki iss process mein aapka whatsapp account delete nahi hoga
check if whatsapp servers are down aksar aapne dekha hoga ki , chatting karte karte kai message ruk jaate hain
halaki ki yeh aamtaur par net service par depend karta hain
chat backups on google drive koi smartphone user kisi bhi chat ko miss nahi karna chahta hain
to iske liye sabse best option hain , chat backups on google drive
yani ki aap koi bhi chat history ko google drive mein save kar sakte hain aur yeh aapki backup file ki tarah google drive mein pada rahega
pay for a friend agar aap apne dost ka payment karna chahte hain , to aapke liye pay for a friend ka feature available hain

08 nashpati khane ke fayde benefits of pear
nashpati khane ke fayde benefits of pear hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips nashpati khane ke fayde benefits of pear 0 health tips a a print email nashpati pear khane ke bade hi fayde hain
aise mein log sabse jyada bukhaar aur anya health problems ka shikar bante hain
asal mein nashpati seb parivar apple family se juda hua hain
nashpati ka juice energy ka best source hain
yeh body ke immune system ko majboot banata hain
gram nashpati mein 9 mg sodium , 14 mg phosphorus , iron
mg , iodine 1 mg , cobalt 10mg , manganese 65 mg , copper 120 mg , molybdenum 5mg , florine 10mg , zinc 190 gram , vitamin a , vitamin b1 , b2 aur potassium bhi paya jata hain
saath hi bharpoor matra mein calcium bhi paya jata hain
nashpati khane ke labh benefits of pear in hindi
nashpati zehareele padartho aur chemical se badi aant ki raksha karta hain
thakaan door karne ke liye nashpati khane se sharir ka glucose energy mein convert ho jata hain
isliye nashpati ka sewan karne se osteoporosis hone ka khatra kam ho jata hain
garbhvati mahila pregnant woman ke liye faydemand nashpati garbhvati pregnant mahila aur uske bacche ke liye bhi faydemand hota hain
nashpati mein mauzood folic acid folate garbhvati mahilaon ke shishoon babies mein neural tube defect se bachata hain
cholesterol mein hain ramban pectin ki adhik matra hone ke karan yeh cholesterol level ko kam rakhta hain
diabetes control nashpati fiber yukt hone ke karan diabetes ke mareezo ke liye aushadhi ki tarah kaam karta hain
nashpati mein vitamin c aur copper hote hain jo kai prakar ke cancer jaise colon , breast , prostate aur fefde ke cancer ke khatre ko kafi kafi kam kar dete hain
immune system ke majboot banata hain nashpati mein mauzood anti oxidants aur vitamin c immune system ko majboot bana kar jukam , flu aur infection se ladne mein madad karte hain
dil ke liye healthy nashpati mein mauzood potassium blood pressure ko kam karne ke saath dil ka daura aur stroke ke khatre ko kam karne mein madad karta hain
anemia se bachata hain nashpati iron ka ek accha source hain , jo hemoglobin ke level ko badhata hain aur anemia ke mareezo ko suraksha pradan karta hain
skin ke liye faydemand nashpati mein mauzood vitamin a aur anti oxidants tavcha par free radicals ke asar ko kam karke jhurriyo , muhaso aur anya skin problems ko door karte hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email aaiye jante hain amlatas ke ped , phool , patte ke kya fayde hote hain
what is health benefits ofamaltas tree , flower in hindi urdu
amaltas ki jadi booti naye body ke naye tissuesko paida karti hain aur iski pattiyo ka ras infected skin area ki dressing ke liye istemal kiya jata hain
isse infection nahi hota hain
body ki immunity ko badhata hain amaltas ke ped ke fruits aur chhal anti oxidants guno ka khazana hote hain
isliye iska sewan karne se body ka immune system strong banta hain
lekin dhyaan rahe ki amaltas ki aushidhi ka prayog herbal expertki salah lekar hi kare
in problems mein amaltas ke gude ko naabhi ke aas paas ke areas par laganese fayda hota hain
skin ki problemsdoor kare amaltas ke ped ki pattiya , skin ki jalan , sujan aur dard ko asardaar tarike se rahat dene mein madadkarti hain
amaltas ki pattiyo ko chhaachh se saathpees kar skin par lagane se skin se related kai problems se chhutkara mil jata hain
daad khaj khujali hone par amaltas ki phalliyo ke gude ko neem ki pattiyo ke saath pees kar infected skin par lagane se labh hota hain

08 vegetarian food khane ke fayde
vegetarian food khane ke fayde
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips vegetarian food khane ke fayde
health tips a a print email non vegetarian ko jo tatvnon veg se milte hain , vaise hi shakahaari bhojan vegetarian food mein bhi veh sabhi tatv mauzood hote hain
vegetarian diet bhi utne hi nutrients hote hain , jitney ki non veg mein
non vegetarian logo ke liye protein , fish , meat aur eggs se prapt hota hain , jabki vegetarian logo ko saag sabzi se prapt hota hain
aaiye jante hain shakahari bhojan vegetarian diet khane ke kya fayde aur benefits hotehain
vegetarian khana khane ke fayde nutrients se bharpoor ; vegetables mein bahut se jaroori tatv jaise vitamins , anti oxidants , amino acid aadi paye jate hain , jisse kai khatarnaak bimariyo se bacha ja sakta hain
iske alawa vegetarian food mein protein , carbohydrate aur fat wale food bhi paye jate hain jo health ke liye faydemand hote hain
vegetarian diet mein jaroorat ke hisaab se calories aur vitamin paye jate hain
aur vegetarian food mein fiber bhi bahut hi acchi matra mein paya jata hain
cancer se bachaye vegetarian diet aapko kai tarah ke bimariyo se bachata hain
aisa vegetarians logo mein estrogens ki kam quantity paye jane ki wajah se hota hain
anaaz , beans , fruits aur sabziyo mein fiber aur antioxidant zyada hote hain , jo cancer ko door rakhne mein madad karte hain
energetic banaye vegetarian food ka extra effect nahi padta hain
saath hi yeh brain ko active rakh kar usay sharp banata hain
vegetarian log kam depression mein rahte hain aur khud ko fresh feel karte hain
kidney ki bimariyo se bachaye kidney ki problem aur kidney ki bimariyo mein bhi vegetarian foodfaydemand hota hain
vegetarian food kidney se related bimariyo ki roktham mein madadgar hota hain
research ke anusaar , urine ke jariye protein ka nikal jana , cells ke dwara khoon ko saaf karne ki gati , kidney se blood ka circulation aur kidney se related defects non vegetarian logo ke mukable vegetarian logo mein kam paaye jate hain
high blood pressure se bachata hain vegetarian logo mein blood pressure ka khatra non vegetarian logo ke mukable bahut kam hoti hain aur yeh weight aur namak par depend nahi karta hain
aisa isliye hota hain kyonki aise log complex carbohydrate jyada matra mein lete hain aur inme motapa bhi kam hota hain

baarish ke mausam mein jaroor khayehealthy snacks

health tips a a print email barsaat ke mausam mein hame tala bhuna namkeen aur snacks khane ka mann karta hain , lekin yeh snacks sehat ke liye bahut hi nuksandayak hote hain
fried food ki bajaye agar healthy snacks ko khayenge toh aapka pet bhi sahi rahega aur aapki sehat bhi acchi rahegi
baarish ke mausam ke liye healthy snacks ke tips dishes mein nuts ka istemal kare
jaise gajar , baby corn , kakdi , coloured shimla mirch
ism e jotter powder aur sun dried tomato bhi shamil kare
thoda garlic aur basil maza dugna kar dega
iced tea , green tea aur flavoured water ko inke saath serve kare
yahi vah khana hain jo gilt free hota hain , isliye healthy food banate waqt yeh bhi dhyaan rakhe ki quantity thodi zyada honi chahiye , kyonki aise snacks aksar jyada kha liye jate hain
yeh bhi aap try kar sakte hain whole wheat crackers par kisa hua paneer chhidke
kali mirch , chilli flex aur fresh vegetables se decorate kare
snacks kurkure hone chahiye

health tips a a print email papite ke patte ka juice peene ke fayde
benefits of papaya leaf juice in hindi urdu
papita ke patte apne medical guno ki wajah se jane jate hain
papite ke patto mein vitamin a , b , c , d aur e kealawa calcium bahut hi acchi matra mein hota hain
inke istemal se khatarnaak rogjaise cancer , dengue , blood sugar , dil ki bimari aur aanto mein rahne wale bacteria ko khatm karne mein madad milti hain
papite ke patte body ki immunity ko bhi boost karte hain
liver ko damage hone se bachate hain , kyonki dengue virus ki wajah se in sabhi problems ka saamna karna padta hain
body ki immunity ko badhaye in chamatkari pattiyo mein body ki immunity ko badhane wale gun paye jate hain
yeh blood mein white cells aur plates ko increase karne mein help karte hain
isse kuch hi dino mein aapke pimples door ho jayenge
yeh immunity ko badhata hain aur cervical cancer , breast cancer , liver cancer , fefdo ke cancer hone se rokne mein madadkarta hain
malaria aur dengue dono hi maccharo ke kaatne se hota hain
bacteria ko khatm kare papite ki pattiyo mein 50 active ingredients hote hain jo ki bacteria , fungus , parjeevi , virus aur cancer cells ko badhne se rokti hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email poha ek bahut hi healthy breakfast hain
yeh tasty recipe hoti hain
benefits of eating poha in hindi urdu
lekin agar aap iska istemal breakfast mein karenge toh isse hone wale benefits kai guna tak badh jate hain
poha khane ke fayde diabetes ke mareezo ke liye faydemand agar aap diabetes ke patient hain toh aapko poha jaroor khana chahiye
jyada matra mein calorie poha ko breakfast mein isliye recommended kiya jata hain kyonki isme zyada matra mein calorie payi jati hain
jisme itni calori payi jati hain moongfali poha 589 kilo calorie huli avalakki 222 kilo calorie vegetarian poha 224 kilo calorie
zyada matra mein carbohydrates pohe mein bharpoor matra mein carbohydrate paya jata hain
anaemia mein faydemand poha mein bharpoor matra mein iron paya jata hain , jisse body ko iron aur cells ko bharpoor oxygen milta hain
jis wajah se body mein immunity aur haemoglobin increase hoti hain
gluten ki matra kam hoti hain agar kisi food mein gluten ki quantity jyada ho toh oos cheez ko khane se aapko pet se related problems ho sakti hain
jis wajah se isme bharpoor matra mein minerals , vitamins aur fiber paya jata hain

asthma ya fefdo ka cancer aadi

09 diabetes se jude myths aur facts
diabetes se jude myths aur facts
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips diabetes se jude myths aur facts
health tips a a print email diabetes se jude aksar logo ko kuch bhram hote hain
diabetes se jude myths aur facts aapke samne yeh hain
diabetes myths facts myth meetha khane se hota hain diabetes
fact meethe se diabetes hone ka koi sambandh nahi hain
halaki diabetes ke ho jane ke baad meetha khane se sugar uncontrolled ho jati hain
myth alcohol ka blood glucose level se sambandh nahi hain
fact niyamit roop se alcohol ke istemal se sharir mein yurik acid aur triglyceride badhte hain
myth diabetes ke liye special khana hota hain
fact diabetes ke liye koi special khana nahi hota hain
balki balanced diet ki jaroorat hoti hain
jisme 50 60 percent carbohydrate , 15 20 percent protein , 20 25 percent fat aur doosre tatv shamil hain
myth sugar free khana hain samsya ka hal
fact sugar free ka matlab calorie free nahi hain
inme khoya , cream aadi ki calorie shamil hoti hain , jo sugar ko uncontrolled kar deti hain
myth diabetes ho to kam khana khaye
fact kam khana sahi nahi hain
myth mote logo ko hota hain diabetes hone ka khatra
myth ; diabetes mein khas aahar hi hain kafi
fact accha aahar vahi hain jisme 40 60 percent carbohydrate , 20 protein aur 30 ya usse kam fat ho
khana niyamit antral par le
myth type 2 diabetes type 1 ki tarah khatarnaak nahi hain
fact roktham na ho to diabetes ke dono roop samsyaon ko janm dete hain
dono mamlo mein sahi dawaa ke saath healthy lifestyle behad jaroori hain
myth diabetes ek umar ke baad hota hain
umar badhne ke saath diabetes type 2 ki shikayat badhti hain
myth khiladi ko diabetes nahi ho sakti hain
jaise olympic gold medalist swimmer garry hall , cricket khiladi wasim akaram
myth diabetes mareez mahila ko pregnant nahi hona chahiye
experts ki dekh rekh mein balanced lifestyle apnana jaroori hain
pregnancy se pahle aur pregnancy ke baad sugar level ko maintain rakhe
myth ; diabetes hain blood donate nahi kar sakte hain
fact american red cross ke anusaar diabetes ka mareez ek healthy insaan ki tarah rakht daan kar sakta hain , basharte kuch standards ko pura karta ho
myth diabetes ke mareez ki umar kam ho jati hain
fact sugar level sahi rakha jaye aur healthy lifestyle apnaya jaye to diabetes patient ki life bhi lambi ho sakti hain
fact diabetes ke mareez ko khane mein refined carbohydrate aur saturated fat se parhez karne ki salah di jati hain
niyamit exercise , samay par diet aur sahi dawaa jaroori hain
you may also like diabetes mein kya khaye aur kya naa khaye
diabetes se bach ke rahna re baba
diabetes ke liye kuch gharelu nuskhe
05 pregnancy mein aap yeh phal kha sakti
pregnancy mein aap yeh phal kha sakti hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge pregnancy mein aap yeh phal kha sakti hain
general knowledge a a print email jab aap pregnanthoti hain , tab aap koi bhi cheez ya phal khane ke bare mein baar baar sochti hain
pregnancy mein palak , dahi , broccoli , lal shimla mirch , soyaproducts , beans , egg , oatmeal , gajaraadi jaroorkhane chahiye
lekin kya aapko maloom hain ki pregnancy mein kaun kaun sephal khane chahiye
agar aap bhi janna chahti hain ki kaun se phal pregnancy mein bina hichak ke khaye ja sakte hain toh yeh post jaroor padhe
pregnancy mein yeh phal fruit khana ek dum safe hain
berries berries mein dher sara anti oxidants paye jate hain , isliye ise super food bhi kaha jata hain
berries mein aap cherry , ber , strawberry , jamun jaise berries ko bina kisi darrke pregnancy mein kha sakti hain
kela pregnancy mein kabz ki problem aam ho jati hain
avocado is phal mein folic acid hota hain
pregnancy ke dauran pregnant woman ko khoob saare folic acid ki jaroorat hoti hain , toh ise khana bilkul na bhoole
amrood amrood mein vitamin c aur anti oxidants hote hain
is citrus fruit mein khoob saara an ti oxidants hota hain jo paida hone wale bacche ke liye accha hain
lychee yeh ek safe phal hain , jise aap araam se pregnancy mein kha sakti hain
santra santra khatta aur meetha hota hain jo ki pregnant woman ko sabse jyada pasand aata hain
iske alawa isme vitamins aur minerals bhi paye jate hain
05 doodh peene ke fayde benefits of
doodh peene ke fayde benefits of drinking milk hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips doodh peene ke fayde benefits of drinking milk 0 health tips a a print email doodh hamesha se hi hamari diet ka ek aham hissa raha hain
scientist ke kai research se yeh sabit ho chuka hain ki calcium mein hamare body fat ko burn karne ki power hoti hain
250ml wholemilk malai yukt doodh mein kareeb 150 calories hoti hain
agar aap prayapt matra mein doodh lena chahte hain to aap skim milk low fat milk accha option sabit ho sakta hain
kyonki isme whole milk ki tulna mein kam calorie 120 calorie hoti hain
yeh dono high quality protein hain
inme se ' whey ' ko fast protein ke naam se jana jata hain , kyonki ise khoon jaldi se observe kar leta hain
in do tarah ke proteins ke perfect combination ke karan doodh muscle ke liye acchi drink mana ja sakta hain aur rojana ek glass milk workout ke fayde ko badha sakta hain
bazaar mein doodh ke kai options mauzood hain
yeh protein , vitamin b aur potassium ka accha source hain
kam fat hone ke karan yeh gaay guy , cow ke doodh se behtra mana jata hain
soya milk jinhe samanya doodh se allergy ki shikayat hain ya jo doodh ko non vegetarian ki list mein rakhte hain , unke liye soya milk accha vikalp hain
coconut milk south india mein bahut matra mein istemal hone wala nariyal ka doodh protein ka bahut hi badhiya source hain
organic food ke supporter kachche doodh ko priority dete hain , kyonki unka manana hain ki kachche doodh mein protein , carbohydrate , fat , vitamins aur minerals hote hain jo ki ubaalne par kam ho jate hain
skimmed milk yani ki malai rahit doodh hi kyon
us ke agricultural department ki mane to skim milk peene se cardiovascular bimariyo ka khatra kam ho jata hain
aaiye jante hain skim milk peene ke kya fayde hote hain
isme paya jana wala calcium aur phosphorus daanto ke swasth ke liye bhi faydemand hain
yeh kai research se sabit ho chuka hain ki doodh mein na kewal paushtik tatv hote hain , balki isse buddhi par positive asar padta hain aur mentally capacity badhti hain
isse bachne ke liye skim milk ka sewan kijiye
tavcha nikhaare skimmed milk ke sewan se skin mein natural roop se nikhaar aata hain
darasal skim milk mein calcium , protein aur chiknaai hoti hain , jisse tavcha par kasaav aata hain aur jhurriya kam hoti hain
doodh mein paya jane wala lactic acid exfoliate aur enzyme ki tarah kaam karta hain , jo skin ko komal banaata hain
isme amino acid hota hain , jo chehre ko nami pradaan karta hain
iske sewan se cholesterol ki matra badhti hain
laptop par kaam karne ke liye sahi posture kya hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email kya aapke pairo mein hamesha dard rahta hain aur aapke pairo mein kamjroi mahsoos hoti hain

home remedies forlegs pain in hindi urdu
leg pain hone ke kai reason ho sakte hain , jaise ki badhti umar , shoes sahi size ke nahi pahanna , bahut jyada chalna ya lambe waqt tak khade rahna , khane mein minerals ki kami ka hona , diabetes aur dusri sehat se judi problems
ek chote se plastic ke bag mein ice ke chote chote slices daale aur dard ko door karne ke liye circulation motion mein infected areas ki massage kare
isse swelling ko kam karne mein madad milti hain
apne pairo ko is paani mein 10 se 15 minutes tak dooboye
hot cold water therapy hot cold water therapy leg pain se rahat paane ka sabse best tarika hain
hot water treatment blood flow ko badhata hain to vahi cold treatment sujan ko kam karne mein madad karta hain
is process ko 2 3 baar dohraaye
phir apne pairo ko dryness se bachane ke liye uspar moisturizer lagaye
massage karne se blood flow tez hota hain aur muscles ko aaram milta hain

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home tech tips paani mein gir gya hain mobile to apnaye yeh tips
tech tips a a print email young generation ke liye smartphone sabse jaroori device banta ja raha hain
check your battery stickers maket mein aise bahut kam smartphone honge jo water proof hain
jyadatar companies waterproof smartphone nahi banaati hain
switch off the handset immediately phone ke bheegte hi usay sabse pahle switch off karde
iske baad battery , sim , sd card nikal kar usay paper towel se savdhani se saaf kare
wipe your phone thoroughly phone ko mulayam kapde se dheere dheere agar ho sake , to chhote vacuum cleaner se bhi paani ko sukhaya ja sakta hain
iske alawa hair dryer ka bhi istemal kiya ja sakta hain
keep the phone in a bowl of uncooked rice phone ke beegne par uska moisture nikalne ke liye sabse accha tarika chawal ka bowl hain
aapko bata de ki chawal mein hygroscopy property hoti hain , jo moisture ko observe karne mein kaam aati hain
wait for 24 hours batate chale ki , phone ka pura moisture sukhne mein kafi samay lag sakta hain
aise mein apne phone ko 24 hours se pahle restart na kare
on karne se pahle sabhi parts aur compartment ko check karle , taki kanhi moisture na rah gya ho
lekin bhige huye phone ko kabhi bhi pankhe , cooler aur ac aadi ki direct hawa nahi deni chahiye

how do correction or update in aadhaar card aadhaar card , general knowledge a a print email aadhaar card correction update
name address birth date , mobile number link or register your mobile number in aadhaar card , , , aap apne aadhar card mein naam name , pata address , date of birth , mobile number ko kaise badal change kar sakte hain , iske liye kya tips aur trika hain

urn receipt aadhaar card update process
documents self attested aadhaar card manually change option through post , https uidai

iball , tablet a a print email iball ne indian users ke liye 7 inch wali windows tablet iball slide i701 lauch kar diya hain
kyonki iball ne apne indian smartphone users ke liye 7 inch display wali windows tab launch kiya hain
yeh tab windows ke
iske alawa company ne yeh kaha hain ki yeh tablet windows 10 ke liye upgrade hogi , jo ki is tablet ko khareedne walo ke liye ek achchi khabar hain
milega office subscription is device par microsoft office ka subscription 1 saal ke liye diya gya hain
iske saath hi is tablet ke users ko microsoft one drive par 1 saal tak 1tb data save kar sakenge
agar features ki baat kare to quad core intel atom processor laga hain
internal memory 16 gb hain jise memory card ki madad se 32 gb tak badhaya ja sakta hain

mega pixel ka hain
09 sendha namak khane ke fayde benefits of
sendha namak khane ke fayde benefits of rock salt hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips sendha namak khane ke fayde benefits of rock salt 0 health tips a a print email sendha namak rock salt khane ke se kya fayde hote hain
sendha namak ke fayde benefits janane ke liye yeh post jaroor padhe
ayurveda ki bahut saari medicines mein sendha namak ka upyog hota hain
aam taur par use mein laye jane wale sea salt se high bp , diabetes , lakwa aadi gambhir bimariyo ka darr rahta hain
iske opposite sendha namak ke upyog se blood pressure par control rahta hain
yeh pachan mein bhi sahayak hota hain aur saath hi isme potassium aur magnesium paya jata hain jo dil ke liye faydemand hota hain
blood pressure , diabetes aadi bimariyo mein doctor namak ke istemal par dhyaan dene ki salah dete hain
dead skin ko door karne se lekar body ko refresh karne tak namak bahut hi upyogi hota hain
rock salt khas taur par vrat fasting ke dino mein istemal kiya jata hain
powder , liquid aur thos roop mein mauzood rock salt kai tarah ke dishes aur medicines ko taiyaar karne ke liye kiya jata hain
isse seasonal fever se bhi rahat milti hain
iski chutaki bhari matra khane se digestion sahi rahta hain
metabolism sahi rakhta hain sendha namak ke sewan se metabolism ka level sahi bana rahta hain , jo puri body ke function ke liye jimmevaar hota hain
isse body hydrate rahti hain , saath hi digestion bhi sahi rahta hain
active aur fit rakhta hain rock salt mein lagbhag 84 tarah ke aise minerals hote hain , jo sehat ke liye bahut hi faydemand hote hain
khastaur par isme mauzood magnesium aur calcium bahut ki fayda pahuchate hain
tension ko door karta hain rock salt mein mauzood aroma body ko relax karta hain
yeh digestion se related sabhi problems ko door karta hain aur pet ki samsyaon se nijat dilata hain
muscles ko relax karne ke saath hi yeh blood pressure ko control karta hain
saath hi body ko detoxify bhi karta hain
gargle kare gungune paani mein sendha namak mila kar usse gargle garare kare

02 android phone par aa rahi hain yeh
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home smartphone tech tips android phone par aa rahi hain yeh problems toh samajh lijiye aapke phone mein hain virus
smartphone , tech tips a a print email aksar aap aisi preshani serubaru hotehain jab aapke smartphoneki speed kam ho jati hain
jyada application ki availability aur open sourceplatformhonekiwajah seandroid smartphone mein virus ka khatra bahut jyada hota hain
lekin yeh problemachanak paida hui hain toh samajh lijiye aapke smartphone mein virus ka attack ho chuka hain
phone ki speed kam ho jana android smartphone mein virus aaneka sabsepahla lakshan hain , phone ka dheema hona
phone ki memory bharne par camera aur browsing jaisi services slow ho jati hain
lekin virus aaneparnormal calls , messaging aur typingke dauran bhi aap mahsoos karenge ki aapka androidsmartphone slow ho gya hain
extraicon agar aapkephone mein virus hain toh aksar apps tray ya home screen par ek extra icon bhi dikhaai dega
data ka use badh jana android smartphone mein virus ka attack sirfaapke phone koslow hi nahi karta , balki aapko hartarah senuksaan pahuchata hain

benefits side effects of pickle in hindi urdu
aachaar khane ke fayde free radicals se bachaye achar banane ke liye fruits aur vegetables ka istemal hota hain , iske liye phalo aur sabziyo ko bina pakaye huye istemal kiya jata hain
yeh anti oxidantsse bharpoor hota hain
yehanti oxidantsachar ke jariyebody mein pahuchate hain aur mukt kano yani ki free radicals se sharir ko bachate hain
jo kai tarah ki bimariyo ki wajah hain free radicals
darasal pet mein good aur bad dono tarahke bacteria hote hain , jab aap kisi antibiotic medicine ka sewan karte hain , tab good bacteria bhimar jate hain
isse digestion system par effect padta hain aur khana asaani se pachta nahi hain
jabki achaar mein namak hota hain , joprobiotics ke vikas mein helpful hain
isse digestion mein sudhaar aata hain

achar khane ke nuksan side effects ofpickle in hindi urdu
iske karan heartse related problems bhi ho sakti hain
isme paya jane wala sodium benzoate ko jyada khane se cancer ki samsya ho sakti hain
yeh diarrhoea ke karan pachan tantra ki parat ko prabhavit karta hain
ek research mein yehbaat saamne aayihain ki achaar jyada khane wale logo ko gastric ki problem ho sakti hain
yeh esophagealcancer ka karan bhi ban sakta hain
ulcer achar mein bahut zyada masale ki wajah se ulcer ki samsya ho sakti hain
diabetes ji haan diabetes ke mareezo ke liyeachar khana accha nahihota hain
achar mein preservatives ke roop mein chini ke saathbhi banaya jata hain
isliye diabetes se peedit logo ke liye yeh sahi nahi hain
high blood pressure high blood pressure , jyada matra mein namak ka sewan karne ki wajah se hota hain
isliyehigh bloodpressure ke mareezo ko achar se doori banaye rakhni chahiye
triglyceride ka high level aachar mein mauzoodsabhi tarah ke preservativeski wajah se yeh health ke liye bura hota hain
preservatives mein aam taurpar telki matra jyada hotihain
lekin iski mauzoodagi se sharir mein triglyceride ke level mein badhotarihoti hain
sharir mein sujan achar mein preservatives ke istemal ki wajah se namak ki matra zyada hoti hain
jisseismesodium bahut zyada hota hain

05 badam khane ke fayde benefits of almonds

new zealand journal of medicine mein prakashit ek study ke anusaar niyamit badam khane se sabse jyada fayda hota hain
isse body ki immunity badhti hain
badam mein monounsaturated fat , protein aur potassium paye jate hain , jo dil ke liye bahut hi faydemand hain
infection se kare mukabla naye shodh ke anusaar badam khane se body ko viral infection jaise sardi jukam , flu aadi se ladne ki shakti milti hain
italy mein messina ke institute of research and polyclinic university mein karyrat scientist ne yeh khoj ki hain ki badam ke chhilke mein natural roop se aise chemicals paye jate hain , jo immunity ko badhate hain
badam ke chhilke se white blood cells mein badhotari hoti hain

kam kare blood sugar yeh khoon mein mauzood sugar level ko kam kar deta hain
clinical research batate hain ki badam khane se badhe huye blood sugar level mein kami aati hain
protein ka power house badam mein protein ki matra adhik hoti hain

08 ice cube tray ka aap is tarah se bhi
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge ice cube tray ka aap is tarah se bhi istemal kar sakte hain
general knowledge a a print email kya aap ice cube tray ka istemal sirf paani bhar kar barf jamane ke liye hi karte hain
apni bachi hui wine , herbs , jewelry store ke alawa dusre tariko se bhi aap is ice tray ka use kar sakte hain
create cool mood kisi bhi party mein jaan daalne ke liye ek ice cube tray ko paani se bhar le
ab ise semi fridge mein rakhe
ab har cube ke beech mein mentos candy rakh de aur in cubes ko puri tarah se freeze ho jane de
in ice cubes ko cola ke glass mein add karke serve kare
start your garden gardening ka sauk rakhte hain to ice cube ke har compartment mein soil yani ki khaad daale
ab inme beej daal kar apna indoor sprouting season shuru kar le
fun treats with kids ice cube tray jelly cubes ke behad acche mold ho sakte hain
yeh kai tray jelly cubes bana sakte hain , jisme har tray alag color aur flavor mein hogi
inhe fun presentation ke liye kids ke party program mein rakha ja sakta hain
have fresh herbs all season sabhi tarah ke healthy herbs ko bareek kaat le aur inhe ice cube tray mein drop kare
iske alawa freezer mein inka colour bhi maintain rahta hain
organize your baubles ice cube tray mein apni choti moti jewelry rakhe aur inhe dressing table ki drawer mein hi rakhe
dresser drawer mein rakhe huye ice cube tray earring aur chote mote jewelry store karne ke liye behtarin jagah ho sakti hain
inme aap apni sabhi earrings store kar sakti hain aur yeh draaz asaani se stack kiya ja sakta hain
freeze leftover wine sauce ya stew banane ke liye bachi huyi wine ko ice cube tray mein freeze kare
jab red aur white wine ke cubes solid ho jaye jab inhe bahar nikaal kar zip lock bag mein shift karke freeze kare
pretty up a drink apne favorite beverage ke glass mein floral ice cube daalenge to behad khubsoorat dikhayi denge
isme aap edible flower phool aap use kar sakte hain
apne ghar mein hone wali kitty ya brunch party mein is tarah ke drink serve kare

05 ganne ka ras peene ke fayde benefits of
ganne ka ras peene ke fayde benefits of sugarcane juice hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips ganne ka ras peene ke fayde benefits of sugarcane juice 0 health tips a a print email garmiyo mein log ganne ka juice bahut jyada peete hain
ismein calcium , chromium , cobalt , copper , magnesium , meganize , phosphorus , potassium aur zinc shamil hain
iske alawa ismein vitamin a , b1 , b2 , b3 , b5 , b6 aur c ke saath anti oxidants , proteins aur bhojan ko asaani se pachaane wale fibers bhi mauzood hain
aayiye jante hain ganne ke ras se hone wale fayde ke baare mein benefits of sugarcane juice energy deta hain
ganne ka juice glucose ka bahut achcha source hota hain , jisse yeh body ko carbohydrate rakhne ke saath energy booster ka kaam bhi karta hain
lekin phir bhi yeh diabetes ke rogiyo ke liye bahut hi faydemand hota hain , kyonki iski meethas ka karan natural sugar hain jo glycemic index ke saath hi blood mein glucose ki matra ko bhi control karta hain
type 2 diabetes ke mareezo ko ganne ke ras ka sewan jaroor karna chahiye
cancer se bachaye ganne ke juice mein mauzood calcium , magnesium , potassium , iron aur meganize body mein alkaline ke roop mein kaam karta hain
aur mahilaon mein sabse jyada hone wale breast aur prostate ka cancer hone ki sambhavna kafi hud tak kam ho jati hain
kidney surkashit rakhta hain
ganne ke juice body mein maujoo protein level ko control karta hain
anti oxidants ganne ka juice anti oxidants se bharpoor hota hain , jo kai prakar ki bimariyo se ladkar body ke immunity system ko sahi rakhta hain
liver ke infection se bachaane ke saath hi bilirubin level ko control karta hain
pet ke kai prakar ke infection se bachaane ke saath usay cancer , gas , apach , pet ki jalan , marod aadi se bhi door rakhta hain
daag dhabbo se chhutkara healthy skin ke liye alpha hydroxy acid bahut hi faydemand hota hain
yeh keel muhanso ko door karne ke saath hi skin ko hydrate rakhne ka kaam karta hain
iske juice ko chehre par lagane se skin se related kai prakar ki problems door hoti hain
ise mask aur scrub ke taur par bhi istemal kiya ja sakta hain
08 tamatar khane ke fayde benefits of
tamatar khane ke fayde benefits of tomato hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips tamatar khane ke fayde benefits of tomato 0 general knowledge , health tips a a print email tamatar khane ke fayde bahut hain
kya aapko pata hain ki tamatar ek healthy food hain
isme vitamin c hota hain
inme calorie kam hoti hain , lekin itna sab kuch nahi hain
lal , pake , kachche tamatar mein vitamin a , c , k , folate aur potassium bahut hi acchi matra mein paye jate hain
tamatar mein fat , cholesterol , calorie aur sodium natural roop se kam paya jata hain
tamatar mein thiamine , niacin , vitamin b 6 , magnesium , phosphorus aur copper bhi paya jata hain , jo good health ke liye bahut hi jaroori tatv hain
14th century aur 15th century mein america mein tamatar khoob ugate thay
15th century ke madhya mein spain ka ek padri ise mexico se europe lekar aaya , iske baad europe mein tamatar ka production shuru hua
hamare desh mein tamatar ka production pahle pahal purtgaliyo portuguese dwara kiya gya
in phalo ko jagli janwar aur birds bade hi maje ke saath khate hain
spain ke jungles mein tamatar ki lambi prajati payi jati hain aur inka rang magenta white hota hain
pakne ke baad dark green brown ho jate hain
yeh bade hi tasty hote hain
jo suraj ki para baingani ultra violet sun rays se skin ki raksha karta hain
cancer se bachav ; tamatar natural tarike se cancer se ladta hain
prostate , mooh , gala , pet , colon aur bhi kai tarah ke cancer ke khatre ko kam kar deta hain
tamatar mein mauzood anti oxidants free radicals se ladte hain
blood sugar tamatar aapke blood sugar level ko control mein rakhta hain
tamatar chromium ek bahut accha source hain jo blood sugar ko control karne mein madad karta hain
baalo ke liye tamatar khane se aapke baal healthy bante hain
pregnancy mein pregnancy mein tamatar ka sewan karna bahut hi faydemand hota hain
benefits of mint tea in hindi urdu

07 baingan khane ke fayde benefits of
baingan khane ke fayde benefits of brinjal hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips baingan khane ke fayde benefits of brinjal 0 health tips a a print email baingan khane ke fayde began brinjal bengan khane ke benefits ke baare mein agar aap janana chahte hain to is post ko jaroor padhe
baingan ko aubergine aur eggplant ke naam se bhi jana jata hain
kai tarah ke health benefits ke karan baingan kai logo ki favorite sabzi hain
kuch researches mein yeh baat samne aayi hain ki baingan mein kisi dusre plant ke compare mein jyada nicotine paya jata hain
aaiye hum aapko baingan se hone wale health benefits ke baare mein batate hain
free radicals se bachata hain free radicals har tarah ke cell ko damage karne ke liye jimmevar hota hain
baingan mein bharpoor matra mein anti oxidants paye jate hain , jisse yeh free radicals se ladta hain
baingan mein paye jane wale anti oxidant mein chlorogenic acid mukhya hain jo free radicals par asar karke bimari ko rokta hain
healthy heart ke liye baingan ke niyamit sewan se cholesterol level ko kam kiya ja sakta hain
saath hi yeh blood pressure ko normal rakhne mein help karta hain
jab cholesterol level aur blood pressure normal rahta hain to isse dil ki bimari ka khatra kam ho jata hain
healthy brain yeh baingan khane ka sabse bada fayda hain
baingan mein phytonutrients paye jate hain jo cell membrains ko kisi bhi tarh ke nuksaan se bachate hain
saath hi isse brain memory power bhi badhti hain
extra iron ko hataye baingan ke niyamit sewan se extra iron kam hoga
polycythemia ke mareez ke liye yeh kafi labhkari hota hain
bacteria ko rakhe door baingan aapko bacteria se door rakhkar aapko infection aadi se bachata hain
ismein bharpoor matra mein vitamin c paya jata hain , jo ki infection se protect karne mein aapki madad karta hain
immune system ko kare majboot baingan aapke immune system ko bhi majboot karta hain
isme paye jane wale fight o nutrients aur vitamin c body ko bahut hi fayda pahuchate hain
smoking chhudaaye smoking ki aadat chhodne ke liye agar aap natural nicotine replacement therapy ke baare mein soch rahe hain to baingan iska ek behtrin option hain
aisa isliye hain kyonki baingan mein nicotine paya jata hain
healthy skin baingan mein minerals , vitamin aur fibers paye jate hain
yeh detoxification karne mein madad karta hain , jisse skin glow karne lagti hain
baingan mein paya jane wala anthocynin ek powerful anti aging agent hota hain
hair care baingan khane se sar ki skin hydrate rahegi
baingan mein paye jane wale kuch enzyme hair follicles ko courage karte hain , jisse baal badhne ke saath saath healthy bhi rahte hain
hydrate skin yeh baingan khane ka sabse bada fayda hain
saath hi baingan ke sewan se aap dry skin aur isse judi problems se nijaat pa sakti hain
how to eat eggs hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips ande ko kis tarah sekhaye taki aapko na ho koi nuksaan balki mile fayda
how to eat eggs 2 health tips a a print email jin logo ko body banani hoti hain , ve protein drinks mein kachche ande milate hain
egg safety centre ki report ke anusaar yadi aap kachchi jardi yolk khate hain , to ande ke bacteria se dushit hone ki stithi mein aapke bimar hone ka khatra badh jata hain
saath hi , bad cholesterol bhi isse nahi hota hain
saath hi bacterial salmonella ke infection ka khatra bhi kam ho jata hain
bird flu se bachav bird flu ke shikar bird se 10 dino tak iske virus nikalte rahte hain
salmonella infection se bachav dushit bhojan khane se 8 se 72 ghanto ke bheetar manushya mein salmonella infection ki wajah se dast , pet mein dard ke saath bukhaar ho jata hain
iske anya lakshan ulti , seer dard aur thand lagna bhi hain
inhe jitna jaldi ho sake to refrigerate kare
aisa karne se bacteria ka badhna kam ho jata hain
ve log jinhe high blood pressure , diabetes aur heart se related bimariya ho , unhe ande ka peela wala hissa yolk ya jardi kisi bhi halat kachcha ya pakka nahi khana chahiye
anda khane ke fayde ande ko protein , calcium aur omega 3 ka accha source mana jata hain
omega 3 se body mein accha cholesterol ka nirman hota hain
iske alawa calcium se daant aur haddiya majboot banti hain
ande mein vitamin a paya jata hain
ande mein milne wala folic acid aur vitamin b12 breast cancer se bachata hain
saath hi body ki immunity power ko bhi badhata hain
pregnant women ko apne khane mein ande ko jaroor shamil karna chahiye
ek research ke anusaar , hafte mein teen se jyada ande khane se protest cancer hone ka khatra badh jata hain
jin logo ko high blood pressure , diabetes aur heart se related bimariya ho , unhe ande ka peela wala hissa yolk ya jardi kisi bhi halat kachcha ya pakka nahi khana chahiye

05 neem ke fayde benefits of neem
neem ke fayde benefits of neem hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips neem ke fayde benefits of neem 2 health tips a a print email neem ka swaad jitna kadwa hota hain , utna hi yeh swasth ke liye faydemand hota hain
sharir ki immunity power kamjor ho jati hain aur bimariyo ke infection hone ka khatra kafi badh jata hain
yeh ldl yani bad cholesterol ko kam karne mein madad karta hain
chicken pox ke dhabbe mitaye chicken pox ke dhabbe bahut hi kharab hote hain aur yeh jaldi smapt nahi hote hain
chicken pox ke nishaan ko saaf karne ke liye neem ke ras ka massage kare
iske alawa neem ka juice skin se related diseases jaise eczema aur small pox ke hone ki sambhavna ko kam karta hain
blood mein sugar ki matra badhne se diabetes ki bimari hoti hain
madhumeh ke rogi bhi neem ka juice peekar apne blood sugar level ko normal kar sakte hain
pyria mein faydemand masoodo se khoon aane aur pyria hone par neem ke tane ki bheetari chhal ya patto ko paani mein dalkar kulla karne se fayda hota hain
muhanso ki samsya hone par neem ka ras chehre par lagaye , isse pimples ki problems door hoti hain
yeh natural tarike se skin ko glow karne mein madad karta hain

acchi neend lena chahte hain to in 5 food ko jaroor khaye
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips acchi neend lena chahte hain to in 5 food ko jaroor khaye
general knowledge , health tips a a print email kya aap bhi acchi neend lene ke liye kai tarah ke gharelu nuskhe aur upay ajmaate hain
acchi neend lene mein help karti hain , khane wali yeh 5 cheeze dahi acchi neend lene mein dairy products hamesha se hi helpful mane gye hain
is chawal mein glycemic index jyada matra mein hote hain
aise food good quantity mein amino acid ko paida karte hain , jisse achhi neend lene mein madad milti hain
kele mein potassium aur vitamin b6 hota hain jo andhere mein neend laane wale hormone melatonin ka production karta hain
cherry juice ki help se aap sleeping pattern mein sudhaar kar sakte hain
eggs khaye jyadatar dietitian ek balance diet mein eggs ko shamil karne ki advice dete hain
aisa isliye hain kyonki ande mein amino acid hota hain jo neurons ko activate kar deta hain , jisse orexins paida hote hain jisse aapki rapid eye movement sleep sudharti hain , jisse aapko neend acchi aati hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips janiye beta carotene ke baare mein
inke alawa in rang birange phal aur sabziyo mein 24 tarah ke carotenoids ya pro vitamins paye jate hain , jinhe vitamin a ke liye ahem mana jata hain
kya hain beta carotene
hamare liye jaroori carotenoids mein beta carotene bahut hi jaroori hain
jaise gajar , palak , tamatar , shakarkandi , broccoli , kaddu , kharbooza , papita , aam , matar , lal peeli shimla mirch , khubaani aadi
inme mauzood phytochemicals shaleshma paudho mein paya jane wala chemical substans ko photosynthetic jhilli mein ikkatha karke food mein gahre rang ko paida karta hain
yeh khane wali cheezo mein natural roop se mauzood fat mein ghulansheel active compound hain
beta carotene ke source aur khuraak scientists ne bhi balanced quantity mein beta carotene ke sewan ko sharir ki jaroorat ke hisaab se hi vitamin a ki supply ka safe source mana hain
scientists ne ek healthy person ko daily 3 6 milligram beta carotene ke sewan ki recommendation kiya hain , jiski supply ke liye supplements lene ki bajaye lal , narangi aur peele phal aur sabziyo ko apni diet mein shamil karna chahiye
bahut faydemand hain beta carotene beta carotene anti oxidant aur immune system booster ke roop mein kaam karta hain
researches se yeh saabit ho chuka hain ki beta carotene hamari body ko free radicals se bachata hain aur immune system ko majboot banata hain
sahi matra mein iske sewan se coronary artery disease , high blood pressure aur heart attack ke khatre ko kam kiya ja sakta hain
vitamin a ka manufacturer producer hone ki wajah se beta carotene skin ko healthy banaye rakhne mein madad karta hain
skin mein dryness , psoriasis aur vitiligo jaisi bimariyo ke ilaj mein helpful hota hain
vitamin c aur e se bharpoor khadya padartho ke saath mil kar cancer ki roktham mein ahem role ada karta hain
umar badhne ke saath aankho ko healthy banaye rakhne mein important role nibhata hain
isse carotenemia hone ki aashanka rahti hain , jisse hamari skin peeli ho jati hain
06 maggi hi nahi balki food preservatives
maggi hi nahi , balki food preservativesbhi hain ghatak
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips maggi hi nahi , balki food preservativesbhi hain ghatak
health tips a a print email maggi noodles mein hanikarak led aur mono sodium glutamate milane se ban kar diya gya hain
lekin ready to eat aur packaged food ke alawa kai anya utpado mein preservatives , sweeteners aur color milaye jate hain
potassium bromate iske sewan se cancer ka khatra rahta hain
ise bread aur bakery ke products mein milaya jata hain
potassium bromate aate ko lacheela banata hain
sodium benzoate sauce , fruits , jam aur achaar aadi mein is preservative ka upyog kiya jata hain jiska adhik istemal cancer ki aashanka ko badhata hain
trans fat vegetable oil mein hydrogen milane se usme trans fat ki adhikta badh jati hain
isse product ko lambe samay tak surakshit to rakha ja sakta hain , lekin khane wale ke sharir mein bad cholesterol ka level badh jata hain
jo aage chalkar heart disease ya heart attack ka karan ban sakta hain
refined grains refined grains jaise white bread , white rice aur white pasta dil ki bimariyo ke khatre ko badhate hain
propyl gallate meat products , vegetable oil , potato sticks , chewing gum aur ready to eat soup mein iska istemal hota hain
fructose corn syrup banavati sweetener wala high fructose corn syrup natural sweetener se sasta hain
ise wheat bread , ham burger bun , muffins , beer , soft drinks aur catch up mein milaya jata hain
iske karan over dieting hoti hain , jisse motapa badh jata hain
sodium nitrate ham burger , hot dogs aur sauces mein is preservative ka prayog kiya jata hain
isse asthma ka khatra badhta hain aur fefde ke rog hone ki ashanka bhi hone lagti hain
aspartame low calorie diet food aur sugar ke vikalp ke roop mein is artificial sweetener ka upyog hota hain
iske jyada istemal se migraine , netra dosh aur sirdard hone lagta hain
jaise packed vegetable , fast food , chips , namkeen aur soup aadi
inke adhik prayog se blood pressure badhta hain aur heart disease aur stroke ka khatra rahta hain

pet , skin aur haddiyo se judi problems ko door karne mein kali mirch bahut jyada asardar hoti hain
sahi metabolism kali mirch metabolism ko behtar banati hain
yeh skin ko bhi healthy banata hain
blood pressure control kare blood pressure ko control karne mein bhi kali mirch faydemand sabit hoti hain
ek kilo chini ki chaar taar ki chashni bana kar usme 100gram ghee , 25 gram kali mirch , 100 gram punarnava ki jad , 25 gram mulethi , 50 gram shatavari aur 50 gram triphala sabhi ka powder milaye
migraine 5 kali mirch aur 3 badam ko pees le
isse sar dard aur migraine ki samsya mein fayda hota hain

aaiye jante hain khoon badhane ke tips , anemia se bachne ke gharelu nuskhe aur tips , blood increasing tips in hindi

general knowledge , health tips a a print email coconut water ki popularity day by day increase ho rahi hain , aapko jankar accha lagega ki desh bhar ke food stores mein iski demand badh rahi hain
fresh , green coconut se paani milta hain
aaiye jante hain coconut water ke kuch side effects ke bare mein
allergy ke mareezo ke liye yeh accha nahi hain hum se kai logo ko allergy ki problem hoti hain
kyonki simple water mein sodium ki matra nariyal paani ke mukable kanhi zyada hoti hain aur sodium rehydration mein madadgar hota hain
electrolytes ka unbalance hona coconut water mein bahut quantity mein potassium paya jata hain jo ise kamaal ka drink banaata hain
ek research mein yeh paya gya ki ek aadmi ne apna pura din 90 degree fahrenheittemperature mein tennis khelte huye bitaya
usne 88ounce nariyal paani piya jis wajah se usay hyperkalemiaki problem ka saamna karna padaaur aage chal kar yeh ek serious matter ban gya
calorie badhaye halanki nariyal paani mein unta sugar calorie nahi hoti hain jitna ki dusre sports drinks ya fruits juice mein payi jati hain , lekin phir bhi isme kafi matra mein calories payi jati hain
ounce coconut water mein 60 calories payi jati hain

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips sahi time par periods aane ke liye khayiye yeh cheeze
health tips a a print email kai saari mahilaon mein periods sahi samay par na hona bilkul aam si baat ho chuki hain
badalti lifestyle , pollution , smoking , drinking , jyada exercise aur khan paan mein badlaav ki wajah se mahilaon mein periods mein deri ho jati hain
kai mahilaon ki shikayat rahti hain ki unhe samay par periods na hone ki wajah se sirf 2 3 hi din periods hote hain
aise mein is problem se aaram paane ke liye kai aise food hain jinhe khane se aapko time par periods hone lagenge
protein , omega 3 fatty acid aur vitamin se bharpoor diet ko khane se is samsya se nijat mila jata hain
samay par period aane ke liye khaye yeh hari pattedar sabziya ; palak , broccoli , baingan ko apni diet mein shamil kare , yeh healthy hote hain aur samay par periods ko laate hain
salmon fish isme calcium aur vitamin bharpoor matra mein hota hain
anda uble huye eggs mein protein , calcium aur vitamin acchi matra mein paya jata hain
protein se bhare ande ko khane se periods sahi samay par aate hain
broccoli apni diet mein broccoli ko jaroor shamil kare
kyonki ise khane se periods sahi samay par hote hain
fish ya fish oil isme omega 3 fatty acid hota hain jo ovary ki khoon ki naso ko damage hone se bachata hain kyonki isse periods mein deri hoti hain
dahi dairy products calcium aur protein mein rich hote hain , to khud ko thanda rakhne ke liye aur periods ko sahi samay par laane ke liye ise roj khayiye
tofu ab paneer nahi balki soya milk se bana tofu khana shuru kar dijiye , kyonki yeh calcium se bhara rahta hain , jisko khane se periods time se hota hain
04 hindi mein offline kaise typing kare ya
hindi mein offline kaise typing kare ya likhe
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home tech tips hindi mein offline kaise typing kare ya likhe
online toh kai saari website hain jaha par jakar aap hindi mein likh sakte hain , in sabhi website par aap simple roman hindi likhte hain aur veh ise mein convert kar deti hain
hindi mein offline google input tools install
computer laptop , , hindi ke alawa aap aur bhi kai langues ke tools ko bhi install kar sakte hain , jaise urdu , punjabi , oriya , bengali , marathi , telugu , gujarati , punjabi , kannada , tamil aadi language ko bhi aap asaani se offline likh ya typing kar sakte hain
aap google input tools ke website par jaye website ka link yeh hain https www
com inputtools windows yaha par jakar aap apne language tool ko select kare , aur download karke install kare
aap chahe to is page par installation instruction ko bhi follow kar sakte hain
