jeera aur gud dono hi hamare khane ka important cheeze rahi hain
jeere aur gud ka paani banane ki vidhi kaise banaye jeera aur gud ka paani , recipe of cumin and jaggery water in hindi urdu
periods ko regular kare isko peene se ladies ki body mein hormones unbalance ko sahi kiya ja sakta hain
jis wajah se yeh period ki problems ko door karta hain
anemia se bachaye jeera aur gud dono hi poshak tatvo se bharpoor hote hain , inme minerals bharpoor matra mein hote hain , jo red blood cells ko healthy rakhne ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
pet ki takhleefe door kare jeere aur gud ka mixture acid ke asar ko bey asar kar deta hain , jiski wajah se pet mein gas banna , pet phoolna aur acidity door hoti hain
body ka temperature kam kare yeh natural drink sharir ke temperature ko kam karta hain aur body ke temperature ko normal banata hain
immune system majboot banaye jeera aur gud natural guno se bhare huye hote hain , jo sharir ki gandagi ko saaf karte hain aur hamare body ke immune system ko majboot banate hain
body ko detox kare ; jeere aur gud ka yeh mixture natural body detox ki tarah kaam karta hain yani ki sharir se zehreele tatvo ko bahar nikaal deta hain aur aapke sharir ki androoni safai karta hain

05 diabetes control karne ke kuch aadiwasi
diabetes control karne ke kuch aadiwasi nuskhe
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips diabetes control karne ke kuch aadiwasi nuskhe
health tips a a print email diabetes ke rogiyo ki sankhya puri duniya mein tezi ke saath badh rahi hain
crore log diabetes ke shikar hain
diabetes rog mein carbohydrate aur glucose ka oxikaran puri tarah se nahi ho pata hain
saath hi hamesha sharirik roop se active rahe
yeh ek aisi samsya hain jis par control sharir ko chust drust aur active bana kar hi kiya ja sakta hain
gujarat ke dang district ke aadiwasi bael aur sitaphal patto ka churan ko saman matra mein milakar 1 chammach matra mein diabetes ke mareezo ko dete hain
chui mui ki 100 gram pattiyo ko 300ml paani mein ubalkar kadha bana le
yeh kadha peene se diabetes mein bahut jyada rahat milti hain
giloy churan ko 15 gram matra mein ghee milakar sewan kare
yeh nuskha diabetes ke control ke liye bahut hi kargar hain
subah jaldi uthkar exercise , yoga ke alawa walk , cycling , swimming jaise kaam bahut hi faydemand hote hain
minutes baad is paani ko piye
rojana 2 baar subah shaam aisa karne se tezi se diabetes par control kiya ja sakta hain
yeh diabetes mein faydemand hota hain
inhe chabane se diabetes control mein rahti hain
modern science bhi farasbeen ki faliyo ko diabetes control karne ke liye upyogi manta hain

health tips a a print email anda khane se aapko kya kya labh milte hain , agar aap iske baare mein janana chahte hain , toh is post ko jaroor padhe
eggs khane isliye jaroori hain kyonki ek ande mein 6 gram high quality wala protein aur sharir ke liye jaroori 9 amino acid paye jate hain
sulfur samet dusre minerals aur vitamin hone ke chalte anda baalo aur nakhoono ke liye accha hota hain
rojana ek ande ko apni diet mein shamil karne se carotenoids ki supply hoti hain , jisse aankho ke cells ko damage hone se bachaya ja sakta hain
breast cancer ki roktham ke liye bhi anda behad madadgar hota hain
anda protein ka ek accha source hain , isme albumin protein bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain
anda poshak tatvo se bharpoor hota hain , isme vitamin a , d , b12 aur riboflavin , phosphorus aur folate paya jata hain
anda aapke susti ko door karke aapko energetic bana deta hain
yeh ek behatrin energy boostar hain
daily subah ke breakfast mein ande ko shamil kare aap pura din energetic mahsoos kar sakte hain
ande ke yellow part mein mauzood healthy fats hote hain , jo body ko energy dene mein help karte hain
ek research ke anusaar anda , raktvahiniyo mein khoon ka thakka jamne , heart attack aur stroke ke khatre ko kam karne mein madadgar hain
iske alawa yeh kaolin ka accha source hain jo brain nerves aur heart arteries ki activity ko suchaaroo roop se chalane mein madad karta hain

health tips a a print email vitamin a do forms mein paya jata hain retinol aur carotene
yeh vitamin body ke kai parts jaise skin , baal , nakhoon , daant , masooda aur haddi ko normal banaye rakhne mein madad karta hain
vitamin a ke upyog acchi sehat ke liye yeh sabse mahtavpurn vitamin hain
yeh bhroon ki normal growth aur development ke liye bahut hi accha mana jata hain
vitamin a ki kami ke lakshan kaan mein phoda hona , sukhe baal , sukhi tavcha , chronic diarrhea , sardi jukham , thakaan , neend na aana , night blindness , pneumonia , prajanan mein kathinaai , sinus , kamjor daant , wajan mein kami
vitamin a ke source yeh chukander , saag , brokali , sabut anaaz , paneer , giridar phal , butter , gajar , mirch , dairy products , hari pattedar sabziya , anda , beans , rajma , meat , aam , sarso , papita , dhaniya , cheeku , matar , kaddu , lal mirch , sea food , saljam , tamatar , shakarkand , makai ke daane bhutta , peela ya orange colour ke fruits , cod liver oil mein bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email healthy rahne ke liye roj subah kala namak aur paani mila kar peena shuru kar dijiye
kaale namak mein 80 tak minerals aur natural tatv paye jate hain
is glass ko plastic ke dhakkan se dhak de
skin ko gora kare isme mauzood minerals jaise sulfur , zinc , iodine aur chromium aapki skin ko gahraai se saaf karte hain , jisse aapka rang gora hone ke saath saath aapki skin se related problems door hoti hain
body ko detox karta hain namak mein kafi minerals hone ki wajah se yeh anti bacterial ka kaam karta hain
iski wajah se body mein mauzood khatarnaak bacteria ka khatma hota hain
lar pet ke ander natural salt , hydrochloride acid aur protein ko hajam karne wale enzymes ko thrilled karne mein madad karta hain
wajan kam kare yeh hajme ko durust karke body ke cells tak nutrients ko pahuchaata hain , jisse motapa control karne mein help milti hain
namak wala paani peene se khoye huye minerals ki purti hoti hain
skin problems namak mein mauzood chromium acne pimples se ladta hain
isme mauzood sulfur skin ko soft aur clean banata hain
iske alawa namak wala paani peene se eczema ki problem door hoti hain
yeh 2 khatarnaak hormone cortisol aur adrenaline ko kam karne mein madad karta hain , jisse aapko raat mein acchi neend aati hain
05 intex ka cloud n smartphone keemat sirf
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home intex smartphone intex ka cloud n smartphone , keemat sirf 4 , 199 rupaye
intex , smartphone a a print email ab jab yu aur xiaomi jaisi companies kafi dhoom dhaam ke saath apni devices launch kar rahi hain
os aur ram par ek nazar jaisa ki intex ki website par bataya gya hain ki cloud n par aapko 4 inch ka display 480 x 800 pixel resolution ke saath milega
version kikat operating system par run karta hain
ghz ka quad core processor diya gya hain , ismein 1 gb ki ram bhi hain
storage capacity ki baat ki jaye to ismein 8gb ke internal memory hain , jise micro sd ki madad se 64 gb tak badhaya ja sakta hain
camera hain aisa photo click karne liye yeh phone aapko 8 megapixel ka auto focus rear camera de raha hain
iska front camera 2 mega pixel ka hain
iska dimension 124x64
intex cloud n aapki pasand ke anusaar kai rango mein available hain
grey , white aur black kisi bhi color ko aap chun sakte hain
connectivity mein aapko milega yeh anya android smartphones ki tarah intex cloud n mein bhi aapko mil raha hain wi fi , 3g , wi fi hot spot , micro usb port , dual sim , bluetooth aur gps ke saath navigation ke liye agps ki suvidha

health tips a a print email aaj kal ki bhaag daur bhari life mein tension , chinta , social problems aur financial problems ki wajah se log depression ka shikar hote ja rahe hain
depression hone par kya khana chahiye
green tea green tea mein anti oxidants aur amino acid paya jata hain , jo depression se bachata hain
omega 3 fatty acid agar aapko depression feel ho rahi ho toh turant apne khane mein omega 3 fatty acid ki matra ko badha de
omega 3 fatty acid machhli , akhrot aadi mein bahut hi acchi matra mein paya jata hain
inme carbohydrate hota hain jo mood swings ki preshani ko rokta hain
nariyal nariyal mein fiber 36 , iron 13 dv , potassium 10 , protein 6 dv , vitamin c 5 hota hain
isme powerful electrolytes hote hain jo depression se ladne mein madad karte hain
blueberry blueberry mein vitamin c paya jata hain
gram blueberry mein
milligram vitamin c hota hain jo roj ke 15 ke barabar hain
isme paya jane wala anti oxidants sharir ko depression se door rakhta hain
badam badam magnesium ka bahut accha source hain jo depression se ladne mein help karta hain
gram badam mein 238 milligram magnesium hota hain , jo roj ki 67 magnesium ki supply karta hain
isme lycopene naam ka tatv hota hain jo depression se ladne mein kargar mana gya hain

06 smartphone radiation se bachane ke kuch
smartphone radiation se bachane ke kuch tips
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge smartphone tech tips smartphone radiation se bachane ke kuch tips
general knowledge , smartphone , tech tips a a print email smartphone ka upyog itna badhta ja raha hain ki log jyada se jyada samay smartphone apne haath mein rakhte hain
lekin iske dusre pahlu par nazar dale to smartphone se health par bura asar padta hain
ji haa hum baat kar rahe hain smartphone radiation mobile radiation ki jiski wajah se kai saari bimariya ho sakti hain
use speakers or headset smartphone radiation ka sabse jyada khatra phone par baat karne ke dauran hota hain
iske liye aap speaker ya headset ka istemal kar sakte hain , yeh aapke liye jyada safe rahega
lekin call disconnect hote hi ise kaan se hata dena chahiye
hold the phone away from your body smartphone ko jitna ho sake apni body se door rakhe
don't keep your phone under pillow or pocket sabse pahle yeh jaan le ki , phone agar use nahi kiya ja raha ho to usse radiation ka khatra kam nahi hota hain
smartphone network mein lagatar signals travel karte rahte hain , jab tak vah switch off nahi ho jata hain
is stithi mein radiation lagatar nikalta rahta hain
halaki isse bachne ke liye ' airplane mode ' best option hain
yani ki is condition mein handset se sabhi wireless transmission cut ho jate hain , jisse radiation aana rook jata hain
text more and talk less jab kisi device mein voice communication hota hain to radiation jyada nikalta hain
halaki aajkal to kai aise messenger app aa gye hain , jo users ko kafi aaraam de sakte hain
make a call when signal is strong hamesha dhyaan rakhna chahiye jab phone signal weak ho , to call karne se bache
yani ki mobile signal strong hone par call karna sahi tarika mana jata hain
ek research ke mutabik , weak signal ke duaran jab koi call ki jati hain to yeh high range ke broadcast ko search karta hain taki aapki call connect ho sake

09 whatsapp ke kuch tricks tricks of
whatsapp ke kuch tricks tricks of whatsapp in hindi hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home tech tips whatsapp ke kuch tricks tricks of whatsapp in hindi 2 tech tips a a print email kya aap whatsapp ke yeh trick jante hain
agar nahi to janiye yeh whatsapp trick
whatsapp download karte hi verification message aane se pahle hi apna phone flight mode par kar dijiye
aise mein whatsapp dusra option dega
isme verify through message ka option choose kijiye aur apni e mail id daliye
send par click kar dijiye aur sending message ko bhi cancel kar dijiye
pdf aur heavy file share karne ke liye agar aap chahte hain ki whatsapp ke jariye hi pdf aur heavy files ko share kar sake to iske liye aapko whats tools download karna hoga
whatsapp online history naam ka app download kijiye aur kamaal dekhiye
whatsapp message schedule agar aap whatsapp ke ke messages schedule karna chahte hain , to message scheduler for whatsapp download kijiye aur kamaal dekhiye
settings account change number on your whatsapp par jayiye
aur apna naya aur purana number feed kar dijiye
iske baad done par click kijiye
whatsapp last seen na badle ; agar aap chahte hain ki aapke whatsapp ka last seen na badle aur aap kisi ka message bhi padh le , to asaan tarika hain
aapka message to chala jayega lekin aapka last seen nahi badlega
agar usne aapko block kiya hoga to yeh nahi ho payega aur aapko yeh message dikhaayi dega not authorised to add this contact
sd card whatsapp data bases
yaha par aapko ' msgstore 2014 01
crypt naam ki kuch files milegi
dusri file ko backup msgstore
crypt naam se rename kijiye
crypt kar dijiye
iske baad , settings applications manage applications whatapp par jayiye
yaha clear data ke option par click kijiye
aapko upar delete button se pahle ek naya symbol dikhaai dega
yeh info button hota hain

07 smartphone se jude bharm aur satya
smartphone se jude bharm aur satya myths facts about smartphone hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home smartphone tech tips smartphone se jude bharm aur satya myths facts about smartphone 0 smartphone , tech tips a a print email labtop ho ya computer , har technique ke baare mein log kuch myths ko manane lagte hain
aisa hi smartphones ke saath bhi hain
jyada megapixel matlab accha photo phone ke camera ki photo quality ko log aksar megapixel se mante hain
jyada megapixel se sirf photo ko bada print nikalane mein madad milti hain
lekin acchi pictures lena chahte hain to iske liye censor aur aperture size megapixel se jyada mayne rakhta hain
magnet touch hone se delete ho jata hain data smartphone mein use hone wali flash storage solid state drive type hoti hain
isliye is par magnet ka koi asar nahi hota hain
brightness , live wallpaper se battery kill hoti hain phone mein live wallpaper lagane , bluetooth on rakhne aur automatic brightness se battery par bahut jyada asar nahi padta hain
is wajah se jaldi khatm hoti hain battery phone ki battery jaldi khatm hoti hain , agar kuch apps sahi tarike se start nahi hote hain
ya phir background processing sahi nahi hain
matlab phone mein functioning jitni jyada hogi battery utni jyada kharch hogi
battery ki size aur capacity ka is par bahut jyada asar nahi padta hain
lekin aisa nahi hain , battery ki performance processor aur apps par depend karti hain
jaise quad code quallcom ke mukable octa core processor ke saath battery ki performance jyada behtar hoti hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips garmiyo mein jaroor khaye yeh phal
health tips a a print email garmiyo mein hame ghumna aur masti karna bahut accha lagta hain
isme jaroori minerals jaise ki potassium , iron , sodium , magnesium , copper , phosphorus , chlorine ke alawa protein , fat aur carbose bhi sahi quantity mein hote hain
iske alawa isme vitamin a , selenium aur zinc bhi hota hain
nimbu kefayde gungune paani mein nimbu aur shahadmila kar peene se hote hain yeh gajab ke fayde litchi isme carbohydrates , vitamin c , vitamin a aur b complex , potassium , calcium , magnesium , phosphorus , iron jaise minerals paye jate hain
lichi mein mauzood potassium aur copper dil ko bimariyo se bachate hain
yeh heart beat rate ki aniyamitta ya unbalance aur bp ko control karte hain , jisse heart attack ka jokhim kam ho jata hain
litchi mein suraj ki ultra violet rays se hamari skin aur body ko bachane ki khasiyat hoti hain
litchi ke niyamit sewan se oily skin ko poshan milta hain
litchi khane ke fayde
aadoo anti oxidants ka khazana hain , jo budhaape ke process se ladne mein madad karta hain
aadoo skin ko healthy banane mein madad karta hain
aadoo mein mauzood vitamin a aur c tavcha ko nikhaarta hain
ananas ananas mein bharpoor matra mein magnesium paya jata hain
yeh bones ko majboot banane aur body ko energy dene ka kaam karta hain
yeh high anti oxidants ka good source hain aur isme vitamin c bhi kafi acchi matra mein hota hain
isse body ki immunity badhti hain aur yeh garmi mein fresh karne wala phal hain
yeh anti oxidants aur vitamin c ka bhi accha source mana gya hain
isme vitamin a paya jata hain jo skin ko healthy rakhne mein madad karta hain
seb seb mein anti oxidants bharpoor matra mein hote hain
isme paya jane wala polyphenols aur flavonoids dil ke liye bahut hi faydemand hain
iske alawa yeh sharir ke liye jaroori minerals aur potassium ka bhi behatarin source hain
seb mein 4 gram fiber aur 95 calorie hoti hain

bhaari wajan uthaane ki koshish na kare pregnancy ke waqt kabhi bhi bhaari samaan ko nahi uthana chahiye

lekin is baat ka dhyaan rahe ki acupressure points par halki massage kare
posture par dhyaan de pregnancy ke time is baat ka dhyaan dena bahut hi jaroori hain ki jab aap kanhi bhi baithe aapka posture theek ho

baccho ko jaroor khilaye yeh 7 super food
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips baccho ko jaroor khilaye yeh 7 super food
general knowledge , health tips a a print email bacche ko sahi poshan dena bahut hi jaroori hain , kyonki agar bacche ko sahitarah se poshan nahi milega toh vah puri life health se related problems ka samna karta rahta hain
in food ko super food ke naam se bhi jana jata hain
fish macchali khana sabhi ke liye accha hota hain , chahe vah budha ho jawan , pregnant woman ke liye bhi fish khana accha hota hain
isme antioxidants , zinc aur iodine acchi quantity mein hota hain
isme sabse important omega 3 fatty acid paya jata hain , jo dimaag ke vikas ke liye sabse jaroori tatv hain
aap apne bacche ko fish ke pakaude , fish finger ya chips khila sakte hain
brinjal mein kafi matra mein vitamin b6 paya jata hain
daily kewal 75 gram baingan ka sewan karne se sharir ki dinbhar ke liye jaroori vitamin b6 ki supply hogi
isme energy dene wala dher saara carbohydrate hota hain , lekin isse wazan nahi badhta hain
magnesium , iron aur calcium ke saath saath isme vitamin a aur c bhi hota hain
broccoli bacche broccoli ko khana bilkul bhi like nahi karte hain , lekin broccoli se vitamin k milta hain jo baccho ke liye bahut hi jaroori vitamin hain
isme bharpoor matra mein fiber aur vitamin a aur c bhi hota hain
iske alawa broccoli ka istemal aap dusri sabziyo ke mila kar bhi kar sakte hain
lekin palak ek super food hain
isme dher saara vitamin a , c ke alawa folic acid , fiber , magnesium aur kai jaroori nutrients paye jate hain
yeh cancer ko rokne mein helpful hota hain
shimla mirch capsicum green , yellow aur red colour mein paya jata hain
yeh rang birangi sabzi vitamin c se bharpoor hoti hain
isme antioxidant kafi acchi matra mein hota hain
yeh bacteria ke attack se aapke bacche ki raksha karta hain
shimla mirch body ke cholesterol level ko bhi control karta hain , saath hi body ka metabolism rate bhi increase karta hain
ise noodles aur pasta mein jaroor daaliye
sprouts ankoorit chana , moong ya soyabean kitna paustik hota hain , yeh aapko batane ki jarooratnahi hain
sprouts mein fiber ki quantity kafi acchi hoti hain , jis wajah se digestion mein madad karta hain
sprouts khane se tension bhi door hoti hain
yeh body ke cholesterol level ko bhi control mein rakhta hain
07 fava beans khane ke fayde benefits of
fava beans khane ke fayde benefits of braod beans hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips fava beans khane ke fayde benefits of braod beans 0 health tips a a print email fava beans jaisa ki naam se pata chalta hain , hare rang ki phaliyan hoti hain , jo apne kavach ke ander rahti hain
ise aam bol chal ki bhasa mein faba beans , fava beans , sem ki phalli , sem , same , broad beans aadi kaha jata hain , ise khane se bahut hi labh milta hain
phoshak tatvo se bharpoor fava beans sem mein protein aur ghulansheel fiber bharpoor matra mein hote hain
saath hi isme fat bahut hi kam hota hain aur isme vitamins aur minerals bahut hi acchi matra mein paye jate hain
sem , fava beans ki phali sabzi khane ke fayde labh , benefits
iske alawa sem mein ghulansheel fiber hote hain
ghulansheel fiber yukt aahaar aapke sharir mein blood sugar level aur saath hi cholesterol level ko control karte hain
4 cup mein 10 gram protein paya jata hain
saath hi isme copper aur iron paye jate hain jo blood ke red cells ko banane mein madad karte hain
isme phosphorus aur magnesium paye jate hain , jo ki haddiyo ki majbooti ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
magnesium ke saath hi isme potassium paya jata hain jo blood pressure ke level ko control karta hain
aisa isliye hain kyonki isme amino acid jise l dopa dopamine kaha jata hain , bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain
sharir ko red blood cells ke nirman ke liye iron ki sahi matra ki jaroorat padti hain
calcium ka accha source calcium haddiyo aur daanto dono ke vikas ke liye bahut hi jaroori hota hain
immune system majboot banaye vitamin c asal mein ek anti oxidant hota hain jo cancer paida karne wale free radicals aur immune system ki kamiyo ko door karta hain
sem mein vitamin c ki acchi khasi matra payi jati hain
potassium mein electrolytes hote hain jo aapke sharir mein paani aur acid ke level ko balance karte hain
oxygen lene mein sahayak iron hemoglobin ka ek mahatvpooran component agent hain
hemoglobin fefdo aur anya koshikaon mein oxygen pahuchane ke liye jimmevar hota hain
keywords , , , sem khane ke fayde in hindi , benefits of sem , fava beans , abroad beans in hindi , sem ki phali phalli khane ke fayde

htc , smartphone a a print email taiwan ki smartphone maker company htc ne apne high budget phone htc one m9 plus smartphone ki bikri india mein shuru kar di hain
inch ki hain display htc company ne apne is naye smartphone one m9 mein android ka latest operating system diya hain
ismein aapko android
inch ki screen milegi
5ghz ka octa core processor milega
one m9 mein aapko 3 gb ki ram milegi
vahi agar iski storage capcity ki baat ki jaye to isme aapko 32gb ki internal memory aur 128 gb tak micro sd card ki suvidha milegi
megapixel ka rear camera htc company ne apne is naye handset htc one m9 plus ko kafi stylish banaya hain
iska behtrin look users ko attract kar sakta hain
vahi ismein 20 megapixel ka rear camera diya gya hain , jismein led flash hoga
jabki front camera 4 megapixel ka hain
agar connectivity ki baat kare to one m9 mein aapko 3g , bluetooth , wi fi aur gps aadi ki suvidha milegi
color variants ki baat kare to , isme aapko gunmetal gray , silver gold aur amber gold available honge

ghz ka quad core processor diya gya hain
yeh phone androide ke
phone ki internal memory 8 gb hain , jise micro sd card ki madad se 32 gb tak badhaya ja sakta hain

saath hi front camer
megapixel ka hain
connectivity ke liye isme wi fi , bluetooth
, 4g , jaise option diye gye hain
halaki is phone ka back up kitna hoga , company ne iski jankari abhi nahi di hain
bharat mein rs
ke price ke under aane wale 4g smartphone hain yu yureka price rs

jante hain kuch aise hi healthy snacks ke baare mein
gram protein ki matra prapt ki ja sakti hain
isse dimaag active rahta hain
ise khane se protein milta hain
ise banane ke kai saare options hain
healthy snacks lekar bahut jyada khane se bhi bacha ja sakta hain
soyabean protein ka bharpoor khazana soybean lambe samay tak healthy rakhta hain
sirf aadha cup soyabean khane se 15 gram protein milta hain
health aur taste ke behtarin combination hain soyabean
kefir doodh se banane wali kefir ko bhi snacks ke roop mein khana bahut hi faydemand hota hain
is snacks ki sabse acchi baat yeh hain ki doodh se bane hone ke baad bhi isme fat bahut kam matra mein hoti hain
yeh 99 lactose free hota hain
saath hi asaani se digest bhi ho jata hain

alsi ke beej asaani se milne wale alsi ke beej bhi protein ka bahut accha source hain
inhe snacks ke taur par khana har tarike se faydemand hota hain
ise smoothie aur dahi mein mila kar khaya ja sakta hain

09 dimaag ko tez karne wale liquid aur
dimaag ko tez karne wale liquid aur juice
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips dimaag ko tez karne wale liquid aur juice
health tips a a print email dimaag ko tez karne wale liquid aur juice increase brain power with liquids juices , kya aap jante hain inke baare mein
kitna accha hota agar aap super market mein ghoomte ghoomte dimaag tez kare , strong bane , jawan dikhe , wajan kam kare , aur mood badle jaise labels wale juices aur liquids ko paa sakte hain
is article mein hum kuch aise liquids aur juices ke baare mein bata rahe hain jo hakikat mein dimaag ko tez banate hain
in juices se aapke brain ki sharpness badhegi
yeh kisi special company dwara banay gya koi special juice nahi hain , balki aap apne gharelu cheezo aur aam juice ki dukaano par milne wale niche bataye gye juice ya liquid ka pryog karke apne dimaag ko tez bana sakte hain
banaavati sweetener aur color se bhare juice brain ke liye hanikarak hain
researches ne yeh padarth mutagenic aur cancer paida karne wale products ke roop mein ghoshit kiya hain
dark chocolate cocoa cocoa mein mauzood flavonoids blood vessels ko shant karke blood pressure ko control karte hain , jisse yeh samay ke saath saath dimaag mein hone wale negative asar ko bhi kam karte hain
rojana ek cup hot chocolate ka sewan stroke ke khatre ko kam karti hain aur aapke dimaag ko tez banane mein help karta hain
dalchini aur haldi wali chaaye ; dalchini mein proantosianidin aur cinnamaldehyde naam ke 2 compounds hote hain , yeh dimaag mein tau protein ko badhne se rokte hain , jise pagal pan mein plaques ke production ka karan mana jata hain
anar ka juice is anokhe phal mein aapki yaddasht aur feelings ko sudharne wale anuthe anti oxidants hote hain
red wine researches se yeh pata chala hain ki red wine aur chocolate mein mauzood polyphenol dimaag mein blood ke flow ko badhata hain isliye dono ka sewan kare aur yeh dimaagi shakti ko badhata hain
wine mein mauzood resveratrol mentally health ko banaye rakhta hain , lekin yaad rahe red wine ka upyog aap ek limit mein rah kar kare
normal sharab ka sewan researches se yeh pata chala hain ki vodka , beer ya wine jaise drinks brain ke cortical functions ko badha dete hain , jisse aapki creativity mein sudhaar hota hain , lekin aapka b
nariyal paani aur iska doodh peene se alzheimer bhoolne ki bimari ko pahle hi step mein roka ja sakta hain
re hydration ke alawa , isme mauzood electrolytes , vitamin aur minerals dimaag mein khoon ke bahaav ko sudhaarte hain
chukandar , gajar aur seb ka juice chukandar ka sewan dimaag mein nitric oxide ke production ko badhata hain , jo ki blood flow ko sudharta hain
tea apne taste ke anusaar black tea ya green tea ko aap piye
chaaye mein bharpoor matra mein anti oxidants hote hain aur har roj black tea ko peene se reaction time mein sudhaar nazar aane lagta hain

toh healthy gums aur teeth ke liye tea peena shuru kar dijiye
iske saath hi aapko rojana 30 minutes ki walk lena bhi jaroori hain
umar ghataye chaay mein anti oxidants shamil hote hain
research mein yeh paya gya ki chai peene walo ki haddiya umar , jyada wajan , exercise , smoking aur anya risk factors ke bawjood bhi majboot hain
paani ki kami puri kare ; chai dehydrate rahne mein help karti hain

agar aap santoshjanak , calorie free drink peena chahte hain toh chai usme se ek hain

cancer se bachaye chai cancer se hame bachaati hain , kyonki isme polyphenols aur anti oxidants mila hota hain
jo cancer se ladne mein bahut madad karte hain

09 chironji ke fayde benefits of chironji
chironji ke fayde benefits of chironji seeds hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips chironji ke fayde benefits of chironji seeds 0 health tips a a print email chironji ke fayde kya hain
protein se bharpoor chironjgi ke seeds mein calorie bahut hi kam payi jati hain
isme fiber ke saath hi vitamin a , b1 aur niacin aadi mein mauzood hote hain
isme calcium , iron aur phosphorus jaise minerals bhi acchi tadad mein paye jate hain

aayiye jante hain chironji se sehat ko kya benefits hote hain aur iske gharelu nuskhe kya hain
immunity ko badhane ke liye chironji ke phal se lekar iske beej mein mauzood kai saare minerals sharir ki immunity ko strong banate hain
isse bani cheezo ko khane se immunity ke saath saath body bhi strong hoti hain
ek cup doodh mein is powder ko mila kar ubaal le

05 nimbu ke fayde aur upyog benefits of
nimbu ke fayde aur upyog benefits of lemon hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips nimbu ke fayde aur upyog benefits of lemon 0 health tips a a print email nimbu ke aushadhiy gun to jag jahir hain
fruits salad banate waqt bhi nimbu ka ras daal sakte hain
vahi salad patte ko zara sa crispy banane ke liye ek bowl mein thanda paani aur dedh nimbu ka ras dalkar salad patte daal de
ise freeze mein rakhe aur 1 ghante ke baad nikaale
marination ke liye meat marination karte waqt thoda sa nimbu ras milaye
to agli baar se coldrinks , paani mein nimbu milana na bhule
chand minto mein saare daag dhabbe door ho jayenge
immune system ko theek rakhta hain
nimbu pani sharir ke immune system ke liye faydemand hota hain
yeh acidity aur gastric problems mein pet ko bahut aaraam dilaata hain
saath hi , pet ko tamam infection se bhi bachata hain
nimbu mein vitamin c aur ascorbic acid hota hain , jisse pet theek rahta hain
ismein tamam anti inflammatory tatv hote hain , jo pet mein maujood bacteria se ladte hain aur sardiyo mein khansi jukam se bachate hain
digestion mein madad karta hain
nimbu mein aise tatv hote hain , jisse digestive system ke toxins khatm ho jate hain
skin ko clear karta hain nimbu vitamin c se bharpoor hota hain , aur isme kai anti oxidants hote hain
yeh skin ko clear , healthy aur glowing banata hain
isse chehre ke daag dhabbe aur wrinkles kam hote hain
iske saath hi nimbu anti aging spots aur scars ko bhi halka karta hain
yeh sab nimbu mein paye jane wale citric ke karan hota hain
vahi jin logo ko urine se judi problems hoti hain , unke liye nimbu faydemand hota hain
energy badhata hain dhero vitamins aur minerals hone ke karan se nimbu paani sharir ko energy boost karta hain
kyonki citrus wale sabhi fruit body aur mind ki energy level ko boost karte hain
isliye agar aap low energy ya stress mahsoos kare to nimbu paani piye
itna hi nahi , nimbu ki khusboo bhi sharir ke nervous system mein positive influence dalti hain
jisse puri body fresh feel karti hain
isse sharir ko metabolism badhta hain
yeh caffin se door karta hain
nimbu mein bharpoor matra mein ascorbic acid hota hain
iske saath hi ascorbic acid haddiyo , cartilage aur tissues ke liye achcha hota hain
saanso ki badboo ko door karta hain nimbu moonh ke bacteria ko maarta hain
isme mauzood citric acid daanto ke liye bahut hi faydemand hain
brush karne ke baad 1 glass nimbu ka ras peene se daanto ki chamak aur tazagi bani rahti hain
shahad aur nimbu mein anti bacterial tatv hote hain , jo germs aur becteria ko saaf karte hain

health tips a a print email methi ka saag khane ke fayde benefits of fenugreek leaves in hindi , methi ke patte ke fayde aur labh aur methi ke gharelu upay aur nuskhe aadi janne ke liye yeh post jaroor padhe
lekin pregnancy mein ise khana khatarnaak ho sakta hain
digestion banaye strong methi ke beej ya patte fiber aur anti oxidants se bharpoor hote hain , jise khane se sharir ke ander ki gandagi ko asaani se bahar nikaala ja sakta hain
kyonki iska fiber tatv body ko detox karta hain
jisse colon cancer hone ki sambhavna kam hoti hain
heart problem rakhe door methi mein mauzood galactomannan , heart ko healthy rakhne ka kaam karta hain
saath hi fenugreek leaves mein potassium bhi acchi khasi matra mein mauzood rahta hain , jo heart rate aur blood pressure ko control karti hain , jisse high aur low bp ki shikayat nahi hoti hain
inka anti diabetic tatv body mein glucose level ko badhne nahi deta hain
isliye methi ki bhaaji ko jaroor khaye yeh type 2 diabetes ke mareezo ke liye faydemand hota hain
gas ki samsya door kare methi ke patte liver ke functions ko sahi rakhne ke saath dyspepsia ki problem se bhi chhutkara dilaate hain
itna hi nahi methi ke patte diarrhea aur dysentery ka behatarin ilaj bhi hain
skin ke liye faydemand vitamin c bahut hi accha anti oxidant hota hain , iske saath hi iska anti inflammatory gun kai tarah ke skin problems se nipatne mein kargar hota hain
cholesterol level balance kare methi ke patte blood vessels mein hone wale congestion ko bhi door karte hain
yeh ldl , triglyceride aur hdl in sabhi ko balance karta hain
pimples aur moohase kare door methi ko facepack mein istemal karke chehre par hone wale pimples moohase , wrinkles aur black heads se bachaya ja sakta hain
methi khane ka nuksaan bhi hain miscarriage aur premature birth ka khatra methi ka istemal pregnancy ke dauran hone wale labor pain se rahat dilata hain
isliye pregnancy mein methi ka bahut jyada istemal karne se bachna chahiye

benefits loss of green banana 3 health tips a a print email kachcha kela dikhne mein jitna accha hota hain , utna khane mein bhi
jyadatar iska sewan sabzi aur snacks ke liye kiya jata hain
ismein mauzood bahut saare vitamins , minerals , fibers blood sugar control karne ke saath hi cholesterol aur wajan ko kam karne mein madadgar hote hain
kachcha kela ke fayde benefits of raw banana starch ka good source hain
research mein yeh baat samne aayi hain ki bhojan mein resistant starch ki matra diabetes , apach , gas aur dil ki bimariyo ke saath hi cholesterol level ko bhi control karti hain
vitamin c anti oxidants ke taur par kaam karta hain jo skin infections se bachane ke saath hi kai bimariyo se ladne mein sahayak hota hain
iski kami se scurvy , anemia , masoodo ke samsya aur heart related kai samsyaon ka khatra bana rahta hain
fiber ki acchi matra kachche kele mein fiber ki prayapt matra hoti hain
gram fiber paya jata hain , jo pachan kriya ko durust rakhne mein madad karta hain
sharir ko rojana kareeb 14 fiber mile to pet sambandhit kai saari bimariya door rahti hain
kela khane se prayapt matra mein fiber ki purti ho jati hain
potassium ka khazana sabhi hari sabziya potassium ka khazana hoti hain
jyadatar log apni daily diet mein potassium ki utni matra nahi le pate , jitni sharir ko jaroorat hoti hain
iski bharpoor matra sharir mein fluids aur electrolytes ke balance ko sahi rakhti hain
saath hi muscles , nervous system bhi sahi dhang se kaam karte hain
vitamin b6 ka source vitamin b6 ki sabse jyada matra kachche kele mein payi jati hain
yeh paani mein asaani se ghulne wala vitamin hain , jo carbohydrate , protein aur metabolism ke liye jimmevar chemicals ke banane ke liye bahut hi jaroori hota hain
vitamin b6 hemoglobin ke banane mein bhi sahayak hota hain , jisse cells tissue aur baki ango ko jaroori matra mein oxygen ki supply ho jati hain

health tips a a print email methi ke daane aur iska saag dono hi sehat ke liye bahut hi faydemand mane gye hain
methi ke daano mein anti inflammatory properties hoti hain
high blood pressure kam kare methidaane wala paani peene se high blood pressure ko kam karne mein madad milti hain
kyonki isme potassium paya jata hain jo blood circulation ko behtar banata hain
haajma durust banaye fenugreek seed water mein fiber aur antioxidant bharpoor matraa mein hote hain
jisse yeh body mein sodium ke level ko control mein rakhta hain aur blood circulation ko behtar banata hain
skin healthy banaye methi ke daano wala paani peene se skin healthy banti hain , kyonkiisme antioxidant bahut hi good quantity mein paye jate hain
jo skin ko healthy banaate hain
yeh digestion ko behtar banata hain
acidity door kare isme aise tatv paye jate hain jo acid level ko control karte hain
yeh acidity ko door karne mein bhi kargar maana jata hain
isme anti bacterial gun paye jate hain jo aapko viral fever se aaraam dilate hain
diabetes mein faydemand methidane ke paani mein amino acid paye jate hain jo body ke insulin level ko banaye rakhta hain
jisse diabetes ki bimari mein fayda hota hain
cancer se bachaye is paani ko peene se zehreele toxins body se baahar nikal jate hain
colon cancer se bachne ke liye methidaane wala paani jaroor pijiye

05 ab 6299 rupaye mein xolo ka xolo one
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home smartphone xolo ab 6 , 299 rupaye mein xolo ka xolo one smartphone
smartphone , xolo a a print email mobile bazaar mein ek baar phir xolo ne phir se ek sasta mobile utaara hain
5inch ki display wala yeh smartphone android lollipop
xolo one mein 1 gb ram aur 8 gb rom internal memory hain
saath hi 32 gb expandable memory wala sd card slot hain
3ghz ka mediatek quad core processor aur mali 400 gpu graphics processing unit laga huaa hain
led flash ke saath isme 5 megapixel ka rear camera hain , aur front par vga camera hain
iske alawa is phone mein 3g , 2g , wi fi , bluetooth , fm radio aur gps samet anya applications hain
mah li on battery wale is phone se lagatar 19 ghanto tak baat ki ja sakti hain
09 non stick bartan ke nuksan health side
non stick bartan ke nuksan health side effects of using non stick utensils hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips non stick bartan ke nuksan health side effects of using non stick utensils 1 health tips a a print email aksar hum healthy rahne ke liye kam oil wala khana pasand karte hain
aaiye jante hain non stick utensils ke health risk kaise hote hain aur iske use karne ke hame kya side effects ka samna karna pad sakta hain
cancer ka khatra in bartano mein khana pakane se cancer ka khatra badh jata hain
non stick bartan mein khana pakane se cancer ko badhawa dene wala tatv carcinogens hamare sharir mein daakhil hota hain , jo breast cancer ko bhi badhawa deta hain
thyroid rojana non stick bartan mein khana khane se thyroid hone ka khatra badh jata hain
non stick utensils mein khana banane se perfluorinated compound pfc sharir mein pahuchta hain , jo thyroid ko badhata hain
aa sakta hain heart attack ek study ke mutabik lohe ki bajaye nonstick mein khana banana dil ki problems badha sakta hain
non stick bartan mein khana banane se body mein high triglyceride levels badh jata hain , jisse heart attack aa sakta hain
immune system par asar non stick bartan se nikalne wala perfluorinated compound sharir ke immune system ko kamjor kar deta hain
non stick bartan mein toxic fumes nikalti hain , jo pet kharab kar deti hain
ek study ke mutabik nonstick bartan ko banane mein istemal hone wale organic compound aur diabetes mein relation paya gya hain
cholesterol badhaye non stick bartan ka istemal aapke cholesterol level ko badha sakta hain

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge skin ya chehrepar besan lagaane ke fayde
skin banaye smooth besan powder lagaane se skin mulayam aur smooth banti hain
isse skin ki extra moisture kam hoga aur chehra fresh lagega
nikhaar aata hain besan mein malaai ya doodh , shahad aur ek chutaki haldi mila kar lagaane se dry skin ko natural tarike se moisture milta hain aur tavcha mein nikhaar aata hain
bleaching karta hain besan mein bleaching ke gun bhi hote hain , yeh skin ko naturally bleach karta hain
isse dead skin saaf ho jayegi
03 kya aapko pata hain lpg connection par
kya aapko pata hain lpg connection par aapko milta hain8 lakh tak ka accidental insurance
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge kya aapko pata hain lpg connection par aapko milta hain8 lakh tak ka accidental insurance
general knowledge a a print email jaise hi koi vyakti lpg ka new connection leta hain , veh8 lakh rupaye tak ke beeme ka hakdaar ho jata hain
yeh insurance automatically oil companies consumer ke liye karwati hain
public distributors companies indian oil , hpc aur bpc ko aor se jan deyta bima policy karwana government ki aor se compulsory hain
yeh insurance policy kisi ek consumerke liye nahi karwayi jati hain
yeh sabhi oon consumers ke liye hoti hain jo kisi bhi tel company ke lpg consumer hain
in ke mutabik har accident par lagbhag8 lac rupees ka claim mil sakta hain
isme shamil har aadmi ka maximum 10 lakh rupaye tak ki harzana diya ja sakta hain
halaki is tarah ke accidents mein di jane wali amount annual 100 crore rupaye se upar nahi ho sakti hain
medical kharcheke roop mein
registered consumer ki propertyka nuksaan hone par maximum1 lakh rupaye tak ka harzana mil sakta hain
is tarah kul mila kar lagbhag8 lakh rupaye ka cover consumer ko milta hain
agar lpg consumer keghar mein lpg ki wajah se koi accident ho gya ho , toh iski turantsoochna nazdiki police station aur lpg distributor ko de
ki original copy sambhaal kar rakhe
jaise hi lpg se judi koi durghatna saamne aati hain , related area ka officer accident ki wajaho ki jaanch karta hain
agaraccident ki wajah lpg hain , tohrelated gasdistributorinsurance company ko iski jaankari deta hain
vahi beema company se claim ke liye daawaa peshkartahain
agarlpgconsumer ya uske parivaar ke member ki oos accident meindeathho jati hain , tohoil company ko death certificate , postpartum report chahiye hoti hain
in documentske binainsurance ki rashi nahi di ja sakti hain
isliye in documentsko sambhaal karrakhna chahiye
property ko nuksaan pahuchneke situation mein beemacompany apni taraf sesurveyor appoint karti hain , jo nuksaan ki jaanch karta hain aur report insurancecompany ko bhejta hain
surveyorki aor se puchegye questions ka jawaab cool rah karaurvistaar se jawabdena chahiye
khastaurpargaslighter , gaspipe , gas stove toh isi markka hona hi chahiye
aapko har saal gas dealer se maintenance check bhi karwaaterahna chahiye
iski receipt bhi sambhaal kar rakhni chahiye
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips black coffee bina shakkar ke peene ke fayde
general knowledge , health tips a a print email black coffee ko hamesha healthy mana jata hain
isme calorie ki matra kam hoti hain aur isme calcium aur potassium jaise poshak tatv paye jate hain
anti oxidants se bharpoorblack coffee cancer ke roktham mein faydemand hain
black coffeevyaktike nervous system ko durust rakhti hain aur suicide ki aashanka ko kam karti hain
iske alawa yeh sharir mein mauzood extra fat ko kam karke safoorti paida karti hain , type 2 diabetes ke risk ko kam karti hain
diabetes ke patient black coffee ko bina shakkar ke pee sakte hain , yeh unke sugarlevel ko control mein rakhtihain
black coffee mein 60 tak poshak tatv , 20 vitamins , 10 calorie , 10 minerals paye jate hain , jo sharir ko takat pradan karte hain
isme mauzood caffeine sharir ke liye labhdayak hain , lekin jyada piya jayetoh yeh nuksaandeh saabit ho sakta hain
benefits ofblack coffee in hindi urdu
coffee peene se sharir mein sujan ka level mein kami aati hain , jissecardiovascular disease yani ki dil ke rogo se bachati hain
yeh aapke metabolism ko 50 tak badha deti hain , jisse aap gym mein acche se work over karte hain
coffee mein anti oxidants gun paye jate hain , jisse colorectal cancer hone ka khatra kam ho jata hain
saath hi yeh liver cancer se bhi 40 tak bachati hain
pet saaf karti hain coffee ek diuretic beverages jisse aapko baar baar peshab lagega
isliye black coffee ko bina shakkar ke peene se toxins aur bacteria bahar nikal jate hain aur aapka pet saafho jata hain
intelligent banaye coffee mein mauzood caffeine psychoactive body se react karke mood ko accha kartihain , energy deti hain aur kuch samay ke liye aap smartly kaam karte hain
coffee mein mauzood caffeine se dopamine ka level badh jata hain , jisse ise peene se parkinson s jaisi bimari se bacha ja sakta hain
iske alawa yeh nervous system ko active rakhti hain aur pagalpan se bachati hain
antioxidants ke level ko increase kare ; black coffee mein kafi quantity mein anti oxidants hote hain
ek cup black coffee peene se vitamin b 2 , b3 aur b5 , manganese , magnesium aur potassium milta hain
07 badi elaichi khane ke fayde benefits of
badi elaichi khane ke fayde benefits of black cardamom hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips badi elaichi khane ke fayde benefits of black cardamom 0 health tips a a print email badi ya kali elaichi khane ke bade hi fayde hain
badi elaichi ki khas baatein badi elaichi ka vanaspatik naam amomum subulatum aur amomum costatum hain
badi elaichi ke labh benefits of black cardamom
pachan durust karti hain badi elaichi ka sewan gastrointestinal system ke liye khas kar ke faydemand hota hain
iske sewan se acidity ki samsya se chhutkara milta hain
iske niyamit sewan se gastric ulcer aur dusri pachan sambandhi bimariyo ka khatra kafi kam ho jata hain
iske niyamit sewan se asthma , kukur khansi , fefde ka sikoodna , fefde ki sujan aur tapedik t
gurde ki bimari door karta hain badi elaichi ko urinary health ke liye accha mana jata hain
yeh ek behatrin diuretic bhi hain
iske sewan se na sirf urination sahi rahta hain , balki kidney se related bimariya bhi door rahti hain
anti oxidants se bharpoor badi elaich anti oxidants se bharpoor hota hain
isme do tarah ke anti oxidants hote hain , lekin khas tuar par anti cancer anti oxidants paye jate hain
yeh breast , colon aur ovarian cancer ko rokta hain
isse cancer cell ka nirman aur vikas rook jata hain
zehareele tatvo ko bahar nikalta hain badi elaichi ek behtarin detoxifiere ka bhi kaam karti hain
skin ko glowing banata hain badi elaichi ke niyamit sewan se skin chamakne lagti hain
skin allergy ki samsya mein badi elaichi apne anti bacterial guno ke karan natural remedy ki tarah kaam karti hain
rog pratirodhak shamta ko badhati hain badi elaichi mein anti septic aur anti bacterial gun paye jate hain
ise khane se bacterial aur viral infection se bachaav hota hain
blood pressure ke rogiyo ke liye faydemand badi elaichi dil ke mareezo ke liye kafi faydemand hain
isse blood pressure bhi control mein rahta hain
iske niyamit sewan se blood ka flow behtar hota hain aur sharir sehatmand bana rahta hain

aaiye jante hain ki swasth healthy tandarust rahne ke liye hamara khan pan diet kaisi honi chahiye
sabsejyada focus breakfast par hona chahiye
din mein 3 4 litter liquid cheezo ki jaroorat body ko hoti hain
baar ke pure khane breakfast , lunch aur dinner ke alawa beech beech mein 2 3 baar healthy snacks jaroor le
vahi fast food jaise pizza , burger , noodles , chhole bhathure , chips , samosa , pakauda aadi khana aapke liye nuksaandeh hota hain
chini , junk food aur jyadatar safed cheezo aaloo , maida , cheeni , chawal aadi ki bajaye multigrain ya multicolor khane daale , genhu , chana , jau , gajar , palak , seb , papita aadi par zor de

bhi healthy fat ki category mein aate hain
01 swimming ke fayde benefits in hindi
swimming hain best exercise
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips swimming hain best exercise
health tips a a print email swimming karne ke fayde bahut hote hain
swimming ek complete exercise hain
isse body jyada active aur flexible rahti hain
saath hi isse cells , glands aur skin ki bhi safaai hoti rahti hain
tanning se bachne ke liye swimming pool mein utarne se pahle skin par moisturizer laga le
swimming ke fayde benefits of swimming in hindi , swimming se sharir ko hone wale labh , swim karne se kya fayda hota hain
brain rakhe active activation ke saath hi swimming physical aur mental power badhane ke liye bhi bahut jaroori hain
tairne ke dauran body ko jyada matra mein oxygen milti hain , jisse dimaag active banta hain
gathiya se bachaav ke liye dusre tarah ki aerobic exercise karne ki bhi salah di jati hain
heart rakhe healthy swimming karne se blood pressure aur heart rate ki aniyamtata ko door karne mein madad milti hain
swimming ek tarah ki aerobic exercise hain , jisse aapke dil ki maanspeshiya majboot hoti hain
isse aapke poore sharir mein blood circulation sahi rahta hain
kai researches mein yeh pata chala hain ki daily sirf aadha ghanta swimming karne se mahilaon mein coronary heart disease hone ka khatra 30 se 40 tak kam ho jata hain
good cholesterol badhta hain healthy rahne ke liye jaroori hain ki aapki body mein bad cholesterol ka level kam ho
agar body mein good cholesterol yani hdl jyada hain toh yeh aapke liye faydemand saabit hota hain
muscles banaye strong muscles strong hoti hain , shoulders aur pasliyo ki acchi exercise ho jati hain
swimming karne se aapke body ke joints strong hote hain
hum jitni mehnat karte hain utni hi jyada calorie burn hoti hain
har roj kewal 30 minutes swimming karne se sharir ki lagbhag 440 calorie burn hoti hain
blood circulation sahi rakhe aisi exercise hain jise kisi bhi umar ke log kar sakte hain , yeh blood circulation ko sahi rakhne mein madad karti hain
03 pregnancy ke dauran ultrasound ke baare mein jaankari
pregnancy ke dauran ultrasound ke baare mein jankaari
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge pregnancy ke dauran ultrasound ke baare mein jankaari
general knowledge a a print email pregnancy ke dauran time time par kai tests aur followup checkup karwane padte hain
inhi test mein se ek test ultrasound ya scan hota hain jo female ko delivery karne se pahle kiya jata hain
puri garbhavshta ke dauran maximum 4 baar ultrasound karwaya ja sakta hain
is test mein pet mein palne wale bacche ko ek screen ke jariye dekha jata hain
lekin current time mein ultrasound ka galat istemal bhi kiya jata hain
pregnancy ke dauran ultrasound ki importance garbhavstha ke dauran ultrasound test bhroon mein palne wale bachhe ki sehat aur uski situation ke baare mein saaf saaf jankaari deta hain
pregnancy ke dauran neeche likhe gye ultrasound aur scans karwane chahiye
nt scan nuchal translucency scan is scan ko garbhavastha ke 12 vein hafte mein kiya jata hain
anomaly scan is tarah ke scan pregnancy ke 18th aur 20th week mein kiye jaate hain
fetal echocardiography is test ko karne se bhroon ke dil ki dhadakan ka sahi pata chal jata hain
ise pregnancy ke 20 vein aur 22 vein hafte mein kiya jata hain
fetal well being is scan ko 28 se 39 vein hafte mein kiya jata hain
grabhavstha ke dauran ultrasound scan ko kaise kiya jata hain
grabhavstha ke sabhi periods mein ultrasound ke alag alag scan ki jaroorat ke anusaar doctor karte hain
lekin shuruvaati mahine mein transvaginal ultrasound ki jaroorat padti hain
transabdominal ultrasound is tarah ke ultrasound mein sonologist pet par gel ki tarah ka substance laga dete hain aur haath se chalaye jane wale transducer ko pet par firaate hain aur bhroon ki stithi ka pata lagate hain
is tarah ki sonography safe hoti hain aur isse mahila ko jyada preshani bhi nahi hoti hain
transvaginal ultrasound is tarah ke ultrasound mein sonologist vagina yoni mein ek patla sa transducer ghoosa dete hain
02 flat tummy pane ke asardaar gharelu
flat tummy pane ke asardaargharelu nuskhe

health tips a a print email aaj kal ki busy lifestyle mein jyadatar log office mein 8 se 10 ghante tak kursi par baithkar kaam karte hain
is motape ko regular taur par exercise karke kam kiya ja sakta hain , lekin kai logo ke paas iske liye itna time nahi hain
iske liye 10 kg
chan eke aate mein 2 kg
workout ko hamesha kram se kare
isme cardio kewal 20 minutes , musclesbuilding 15 minutes aur aakhir mein abe exercise karni chahiye
din mein dophar 3 4 baje ke beech mein kuch protein wale food khaye , kyonki isse metabolism badhta hain
dry fruits , fruits , healthy snacks ke taur par sprouts khana tummy ko jaldi flat karne mein madadgaar foods hain

inch ki hain display sony company ne apne iss naye smartphone xperia e4g dual mein android ka operating system diya hain
vahi iss handset mein aapko
7inch ki display milegi
iske ilawa agar handset ke processor par gaur kare to issme aapko
iske saath hi xperia e4g dual aapko 1 gb ki ram milegi
vahi iske storage capacity ki baat kare to isme 8gb ki internal memory hain , jise aap 32 gb tak micro sd card ke jariye badha sakte hain

isme aapko 5mp ka rear camera milega , jisme led flash hoga

05 fish khane ke fayde benefits of fish
fish khane ke fayde benefits of fish hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips fish khane ke fayde benefits of fish 0 health tips a a print email fish mein sehat se jude kai saare tatv maujood hote hain
low calorie wali fish mein bahut sara protein maujood hota hain , jo dimaag ke liye bhi accha hain
iske saath hi polyunsaturated omega 3 fatty acid maujood hote hain , jo healthy life ke liye faydemand hain
salmon fish ke sirf 2 3 tukdo mein hi
gram fatty aicd maujood hota hain
isliye doctor fish khane ki salah bachcho ke saath saath pregnant ladies ko bhi dete hain
alzheimer ka khatra kam karti hain fish ko brain food bhi kaha jata hain , kyonki isme aise tatv maujood hote hain jo brain ke liye bahut hi faydemand hote hain
body ko 2 types ke fatty acids ki jaroorat hoti hain vo hain omega 3 aur omega
isme omega 3 hi hearts ki problems ko door rakhta hain
yeh artis mein blood ke saath oxygen aur nutrients ke circulation ke liye bhi jimmevar hain
bhaag daur bhari zindagi , kaam ka pressure , pregnancy ke dauraan hone wale depression ko kam karne ke liye machhali khana ek behtar option hain
omega 3 fatty acid depression ko kam karne ke saath mood ko bhi sahi rakhta hain
macchali mein mauzood protein aur omega 3 sabse jyada fayda pahuchate hain

health tips a a print email agar sahi tarah se khana na banaya jaye toh khane mein se jaroori vitamins , minerals aur protein jaise paushtik tatv khatm ho jate hain
lekin iss process mein hame saavdhaan rahna chahiye ki khana banane ya pakaane mein kanhi khane mein se nutrient kam na ho jaye
chokar samet aate se bani roti mein nutrients jyada hote hain
pressure cooker mein khana pakane se time aur fuel dono ki bachat hoti hain
khane mein nutrients ki quantity jitni jyada hogi , hamara bhojan jyada paushtik hoga aur yeh hamari acchi sehat ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips chhole kabuli chana khane ke fayde
health tips a a print email kabuli chana chhole , safed chana , white chickpeas , white gram khane se kya fayde aur benefits hote hain
chhole mein jyada matra mein protein aur fiber paya jata hain
blood pressure control mein rakhe chhole mein adhik matra mein potassium aur manganese paya jata hain , jo ki body ke electrolyteske balance ko banaye rakhne mein help karte hain
mahilaon ke hormones ke level ko controlkare chhole mein jyada matra mein phytonutrients hote hain
jo ki ladies mein breastcancer hone ke khatreko kam karte hain aur estrogen hormone ka blood levelmaintain karke aapko osteoporosisse bachate hain
anemia se bachaye chhola mein bharpoor matra mein iron paya jata hain
khas karke pregnantwoman ko , period ke timeiska sewan jaroor karna chahiye
wajan kam karne mein helpful chhole mein jyada matra mein fiber hota hain
saath hi yeh protein ka bahut hi accha source bhi hain
pachan se relateddikkato senijatdilaye chhole mein high quality ka fiber paya jata hain
jo pachan se related problems ko door karta hain aur saath hi aant ko bhi theek rakhta hain
isme paya jane wala protein , vitamin , minerals aur fibers se kabz jaise rog hone ka khatra kam hota hain
diabeteske mareezo ke liye faydemand chhole mein kam matra mein glycemic index hota hain
saath hi yeh khoon mein dheemi speed se glucose ko release karta hain aur aapke blood sugar level ko control mein rakhta hain
saath hi ghulansheel fiber , protein aur iron sesugar level contol mein rahta hain

05 elaichi khane ke fayde benefits of
elaichi khane ke fayde benefits of cardamom hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips elaichi khane ke fayde benefits of cardamom 0 health tips a a print email elaichi har bhartiya gharo ki rasoi ka ek aham hissa hain
elaichi ka vanaspatik naam elettaria cardamom hain
cancer ko rokta hain elaichi mein cancer se ladne wale chemical jaise indole 3 , carbinol , dayaindolila aur methane aadi paye jate hain , jo cancer cells ko badhne se rokne mein safal mane jate hain
gande toxins ko bahar nikalne ke liye elaichi ko ek behtarin detox bhi mana jata hain
unchahe baalo se chhutkara paane ke liye gharelu nuskhe aur tips hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips unchahe baalo se chhutkara paane ke liye gharelu nuskhe aur tips 0 health tips a a print email unchahe baalo se chhutkara paane ke liye aap kya kya tips aur treatments use karti hain , lekin kya aapko pata hain aap in unchahe baalo se chhutkara paane ke liye unwanted hair removal kuch aise gharelu nuskhe apna sakti hain , jo behad hi asaan hain aur yeh nuskhe apna kar apni khubsurati ko badha sakti hain
unchahe baalo ko hatane ke liye gharelu nuskhe kaccha papita papita mein paya jane wala papain bahut hi effective enzyme hota hain
sensitive skin ke liye papita papaya bahut hi accha hota hain
haldi ka anti inflammatory aur anti bacterial gun unchahe baalo ko door karne mein bahut hi kargar hota hain
sukhne par halka sa scrub karte huye ise paani se dho le
kam se kam half an hour tak aise hi laga rahne de
sukhne ke baad baalo ke ugane ki direction ke opposite dheere dheere scrub karte huye usay garam paani ki help se hataye
20 minutes laga rahne de
sensitive skin waalo ko ise use karne par khas dhyaan dena chahiye
istemal 2 chammach white pepper , 2 chammach kapoor aur badam tel ki kuch boonde mila kar mixture taiyaar kare
pyaz ke beech se transparent membrane ko alag kar le aur isme tulsi ke patto ko masalkar paste bana le
ise 15 20 minutes tak unchahe baalo par lagaye
istemal 1 bowl potato , ek bowl moong daal , 1 chammach shahad , 4 chammach nimbu ka ras ek saath mila kar paste taiyaar kare
05 lauki khane ke fayde benefits of bottle
lauki khane ke fayde benefits of bottle gourd hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips lauki khane ke fayde benefits of bottle gourd 0 health tips a a print email duniya bhar mein bottle gourd ke naam se masahoor sabzi ko bharat mein lauki aur doodhi ke naam se jana jata hain
thoda sa kadwa test liye huye lauki mein bahut sare nutrients hote hain
iske saath hi kai sare nutrients sharir ko androoni roop se strong rakhte hain
kyonki ismein 96 paani hota hain aur per 100 gram lauki mein 12 calorie hoti hain
kharab khane , smoking , packed food aadi iski wajah ho sakti hain
bahut saare phalo aur sabziyo ki tarah lauki mein bhi cholesterol ki matra na ke barabar hoti hain aur vitamin c aur anti oxidants ki matra dil ko surkshit rakhne ka kaam karti hain
blood pressure control karti hain
sirf 1 glass lauki ka juice peekar high blood pressure ki samsya ko kaafi had tak control kiya ja sakta hain
ise sabzi ke khaye ya iska juice dono hi labhkari hote hain , lekin indian journal of gastroenterology 2011 ki study ke mutabik lauki ka thoda sa kadwa test aapki pachan shakti ko kharaab kar sakta hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email hamare buzurgo ne jo bhi tradition banaye hain , unke peeche kuch na kuch religious ya scientific reason hain
jiske karan digestive system aaram se apna kaam kar paata hain
is tarah dil badi asaani ke saath digest karne mein madad karne wale body ke sabhi parts ko blood supply karta hain , lekin jab aap kursi chair par baithkar khana khate hain , toh yaha blood circulation opposite hota hain
veh behtar dhang se bhojan par concentrate kar paata hain

nariyal paani peene aur nariyal khane ke fayde benefits of coconut water drink hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips nariyal paani peene aur nariyal khane ke fayde benefits of coconut water drink 0 health tips a a print email rojana ek glass nariyal paani coconut water drink piye
isse aapko freshness milegi aur health mein sudhaar hoga
natural guno se bharpoo nariyal paani aapko bahut jyada labh dega
nariyal mein vitamin , dietary fibers aur minerals ka sampoorn misharan hain
nariyal wale milk mein healthy nutrients sabse jyada hote hain
immunity system ko majboot banata hain nariyal paani coconut water drink body ki immunity power ko badhata hain aur infection ke khatre ko kam karke anek bimariyo se hamari raksha karta hain
khas taur par dil , liver aur blood flow se related problems se nijat dilane mein madadgar hain
infections se bachne ke liye nariyal mein natural source hone ki wajah se vah bahari infection hone se bachata hain
iske alawa nariyal mein anti bacterial , anti fungal aur anti viral gun hote hain , jo aapki body ke immune system ko strong rakhne mein madad karta hain
wajan control karne mein madad karna coconut mein fiber adhik hota hain , jise khane se calorie nahi badhti hain
nariyal metabolism ko control karta hain jisse jyada bhookh nahi lagti hain
acidity ko shant karne ke liye nariyal paani kafi helpful hain
blood sugar ko control karna fibers hone ki wajah se nariyal glucose ke badhte level ko control karta hain jisse blood mein sugar level control ho jata hain aur diabetes nahi hoti aur agar diabetes hain to vah control mein rahti hain
iske alawa nariyal paani se aapka digestive system sahi rahta hain
dil ko rakhe healthy nariyal mein sodium ki matra kam aur potassium ki matra adhik hoti hain
jin logo ko high blood pressure ki dikkat hain , unke ke liye yeh kafi faydemand hain
nariyal fat aur gluten free hota hain aur isme dietary fibers adhik hota hain , jo dil ke liye accha hota hain
skin infection ke liye skin mein kanhi bhi infection hone par aap nariyal oil ya milk ko laga sakte hain
iske alawa skin infection jaise dermatitis , eczema aur tavcha rog hone par nariyal tel lagana sahi rahta hain
loose skin , aging spot aur other problems ke liye nariyal best medicine hain
nariyal aapke khane ko digest karne mein help karta hain
pathari ko khatm karta hain isme mauzood potassium aur magnesium gurde ki patthari kidney stone hone ke khatre ko kafi kam kar dete hain

yeh bones aurmusclesko strongbanane mein help kartahain
pregnancy mein faydemand pregnant women ko daily 400 se 600 microgram folic acid ki jaroorat padti hain
kiwi folic acid ka accha source hain

yeh skin ke cells ko lambesamay tak theek rakhte hain aur immunity ko badhatehain

11 hair problems ko door karne ke gharelu
hair problems ko door karne ke gharelu nuskhe aur upay
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge hair problems ko door karne ke gharelu nuskhe aur upay
general knowledge a a print email aajjyadatarlog baalon ke jhadna , girna , unki sahi growth na hona , ganjapan aur dandruff jaisi problems ka shikar ban rahe hain
kai log to inse bachne aur hair problems ke treatment ke liye kai chemicals wale products ka istemal kare rahe hain
in chemical wale treatment ko ajmaane se ek to aapki jeb par asar padta hain yani ki yeh hair products kafi mahnge hote hain aur dusra inke side effects bhi bahut hote hain
home remedies for hair problems in hindi urdu
phir apne baalo ko dho le , isse dandruff aur hair fall ki problem se chhutkara milega
se 4 spoon olive oil ko gunguna garm karke baalo ki maalish kare
ek chammach chukandar aur til ke tel ko mix karke scalp par lagane se hair thick , black , soft aur glowing bante hain
is gharelu nuskhe ko ajmane se baalo ki dryness door hogi aur baal healthy ban jate hain
isse baalo ka jhadna aur dandruff ki problems se rahat milti hain
isse baal black , shiny aur soft banege
spoon aloe vera gel ko daily baalo aur scalp par 1 ghante tak lagane se baalo ka jhadna band ho jata hain
isse unki growth hone lagti hain
isse baal shiny , glowing bante hain aur unki growth bhi acchi hoti hain
spoon onion ke ras mein 1 spoon khatti dahi aur 1 spoon nimbu ka ras mix kare aur usse baalo ki massage kare
ise 30 minutes tak baalo par laga rahne de
isse hair strong shiny ho jate hain
spoon onion ke juice mein 1 ande ke safedi mix kare aur scalp ki massage kare

general knowledge , health tips a a print email kya aap smoking chhodna chahtehain
cigarette , beedi , tobacco , khaini , gutka , sharab aadi chhodne ke liye aapko apne iraade majboot rakhne padenge
ek research ke mutabik indian smoking karne ke mamle mein duniya mein sabse aage hain , vah rojana lagbhag
cigarette pee jate hain
khana khane se 15 minutes pahle 1 glass paani peene se metabolism rate control mein rahta hain
shahad mein anti oxidants , vitamins , enzymesaur protein paya jata hain jo asaani se smoking ki aadat ko chhudane mein madad karta hain
ginseng ek powerful herb hain jo body ko energy deta hain aur tension ko release karne mein madad karta hain
coenzyme q 10 ek aisa enzyme hain jo natural fermented material se taiyaar kiya jata hain
yeh bahut hi powerful antioxidant mana jata hain

aaj ke samay mein yeh ek controversy product hain
fast food ka badhta craze isi ka example hain
par dusre log hafte mein 2 baar iska sewan kar tasty food ko enjoy kar sakte hain
tofu se hame kya milta hain
tofu protein ka ek behatrin source hain
kya aap yakeen karenge ki sirf aadhe cup tofu se hame 10 gram protein milta hain
itna hi nahi is 10 gram protein mein 88 calorie energy hoti hain
saath hi tofu mein zinc , iron , selenium , potassium aur anya kai vitamins aur minerals paye jate hain
tofu se milne wale health benefits vaise to tofu mein kai labhdayak tatv paye jate hain , par isse kuch khas swasth labh bhi hote hain
agar aap meat ki jagah tofu ka sewan karenge to triglyceride aur cholesterol ka level kam ho jayega
isme isoflavones paye jate hain , jo ki jane mane anti oxidants hain
anti oxidants sharir mein paida hone wale free radicals ko khatm karte hain , jisse aap umar se jyada jawan nazar aate hain
shodh mein paya gya hain ki agar jyada matra mein tofu ka sewan kiya jaye to yeh breast cancer , cardiovascular disease aur osteoporosis ko bhi rokta hain
05 kya hain osteoporosis
kya hain osteoporosis
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips kya hain osteoporosis
health tips a a print email badhti umar ke saath sharir mein kai tarah ki problems paida ho jati hain , khastaur par mahilaon mein
aaiye jante hain aisi hi ek bimari osteoporosis ke baare mein osteoporosis osteoporosis ka arth hain pores bone
visheshkar isse hips , wrist , back bone aam taur par prabhavit hote hain
yeh ek gambhir samsya hain , jispar national osteoporosis foundation ka kahna hain ki 2025 tak isse hone wale fracture 30 lakh tak ho chuke honge
sabse gambhir mana jata hain , hip ka fracture
bimari ka kya hain karan abhi tak is bimari ka vastvik karan pata nahi chal saka hain
family history hereditary kisi ke parivaar mein haddiya tutne ka krm lagatar peedi dar peedi chalta rahta hain
kharab food , jisme calcium ki matra na ho , aur kharab lifestyle ke karan yeh problem ho sakti hain
dawaaye aur anya bimari osteoporosis se judi kuch dawaye medicine di jati hain , jaise ki steroids aadi
lekin isse kuch anya takleef paida ho jati hain , jaise thyroid ka badhna ya ghatna ho sakta hain
saath hi khan pan mein pryapt matra mein calcium aur vitamin d ki matra leni chahiye
calcium isse bachne ke liye badhte bacchon ko bharpoor matra mein calcium ki jaroorat hoti hain
lekin agar growth ke waqt pryapt matra mein calcium nahi mila , to baad mein umar badhne ke saath osteoporosis ki gambhir samsya khadi ho sakti hain
menopause ke baad aapko calcium ki sabse jyada jaroorat hoti hain
aapko kitni matra mein calcium lena hain , yeh age ke according tay hoti hain
se 18 ki age ke ladke ladkiyon ko 1300 ml per day calcium 19 se 50 saal ke liye 1000 ml per day calcium 50 saal se adhik umar ke mahila aur purush ke liye 1200 ml calcium per day
ek glass milk mein 300ml calcium sharir ko mil pata hain
iske alawa calcium ke anya source mein hari pattedar sabziya aati hain
is osteoporosis ka treatment kya hain
ilaj ke tarike estrogen replacement therapy ise ert kaha jata hain
bone density jab menopause ke dauraan li jati hain , tabhi tay kar liya jata hain ki ert is rogi ke liye sahi hain ya nahi
lekin ert se breast cancer hone ka bhi khatra rahta hain
selective estrogen receptor new anti estrogen ko selective estrogen receptor modulators serms ke naam se jana jata hain
calcitonin yeh nasal spray ki tarah hain
