general knowledge a a print email sabhi log toothpaste ka istemal daanto ko saaf karne ke liye karte hain
related post chaandi ke gahne ghar par kaise saaf kare
mint wala toothpaste jaldi asar karta hain
table aur stool par agar paani ke daag dhabbe aur nishaan pad gye ho toh soft toothpaste ko mulayam kapde par lekar dhabbo ko halke halke se rub kare
headlight chamak uthegi
ab scratch ko dhoondhna mushkil ho jayega
related post smartphone ki alag alag screen aur unki khasiyat
leather car seats , cover , purse , jacket ya kisi bhi leather ke saamaan par pen ke nishaan mitaane ho toh thoda sa toothpaste lekar dhabbo par halke se ragade
03 aluminium ke bartan ke side effects
aluminium ke bartan ke side effects
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips aluminium ke bartan ke side effects
health tips a a print email bharat ke gharo mein aluminium ke bartan ka istemal aam baat hain , lekin aluminium ke bartan mein khana pakana health keliye nuksaandayak hain
aluminium ke bartanhealthkeliyehanikarakhonekiwajah inme ionske tatvo ki mauzoodagihain
aluminium kidneyke rogiyo ke liye bhi sahi nahi hain khas taur par jo log dialysis par hain unkhe liyetoh yeh behad khatarnaak hain
isse accha hain ki aapstainless steel ke bartano ka istemal kare jo healthpar buraasar nahi dalte hain
aluminium ke bartan ke nuksan side effectsofaluminium utensilsin hindi urdu osteoporosis aluminium haddiyo kedevelopment ko kam kardetahain , jisseosteoporosis ka khatra badhjatahain
alzheimer aluminium ke bartano senervous system par galat asarpadta hain
yeh alzheimerhone ki sabse badiwajah ban sakta hain
08 triphala ke fayde benefits of triphala
triphala ke fayde benefits of triphala hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips triphala ke fayde benefits of triphala 0 health tips a a print email triphala ke fayde benefits of triphala , kai baar kamjori ke karan bhi sharir bimariyo ka shikar hone lagta hain
ayurvedik doctors ki sabse favorite medicine hain triphala
yadi sharir mein ringworm ya tapeworm ho jate hain to bhi triphala kargar hain
triphala sharir mein red blood cells ko badhava deta hain , jo ki kisi bhi infection se ladne mein saksham hota hain
saans sambandhi samsya mein triphala saans se related rogo mein labhdayak hain
cancer mein labhdayak ek research mein yeh paya gya hain ki triphala se cancer ka ilaj mumkeen hain
isme anti cancer gun paye gye hain
seerdard metabolic gadbadi ke karan hota hain
diabetes ki behtarin dawa ; diabetes ke upchar mein triphala bahut asardar hain
yeh pancreas ko uttejit karta hain , jisse insulin paida hota hain
sharir mein insulin ki matra sugar level ko sahi banaye rakhti hain
tract ke ph level ko bhi triphala banaye rakhta hain
anemia mein ramban khoon ki kami ho jane par anemia rog hone lagta hain
hemoglobin ki matra kam hone par triphala ka sewan labhkari hota hain
yeh sharir mein red blood cells ko badha deta hain , jisse anemia ki bimari door ho jati hain
skin problems ko door karta hain kisi bhi tarah ki skin problem hone par triphala madadgar hain
lambi umar tak jawan banaye rakhta hain triphala mein bharpoor matra mein anti oxidants hote hain , jo cells ke metabolism ko control mein rakhte hain
sharir ki immunity ko badhaye ayurveda mein triphala kaya kalp karne wali dawa ke roop mein jani jati hain
triphala , sharir mein anti body ke production ko badhava deti hain , jo sharir mein antigen ke khilaaf ladte hain aur body ko bacteria free rakhte hain
kaise banaye triphala triphal ek ayurvedik tradition dawa hain , jo rasayan ya kayakalp ke naam se bhi famous hain
isliye iske best result ke liye ayurvedik doctor se salah jaroor le
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips tamatar kyon hain best
health tips a a print email tamatar ke bare mein kya kahe , yeh bahut hi tasty aur ras se bhare huye phal hain
tamatar mein vitamin a , c , k , folate aur pottasium bahut hi acchi matra mein paye jate hain
tamatar mein fat , cholesterol , sodium aur calorie kam matramein hote hain
tamatarthiamine , niacin , vitamin b 6 , magnesium , phosphorus aur copper ka bahut accha source hain
cancer seladta hain tamatarnatural tarike se cancer se ladta hain
prostate , grabhashya , mooh , gala , pet , colon aur bhi kai tarah ke cancer ke khatre ko aap sirf tamatarkha kar kam kar saktehain
tamatar mein mauzoodanti oxidants , free radicals se ladte hain , jo hamare body cells ko damagekarneka kaam karta hain
dil ke liye accha hain tamatar mein paya jane wala potassium aur vitamin b cholesterollevelko kam karte hain aur iske saath hi tamatarheart attack aur stroke ke khatreko bhi kam kar deta hain
healthy heart ke liyetomato ko apne bhojan mein jaroor shamil kare
tamatar mein paya jane wala lycopene ultra violet rays ko kam sensitivebanata hain , jo skin par lines aur wrinkles hone ki ahem wajah mani gyi hain
haddiya banaye majboot tamatar mein vitamin k aur calcium dono hi haddiyo ko majboot banane ke saath hi unki murramat bhi karte hain
lycopene haddiyo ko sudhaarta hain , jo osteoporosis se ladne mein madad karta hain
tamatar mein high bioflavonoids aur carotenenaam ka tatv hota hain , jo pain ko door karne mein help karta hain
madhumeh mein faydemand tamatar aapke blood sugar level ko control mein rakhta hain
tomato mein chromium naam ka tatv paya jata hain jo blood sugar ko control karne mein madad karta hain
kaccha tamatarkhana hota hain faydemand tamatar mein lycopene , vitamin a aur c hote hain
yeh anti oxidants ka khazana hain

11 alexa rank kya hoti hain ise kaise
alexa rank kya hoti hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home miscellaneous alexa rank kya hoti hain
miscellaneous a a print email alexa rank kya hain
alexa ek website hain jo amazon company ki taraf se banayi gyi hain
alexa rank veh rank hoti hain jo alexa ki website kisi website ko ranking deti hain
example ke taur maan lijiye hum sabhi students hain aur exam dene baad hamare dwara prapt kiye gye exam marks ke base par hamari apni class mein rank aata hain , jaise ki koi 1st aata hain aur koi second aata hain , kisi bhi board university ke exam ke baad marks ke according students ki merit list aur ranking hoti hain
usi tarah se alexa bhi world ke har blog aur website ki ranking , oos website blog par aane wale daily traffic ke mutabik set karti hain
matlab alexa rank ke jariye aap samajh sakte hain ki koi website blog world mein kitna famous hain
koi blog website kaun se desh mein kitna popular hain
alexa traffic ke hisaab se har website ko rank deta hain
isse pata chalta hain ki koi website kitne paaydaan position par hain
alexa kisi blog aur website ko 2 tarah ki ranking deti hain , pahli rank worldwide hoti hain , jiska matlab yeh hota hain ki aapki website aur aapka blog duniya mein kitna popular hain aur world mein iski kya position hain
dusra rank country wise hota hain , jiska matlab yeh hain ki aapke blog website par agar kisi ek country ka zyada traffic aata ho toh veh alexa rank yeh show karti hain ki oos country mein aapki website ka rank kya hain
duniya bhar ke advertiser bhi alexa rank ko kisi website ki popularity ka paimana mante hain
acchi alexa ranking hone se advertiser khud b khud aapki website par khiche chale aate hain
kisi website ki alexa rank kitni honi chahiye
kisi website ki alexa rank jitni kam hogi , website ke liye utna hi accha hain
top alexa ranking ke hisaab se agar aapki website ki rank worldwide 1 lakh se kam hain toh yeh bahut hi badhiya hain
kyonki 1 lakh se kam alexa ranking wali website ko top website wala mana gaya hain
alexa 1 lakh se kam ranking wali website ka sahi se ranking bhi deti hain
lekin kisi website ka 1 , 00 , 000 se kam alexa ranking ko pana website ke high traffic par depend karta hain
agar aapki website sach mein 1 , 00 , 000 ranking se kam hain toh sach mein aap great ho
alexa kaise tay karta hain kisi website ki ranking
alexa kisi bhi website ki ranking oos website par aane wale daily traffic ke mutabik tay karta hain
aur yehi wajah hain ki har website ki alexa ranking har din kam jyada hoti rahti hain , kyonki har website par har din kam jyada traffic aata rahta hain
isliye alexa ranking ka paimana website ki traffic hain
alexa ranking ko increase karne badhane ke tips
alexa ranking ko increase badhane ke tips ki jagah agar hum alexa rank ko kam karne ki tips kahe toh zyada accha rahega
kyonki alexa rank jitni kam hogi utna hi accha hain
yani ki alexa rank ko kam karne ki tips jante hain
alexa rank traffic par depend hota hain , isliye koshish kare ki aap apni website par zyada se zyada visitors ko attract kare
alexa ranking acchi karne ke liye aap apne blog website ko daily update karte rahe
isliye aap apne blog website par daily naye articles likhte rahe
agar aap apne blog par daily article nahi likhenge toh aapke website ki alexa rank gir jati hain
alexa ranking ko increase karne ke liye jaroori hain ki aapke website par computer users ka traffic zyada aana jaroori hain
kyonki agar aapki website par zyada computer laptop users visit karenge toh alexa ranking aur bhi tezi ke saath increase karegi
alexa ranking increase karne ke liye jaroori hain ki apni site ko attractive banaye , jisse jyada users aapki website par aayenge aur zyada traffic ki wajah se alexa rank increase karegi
alexa ranking ka widget aap apne website par lagaye , isse alexa ko aapke website ko sahi rank karne mein madad milegi
koshish kare ki aapki website 1 , 00 , 000 ke under ho isse alexa sahi ranking deta hain
apni website ka bounce rate kam karne ki koshish kare
bounce rate vah hota hain jisse hame pata chalta hain ki aapki website par koi user aapki website par kitna waqt deta hain
matlab ki aapki website par koi user kitna der tak thaharta hain
agar aapke website par koi visitor aata hain aur turant aapki website se chala jata hain toh bounce rate bahut zyada ho jata hain , agar koi visitor jyad der tak aapki website par rookta hain toh bounce rate kam hota hain , jisse alexa rank ko accha karne mein fayda milta hain
sabse jaroori hain ki aapki blog ka khud ka custom domain ho , custom domain hone ki wajah se alexa rank sahi se aapki website ko rank de sakti hain
kyonki blogspot url country ke hisaab se alag alag ho jata hain , maslan india mein hisab se blogspot
in , england ke hisaab se blogspot
uk jabki custom domain se aapke blog ka sirf ek url hota hain , jis par alexa acchi tarah se focus karta hain
alexa rank ki kamiya
alexa ranking mein 1 , 00 , 000 se upar ki website ka sahi sahi yeh ranking nahi deti hain
alexa sirf website ke computer users ke traffic ke hisaab se ranking karti hain , ho sakta hain ki kisi website par computer users ki jagah mobile users jyada ho , lekin alexa sirf computer user par focus karti hain
alexa rank mein koi website kisi khas rank par pahuch kar rook kyo jati hain
alexa ranking mein hum dekhte hain ki koi website kisi khas rank number par atak jata hain , matlab samjah lijiye ki kisi website ki alexa rank 50 , 000 hain veh 1 mahine mein 50000 se thoda kam ya jyada hota rahta hain , lekin 40 , 000 rank par nahi pahuch pata hain
aisa isliye hota hain kyonki jaise jaise aapki website ki alexa rank kam hone lagti hain , matlab ki alexa rank acchi honi lagti hain , ab aapke saamne dusri websites se kadi takkar ka saamna karna padta hain
matlab ki aapse aage wali websites bhi top ki websites hoti hain
yani ki high quality aur high traffic wali website baazi maar leti hain
isliye jaise jaise alexa rank increase hoti hain , vaise vaise aapki website ki ranking ka accha hone ka margin kam ho jata hain
yahi wajah hain ki aapki website kisi khas ranking mein atak jati hain
alexa ranking ka sabse bada secret yahi hain ki aap apne website par computer users ka traffic increase kare
agar aapke website par computer users jyada aayenge toh aapki website jyada alexa rank prapt karegi
agar aapki website par mobile user jyada hain toh alexa rank ko yeh utna fayda nahi dete hain
computer user hi alexa ranking ke liye jaroori hain
01 lobia khane ke fayde benefits of black
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips lobia khane ke fayde
health tips a a print email lobia ek tarah ki phali hain , jinhe chawli ki phalli ke naam se bhi jana hain , ise english mein black eyed pea kaha jata hain
infection se bachaav vitamin a jaise anti oxidants ka khazana hone ki wajah se yeh phalli kai tarah ki bimariyo se hame door rakhti hain
wajan kam karne mein madadgar in black eyed pea mein calorie kam hoti hain , isliye yeh wajan kam karne ke liye accha aahaar hain
lobia dietary fiber ka ek accha source hain , jisse aapka pet jyada samay tak bhara rahta hain
healthy skin ke liye upyogi skin ko suchaaroo roop se repair karte huye lobia skin ko healthy rakhti hain
is phalli mein mauzood anti oxidant mein vitamin a aur c ki mauzoodgi hoti hain jo free radicals se skin ko huye nuksaan ko door karte hain
blood cholesterol level kam kare black eyed pea blood cholesterol level ko kam karne ke liye jani jati hain aur kai tarah ki dil ki bimariyo ko door karti hain
potassium aur magnesium jaise flavonoids aur lignin ki mauzoodagi lobia ko heart se related bimariyo ko door karne mein upyogi banati hain
diabetes ke mareezo ke liye faydemand lobia ka glycemic index dusri istemal ki jane wali phaliyo aur daalo ke mukable kam hota hain
aise foods jinka glycemic index kam hota hain , veh blood sugar level ko normal rakhte hain
isliye yeh diabetes patient ke liye accha aahaar hain
07 digestive system ko durust rakhne wale
digestive system ko durust rakhne wale phal fruit
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips digestive system ko durust rakhne wale phal fruit
health tips a a print email apni daily diet mein kuch aise food aur fruits ko jaroor shamil karna chahiye , jisme sabhi nutrients aur protein acchi matra mein ho
experts ke mutabik 2 se 3 tarah ke fruit jaroor hi khane chahiye , kyonki isse aapko energy milegi
in dono mein sodium aur fiber bharpoor matra mein paye jate hain jo aapke pure din ko active banaye rakhte hain
aaj hum aise phal fruits ke baare mein janenge jinhe khane se digestion sahi hota hain , matlab ki yeh phal digestion system pachan kriya ko sahi rakhte hain
in fruits ko khane se pachne mein mushkil paida karne wale food ko divide kar unse protein nikaalne mein madad milti hain
best fruits for digestion system khana khane ke baad yeh phal jaroor khaye , isse aapka hajma durust rahega
isme bromelain enzyme hota hain jo khane ko hajam karne mein madad karta hain
apple apple mein fiber bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain
agar aapko pachan se related problem hain to seb digestion ke liye sabse best fruit hain
avocado is phal mein nutrients , vitamins aur energy bharpoor matra mein hoti hain
nashpati sodium free , cholesterol free aur fat free hota hain aur 190 milligram potassium paya jata hain , jisse pachan tantra majboot banta hain
rasbhari agar aapko diabetes aur pachan se related problem hain to rasbhari aapke liye accha option saabit ho sakta hain
isme calories bhi kam hoti hain , yeh behtar digestion ke liye bahut hi accha phal hain
02 chicken pakaane aur khaane ka healthy
chicken pakaane aur khaane ka healthy tarika
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips chicken pakaane aur khaane ka healthy tarika
health tips a a print email dekha jaye toh chicken non vegetarian khane walo ki jaan hoti hain
chicken pakane ka healthy tarika grilled chicken grilled chicken na sirftasty hotahain , balki healthy bhi hota hain
roasted chicken roasted chicken khanemein bahut hi behtarin lagta hain
chicken soup chicken ko boil karke uska soup piya ja saktahain
isme mauzood jitne bhi vitamins , protein aur minerals hote hain , veh usi mein sama jate hain
is soup ko peene se pet bhi kam hota hain
stir fry stir fry chickenkafi tasty hota hain aur agar yeh lahsun aur dusre herbs ke saathspice kar diya jaye toh yeh aur bhi tasty lagta hain
boil chicken bina paka hua chiken unhealthy hota hain , isliye jab aap ise ubaale toh baad meinisefry bhi kar le

04 mobile se pata kare aapka aadhaar
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home finance tech news tech tips mobile se pata kare , aapka aadhaar number bank se link hua hain ki nahi
finance , tech news , tech tips a a print email lpg ki subsidy direct consumer ke bank account mein transfor karne ke liye aadhaar card ko bank ke khato se joda ja raha hain
sarkar ne aadhaar card ko link karane ke liye aakhiri faze mein 10 crore bank account ko jodane ka target rakha hain
june tak jisne ise link kara diya usay hi subsidy ka labh diya jayega
aise paa sakte hain subsidy dbtl scheme ke tahat lpg subsidy upbhogta ke seedhe bank account mein aa rahi hain
scheme se judne wale logo ko ctc consumer ka naam diya gya hain
primary tarike mein jahan upbhogta ke paas aadhaar number hain , usay apne aadhaar number ko bank account number aur lpg consumer number ke saath link karna hoga
iske liye ya to apne bank account ki jankari lpg distributor ko de ya phir lpg consumer id apne bank ko de
market rate par milega cylinder pehal dbtl scheme ke tahat jo upbhogta abhi tak scheme se nahi jude hain , unhe market rate par cylinder khareedna pad raha hain
yahan tak ki subsidy bhi nahi mil rahi hain
philhal 3 months ka extend period diya gya hain
grace period non ctc consumers ko is scheme se judne aur ctc banane ke liye 3 mahine ka parking period diya gya hain
march mein khatm huyi dbtl scheme se judne ke liye ab upbhogta ke paas june tak aadhaar card link karvana hoga
is dauran unhe cylinder subsided retail price par hi milega

badam wala doodh peene ke fayde benefits of almond milk hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips badam wala doodh peene ke fayde benefits of almond milk 0 health tips a a print email badam ka doodh badam wala doodh peene ke fayde bahut hain kya aap jante hain
badam wala doodh peene se skin healthy aur chamakdar banti hain
isme healthy fat ki matra bahut jyada hoti hain jaise , omega fatty acid
saath hi isme potassium , vitamin e , magnesium aur mono saturated fats bhi paye jate hain
badam ka doodh peene se arthritis aur osteoporosis ka khatra kam ho jata hain
muscles banaye ; bhale hi badam ke doodh mein protein ki matra jyada na ho lekin isme magnesium , copper aur riboflavin jaise nutrients hote hain jo sharir ki energy badhane mein madad karte hain
yeh bahut hi powerful nutrient hota hain jo skin mein moisture bharta hain aur usay healthy banata hain
aankho ke liye kyonki badam milk mein vitamin a hota hain jo aankhon ko direct asar karta hain
isliye almond milk padhte huye baccho ko jaroor pilana chahiye

general knowledge , health tips a a print email khane khate waqt hum aksar paani lekar baithte hain
why doesn t drink water during eating food
jiski wajah se pachan enzymes bahut hi kam quantity mein nikalte hain
so apach ki wajah se pet mein acidity aur seene mein jalan hone lagti hain
gastric juice ko kamjor karta hain khane ko hazam karne mein gastric juice madad karte hain
body mein insulin ki matra ko badhata hain glycemic food ki tarah khane ke dauran paani peene se body mein insulin ka level badh sakta hain
isse khane mein mauzood glucose fat ke roop mein convert ho jata hain , aur baad mein aapke blood sugar level ko badhata hain
wazan ko badhata hain khana khane ke dauran paani peene se iska direct asar wazan par padta hain
jaisa ki pahle bhi bataya gya hain ki khane mein mauzood glucose fat mein convert ho jate hain aur insulin ke level ko badha dete hain
lar mein mauzood enzymes sirf khane ko chabane mein hi hamari madad nahi karte hain , balki yeh pet ko pachan enzymes ko paida karne ka sanket bhi deta hain aur pet ko digestion process ke liye taiyaar karta hain
khane ko acchi tarah se chaba kar khaye khane ko acchi tarah se chabane se mooh ki lar digestion process ko tez karti hain aur yeh iska health benefit hain

general knowledge a a print email market mein available kai tarah ke saabun aapko confuse kar dete hain , aakhir kaun sa saabun aapke liye accha hain
oily skin ke liye saabun skin sebum ka production karti hain , jo ki ek natural oil hain
alag alag vyaktiyo mein iske production mein difference paya jata hain
jaroorat se jyada active sebaceous glands ki wajah se skin oily ho jati hain aur pimples ki problem hoti hain
saboon khareedne se pahle uske packet par likhe ingredients ko padhna na bhoole , jisme salt , oatmeal , brown sugar ya pitch jaisi cheeze ho , veh saabun aapke liye faydemand hoga
agar skin jyada sensitive na ho toh mild exfoliate soap ka istemal aap kar sakte hain
dry skin walo ke liye soap sebum skin ke liye accha mana jata hain , lekin iska bahaav bahut jyada ya bahut kam nahi hona chahiye
agar sebum ka production jaroori limit se kam matra mein hota hain toh skin dry ho jati hain
jab aap dry skin ke liye soap ka selection kare toh aisa sabun choone jisme glycerin ho , is tarah ka saabun dry skin ke liye faydemand rahta hain
yeh moisturize dene wala tatv hain
normal skin ke liye yeh combination skin se opposite hoti hain
is tarah ki skin par aap na toh dry skin soap ka istemal kare aur nahi oily skin soap ka istemal kare
iske liye herbal soap faydemand rahta hain
oily skin wale iss tarah ke saabut se door rahe aise saboon jinme acid tatv jyada ho ya ph value kafi high ho
bahut jyada chemical wale soap se bachna chahiye
isme chemical ki matra bahut jyada hoti hain

yeh phone white gold aur grey silver color mein utara gya hain
ise flash sale ke jariye becha jayega aur iske registration 22 april se shuru ho chuke hain
inch ki q hd 960x540 pixel ips display hain , jispar corning gorilla glass 3 protection diya gya hain

canvas spark mein internal memory 8 gb hain , jise micro sd card se extend kiya ja sakta hain
is phone mein 8 megapixel ka rear camera hain jisme led flash diya gya hain aur front camera 2 mega pixel ka hain
lollipop version per loaded hain

general knowledge a a print email bijali se chalne wale tamam tarah ki machines ka hum istemal karte hain
electricity saving tips in hindi
thermostat temperature ko control karta hain
aise mein aap uska thermostat 20 se 25 set kar bijali ki bachat kar sakte hain
temperature set karne ke baad jaise hi kamra thanda ho jata hain , vaise hi ac mein auto cut lag jata hain
air filter ki safaai jaroori hain
isse cooling behtartarike se hoti hain
kamra air tight hona chahiye
bulb sabse bada energy saving device ghar ya office mein lage bulb hote hain
isse bhi jyada kifayati led light hain
watt ke night lump ki jagah led bulb ka istemal kare
disposal ke waqt cfl light mein mercury jyada hoti hain , led light mein iski matra kam hoti hain
aise mein disposal ke waqt pollution kam hota hain
ghar mein halke rango ka paint karwaya , isse light ka reflection hota hain aur kam energy consume mein bhi ghar roshan dikhta hain
pahle unhe room temperaturepar aane de
auto defrost wale fridge mein energy ki jyada khapat hoti hain
mixer grinder mixergrinder ko puri tarah se bharkarna chalaye
washing machine kapde dhone ke liye garam paani ka istemal na kare
kapde washing machine ke dryer mein na sukha kar khuli hawa mein sukhaye
tv ko remote se band karke standby mein na chhode
usay switch se band kare
kya hain star rating ka matlab bureau of energy efficiency kiaor se star rating di jati hain
energy consumable ke hisaab se ise categorized kiya gya hain
star labelling refrigerator , ac aur tumblers floor cents aur transformer ke liyejaroorihota hain
bharat mein starrating 1 se 5 tak hain
misaal ke taur par agar1 star wala ac agar ek din mein 10 unit bijali consume karta hain , 5 star wala
agar1 star wale ac ka billagar 100 rupaye aata hain toh 5 star wale mein sirf 69 rupaye ka aata hain
zahir hain ki star rating waleproduct aapki jeb ko dheela nahi hone detehain

ac , cooler ke aagekoi bhi furniturena rakhe

08 metabolism rate increase badhaane ke
metabolism rate increase badhaane ke liye jaroor khaye yeh cheeze
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips metabolism rate increase badhaane ke liye jaroor khaye yeh cheeze
health tips a a print email duniya mein kai log yeh janna chahte hain ki kya koi aisa food hain , jinhe khane se metabolism rate badhta hain aur weight kam karne ke body ki fat burning capacity mein ijafa hota hain
is tarah ke food ko negative calorie food bhi kaha jata hain
in cheezo ko kha kar aap khane se milne wali calories se jyada calories burn kar sakte hain
is tarah metabolism rate ko increase karne aur fat burn karne ki power ki wajah se negative calorie food bahut hi jaroori hain
acchi exercise karne ke saath hi yeh zero calorie food jo aapke metabolism rate ko badhane ke saath wazan kam karne mein important role ada karte hain
aaiye jante hain metabolism rate ko badhane wale food food for increase metabolism rate in hindi urdu
cereal khaye wazan kam karna chahte hain to cereals khaye
cereals na kewal aapki metabolism rate ko boost karte hain , balki yeh kai ghanto tak aapko energy bhi dete hain , kyonki inhe hajam karne mein bahut waqt lagta hain
yeh insulin ke level ko control mein rakh kar fat ko banne se rokte hain
fish aur chicken aise log jo bina charbi ke protein jaise fish ya chicken ko khate hain , unki metabolism rate mein sudhaar aata hain
kyonki inke pachan mein bahut jyada time aur energy ki jaroorat hoti hain , jisse fat burn hone ka process badh jata hain
yeh body mein fat paida karne ki capacity ko dheema kar deta hain aur din bhar ki jane wali activities mein burn hone wali calories ko badha deta hain
berries har tarah ki berries jaise blueberries , strawberry ya blackberry aapke metabolism rate ko increase karte hain
yeh calories ko burn karne mein helpful hote hain
berries mein mauzood fiber fat ko observe kar lete hain aur unhe sharir se baahar nikaal dete hain
10 sharab peene ke nuksan side effects of
sharab peene ke nuksan side effects of alcohol in hindi hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips sharab peene ke nuksan side effects of alcohol in hindi 0 health tips a a print email sharab peene se sharir ko hamesha hi nuksaan ka saamna karna padta hain
sharab na sirf aapke social life , economy par asar daalti hain balki yeh aapke health ko bhi bahut bure tarah se prabhavit karti hain
sharab peene ke nuksaan side effects of drinking alcohol anemia alcohol ke jyada sewan se sharir mein oxygen le jane wali red blood cells kam ho jati hain
sharab se platelets ka khoon ke thakko ke roop mein jamne lagte hain , jiski wajah se heart attack ya stroke hone ka khatra badh jata hain
cancer sharab peene se cancer badh jata hain
ek research ke mutabik alcohol sharir ke ander acetaldehyde mein badal jata hain , jisse gale ka cancer , liver cancer , breast cancer aur larynx cancer ho jata hain
isse aapke dimaag ke reaction dene ki capacity par asar padta hain
immune system kamjor jyada drinking karne se immune system kamjor ho jata hain , jisse infection hone ka khatra badh jata hain
isse t
pneumonia aadi jaise rog shamil hain
high blood pressure sharab ka asar sharir mein blood flow par padta hain
isse blood pressure badhne lagta hain
high blood pressure apne aap mein ek rog hain , saath hi yeh anya kai bimariya jaisi dil ki bimariya , stroke , heart attack ke liye bhi jimmevar hota hain
purusho mein virya ki quality par asar ; jyada sharab peene se aapke sperm ki quality par kharab asar hota hain
isse aapki sperm count mein kami aati hain
fatty liver pahli stage mein liver bada ho jata hain aur usme fat badh jata hain
is stage mein agar aap alert ho jaye to fatty liver se bacha ja sakta hain
alcohol hepatitis isme fat badhne ke saath liver ke cells dead hone lagte hain
is dusri stage mein ultrasound karwa kar check kiya jata hain
alcoholic cirrhosis jab koi lagatar pita jata hain toh teesri sabse ghatak stage shuru ho jati hain , jise alcoholic cirrhosis ke naam se jana jata hain
is stage mein aane ke baad liver kabhi bhi normal nahi ho pata hain

health tips a a print email aamtaur par murabba ka naam sunte hi , dimaag mein amle ka murabba hi yaad aata hain

saath hi isme calcium , vitamin a aur magnesium bhi hota hain , jo ise aur bhi healthy banata hain

yeh pregnant women mein morning sickness ki problem ko door karta hain
yeh hemoglobin ki matra ko badha kar unhe energy deta hain

seb ka murabba seb ke murabbe mein phosphorus , iron , protein , calcium , carbohydrate , vitamin b aur vitamin c khoob hota hain

health tips a a print email garmiyon ke mausam ke baad barsaat ka mausam aata hain toh maano garmi se kuch rahat milti hain
mushroom barsaat ke dino mein mushroom khane se bhi bachna chahiye

jo body ki immunity ko badhaane mein madad karte hain

vitamin c is mausam mein aapkeliye kafi faydemand hota hain , yeh aapko bimariyo se door rahne mein madad karta hain aur body ki immunity ko badhata hain
tulsi mein antioxidants paye jate hain
yeh anti viral agent hota hain

lahsun aapki body ki immunity ko boost karta hain aur toxins ko bahar nikaalta hain

05 santra ke desi nuskhe fayde benefits of
santra ke desi nuskhe , fayde benefits of orange hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips santra ke desi nuskhe , fayde benefits of orange 0 health tips a a print email garmiyo ke mausam mein santra orange bade hi chaav ke saath khaya jata hain

05 mood happy karne wale food

general knowledge , health tips a a print email mood kharab hone par kya khaye
happy hone ke liye kya khaye
in swaalo ka jawaab janne ke liye yeh post jaroor padhe
kuch researches ke mutabik serotonin , endorphin , dopamine aur dusre neurotransmitter hormones hote hain jo dil aur dimaag ko accha aur khush rakhte hain
agar aapka dimaag soost hain toh black tea , green tea ya orange lemon tea lene se mood ekdum change ho jata hain
ji haan journal of nutrition ki ek research ke mutabik is tarah ki chai mein ek tarah ka amino acid paya jata hain
strawberry potassium ka bahut accha source hain , jo ki tantrikaonko uttejit karne mein madad karta hain
yeh vitamins ka bhi bahut accha source hain
isme kaempferol aurquercetinaadi paye jate hain , jo ki mind ko stress freerakhne ka kaam karte hain
isse sharir ko protein aur amino acid milte hain
tyrosineek special kism ka amino acid hain jo dopamine , norepinephrineaur epinephrine aadi neurotransmitter ke production ko badhata hain
in rasayano se sharirik alertness aur energy badhne mein madad milti hain
carbohydrate wale food serotonin ka production badhate hain
jo ki body ke liye feel good hormone hain
research se pata chala hain ki jin depression ke mareezo ne carbohydrate ka lagatar sewan kiya , 1 2 hafte mein hi unka depressionkam hua
nariyal khane se heartbeat turant control mein aa jati hain
colombia university dwara kiye gye research mein yeh paya gya ki agar kisi ka blood pressure badha hua hain aur veh nariyal soonghta hain toh uska blood pressure bahut tezi se control mein aata hain
darasal nariyal mein medium size triglycerides hote hain
isme fat ki special quantityhoti hain jo mood ko accha karte hain aur dimaag ke liye healthy bhi hain
potassium aur magnesium kafi matra mein paye jate hain
keleke andernatural sugar jab aapke blood mein milti hain toh isse aapmeenergy ka circulation hota hain
kele mein starch wala carbohydrate hota hain jo aapke mood ko accha banaye rakhne mein madad karta hain
dark chocolate khane se dimaagstress free hota hain
kai researches se yeh baat saabitho chuki hain
saath hi chocolate mein anti oxidants paye jate hain , jo aapke mood ko hamesha accha banayerakhti hain
isme lycopene naam ka anti oxidant paya jata hain jo dimaag ki sujan ko door karta hain

09 naya air conditioner khareedne ke tips
naya air conditioner khareedne ke tips tips for buying new a
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge tech tips naya air conditioner khareedne ke tips tips for buying new a
general knowledge , tech tips a a print email kya aap naya air conditioner a
ek samay tha jab air conditioner vilashta ka dusra naam tha , lekin jaise jaise lifestyle mein change aaye aur aam aadmi khas karke middle class ki buying capacity badhi , ac ek jaroorat ban gya
duniya bhar ki tamam chhoti se badi companies iska production kar rahi hain
window aur split ke baad ab portable ac bhi bazaar mein available hain
ac ki capacity kya ho aur kaun sa variant behtar hoga
lekin ac khareedte waqt kam se kam 3 star rating wala product lena hi sahi rahega , aap apni suvidha ke anusaar 4 ya 5 star wala ac bhi khareed sakte hain
size ya capacity air conditioner khareedte samay sabse badi confusion uske size ya capacity ko lekar hoti hain
yeh seedhe taur par room , hall ya oos jagah ke size par depend karta hain , jaha ac ko install kiya jana hain
kyonki big rooms mein small ac kai ghanto ki bijali khapat karne ke baad bhi kuch khas asar nahi kar pate hain
square feet ke lihaz se agar aapke kamre ka floor 90sqft se chota hain to aapke liye
window , split ya portable ac ke 3 variants mein apni apni khoobiya hain , window ac anya 2 variants ke mukable thoda sasta hota hain
asaani se install hota hain
lekin khoobsurati ke mamle mein split ac se pichhad jata hain
split ac mein iske component ko bahar kanhi bhi install karne ki suvidha rahti hain
air flow jyada hone ke karan yeh big room ke liye sahi hain
component bahar install hota hain , lihaza chalne ki wajah se shor nahi hota hain
lekin window ac ke mukable split ac thoda mehanga hota hain
installation ka jhanjhat nahi
filter , air flow , swing ek good ac ka chunaav isliye mayne mein important hain ki aap uski hawa mein saans bhi lete hain , yani ki ac mein badhiya filter laga hona jaroori hain
jaroori hain ki ac mein cooling fan ki speed ko tay karne ki suvidha ho
split aur portable ac mein swing ki suvidha hoti hain
ab kuch window ac mein bhi yeh feature aane lage hain
ac ko samay samay par servicing ki bhi jaroorat hoti hain
dusri jaroori baatein kai ac mein timer ki bhi suvidha hoti hain
voltage stabilizer ac ke saath voltage stabilizer khareedne ki bhi salah di jati hain
ton ka hain to iske saath 2 kva ka stabilizer sahi rahega
ton ac ke liye 4 kva ka ,
ton ke liye 5 kva aur 3 ton se adhik capacity wale ac ke liye 6 kva ka stabilizer sahi rahega

nimbu paani peene kenuksan side effects oflemon water in hindi urdu
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips nimbu paani peene kenuksan side effects oflemon water in hindi urdu
general knowledge , health tips a a print email nimbu paani peenese jaha faydehote hain , vahi zyada nimbu paani peene se nuksan bhi hote hain
nimbu paani peene se sharir ko vitamin c , potassium aur fiber jaise minerals milte hain , lekin kisi bhi cheez ko jyada matra mein istemal karna hamesha faydemand nahi hota hain
jyada nimbu paani peene se sharir ko hote hain yeh nuksan side effects of lemon water in hindi urdu
jisse dehydration ka khatra badh jata hain
nimbu paani peene se acidity aur gas ki problem badh sakti hain
jiska effect digestion system par bhi padta hain
daant bahut zyada sensitive ho jate hain nimbu mein citricacid hota hain , jiske contact mein aate hi teeth bahut zyad sensitive ho jate hain
aise mein koshish kare ki nimbu paani ka sewan simit matra mein experts ki salah par kare
stone ka khatra nimbu mein citricacid ke alawa oxalate ki bhi prayapt matra mein hoti hain
nimbu paani ka zyada sewan karne se yeh crystal ke roop mein sharir mein jama ho jata hain
02 karela juice peenee ke fayde benefits
karela juice peene ke fayde benefits of bittergourd juice in hindi
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips karela juice peene ke fayde benefits of bittergourd juice in hindi
health tips a a print email bitter gourd yani ki karela apne medical guno ki wajah se ek dawa ke taur par kaam karta hain
kacche karele ka juice bahut hi faydemand hain kyonki sabhi jaroori vitamins , minerals aur antioxidants isme mauzood hote hain jo hamare sharir ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
karela juice peene ke fayde benefits of drinking bitter gourd juice in hindi pachan shakti badhata hain karele ka juice kamjor pachan shakti ko sudhaarta hain aur apach ko door karta hain
blood ko saaf karta hain bitter gourd juice body mein ek natural blood purifier ka kaam karta hain
pancreas ke cancer ke ilaj ke liye faydemand rojana ek glass karela juice peene se pancreas mein cancer paida karne wale cells khatm ho jate hain
aisa isliye hota hain kyonki karele mein mauzood anti cancer components pancreas mein cancer paida karne wale cells mein glucose ka pachan rok dete hain , jisse in cells ki shakti khatm ho jati hain aur yeh khatm ho jate hain
blood sugar level ko kam karta hain apne sugar level ko control karne ke liye aap 3 din tak khali pet subah karele ka juice pee sakte hain
yeh insulin ko kaam mein lekar diabetes mein sugar level ko kam karta hain
iske alawa isme mauzood vitamin c aur anti oxidants oxidative stress se hone wali nazaro ki kamjori se bachata hain
bhookh badhata hain bhookh nahi lagne par sharir ko pura poshan nahi mil pata hain , jisse health se related problems paida ho jati hain
yeh aapki rog pratirodhak kshamta ko bhi badhata hain aur psoriasis ko natural tarike se theek karne mein madad karta hain
toh dosto aaj aapne jana karela juice peene ke fayde benefits of drinking bitter gourd juice in hindi , karele ka juice hame kyon peena chahiye is swaal ka jawaab aapko mil hi gya hoga
04 magnesium kisme sabse jyada paya jata
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips magnesium kisme sabse jyada paya jata hain
health tips a a print email jyadatar logo ko magnesium se sharir ko hone wale fayde ke baare mein pata hi nahi hota hain
isse body ka immune system strong banta hain aur aapko androoni bharpoor takat milti hain
depression mein magnesium bahut hi fayda karta hain , seer dard aur migraine jaise problems ko door karne mein magnesium bahut bada role ada karta hain
magnesium ke good source kya hain , magnesium ke liye kya khana chahiye
dahi dahi se calcium aur magnesium dono hi prapt hote hain
dahi khane se aapko fayda hi hota hain , yeh magnesium ka bahut accha source hain
cocoa 10 gram cocoa mein 52 milligram magnesium hota hain
avocado avocado mein kai tarah ke vitamins paye jate hain
avocado ka sandwich bana kar khane se magnesium bharpoor matra mein aapko milta hain
badam ek baar badam khane se sharir mein 75mg
magnesium milta hain
kaju kaju mein carbohydrate ke sath sath magnesium hota hain , jo sharir ko durust rakhta hain
soya bean isme protein , vitamin aur magnesium hota hain
peanut butter peanut butter ke ek chote chammach mein lagbhag 22mg magnesium hota hain
breakfast mein apni bread par peanut butter moongfali ka makkhan laga kar jaroor khaye
fish fish mein magnesium aur omega 3 fatty acid ki bharpoor matra payi jati hain
fig fig ko khane se body ko balanced matra mein magnesium prapt hota hain
dark chocolate dark chocolate mein kafi matra mein magnesium hota hain
kaddu ke beej pumpkin seeds mein magnesium hota hain
saabut aanaaz aur sprouts subah breakfast mein anaaz ya sprout khane se sharir ko magnesium milta hain
kela kela khane se potassium bharpoor matra mein hame prapt hota hain
isme 30mg magnesium hota hain

janiye fitkari ke fayde aur iske khas gun ek liter paani mein 10 gram fitkari ka churan ghole
gram fitkari ke churan mein 5 gram sendha namak mila kar manjan bana le

health tips a a print email garmi ka mausam aate hi jyadatar logo ko skin se related problems paida hone lagti hain
kuch logo ko garmiki wajah se aankho , saraur chehre parred yellow badi funsiya hone ki problem hoti hain
koshish kare ki khane mein jyada fresh fruits aursalad khaya jaye
garmi ke mausam mein cotton ya paseena sokhnewalekapde pahne
agaraapko kisi tarah ke infection ki tendency hain ya aapki family historyhain toh doctorse salah jaroor le
agar 3 4 din mein fode funsi theek na ho toh doctor se contact kare
iske alawa direct sun rays ya tez garmi ke contact mein aane , dhool dhuaan , kisi kharab cosmetic se , galat material ke kapdepahanne sebhi fode funsi ho sakte hain
aapko pollution aadi se bhi bach kar rahna chahiye
05 bhukamp kyo aate hain why earthquake
why earthquake comes knowledge in hindi
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge bhukamp kyo aate hain
general knowledge a a print email pichle 15 dino ke ander nepal , china aur north india mein bhookamp ke jhatke mahsoos kiye gye
darasla bhookamp ke is theory ko english mein plates tectonics aur hindi mein plates vivartniki kahte hain
is theory ke anusaar prithvi ki upari parat lag bhag 80 se 100 kilometer hoti hain
jise sthal mandal kahte hain
kyon aata hain bhookamp bhukamp earthquake dharti ki plates ke aapas mein takrane se
puri dharti 22 tectonics plates par stith hain
plates stah se kitni neeche hoti hain
indian plate himalaya se lekar antarctica tak faili hain
jabki eurasian plate himalaya ke north mein hain
indian plate north east disha mein aur eurasian plate jisme china aadi desh aate hain , aur indian plate dheere dheere eurasian plates ki aor badh rahi hain
bhookamp ke khatre ke hisaab se bharat ko 4 zone mein divide kiya gya hain
zone 2 jo ki south india hain jo ki sabse kam khatre wala area hain
zone 3 central india , zone 4 new delhi samet pura north india , zone 5 himalayan area aur north east aur kachh
zone 5 sabse jyada khatre wala area hain
yeh technique available hain
nahi , bhukamp engineering ki study bahut kam hoti hain
lekin training se manpower taiyaar ho sakti hain
retrofitting kitni mahngi hain
retrofitting clinic kya hain
ek aise center hain , jaha bhawano ki jaanch karne wale aur retrofitting experts mauzood hote hain
05 anar khane ke fayde benefits of
anar khane ke fayde benefits of pomegranate hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips anar khane ke fayde benefits of pomegranate 1 health tips a a print email ek anar sau bimar yeh kahawat to aapne suni hogi
isme vitamin a , c aur e ke saath folic acid bhi hota hain
isme anti oxidants aur anti viral tatv hote hain
anar mein anti oxidant hone ki wajah se free radicals suraj ki roshini se aur pollution se hone wale radicals se bachata hain
anar mein anti oxidants kafi hone ke karan yeh kharab cholesterol ko shuruvati avastha mein hi rok deta hain
anar ka juice adhik umar mein hone wale alzheimer bimari se bachata hain
anar skin ke liye bahut hi accha hota hain , yeh skin ko mulayam aur glowing banata hain
yeh pregnant woman ke liye bhi bahut badhiya hota hain
ise khane se baby healthy paida hota hain
anar ke sewan se protest ka cancer hone ki sambhavna kam ho jati hain

05 seafood khane ke fayde benefits of sea
seafood khane ke fayde benefits of sea food in hindi urdu

health tips a a print email agar aap non vegetarianhain toh aapko sea food yani ki samundarikhadya padarth jaroor hipasand honge
lekin kya aap in sea food ke paushtikguno ke bare mein jante hain
aaj hum aapko seafood khane ke fayde batayenge benefitsofsea food in hindi urdu
dimaag ke liye sea food ko brain food bhi kaha jata hain
saath hi sea food khane se budhape mein alzheimerki problem nahi hogi
protein ka good source protein ka high source chicken aur meat hote hain , lekin machhali bhi kuch kam nahi hain
yeh blood pressure , tavcha ki dekhbhaal aur aankho ki roshini badhati hain
pregnancy mein pregnancy mein omega 3 fatty acid ko bahut faydemandmana gya hain
garbvati aurato ko pregnancy ke teesre mahine se paki huyi machhali ka sewan karna chahiye
muscles ke liye workout karne ke baad musclesko protein ki khas jaroorat hoti hain
iske liye aap fish try kar sakte hain
omega 3 fatty acid sharir keliye omega 3 fatty acidbahut jaroori hain , kyonki yeh sharir par jald budhapa nahi aane deta hain
seafood ko khane se khoon mein triglyceride level kam hota hain

health tips a a print email hume apni rasoi mein aisi cheezo ko jaroor hamesha rakhna chahiye , jo sehat ke liye faydemand hoti hain
lekin hamare traditional food aur masale inse kanhi zyada healthy aur tasty hote hain
elaichi khushboo se bharielaichi na sirf hamare khane ko tasty banati hain , balki isme mauzood essentialoil hamare digestive system ko sudhaarne mein madad karta hain
yeh quercetin naam ke anti oxidant se bharpoorhoti hain , jo aapki physical capacity ko increase karta hain
ghee aaj kal ke zamane mein olive oil ko sabse healthy mana jata hain
gaay ke shuddh deshi ghee mein cla conjugated linoleic acid hota hain
adrak adrak wali chai peene se mood accha hota hain
saath hi iske anti inflammatory tatv muscles ko repair karne mein bhi madad karte hain
adrak ki chai metabolism rate ko increase karne mein madad karti hain , isse sharir chust aur durust bana rahta hain
imli khatti imli anti bacterial guno se bharpoor hoti hain
iska powder regularly lene se cholesterol ka level normal bana rahta hain
yeh kidney stone ko banne se bhi rokta hain
yeh brain memory power ko badhane ke liye kafi madadgar hota hain
triphala yeh human body ke bahut saare defects ko door karne mein madad karta hain
triphala ka sewan jaroor karna chahiye

general knowledge a a print email agar aap civil services exam upsc ias ki taiyaari kar rahe hain toh exam clear karne ke liye aapko kisi coaching ki jaroorat nahi hain
iske liye aap chahe toh self assessment se bhi exam clear kar sakte hain
aisa dekhte huye kuch questions ko solve karne ki practise kare
regularly newspaper padhe candidatesko exam mein success paane ke liye acche se rojana 2 3 newspaper ko padhna chahiye
akhbaar se desh duniya , sports , cinema jagat ki jankari to milti hi hain , saath hi editor s choice se zyadatar subjects ke bare mein vistaar se pata chalta hain
notes ki help le topics ki acche tarikese padhai karne ke liye jaroori hain aap usse related notes banaye
notes ki help se aap syllabus ko ek nazar mein revised kar sakte hain
isliye ghatnao ko analysis karne ki aadat dale
iconology , environments , arts aur culture par karna hoga focus candidates ko iconology , environments , arts aur culture par focus karna hoga
in sabhi topicski acchese taiyaari karni hogi , khas karke inki study ke liye aise notesbanaye , jinme subject ke bare mein full details ke saath samjhayagya ho
apnebasicclearrakhe candidates ko badle huye pattern ke saath apne basic clear karnehonge

ncert ki books jaroor padhe civil services exam ki taiyaari kar rahe students ko ncertki books jaroor padhni chahiye
aap in kitaabo ki short notes bhi bana sakte hain
sahi books ka chayan kare ; kai saari books padhneseaccha hain ki ek aise quality ki kitaabpadhe , jisse aapke basicconcepts clear ho jaye

09 omega 3 fatty acid ke fayde benefits of
omega 3 fatty acid ke fayde benefits of omega 3 fatty acid hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips omega 3 fatty acid ke fayde benefits of omega 3 fatty acid 1 health tips a a print email omega 3 sharir ke liye kyun jaroori hota hain
omega 3 fatty acid ke kya fayde hain
vaise to omega 3 fatty acids body ki kai activities ke liye bahut hi jaroori hota hain
aaiye jante hain omega 3 fatty acid ke fayde ke baare mein ; hamari sehat ko balance rakhne mein omega 3 fatty acids ka bahut hi ahem role hain
darasal , omega 3 fatty acids essential polyunsaturated fatty acids kahlate hain , kyonki inka production body ke jariye nahi kiya jata
hame inhe supplements ya bhojan ke jariye hi lena padta hain
essential fatty acids heart , muscles , brain aur immune system ko sahi process mein kaam karne mein madad karte hain
ala vegetarian based omega 3 fatty acids hain , jo vegetarians ke liye jaroori hain
omega 3 fatty acid ke fayde 1 baalo ko de strength agar aap sochte hain ki baalo ko healthy rakhne ke liye shampoo aur conditioner hi kafi hain , to aap galat hain
darasal baalo ko strong banane ke liye bhi omega 3 fatty acid bahut hi jaroori hota hain
omega 3 mein alpha linolenic acid ala , eicosapentaenoic acid epa aur docosahexaenoic acid dha paya jata hain
yeh 3 magic acids baalo ki dryness ko khatm karne , girne se rokne , shining dene aur blood circulation ko theek rakhne ka kaam karte hain
pregnancy time baccha na ho pane ya pahle hone , jaisi dikkato se omega 3 fatty acids diet behad kaam aati hain
yahi nahi isse conceive possibility bhi behad badh jati hain
pregnancy ke dauran maa ki diet mein li gyi cheeze bacche ki body , brain development aur is dauran aane wali problems se bachata hain
pregnant lady ko foetal neurological system ke sahi vikas ke liye omega 3 acid lene ki salah di jati hain
aamtaur par omega 3 fatty acids machhali fish mein paya jata hain , jo bacche ke cardiovascular system , brain aur aankho ke liye bahut hi faydemand hota hain
periods ke dard mein doctors ka kahna hain ki mahilaon mein periods aur menopause ke dauraan hone wale dard ki ek ahem wajah body mein omega 3 fatty acid ki quantity ka kam hona hain
doodh badhane mein bacche ke janm ke baad doodh ki quantity badhane ke liye omega 3 fatty acids wali diet khoob kaam aati hain
researches se yeh pata chala hain ki pregnant mahilaon ko epa aur dha ko apni diet mein shamil karne se bacche ke visual cognitive vikas par positive effect padta hain
omega 3 fatty acid ki sahi quantity bacche mein allergy ke risk ko kam kar sakti hain
cancer se bachaye omega 3 fatty acids ki sahi khuraak tumor hone ke process ko bhi slow kar deta hain
khastaur par breast aur intestine ke cancer mein
ala based omega 3 mein natural anti inflammatory agent hain , jo cancer hone ke process ko 53 kam kar deta hain
heart problem ala based omega 3 fatty acids heart ko healthy rakhne , heart rate ko kam karne aur heart attack padne ke khatre ko kafi kam kar deti hain
omega 3 fatty acid heart ke liye faydemand hain
oil wali fishes jaise salmon mackerel aur sardines mein 2 tarah ke omega 3 fatty acids dha aur epa hota hain , jo blood fats ko kam karta hain aur heart beat ko control mein rakhta hain
osteoporosis aam taur par calcium ki kami ki wajah se mahilaon ko is problem se joojhna padta hain
ala base omega 3 fatty acid ki sahi quantity osteoporosis se bachane ke saath hi bones ke banane mein bhi madad karti hain aur periods ke dauran hone wale bone pain se bhi bachati hain
omega 3 fatty acid kin kin cheezo se hame milta hain
omega 3 fatty acid ke liye hum kya khaye aur iski diet kya hain
canola oil , rapeseed , raai , sarso , soyabean oil , sun , patson , alsi ke beej aur tel , kaddu ke beej aur iske beejo ka tel
perilla seed oil , akhrot aur uska tel , sunflower oil surajmukhi ka tel , makki ka tel

acidity kare door yadi aapko acidity ki samsya hain to roj 1 glass jal zira dheere dheere piye
yeh upay tab tak kare jab tak acidity kam na ho jaye
gas door kare jal jeera peene se gas door hoti hain aur pet halka mahsoos hone lagta hain
06 aam ke patte ke fayde benefits of mango
benefits of mango leaves in hindi urdu
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips aam ke patte ke fayde
benefits of mango leafs in hindi urdu
lekin in patto se bane ark ka istemal diabetes aur asthma jaisi bimarise bachne ke liye bhi kiya ja sakta hain
isme zyada quantity meincaffeic acid jaise phenolic , mangiferin jaisepolyphenols , gallic acid , flavonoids aur kai temporary compound components paye jate hain
yeh sabhi gun aam ke patto ko ek accha antibiotic , anti oxidants aur anti allergic natural banata hain
cholesterol ko control kare aam ke patto mein fiber , pectin aur vitamin c paya jata hain , jo aapke bad cholesterol ke level ko kam karne mein madad karte hain
iskealawa aam mein mauzood flavonoid lipid level ko kam karke dhamaniyo ko majboot aur healthy banata hain
kidney aur liver ke liye faydemand unbalance blood sugar level ki wajah se yeh problem pahle hoti hain
aam ka sewan is problem se bachne mein kafi help karta hain
aam ki pattiyo se kidney stone ko bhi door kiya ja sakta hain aur yeh kidney ko healthy rakhne mein bhi madad karti hain
diabetes ke liye faydemand aam ke patto mein anti diabetic gun paye jate hain jo blood sugar level ko control karne mein madad karta hain
aam ke patto se nikalne wala ark insulin ke production ko badhata hain aur blood sugar level ko kam karta hain
infection se bachaye aam ke patto mein paya jane wala anti bacterial property pet se related har problems nijat dilate hain
isse aapka bloodsugar level control mein rahta hain aur diabetes ki bimari door hoti hain

health tips a a print email garmiyo mein aam khana sabhi ko accha lagta hain
jaise ki cancer , tension , heart disease , arthritis , motapa aadi se nijat milta hain
aam mein zyada matra mein amino acid , vitamin a , c aur e , niacin , iron , calcium , beta carotene aur potassium jaise tatv paye jate hain
aam khane se hone wale fayde benefits of eating mango in hindi urdu
aam mein citric acid paya jata hain jo aapki body ki immunity ko badha kar kidney ki bimari , motapa aadi bimariyo se bachata hain
isme glutamine acid paya jata hain jo yaaddasht badhane ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
kyonki isme potassium hone ki wajah se yeh high blood pressure ko low karne ki capacity rakhta hain
aam se sewan karne se aapko pachan se related bimariyo se bhi nijaat mil jati hain , kyonki isme prayapt matra mein fiber paye jate hain
aam mein anti oxidants , vitamin c aur fiber adhik matra mein paya jata hain jo cancer jaisi gambhir bimariyo se hame bachata hain
05 online in tariko ka istemal karte hain
online in tariko ka istemal karte hain hackers
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home tech tips online in tariko ka istemal karte hain hackers
tech tips a a print email smartphones aur pc ka upyog kai karano se hota hain
jinme mukhya hain , social website ka prayog , e shopping aur net surfing
ek nazar aise hi tariko par daale , taki na hona pade online fraudness ka shikar attractive ads kai baar kisi website ko kholne par aise ads dikhai deti hain , jo users ko attract karti hain
kai baar hackers adult photos aadi ke roop mein ads dete hain
jinhe click karne par aapke pc ya smartphone par virus aa jata hain
jyadatar hackers porn aur adult material ka upyog ya free mein paid software aadi ka lalach dikha kar aapke pc ya smartphone mein malware install kar dete hain
third party apps internet istemal karte samay third party apps se savdhaan rahna chahiye
kai baar smartphone aur tablets par third party apps ke install se private jankari hackers tak pahuch jati hain aur dhokha dhari hone ke chance ban jate hain
isliye apps ko install karte waqt smartphone ke app storage ka istemal kare
virtual keyboard bank ya phir payment karne vali adhiktar sites par virtual keyboard ka option hota hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge smartphone tech tips mobile ke liye processor kya kaam karta hain
general knowledge , smartphone , tech tips a a print email mobile ke liye processor kya hain
mobile phone hi nahi , balki ab unke buyers bhi smart ho rahe hain
phone ab bas camera , operating system ya screen size dekh kar nahi khareeda jata , micro processor kaisa hain , kitne core ka hain , uski speed kya hain , jaise swaal log puchne lage hain
processor jitna tez hoga , utni tez hi multitasking , gaming , photo aur video edit honge
ise central processing unit yani cpu kahte hain jo ek electronic circuit hota hain
inki performance ko clock rate ki speed se napa jata hain , yani koi performance per second se cycle se ki gyi , yeh hertz hz , kilohertz khz , megahertz mhz , gigahertz ghz , aur terahertz thz ke scale par naape jate hain
ghz tak ke processor mobile phone mein mil rahe hain
core ki kahani iphone 4 tak hum single core processor hi dekhte thay , yani ek hi processor core unit hoti thi
inki speed mein koi shak nahi tha , lekin jis tarah phone par jyada se jyada multi tasking features aa rahe hain , ab 8 core wale processor tak ban rahe hain
dual core processor ko samajh lijiye ki veh 2 dimaag wala processor hain , jisme 2 cpu core ko ek processor mein rakha gya hain
cpu ka size toh companies ek limit tak hi badha sakti hain , kyonki inke aage heating jaise masle aa sakte hain , lekin usay ek se jyada core dekar performance next level tak le ja sakti hain
dual core ke baad hame quad core 4 , hexa core 6 aur octa core 8 processor dekhne ko milte hain
ab toh quad core bhi aam feature hota ja raha hain
core ki karigri jyada core hone se smartphone ki performance kaise sudharti hain , ise samjhne ke liye ek dual core processor ka example lete hain
example ke taur par aap travel kar rahe hain aur smartphone ke navigation aur music , dono features ka istemal kar rahe hain
aise mein operating system navigation ka kaam ek cpu ko aur music streaming ka kaam dusre cpu ko de sakta hain
yani ki ek ek task dono ke beech bant divide ho jata hain
isse dono core apni puri speed mein jaaye bina task pura kar sakte hain
jyada core hone ke fayde 1 jyada tez gaming jab aap koi speed ya action game khelte hain jo multi core processor ise smooth banata hain
gaming console ki takkar ka experience ap mobile mein multi core processor se aaya hain
multi tasking ek saath kai features par kaam karne ke liye phone ki speed acchi honi chahiye
mutli tab internet surfing , multi window , popup video jaise feature bina multi core processor ke soche bhi nahi ja sakte hain
full hd video multi core processor se aapko phone ki screen par 1080 pixels tak ka video record ya play milta hain
ab toh ultra hd playback ko handle karne ki capacity wale mobile processor aa chuke hain
big screen par log behtar video playback chahte hain
isi tarah mobile phone mein jyada damdaar hote camera ko bhi processor se accha support milta hain
battery life screen badi ho rahi hain , chamak badh rahi hain , lekin battery ki apni kuch limitation hain
isliye dosto single core bole toh 1 dimaag wala processor , dual core bole toh 2 dimaag wala processor , quad code bole toh 4 dimaag wala processor , hexa core bole toh 6 dimaag wala processor aur octa core bole toh 8 dimaag wala processor hain
toh dekha aapne dual core , quad core , hexa core , octa core in sabhi mein kya antar ya difference hain
07 gudhal ke phool ke fayde benefits of
gudhal ke phool ke fayde benefits of hibiscus flower hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips gudhal ke phool ke fayde benefits of hibiscus flower 0 health tips a a print email gudhal ek khoobsurat phoolo wala paudha hain , ise gurhal , jabakususm , japakusum , arhul aadi bhi kaha jata hain , is ke bade hi fayde hain
yeh aam taur par tropical aur garm shetro mein paya jata hain
mazedaar baat yeh hain ki yeh gudhal ka phool , south korea , malaysia aur hatay state ka national flower rashtriya phool hain
gudhal ki sukhi patti ka istemal mexican jaise kai foods ko sajane ke liye bhi kiya jata hain
kai researches ke jariya yeh baat scientifically proof ho chuki hain ki gurhal ki patti mein aushadhiy gun paye jate hain
saath hi gudhal anti oxidant guno se bharpoor hota hain aur iska istemal anti aging ke roop mein kiya jata hain
hair conditioner gudhal ki patti aur iske phool ki pankhoodi se bana paste natural hair conditioner ka kaam karta hain
skin care apne khas guno ke karan gudhal ka istemal cosmetic skin care mein kiya jata hain
traditional chinese medicines mein gudhal ki patti ka istemal anti solar agent ke roop mein kiya jata hain , kyonki yeh ultra violet rays ko sokh leta hain
blood pressure kam kare research mein yeh pata chala hain ki gudhal ki patti se bani chaay ko peene se blood pressure ki problem se nijat milti hain
saath hi yeh cancer ke shuruvati steps mein kafi kargar hota hain
isme paye jane wale tatv artie mein plague ko jamne se rokte hain , jisse cholesterol ka level kam hota hain
regular periods cycle gudhal ki patti se bani chaay ke niyamit sewan se mahilaon ke sharir mein estrogen ka level kam hota hain
isse sharir mein hormone ka balance bana rahta hain
yehi wajah hain ki periods ke dauran koi dikkat nahi aati hain
anti aging gudhal mein kai tarah ke anti oxidants paye jate hain
yeh sharir mein mauzood free radicals ko hatata hain , jisse umar badhne ki prakriya dheemi ho jati hain aur budhapa jaldi nahi aata hain
yeh 6 cheeze khane se door ho sakti hain rusi dandruff hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips yeh 6 cheeze khane se door ho sakti hain rusi dandruff 0 health tips a a print email rusi dandruff ki samsya bahut hi aam hain
isme carbohydrate , protein , nami , chikanaai , iron aur vitamins hote hain
chane mein vitamin b6 aur zinc hota hain
jiske karan iske niyamit sewan se dandruff khatm ho jata hain
lahsun isme paye jane vale tatvo mein allicin bhi ek tatv hain , jise great anti bacterial , anti fungal aur anti oxidant ke roop mein jana jata hain
lahsun mein high constriction mein allicin acid paya jata hain , jo ek natural anti fungal hain
dandruff door ho jayegi
isme zinc aur vitamin b6 hota hain
iske beej pachan ko darust kar sharir mein metabolism ko theek karte hain , aur infection se paida hone wali dandruff ko door karte hain
ismein bahut saara vitamin b6 aur zinc paya jata hain
seb apple seb reshe wala phal hain , isliye isme fiber acchi matra mein paya jata hain
yeh ek accha anti oxidant bhi hain
seb sharir mein glucose ki matra ko normal karta hain
kela mein vitamin aur minerals jaise zinc , potassium aur iron hote hain
iske alawa isme amino acid aur anti oxidant bhi hote hain
fast food jaise pizza , burger , aadi ko kam khaye
chocolate ko avoid karna chahiye

health tips a a print email garmiyon mein kheera khana sehat ke liye bahut hi faydemand mana jata hain
ismein vitamin a , b1 , b6 , d , potassium , phosphorus , iron aadi paye jate hain
kheera pani ka bahut hi badhiya source hain
kheere mein erepsin enzyme hota hain , jo protein ke pachan mein madadgar hota hain
gas , acidity , chhati mein jalan jaisi samsyaon mein niyamit roop se kheera khana faydemand hota hain
kheera mein vitamin b , sugar aur electrolights mauzood hote hain
kheere ke karan sharir mein uric acid ka level control mein rahta hain , jisse gurde kidney apne sahi aakaar mein rahte hain
kheere mein silicon aur sulfur mauzood hota hain
isse uric acid ka level bhi kam hota hain
diabetes aur blood pressure mein kheera khana bahut hi faydemand hota hain
kheere ka ras pancreas ko active karta hain
pancreas ke active ho jane par insulin banta hain
jisse diabetes control mein rahti hain

health tips , tech tips a a print email doodh na kewal calcium ka source hain , balki isme lactic acid bhi hota hain , jo skin ko soft banata hain
is dauran bacche ko gaay ka doodh cow's milk pilane ki salah di jati hain
american academy of pediatrics is age ke baccho ko rojana 3 se 4 cup doodh peene ki salah deti hain
aise mein american department of agriculture ke mutabik 2 3 ke baccho ko 4 cup aur 4 8 saal ke baccho ko kam se kam 5 cup doodh rojana de
dinner ke 3 hours ke baad piye doodh ayurveda ke anusaar dinner karne ke 3 ghante baad hi doodh le , taki stomach puri tarah se khali ho
isse blood pressure , dil ke rog aur tension se bhi rahat milti hain
milk se kitni energy milti hain full cream milk 150 calorie toned milk 120 calorie double toned milk 100 calorie skimmed toned milk 80 calorie doodh ko baar baar na ubaale ; doodh ko baar baar na ubale , aisa karne se vitamin aur poshak tatvo ki kami aa jati hain
04 pimples ko control karne ki tips
pimples ko control karne ki tips
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips pimples ko control karne ki tips
health tips a a print email pimple yani ki muhase ek common problem hain
aise mein in pimples ko control karne ke liye aapko neeche bataye tips ko follow karna chahiye
yeh healthy diet skin se nikalne wale oil level ko normal banati hain , healthy diet aur sahi khan pan aapke skin ki immunity ko boost kar dete hain , jisse bacteria aadi paida nahi hote hain
drink more water paani hamare sharir ke liye bahut hi jaroori tatv hain
yeh hamare body ke liquid electrolyte ka balance bana kar rakhta hain
jo ki khaye gye food se nutrients ko sokhne mein madad karta hain
choose healthy lifestyle aap apni rojmarra ki zindagi mein ek acchi healthy lifestyle ko apnaye
daily exercise , yoga , meditation , pranayam aadi kar ke stress , depression aur tension ko door bhagaye aur aapko acchi neend leni bhi bahut hi jaroori hain
avoid junk food junk food yani ki fast food vaise bhi hamare sehat ke liye acche nahi mane jate hain
junk food mein nutrients ki matra kafi kam hoti hain aur isme calorie kafi jyada matra mein payi jati hain
jab aap junk food khate hain toh hamari body oon zehreele tatv ko hajam nahi kar paati hain , jo in junk food mein paye jate hain
eat sprouts ankoorit anaaz mein bahut hi acchi matra mein protein aur fiber hota hain
vegaterian protein asaani se pach jata hain aur acne ko bhi control karta hain
eat fresh vegetables fruits pimples ko control karne ke liye apni diet mein khoob saari fresh hari sabziya aur taaze phal ko jaroor shamil kare
in fresh fruits aur vegetables mein bahut hi acchi matra mein vitamins aur minerals hota hain jo skin ko chamakdaar aur healthy banate hain
research se pata chala hain ki vitamin a aur zinc hamare sharir mein bahut bada role play karte hain
kabz ko door karne ke liye aap apni diet mein fiber wale food ko shamil kare
07 kinnoo khane ke fayde benefits of kinnow
kinnoo khane ke fayde benefits of kinnow hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips kinnoo khane ke fayde benefits of kinnow 0 health tips a a print email kafi hud tak santre ke jaise dikhne wala kinnoo ka swaad santre orange ke jaisa hi hota hain
isme minerals , iron , lime , phosphorus , vitamin c aur vitamin b complex bharpoor matra mein paye jate hain
khane mein jaroorat se jyada minerals aur chemicals se kidney mein stone ki problem ho jati hain
lekin kinnoo mein mauzood citrate urine acidity ko rokta hain , jo kidney stone hone ki ahem wajah mani jati hain
isliye kidney stone ki samsya se joojh rahe rogiyo ko kinnu khane ki salah di jati hain
thakaavat mahsoos nahi hoti , kyonki isme bharpoor matra mein carbohydrate paya jata hain
iske alawa isme mauzood glucose , fructose aur sucrose ki matra bhi energy ko badhane mein madadgar hoti hain
blood pressure control karta hain kinnoo high aur low , dono tarah ke blood pressure wale rogiyo ke liye faydemand hota hain , kyonki isme mauzood magnesium blood pressure ko control karta hain
pachan sahi rakhta hain ; isme mauzood fibers digestion ko sahi rakhta hain
saath hi , yeh blood sugar level ko control karta hain
kai tarah ke chemicals jo cancer hone ka karan hote hain , unse bhi yeh bachata hain
dil ki bimari kinnoo mein paye jane wala vitamin c , fiber , potassium aur colline dil ko healthy rakhta hain
potassium ki matra blood pressure ko control karti hain aur fructose aur dextrose jaise minerals energy dene ke saath hi dil aur dimaag dono ko fresh rakhte hain
cancer se kare bachav kinnoo mein anti oxidants ke saath limonene bhi hota hain , jo cells ki raksha karta aur aisi koshikaon ko banne se rokta hain jo cancer ka karan hoti hain
iske rojana sewan se pet , mooh , fefde , skin se related cancer se bacha ja sakta hain
saath hi , isse body ke liye jaroori thiamin , niacin , vitamin b6 , magnesium aur copper ki bhi supply hoti hain
tavcha nikharta hain vitamin c anti aging ki tarah kaam karta hain

health tips a a print email kya aap bhi apne brain memory ko boost karna chahte hain
dimaag ko tez banane wale 5 useful foods herbs 1 brahmi brahmi brain ko fast aur sharp banane wali best herb ke taur par jani jati hain
iske regularly istemal se brain memory yani ki yaddasht badhti hain
shankh pushpi brain ko sharp banane ke liye shankh pushpi sabse behtrin medicine hain , yeh dimaag ko healthy rakhne mein bhi help karti hain
dimaag ko tez karne ke liye spoon shankh pushpi ko 1 cup warm water ke saath rojana piye
yeh brain mein blood circulation ko sahi banati hain , jisse yaad karne ki power aur learning ability mein badhotari hoti hain
tulsi tulsi ko antibiotic mana gya hain
isme powerful antioxidant paye jate hain jo brain aur heart mein blood flow ko behtar banate hain
isliye tulsi ko dimaag ke liye ek best medicine ke taur par bhi jana jata hain
california university ke researchers ke mutabik haldi mein curcumin naam ka chemical paya jata hain jo brain ke dead ya inactive cells ko activate karne mein help karta hain

microsoft edge ab windows ka naya browser hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home microsoft tech news microsoft edge ab windows ka naya browser 0 microsoft , tech news a a print email internet explorer ko alvida kahne ka waqt ab aa gya hain

ab tak ise project spartan kaha ja raha tha , lekin ab ise microsoft edge ke naam se jana jayega
