06 janiye nicotine replacement therapy ke
janiye nicotine replacement therapy ke bare mein
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips janiye nicotine replacement therapy ke bare mein
general knowledge , health tips a a print email tobacco mein nicotine hota hain
lagatar tobacco ka istemal karne se hamare body ke kuch parts sensitive ho jatehain jis wajah se tambaku ya cigarette chhodna bahut mushkil ho jata hain
isko chhudane ke liye nicotine replacement therapy ka istemal kiya jata hain
tobacco ya cigarette ke alawa aur kisi tarike se body mein nicotine pahuchane ko nicotine replacement tharepy nrt kaha jata hain
iske liye nicotine ke chewing gum , spray , inhaler , patch aadi diye jate hain , lekin in sabme sabse asaan tarika hain chewing gum chabana
nrt ko w
ne approve kiya hain
isse nicotine dheere dheere nikalta hain aur nicotine ki talab kam ho jati hain
in nrt chewing gum mein kam matraa mein nicotine hota hain aur dhuyein mein paye jane wale toxins isme nahi hote hain
nrt chewing gum ka aim saaf hain , yeh dheere dheere nicotine ki matrako kam karke nicotine ki latt ko door karna hain
isme nicotine ki matra kam hoti hain , isliye tobacco ya cigarette chhodne ke baad iski latt lagne ke chances kafi kam hote hain
nicotine therapy se tobacco ki latt aur smoking chhodne ke chances 50 se 70 tak hote hain
hafte baad sharir ko nicotine ki jaroorat nahi lagegi
khas karke diabetes patient , bp ke mareez , cholesterol patient , pregnant woman ya doodh pilane wali maao ko nrt shuru karne se pahle doctor se salah jaroor le
garmiyo mein kya khaye aur kya na khaye diet in summer hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips garmiyo mein kya khaye aur kya na khaye diet in summer 0 health tips a a print email garmiyo mein sabse badi chunauti hain , khud ko is bhayankar garmi se bachaye rakhne ki
kabz , apach , vomiting is mausam mein aam baat hoti hain
lunch aur dinner lunch mein is mausam mein available sabziyo ke saath moong ki dal aur chapati li ja sakti hain
bazaar mein chiwda , poha samet bahut se oil free options mauzood hain , unhe nashte ke liye istemal mein laya ja sakta hain
seb , santra , mosambi , malta vitamin c se bharpoor hain , jo sharir ki immunity ko badhane ke saath hi anti aging ki problem se bhi door rakhte hain
oil free bhojan breakfast mein parathe aadi se parhez kare
uski jagah poha , dhokla , idli , upma , oats , cornflakes , veg sandwich khana ek accha option hain
bharpoor liquid le paani rojana 10 15 glass paani healthy rahne ke liye bahut hi jaroori hain
protein aur potassium ka accha source hain
ulcer mein bhi kargar hain
desi ghee , vanaspati ghee , refined oil , sarso ka tel , olive oil garm hote hain
junk food burger , pizza , tandoori chicken jaise junk food ko garmiyo mein bye kahna hi behtar hain
inse body de hydrate hoti hain
green tea peena behtar hain
unme bacteria ke panpane ka khatra jyada hota hain
09 makkhan khane ke fayde benefits of
makkhan khane ke fayde benefits of butter hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips makkhan khane ke fayde benefits of butter 1 health tips a a print email makkhan butter khane se kya fayde hote hain
butter makhan , makkhan ke health benefits kya hain
kai logo ka manana hain ki butter mein calories kafi jyada hoti hain aur agar regular bread butter khaya jaye to isse wajan badhne ka khatra kafi jyada badh jata hain
peele butter ki tulna mein safed butter mein calories kam hoti hain
jin logo ko liver se related problems hoti hain , unke liye butter mein bana khana pachne wala hota hain
ghar mein bana makkhan yellow butter se jyada paushtik hota hain
infertility prajanan badhaye infertility prajanan kshamta badhane ke liye makkhan bahut hi labhkarak mana gya hain
darasal makkhan mein mauzood fatty acid coagulated linoleic cancer se bachaav karne mein madad karta hain
osteoporosis vitamins , minerals aur calcium se bharpoor makkhan aapki haddiyo ko majboot bana kar osteoporosis jaisi problems se nijat dilata hain
thyroids ke liye accha isme khoob sara vitamin a hota hain jo thyroid granthi ke kaam kaaj ke liye accha hota hain
makkhan mein iodine bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain jo thyroids ke mareezo ke liye faydemand hota hain
heart problems mein faydemand medical research of counseling ke ek research mein yeh baat samne aayi hain ki jo log kuch matra mein butter ko apni diet mein shamil karte hain , unhe dil ki bimari ka khatra kam hota hain
skin glow kare ; butter chehre ko komal banata hain
cocoa butter ya shia butter chehre par lagane se chehre par nikhaar aa jata hain
vitamin d ka accha source hamare sharir mein calcium sokhne ke liye vitamin d ki jaroorat hoti hain
anti oxidants se bharpoor ; antioxidants se bharpoor makkhan cancer ya tumor se aapki raksha karne ke saath hi aapki skin ki free radicals se bhi bachata hain
yeh skin ke liye bahut hi faydemand hain , tabhi to shia butter anti aging creams ke liye istemal kiya jata hain
iski massage se skin mein chamak aa jati hain
06 black tea peene ke fayde benefits of
black tea peene ke fayde
benefits of black tea in hindi urdu
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips black tea peene ke fayde
general knowledge , health tips a a print email hum sabhi logo ko chai peena bahut accha lagta hain
black tea peene ke fayde bahut zyada hote hain
benefits ofblack tea in hindi urdu
antioxidants se bharpoor black tea mein polyphenols paye jate hain , yeh antioxidants dna mein tobacco ya phir dusre zehreele chemicals se hone wale nuksan ko kam karne mein madad karte hain
yeh anti oxidants vegetables aur fruits mein paye jane wale antioxidants se different hote hain
isliye black tea ko jaroor pijiye aur healthy rahiye
energy level badhati hain is chaay mein paya jane wala theophylline component kidney , heart aur fefdo ko active banaye rakhta hain
is tarah ke compound heart ko healthy banaye rakhne mein madadgar hote hain
oral health banaye rakhe black tea mein catechin antioxidant paya jata hain , jo mooh ke cancer hone ke khatre ko kam karta hain
black tea mein paye jane wale fluorides saanso ki badboo se ladte hain aur mooh mein cavity paida karne wale bacteria ko bhi khatm karte hain
cholesterol level kam kare black tea triglyceride ke level ko kam karti hain
isse kharab cholesterol ldl ka level kam hota hain , jis wajah se dil se related bimariya hone ka khatra kam ho jata hain
brain aur nervous system ke liye faydemand agar koi aadmi ek mahine tak din mein 2 baar black tea rojana piye to cortisol hormone kamhota hain jisse tension ke level ko kam karne mein madad milti hain
caffeine brain memory aur alertness ko badhane mein madad karta hain
diabetes ka khatra kam kare ek search mein yeh paya gya ki jo log daily 1 ya 2 cup black tea peetehain , unme type 2 diabetes hone ka khatra 70 tak kam ho jata hain
agar aapko shuruvaati diabetes hone ki problem hain to black tea peene se usay doorkiya ja sakta hain
cancer se bachaye jo log smoking ya phir dusretobacco products ka istemal karte hain , black tea unhe mooh mein hone wale cancer se bachati hain
black tea mein paye janewale compound tumours ko badhne aur paida hone se rokte hain
haddiyo aur tissues ke liye faydemand black tea mein powerful phytochemical hote hain jo haddiyo aur tissues ko strong banane mein madadgar hote hain
research se yeh saabit ho chuka hain ki black tea mein paya jane wala amino acid l theanine aapko aaram pahuchata hain aur aapki concentration ko bhi badhaata hain
black tea ko regularly aur balanced quantity mein peene se cortisol hormoneke level mein giraavat aati hain , jisse tension se aapko rahat milti hain
wajan ghatane mein useful black tea mein fat , calorie aur sodium kam quantity mein hote hain
isme calorie nahi hoti hain
isse metabolism rate badhtahain , jisse weight loss karne mein madad miltihain
hajma durust banaye black tea mein paye jane wala tannin digestion mein faydemand hota hain
black tea peene se diarrhoea ko bhi door kiya ja sakta hain
black tea mein paye jane wale polyphenols aanto ki sujan ko kam karte hain
aanto mein sujan hone ki wajah se irritable bowel syndrome ki bimari hoti hain
happiness provide karti hain black tea mein mauzood tatv aapko khushi dete hain
ek cup black tea peene se aapka saara tension doorho jata hain
ek cup black tea peena maano aapke liye vardaan ki tarah hain
dil ko sehatmand banaye rakhe ; ek research se pata chala ki din mein 2 cup black tea peene wale logo mein stroke hone ka khatra 21 kam hota hain
isme flavonoid antioxidants hote hain jo ldl cholesterol ko oxidised hone se rokta hain
immune system majboot banaye black tea mein paye jane wale tatv body ki immunity ko majboot banate hain
black tea kali chai kaise banaye
cold black tea cold black tea aapka natural cold drink ban sakta hain
lijiye taiyaar hain aapki natural cold drink
yeh sehat ke liye bahut hi acchi hain aur ise peene se cold drink soft drink ki tarah koi nuksaan bhi nahi hota hain

periods ke dauran kya khaye what to eat in menstruation hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips periods ke dauran kya khaye what to eat in menstruation 0 health tips a a print email aaj ki post mein hum janenge ki periods masik dharm ke dauran kya khana chahiye aur kya nahi khana chahiye aapki diet kaisi honi chahiye
aaiye ham aapko masik dharm aahar periods diet ke baare mein batate hain , jo periods ke dauran aapko energetic banaye rakhenge
complex carbohydrate ka kare sewan aap apne masik dharm mein phal , sabzi aur whole food jaise complex carbohydrate ko shamil kare
dark chocolate apne diet mein periods ke dauran chocolate ko shamil karna sabse badhiya time hain
isme mauzood anti oxidant serotonin ko badhata hain , jisse mood behtar hota hain
vitamin e aapko pms syndrome se chhutkara dilane mein madad karta hain
vitamin e ke liye aap avocado fruit aur ande ki jardi kha sakti hain
vahi vitamin b6 clotting ko kam karne mein madad karta hain
vitamin c prajanan tantr ko behtar banata hain
vahi vitamin b6 ke liye apne diet mein aaloo ko shamil kare

jaroori fatty acid period ke dauran pet mein cramp ki shikayat hoti hain
is cramp se bachne ke liye aapka bhojan aisa hona chahiye ki jisse aapko jaroori fatty acid milta ho
aise mein aapko ise body system mein phir se banana hota hain
prayapt matra mein iron pane ke liye aap palak , meat , dried bean aur hari pattedar sabziyo ka sahara le sakti hain
saath hi aap periods ke dauran khoob paani piye
aapko periods ke dauran healthy rahne ke liye period diet ko apanana chahiye
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips antioxidant kya hain aur yeh health ke liye kaise jaroori hain
health tips a a print email aap aksar sunte hain ki anti oxidants health ke liye bahut hi faydemand hote hain
kya hain anti oxidant
anti oxidant vitamin , minerals aur kuch anya chemicals hain , jo hamare sharir mein oxidation se hone wale nuksaan ko deactivate karne mein madad karte hain
anti oxidant ka kaam in hanikarak products ki safaai karna hota hain
inki supply bhojan se hi ho sakti hain
oxykaran oxidation hamare sharir ka normal process hain
isse kuch bacteria paida hote hain , jinhe free radicals kaha jata hain
kam sankhya mein free radicals hamare sharir ke liye labhdayak hain aur cells ke banne mein madadgar hain
lekin adhik tadad mein yeh free radicals cells ko khatm karne lag padte hain
yeh kaam karne ki capacity par negative asar dalte hain
anti oxidant vitamin c ya beta carotene in free radicals se hame bachate hain
supplement se bache london ke kings college mein diabetes nutritional science division ke head sounders ke mutabik , supplement se anti oxidant ko lena hanikarak ho sakta hain , khas taur par smoking karne walo ke liye
international group cochrane collaboration bhi is baat se sehmat hain ki anti oxidant supplement fayde se adhik nuksaan pahuchate hain
researchers ne vitamin e supplement ka sambandh ek tarah ke stroke aur prostate cancer se bhi paya hain
isliye aapko anti oxidants ki purti ke liye phal , sabziyo aur sea food aadi ko khana chahiye
to aaiye jante hain anti oxidants ke natural source
yeh sharir ko bio chemicals ke reaction se bachata hain
yeh white blood cells ki sankhya ko badha kar immunity ko bhi strong karta hain
selenium 20 mg per day lahsun , red meat , anda , machhli , chicken
yeh ek mineral hain
yeh sharir mein natural tarike se banane wale anti oxidant ke production mein madadgar hain
lycopene 15 mg per day tamatar , tarbooz , angoor , papita , santra
yeh dhoop ke asar se skin ko bachata hain
yeh ek tarah se skin ki oxygen sokhne ki capacity ko badhata hain
carotenoids 2400 iu per day aaloo , tamatar , seetaphal , gajar , kaddu , lauki , aam , palak
tez dhoop mein yeh hamari aankhon aur skin ko safety deta hain
cells ki bhi raksha karta hain
co enzyme q 10 60 mg per day palak , broccoli , phool gobhi , machhali , chicken breast
yeh sharir ke cells ko majboot karne ke saath unhe active karta hain
isse migraine aur low blood pressure ki shikayat nahi hoti hain
polyphenols 800 mg se adhik pyaz , haldi , sarso , alsi , olive oil , coffee
yeh dementia , parkinson's aur alzheimer jaisi bimariyo se bachav karta hain
ise catechin bhi kahte hain
09 dengue bhukaar mein kya khaye food for
food for dengue fever hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips dengue bhukaar mein kya khaye
food for dengue fever 0 health tips a a print email dengue bukhaar mein kya khaye
isliye coolers , tanks , gamlo , tyres aadi mein paani jama na hone de , kyonki yeh macchar yahi sabse jyada paya jata hain
isme electrolytes , minerals aur jaroori poshak tatv hote hain jo sharir ko majboot banate hain
protein se bharpoor diet dengue ke mareez ko doodh ya ande ka sewan karna chahiye
fruits juice dengue bukhaar mein vitamin c wale phalo ka juice jaroor pina chahiye
yeh ek aisa poshan hain jo sharir ki immunity ko strong karta hain
vitamin c strawberry , amrood , kiwi , santra aur papite mein paya jata hain
yeh bacteria aur virus ko bhi khatm kar deta hain
herbal tea jinhe tez bukhaar hain , veh herbal tea pee kar aaram pa sakte hain
orange mein energy aur khoob saara vitamin c hota hain
04 internet ke bina smartphone par tv
internet ke bina smartphone par t
channels dikhayega prasar bharti
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home tech news internet ke bina smartphone par t
tech news a a print email public broadcaster prasar bharti smartphones par logo ko t
channels dikhane ke liye ek pilot project par kaam kar raha hain
khas baat yeh hain ki isme internet yaa telecom broadband ka istemal nahi hoga
channels smartphones par pahuchane ki hain
ab aage badhne ka ek matr rasta nayi technology ke saath mauzooda infrastructure istemal karne ka hain
iski shuruvat mein prasar bharti ki yojana lag bhag 20 free to air channels ka ek bouquet taiyaar karne ki hain
isme dd ke top channels ke alawa kai bade private broadcaster ke popular free to air channels bhi shamil honge
iska makshad naye zamane ke viewers ke saath judna hain
jo apna kafi time smartphone ya tablet par bitate hain
sarkar ne yeh bataya hain ki prasar bharti ko apna yeh target pura karne ke liye kewal apne mauzooda infrastructure ko upgrade karna hoga
unhone kaha ki installed trans meters ki ek badi sankhya hain
jinka istemal digital signals ko sidhe external dongle ya inbuilt chip ke jariye bhejne ke liye kiya ja sakta hain
unhone bataya , har viewers ek head held device se jude dongle ke jariye content dekh sakega
jise samsung , apple , microsoft aur hcl jaise hardware manufactures apne system mein inbuilt kar sakte hain
jaisa private fm radio channels ne kiya hain
prasar bharti ne yeh yojana ministry of information of broadcasting ko bheji hain
abhi delhi mein important dongles ke jariye ise in house test kiya jaa raha hain
yojana ke mutabik , viewers ek single broadcast service mein lag bhag 20 free to air t
channels aur 20 radio channels hasil kar sakenge
yeh free to air aur free to life honge
iske liye kisi bhi dish , satellite aur internet aur set top box ki jaroorat nahi hogi
yeh broadcast ek bade area ke liye honge
jise transmitters cover karenge
yeh area dd ke mauzooda terrestrial transmissions ki coverage se bada hoga
experts ka kahana hain ki yeh project bahut mahtavkankshi hain aur iski apni simaye hain
senior media adviser aur mumbai ki advisory firm sapphire professional services ke managing director timmy kandhari ne kaha , yeh tabhi kaam kar sakti hain , jab technology bahut acchhi aur mauzooda available technology se different ho
kyonki iphone jaise bahut se phone mein dongle ke istemal ka provision nahi hota aur private broadcaster pahle hi smartphone ke liye platform taiyaar kar rahe hain

health tips a a print email gajar ka ek glass juice peena pura khana khane jitna kaam kartahain
gajarkeras mein vitamin a , b , c , d , e aur g milte hain
iska istemal blood cancer aur pet ke cancer mein kafi faydemand hota hain
mentally aur physically power dono ka vikas hota hain
diabetes ke mareezo ke liye gajar amrit ke samaan hain
medical researches ne yeh saabit kiya hain ki gajar cancer ke khatre ko kam karti hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips diabetes se bach ke rahna re baba
health tips a a print email aaj hum aapko diabetes ke baare mein puri jankari dene ki koshish karenge
mote taur par samjhane ki koshish kare to diabetes jise madhumeh ya sugar bhi kaha jata hain unbalance hormones , motapa aur unhealthy lifestyle ka ek mila jula result hain
in karano se bhojan se mila carbohydrate , jise hamari koshikaon mein energy dene ka kaam karna chahiye , vah khoon mein hi ghoomta rahta hain
diabetes kitni tarah ki hoti hain
diabetes ke type 1 type 1 diabetes yeh bachpan ya kishor awastha mein achanak insulin ke production mein kami hone se paida hone wali bimari hain
isme insulin hormone banana puri tarah se band ho jata hain
isme insulin kam matra mein banta hain ya phir pancreas sahi se kaam nahi kar raha hota hain
diabetes ki 90 patients is category mein aate hain
exercise , balanced diet aur medicines se ise control mein rakha ja sakta hain
kaun kaun se test karwaye blood test agar blood sugar 170 se jyada nahi hain to peshab mein nahi aayegi , isliye blood test jaroori hain
blood test 2 baar kiya jata hain khali pet aur nashta ya glucose lene ke baad
is test se 3 4 din pahle se carbohydrate se bharpoor khana khana chahiye
test se pahle cholesterol kam karne wali niacin tablets , vitamin c , aspirin , garb nirodhak dawaaiya aadi ka istemal bilkul na kare
inse peshab mein sugar level kam aa sakta hain , jisse sahi reading nahi aa payegi
jis vyakti ko 75 gram glucose kha kar 2 ghante baad test dena hain , usay kanhi nahi jana chahiye
isse test ke result par asar padta hain
diabetes ke mareez hain to in testes ko karwate rahe khali pet blood sugar normal range 100 120 aur khana khane ke 2 ghante baad normal range 130 160 hafte mein kam se kam ek baar
hba1c test har teen se chaar mahine baad karwaye
is test mein aapko khali pet ya khana khane ke 2 ghante baad ka blood sample dene ki jaroorat nahi hain
kabhi bhi kisi bhi lab mein jakar hba1c glycated hemoglobin test karane ke liye sample de sakte hain
yeh test sirf diabetes ke mareez hi nahi balki normal aur pre diabetic log bhi karwa sakte hain
hba1c se sahi samay par diabetes ki sahi process ka pata lagaya ja sakta hain
isse aise bina diabetes wale mareezo ka confusion bhi khatm ho jata hain , jinka emergency mein kiye gye test mein blood glucose level jyada aaya ho
is test se last three months ki average stithi ka pata lag jata hain
hemoglobin blood ke red cells se banta hain aur isme glucose milta hain to glycosylated hemoglobin banta hain
hba1c test pichale teen mahino ka average blood sugar level bata deta hain
iski normal range 4 se 6 percent tak maani jati hain , lekin
yeh pre diabetes ki stage hoti hain , jo aage chal kar diabetes mein badal sakti hain
diabetes ke mareezo mein hba1c
se 7 percent tak rahe to diabetes control mein maani jati hain
aur kaun si jaanch karwaye khoon mein cholesterol aur fat ki matra ke liye lipid profile test
wajan ka record pairo ki jaanch , blood pressure ki jaanch
kidney ka test
sabhi ango par diabetes ka asar kidney par kuch saal baad iska asar shuru ho jata hain
ise rokne ke liye blood sugar aur blood pressure dono ko normal rakhna chahiye
blood sugar level ko control mein rakhkar aankho ki motiyabind jaisi bimariyo se bachaya ja sakta hain
isse bachne ke liye glucose level ko control mein rakhne ke saath saath blood pressure , cholesterol aur tension aadi par bhi control karna chahiye
dusri bimariya heart attack , stroke , lakwa , infection aur kidney failure
skin aur aankho ki samsya
frozen shoulder ya kandhe ka jam hona
aise mein fasting blood sugar 120 aur khane ke 2 hours baad ka blood sugar level 180 se kam na hone de
nayi insulin par research chal rahi hain
lagatar blood sugar level ko monitor karne ke liye naya monitoring system jise cgm kahte hain , insulin pump m other naya device hain jisse niyamit roop se insulin seedhe sharir mein liya ja sakta hain
insulin ka istemal kai baar niyamit insulin ki dose lene ke bawjood blood sugar level control se bahar rahta hain
is samsya se bachne ke liye kisi registered chemist se hi ise khareede aur iska bill le
iske saath hi yeh bhi jaanch le ki insuline ke storage mein temperature ke standards ka dhyaan rakha gya hain ki nahi
iski quality barkarar rakhne ke liye ise 8 se 10 degree temperature par rakhna chahiye
kise padti hain insulin ki jaroorat
sugar ke vah mareez , jinko dil ki bimari ho ya lakwa ka attack aa chuka ho , aankho ki bimari ho , infection ho , t
ho ya operation hone wala ho
diabetes se peedit garbhvati mahilaon ko
jab dawaaon se diabetes control mein na aa rahi ho
insulin lene ka sahi tarika diabetes ke mareez siring aur insulin ki shishi ki bajaye insulin pen ka istemal kar sakte hain , kyonki ise asaani ke saath kanhi bhi liya ja sakta hain
injections ke beech 10 se 12 ghanto ka difference hona jaroori hain
khane ke ekdum saath insulin ka injection na lagaye , kyonki aisa karne se blood sugar level badh sakta hain
diabetes se jude myths aur satya myths facts
diabetes ke ilaj ke liye kuch gharelu nuskhe

health tips in hindi
cancer se bachav ghulansheel fiber , calcium aur iron pet ki androoni safaai karte hain
colon cancer se bachav ke liye kai prakar ke minerals ka bhojan mein hona bahut hi jaroori hain
hari pattedar sabziyo mein bharpoor matra mein minerals paye jate hain
inhe regular use karne se cancer hone ka khatra kam ho jata hain
khoon ki kami ko door kare palak , sarso se lekar methi , muli aur pyaz ke patte iron ka bahut hi accha source hote hain
vitmin k ki matra umar badhne ke saath hone wali kai tarah ki samsyaon , jaise cardiovascular bimariya , haddiyo ki toot foot , kidney mein hone wale infections ki problems ko door rakhti hain
lekin hari pattedar sabziyo mein mauzood fiber is samsya se nipatne mein madadgar hota hain
saath hi yeh bad cholesterol ko kam karke , yeh kabz , acidity jaisi kai problems se rahat dilati hain
aankhon ki roshini badhaye jyadatar pattedar sabziya carotenoids , lutein aur zeaxanthin ka khazana hoti hain , jo sharir ko energy dene ke saath aankhon ki sehat ko bhi banaye rakhti hain
yeh khane mein mauzood carbohydrate ko glucose mein badalne ka kaam karta hain , jisse sharir mein energy bani rahti hain
iske kadwepan ka karan isme mauzood calcium hota hain
iske rojana sewan se 1000 mg calcium ki bharpaai ki ja sakti hain
doctors mahilaon ko khas taur par delivery hone ke baad sahi matra mein calcium lene ki salah dete hain
blood sugar ko control kare potassium blood sugar level ko control karne ka kaam karta hain
saath hi , exercise karne ke saath supplements ka istemal karte hain , lekin is baat se anjaan hote hain ki hari pattedar sabziyo mein potassium ki kafi matra hoti hain , jo blood sugar level ko control karne mein sahayak hoti hain
damakti tavcha ke liye in pattiyo mein mauzood anti oxidants jaise vitamin c , lutein aur zeaxanthin tavcha ke liye bahut hi faydemand hote hain
vitamin c na sirf jodo ke beech mein liquid bana kar arthritis jaisi bimari se bachata hain , balki tavcha ki bhi gaharaai se safaai karke usay chamakdar banata hain
motapa kam kare vitamin , kai saare minerals aur fight o chemicals ki mauzoodagi sehat ke liye bahut hi faydemand hoti hain
fiber motapa kam karne mein kaam karta hain

yeh packaged fruit juice sehat ko fayda pahuchane ki bajaye nuksan bhi pahucha sakte hain

iske alawa packaged juice mein kai tarah ke gun nahi paye jate hain
aaiye jante hain packaged juice dibba band juice peene ke nuksan ke bare mein side effects of packaged fruits juice in hindi urdu
diabetes mein nuksaandeh diabetes ke mareezo ko yeh packet wala juice bilkul bhi nahi peena chahiye
darasal yeh refined sugar se bane huye hote hain , jo diabetic logo ke liye theek nahi hain

kela ka phool kele ke phool , banana's flower ke fayde period ki bleeding control karke pcos ko theek karta hain ayurveda ke anusaar , ek cup kele ke phool ko dahi mein paka kar khane se sharir mein progesterone level badhta hain aur periods ke dauran jyada khoon nahi bahta hain
mana jaata hain ki kele ke phoolo se polycystic ovary syndrome pcos se joojhe rahi mahilaon ko madad milti hain
ek research mein yeh paya gya ki iske sewan se sugar ka level kam kiya ja sakta hain , halaki yeh abhi tak clinical tested nahi hain
free radicals se ladta hain kele ke phool mein anti oxidants bahut hi acchi matra mein paye jate hain
yeh anti oxidants free radicals se ladta hain , free radicals healthy cells par hamla karke unhe damage kar dete hain , jisse aapko dil ki bimari , cancer aur skin aging jaisi dikkate hone lagti hain
in phoolo mein anti oxidants mauzood hote hain jo free radicals se ladkar unhe body ko damage hone se bachate hain
infection se bachata hain yeh phool pathogenic bacteria ki growth ko rokta hain
pathogenic bacteria veh bacteria hota hain jo hamare sharir mein infection paida karta hain

isse sharir ka sugar level normal bana rahta hain
yeh skin ke liye natural bleech ka kaam karte hain
iske alawa yeh blood ko purify karta hain
shahad mein anti bacterial properties hoti hain
isliye iske niyamit sewan se chehre par moohanse aur daag dhabbe nahi hote hain aur skin par natural glow bana rahta hain
pratirodhi shamta badhata hain iska niyamit sewan sharir ki immunity ko badhata hain
shahad aur nimbu mein mauzood anti oxidants aur kai poshak tatv sharir ko mausam badalne ke saath hone wale infections se door rakhta hain
yeh ek behtrin diuretic bhi hain , isliye yeh urinary system ki safaai kar usay durust rakhta hain
yeh seer ki tavcha ko hydrate karta hain , jisse skin ke dry hone ki problem khatm ho jati hain
yadi aap skin problems se preshan hain ya glowing skin ke liye tarah tarah ke cosmetic use karke thak gye hain , to rojana sirf ek glass garm paani peena shuru kar dijiye
aapki skin problem free ho jayegi aur chamakne lagegi

05 tarbooz khane ke fayde benefits of
tarbooz khane ke fayde benefits of watermelon hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips tarbooz khane ke fayde benefits of watermelon 0 health tips a a print email garmiyon mein bade hi chaav se khaye jane wale fruits ke list mein tarbooz ka naam sabse aage hain
carbohydrate , protein , fiber aur vitamin a , b aur c ke alawa isme potassium aur bahut saare minerals jaise iron , calcium , magnesium aur phosphorus bhi maujood hain
iske alawa ismein bahut saare enzyme , arginine acid aur natural sugar hain jo hame chust aur durust rakhta hain
saal 2007 mein chhape journal of nutrition ke mutabik , tarbooz mein maujood amino acid arginine sharir ke extra fat ko kam karta hain
aur cardiovascular system ko sahi rakhta hain
tarbooz high blood pressure ko control karta hain
isme mauzood potassium , magnesium aur amino acid ek saath milkar naso ko swasth aur majboot banate hain , jisse sharir mein sucharu roop se rakt ka pravaah hota hain
yeh sharir mein acid aur electrolyte ke beech mein balance ko bhi banaye rakhta hain
jisse high blood pressure ki sambhavna kam ho jati hain
florida state of university ke anusaar , jo log mote hote hain , unme high blood pressure ki samsya aam hoti hain
rojana 1 glass tarbooz ka juice peene se high blood pressure ko control kiya ja sakta hain
ismein kai prakar ke hydration karne wale tatv jaise calcium , magnesium , potassium aur sodium itni matra mein hote hain ki agar aap pura din na paani piye to , tarbooz iski purti kar deta hain
saal 2009 mein abardin medical university ke mutabik ki tarbooz aur tarbooz jaise kai phal jime namak , minerals aur natural sugar ki matra payi jati hain , vo paani se jyada sharir ko fayda pahuchate hain
beta carotene ka accha source hone ke karan yeh sharir ko vitamin a ki supply bharpoor matra mein karta hain
iske alawa tarbooz vitamin c , lutein aur zeaxanthin aankhon ko swasth rakhne ke saath inhe infection se bhi door rakhta hain
saath hi vitamin c chehre aur sharir par pad rahe free radicals ko door karta hain , jo depression aur irritation ka karan hoti hain
yeh hormones ko balance karta hain , taki kharab mood sahi ho sake
kidney ko healthy rakhta hain tarbooz aankhon ke saath saath hamari kidneys ke liye bhi bahut faydemand hain
yeh blood mein mauzood uric acid ki matra ko bhi kam karta hain
agar aapko urine se related koi bhi samsya ho to aap tarbooz khaye ya uska juice piye
ismein mauzood potassium aapke dil ki raksha karta hain
iske alawa ismein maujood amino acid , cituline aur arginine rakt ke parvaah ko sucharu roop se chalate hain
saath hi lycopene , beta carotene aur vitamin c cholesterol ki matra ko kam karte hain aur kai prakar ki dil ki bimariyo se bachate hain
swasth dil aur dimaag ke liye tarbooz ka sewan kare , isme paye jane wale anti oxidants , low fat aur cholesterol sharir ki sabhi jaroorato ko pura karte hain
cancer se ladta hain
lycopene aur kai prakar ke dusre anti oxidants cancer ki bimari se ladne ke saath hi unse bachate bhi hain
kai research se yeh pata chala hain ki lycopene protest , breast , lung , colon aur endometrial cancer ki sambhavna ko kafi kam kar deta hain
vitamin a aur c alag alag cells ki raksha karke free radicals ki samsya se nijaat dilane mein mahatvpurn bhoomika nibhate hain
vitamin b6 aur b1 ko samete huye yeh sharir mein mauzood energy level ko banaye rakhta hain
magnesium , potassium , vitamin c aur beta carotene yeh sabhi natural energy ke source hain , jo tarbooz mein paye jate hain
antioxidants ka kaam karta hain tarbooz antioxidants ka khazana hain jo aapko healthy rakhne ke saath kai prakar ki bimariyo se bhi bachata hain
vitamin c aur kai prakar ke flavonoids jaise lycopene , beta carotene , lutein , zeaxanthin aur cryptoxanthin ka bahut accha source hain
isse gathiya rog , asthma , heart attack aur jalan jaisi bimariyo se koso door raha ja sakta hain
yeh skin ko kafi samay tak young rakhta hain
yeh immunity power ko bhi badhata hain , jisse allergy aur infection jaisi problems nahi hoti hain

health tips a a print email khane ko sahi tarah se pachaane ke liye fiber ki jaroorat hoti hain
aapko yeh mahsoos karwane ke liye ki aapka pet bhara hua hain , food related fiber jaroori hain
iske opposite iski jyada matra ke upyog se aantadiyo mein preshani , dast ya dehydration ki problem bhi aa sakti hain
fiber ke sewan se dil ki bimari , diabetes , motapa aur kai tarah ke cancer se bacha ja sakta hain
mahilaon ko din bhar mein 25 gram fiber aur purusho ko lagbhag 35 se 40 gram fibers ki jaroorat hoti hain , lekin hum sirf 15 gram hi fiber kha paate hain
dry fruits salad , dahi aur anaaz mein dry fruits milaye
oatmeal oats mein beta glucan hota hain jo ek special type ka fiber hain
yeh cholesterol level ko kam karke body ki immunity ko badhata hain
sabziya fiber ka bahut accha source hoti hain example ke taur par muli , pattagobhi aadi
daale apne niyamit khane mein high fiber se bharpoor anaaz shamil kare jaise rajma , alag alag kism ki sabhi daalein fiber ka accha source hoti hain
bhutta makka fiber anaaz aisa choone jisme ek baar khane se hi jyada fiber ki supply ho sake , jaise makka , jiske ek hisse mein kam se kam 4gram fiber hota hain
phal fruits phalo ka sewan jyada kare
gram fiber milega
brown rice ; samanya chawal ki jagah par brown rice ka upyog kare
brown bread genhu se bani hui bread aur pasta ka istemal kare

05 jaaniye ctet exam ke bare mein
jaaniye ctet exam ke bare mein
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge jaaniye ctet exam ke bare mein
general knowledge a a print email agar aap apne carrier mein teacherbanne ki chah rakhte hain toh iska sabse pahla step hain c
ctet exam saal mein 2 baar aayojit kiya jata hain
cbse ctet offlinehi conduct karati hain
kaun kar sakta hain ctet clear
central teachereligibility test mein 60 ya usse jyadamarks laane wale candidateshi clear kar sakte hain
kya hain exam
iska matlab hain ki applicant government school mein teacher banne ke liye yogya eligible ho gya hain
result declare hone ke baad marks certificate ko 7 saalo tak valid mana jata hain
yeh exam candidateschahe jitni baarde sakte hain
ek baarqualify kar chuke candidatesapna score better karne ke liye dobara bhi yeh exam de sakte hain
ctet seaap kendriya vidyalaya , navodaya vidyalaya , sarvodaya vidyalaya , central tibetan schoolsaur sabhi governmentschools mein padhane ke yogyaho jate hain
yahi nahi acche private schools mein bhi ctet ki demand hain
is exam mein vahi participate kar sakta hain , jisne b
ed kiya ho ya uske paas diploma in alimentary education ho
kaisa hota hain exam
ctet exam mein pahle paper mein 5 section hote hain
har section mein 30 question hote hain
in questions mein child development , language i aur language ii , maths aurenvironment ke subjects se jude swaal shamil hote hain
jyada jaankari ke liye aap ctet ki official website par bhi login kar sakte hain
ctet ki official website ka link yeh http ctet

health tips a a print email kaccha pyaaz bhi health ke liye faydemand hota hain
raw onion mein sulfur aur jaroori vitamins paye jate hain , jo sharir se bimariyo ko door karne mein madad karte hain
cholesterol kam kare isme methyl sulphide aur amino acid hota hain , jo kharaab cholesterol ko kam karke , good cholesterol ko badhane mein madad karta hain
is sulfur mein ek tel mauzood hota hain jo anemia ko theek karne mein madadgar hota hain
cancer cell ki growth ko roke ; pyaaz mein sulfur jyada matra mein paya jata hain
sulfur pet , colon , breast , fefde aur prostat cancer se bachata hain
diabetes par control agar aap kaccha pyaaz khate hain toh yeh body mein insulin paida karta hain , toh agar aap diabetes ke mareez hain toh ise salad ke roop mein khana shuru kar dijiye

jamun ko jambul , jambs , jamboo , black plum , jamali , jambolan aadi kai naamo se jana jata hain
jamun khane ke labh aur fayde diabetes se rahat jamun ke saath iski pattiyo mein mauzood anti diabetic tatv diabetes ke rogiyo ke liye bahut hi kargar hain
jamun starch ko energy mein badal kar sugar level ko control karta hain
yeh liver damage ki problem ko bhi door karta hain
isme mauzood bio chemical aur fight o chemical tatv jaise polyphenol cancer se ladne mein sahayak hote hain
yeh blood purify bhi karta hain
oral health ke liye faydemand jamun ki pattiyo ka anti bacterial gun daanto aur masoodho ko majboot banata hain
jamun mein potassium ki acchi khasi matra mauzood hoti hain
iske per 100 gram mein 55 mg potassium hota hain , heart ke saath hi blood pressure ko control karta hain aur heat stroke se bachata hain
jamun blood sugar ke level ko control karta hain , isliye kisi bhi tarah ki surgery ke baad jamun khane se bachna chahiye

05 yeh hain nervous breakdown ke lakshan

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips yeh hain nervous breakdown ke lakshan
general knowledge , health tips a a print email hum mein se zyadatar logkuch lakshan aur sanketo ko normal maan kar kai baar oon pardhyaan nahi dete hain , lekin jabkoi insaan ajeebharkatein karnelagta hain toh hum usay pagalbolnelagte hain
kisi bhi insaan ko nervous break down se gujarte huye dekhna bahut hi dardnaak anubhavhota hain
nervous system breakdown symptoms in hindi
nervous breakdown signs in hindi urdu
mental stress stress ya tension bhinervous breakdown ki wajah banti hain
mental stress jitna kam hoga , nervous break down ka khatra bhi utna kam hoga
depression depression ek aisi problem hain jo dheere dheerekab gharjati hain
aiselogsociety aurfriends se bhi doorhonelagte hain
concentration ki kami concentration ki kami ek taraf se mentally disorder ki tarafishara karti hain
baar baarmann mein suicideka khyaal aaye toh iska matlab hain ki aap kisi maansik bimari se joojh rahe hain aur aapko turant psychologist se contact karna chahiye
kabhi kabhi bahut zyada depressive rahna , kabhi bahutzyada khush rahna aur kabhi ekdum segussa aa jana yeh sabhi nervousbreakdownki tarafishaara karte hain
sex life sex life bhi agar theek na ho toh yeh bhi mental disorderki ek ahem wajah ban sakti hain
kaibaar sex problems ki wajah se bhi tension badh jati hain
nashe ki latt ki wajah kai baar drugs ya drinks ya dusre tarah ki nashe kiaadat bhi nervous breakdown ki wajah ban sakti hain
in problems ko choti na samajhte huye aur sharm aur jhijhak chhod kar aap psychologist se milengetoh yehsamsayein bahut asaani se sulajh jayengi

05 kharbooja khane ke fayde benefits of
benefits of muskmelon hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips kharbooja khane ke fayde
benefits of muskmelon 0 health tips a a print email cantaloupe jise bharat mein muskmelon aur kharbooje ke naa se jana jata hain , to vahi duniya ise rock melon ke naam se janti hain
saath hi ismein mauzood paani , vitamins aur minerals sharir ko poshak tatvo ki kami ko pura karte hain
kharbooje se skin ko hone wale fayde kharbooje mein mauzood ulfa aur beta carotene , folates aur folic acid , potassium , vitamin c , e , k ka khazana skin ko healthy rakhne ke saath usay chamakdaar bhi banaye rakhte hain
skin texture ko banaye rakhta hain
kharbooje mein paye jane wala collagen tatv skin ke natural glow aur banavat ko banaye rakhta hain
moisture banaye rakhe ismein mauzood paani aur vitamin k , b aur e ki matra tavcha ki khoi hui nami ko lauta kar usay healthy aur fresh banata hain
delivery ke baad iske sewan se pryapt matra mein doodh banta hain , jo shishu ke vikas ke liye bahut jaroori hain
periods ke dauran ismein mauzood potassium ki matra sharir ke extra sodium ko bahar nikal kar blood pressure ko control mein rakhta hain
iske saath hi periods ke dauraan mahilon mein bleeding aur blood clotting ke banane ki samsya ko bhi khatm karta hain
motapa kam karne ke liye faydemand hain kharbooza calorie ki bahut kam matra aur fiber ki acchi khasi matra samete huye kharbooje mein paani , minerals , vitamins aur kai tarah ke jaroori poshak tatv paye jate hain
pregnancy mein hain faydemand folic acid aur iron yeh garbhvati mahilon ko bahut hi fayda pahuchata hain
saath hi isme mauzood kai prakar ke tatv jaise adenosine blood cloting nahi hone deta hain
potassium ki adhik matra aur cholesterol ki kam matra blood circulation ko banaye rakhti hain jo heart pulse ki sahi chalaane ke liye kargar hain
iske rojan sewan se artriz ki ainthan nahi hoti hain
cancer se bachata hain isme paye jane wala flavonoids aur carotenoids jo ki cancer ki cancer jaisi bimari se ladte hain , aur usay banane wale cells ko rokte hain
asamay budhape ko rokta hain colon cancer , breast cancer , uterus , lung aur pancreatic cancer aajkal hone wale aam cancer hain
diabetes kharbooze mein fructose aur glucose ki matra diabetes ke rogiyo ke liye theek hain
kharbooje se balo ko hone wale fayde baalo ka vikas karta hain nutrients aur minerals ka source hain kharbooza , jo ki baalo ke vikas ke liye bahut hi important hota hain
scalp ko poshan pradaan karta hain iske gude ko scalp par lagakar baalo ki acchi conditioning hoti hain

ek baar agar body ko caffeine ki latt lag gyi toh dusri kai saari health problems start ho jati hain

06 strawberry khane ke fayde benefits of
strawberry khane ke fayde benefits of strawberries hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips strawberry khane ke fayde benefits of strawberries 0 health tips a a print email seb , kela , aam aur santra , yeh chaar aise phal hain , jinme sharir ke liye jaroori sabhi tatvo ki bharpoor matra payi jati hain
strawberry mein shamil tatvo ki matra 1 cup strawberry mein calorie 46 , manganese 28 , fiber 12 , iodine 9 , folate 9 , copper 8 , potassium 6 , magnesium 5 , phosphorus 5 , omega 3 fat 4 , vitamin b6 4 paya jata hain
cardiovascular bimari rakhe door strawberry mein flavonoids ki mauzoodagi sharir mein hone wali kisi bhi prakar ki sujan ke samsya se rahat dilati hain
majboot haddiyo ke liye strawberry potassium , vitamin k aur magnesium ka khazana hain
vitamin c ka khazana rojana strawberry kha kar sharir ke liye jaroori vitamin c ki kami ko asaani se pura kiya ja sakta hain
high ya low kisi bhi prakar ke blood pressure ko control karne ka gun strawberry phal mein hota hain
strawberry ka upyog karne se skin glow karne lagti hain aur pimples ki samsya nahi hoti hain
anti oxidants ka accha source strawberry mein anthocyanins paya jata hain
yeh anti oxidant ka bahut accha source hain
saath hi , yeh free radicals damaging ko bhi rokta hain
biotin ki prayapt matra baalo ke saath hi naakhoono ki majbooti ke liye madadgar hoti hain
motapa kam kare nitrate body mein blood ke saath hi oxygen ke circulation ko control karta hain
isme mauzood anthocyanins nervous system ko strong banata hain
isse dimaag shant hone ke saath hi uski activity badh jati hain
05 healthy sperm ke liye jaroori hain yeh
healthy sperm ke liye jaroori hain yeh vitamins
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips healthy sperm ke liye jaroori hain yeh vitamins
health tips a a print email aaj kal ke zamane mein tension ki wajah se bhi purusho ki fertility mein kami aa rahi hain
diet mein vitamins ki kami ki wajah se kai saari bimariya hoti hain , jisme sperm quality aur counts par bhi effectpadta hain
kai baar vitamins ki kami ki wajah se purusho ke sperm shukraanoo ki quality aur counts par bura asar padta hain
aaiye jante hain aise hi vitamins ke bare mein jinse purush healthy sperm pa sakte hain
vitamin b12 , vitamin c , vitamin e aur folic acid purusho mein sperm ki sankhya ko badhata hain
agar aapke sperm ki sankhya kam hain ya quality kharab hain , toh jyadatar aise mamlo mein folic acid ki kami se hota hain
isliye aapko folic acid ke supplements leneki koshish karni chahiye
lycopene paudho mein paya jane wala carotenoid pigment hain
agar aapki diet mein lycopene ki kami hogi toh sperm ki quality kharab hogi
iske liye aap lycopeneke supplements le
vitamin e sperm ki quality ko behtar banata hain
research se pata chala hain ki vitamin e fertility ko takreeban 10 tak increase kar deta hain
vitamin e inke liye faydemand hain
omega 3 fatty acid sperm ke counts ko badhata hi hain , saath hi yeh garbhadharan karwane mein labhkari hain
research se pata chala hain ki purusho mein agar sperm ki sankhya kam ho ya uski quality acchi nahi ho , toh aisa omega 3 fatty acid ki kami ki wajah se bhi ho sakta hain
selenium aur zinc bhi sperm count ko increase karne wale hote hain
brazil nuts , sea food aur tunafish jaise food mein is tarah ke minerals paye jate hain , jo sperm ki sankhya ko badha kar fertility ko badhate hain
research ke dauran jab live sperm cells mein vitamin d ko milaya gya , toh isse sperm mein activity aayi
saath hi acrosome reaction bhi dekhne ko mila
yun kahe toh vitamin d purusho ki fertility ko badhane mein ahem role ada karta hain
vitamin c aur e , coenzyme q10 , selenium aur n acetylcysteine jaise antioxidants bhi sperm ki quality aur quantity ko badhane mein madadgarhote hain
acche cellular anti oxidants se sperm quality ke saath saath iski gatisheelta bhi badhti hain , jisse aakhirkaar sperm ki quality behtar hoti hain
iske liye healthy sperm ki jaroorat hoti hain , jo energy se bharpoor ho

isse muscles strong banti hain aur khoon badhta hain
asthma sahi kare yeh fefdo se related problems ko door karti hain aur asthma se chhutkara dilati hain
agar baalo mein copper ki kami ho jaye to baal gray hone shuru ho jate hain
yeh kam calorie wali hoti hain , jisme dher saare nutrients aur fiber hote hain
immune system majboot banaye isme vitamin c bahut hi acchi matra mein hota hain jo immune system ko strong banata hain aur infection se bachata hain
fiber se bharpoor isme dher saara fiber hota hain , jo sugar level ko kam karne mein madad karta hain

myth yeh acchi neendmein madadkarta hain
fact doodh mein tryptophan naam ka amino acid hota hain
myth yehmotapa badhatahain
fact researchbatate hain ki sahi matra mein doodh wajanghatanemeinmadad kar sakta hain
jo doodh mein mauzood calcium tatvo ke karan se hota hain
myth organic , non organic se behtar hain
fact expertsmante hain ki organic food products ka istemal sehat par asar nahi dalta hain
organic aurnon organic dono tarah kedoodh calcium , riboflavin , magnesium jaise jaroorinutrients ki matrabarabarhi hoti hain
fact agar bhojan mein calcium kimatrasahi hain aur hum prayapt matra mein paani pee rahe hain toh kidney yagall bladdermein pattharihoneki sambhavna bahut kamrahti hain
09 acchi body language ke liye jaroori
acchi body language ke liye jaroori tips kya hain

body language tips in hindi 0 general knowledge a a print email har insaan ki apni alag alag sharirik bhasha yani ki body language hoti hain
body language ka work aur success par bahut hi gahra asar padta hain
talent smart naam ki ek society ne is par lakho safal aur asafal logo par research kiya aur paya ki body language se judi aisi galtiya hain jo safal insaan kabhi nahi karte hain
aisa karne se lagta hain aapke ander self confidence ki kami hain
cross leg ya cross arm kai baar dekhne mein aata hain ki baatcheet ke dauran log cross leg hokar baithna pasand karte hain ya baanho ko modkar baat karte hain

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips dil ka daura padne ke baad nahi karni chahiye yeh mistakes
general knowledge , health tips a a print email heart attack yeh aise words hain , jo kisi ko bhi dara sakte hain
heart attack padne wale patient ko physically aur mentally roop se healthy rahna bahut hi jaroori hota hain
heart attack padne ke follow kare yeh tips
wajan ko na badhne de heart attack ke baad aap apni body par pura focus kare
kisi bhi person ka body mass index bmi
high blood pressure ko controlkare american heart association ne yeh bataya hain ki heart attack hone ke sabse jyada chances high blood pressure ki wajah se hota hain
saturated fat trans fat se door rahe khane mein kam se kam oil , dalda ya ghee ka istemal kare
saturated fat ya trans fat ko khane se bache
dusri health problems ko andekha na kare kai baar heart attack padne ke baad log dusri health problems ko andekha kar dete hain
diabetes , hypertension , hypothyroidism , depression aadi jaisi problems ko seriously le
smoking karne se heart arties mein blood flow par direct effect padta hain
physical taur par active rahe heart attack ke baad bed par hi na rahe
araam se walk kare aur kuch waqt baad physical activities par khas dhyaan de
isse aapki body fit rahegi aur blood circulation acchi tarah se hoga
symptoms ko ignore na kare agar heart attack ke baad recovery ke dauran bahut jyada thakaan , chest mein pain , jyada paseena aata hain ya pairo mein sujan ho jati hain toh aise symptoms ko na nakaare
apne health ke prti alert rahe
cholesterol badhaane wale food se doori banaye cholesterol badhaane wale food items se doori banaye , jisme chat , tikki , pakauda aadi cheezo mein fat hota hain jo cholesterol level ko kafi had tak badha dete hain
sugar , pasty , sweets , chocolate ko na khaye heart attack ke baad sugar pasty , meethai , chocolate aadi ka sewan kabhi nahi karna chahiye

general knowledge a a print email india mein sabse badi punishment maut ki saza hain , dusre desho mein maut ki punishment kai tarike se di jati hain
aaiye jante hain fansi se jude kuch general knowledge
janiye accused ko death punishment milne par subah ke time hi fansi ke fandey par kyon latkaya jata hain
lekin fansi dene ke 10 minutes baad medical team dead body ki jaanch karti hain
fansi dete waqt vaha par executive magistrate , jailer aur jallad ka mauzood rahna bahut hi jaroori hota hain
fansi ki punishment dene ke baad judge apne pen ki nib kyon tod deta hain
jail administration fansi se pahle aakhiri khwaahish puchhta hain , jo jail ke andar aur manual ke tahat hota hain , isme veh apni family se milne , koi special dish khane ke liye ya phir koi religious holy book padhne ki iccha kar sakta hain
agar yeh sabhi desires jail administration ke manual mein hain to veh ise pura karti hain
04 arahar ki daal ke fayde benefits of
benefits of pigeon pea lentil in hindi urdu
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips arahar ki daal ke fayde
general knowledge , health tips a a print email arhar arahar toor tuar ki daal khane se kya fayde hote hain
daalo ko protein ka good source mana jata hain
arhar ki daal ko khane se body ko kai nutrients jaise protein , fat , carbohydrates jaise poshak tatvo ki prapti hoti hain
arhar ki daal protein aur fiber ka bahut bada source hain
saath hi cholesterol free hain
arahar ki daal iron , folic acid , calcium , magnesium , potassium , vitamin b aur minerals ki kami ko pura karta hain
toor daal mein mauzood folic acid mahilaon ko bahut zyada fayda pahuchata hain
yeh ladies ke liye vitamins ka bahut hi accha source hain
khastaur par pregnantwoman ke liye yeh bahut hi accha mana jata hain
arahar ki daal carbohydrates ka accha source hain , jisse sharir ko energy milti hain
jab bhi aap carbohydrates wale food khate hain toh yeh sharir mein jakar glucose ya blood sugar mein break ho jata hain
iske baad blood sugar iss body , dimaag aur nervous system ko energy deta hain
toor daal fiber ka accha source hain , jisse kabz se chhutkara milta hain
fiber wali diet lene se chronicdiseasenahi hoti hain
niyamit roop se fiber wali dietkhane se dil se related bimariya , stroke aur kaitarah ke cancer , cardiovascular diseaseaur type 2 diabetesse bacha ja sakta hain
iska scientificnamecajanus cajan hain

05 vitamin ki kami se hone wali problems

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips vitamin ki kami se hone wali problems aur unke solutions
yeh immunity ko badhata hain
kami se raat mein kam dikhna , sukhi skin aur kamjor haddiyan source soya milk , dairy products , gajar , palak , hari matar , tamatar ka juice , tarbooz , chukandar aadi
vitamin b sharir mein carbohydrate ko energy mein badalne ka kaam yeh vitamin karta hain
yeh nervous system ko normal banane aur pachan shakti ko majboot rakhta hain
source kela , phaliyan , aaloo , chukandar , tarbooz , saabut anaaj
vitamin c sharir ke parts ko ek dusre se jode rakhne mein upyogi
vitamin d calcium ko sokhne mein madadgar aur sharir mein phosphorus ke level ko badhaata hain
vitamin e sharir mein lal rakt kano red blood cells ko banaane ka kaam karta hain
source sabut anaaj , daale aur sukhe mewe dry fruits
vitamin k khoon ke thakke banane se rokne ka kaam is vitamin ka hain
kami se naak se khoon aana , antrik raktsrav androoni khoon ka behna source hari sabziya , soyabean

11 mozzarella cheese khane ke fayde
mozzarella cheese khane ke fayde
benefits of mozzarella cheese in hindi urdu
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips mozzarella cheese khane ke fayde
health tips a a print email cheese kojo loglike karte hain unhe mozzarella cheese ke bare mein jaroor pata hoga
lekin phir bhi isme sehat ko labh pahuchane walekai tatv paye jate hain , aaiye jante hain mozzarella cheese khane ke fayde mein jante hain benefits of mozzerella cheese in hindi urdu
phosphoruska accha source hain mozzarella cheese mein phosphorus acchi khasi quantity meinpaya jata hain , yeh khane meincalcium ko sokhne ke liyebhi madad karta hain
bloodpressureko sahi rakhta hain pottasium ka accha source hone ki wajah se mozzarella cheese sodium ke bure effects ko kam karta hain
yeh blood pressureko kam karne mein madadgarhain aur isse heart healthy rahta hain
niacin ka good sourcehain dairy product hone ki wajah se ismeniacin aurvitamin b paya jata hain , iske alawa yeh fat ko energymein badal deta hain
niacin cholesterolkocontrol karta hain aur diabetes aur gathiya rogo ke ilaj mein faydemand hain
biotin ka accha source hain mozzarella cheese ko biotin ka accha source mana jata hain , biotin ko vitamin b bhi kaha jata hain
pregnant aurato ko biotin ki kami ko pura karne ke liye iska sewan jaroor karna chahiye
research se yeh pata chala hain ki sugar se peedit logo mein blood glucose ka level kam karne mein bhi yeh helpful hain
zinc se bharpoor mozzarella cheese zinc se bharpoorhota hain
zinc skin problems se ladta hain aur white blood cells ko increase karta hain
protein ka goodsource agar aap apni body mein proteinki kami ko pura karna chahte hain toh aapko mozzarella cheese ko jaroor khana chahiye
iske sewan se energy milti hain aur muscles strongbante hain
ek ouncemozzarella cheese mein 183 mg
calcium hota hain jo tooth enamel ki suraksha karta hain aur bones ko healthy banata hain
fat mein ghulansheel mozzarella cheesemeinfat mein ghulanewale vitamins jyada payejate hain jaisi ki vitamin d , e aur a jyada hota hain
yeh vitamin calcium ko sokhne , haddiyo ko healthy rakhneaur koshika jhilli ki safety ke liye jaroori hain
riboflavin ka good source hain vitamin b aur riboflavin ka accha source hone ki wajah se mozzarellacheesekhana accha rahta hain
vitamin b complex family ka hissa hone ki wajah se yeh migraine attack , anemia jaise bimariyo mein faydemand hain
ismeanti oxidant bhi acchi matra mein paye jate hain

01 nariyal ke gharelu nuskhe home remedies
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips nariyal ke gharelu nuskhe
health tips a a print email nariyal hamare desh ke jyadatar samundari ilako mein bahut hi acchi matra mein ugaya jata hain
coconut mein potassium , fiber aur magnesium bharpoor matra mein paye jate hain
saath ki skin ko healthy rakhne ke liye bhi coconut bahut hi fayde mand mana gya hain
yeh energy ko badhane ke liye bahut hi accha source hain
nariyal mein vitamin , carbohydrates , protein aur minerals sabhi tarah ke poshak tatv mauzood hote hain
mahilaon ko periods se related agar problems ho toh rojana 10 gram geela nariyal khaye aur saath mein gaay ka doodh piye
kidney , thyroid , diabetes aur urine se related bimariyo se pidit rogiyo ke liye nariyal bahut hi faydemand mana jata hain
rojana 2 se 3 glass nariyal paani peene se chehra chamakne lagta hain
05 high blood pressure hone par kya khaye
high blood pressure hone par kya khaye aur kya naa khaye
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips high blood pressure hone par kya khaye aur kya naa khaye
health tips a a print email kai baar achanak se kamjori hone lagti hain aur tabiyat kharab ho jati hain
aise mein apne blood pressure ka dhyaan rakhna bahut hi jaroori hain
high blood pressure ki problem mein sabse pahle aapko apne khan pan mein in cheezo ko shamil karna chahiye
blood pressure badhne par aap calcium , magnesium aur potassium ki bharpoor matra mein upyog kare , yeh doodh , hari sabziya , daal , santra , badam aur sitaphal mein milte hain
is guidelines ko american heart institute ke saath saath indian national cancer institute ne bhi saraha hain
high blood pressure mein in cheezo se kare parhez
sauce , aachaar , chutney , azinomoto , baking powder aadi se parhez kare
packed food ya frozen items naa khaye
inme preservative hote hain aur namak bhi jyada matra mein hota hain

05 2 minutes mein banane wali maggi le
minutes mein banane wali maggi le sakti hain aapki 1 minute mein aapki jaan hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips 2 minutes mein banane wali maggi le sakti hain aapki 1 minute mein aapki jaan 0 health tips a a print email ho sakta hain ki yeh khabar padh kar aapka mood kharaab ho jaye kyonki maggi ham sabhi ke bachpan ki saathi hain aur ham iske baare mein kuch bhi bura nahi sunanaa chahte hain
magar is fast food ko lekar ab chaukaane wala khulasa hua hain
jankaari ke mutabik pichle dino uttar pradesh ke alag alag areas se maggi ke sample liye gye
laboratory ke jaanch mein yeh paya gya ki iss fast food mein bhaari matra mein monosodium glutamate msg aur lead hain
lead ki matra 17 parts per million hain , jabki iski anumati mahaz
ppm ki hain
times of india ke mutabik , lucknow food safety drug administration ne food safety standard authority of india ko likha hain ki company ke khilaaf sakht karvaai ki jaye
ke niyaamak ne kaha hain ki desh bhar se sample lekar jaanch ki jaye , taki iss fast food ki quality ki sachchaai sabke samne aa sake
isme kai haanikarak chemicals hain
aapki jankari ke liye bata de monosodium glutamate msg ek amino acid hain , jise swaad badhane ke liye istemaal kiya jata hain
08 dhaniya powder ke fayde benefits of
dhaniya powder ke fayde benefits of coriander powder hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips dhaniya powder ke fayde benefits of coriander powder 1 health tips a a print email dhaniya powder ke fayde ya phir sabut dhaniya ke fayde bahut hi adhik hain
bharat ke newspaper ho ya magazine ka column , sabhi mein health beauty ke baare ko lekar kafi kuch likha jata hain , western countries mein aisa kam dekhne ko milta hain kyonki bharat mein jadi bootiyo aur aushdhiyo par jyada bharosha kiya jata hain
isme kai healthy gun hote hain
ise nature ka gift kahe ya medicine , isse human body ko kafi benefits milte hain
agar dhaniya powder ka nutrients chart dekha jaye to isme 8 fiber ,
calcium aur anya gunkari tatv paye jate hain
yeh anti diabetic bhi hota hain , isi karan europe ke kai desho mein ise anti diabetic paudhe ke naam se bhi jana jata hain
dhaniya ke anya gunkari baato ke baare mein janiye ; 1 blood sugar ko control karta hain dhaniya mein blood sugar ko control karne ki capacity hoti hain , aisa duniya bhar ke serve reports mein bataya gya hain
dhaniya powder body se sugar level ko kam kar deta hain aur insulin ki matra ko badhata hain , jisse sharir mein blood sugar hamesha control mein rahti hain
salmonella bacteria ko khatm karta hain dhaniya , salmonella bacteria ko khatm kar deta hain
is becteria se food poisoning jaise ghatak rog ho jate hain
dhaniya mein volatile oil hota hain jo kafi labhkari hain
research ke anusaar dhaniya ke beejo mein cholesterol ko maintain karne ke tatv hote hain
infective rogo par asardar infective rog jaise chicken pox aadi mein dhaniya powder madadgar hota hain
you may also like moohase door karne ke gharelu upay aur nuskhe 7 aniyamit periods ki samsya ko door karta hain acche masalo mein acche swasthvardhak gun hote hain
periods ke dauraan jyada bleeding hone par dhaniya powder ka sewan faydemand hota hain
you may also like periods ke dauran kya khana chahiye 8 jhurriya door karta hain dhaniya powder ya dhaniya ki pattiya , jhurriyo ko kam karti hain
inme anti oxidants kafi matra mein hota hain jiske chalte ise lagane se tavcha mein khichaav aa jata hain

kabhi pollution to kabhi unhealthy khana aadi

hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips calcium ki kami hone ke lakshan kya hain
health tips a a print email calcium haddiyo aur daanto ko banane aur uske maintenance ke liye , muscles ke sankoochan , heart beat ko niyamit karne aur blood clotting karne ke liye bahut jaroori hain
junk food ke jyada sewan aur exercise na karne ki wajah se calcium ki kami dekhi ja rahi hain
calcium ki kami ko janne ke liye blood test karwaye aur doctor se consult karke dusre lab test jaroor karwaye
kam calcium hone ki wajah se neend na aana , darr lagna , tension mein rahnaaam baat hoti hain
agar aapme calcium ki kami ho gyi ho to haddiya asaani se fracture ho sakti hain
teen girls mein periodproblems calcium ki kami hone par kishoriyo mein yauvan deri se aata hainaur calcium ki kami hone se periods mein bhi gadbadi ho sakti hain
kai teen age girls mein periods ke pahle kafi dard bhi ho sakta hain
baalo mein hardness aur dryness aana ek aam baat ban jati hain
09 computer users ke liye aankho ki dekh
computer users ke liye aankho ki dekh bhaal ke liye tips tips for eye care for computer users hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips computer users ke liye aankho ki dekh bhaal ke liye tips tips for eye care for computer users 0 health tips a a print email aankhe sharir ka sabse important part hoti hain
is article mein computer users ke liye eyes care ke kai tips diye ja rahe hain
computer users ke liye aankho ki dekh bhaal ke tips
eye level adjust kare computer par kaam karte huye apni aankho ki seedh mein screen rakhe
bahar jaye , ghoomkar aaye phir fresh mood se baithkar kaam kare
20 20 ka rule follow kare 20 20 20 ka rule follow kare
yani ki kaam karne ki shuruvaat ke 20 minutes baad 20 seconds ka rest le aur 20 feet ki doori rakhe
isse aapki aankho mein moisture bana rahega aur dryness nahi rahegi
brightness kam kare jab aap computer par kaam kar rahe hain to screen ki brightness kam kar le
brightness ko aankho ke hisab se adjust kare taki brightness ke karan aankho par tikhi roshini na pade
isse aapki aankho par roshini ka negative impact nahi padta hain aur aankhe hamesha swasth bani rahengi
08 janiye alag alag paints ke baare mein
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge janiyealag alagpaints kebaare mein aur kaun sa paint aapki deewaro ke liye accha rahega
general knowledge a a print email kya aap apne ghar ko colour karwaane ja rahe hain
to dosto yeh post jaroor padhe
lekin is paint ko karne mein thodi acchi jankaari aur extra efforts ki jaroorat padti hain
texture paints wall ko beautiful arts se sajane ke liye texture paint ka istemal kiya jata hain
normal colour paint se alag is paint ko lagane ka process bhi alag hota hain
iske liye company ki tarah se trainee employees ko logo ke gharo mein bheja jata hain
is technique se ghar ko multi star hotel jaisa khubsoorat banaya ja sakta hain
yeh kai tarah ke beautiful shades aur texture mein milta hain
clay paint clay paint dharti se milne wale minerals se banaya jata hain
apne ghar ko eco friendly aur hygienic banane ke liye clay paint ek accha option hain
cement based paint yeh sirf ghar ki baahari deewaaro ke liye hi accha rahta hain
limewash ya whitewash limewash ko calcium based minerals se banaya jata hain
limewash paint asal mein choona paint hota hain
lime wash paint andar aur bahar dono jagaho par istemal kiya ja sakta hain , yeh lakdi , brick , plaster ya concrete sabhi jagaho par accha rahta hain
milk paint clay paint aur lime paint mein jaha aapko minerals milte hain , vahi milk paint protein based hota hain
dry distemper yeh zyadatar bright shades mein milta hain aur iski keemat bhi thodi zyada hoti hain
oil bound distemper yeh 2 3 saal tak kharab nahi hota
weathershield surface paint gharo ke baahar deewaro par lagne wala yeh paint temperature ko 5 degree kam karne ki power rakhta hain
weather shield paint velvet touch , three in one aur dulux super smooth category mein available hota hain
synthetic enamel paint yeh 2 tarah ke hote hain
general purpose enamel khidaki , darwaajo aur steel ke furniture ke saath saath dewaaro ke liye bhi istemal kiya jata hain , lekin super synthetic enamel khas karke lakdi aur metal ke liye hi istemal kiya jata hain
lux super smooth category mein available hota hain
water proof paint ; water proof paint mein colours ko saalo tak ek jaisa rakhne ki quality hoti hain
acrylic emulsion paint dusre wall paint ke mukable zyada popular hain
yeh glossy , semi glossy aur matt finish ke hundreds shades mein available hain
plastic shine royal luxury emulsion paint plastic shine royal luxury emulsion paint ki khubsoorati raat ko nikhaarti hain
ghar ki baahri deewaro par lagne wala yeh paint sun rays ke reflection ke baad chamakta hain
hygienic paint ghar ki deewaro ka hygienic hona bahut hi jaroori hain
kyonki deewaro par mauzood chemicals , dust aur bacteria hame kai tarah se nuksaan pahucha sakte hain
ordinary paint mein phenol and formaldehyde jaise chemical hote hain , jinse cancer hone ka khatra hota hain
aam paint mein mauzood chemicals hawaa mein ghool kar baccho mein asthma paida kar sakte hain
yahi nahi khujali , fefdo ki takhleef , aankhe aur skin mein allergic reaction bhi non hygienic paint ke asar se ho sakta hain
market mein aise bahut se paint available hain jo non toxic element se bane hote hain
yeh paint hygienic hone ke saath hi eco friendly bhi hote hain
yeh zero volatile organic compound yani hawaa mein na ghulne wale aur chemical rahit hone ke saath hi non toxic hote hain
yeh gandh rahit paint faydemand bhi hain , kyonki yeh sirf 250 chemicals se taiyaar kiye jate hain , jinme 98 natural hote hain
non eco friendly ya traditional paints mein mauzood voc yani ki volatile organic compound hawaa mein ghulne wale chemical gas ke roop mein hote hain , jo hard hone ke saath hi liquid bhi ho sakte hain
voc mein kai tarah ke chemical mauzood hote hain , jo sehat par bura asar daalte hain
center for energy research studies ne bhi emulsion companies ko order diye hain ki paint mein chromium , led , mercury ki quantity nahi hona chahiye
is order ke paas hone ke baad sabhi companies ne eco friendly paints ka production karne ka process tez kar diya tha
hygienic paint ka chunaav karne se pahle yeh jaroor jaan lena chahiye ki kaun se paint hygienic hain , isliye paint karwaane se pahle yeh paint ke hygienic paint ke baare mein jaroor jane
aam taur par aap colours ko 2 parts mein divide kar sakte hain
in rango mein red , orange aur yellow colour aata hain
in rango mein neela , green , white aur cream colour shamil hain
05 litchi lichi ya leechee khane ke fayde
litchi , lichi ya leechee khane ke fayde benefits of lychee hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips litchi , lichi ya leechee khane ke fayde benefits of lychee 0 health tips a a print email garmiyo ke mausam mein lichi bade hi chaav se khaye jane wala fruit hain
iska scientific naam bhi litchi chinensis hain
china , taiwan aur south east asia ke kam uchaai wale jagaho par litchi ki kheti ki jati hain
litchi leechee , lichi se hone wale fayde
cancer lichi mein cancer se ladne wale kai tatv paye jate hain
iske gude mein flavonoids ghatak aur janlewa cancer bimaari se bachaate hain
saath hi flavones , quercetin aur kaempferol jaise tatv tezi se badh rahe cancer cells ko badhne se rokte hain
lichi breast cancer se bachaane mein faydemand hain
dil ki bimari lichi blood pressure ko control karne ke saath hi heart attack aur kai prakar ki dil ki bimariyo ko door rakhta hain
rojana 1 glass lichi ka juice peekar aap healthy rah sakte hain , kyonki ismein polyphenols ki matra dil ko swasth rakhti hain
saath hi ismen mauzood anti oxidants immunity system ko chust durust rakhne ke saath hi motiyabind jaisi bimari ko koso door rakhta hain
vitamin c sifr vitamin c ek aisa tatv hain , jise hamari body naturally nahi banaati hain
vitamin c anti aging ka kaam karti hain , jo skin ko young rakhne ke saath kai prakar ke infection jaise gale ka dard , sardi khansi aur seasonal bukhaar se bhi bachaati hain
haddiyo ko majboot banati hain leechee mein phosphorus aur magnesium ki bharpoor matra payi jati hain , jo haddiyo ko majboot banaati hain
saath hi kai prakar ke minerals jaise copper aur meganize bhi haddiyo ko tutne se bachate hain
oligonol lichi mein mauzood tatv oligonol se sharir mein jama extra fat kam hota hain
vitamin b lichi mein vitamin b complex jaise thymine , riboflavin , niacin aur folates ki bharpoor matra hain
jo carbohydrate , protein aur fat ki matra ko control karta hain
beta carotene ki achchi matra hamare immune system ko sahi rakhne mein madad karti hain
wajan kam karti hain litchi mein calorie bahut kam matra mein paayi jati hain aur saturated fat aur fiber ki samanya matra hoti hain
lichi se skin ko hone wale fayde skin ko healthy aur glowing banaane ke liye vitamin c aur nutrients jaise tatv lichi mein paye jate hain , jinhe khana bahut jyada faydemand hota hain
lekin aajkal dhool , pollution , uv radiation aur dhooye ki wajah se yeh samsya aam ho gyi hain
free radicals asamay budhaape ka main reason hain
lekin lichi mein mauzood vitamin c ek accha anti oxidant hota hain
free radicals se nijaat ismein vitamin c , b , b complex aur flavonoids paye jate hain jo pollution se ho rahe chehre ke nuksaan ko door karte hain
free radicals oxygen moliquels se bante hain , jinhe dhyaan na dene par cancer ka roop le lete hain
lichi vitamin c , niacin aur thymine ka achcha source hain , jo baalon ke liye bahut jaroori tatv hain

isme potassium aur magnesium bhari matra mein paya jata hain
yeh bilkul natural roop se milta hain , na koi packaging hoti hain aur na hi koi processing
fresh lime juice dusra natural drink hain nimbu ka ras , jise turant nichodte hi peena sehatmand hota hain

fruits smoothies smoothie taiyaar hoti hain , doodh , dahi , shahad aur fruits se
isko peene se body ko energy , protein aur minerals milte hain

health tips a a print email lijiye garmiyo ka mausam aa gya hain
garmi ke mausam mein tarbooz ka juice hame active aur fit banaye rakhne mein help karta hain
ek research mein yeh bataya gya hain ki garmi ke dino mein rojana 2 glass tarbooz ka juice watermelon juice hame jaroor pina chahiye
tarbooz ka juice aur kali mirch powder ko ek saath mila kar peene se sharir mein calcium , magnesium , potassium , copper , zinc aur iron ki bahut acchi matra sharir ko prapt hoti hain
saath hi isse vitamin c , vitamin b1 , b2 , b3 , b5 aur b6 bhi prapt hote hain
benefits of watermelon juice black pepper powder together in hindi urdu
sharir ko dehydrate hone se bachaye tarbooz ka juice peene se body ko hydrate rakhne mein madad milti hain
cancer se bachaye watermelon juice aur black pepper powder ko mila kar peene se cancer cells ko khatm karne mein madad milti hain
kyonki tamatar mein paya jane wala lycopene anti oxidant tarbooz mein bhi kafi acchi matra mein paya jata hain , jo body ki immunity ko strong karne mein bahut hi labhdayak hain
asthma mein faydemand kai logo ka manna hain ki tarbooz ka thanda juice asthma mein nuksaan pahucha sakta hain , lekin aisa nahi hain
cholesterol ko control kare watermelon juice peene se cholesterol control mein rahta hain aur isse hdl balance mein rahta hain
tarbooz ka juice ya sharbat aise banaye samagri ingredients 2 3 kilo taaza fresh kata hua tarbooz , 1 nimbu , 1 cup ice cube , swaadanusaar chini , 1 4 chammach kali mirch powder aur kuch pudine ki pattiya

health tips a a print email shakahari khane mein agar kuch special banana ho toh hamare yaha sabse pahle naam aatahain paneer ka
swaad ke saath saathposhak tatv jaise protein , calcium , vitamin b2 , b12 aur vitamin d sabhi paneer mein mauzoodhotehain
aaiyejantehain paneerke fayde benefitsofcheese in hindi skin ke liye accha chehre par chamak laani ho toh paneer ka sewan kare
vitamin b ke sewan se healthy aur glowing skin milti hain
healthy teeth jab majboot daanto ki baat aati hain , toh calcium sabse jaroori hain
paneermein calcium high quality mein miltahain
paneer is rog sepeeditmareezoke liyebest upay hain
is bimari kailaj protein , calcium , vitamin aur high quality minerals ka sewan karna hain , jo ki yeh sabhi cheeze paneer mein mauzood hotihain
strong bones ke liye calcium ki jaroorat hoti hain aur paneer mein protein aur calcium dono hi high quality mein mauzood hote hain
paneer mein vitamin a , phosphorus aurzinc bhi payajatahain
khastaurpar baccho , pregnant women aur buzurgo ki haddiyo ko majboot karne mein paneer madad karta hain
paneer mein high quality ka fat mauzood hotahain , jo cholesterolko badhata hain

vahi kuch desho mein health standards ke anusaarraw milk ka istemalcheesemeinnahi karneki salah di jati hain
