jabki pasteurised doodh mein bacteria nahi hote hain
08 brown rice khane 12 behatarin fayde
brown rice khane ke 12 behatarin fayde
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips brown rice khane ke 12 behatarin fayde
general knowledge , health tips a a print email brown rice ko chhilke wala chawal ya bhoora chawal bhi kaha jata hain
brown rice mein dimaag ko badhaane wale poshak tatv paaye jate hain
brown rice mein vitamin b , phosphorus , selenium , manganese , potassium aur magnesium samet kai dusre nutrients bhi bharpoor matra mein paye jate hain
yeh dietary fiber aur phtonutrients ka bahut hi good source hain , jo weight ko manage karne ka bhi kaam karta hain
aaiye jante hain brown rice bhoore chawal khane ke fayde benefits of brown rice in hindi urdu
haddiya strong banaye brown rice magnesium ka good source hain , jo bones ko healthy banaye rakhne mein ahem role ada karta hain
cup brown rice khane se body ko daily jaroorat ka 21 magnesium milta hain
pittashay ki patthari ke khatre ko kam kare american journal of gastroantrology mein published ek research ke according brown rice wale fiber se bharpoor diet ko lene se ladies mein pittashay ki patthari hone ka khatrakafi kam ho jata hain
blood sugar level ko kam kare brown chawal mein mauzood fiber bloodsugar level ko control karke type 2 diabetes ko rokne mein madad karte hain
diabetes ke patient ko agar chawal khane ka mann kare to vah safed chawal ki bajaye brown rice ka sewan kare
wazan ko control mein rakhta hain brown rice mein fiber zyada matra mein paya jata hain , isliye yeh aapke jariye li jane wali calories ki quantity ko control karta hain aur aapke pet ko kafi der tak bhara hua rakhta hain
howard ke researchers ne apni research mein yeh paya ki jin aurato ne apni diet mein brown rice ka istemal kiya unka wazan normal rakhne mein unhe jyada success mili
nervous system ko majboot banaye brown rice mein manganese acchi matra mein paya jata hain , jo nervous system ko healthy banane mein kafi madadgar hota hain
poshak tatv fatty acid ka production badhaa kar aur cholesterol ko paida karke sex hormones ke production ko bhi badhaate hain
temple university ke researchers ne apni research mein yeh paya ki brown rice ko khane se blood pressure kam ho jata hain aur dhamniyo mein plague banne ke khatre ko kam kiya ja sakta hain , is tarah yeh hame heart ki bimariyo ke khatre se hame bachata hain
diet ki jaroorato ko pura kare ; dietary guidelines ke according anaaz ka din mein 3 baar sewan karne ki salah di jati hain
brown rice cup dusre anaazo ke 3 baar sewan karne ke barabar hain
isliye apni daily nutrients ki jaroorato ko pura karne ke liye brown rice khana ek accha kadam saabit ho sakta hain
breast cancer se bachaye ; brown rice mein mauzood phytonutrients breast cancer aur heart ki bimariyo se ladne mein help karte hain
jyada umar ki ladies par kiye gye research se yeh baat saabit huyi ki brown rice ko khane se enterolactone ka level badhta hain , jisse breast cancerke khatre ko kam karne mein madad milti hain
asthma ke symptoms ko kam kare ; brown ricemein magnesium jyada hota hain , isliye yeh asthma ke symptoms ko kam karne mein help karta hain
kai researches yeh baat proof ho chuki hain ki brown rice ko khane se asthma ke patient ko kafi aaram milta hain
brown rice mein mauzood selenium bhi asthma ko door karne mein madad karta hain
pet ke cancer se bachaye brown rice mein selenium paya jata hain jo pet ke cancerhone ke khatre ko kam karta hain
chawal mein mauzood fiber ki jyada matra aant ke cancer ko rokne wale chemicals par asar daalta hain , is tarah yeh pet ke cancer ko rokne mein helpful hota hain
kabz door kare fiber ki jyada matra hone ki wajah se brown rice digestive system ke liye faydemand hota hain
cholesterol level kam kare ; peese huye brown rice mein mauzood oil cholesterol ka level kam karne mein madad karta hain
brown rice mein fiber hota hain jo ldl yani bad cholesterol ko kam karne mein madadkarta hain
to dosto aapne jana ki brown rice khane se aapko kya kya fayde aur benefits hote hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email sharir mein khujali hone se kisi kaam ko karne mein man nahi lagta hain , yaha tak ki insaan khujali ke maare chidchida tak ho jata hain
research ke mutabik body ke immune system mein gadbadi hone ki wajah se bhi itching problem ka saamna karna padta hain
diabetes blood mein sugar level badh jane ki wajah se skin tak blood sahi tarike se pahuch nahi pata hain aur khujali hone lagti hain
hormonal change hormonal change ki wajah se skin dry ho jati hain aur isme itching hone lagti hain
anaemia body mein iron ki kami hone ki wajah se red blood cells kam ho jate hain
dehydration body mein paani ki kami ki wajah se skin dry ho jati hain , jiski wajah se khujali hone lagti hain
liver mein kharabi liver ke kharabhone ka asar body ke detoxification process par dekhne ko milta hain
kidney problem kidney ki kharabi hone par body ke toxins baahar nahi nikal paate hain aur isse khujali hone lagti hain
infections paseene , nami se bacterial ya fungal infection ki wajah se sharir mein khujali hone lagti hain

general knowledge a a print email kya aap daad , khaj , khujali aadi se preshan hain
saath hi yeh skin infection hone ki wajah bhi bante hain
fungal aur bacterial infection aisi hi problems hain , jinka sahi waqt par ilaj na hone par yeh bure body mein phail sakte hain
jante hain inhe door karne ke desi nuskho ke baare mein apple cider vinegar seb ka sirka vinegar yeast infection ko control karke fungus ki problem se chhutkara dilata hain
saath hi infected area mein 30 minutes tak sirka laga kar rakhe
iska anti bacterial , anti fungal aur antibiotic gun har tarah ke infection ko door karne mein madad karte hain
dahi dahi mein lactobacillus acidophilus bacteria mauzood hote hain jo bacteria aur yeast infection ke badhte growth ko rokne mein madad karte hain
vaginal infection , ringworm , khujali jaisi samsyaon ke ilaj mein dahi khana aur lagana faydemand rahta hain
istemal kaise kare ; infection wali jagah par dahi laga kar kam se kam 30 minutes tak rakhe
iska lycopene aur anti inflammatory tatv healing mein behatarin hota hain
cranberry karonda iska anti fungal aur anti bacterial formula fungal infection ko door karne mein sahayak hota hain
kaise kare istemal kisi bhi tarah ke infection se agar aap peedit ho toh cranberries karonda ka juice din mein ek baar jaroor piye
haldi mein anti oxidants ke saath saath anti bacterial gun mauzood hote hain , jo bacteria aur germs ke attack ko rokte hain
doodh doodh kai saare nutrients jaise fat , protein aur lactic acid ka khazana hota hain
saath hi isme anti inflammatory tatv bhi paye jate hain
jo skin ki problems ke ilaj ke liye bahut hi asardaar hota hain
aloe vera aloe vera har tarah ke skin ke liye faydemand hota hain
sensitive ho ya normal sabhi tarah ki skin problems ko door karta hain
aloe vera gel ko baalo mein lagane se baalo ko silky aur shiny banaya ja sakta hain
kaise kare istemal aloe vera ka natural antibiotic tatv har tarah ke skin infection ko door karne mein kargar hain
nariyal tel nariyal tel ka anti fungal tatv har tarah ke fungal infection se rahat dilata hain
kaise kare istemal nariyal tel halka hota hain , jisse yeh skin mein jaldi se absorb ho jata hain toh skin ko nariyal ke tel se hydrate rakhe
green tea green tea anti oxidants , anti bacterial aur anti inflammatory se bharpoor hota hain
kisi bhi tarah ka fungal infection ho ya yeast infection , har tarah ki problems ko door karta hain
kaise kare istemal green tea peena hi kai tarah ki skin problems se bache rahne ka tarika hain

hum log easy steps ko apna kar healthy rahna chahte hain
detoxify your body yeh sabse zyada asardaar detox drinks mein se ek hain
high fiber aur water content hone ki wajah se cucumber water body se sabhi toxins ko bahar kar deta hain
keep your skin healthy dry aur itchy skin bhala kise acchi lagti hain
iski wajah hain sun exposure , air pollution aur weather changes jinhe hum chah kar bhi avoid nahi kar sakte hain
cucumber water pee kar hum apne skin ko healthy bana sakte hain
isme vitamin b 5 acchi quantity mein hota hain aur yeh acchi glowing skin ke liye bhi jaroori hain

health tips a a print email kai baar lagatar workout karne ke baad bhi wajan kam nahi hota hain
diet par dhyaan de ek food log banaye jisse khane ki quality aur pattern par nazar rahe
calorie diet se kam kare
par rojana calorie consume 1200 se 1500 calorie se kam nahi hona chahiye , taki sharir ki activity ke liye energy bani rahe
kam calorie lene se aapka metabolism dheema ho jata hain
juice , junk food aur cold drinks ko apni diet mein jagah na de
calorie count ya note karna shuru kar de
yoga , ty chi , meditation aur pilates tension ke level ko kam karne mein madad karte hain
hafte mein ek din workout se break lena bhi jaroori hain
body ko surprise de workout ko badal badal kar kare
roj apna cardio routine badle
agar aap rojana jim jate hain toh monday ko kewal cycling kare
tuesday ko crass tenor aur teesre din treadmill par chale
skipping , punching aur 50 minutes ke cardio ke baad har roj 5 minutes stretching jaroor kare
agar aap high intensity se workout kar rahe hain , toh roz kareeb 350 calorie ghata lenge
hafte mein ek din body ko break dena bhi jaroori hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email hame apni skin ka bahut khyaal hota hain , lekin aankho ke baare jyada nahi sochte hain
energy dene wale fruits aur vegetables ko khaye
aankhon ki acchi health ke liye yeh food jaroor khaye vitamin a food amrood , orange , pineapple , lal aur hari mirch , shimla mirch mein vitamin a bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain
vitamin c wale food tarbooz , doodh , tamatar , angoor aadi mein vitamin c hota hain jo eyes ko hamesha cool banaye rakhta hain
vitamin e food fish , badam , gajar , anda , surajmukhi ke beej , papita yeh sabhi vitamin e ke source hain
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge machar ke kaatne par khujali se bachne ke liye lagaye yeh natural cheeze
general knowledge a a print email macchar mosquito ke kaatne ke baad aapko khujali ki samsya ho jati hain
is mosquito bites ke baad itch khujali bahut jyada hoti hain
inme se jyada upay traditions par based hain aur iske peeche koi scientific reason nahi hain
isliye kele ke chhilke ko androoni hisse ko infected skin par ragadne se aaram milta hain
nimbu ka ras nimbu mein anti bacterial aur anti microbial gun paye jate hain
spirit spirit lagane se khujali se aaram milta hain
aap apne first aid box se spirit nikalne aur usay macchar katne wali jagah par lagaye aur phir acchi tarah saaf kare
spirit ko rubbing alcohol bhi kaha jata hain
baking soda aur witch hazel in dono ka mota paste bana kar kaatne wali jagah par 15 minutes tak lagaye
baking soda mein ek alkaline compound paya jata hain , jo skin ke ph ko diffuse karne mein madad karta hain
isme paya jane wala molic acid khujlahat mein aaram dilata hain
ungli par thoda sa lar lagaye aur infected area par lagaye
aloe vera taza aloe vera ka thandapan khujali se aaram dilata hain
09 dengue se bachne ke upay
dengue se bachne ke upay
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips dengue se bachne ke upay
general knowledge , health tips a a print email life mein aisi bahut si cheeze hain jiske baare mein aap chahte hain hi aapke saath vah na ho , dengue bukhaar fever unme se ek hain
is virus ka infection aedes naam ke machhar ke kaatne se hota hain
khas baat yeh hi dengue phailane wale mosquitoes gande paani ki jagah saaf paani mein paida hote hain
isliye baarish mein gamlo , coolers , tyres aadi mein ikattha huye paani mein yeh macchar jyada paya jata hain
chemical ka istemal ghar ke aas paas dtt powder ya bleaching powder ka chhidakne se dengue phailane wale macchar khatm ho jate hain aur aap dengue se bache rah sakte hain

07 online shopping karte samay aise barte
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home tech tips online shopping karte samay aise barte sawdhani
tech tips a a print email india mein online shopping ka vyapar lagatar badh raha hain
gadgets , electronics , cloth , footwear , home appliance , furniture har cheez online khareedi ja sakti hain
iski badi wajah yeh hain ki yaha par har product market price se jyada saste mil jate hain
aapko aise tips batane ja rahe hain , jo online shopping ke samay aapke kaam aa sakte hain
aap kisi product ko online khareedna chahte hain to internet par kai saari website mil jayengi , lekin sabse jaroori hain ki aap sahi website ka chunaav kare
yeh isliye jaroori hain kyonki baat product ki quality ke saath aapke paise se judi hoti hain
online shopping ke liye bharat mein jin websites ka sabse jyada istemal kiya jata hain vah yeh hain
com www
com inke alawa kai aur bhi kai websites hain , jo online products sale karti hain
kai baar 2 alag alag website par kisi product ki keemat mein 100 rupaye se lekar 500 rupaye tak ka difference aa jata hain
aise mein aap koi mehnga aur sasta koi products lene se pahle uske price ko alag alag website par compare jaroor kare
sabse jaroori baat , kai baar 2 products ke model number mein mamooli antar hota hain , lekin keemat puri tarah se alag hoti hain
aise mein product ke model par jaroor dhyaan de
big offers aaj ka offer har online website kai products par big offers deti hain
in websites par kai baar kisi din , hafte ya phir festival ke samay 50 tak ka discount mil jata hain
aise mein jo log online shopping karte hain ve in offers par jaroor nazar rakhe
coupon aur promotional code ka istemal online sale karne wali kai websites customers ko offer coupon aur promotions code bhi send karti rahti hain
in codes ke message bhi aapke mobile mein aate rahte hain
saath hi yeh bonus point bhi dete hain
in sabhi baaton ka fayda yeh hota hain ki jab aap online shopping karenge , tab offer coupon , promotional code aur bonus point ke istemal se oos product ki keemat kam ho jati hain
exchange offfer kai users naya product khareedna chahte hain
aise mein ve exchange offer ka istemal kar sakte hain
yani ki koi user apne purane phone ko online exchange kar naya smartphone khareed sakta hain
cash on delivery online shopping mein cash on delivery sabse accha option mana jata hain
ise cod kahte hain
is option ke chalte users apna product lene ke baad uski keemat deta hain
jab aap koi product khareedte hain to payment ke saath cod aur emi ke option mauzood rahte hain
free shipping aap shopping ke dauran jab bhi koi product khareede , to is baat ka dhyaan rakhe ki uski shipping free hain ya nahi
darasal kai product par website free shipping nahi deti hain aur delivery ke waqt uski keemat aapko chukaani padti hain
aise mein free shipping ka hona bhi jaroori hain , taki aapki jeb par extra charge na aaye
iske liye aap ek baar phir kuch websites ki tulna kar sakte hain
darasal , jab aap koi product online khareedte hain to email id ka option aata hain
iske saath , product ki delivery ke liye aisa address dena chahiye jo delivery boy ko asaani ke saath mil jaye
emi ka option aap credit card istemal karte hain to online shopping ke samay emi ka option choose kar sakte hain
iska bada fayda yeh hain ki kai product emi par bhi utni keemat mein hi mil jate hain
emi bhi 6 mahine , 12 mahine , 18 mahine aur 24 mahine ke options mein de sakte hain
payment security online shopping ke samay kai logo ko payment security ka darr hota hain
aise mein agar aap kisi famous website se shopping kar rahe hain to vo apne payment option ko puri tarah secure rakhti hain
unki site par product aur security se judi certificate bhi rahta hain
halaki , iske baad bhi aapke mann mein darr hain to aap cod cash on delivery ka option choon sakte hain
halaki har product par cash on delivery ka option mauzood nahi hota hain
trace your order product ki booking karte samay website uski delivery se judi jankari bhi share karti hain
saath hi product booking ke baad vo aapko ek order id bhi deti hain
jiski madad se aap apne order ko trace kar sakte hain
i am not quite much with the internet , but i believe that what i just read is some good material
06 hari pyaz khane ke fayde benefits of
hari pyaz khane ke fayde benefits of spring onions , green onions hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips hari pyaz khane ke fayde benefits of spring onions , green onions 1 health tips a a print email spring onion , ek bahut hi lokpriy sabzi hain aur yeh kai kismo jaise safed , peeli aur lal mein paida hoti hain
is pyaz mein sulfur bhi adhik matra mein hota hain
is tarah ke pyaz mein calorie low hoti hain
spring pyaz ko hara pyaz kaha jata hain
hara pyaz vitamin c , vitamin b2 aur thiamine se bharpoor hota hain
isme vitamin a aur vitamin k bhi hota hain
iske alawa yeh copper , phosphorus , magnesium , potassium , chromium , manganese aur fiber ka accha source hain
hara pyaz flavonoids jaise quercetin ka bhi majboot source hain
yeh cholesterol ke oxykaran ko kam karta hain aur coronary heart disease ko kam karta hain
blood pressure maintain rakhta hain is pyaz mein sulfur ki matra , sharir mein bp ko sahi banaye rakhti hain
cholesterol level hara pyaz , cholesterol ke level ko sahi banaye rakhta hain
diabetes hare pyaz mein chromium hota hain jo sharir mein diabetes hone par faydemand hain
iski madad se blood sugar level control mein hota hain aur glucose tolerance mein bhi sudhar hota hain
allyl propyl disulfide bhi blood sugar ke level ko kam karne mein madadgar hoti hain
sardi aur flu hara pyaz , body mein sardi aur flu se ladne ke anti bacterial gun paida karta hain
pachan mein sudhar anti bacterial gun se pachan mein sudhar hota hain
pet ka cancer hare pyaz mein pectin hoti hain jo ek tarah ka liquid colloidal carbohydrates hota hain , jisse pet ke cancer ka khatra kam ho jata hain
immunity badhaye hara pyaz khane se body ki immunity badhti hain
gathiya aur asthma hare pyaz mein anti inflammatory aur anti histamine wale gun hote hain jisse gathiya aur asthma mein aaram milta hain
metabolism hara pyaz , metabolism ko control karta hain aur macronutrients ko banaye rakhta hain

health tips a a print email daanto se naakhoon chaabana ya kaatna bahut hi gandi aur buri aadat hain
nail biting ko onicofagia bhi kaha jata hain
daanto se nakhoon chabaane ke time ko pahchane nail biting ke triggers ko pahchane , jaise boring , television dekhte huye nakhoon chabana aadi
is dauran apne haatho ko band ya electric tape se baandh kar rakhe
nakhoono ka infection lagatar nakhoon chabaane se uske aas paas infection phail jata hain
nail biting ki aadat ko door karne ke liye behavioral therapy ka bhi sahara le sakte hain

accha resume banane ke tips tips for making writing good resume in hindi urdu
dher saara white space bhi aapke resume ka look kharab kar deta hain
grammatical errorse bache resume mein grammatical galtiya aksar dekhi jati hain , jisse recruiter ke saamne aapka impression interview se pahle kharab ho jata hain

general knowledge , health tips a a print email kya aapko pata hain ki bharat ka rashtriya ped kaun sa hain
jee haan bargad ka ped bharat ka rashtriya ped hain banyan tree is national tree of india
aaiye jante hain bargad ke ped ke gharelu nuskhe aur fayde benefits of banyan tree in hindi , banyan tree home remedies usage naak se khoon nikalna band kare bargad ke ped ki chhal ko chhachh ke saath mix karke iska powder bana le
minutes baalo mein lagaye
har tarah ki skin problems se chhutkara milta hain

urine ki problems mein aaram bargad ke phalo ko pees kar iska powder bana le

09 cancer ke lakshan symptoms of cancer in
cancer ke lakshan symptoms of cancer in hindi hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips cancer ke lakshan symptoms of cancer in hindi 0 health tips a a print email cancer ke lakshan laxan , symptoms of cancer in hindi janiye kya hote hain
aayiye jante hain kuch aise hi cancer ke symptoms ke baare mein
yeh fefdo mein tumor ya bronchitis ke lakshan bhi ho sakte hain
periods mein takhleef periods mein bahut jyada dard hona aur asamay khoon ka bahna , vaginal cancer ke lakshan ho sakte hain
aise mein doctor ki salah se trans vaginal ultrasound jaroor karwaye
nipple mein badlaav nipple ke size mein achanak change aana breast cancer ki wajah ho sakta hain
bahut jyada thakaan sharir mein jaroorat se jyada thakaan tiredness ka bane rahna , blood plates ya red blood cells mein gadbadi ka karan ho sakta hain , jisse leukemia ka khatra bana rahta hain , aisa hone par andekha na kare
yeh colon cancer ki chetawani hain

side effectsof camphor in hindi
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home health tips kapoor se hone wale nuksaan
health tips a a print email puja karne ke liye kapoor ka istemal kiya jata hain
kapoor se hone wale nuksan side effects of camphor in hindi
kapoor ke zyada istemal se aapko skin ulcer bhi ho sakta hain
kapoor pregnant ladies aur doodh pilaane wali maao ke liye nuksaandeh hoti hain
agar aap kapoor ko skin par direct apply karte hain to aapko skin allergy ya skin ki serious bimari ho sakti hain
09 woman ki kai problems ko door karte
woman ki kai problems ko door karte hain yeh 10 special food
hinglishpedia hinglishpedia menu about contact more finance miscellaneous health tips general tech news twitter facebook google rss linkedin dribbble pinterest menu home about health tips general knowledge android apps smartphone micromax intex lava panasonic microsoft spice finance search home general knowledge health tips woman ki kai problems ko door karte hain yeh 10 special food
general knowledge , health tips a a print email woman ki body apne puri life mein kai saare process se gujarti hain
ladies ko unke body ke according khane peene ki advice di jati hain
paani sahi matra mein peene se body ki androoni safaai hoti hain , khoon saaf hota hain aur body ko nutrients ki supply hoti hain
saath hi paani peene se kabz , dehydration aur blood circulation sahi rahta hain
agar aapko kabz ki shikayat rahti hain to regularly isko khayiye , kyonki isme dher saara fiber hota hain
pista piste mein dher sara copper , protein , calcium , potassium , phosphorus , vitamin b6 aur magnesium hota hain
isme fiber bhi bharpoor matra mein paya jata hain
jisse aapki kamar aur cholesterol level dono hi kam hote hain
isme high antioxidants hote hain jo cancer aur heart disease ko rokne mein aapki madad karte hain
cranberry karonda urine infection ladies mein hone wali ek aam bimari hain
but cranberry ka juice peene se aap urine infection ko door kar sakti hain
rojana ek glass fresh karonde ka juice aapko jaroor peena chahiye
yeh super market mein aapko easily mil jayega
alsi alsi ke beejo mein omega 3 fatty acid hota hain jo brain aur body ko healthy banaye rakhne ka kaam karta hain
isme fiber bahut acchi matra mein paya jata hain , jisse kabz , dil ki bimari , blood pressure aur cholesterol ki problems door rahti hain
yeh pms ke symptoms ko bhi door karta hain
yeh aapki body ko jaroori vitamin , minerals , antioxidants , healthy fat , carbohydrate aur fiber deta hain
doodh dahi low fat wala doodh sabhi ladies ko peena jaroori hain
women ki bones aur teeth ko strong banaye rakhne ke liye calcium , vitamin b12 aur riboflavin ko lena bahut hi jaroori hain , jo ki ek katori dahi aur ek glass doodh ko pee kar paya ja sakta hain
yeh fiber , antioxidants , vitamins aur minerals se bhare huye hote hain
green vegetables hari pattedar sabziya vitamin aur minerals ka khazana hoti hain
isse ladies ko periods ke dauran hone wali khoon ki kami ko door kiya ja sakta hain

saunf mein calcium , sodium , iron , potassium jaise tatv paye jate hain , jo sharir ko sehatmand rakhte hain
isse smarn shakti yaddasht badhti hain
